276.traditional: 這次遲到不是我們的錯。
276.pinyin: zhè cì chídào bùshì wǒmen de cuò
276.english: It was not our fault that we were late.

277.simplified: 我们明天将一起吃午饭。
277.traditional: 我們明天將一起吃午飯。
277.pinyin: wǒmen míngtiān jiāng yīqǐ chī wǔfàn
277.english: We will eat lunch together tomorrow.

278.simplified: 对不起，我忘了你的名字。
278.traditional: 對不起，我忘了你的名字。
278.pinyin: wǒmen míngtiān jiāng yīqǐ chī wǔfàn
278.english: I'm sorry; I've forgotten your name.

279.pinyin: qǐng yīshēng kāi diǎn késou yào
279.english: Ask the doctor to prescribe something for that cough.

280.pinyin: tā zǒujìn nèishì qù huàn yīfu
280.english: She went into the inner room to change her dress.

281.simplified: 我们深深感谢你的支持。
281.traditional: 我們深深感謝你的支持。
281.pinyin: wǒmen shēnshēn gǎnxiè nǐ de zhīchí
281.english: We are deeply grateful for your support.

282.simplified: 他没有努力工作的动力。
282.traditional: 他沒有努力工作的動力。
282.pinyin: tā méiyǒu nǔlì gōngzuò de dònglì
282.english: He hasn't much incentive to work hard.

283.pinyin: zhèxiē píngguǒ bù shú shì suān de
283.english: These apples are not ripe; they are sour.

284.simplified: 她穿着一件深蓝色的上衣。
284.traditional: 她穿著一件深藍色的上衣。
284.pinyin: tā chuānzhuó yī jiàn shēn lánsè de shàngyī
284.english: She wore a dark blue coat.

285.pinyin: fēngnián shí rénrén dōu chī dé bǎo
285.english: In years of plenty everyone has plenty to eat.

286.simplified: 他向我提了一些很好的意见。
286.traditional: 他向我提了一些很好的意見。
286.pinyin: tā xiàng wǒ tí le yīxiē hěn hǎo de yìjiàn
286.english: He gave me some good advice.

287.simplified: 你应该好好利用这个机会。
287.traditional: 你應該好好利用這個機會。
287.pinyin: nǐ yīnggāi hǎohǎo lìyòng zhège jīhuì
287.english: You should take advantage of it.

288.simplified: 我们想去参加化装舞会。
288.traditional: 我們想去參加化裝舞會。
288.pinyin: wǒmen xiǎng qù cānjiā huàzhuāng wǔhuì
288.english: We want to join in the masquerade.

289.simplified: 休息一下对你会有好处的。
289.traditional: 休息一下對你會有好處的。
289.pinyin: xiūxi yīxià duì nǐ huì yǒuhǎochù de
289.english: It'll do you good to have a rest.

290.simplified: 你的雨衣系上带子更好看.
290.traditional: 你的雨衣系上帶子更好看.
290.pinyin: nǐ de yǔyī jìshang dàizi gèng hǎokàn

291.english: Don't stand on ceremony. I'm no stranger.

292.simplified: 她一点儿也不像那么大年纪.
292.traditional: 她一點兒也不像那麼大年紀.
292.pinyin: tā yīdiǎnr yě bù xiàng nàme dà niánjì
292.english: She doesn't look her age at all.

293.simplified: 他们拿那位老人开玩笑。
293.traditional: 他們拿那位老人開玩笑。
293.pinyin: tāmen ná nà wèi lǎorén kāiwánxiào
293.english: They are making fun of the old man.

294.simplified: 我们必须提高生产水平。
294.traditional: 我們必須提高生產水平。

295.pinyin: tā zuò zài fēngkǒu shàng zháoliáng le
295.english: He sat in a draught and catch a cold.

296.simplified: 晚课后，男孩子们去睡了。
296.traditional: 晚課後，男孩子們去睡了。
296.pinyin: wǎn kè hòu nánháizi men qù shuì le
296.english: The boys went to sleep after vespers.

297.simplified: 每个学生发了一本课本。
297.traditional: 每個學生發了一本課本。
297.pinyin: měi gè xuésheng fā le yī běn kèběn
297.english: Each student was issued with a textbook.

298.simplified: 要是我再有一次机会就好了。
298.traditional: 要是我再有一次機會就好了。
298.pinyin: yàoshi wǒ zài yǒuyīcì jīhuì jiù hǎole
298.english: If only I had another chance.

299.english: This dish is delicious but rather a trouble to prepare.

300.simplified: 他洗澡时想出了这个主意。
300.traditional: 他洗澡時想出了這個主意。
300.pinyin: tā xǐzǎo shí xiǎngchū le zhège zhǔyi
300.english: The idea came to him in his bath.

301.simplified: 他们之间的交易告吹了。
301.traditional: 他們之間的交易告吹了。
301.pinyin: tāmen zhījiān de jiāoyì gào chuīle
301.english: The transaction between them was dismissed.

302.simplified: 他用一把刀子将苹果切开。
302.traditional: 他用一把刀子將蘋果切開。
302.pinyin: tā yòng yī bǎ dāozi jiāng píngguǒ qiē kāi
302.english: He cleaved an apple with a knife.

303.simplified: 我没有注意到他已经走了。
303.traditional: 我沒有注意到他已經走了。
303.pinyin: wǒ méiyǒu zhùyì dào tā yǐjīng zǒu le
303.english: I failed to note that he had left.

304.simplified: 孩子们假装开商店玩儿.
304.traditional: 孩子們假裝開商店玩兒.
304.english: The children were playing at keeping shop.

305.simplified: 我们在旁边的地里放羊。
305.traditional: 我們在旁邊的地裡放羊。
305.pinyin: wǒmen zài pángbiān de dì lǐ fàngyáng
305.english: We are grazing the sheep in the next field.

306.simplified: 那些男孩子们渴望下课。
306.traditional: 那些男孩子們渴望下課。
306.english: The boys were itching for the lesson to end.

307.simplified: 夏天他总是高高兴兴的。
307.traditional: 夏天他總是高高興興的。
307.english: He's always full of cheer in summer.

308.simplified: 我们一星期三节化学课。
308.traditional: 我們一星期三節化學課。
308.pinyin: wǒmen yī Xīngqīsān jié huàxué kè
308.english: We have three periods of chemistry a week.

309.simplified: 你不是支持我就是反对我。
309.traditional: 你不是支持我就是反對我。
309.pinyin: nǐ bùshì zhīchí wǒ jiùshì fǎnduì wǒ
309.english: You are either with me or against me.

310.pinyin: tā xiǎng dāng yīshēng huòzhě jīngshāng
310.english: He wants to be a doctor or go into business.

311.simplified: 门口有个男人要求见你。
311.traditional: 門口有個男人要求見你。
311.pinyin: ménkǒu yǒu gè nánrén yāoqiú jiàn nǐ
311.english: Some man at the door is asking to see you.

312.simplified: 他觉得他们和他地位相等。
312.traditional: 他覺得他們和他地位相等。
312.pinyin: tā juéde tāmen hé tā dìwèi xiāngděng
312.english: He feels that they are his equals.

313.pinyin: jīnnián de kāishǐ jiānghuì gèng hǎo
313.english: The commencement of this year will be better.

314.simplified: 他们决定开办一家合作社。
314.traditional: 他們決定開辦一家合作社。
314.english: They decided to set up a cooperative.

315.simplified: 你现在需要的就是放假。
315.traditional: 你現在需要的就是放假。
315.pinyin: nǐ xiànzài xūyào de jiùshì fàngjià
315.english: A holiday will be just the thing for you.

316.simplified: 她上大学时经常练跑步.
316.traditional: 她上大學時經常練跑步.
316.pinyin: tā shàng dàxué shí jīngcháng liàn pǎobù
316.english: She used to run when she was at college.

317.simplified: 他是一位非常重要的人物。
317.traditional: 他是一位非常重要的人物。
317.pinyin: tā shì yī wèi fēicháng zhòngyào de rénwù
317.english: He is a man of great importance.

318.simplified: 别以为我能相信那件事.
318.traditional: 別以為我能相信那件事.
318.pinyin: bié yǐwéi wǒ néng xiāngxìn nà jiàn shì
318.english: You can scarcely expect me to believe that.

319.simplified: 他将他的名字写在清单上。
319.traditional: 他將他的名字寫在清單上。
319.pinyin: tā jiāng tā de míngzi xiě zài qīngdān shàng
319.english: He wrote down his name on the list.

320.simplified: 这里有很大的活动空间。
320.traditional: 這裡有很大的活動空間。
320.pinyin: zhèlǐ yǒu hěn dà de huódòng kōngjiān
320.english: There is plenty of space here to move about.

321.simplified: 她和我在学院里是同学。
321.traditional: 她和我在學院裡是同學。
321.pinyin: tā hé wǒ zài xuéyuàn lǐ shì tóngxué
321.english: She and I were contemporaries at college.

322.simplified: 她在电话中说话不太客气.
322.traditional: 她在電話中說話不太客氣.
322.pinyin: tā zài diànhuà zhōng shuōhuà bù tài kèqi
322.english: She sounded rather off on the phone.

323.simplified: 我们在下午四点钟喝茶。
323.traditional: 我們在下午四點鐘喝茶。
323.pinyin: wǒmen zài xiàwǔ sì diǎnzhōng hē chá
323.english: We have tea at four o'clock in the afternoon.

324.simplified: 我在写现代英语的语法书.
324.traditional: 我在寫現代英語的語法書.
324.pinyin: wǒ zài xiě xiàndài Yīngyǔ de yǔfǎshū
324.english: I'm writing a grammar of modern English.

325.simplified: 我想我们能从中学到许多。
325.traditional: 我想我們能從中學到許多。
325.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng wǒmen néng cóng zhōngxué dào xǔduō
325.english: I think we may learn much from it.

326.simplified: 他已经习惯在外面吃饭了。
326.traditional: 他已經習慣在外面吃飯了。
326.pinyin: tā yǐjīng xíguàn zài wàimiàn chīfàn le
326.english: He is used to eating out all the time.

327.simplified: 我们都支持他的科学研究。
327.traditional: 我們都支持他的科學研究。
327.pinyin: wǒmen dōu zhīchí tā de kēxuéyánjiū
327.english: We all support his scientific research.

328.simplified: 请给我找一个放糖的容器。
328.traditional: 請給我找一個放糖的容器。
328.pinyin: qǐng gěi wǒ zhǎo yī gè fàng táng de róngqì
328.english: Please find me a receptacle for sugar.

329.simplified: 我从不错过踢足球的机会。
329.traditional: 我從不錯過踢足球的機會。
329.pinyin: wǒ cóngbù cuòguò tī zúqiú de jīhuì
329.english: I never miss a chance of playing football.

330.simplified: 父亲下午总要睡个午觉。
330.traditional: 父親下午總要睡個午覺。
330.pinyin: fùqīn xiàwǔ zǒngyào shuì gè wǔjiào
330.english: Father always takes a nap in the afternoon.

331.simplified: 住寄宿舍比住旅馆便宜.
331.traditional: 住寄宿舍比住旅館便宜.
331.pinyin: zhù jì sùshè bǐ zhù lǚguǎn piányi
331.english: It's cheaper to live in lodgings than in a hotel.

332.simplified: 我不喜欢读他的文学批评。
332.traditional: 我不喜歡讀他的文學批評。
332.pinyin: wǒ bù xǐhuan dú tā de wénxué pīpíng
332.english: I don't like to read his literary criticism.

333.simplified: 别把刚才跟你说的事忘了。
333.traditional: 別把剛才跟你說的事忘了。
333.pinyin: bié bǎ gāngcái gēn nǐ shuō de shì wàng le
333.english: Don't forget what I told you just now.

334.simplified: 好像她已出去好几天了。
334.traditional: 好像她已出去好幾天了。
334.pinyin: hǎoxiàng tā yǐ chūqù hǎo jǐ tiān le
334.english: It looks as if she's gone away for a few days.

335.simplified: 我从报纸上得知这个消息。
335.traditional: 我從報紙上得知這個消息。
335.pinyin: wǒ cóng bàozhǐ shàng dézhī zhège xiāoxi
335.english: I learned this news from the newspaper.

336.simplified: 排球是我很喜欢的运动。
336.traditional: 排球是我很喜歡的運動。
336.pinyin: páiqiú shì wǒ hěn xǐhuan de yùndòng
336.english: Volleyball is a sport of which I am very fond.

337.simplified: 他昨天参加了我们的讨论。
337.traditional: 他昨天參加了我們的討論。
337.pinyin: tā zuótiān cānjiā le wǒmen de tǎolùn
337.english: He joined us in the discussion yesterday.

338.simplified: 除我之外，他们都去睡觉了。
338.traditional: 除我之外，他們都去睡覺了。
338.pinyin: chú wǒ zhīwài tāmen dōu qù shuìjiào le
338.english: They all went to sleep except me.

339.simplified: 今天食堂比往常忙得多.
339.traditional: 今天食堂比往常忙得多.
339.pinyin: jīntiān shítáng bǐ wǎngcháng máng dé duō
339.english: The canteen is more than usually busy today.

340.simplified: 整个工作只需要半个小时。
340.traditional: 整個工作只需要半個小時。
340.pinyin: zhěnggè gōngzuò zhǐ xūyào bànge xiǎoshí
340.english: The whole job only takes half an hour.

341.simplified: 我找不到你寄给我的那封信。
341.traditional: 我找不到你寄給我的那封信。
341.pinyin: wǒ zhǎobudào nǐ jì gěi wǒ de nà fēng xìn
341.english: I can't trace that letter you sent me.

342.simplified: 我们每个星期四下午开会。
342.traditional: 我們每個星期四下午開會。
342.pinyin: wǒmen měi gè Xīngqīsì xiàwǔ kāihuì
342.english: We have meetings every Thursday afternoon.

343.simplified: 早饭后，他读了各种报纸。
343.traditional: 早飯後，他讀了各種報紙。
343.pinyin: zǎofàn hòu tā dú le gèzhǒng bàozhǐ
343.english: After breakfast he perused the newspapers.

344.simplified: 这条街道比那条短四倍。
344.traditional: 這條街道比那條短四倍。
344.pinyin: zhè tiáo jiēdào bǐ nà tiáo duǎn sì bèi
344.english: This street is four times shorter than that one.

345.simplified: 她长成了一位漂亮的女人。
345.traditional: 她長成了一位漂亮的女人。
345.pinyin: tā cháng chéngle yī wèi piàoliang de nǚrén
345.english: She developed into a beautiful woman.

346.simplified: 我百分之百同意你的看法。
346.traditional: 我百分之百同意你的看法。
346.pinyin: wǒ bǎifēnzhībǎi tóngyì nǐ de kànfǎ
346.english: I am a hundred percent in agreement with you.

347.simplified: 这样的天才现在很少见。
347.traditional: 這樣的天才現在很少見。
347.pinyin: zhèyàng de tiāncái xiànzài hěn shǎojiàn
347.english: It is rare to find such a genius nowadays.

348.simplified: 你只要问他，他就会告诉你。
348.traditional: 你只要問他，他就會告訴你。
348.pinyin: nǐ zhǐyào wèn tā tā jiù huì gàosu nǐ
348.english: You have only to ask and he'll tell you.

349.simplified: 我是最近才开始学法语的。
349.traditional: 我是最近才開始學法語的。
349.pinyin: wǒ shì zuìjìn cái kāishǐ xué Fǎyǔ de
349.english: I've only recently started learning French.

350.simplified: 这是一个极为重要的问题。
350.traditional: 這是一個極為重要的問題。
350.pinyin: zhè shì yī gè jíwéi zhòngyào de wèntí
350.english: This is an issue of the utmost importance.

351.simplified: 他没穿鞋，看上去矮多了。
351.traditional: 他沒穿鞋，看上去矮多了。
351.pinyin: tā méi chuān xié kànshangqu ǎi duō le
351.english: He seems much shorter without his shoes on.

352.simplified: 刚才你男朋友给你打电话了。
352.traditional: 剛才你男朋友給你打電話了。
352.pinyin: gāngcái nǐ nánpéngyou gěi nǐ dǎdiànhuà le
352.english: Your boyfriend called you just now.

353.simplified: 天花板很低, 留神别碰头.
353.traditional: 天花板很低, 留神別碰頭.
353.pinyin: tiānhuābǎn hěn dī liúshén bié pèngtóu
353.english: Mind you don't bump your head on the low ceiling.

354.simplified: 大米是我们生活的基本食物。
354.traditional: 大米是我們生活的基本食物。
354.pinyin: dàmǐ shì wǒmen shēnghuó de jīběn shíwù
354.english: Rice is our essential foodstuff in life.

355.simplified: 我家附近新建了一家工厂。
355.traditional: 我家附近新建了一家工廠。
355.pinyin: wǒ jiā fùjìn xīnjiàn le yījiā gōngchǎng
355.english: A new factory was established near my home.

356.simplified: 你把这个句子中的动词丢了。
356.traditional: 你把這個句子中的動詞丟了。
356.pinyin: nǐ bǎ zhège jùzi zhòngdì dòngcí diū le
356.english: You have omitted the verb in the sentence.

357.simplified: 老师给全班同学作了听写。
357.traditional: 老師給全班同學作了聽寫。
357.pinyin: lǎoshī gěi quánbān tóngxué zuò le tīngxiě
357.english: The teacher dictated to the whole class.

358.simplified: 你不请大夫来, 他就得死了.
358.traditional: 你不請大夫來, 他就得死了.
358.pinyin: nǐ bù qǐng dàifu lái tā jiù dé sǐ le
358.english: He will certainly die if you don't call a doctor.

359.simplified: 他喜欢拿他的同学开玩笑。
359.traditional: 他喜歡拿他的同學開玩笑。
359.pinyin: tā xǐhuan ná tā de tóngxué kāiwánxiào
359.english: He likes playing jokes on his classmates.

360.simplified: 他们要去动物园或打排球。
360.traditional: 他們要去動物園或打排球。
360.pinyin: tāmen yào qù dòngwùyuán huò dǎ páiqiú
360.english: They will go to the zoo or play volleyball.

361.simplified: 爸爸每天早上走路去上班。
361.traditional: 爸爸每天早上走路去上班。
361.pinyin: bàba měitiān zǎoshang zǒulù qù shàngbān
361.english: Father walks to his office every morning.

362.simplified: 我们决定立刻去火车站。
362.traditional: 我們決定立刻去火車站。
362.english: We determined to go to the railway station at once.

363.simplified: 这个小男孩能够数到一千。
363.traditional: 這個小男孩能夠數到一千。
363.pinyin: zhège xiǎo nánhái nénggòu shǔ dào yī qiān
363.english: The little boy can count up to a thousand.

364.simplified: 有的人爱先做难做的工作。
364.traditional: 有的人愛先做難做的工作。
364.pinyin: yǒude rén ài xiān zuò nán zuò de gōngzuò
364.english: Some people tackle the difficult jobs first.

365.simplified: 这个小男孩跑去找他的哥哥。
365.traditional: 這個小男孩跑去找他的哥哥。
365.pinyin: zhège xiǎo nánhái pǎo qù zhǎo tā de gēge
365.english: The little boy ran off to get his brother.

366.simplified: 这座公路桥现在开放通行。
366.traditional: 這座公路橋現在開放通行。
366.pinyin: zhè zuò gōnglù qiáo xiànzài kāifàng tōngxíng
366.english: The road bridge is now open to traffic.

367.simplified: 把这些信送到对面邮局去。
367.traditional: 把這些信送到對面郵局去。
367.pinyin: bǎ zhèxiē xìn sòng dào duìmiàn yóujú qù
367.english: Take these letters over to the post office.

368.simplified: 那男子一举一动像个大男孩。
368.traditional: 那男子一舉一動像個大男孩。
368.pinyin: nà nánzǐ yījǔyīdòng xiàng gè dà nánhái
368.english: That man behaves like an overgrown child.

369.simplified: 这家医院有二百个床位。
369.traditional: 這家醫院有二百個床位。
369.pinyin: zhè jiā yīyuàn yǒu èr bǎi gè chuángwèi
369.english: This hospital has accommodation for 200 patients.

370.simplified: 可能的话，她想跟我们一起去。
370.traditional: 可能的話，她想跟我們一起去。
370.pinyin: kěnéng dehuà tā xiǎng gēn wǒmen yīqǐ qù
370.english: If possible, She wants to go with us.

371.simplified: 这不是一个很重要的问题。
371.traditional: 這不是一個很重要的問題。
371.pinyin: zhè bùshì yī gè hěn zhòngyào de wèntí
371.english: This is not an issue of the utmost importance.

372.simplified: 不论你在哪里，我都会想念你。
372.traditional: 不論你在哪裡，我都會想念你。
372.pinyin: bùlùn nǐ zài nǎlǐ wǒ dūhuì xiǎngniàn nǐ
372.english: Wherever you are, I will miss you.

373.simplified: 她认为自己懂得什么是生活。
373.traditional: 她認為自己懂得什麼是生活。
373.pinyin: tā rènwéi zìjǐ dǒngde shénme shì shēnghuó
373.english: She esteemed that she knew what life was.

374.simplified: 别哭，你现在已经是大男孩了。
374.traditional: 別哭，你現在已經是大男孩了。
374.pinyin: bié kū nǐ xiànzài yǐjīng shì dà nánhái le
374.english: Don't cry, you are a big boy now.

375.simplified: 别都挤在一块儿, 分开坐吧.
375.traditional: 別都擠在一塊兒, 分開坐吧.
375.pinyin: bié dōu jǐ zài yīkuàir fēnkāi zuò ba
375.english: Don't all sit together, spread yourselves out.

376.simplified: 听到脚步声，就知道他回来了。
376.traditional: 聽到腳步聲，就知道他回來了。
376.pinyin: tīngdào jiǎobù shēng jiù zhīdào tā huílai le

377.simplified: 他为我切了几块很好的鸡肉。
377.traditional: 他為我切了幾塊很好的雞肉。
377.pinyin: tā wéi wǒ qiē le jǐ kuài hěn hǎo de jīròu
377.english: He carved me some very nice pieces of chicken.

378.simplified: 这些电影只适宜成人观看。
378.traditional: 這些電影只適宜成人觀看。
378.pinyin: zhèxiē diànyǐng zhǐ shìyí chéngrén guānkàn
378.english: These films are suitable for adults only.

379.simplified: 这封信只用一张纸写成。
379.traditional: 這封信只用一張紙寫成。
379.pinyin: zhè fēng xìn zhǐ yòng yī zhāng zhǐ xiě chéng
379.english: The letter was written on a single sheet of paper.

380.simplified: 我要去图书馆还这些书。
380.traditional: 我要去圖書館還這些書。
380.pinyin: wǒ yào qù túshūguǎn hái zhèxiē shū
380.english: I'm just going to check in these books at the library.

381.simplified: 下点雨会使我们感到凉快一些。
381.traditional: 下點雨會使我們感到涼快一些。
381.pinyin: xià diǎn yǔ huì shǐ wǒmen gǎndào liángkuai yīxiē
381.english: Some rain would cool us down.

382.simplified: 小女孩立志要做一名科学家。
382.traditional: 小女孩立志要做一名科學家。
382.pinyin: xiǎo nǚhái lìzhì yào zuò yī míng kēxuéjiā
382.english: The young girl aspired to be a scientist.

383.simplified: 我希望演说者不要离题。
383.traditional: 我希望演說者不要離題。
383.english: I wish the speaker would confine himself to the subject.

384.simplified: 我正在做晚饭时停电了。
384.traditional: 我正在做晚飯時停電了。
384.pinyin: wǒ zhèngzài zuò wǎnfàn shí tíngdiàn le
384.english: While I was cooking supper the electricity went off.

385.english: Teenage is the period at which the body reaches maturity.

386.simplified: 那就说明了她不在这里的原因。
386.traditional: 那就說明了她不在這裡的原因。
386.pinyin: nà jiù shuōmíng le tā bùzài zhèlǐ de yuányīn
386.english: That explains why she is not here.

387.simplified: 有许多来自那个国家的难民。
387.traditional: 有許多來自那個國家的難民。
387.pinyin: yǒu xǔduō láizì nàge guójiā de nànmín
387.english: There are many refugees from that country.

388.simplified: 妈妈准备了好吃的东西给我。
388.traditional: 媽媽准備了好吃的東西給我。
388.pinyin: māma zhǔnbèi le hǎochī de dōngxi gěi wǒ
388.english: Mother has something delicious in store for me.

389.simplified: 使学生学习是教师的责任。
389.traditional: 使學生學習是教師的責任。
389.pinyin: shǐ xuésheng xuéxí shì jiàoshī de zérèn
389.english: It's a teacher's business to make student learn.

390.simplified: 我不喝酒, 给我来杯汽水吧.
390.traditional: 我不喝酒, 給我來杯汽水吧.
390.pinyin: wǒ bù hējiǔ gěi wǒ lái bēi qìshuǐ ba
390.english: I won't have any wine; I'll just have (a) soda water.

391.simplified: 她很快成为大家注意的人物。
391.traditional: 她很快成為大家注意的人物。
391.pinyin: tā hěn kuài chéngwéi dàjiā zhùyì de rénwù
391.english: She soon becomes the centre of attention.

392.simplified: 我认为我已找到理想的爱人了。
392.traditional: 我認為我已找到理想的愛人了。
392.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi wǒ yǐ zhǎodào lǐxiǎng de àiren le
392.english: I think I've met the love of my life.

393.simplified: 我为准备英语考试的人做辅导。
393.traditional: 我為准備英語考試的人做輔導。
393.pinyin: wǒ wéi zhǔnbèi Yīngyǔ kǎoshì de rén zuò fǔdǎo
393.english: I coach people for English exams.

394.simplified: 我们应该对下一代负责。
394.traditional: 我們應該對下一代負責。
394.english: We should be responsible for the generation as yet unborn.

395.simplified: 我爱她就像爱自己的女儿一样。
395.traditional: 我愛她就像愛自己的女兒一樣。
395.pinyin: wǒ ài tā jiù xiàng ài zìjǐ de nǚ'ér yīyàng
395.english: I have loved her like a father should.

396.simplified: 我能和你做生意，太高兴了。
396.traditional: 我能和你做生意，太高興了。
396.pinyin: wǒ néng hé nǐ zuòshēngyì tài gāoxìng le
396.english: I am only too pleased to do business with you.

397.simplified: 这辆汽车亮起了危险信号灯。
397.traditional: 這輛汽車亮起了危險信號燈。
397.pinyin: zhè liàng qìchē liàng qǐ le wēixiǎn xìnhàodēng
397.english: The car had its hazard warning lights on.

398.simplified: 这决非解决问题的好办法。
398.traditional: 這決非解決問題的好辦法。
398.pinyin: zhè jué fēi jiějué wèntí de hǎo bànfǎ
398.english: This is by no means a good way to solve the problem.

399.simplified: 天气预报说明天是晴天。
399.traditional: 天氣預報說明天是晴天。
399.english: The weather forecast says it will be sunny tomorrow.

400.simplified: 我有两个姐姐. 她们都是医生.
400.traditional: 我有兩個姐姐. 她們都是醫生.
400.pinyin: wǒ yǒu liǎng gè jiějie tāmen dōu shì yīshēng
400.english: I've got two sisters. They'reboth doctors.

401.simplified: 这家新开的商店里挤满了顾客。
401.traditional: 這家新開的商店裡擠滿了顧客。
401.pinyin: zhè jiā xīn kāi de shāngdiàn lǐ jǐmǎn le gùkè
401.english: The new store is crowded with customers.

402.simplified: 她是个在英国的外国留学生。
402.traditional: 她是個在英國的外國留學生。
402.pinyin: tā shì gè zài Yīngguó de wàiguó liúxuéshēng
402.english: She is an overseas student in Britain.

403.simplified: 九月的天气确实像秋天了。
403.traditional: 九月的天氣確實像秋天了。
403.pinyin: Jiǔyuè de tiānqì quèshí xiàng qiūtiān le
403.english: The weather in September was positively autumnal.

404.simplified: 如果有机会，你应当到那里去。
404.traditional: 如果有機會，你應當到那裡去。
404.pinyin: rúguǒ yǒu jīhuì nǐ yīngdāng dào nàli qù
404.english: You should go there if occasion arises.

405.simplified: 没有这么大的地方来放这些书。
405.traditional: 沒有這麼大的地方來放這些書。
405.pinyin: méiyǒu zhème dà de dìfang lái fàng zhèxiē shū
405.english: There is not so much room for these books.

406.simplified: 离开房间前，请把灯关掉。
406.traditional: 離開房間前，請把燈關掉。
406.pinyin: líkāi fángjiān qián qǐng bǎ dēng guāndiào
406.english: Please turn the light off before leaving the room.

407.simplified: 她各种音乐都喜爱，和我一样。
407.traditional: 她各種音樂都喜愛，和我一樣。
407.pinyin: tā gèzhǒng yīnyuè dōu xǐ'ài hé wǒ yīyàng
407.english: She enjoys all kinds of music, as I do.

408.simplified: 他经常给当地报纸写文章。
408.traditional: 他經常給當地報紙寫文章。
408.pinyin: tā jīngcháng gěi dāngdì bàozhǐ xiě wénzhāng
408.english: He constantly writes articles for the local paper.

409.simplified: 他们讨论了气候和其他的话题。
409.traditional: 他們討論了氣候和其他的話題。
409.pinyin: tāmen tǎolùn le qìhòu hé qítā dehuà tí
409.english: They discussed the weather and other topics.

410.simplified: 那店员一点也不怕麻烦。
410.traditional: 那店員一點也不怕麻煩。
410.pinyin: nà diànyuán yīdiǎn yě bùpà máfan
410.english: The shop assistant was not in the least afraid of the trouble.

411.simplified: 游船上的人们看上去很高兴。
411.traditional: 游船上的人們看上去很高興。
411.pinyin: yóu chuán shàng de rénmen kànshangqu hěn gāoxìng
411.english: People on the barge looked rather happy.

412.simplified: 她把幸福和有钱联想到一起。
412.traditional: 她把幸福和有錢聯想到一起。
412.pinyin: tā bǎ xìngfú hé yǒuqián lián xiǎngdào yīqǐ
412.english: She associated happiness with having money.

413.simplified: 他在开会，没空来接电话。
413.traditional: 他在開會，沒空來接電話。
413.pinyin: tā zài kāihuì méi kōng lái jiē diànhuà
413.english: He is in conference and cannot come to the telephone.

414.simplified: 希思先生是英国前任首相。
414.traditional: 希思先生是英國前任首相。
414.pinyin: xī sī xiānsheng shì Yīngguó qiánrèn shǒuxiàng
414.english: Mr. Heath is the former Prime Minister of Britain.

415.simplified: 我们试图让她和她的家庭和好。
415.traditional: 我們試圖讓她和她的家庭和好。
415.pinyin: wǒmen shìtú ràng tā hé tā de jiātíng héhǎo
415.english: We tried to reconcile her with her family.

416.simplified: 她最初是以当演员而成名的.
416.traditional: 她最初是以當演員而成名的.
416.pinyin: tā zuìchū shìyǐ dāng yǎnyuán ér chéngmíng de
416.english: She first made a name for herself as an actress.

417.simplified: 他是去年六月开始在这里工作的。
417.traditional: 他是去年六月開始在這裡工作的。
417.pinyin: tā shì qùnián Liùyuè kāishǐ zài zhèlǐ gōngzuò de
417.english: He started work here last June.

418.simplified: 他没有给我回答他问题的机会。
418.traditional: 他沒有給我回答他問題的機會。
418.pinyin: tā méiyǒu gěi wǒ huídá tā wèntí de jīhuì
418.english: He gave me no chance to reply to his question.

419.simplified: 我希望这本书的字再大一点儿。
419.traditional: 我希望這本書的字再大一點兒。
419.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng zhè běn shū de zì zài dà yīdiǎnr
419.english: I wish this book was written in bigger character.

420.simplified: 她常常一边看电视一边织毛衣。
420.traditional: 她常常一邊看電視一邊織毛衣。
420.pinyin: tā chángcháng yībiān kàn diànshì yībiān zhī máoyī
420.english: She often knits while watching TV.

421.simplified: 希望你能感到像一家人一样.
421.traditional: 希望你能感到像一家人一樣.
421.pinyin: xīwàng nǐ néng gǎndào xiàng yījiārén yīyàng
421.english: We'd like you to feel you're part of the family.

422.simplified: 处理这个问题有好几个方法。
422.traditional: 處理這個問題有好幾個方法。
422.pinyin: chǔlǐ zhège wèntí yǒu hǎo jǐge fāngfǎ
422.english: There are several ways of approaching the problem.

423.simplified: 我是用电动打字机打这封信的。
423.traditional: 我是用電動打字機打這封信的。
423.pinyin: wǒ shì yòng diàndòng dǎzìjī dǎ zhè fēng xìn de
423.english: I did the letter on my electric typewriter.

424.simplified: 我们应该全体讨论班级活动。
424.traditional: 我們應該全體討論班級活動。
424.pinyin: wǒmen yīnggāi quántǐ tǎolùn bānjí huódòng
424.english: We must discuss the class activities in a body.

425.simplified: 那男孩今天早上吃了三碗米饭。
425.traditional: 那男孩今天早上吃了三碗米飯。
425.pinyin: nà nánhái jīntiān zǎoshang chī le sān wǎn mǐfàn
425.english: The boy ate three bowls of rice this morning.

426.simplified: 他们通过一条小路爬到山上。
426.traditional: 他們通過一條小路爬到山上。
426.pinyin: tāmen tōngguò yī tiáo xiǎolù pá dào Shānshàng
426.english: They climbed up the mountain through a defile.

427.simplified: 原来她姑姑就是我表姐.
427.traditional: 原來她姑姑就是我表姐.
427.pinyin: yuánlái tā gūgu jiùshì wǒ biǎojiě
427.english: It turns out that her aunt and my cousin are one and the same (person).

428.simplified: 我问了一位本地人，该走哪条路。
428.traditional: 我問了一位本地人，該走哪條路。
428.pinyin: wǒ wèn le yī wèi běndìrén gāi zǒu nǎ tiáo lù
428.english: I asked one of the locals which way to go.

429.simplified: 留出星期五下午的时间做复习。
429.traditional: 留出星期五下午的時間做復習。
429.pinyin: liú chū Xīngqīwǔ xiàwǔ de shíjiān zuò fùxí
429.english: Friday afternoons are left free for revision.

430.simplified: 老师在黑板上写出新单词。
430.traditional: 老師在黑板上寫出新單詞。
430.pinyin: lǎoshī zài hēibǎn shàng xiě chūxīn dāncí
430.english: The teacher wrote down the new words on the blackboard.

431.simplified: 父亲每晚都坐在同一张椅子上，
431.traditional: 父親每晚都坐在同一張椅子上，
431.pinyin: fùqīn měi wǎn dōu zuò zài tóngyī zhāng yǐzi shàng
431.english: Father sits in the same chair every evening.

432.simplified: 在我们的花园里有一棵矮苹果树。
432.traditional: 在我們的花園裡有一棵矮蘋果樹。
432.pinyin: zài wǒmen de huāyuán lǐ yǒu yī kē ǎi píngguǒ shù
432.english: There is a dwarf apple tree in our garden.

433.simplified: 这些年来，他取得了丰富的经验。
433.traditional: 這些年來，他取得了豐富的經驗。
433.pinyin: zhèxiē niánlái tā qǔdé le fēngfù de jīngyàn
433.english: He has gained rich experience in these years.

434.simplified: 学生们正在解一道数学习题。
434.traditional: 學生們正在解一道數學習題。
434.pinyin: xuésheng men zhèngzài jiě yīdào shùxué xítí
434.english: The students are working on a mathematical problem.

435.simplified: 桌上有两只苹果和一只橘子。
435.traditional: 桌上有兩只蘋果和一只橘子。
435.pinyin: zhuō shàng yǒu liǎng zhǐ píngguǒ hé yī zhǐ júzi
435.english: There are two apples and an orange on the table.

436.simplified: 我经常带我的孩子们去公园玩。
436.traditional: 我經常帶我的孩子們去公園玩。
436.pinyin: wǒ jīngcháng dài wǒ de háizimen qù gōngyuán wán
436.english: I often take my children to play in the park.

437.simplified: 教师正在给班上的学生做听写。
437.traditional: 教師正在給班上的學生做聽寫。
437.pinyin: jiàoshī zhèngzài gěi bānshàng de xuésheng zuò tīngxiě
437.english: The teacher was dictating to the class.

438.simplified: 我对座次表作了小小的调整。
438.traditional: 我對座次表作了小小的調整。
438.pinyin: wǒ duì zuò cì biǎo zuò le xiǎoxiǎo de tiáozhěng
438.english: I've made a few minor adjustments to the seating plan.

439.simplified: 这一新闻节目只报道国外消息。
439.traditional: 這一新聞節目只報道國外消息。
439.pinyin: zhè yī xīnwén jiémù zhǐ bàodào guówài xiāoxi
439.english: This news program only covers external events.

440.simplified: 如果天不晴，我们就不去散步。
440.traditional: 如果天不晴，我們就不去散步。
440.pinyin: rúguǒ tiān bù qíng wǒmen jiù bù qù sànbù
440.english: If the weather doesn't clear, we won't go for a walk.

441.simplified: 我汽车里的暖气设备出了点毛病。
441.traditional: 我汽車裡的暖氣設備出了點毛病。
441.pinyin: wǒ qìchē lǐ de nuǎnqì shèbèi chū le diǎn máobìng
441.english: The heater in my car doesn't work properly.

442.simplified: 收集这些邮票花了我一百块钱。
442.traditional: 收集這些郵票花了我一百塊錢。
442.pinyin: shōují zhèxiē yóupiào huā le wǒ yī bǎi kuài qián
442.english: It cost me 100 dollars to collect the stamps.

443.simplified: 医生对我说，我需要好好休息。
443.traditional: 醫生對我說，我需要好好休息。
443.pinyin: yīshēng duì wǒ shuō wǒ xūyào hǎohǎo xiūxi
443.english: The doctor told me I was in need of a good rest.

444.simplified: 如果明天天气好，我门可能出门。
444.traditional: 如果明天天氣好，我門可能出門。
444.pinyin: rúguǒ míngtiān tiānqì hǎo wǒ mén kěnéng chūmén
444.english: If it is fine tomorrow, we may go out.

445.simplified: 他急急忙忙地把孩子们推进汽车。
445.traditional: 他急急忙忙地把孩子們推進汽車。
445.pinyin: tā jíjímángmáng dì bǎ háizimen tuījìn qìchē
445.english: He huddled the children into the automobile.

446.simplified: 电视上对这件事报道很少。
446.traditional: 電視上對這件事報道很少。
446.pinyin: diànshì shàng duì zhè jiàn shì bàodào hěn shǎo
446.english: The television coverage of the event was rather sparse.

447.simplified: 这顿饭我请客，你把钱收起来吧。
447.traditional: 這頓飯我請客，你把錢收起來吧。
447.pinyin: zhè dùn fàn wǒ qǐngkè nǐ bǎ qián shōu qilai ba
447.english: This meal is my treat, so put your money away.

448.simplified: 目前的情况不得再继续下去了.
448.traditional: 目前的情況不得再繼續下去了.
448.pinyin: mùqián de qíngkuàng bùdé zài jìxù xiàqù le
448.english: The present state of affairs cannot be allowed to go on.

449.simplified: 那个农村男孩儿过不惯城市生活.
449.traditional: 那個農村男孩兒過不慣城市生活.
449.pinyin: nàge nóngcūn nánháir guò bù guàn chéngshì shēnghuó
449.english: The village boy was strange to city life.

450.simplified: 校长表扬男同学服装整齐.
450.traditional: 校長表揚男同學服裝整齊.
450.pinyin: xiàozhǎng biǎoyáng nán tóngxué fúzhuāng zhěngqí
450.english: The headmaster praised the boys for their neat turn-out.

451.simplified: 对不起，我不能来参加晚会了。
451.traditional: 對不起，我不能來參加晚會了。
451.pinyin: duìbuqǐ wǒ bùnéng lái cānjiā wǎnhuì le
451.english: Sorry, but I can not join you for the evening party.

452.simplified: 学习外语离不开好的词典。
452.traditional: 學習外語離不開好的詞典。
452.pinyin: xuéxí wàiyǔ líbukāi hǎo de cídiǎn
452.english: A good dictionary is indispensable for learning a foreign language.

453.simplified: 我不知道该怎样来感谢你才好。
453.traditional: 我不知道該怎樣來感謝你才好。
453.pinyin: wǒ bù zhīdào gāi zěnyàng lái gǎnxiè nǐ cái hǎo
453.english: I don't know how I can possibly thank you enough.

454.simplified: 太阳，星星和月亮都是天体。
454.traditional: 太陽，星星和月亮都是天體。
454.pinyin: tàiyang xīngxing hé yuèliang dōu shì tiāntǐ
454.english: The sun, the stars and the moon are celestial bodies.

455.simplified: 电视机设定在10点钟自动打开。
455.traditional: 電視機設定在10點鐘自動打開。
455.pinyin: diànshìjī shèdìng zài diǎnzhōng zìdòng dǎkāi
455.english: The video is programmed to switch on at ten o'clock.

456.simplified: 我喜欢唱歌，更不用说听音乐了。
456.traditional: 我喜歡唱歌，更不用說聽音樂了。
456.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan chànggē gèng bùyòng shuō tīng yīnyuè le
456.english: I enjoy singing, much more listening to music.

457.simplified: 我想请你说说对这种情况的意见。
457.traditional: 我想請你說說對這種情況的意見。
457.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ shuōshuo duì zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng de yìjiàn
457.english: I need your slant on the situation.

458.simplified: 我不知道这个对你的意义有这么大。
458.traditional: 我不知道這個對你的意義有這麼大。
458.pinyin: wǒ bù zhīdào zhège duì nǐ de yìyì yǒu zhème dà
458.english: I didn't realize how much this meant to you.

459.simplified: 画完后请把东西都放回原处。
459.traditional: 畫完後請把東西都放回原處。
459.pinyin: huà wán hòu qǐng bǎ dōngxi dōu fàng huí yuánchù
459.english: Please put all those things away when you finish drawing.

460.simplified: 我希望这些安排会得到你的同意。
460.traditional: 我希望這些安排會得到你的同意。
460.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng zhèxiē ānpái huì dédào nǐ de tóngyì
460.english: I hope the arrangements meet with your approval.

461.simplified: 宴会上，大家吃掉了好几篮水果。
461.traditional: 宴會上，大家吃掉了好幾籃水果。
461.pinyin: yànhuì shàng dàjiā chīdiào le hǎojǐ lán shuǐguǒ
461.english: Several baskets of fruit were eaten at the party.

462.simplified: 过10分钟会有一辆出租汽车到那儿。
462.traditional: 過10分鐘會有一輛出租汽車到那兒。
462.pinyin: guò fēnzhōng huì yǒu yī liàng chūzūqìchē dào nàr
462.english: A cab will be there in ten minutes.

463.simplified: 他请求我们帮他完成他的计划。
463.traditional: 他請求我們幫他完成他的計劃。
463.pinyin: tā qǐngqiú wǒmen bāng tā wánchéng tā de jìhuà
463.english: He asked us to assist him in carrying through his plan.

464.simplified: 我一点也不明白你在说些什么。
464.traditional: 我一點也不明白你在說些什麼。
464.pinyin: wǒ yīdiǎn yě bù míngbai nǐ zài shuō xiē shénme
464.english: I haven't the slightest idea what you are talking about.

465.simplified: 他看到她父亲走进来就站了起来。
465.traditional: 他看到她父親走進來就站了起來。
465.pinyin: tā kàn dào tā fùqīn zǒu jìnlái jiù zhàn le qilai
465.english: He got to his feet when he saw her father came in.

466.simplified: 我可不喜欢整天和他在一起。
466.traditional: 我可不喜歡整天和他在一起。
466.pinyin: wǒ kě bù xǐhuan zhěngtiān hé tā zàiyīqǐ
466.english: I'm not too enamored with the idea of spending a whole day with him.

467.simplified: 我们应该更好地利用现有设备。
467.traditional: 我們應該更好地利用現有設備。
467.pinyin: wǒmen yīnggāi gèng hǎo dì lìyòng xiànyǒu shèbèi
467.english: We should make a better use of the existing equipment.

468.simplified: 那家破产的银行正被法院调查。
468.traditional: 那家破產的銀行正被法院調查。
468.pinyin: nà jiā pòchǎn de yínháng zhèng bèi fǎyuàn diàochá
468.english: The bank of bankruptcy is investigated by the court.

469.simplified: 想像一下你又有钱, 又有名的情况.
469.traditional: 想像一下你又有錢, 又有名的情況.
469.pinyin: xiǎngxiàng yīxià nǐ yòu yǒuqián yòu yǒumíng de qíngkuàng
469.english: Imagine yourself (to be) rich and famous.

470.simplified: 虽然汤药很苦，我还是不得不喝了。
470.traditional: 雖然湯藥很苦，我還是不得不喝了。
470.pinyin: suīrán tāngyào hěn kǔ wǒ háishi bùdébù hē le
470.english: I had to take the herb tea although it's bitter.

471.simplified: 他没吃早饭就去上学了。
471.traditional: 他沒吃早飯就去上學了。
471.pinyin: tā méi chī zǎofàn jiù qù shàngxué le
471.english: He went to school without breakfast. (=He went to school and did not eat breakfast.)

472.simplified: 把面包切成小片，然后给我两片。
472.traditional: 把面包切成小片，然後給我兩片。
472.pinyin: bǎ miànbāo qiēchéng xiǎo piàn ránhòu gěi wǒ liǎng piàn
472.english: Cut the bread into small rounds and give me two.

473.simplified: 细心的人总是把东西放得很整齐。
473.traditional: 細心的人總是把東西放得很整齊。
473.pinyin: xìxīn de rén zǒngshì bǎ dōngxi fàng dehěn zhěngqí
473.english: Careful people usually put everything in good order.

474.simplified: 如果有机会，我将去看那部电影。
474.traditional: 如果有機會，我將去看那部電影。
474.pinyin: rúguǒ yǒu jīhuì wǒ jiāng qù kàn nà bù diànyǐng
474.english: I will go to see the film if I get the opportunity.

475.simplified: 我不太满意他对这个句子的翻译。
475.traditional: 我不太滿意他對這個句子的翻譯。
475.pinyin: wǒ bù tài mǎnyì tā duì zhège jùzi de fānyì
475.english: I'm not satisfied with his interpretation of this sentence.

476.simplified: 他不但会说英语，而且还会说法语。
476.traditional: 他不但會說英語，而且還會說法語。
476.pinyin: tā bùdàn huì shuō Yīngyǔ érqiě hái huì shuōfa yǔ
476.english: He speaks not only English but also French.

477.simplified: 我们必须找一个地方放这张新照片。
477.traditional: 我們必須找一個地方放這張新照片。
477.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū zhǎo yī gè dìfang fàng zhè zhāng xīn zhàopiàn
477.english: We must find a place for this new picture.

478.simplified: 我上了当, 还以为他们的玩笑是真的呢.
478.traditional: 我上了當, 還以為他們的玩笑是真的呢.
478.pinyin: wǒ shàng liǎodàng hái yǐwéi tāmen de wánxiào shì zhēn de ne
478.english: I was hoaxed into believing their story.

479.simplified: 这个计划道理上行得通, 但不现实。
479.traditional: 這個計劃道理上行得通, 但不現實。
479.pinyin: zhège jìhuà dàoli shàngxíng dé tōng dàn bù xiànshí
479.english: The plan is feasible in reason but impractical.

480.simplified: 直到几个月后，他才知道这故事。
480.traditional: 直到幾個月後，他才知道這故事。
480.pinyin: zhídào jǐge yuè hòu tā cái zhīdào zhè gùshi
480.english: It was not until a few months later that he knew the story.

481.simplified: 我对他很生气，因为他让我等了好久。
481.traditional: 我對他很生氣，因為他讓我等了好久。
481.pinyin: wǒ duì tā hěn shēngqì yīnwèi tā ràng wǒděng le hǎojiǔ
481.english: I was angry with him for keeping me waiting.

482.simplified: 表演正好进行到一半时停电了。
482.traditional: 表演正好進行到一半時停電了。
482.pinyin: biǎoyǎn zhènghǎo jìnxíng dào yībàn shí tíngdiàn le
482.english: The light went out bang in the middle of the performance.

483.simplified: 我们今后一星期没有见面的机会了。
483.traditional: 我們今後一星期沒有見面的機會了。
483.pinyin: wǒmen jīnhòu yī xīngqī méiyǒu jiànmiàn de jīhuì le
483.english: We have no chance to meet each other a week hence.

484.simplified: 他带这个人走过街道到火车站。
484.traditional: 他帶這個人走過街道到火車站。
484.pinyin: tā dài zhège rén zǒuguò jiēdào dào huǒchēzhàn
484.english: He guided the man through the streets to the railway station.

485.simplified: 你应该在课堂上完成语法练习。
485.traditional: 你應該在課堂上完成語法練習。
485.pinyin: nǐ yīnggāi zài kètáng shàng wánchéng yǔfǎ liànxí
485.english: You should finish your English grammar drills in the class.

486.simplified: 这本书从前很出名, 现在没人看了.
486.traditional: 這本書從前很出名, 現在沒人看了.
486.pinyin: zhè běn shū cóngqián hěn chūmíng xiànzài méi rén kàn le
486.english: This book was once famous, but nobody reads it today.

487.simplified: 这演说很动听，可是没什么内容。
487.traditional: 這演說很動聽，可是沒什麼內容。
487.pinyin: zhè yǎnshuō hěn dòngtīng kěshì méishénme nèiróng
487.english: It's a clever speech, but there was no real meat in it.

488.simplified: 她每举办舞会，总喜欢搞得很排场。
488.traditional: 她每舉辦舞會，總喜歡搞得很排場。
488.pinyin: tā měi jǔbàn wǔhuì zǒng xǐhuan gǎo dehěn páichang
488.english: If ever she gives a party she likes to do it in style.

489.simplified: 我认为你应当去找医生看看病.
489.traditional: 我認為你應當去找醫生看看病.
489.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi nǐ yīngdāng qù zhǎo yīshēng kànkan bìng
489.english: I think you ought to go to/to go and see (ie consult) the doctor.

490.simplified: 班个子太矮了, 拿不到桌子上的书。
490.traditional: 班個子太矮了, 拿不到桌子上的書。
490.pinyin: bān gèzi tài ǎi le ná bùdào zhuōzi shàng de shū
490.english: Ben is so short that he can not get at that book on the table.

491.simplified: 对我们来说，很难决定走哪一条路。
491.traditional: 對我們來說，很難決定走哪一條路。
491.pinyin: duì wǒmen láishuō hěn nán juédìng zǒu nǎ yī tiáo lù
491.english: It was difficult for us to decide which road to take.

492.simplified: 我真是累极了，简直可以睡上一整天。
492.traditional: 我真是累極了，簡直可以睡上一整天。
492.pinyin: wǒ zhēnshi lèi jíle jiǎnzhí kěyǐ shuì shàng yī zhěngtiān
492.english: I'm so tired I could sleep for a whole day.

493.simplified: 他每天早晨花两个小时练习赛跑。
493.traditional: 他每天早晨花兩個小時練習賽跑。
493.pinyin: tā měitiān zǎochén huā liǎng gè xiǎoshí liànxí sàipǎo
493.english: Every morning he spent two hours training for the race.

494.simplified: 她向老板说明了自己那种表现的原因。
494.traditional: 她向老板說明了自己那種表現的原因。
494.pinyin: tā xiàng lǎobǎn shuōmíng le zìjǐ nàzhǒng biǎoxiàn de yuányīn
494.english: She explained her conduct to her boss.

495.simplified: 他又拿出惯用的借口，说他太忙了。
495.traditional: 他又拿出慣用的借口，說他太忙了。
495.pinyin: tā yòu náchū guànyòng de jièkǒu shuō tā tài máng le
495.english: He came out with his staple excuse that he was too busy.

496.simplified: 他用一把小刀把自己的名字刻在墙上。
496.traditional: 他用一把小刀把自己的名字刻在牆上。
496.pinyin: tā yòng yī bǎ xiǎodāo bǎ zìjǐ de míngzi kè zài qiáng shàng
496.english: He scratched his name on the wall with a knife.

497.simplified: 她处理政治问题的方法很科学。
497.traditional: 她處理政治問題的方法很科學。
497.pinyin: tā chǔlǐ zhèngzhì wèntí de fāngfǎ hěn kēxué
497.english: She has a very scientific method of dealing with political problems.

498.simplified: 长江是世界上最长的河流之一。
498.traditional: 長江是世界上最長的河流之一。
498.pinyin: Cháng Jiāng shì shìjiè shàng zuì cháng de héliú zhīyī
498.english: The Changjiang River is one of the longest rivers in the world.

499.simplified: 老师要求我把演说的要点记下来。
499.traditional: 老師要求我把演說的要點記下來。
499.pinyin: lǎoshī yāoqiú wǒ bǎ yǎnshuō de yàodiǎn jì xiàlai
499.english: The teacher asked me to note down the main points of the speech.

500.simplified: 只要不吃得太多，你可以吃任何东西。
500.traditional: 只要不吃得太多，你可以吃任何東西。
500.pinyin: zhǐyào bù chī dé tài duō nǐ kěyǐ chī rènhé dōngxi
500.english: You may eat anything, so long as you don't eat too much.

501.simplified: 我已经通过了日语的中级水平考试。
501.traditional: 我已經通過了日語的中級水平考試。
501.pinyin: wǒ yǐjīng tōngguò le Rìyǔ de zhōngjí shuǐpíng kǎoshì
501.english: I've passed the intermediate level exam of Japanese.

502.simplified: 万一下雨的话，我们也许得改变计画。
502.traditional: 萬一下雨的話，我們也許得改變計畫。
502.pinyin: wànyī xiàyǔ dehuà wǒmen yěxǔ dé gǎibiàn jìhuà
502.english: If the day turns out wet we may have to change our plans.

503.simplified: 问题是什么时候能得到我们所需要的钱。
503.traditional: 問題是什麼時候能得到我們所需要的錢。
503.pinyin: wèntí shì shénmeshíhou néng dédào wǒmen suǒ xūyào de qián
503.english: The problem is when to get the money we need.

504.simplified: 她自己省着吃，好让孩子们吃饱。
504.traditional: 她自己省著吃，好讓孩子們吃飽。
504.pinyin: tā zìjǐ shěng zhe chī hǎo ràng háizimen chībǎo
504.english: She stinted herself of food in order to let the children have enough.

505.simplified: 我的英文作业中只有两三处错误。
505.traditional: 我的英文作業中只有兩三處錯誤。
505.pinyin: wǒ de Yīngwén zuòyè zhōng zhǐyǒu liǎng sān chǔ cuòwù
505.english: I had no more than 2 or 3 mistakes on my English assignment.

506.simplified: 我们的海关检查只花了几分钟时间。
506.traditional: 我們的海關檢查只花了幾分鐘時間。
506.pinyin: wǒmen de hǎiguān jiǎnchá zhǐ huā le jǐ fēnzhōng shíjiān
506.english: It took us only a few minutes to get through the Customs.

507.simplified: 这是我从当地干部那里了解到的情况。
507.traditional: 這是我從當地干部那裡了解到的情況。
507.pinyin: zhè shì wǒ cóng dāngdì gànbù nàli liǎojiě dào de qíngkuàng
507.english: That's what I've learnt from the local cadres.

508.simplified: 步行了四个小时以后，我们开始累了。
508.traditional: 步行了四個小時以後，我們開始累了。
508.pinyin: bùxíng le sì gè xiǎoshí yǐhòu wǒmen kāishǐ lèi le
508.english: After walking for four hours we were beginning to flag.

509.simplified: 你多花点时间学习课文是有好处的.
509.traditional: 你多花點時間學習課文是有好處的.
509.pinyin: nǐ duō huā diǎn shíjiān xuéxí kèwén shì yǒuhǎochù de
509.english: You could with profit spend some extra time studying the text.

510.simplified: 客人们说他们不反对听听轻音乐。
510.traditional: 客人們說他們不反對聽聽輕音樂。
510.pinyin: kè rénmen shuō tāmen bù fǎnduì tīng tīng qīngyīnyuè
510.english: The guests said that they wouldn't mind having a little light music.

511.simplified: 把这些数字加起来，告诉我总数是多少。
511.traditional: 把這些數字加起來，告訴我總數是多少。
511.pinyin: bǎ zhèxiē shùzì jiā qilai gàosu wǒ zǒngshù shì duōshao
511.english: Add this numbers together and give me the total.

512.simplified: 我们每年举行一次大学校友联欢会。
512.traditional: 我們每年舉行一次大學校友聯歡會。
512.pinyin: wǒmen měinián jǔxíng yīcì dàxué xiàoyǒu liánhuānhuì
512.english: We hold an annual reunion of former students of the college.

513.simplified: 他决心去看看办公室后边的那些房间。
513.traditional: 他決心去看看辦公室後邊的那些房間。
513.pinyin: tā juéxīn qù kànkan bàngōngshì hòubian de nàxiē fángjiān
513.english: He determined to view the rooms behind the office.

514.simplified: 不要指望一个星期就能学会一门外语.
514.traditional: 不要指望一個星期就能學會一門外語.
514.pinyin: bùyào zhǐwàng yī gè xīngqī jiù néng xuéhuì yī mén wàiyǔ
514.english: You can't expect to learn a foreign language in a week.

515.simplified: 辛苦工作了四个小时后，他觉得非常饿。
515.traditional: 辛苦工作了四個小時後，他覺得非常餓。
515.pinyin: xīnkǔ gōngzuò le sì gè xiǎoshí hòu tā juéde fēicháng è
515.english: He felt very hungry after four-hours' hard work.

516.simplified: 他走了，把所有没做完的工作都留给了我。
516.traditional: 他走了，把所有沒做完的工作都留給了我。
516.pinyin: tā zǒu le bǎ suǒyǒu méi zuòwán de gōngzuò dōu liúgěi le wǒ
516.english: He was gone and left all the work undone to me.

517.simplified: 讲一口流利的英语需要多年的刻苦操练。
517.traditional: 講一口流利的英語需要多年的刻苦操練。
517.pinyin: jiǎng yīkǒu liúlì de Yīngyǔ xūyào duō nián de kèkǔ cāoliàn
517.english: It took years of hard work to speak good English.

518.simplified: 这是我有过的教育意义最大的一次经历。
518.traditional: 這是我有過的教育意義最大的一次經歷。
518.pinyin: zhè shì wǒ yǒu guò de jiàoyù yìyì zuì dà de yīcì jīnglì
518.english: It was the most educational experience I had ever had.

519.simplified: 我们请她帮忙时， 她总是那么不友好。
519.traditional: 我們請她幫忙時， 她總是那麼不友好。
519.pinyin: wǒmen qǐng tā bāngmáng shí tā zǒngshì nàme bù yǒuhǎo
519.english: She is always so disagreeable when we ask her to help.

520.simplified: 这机器是为水下使用而特别改装的。
520.traditional: 這機器是為水下使用而特別改裝的。
520.pinyin: zhè jīqì shì wéi shuǐxià shǐyòng ér tèbié gǎizhuāng de
520.english: This machine has been specially adapted for underwater use.

521.simplified: 一般认为出国旅游可增广见闻。
521.traditional: 一般認為出國旅游可增廣見聞。
521.pinyin: yībān rènwéi chūguó lǚyóu kě zēngguǎng jiànwén
521.english: It is generally thought that traveling abroad can enrich one's knowledge.

522.simplified: 也许这本书会对你的研究有用处。
522.traditional: 也許這本書會對你的研究有用處。
522.pinyin: yěxǔ zhè běn shūhuì duì nǐ de yánjiū yǒuyòng chǔ
522.english: Perhaps this book will prove to be of some use to you in your studies.

523.simplified: 周一周二连续两天我们都将开会。
523.traditional: 周一周二連續兩天我們都將開會。
523.pinyin: Zhōuyī Zhōu'èr liánxù liǎng tiān wǒmen dōu jiāng kāihuì
523.english: We shall have meetings on two consecutive days, Monday and Tuesday.

524.simplified: 我只关心我觉得对我很重要的事物。
524.traditional: 我只關心我覺得對我很重要的事物。
524.pinyin: wǒ zhǐ guānxīn wǒ juéde duì wǒ hěn zhòngyào de shìwù
524.english: I am concerned only with things that I feel are important to me.

525.simplified: 如今，我们可以利用太阳能做很多事情。
525.traditional: 如今，我們可以利用太陽能做很多事情。
525.pinyin: rújīn wǒmen kěyǐ lìyòng tàiyángnéng zuò hěn duō shìqing
525.english: We can use solar energy to do many things today.

526.simplified: 那城市有自己的公用图书馆和公园。
526.traditional: 那城市有自己的公用圖書館和公園。
526.pinyin: nà chéngshì yǒu zìjǐ de gōngyòng túshūguǎn hé gōngyuán
526.english: The town has its own public library and public gardens.

527.simplified: 她的小说我都喜欢, 最新的一部尤其好.
527.traditional: 她的小說我都喜歡, 最新的一部尤其好.
527.pinyin: tā de xiǎoshuō wǒ dōu xǐhuan zuìxīn de yī bù yóuqí hǎo
527.english: I like all her novels, but her latest is particularly good.

528.simplified: 女儿睡觉之前，我总讲故事给她听。
528.traditional: 女兒睡覺之前，我總講故事給她聽。
528.pinyin: nǚ'ér shuìjiào zhīqián wǒ zǒng jiǎng gùshi gěi tā tīng
528.english: I always tell my daughter a story before she goes to sleep.

529.simplified: 今天早晨我起床晚了，错过了公共汽车。
529.traditional: 今天早晨我起床晚了，錯過了公共汽車。
529.pinyin: jīntiān zǎochén wǒ qǐchuáng wǎn le cuòguò le gōnggòngqìchē
529.english: I got up late this morning and missed the bus.

530.simplified: 当她看到他走过来的时候，她的脸亮了起来。
530.traditional: 當她看到他走過來的時候，她的臉亮了起來。
530.pinyin: dāng tā kàn dào tā zǒuguò lái de shíhou tā de liǎn liàng le qilai
530.english: Her face lit up when she saw he was coming.

531.simplified: 我们是在试验的基础上得出这个结论的。
531.traditional: 我們是在試驗的基礎上得出這個結論的。
531.pinyin: wǒmen shì zài shìyàn de jīchǔ shàng déchū zhège jiélùn de
531.english: We drew this conclusion on the basis of experiments.

532.simplified: 二十世纪六十年代出现了许多新兴国家。
532.traditional: 二十世紀六十年代出現了許多新興國家。
532.pinyin: èrshíshìjì liùshíniándài chūxiàn le xǔduō xīnxīng guójiā
532.english: The 1960s saw the emergence of many new nations.

533.simplified: 他十岁的时候就已经长得比他哥哥高了。
533.traditional: 他十歲的時候就已經長得比他哥哥高了。
533.pinyin: tā shí suì de shíhou jiù yǐjīng zhǎngde bǐ tā gēge gāo le
533.english: By the time he is ten, he has outgrown his older brother.

534.simplified: 我认为他对这个问题的评论是不正确的。
534.traditional: 我認為他對這個問題的評論是不正確的。
534.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi tā duì zhège wèntí de pínglùn shì bùzhèngquè de
534.english: I think his commentary on this issue is not correct.

535.simplified: 工作了十五个小时之后，我开始感到累了。
535.traditional: 工作了十五個小時之後，我開始感到累了。
535.pinyin: gōngzuò le shíwǔ gè xiǎoshí zhīhòu wǒ kāishǐ gǎndào lèi le
535.english: After working for fifteen hours I began to tire.

536.simplified: 旅行社的那位小姐告诉我下午一点开门.
536.traditional: 旅行社的那位小姐告訴我下午一點開門.
536.pinyin: lǚxíngshè de nà wèi xiǎojie gàosu wǒ xiàwǔ yīdiǎn kāimén
536.english: The lady at the tourist office told me it opened at 1 pm.

537.simplified: 他每次来电话时, 我好像总是正在洗澡.
537.traditional: 他每次來電話時, 我好像總是正在洗澡.
537.pinyin: tā měicì lái diànhuà shí wǒ hǎoxiàng zǒngshì zhèngzài xǐzǎo
537.english: Every time he phones I always seem to be in the bath.

538.simplified: 你可得安静点儿了，要不然我没法计算了。
538.traditional: 你可得安靜點兒了，要不然我沒法計算了。
538.pinyin: nǐ kě dé ānjìng diǎnr le yàobùrán wǒ méifǎ jìsuàn le
538.english: Do keep quiet or you'll throw me out in my calculations.

539.simplified: 我代表我的同事和我本人向你表示感谢。
539.traditional: 我代表我的同事和我本人向你表示感謝。
539.pinyin: wǒ dàibiǎo wǒ de tóngshì hé wǒ běnrén xiàng nǐ biǎoshì gǎnxiè
539.english: On behalf of my colleagues and myself I thank you.

540.simplified: 我正在做吃的, 没太留心听收音机.
540.traditional: 我正在做吃的, 沒太留心聽收音機.
540.pinyin: wǒ zhèngzài zuò chī de méi tài liúxīn tīng shōuyīnjī
540.english: I was only listening to the radio with half an ear, while preparing some food.

541.simplified: 有些人在爬高山时会发生高山反应。
541.traditional: 有些人在爬高山時會發生高山反應。
541.pinyin: yǒuxiērén zài pá gāoshān shí huì fāshēng gāoshān fǎnyìng
541.english: Some people develop altitude sickness when climbing high mountains.

542.simplified: 现在是差一刻四点--我四点一刻见你.
542.traditional: 現在是差一刻四點--我四點一刻見你.
542.pinyin: xiànzài shì chà yī kè sì diǎn wǒ sì diǎn yī kè jiàn nǐ
542.english: It's (a) quarter to (US of) four now I'll meet you at quarter past (US after).

543.simplified: 我女儿今天有点不舒服, 所以她没去上学.
543.traditional: 我女兒今天有點不舒服, 所以她沒去上學.
543.pinyin: wǒ nǚ'ér jīntiān yǒudiǎn bùshūfu suǒyǐ tā méi qù shàngxué
543.english: My daughter's a bit poorly today, so she didn't go to school.

544.simplified: 劳驾, 买去市中心的两张全票和两张半票.
544.traditional: 勞駕, 買去市中心的兩張全票和兩張半票.
544.pinyin: láojià mǎi qù shìzhōngxīn de liǎng zhāng quánpiào hé liǎng zhāng bànpiào
544.english: Two and two halves to the city centre, please.

545.simplified: 他长大了，穿剩下的衣服就给了他的弟弟。
545.traditional: 他長大了，穿剩下的衣服就給了他的弟弟。
545.pinyin: tā zhǎngdà le chuān shèngxià de yīfu jiù gěi le tā de dìdi
545.english: As he grew up he passed on his clothes to his younger brother.

546.simplified: 那个小男孩第一次会将汉字慢慢地读出来。
546.traditional: 那個小男孩第一次會將漢字慢慢地讀出來。
546.pinyin: nàge xiǎo nánhái dìyīcì huì jiāng hànzì mànmàn dì dú chūlái
546.english: That boy can spell out the Chinese for the fast time.

547.simplified: 只要你不出卖我，要我做什么我都愿意。
547.traditional: 只要你不出賣我，要我做什麼我都願意。
547.pinyin: zhǐyào nǐ bù chūmài wǒ yào wǒ zuò shénme wǒ dōu yuànyì
547.english: As long as you don't betray me, I'll do whatever you ask me to (do).

548.simplified: 他没有回答，只是继续一点一点地吃东西。
548.traditional: 他沒有回答，只是繼續一點一點地吃東西。
548.pinyin: tā méiyǒu huídá zhǐshì jìxù yīdiǎnyīdiǎn dì chī dōngxi
548.english: He didn't answer, but just continued to nibble at his food.

549.simplified: 这个地方脏极了，我不相信有人能住在这。
549.traditional: 這個地方髒極了，我不相信有人能住在這。
549.pinyin: zhège dìfang zāng jíle wǒ bù xiāngxìn yǒurén néng zhù zài zhè
549.english: This place is filthy; I don't believe anyone can live here.

550.simplified: 我突然意识到可能再也见不着她了。
550.traditional: 我突然意識到可能再也見不著她了。
550.pinyin: wǒ tūrán yìshí dào kěnéng zàiyě jiàn bùzháo tā le
550.english: I was struck by the sudden realization that I would probably never see her again.

551.simplified: 宴会结束时，我们谢了主人后便回家去了。
551.traditional: 宴會結束時，我們謝了主人後便回家去了。
551.pinyin: yànhuì jiéshù shí wǒmen xiè le zhǔrén hòu biàn huíjiā qù le
551.english: At the end of the party, we thanked our host and went away.

552.simplified: 我是今天早晨从报纸上知道这条消息的。
552.traditional: 我是今天早晨從報紙上知道這條消息的。
552.pinyin: wǒ shì jīntiān zǎochén cóng bàozhǐ shàng zhīdào zhè tiáo xiāoxi de
552.english: I learned this piece of news from the newspaper this morning.

553.simplified: 这个虽然不便宜, 但我觉得我们还是应该买.
553.traditional: 這個雖然不便宜, 但我覺得我們還是應該買.
553.pinyin: zhège suīrán bù piányi dàn wǒ juéde wǒmen háishi yīnggāi mǎi
553.english: It's not cheap but I think we should buy it none the less.

554.simplified: 新医院的全部设备需要一年才能装备好。
554.traditional: 新醫院的全部設備需要一年才能裝備好。
554.pinyin: xīn yīyuàn de quánbù shèbèi xūyào yī nián cáinéng zhuāngbèi hǎo
554.english: The complete equipment of the new hospital will take a year.

555.simplified: 天气的变化打乱了我们体育比赛的时间表。
555.traditional: 天氣的變化打亂了我們體育比賽的時間表。
555.pinyin: tiānqì de biànhuà dǎ luàn le wǒmen tǐyùbǐsài de shíjiānbiǎo
555.english: The change of the weather has mucked up our sports timetable.

556.simplified: 你讲到一半就停下来不讲，太没意思了。
556.traditional: 你講到一半就停下來不講，太沒意思了。
556.pinyin: nǐ jiǎngdào yībàn jiù tíngxiàlái bù jiǎng tài méiyìsi le
556.english: It's not nice of you to stop in the middle of what you are saying.

557.simplified: 那把椅子原本是为你准备的，但是被她拿走了。
557.traditional: 那把椅子原本是為你准備的，但是被她拿走了。
557.pinyin: nà bǎ yǐzi yuánběn shì wéi nǐ zhǔnbèi de dànshì bèi tā názǒu le
557.english: The chair was intended for you, but she took it away.

558.simplified: 我们将吃一点面包，剩下的留到早饭时吃。
558.traditional: 我們將吃一點面包，剩下的留到早飯時吃。
558.pinyin: wǒmen jiāng chī yīdiǎn miànbāo shèngxià de liú dào zǎofàn shí chī
558.english: We'll eat some of the bread and keep the rest for breakfast.

559.simplified: 我们相信你在星期五之前可以完成这篇论文。
559.traditional: 我們相信你在星期五之前可以完成這篇論文。
559.pinyin: wǒmen xiāngxìn nǐ zài Xīngqīwǔ zhīqián kěyǐ wánchéng zhè piān lùnwén
559.english: We are depending on you to finish the paper by Friday.

560.simplified: 他跑步出发，但很快就累得慢下来成了步行。
560.traditional: 他跑步出發，但很快就累得慢下來成了步行。
560.pinyin: tā pǎobù chūfā dàn hěn kuài jiù lèi dé màn xiàlai chéngle bùxíng
560.english: He started off at a run but soon tired and slowed to a walk.

561.simplified: 当他在国外安定下来时，他开始想念祖国了。
561.traditional: 當他在國外安定下來時，他開始想念祖國了。
561.pinyin: dāng tā zài guówài āndìng xiàlai shí tā kāishǐ xiǎngniàn zǔguó le
561.english: He came to miss his homeland when he settled down abroad.

562.simplified: 这位演说者除了想搞笑之外，没有别的目的。
562.traditional: 這位演說者除了想搞笑之外，沒有別的目的。
562.pinyin: zhèwèi yǎnshuōzhě chúle xiǎng gǎoxiào zhīwài méiyǒu biéde mùdì
562.english: The speaker has no other purpose except to make people laugh.

563.simplified: 他自从参加了会话班，法语取得了很大进步。
563.traditional: 他自從參加了會話班，法語取得了很大進步。
563.pinyin: tā zìcóng cānjiā le huìhuà bān Fǎyǔ qǔdé le hěn dà jìnbù
563.english: His French has come on a lot since he joined the conversation class.

564.simplified: 到了这里一个月以后，学生们开始想家了。
564.traditional: 到了這裡一個月以後，學生們開始想家了。
564.pinyin: dàoliǎo zhèlǐ yī gè yuè yǐhòu xuésheng men kāishǐ xiǎngjiā le
564.english: The students began to feel homesick after they had been here for a month.

565.simplified: 这个决定将被通知给所有直接有关的人。
565.traditional: 這個決定將被通知給所有直接有關的人。
565.pinyin: zhège juédìng jiāng bèi tōngzhī gěi suǒyǒu zhíjiē yǒuguān de rén
565.english: All those who are immediately involved will be informed of the decision.

566.simplified: 他一向是来得很晚，然后又总说他得早走。
566.traditional: 他一向是來得很晚，然後又總說他得早走。
566.pinyin: tā yīxiàng shì lái dehěn wǎn ránhòu yòu zǒng shuō tā dé zǎo zǒu
566.english: Typically, he would come in late and then say that he had to go early.

567.simplified: 如果我们要克服困难，我们就要有进取精神。
567.traditional: 如果我們要克服困難，我們就要有進取精神。
567.pinyin: rúguǒ wǒmen yào kèfú kùnnan wǒmen jiùyào yǒu jìnqǔ jīngshén
567.english: We need a spirit of enterprise if we are to overcome our difficulties.

568.simplified: 那青年通过每天给那女子送花而向她求爱。
568.traditional: 那青年通過每天給那女子送花而向她求愛。
568.pinyin: nà qīngnián tōngguò měitiān gěi nà nǚzǐ sòng huā ér xiàng tā qiú'ài
568.english: The young man courted the young lady by bring her flowers every day.

569.simplified: 我不喜欢他，但是说句公道话，他是个好工人。
569.traditional: 我不喜歡他，但是說句公道話，他是個好工人。
569.pinyin: wǒ bù xǐhuan tā dànshì shuō jù gōngdào huà tā shì gè hǎo gōngrén
569.english: I don't like him, but, to give him his due, he is a good worker.

570.simplified: 我们一起欢度的那个晚上是我最快乐的事情之一。
570.traditional: 我們一起歡度的那個晚上是我最快樂的事情之一。
570.pinyin: wǒmen yīqǐ huāndù de nàge wǎnshang shì wǒ zuì kuàilè de shìqing zhīyī
570.english: That evening together is one of my happiest recollections.

571.simplified: 这个女孩非常幸运，她的妈妈是她的知心朋友。
571.traditional: 這個女孩非常幸運，她的媽媽是她的知心朋友。
571.pinyin: zhège nǚhái fēicháng xìngyùn tā de māma shì tā de zhīxīn péngyou
571.english: The girl was fortunate enough to have her mother as a bosom friend.

572.simplified: 几年来, 几百个留学生在那所大学学习过。
572.traditional: 幾年來, 幾百個留學生在那所大學學習過。
572.pinyin: jǐniánlái jǐbǎi gè liúxuéshēng zài nà suǒ dàxué xuéxí guò
572.english: Over the years, hundreds of overseas students have studied at that university.

573.simplified: 我们每星期工作五天, 每星期六和星期日休息。
573.traditional: 我們每星期工作五天, 每星期六和星期日休息。
573.pinyin: wǒmen měi xīngqī gōngzuò wǔ tiān měi Xīngqīliù hé Xīngqīrì xiūxi
573.english: We work five days a week and have every Saturday and Sunday off.

574.simplified: 在出访外国之前要做好许多准备工作。
574.traditional: 在出訪外國之前要做好許多准備工作。
574.pinyin: zài chūfǎng wàiguó zhīqián yào zuò hǎo xǔduō zhǔnbèi gōngzuò
574.english: There are a lot of preliminaries to be gone through before you can visit a foreign country.

575.simplified: 这一情况出现得很突然，把我们的计划全都打乱了。
575.traditional: 這一情況出現得很突然，把我們的計劃全都打亂了。
575.pinyin: zhè yī qíngkuàng chūxiàn dehěn tūrán bǎ wǒmen de jìhuà quándōu dǎ luàn le

779.pinyin: wǒ bìxū mǎi yī jié xīn de gàn diànchí le
779.english: I have to buy a new dry cell.

780.simplified: 她脸上露出愉快的微笑。
780.traditional: 她臉上露出愉快的微笑。
780.pinyin: tā liǎn shàng lùchū yúkuài de wēixiào
780.english: There is a merry smile on her face.

781.simplified: 他推着手推车沿路走过。
781.traditional: 他推著手推車沿路走過。
781.pinyin: tā tuī zhuóshǒu tuīchē yánlù zǒuguò
781.english: He trundled a wheelbarrow down the path.

782.pinyin: wǒ tǎoyàn tā zài jiàoshì chōuyān
782.english: I got sick of his smoking in the classroom.

783.simplified: 他的眼光转向了电话机。
783.traditional: 他的眼光轉向了電話機。
783.pinyin: tā de yǎnguāng zhuǎnxiàng le diànhuàjī
783.english: His eyes shifted to the telephone.

784.simplified: 我们在那儿几乎没看见学生。
784.traditional: 我們在那兒幾乎沒看見學生。
784.pinyin: wǒmen zàinar jīhū méi kànjiàn xuésheng

785.simplified: 工人们装好了供水系统。
785.traditional: 工人們裝好了供水系統。
785.pinyin: gōng rénmen zhuāng hǎole gōngshuǐ xìtǒng
785.english: The workmen fixed the water system.

786.simplified: 道路被一块大石头堵住了。
786.traditional: 道路被一塊大石頭堵住了。
786.pinyin: dàolù bèi yīkuài dà shítou dǔzhù le
786.english: The road was blocked by a huge rock.

787.simplified: 他决定到我们的岛上居住。
787.traditional: 他決定到我們的島上居住。
787.pinyin: tā juédìng dào wǒmen de dǎo shàng jūzhù
787.english: He decided to dwell on our island.

788.english: The peasants are reaping a field of barley.

789.simplified: 在第二个转弯处向左转。
789.traditional: 在第二個轉彎處向左轉。
789.pinyin: zài dì'èr gè zhuǎnwān chǔ xiàng zuǒzhuǎn
789.english: Take the second turning on the left.

790.simplified: 他们拿起武器保卫祖国。
790.traditional: 他們拿起武器保衛祖國。
790.english: They took up arms in defence of their country.

791.simplified: 有头脑不仅指受过教育。
791.traditional: 有頭腦不僅指受過教育。
791.pinyin: yǒu tóunǎo bùjǐn zhǐ shòu guò jiàoyù
791.english: Brains are more than just education.

792.simplified: 他在最适当的时候到达。
792.traditional: 他在最適當的時候到達。
792.pinyin: tā zài zuì shìdàng de shíhou dàodá
792.english: He arrived at the most opportune moment.

793.simplified: 她最主要的品质是善良。
793.traditional: 她最主要的品質是善良。
793.pinyin: tā zuì zhǔyào de pǐnzhì shì shànliáng
793.english: Her most essential quality is kindness.

794.simplified: 这活儿需要细心, 催不得.
794.traditional: 這活兒需要細心, 催不得.
794.pinyin: zhè huór xūyào xìxīn cuī bùdé
794.english: This work needs care; it mustn't be hurried.

795.simplified: 那是一场死气沉沉的演出。
795.traditional: 那是一場死氣沉沉的演出。
795.pinyin: nàshi yī chǎng sǐqìchénchén de yǎnchū

796.simplified: 鱼在这家厂里装成罐头。
796.traditional: 魚在這家廠裡裝成罐頭。
796.pinyin: yú zài zhè jiā chǎng lǐ zhuāngchéng guàntou
796.english: The fish is canned in the factory.

797.simplified: 他的人生观与你的不同。
797.traditional: 他的人生觀與你的不同。
797.pinyin: tā de rénshēng guān yǔ nǐ de bùtóng
797.english: His view of life is different from yours.

798.simplified: 他该保持安静是有必要的。
798.traditional: 他該保持安靜是有必要的。
798.pinyin: tā gāi bǎochí ānjìng shì yǒu bìyào de
798.english: It is important that he be quiet.

799.simplified: 所有这些完全都是多余的。
799.traditional: 所有這些完全都是多余的。
799.pinyin: suǒyǒu zhèxiē wánquán dōu shì duōyú de

800.simplified: 她以简练的风格写小说。
800.traditional: 她以簡練的風格寫小說。
800.pinyin: tā yǐ jiǎnliàn de fēnggé xiě xiǎoshuō
800.english: She writes novels with economical style.

801.pinyin: wǒ de gōngzī duōdá yī wàn yuán
801.english: I received no less than ten thousand yen for my work.

802.simplified: 床单的中间部分磨薄了。
802.traditional: 床單的中間部分磨薄了。
802.pinyin: chuángdān de zhōngjiān bùfen mó báo le
802.english: The sheets have worn thin in the middle.

803.simplified: 法官否决了以前的判决。
803.traditional: 法官否決了以前的判決。
803.pinyin: fǎguān fǒujué le yǐqián de pànjué
803.english: The judge overruled the previous decision.

804.simplified: 他向我求婚，但我拒绝了。
804.traditional: 他向我求婚，但我拒絕了。
804.pinyin: tā xiàng wǒ qiúhūn dàn wǒ jùjué le
804.english: He asked me to marry him but I refused.

805.simplified: 吸烟对你的健康没有好处。
805.traditional: 吸煙對你的健康沒有好處。
805.pinyin: xīyān duì nǐ de jiànkāng méiyǒu hǎochu
805.english: Smoking is not good for your health.

806.pinyin: shàonǚ yǐqián yào shàng yítài kè
806.english: Young ladies used to have lessons in deportment.

807.simplified: 我是一名广播电台的听众。
807.traditional: 我是一名廣播電台的聽眾。
807.pinyin: wǒ shì yī míng guǎngbōdiàntái de tīngzhòng

808.simplified: 看著课文, 听我给你朗读.
808.traditional: 看著課文, 聽我給你朗讀.
808.pinyin: kàn zhe kèwén tīng wǒ gěi nǐ lǎngdú
808.english: Follow the text while I read it out to you.

809.pinyin: xiǎotōu tiào shàng qìchē táozǒu le
809.english: The thief jumped into a car and made his escape.

810.simplified: 他常去那个教堂做礼拜。
810.traditional: 他常去那個教堂做禮拜。
810.pinyin: tā cháng qù nàge jiàotáng zuòlǐbài
810.english: He is a regular worshiper at that church.

811.simplified: 我会尽一切可能帮助你。
811.traditional: 我會盡一切可能幫助你。
811.pinyin: wǒ huì jìn yīqiè kěnéng bāngzhù nǐ
811.english: I'll do everything possible to help you.

812.simplified: 她用功的程度是我的三倍。
812.traditional: 她用功的程度是我的三倍。
812.pinyin: tā yònggōng de chéngdù shì wǒ de sānbèi
812.english: She studies three times as hard as I.

813.simplified: 他们在议会中互相吹捧。
813.traditional: 他們在議會中互相吹捧。
813.pinyin: tāmen zài yìhuì zhōng hùxiāng chuīpěng
813.english: They clawed each other in Parliament.

814.simplified: 这些动物仅在夜间才出来.
814.traditional: 這些動物僅在夜間才出來.
814.pinyin: zhèxiē dòngwù jǐn zài yèjiān cái chūlái
814.english: These animals only come out at night.

815.simplified: 我坐电梯上了第十八层。
815.traditional: 我坐電梯上了第十八層。
815.pinyin: wǒ zuò diàntī shàng le dì shíbā céng
815.english: I took the elevator to the eighteenth floor.

816.simplified: 他经常按他妻子的吩咐去做。
816.traditional: 他經常按他妻子的吩咐去做。
816.pinyin: tā jīngcháng àn tā qīzi de fēnfù qù zuò
816.english: He often does his wife's bidding.

817.simplified: 这些球员们配合得很好。
817.traditional: 這些球員們配合得很好。
817.pinyin: zhèxiē qiúyuán men pèihé dehěn hǎo
817.english: These players made a very good combination.

818.simplified: 请示范机器的使用方法。
818.traditional: 請示范機器的使用方法。
818.pinyin: qǐng shìfàn jīqì de shǐyòng fāngfǎ
818.english: Please demonstrate how the machine works.

819.simplified: 有些啤酒和巧克力有苦味。
819.traditional: 有些啤酒和巧克力有苦味。
819.pinyin: yǒuxiē píjiǔ hé qiǎokèlì yǒu kǔwèi
819.english: Some beer and chocolate taste bitter.

820.simplified: 这个小村庄离城市很远。
820.traditional: 這個小村莊離城市很遠。
820.pinyin: zhège xiǎo cūnzhuāng lí chéngshì hěn yuǎn
820.english: This hamlet is distant from the town.

821.simplified: 他太小气，不肯请我们吃饭。
821.traditional: 他太小氣，不肯請我們吃飯。
821.pinyin: tā tài xiǎoqì bù kěn qǐng wǒmen chīfàn
821.english: He's too mean to buy us a meal.

822.simplified: 并不是每个人都喜欢这本书。
822.traditional: 並不是每個人都喜歡這本書。
822.pinyin: tā tài xiǎoqì bù kěn qǐng wǒmen chīfàn

823.pinyin: xìnfēng nèi zhuāngyǒu jǐ fèn fùjiàn
823.english: There are several enclosures in the envelope.

824.simplified: 我们是朝正北方向航行。
824.traditional: 我們是朝正北方向航行。
824.pinyin: wǒmen shì cháo zhèng běi fāngxiàng hángxíng
824.english: Our course was straight to the north.

825.simplified: 在困难面前我们决不退缩。
825.traditional: 在困難面前我們決不退縮。
825.pinyin: zài kùnnan miànqián wǒmen juébù tuìsuō

826.simplified: 战争使许多家庭妻离子散。
826.traditional: 戰爭使許多家庭妻離子散。

827.simplified: 球打在墙上又反弹回来。
827.traditional: 球打在牆上又反彈回來。
827.pinyin: qiú dǎ zài qiáng shàng yòu fǎntán huílai
827.english: The ball hit the wall and bounced off it.

828.simplified: 她年轻时是个有名的美人.
828.traditional: 她年輕時是個有名的美人.
828.pinyin: tā niánqīng shí shì gè yǒumíng de měirén
828.english: She was a famous beauty in her youth.

829.simplified: 这条裤子被改成了短裤。
829.traditional: 這條褲子被改成了短褲。
829.pinyin: zhè tiáo kùzi bèi gǎi chéngle duǎnkù
829.english: This pair of pants was converted into shorts.

830.simplified: 彩旗增加了节日的欢乐。
830.traditional: 彩旗增加了節日的歡樂。
830.pinyin: cǎiqí zēngjiā le jiérì de huānlè
830.english: Color flags added to the gaiety of the festival.

831.simplified: 我们可以轻松地开始工作。
831.traditional: 我們可以輕松地開始工作。
831.pinyin: wǒmen kěyǐ qīngsōng dì kāishǐ gōngzuò
831.english: We can set to work with a light heart.

832.simplified: 律师向我们解释了新法律。
832.traditional: 律師向我們解釋了新法律。
832.pinyin: lǜshī xiàng wǒmen jiěshì le xīn fǎlǜ
832.english: The lawyer explained the new law to us.

833.simplified: 别让她在外边雨中等著.
833.traditional: 別讓她在外邊雨中等著.
833.pinyin: bié ràng tā zàiwài biān yǔ zhōngděng zhe
833.english: Don't leave her waiting outside in the rain.

834.pinyin: bié wàng le gěi fúwùyuán xiǎofèi
834.english: Please remember (ie Don't forget to tip) the waiter.

835.simplified: 数小时后, 他清醒过来。
835.traditional: 數小時後, 他清醒過來。
835.english: It was many hours before he came back to life.

836.simplified: 石墨常被用来做成铅笔。
836.traditional: 石墨常被用來做成鉛筆。
836.pinyin: shímò cháng bèi yònglái zuò chéng qiānbǐ
836.english: Graphite is used in making lead pencils.

837.simplified: 请问我该先买哪个品种。
837.traditional: 請問我該先買哪個品種。
837.pinyin: qǐngwèn wǒ gāi xiān mǎi nǎge pǐnzhǒng
837.english: Please advise me which item I should buy.

838.simplified: 我不和我的老板谈私事。
838.traditional: 我不和我的老板談私事。
838.pinyin: wǒ bùhé wǒ de lǎobǎn tán sīshì
838.english: I don't talk with my boss about my private matters.

839.simplified: 面包主要是由面粉做成的。
839.traditional: 面包主要是由面粉做成的。
839.pinyin: miànbāo zhǔyào shì yóu miànfěn zuò chéng de
839.english: Bread is chiefly made of flour.

840.simplified: 现在该是填饱肚子的时候了。
840.traditional: 現在該是填飽肚子的時候了。
840.pinyin: xiànzài gāi shì tiánbǎo dùzi de shíhou le
840.english: It's time to satisfy my inner man.

841.simplified: 我们一共捉到10只金丝猴。
841.traditional: 我們一共捉到10只金絲猴。
841.pinyin: wǒmen yīgòng zhuō dào zhǐ jīnsīhóu
841.english: Altogether we caught ten golden monkeys.

842.simplified: 我们出去吸口新鲜空气吧。
842.traditional: 我們出去吸口新鮮空氣吧。
842.pinyin: wǒmen chūqù xīkǒu xīnxiān kōngqì ba
842.english: Let's go out for a breath of fresh air.

843.simplified: 他们又提高了汽油的价格。
843.traditional: 他們又提高了汽油的價格。
843.pinyin: tāmen yòu tígāo le qìyóu de jiàgé
843.english: They have increased the price of petrol again.

844.simplified: 学生们手牵手站成一排。
844.traditional: 學生們手牽手站成一排。
844.pinyin: xuésheng men shǒuqiānshǒu zhàn chéng yīpái
844.english: Students stand hand in hand in a row.

845.simplified: 她无疑是本市最好的律师。
845.traditional: 她無疑是本市最好的律師。
845.pinyin: tā wúyí shì běnshì zuìhǎo de lǜshī
845.english: She is easily the best lawyer in the city.

846.simplified: 他们一家常在树林里野餐。
846.traditional: 他們一家常在樹林裡野餐。
846.pinyin: tāmen yījiā cháng zài shùlín lǐ yěcān
846.english: Their family often picnics in the woods.

847.english: He has some little acquaintance with the Japanese language.

848.pinyin: cóngqián yǒu gè měilì de gōngzhǔ
848.english: Once upon a time there was a beautiful princess...

849.simplified: 英语现在通用于全世界。
849.traditional: 英語現在通用於全世界。
849.english: English is spoken all over the world today.

850.simplified: 孩子们整整齐齐排好队。
850.traditional: 孩子們整整齊齊排好隊。
850.english: The children lined up in an orderly fashion.

851.simplified: 他似乎把正号误作负号了。
851.traditional: 他似乎把正號誤作負號了。
851.pinyin: tā sìhū bǎ zhènghào wùzuò fùhào le
851.english: He seems to have mistaken a plus for a minus.

852.pinyin: chūmén zhīqián bǎ chuānghu guān yán
852.english: Make the windows secure before leaving the house.

853.simplified: 那位诗人为她写了许多诗。
853.traditional: 那位詩人為她寫了許多詩。
853.pinyin: nà wèi shī rénwéi tā xiě le xǔduō shī
853.english: The poet has written many poems for her.

854.simplified: 这种错误会有损你的事业。
854.traditional: 這種錯誤會有損你的事業。
854.pinyin: zhèzhǒng cuòwù huì yǒusǔn nǐ de shìyè
854.english: Such a mistake would mar your career.

855.pinyin: zài dāi gè xīngqī yīgòng gè yuè
855.english: Another ten weeks three months altogether.

856.simplified: 这封信是用正式文体写的。
856.traditional: 這封信是用正式文體寫的。
856.pinyin: zhè fēng xìn shì yòng zhèngshì wéntǐ xiě de
856.english: The letter is written in formal style.

857.simplified: 我想进村林子里去凉快一下
857.traditional: 我想進村林子裡去涼快一下
857.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng jìn cūn línzi lǐ qù liángkuai yīxià
857.english: I'm going into the wood to cool off.

858.simplified: 有些印第安人对我们很友好。
858.traditional: 有些印第安人對我們很友好。
858.pinyin: yǒuxiē Yìndì'ānrén duì wǒmen hěn yǒuhǎo
858.english: Some Indians are friendly to us.

859.simplified: 他的计划迅速变为现实。
859.traditional: 他的計劃迅速變為現實。
859.pinyin: tā de jìhuà xùnsù biànwéi xiànshí
859.english: His plans were transformed overnight into reality.

860.simplified: 星星在晴朗的夜空闪亮。
860.traditional: 星星在晴朗的夜空閃亮。
860.pinyin: xīngxing zài qínglǎng de yèkōng shǎnliàng
860.english: Stars are brilliant in the clear night sky.

861.simplified: 歉收引起食物严重短缺。
861.traditional: 歉收引起食物嚴重短缺。
861.english: The bad harvest led to severe food shortage.

862.simplified: 他不赞成改变党的方针。
862.traditional: 他不贊成改變黨的方針。
862.pinyin: tā bùzànchéng gǎibiàn dǎng de fāngzhēn
862.english: He deprecates changing the party's policy.

863.simplified: 要满足每一个人绝非易事。
863.traditional: 要滿足每一個人絕非易事。
863.pinyin: yào mǎnzú měi yīgèrén juéfēi yì shì
863.english: It is by no means easy to satisfy everyone.

864.simplified: 我心中充满了回家的渴望。
864.traditional: 我心中充滿了回家的渴望。
864.pinyin: wǒ xīnzhōng chōngmǎn le huíjiā de kěwàng
864.english: I am filled with desire to go back home.

865.simplified: 这条街比那条街宽三倍。
865.traditional: 這條街比那條街寬三倍。
865.pinyin: zhè tiáo jiē bǐ nà tiáo jiē kuān sānbèi
865.english: This street is three times wider than that one.

866.simplified: 它比另外一个的声音大十倍。
866.traditional: 它比另外一個的聲音大十倍。
866.pinyin: tā bǐ lìngwài yī gè de shēngyīn dà shíbèi
866.english: It is ten times louder than another.

867.simplified: 所有的植物都需要水和阳光。
867.traditional: 所有的植物都需要水和陽光。
867.pinyin: suǒyǒu de zhíwù dōu xūyào shuǐ hé yángguāng
867.english: All plants need water and light.

868.simplified: 他的行为招致尖锐的批评。
868.traditional: 他的行為招致尖銳的批評。
868.pinyin: tā de xíngwéi zhāozhì jiānruì de pīpíng
868.english: His behavior called forth sharp criticism.

869.simplified: 他把醋洒在鱼和土豆片上。
869.traditional: 他把醋灑在魚和土豆片上。
869.pinyin: tā bǎ cù sǎ zài yú hé tǔdòu piàn shàng
869.english: He sprinkled vinegar on his fish and chips.

870.simplified: 请保持在听得见的距离之内。
870.traditional: 請保持在聽得見的距離之內。
870.pinyin: qǐng bǎochí zài tīngdéjiàn de jùlí zhīnèi

871.simplified: 他对自己的缺点十分清楚。
871.traditional: 他對自己的缺點十分清楚。
871.pinyin: tā duì zìjǐ de quēdiǎn shífēn qīngchu
871.english: He was very conscious of his shortcomings.

872.simplified: 大多数人的右手是优势手。
872.traditional: 大多數人的右手是優勢手。
872.pinyin: dàduōshù rén de yòushǒu shì yōushì shǒu
872.english: The right hand is dominant in most people.

873.simplified: 一阵大风吹来，把门关上了。
873.traditional: 一陣大風吹來，把門關上了。
873.pinyin: yīzhèn dàfēng chuī lái bǎmén guānshàng le
873.english: A gust of wind blew the door shut.

874.simplified: 这顶帽子和鞋子完全相配。
874.traditional: 這頂帽子和鞋子完全相配。
874.pinyin: zhè dǐng màozi hé xiézi wánquán xiāngpèi
874.english: The hat and shoes are a perfect match.

875.simplified: 我们及早订票以确保有座。
875.traditional: 我們及早訂票以確保有座。
875.pinyin: wǒmen jízǎo dìngpiào yǐ quèbǎo yǒu zuò
875.english: We book early to assure ourselves of seats.

876.simplified: 乡村生活确实让人愉快。
876.traditional: 鄉村生活確實讓人愉快。
876.pinyin: xiāngcūn shēnghuó quèshí ràng rén yúkuài
876.english: Life in the country is rather delightful.

877.simplified: 这孩子专注地听着童话故事。
877.traditional: 這孩子專注地聽著童話故事。
877.pinyin: zhè háizi zhuānzhù dì tīng zhe tónghuàgùshì

878.simplified: 她穿着一件黑色丝质晚礼服。
878.traditional: 她穿著一件黑色絲質晚禮服。
878.pinyin: tā chuānzhuó yī jiàn hēisè sī zhì wǎnlǐfú
878.english: She wore a black silk evening gown.

879.simplified: 这里的邮政服务很不可靠。
879.traditional: 這裡的郵政服務很不可靠。
879.pinyin: zhèlǐ de yóuzhèng fúwù hěn bùkěkào
879.english: The postal service here is very unreliable.

880.simplified: 那孩子正经历困难的阶段。
880.traditional: 那孩子正經歷困難的階段。
880.pinyin: nà háizi zhèng jīnglì kùnnan de jiēduàn
880.english: The child is going through a difficult phase.

881.simplified: 警方查获了各种书和磁带.
881.traditional: 警方查獲了各種書和磁帶.
881.pinyin: jǐngfāng cháhuò le gèzhǒng shū hé cídài
881.english: The police seized various books and tapes.

882.simplified: 很多树冬天时就掉光了叶子。
882.traditional: 很多樹冬天時就掉光了葉子。
882.pinyin: hěn duō shù dōngtiān shí jiù diào guāng le yèzi
882.english: Many trees are leafless in winter.

883.simplified: 天空慢慢由蓝色变为红色。
883.traditional: 天空慢慢由藍色變為紅色。
883.pinyin: tiānkōng mànmàn yóu lánsè biànwéi hóngsè
883.english: The sky slowly changed from blue to red.

884.simplified: 啊，好啦，一样白米养百样人嘛。
884.traditional: 啊，好啦，一樣白米養百樣人嘛。
884.pinyin: ā hǎo la yīyàng báimǐ yǎng bǎi yàng rén ma
884.english: Ah, well, it take all kinds!

885.simplified: 我觉得他好象想要回家。
885.traditional: 我覺得他好象想要回家。
885.pinyin: wǒ juéde tā hǎoxiàng xiǎngyào huíjiā
885.english: It seems to me that be would like to go back home.

886.simplified: 队长带领我们队取得了胜利。
886.traditional: 隊長帶領我們隊取得了勝利。
886.pinyin: duìzhǎng dàilǐng wǒmen duì qǔdé le shènglì
886.english: The captain led our team to victory.

887.simplified: 乘飞机旅行前他紧张不安。
887.traditional: 乘飛機旅行前他緊張不安。
887.pinyin: chéng fēijī lǚxíng qián tā jǐnzhāng bù'ān
887.english: He was nervous before the plane trip.

888.simplified: 他警告我晚上不要到那去。
888.traditional: 他警告我晚上不要到那去。
888.pinyin: tā jǐnggào wǒ wǎnshang bùyào dào nà qù
888.english: He warned me against going there at night.

889.simplified: 这个淡水湖里有许多种鱼。
889.traditional: 這個淡水湖裡有許多種魚。
889.pinyin: zhège dànshuǐ Húlǐ yǒu xǔ duōzhǒng yú
889.english: There are many fish in this freshwater lake.

890.simplified: 网球俱乐部组织了一次舞会。
890.traditional: 網球俱樂部組織了一次舞會。
890.pinyin: wǎngqiú jùlèbù zǔzhī le yīcì wǔhuì
890.english: The tennis club has organized a dance.

891.simplified: 参加考试的人大多数语法及格.
891.traditional: 參加考試的人大多數語法及格.
891.pinyin: cānjiā kǎoshì de rén dàduōshù yǔfǎ jígé

892.simplified: 窗外的树木挡住了阳光。
892.traditional: 窗外的樹木擋住了陽光。
892.pinyin: chuāng wài de shùmù dǎngzhù le yángguāng
892.english: The trees outside the window blocked off the sun.

893.simplified: 没有人能够成功而不努力。
893.traditional: 沒有人能夠成功而不努力。
893.pinyin: méiyǒu rén nénggòu chénggōng ér bù nǔlì
893.english: No one can succeed without working hard.

894.simplified: 他骗我把自行车借给了他。
894.traditional: 他騙我把自行車借給了他。
894.pinyin: tā piàn wǒ bǎ zìxíngchē jiègěi le tā
894.english: He beguiled me into lending him my bicycle.

895.simplified: 冬天是大多数旅馆的淡季。
895.traditional: 冬天是大多數旅館的淡季。
895.pinyin: dōngtiān shì dàduōshù lǚguǎn de dànjì
895.english: Winter is the slack season at most hotels.

896.simplified: 他无礼至极，竟然叫我傻瓜。
896.traditional: 他無禮至極，竟然叫我傻瓜。
896.pinyin: tā wúlǐ zhìjí jìngrán jiào wǒ shǎguā
896.english: He was impudent enough to call me a fool.

897.simplified: 偷吃而不被人发现很有趣。
897.traditional: 偷吃而不被人發現很有趣。
897.pinyin: tōuchī ér bù bèi rén fāxiàn hěn yǒuqù
897.english: It is fun eating by stealth without being found.

898.simplified: 小猫喝了牛奶，又洗了脸。
898.traditional: 小貓喝了牛奶，又洗了臉。
898.pinyin: xiǎomāo hē le niúnǎi yòu xǐ le liǎn
898.english: The little cat drank its milk and washed its face.

899.simplified: 去年冬天，地上积雪很厚。
899.traditional: 去年冬天，地上積雪很厚。
899.pinyin: qùnián dōngtiān dìshang jīxuě hěn hòu
899.english: Last winter the snow lay thick on the ground.

900.simplified: 下一次邮递时间是四点钟。
900.traditional: 下一次郵遞時間是四點鐘。
900.pinyin: xiàyīcì yóudì shíjiān shì sì diǎnzhōng
900.english: The next postal delivery is at 4 o'clock.

901.simplified: 这个商人收到了一船茶叶。
901.traditional: 這個商人收到了一船茶葉。
901.pinyin: zhège shāngrén shōu dàoliǎo yī chuán cháyè
901.english: The merchant had received a shipment of tea.

902.simplified: 她错在没有亲自与他见面。
902.traditional: 她錯在沒有親自與他見面。
902.pinyin: tā cuò zài méiyǒu qīnzì yǔ tā jiànmiàn
902.english: She erred in failing to meet him in person.

903.simplified: 大家的反应如何难以估计。
903.traditional: 大家的反應如何難以估計。
903.pinyin: dàjiā de fǎnyìng rúhé nányǐ gūjì
903.english: It was difficult to gauge how people would respond.

904.simplified: 他用一张小的王牌吃了我的A牌。
904.traditional: 他用一張小的王牌吃了我的A牌。
904.pinyin: tā yòng yī zhāng xiǎode wángpái chī le wǒ de pái
904.english: He took my ace with a low trump.

905.simplified: 你刚才讲的话彻底离题了。
905.traditional: 你剛才講的話徹底離題了。
905.pinyin: nǐ gāngcái jiǎng dehuà chèdǐ lítí le
905.english: What you just said is completely off the track.

906.simplified: 我的各种问题似乎同时出现了
906.traditional: 我的各種問題似乎同時出現了
906.pinyin: wǒ de gèzhǒng wèntí sìhū tóngshí chūxiàn le
906.english: All my troubles seem to come together.

907.simplified: 他以晓之以礼的态度劝说她。
907.traditional: 他以曉之以禮的態度勸說她。
907.pinyin: tā yǐ xiǎo zhī yǐ lǐ de tàidu quànshuō tā
907.english: He talked to her with persuasive manner.

908.simplified: 她把她的意思解释得清清楚楚。
908.traditional: 她把她的意思解釋得清清楚楚。
908.pinyin: tā bǎ tā de yìsi jiěshì dé qīng qīngchu chǔ
908.english: She made her meaning crystal clear.

909.simplified: 对这类事情的兴趣慢慢减少了。
909.traditional: 對這類事情的興趣慢慢減少了。
909.pinyin: duì zhèlèi shìqing de xìngqù mànmàn jiǎnshǎo le

910.simplified: 这条线是那条线的四倍长。
910.traditional: 這條線是那條線的四倍長。
910.pinyin: zhè tiáo xiàn shì nà tiáo xiàn de sì bèi cháng
910.english: This line is four times as long as that one.

911.simplified: 我想讲一下这首诗的意义。
911.traditional: 我想講一下這首詩的意義。
911.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng jiǎng yīxià zhè shǒu shī de yìyì
911.english: I want to bring out the meaning of the poem.

912.english: It is more convenient to transport the goods in bulk.

913.simplified: 老年人冬季需要暖和的衣服。
913.traditional: 老年人冬季需要暖和的衣服。
913.pinyin: lǎoniánrén dōngjì xūyào nuǎnhuo de yīfu
913.english: Old people need warm clothes in winter.

914.simplified: 头版上有些有意思的消息.
914.traditional: 頭版上有些有意思的消息.
914.pinyin: tóubǎn shàng yǒuxiē yǒuyìsi de xiāoxi
914.english: There's something interesting on the front page.

915.simplified: 留心那条狗, 有时候咬人.
915.traditional: 留心那條狗, 有時候咬人.
915.pinyin: liúxīn nà tiáo gǒu yǒushíhou yǎo rén
915.english: Be careful of the dog; it sometimes bites people.

916.simplified: 请于每段第一行缩格书写。
916.traditional: 請於每段第一行縮格書寫。
916.pinyin: qǐng yú měi duàn dìyī xíng suō gé shūxiě
916.english: Please indent the first line of each paragraph.

917.simplified: 我父亲喜欢在饭后用牙签。
917.traditional: 我父親喜歡在飯後用牙簽。
917.pinyin: wǒ fùqīn xǐhuan zài fàn hòu yòng yáqiān
917.english: My father likes to use toothpick after meals.

918.simplified: 警方正在忙着捕捉逃犯。
918.traditional: 警方正在忙著捕捉逃犯。
918.english: The police are on the run to catch the murderer.

919.simplified: 我往平底锅里打了两个鸡蛋。
919.traditional: 我往平底鍋裡打了兩個雞蛋。
919.pinyin: wǒ wǎng píngdǐguō lǐ dǎ le liǎng gè jīdàn
919.english: I cracked two eggs into the frying pan.

920.simplified: 中国是一个原油丰富的国家。
920.traditional: 中國是一個原油豐富的國家。
920.pinyin: Zhōngguó shì yī gè yuányóu fēngfù de guójiā
920.english: China is a country rich in crude oil.

921.simplified: 云层的构成方式有好几种。
921.traditional: 雲層的構成方式有好幾種。
921.pinyin: yúncéng de gòuchéng fāngshì yǒu hǎojǐ zhǒng
921.english: There are several kinds of cloud formations.

922.simplified: 我起床后舒服地伸了个懒腰。
922.traditional: 我起床後舒服地伸了個懶腰。
922.pinyin: wǒ qǐchuáng hòu shūfu dì shēn le gè lǎnyāo
922.english: I got out of the bed and had a good stretch.

923.simplified: 我认为他是更合适的人选。
923.traditional: 我認為他是更合適的人選。
923.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi tā shì gèng héshì de rénxuǎn
923.english: In my estimation, he is a more suitable candidate.

924.simplified: 我们有时候吃大米, 不吃土豆.
924.traditional: 我們有時候吃大米, 不吃土豆.
924.pinyin: wǒmen yǒushíhou chī dàmǐ bù chī tǔdòu
924.english: We sometimes eat rice instead of potatoes.

925.simplified: 我不知道合同的正确条款。
925.traditional: 我不知道合同的正確條款。
925.pinyin: wǒ bù zhīdào hétong de zhèngquè tiáokuǎn
925.english: I don't know the exact terms of the contract.

926.simplified: 牙被拔掉时，他疼得大叫。
926.traditional: 牙被拔掉時，他疼得大叫。
926.pinyin: yá bèi bádiào shí tā téng dé dà jiào
926.english: He bellowed with pain when the tooth was pulled out.

927.simplified: 学生们接受老师的劝告。
927.traditional: 學生們接受老師的勸告。
927.pinyin: xuésheng men jiēshòu lǎoshī de quàngào
927.english: The students take the admonition from their teacher.

928.simplified: 我们在花园里种了许多蔬菜。
928.traditional: 我們在花園裡種了許多蔬菜。
928.pinyin: wǒmen zài huāyuán lǐ zhǒng le xǔduō shūcài
928.english: We've grown many vegetables in our garden.

929.simplified: 她头上带着一块黄色的头巾。
929.traditional: 她頭上帶著一塊黃色的頭巾。
929.pinyin: tā tóushàng dài zhe yīkuài huángsè de tóujīn
929.english: She wore on her head a yellow kerchief.

930.simplified: 真正的友谊比金钱更宝贵。
930.traditional: 真正的友誼比金錢更寶貴。
930.pinyin: zhēnzhèng de yǒuyì bǐ jīnqián gèng bǎoguì
930.english: Real friendship is more valuable than money.

931.simplified: 我妹妹每周去一次美容院。
931.traditional: 我妹妹每周去一次美容院。
931.pinyin: wǒ mèimei měizhōu qù yīcì měiróngyuàn
931.english: My sister goes to a beauty parlour once a week.

932.simplified: 我姐姐和我都喜欢穿牛仔裤。
932.traditional: 我姐姐和我都喜歡穿牛仔褲。
932.pinyin: wǒ jiějie hé wǒ dōu xǐhuan chuān niúzǎikù
932.english: Both my sister and I like to wear jeans.

933.simplified: 两块田之间有一条树木带。
933.traditional: 兩塊田之間有一條樹木帶。
933.pinyin: liǎng kuài tián zhījiān yǒu yī tiáo shùmù dài
933.english: A belt of trees grew between the two fields.

934.simplified: 如果你努力工作，你就会成功。
934.traditional: 如果你努力工作，你就會成功。
934.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ nǔlì gōngzuò nǐ jiù huì chénggōng
934.english: If you work hard you will succeed.

935.simplified: 她在一年后才把孩子的奶断掉。
935.traditional: 她在一年後才把孩子的奶斷掉。
935.pinyin: tā zài yī nián hòu cái bǎ háizi de nǎi duàn diào
935.english: She had her baby weaned a year later.

936.simplified: 他想在餐具室里找到一些酒。
936.traditional: 他想在餐具室裡找到一些酒。
936.pinyin: tā xiǎng zài cānjù shì lǐ zhǎodào yīxiē jiǔ
936.english: He wanted to find some wine in the pantry.

937.simplified: 他把硬币倒过来，仔细检查。
937.traditional: 他把硬幣倒過來，仔細檢查。
937.pinyin: tā bǎ yìngbì dǎo guòlái zǐxì jiǎnchá
937.english: He reversed the coin and examined it carefully.

938.simplified: 电话在底楼的小书房里。
938.traditional: 電話在底樓的小書房裡。
938.pinyin: diànhuà zài dǐ lóu de xiǎo shūfáng lǐ
938.english: The telephone was in the little study on the ground floor.

939.simplified: 我迫不及待地想听到这个消息。
939.traditional: 我迫不及待地想聽到這個消息。
939.pinyin: wǒ pòbùjídài dì xiǎng tīngdào zhège xiāoxi
939.english: I can hardly wait to hear the news.

940.simplified: 他们在沙漠中迷路而渴死了.
940.traditional: 他們在沙漠中迷路而渴死了.
940.pinyin: tāmen zài shāmò zhōng mílù ér kě sǐ le
940.english: They lost their way in the desert and died of thirst.

941.simplified: 所有乘客都必须出示车票。
941.traditional: 所有乘客都必須出示車票。
941.pinyin: suǒyǒu chéngkè dōu bìxū chūshì chēpiào
941.english: All passengers are required to show their tickets.

942.simplified: 我们的木头沙发似乎不太舒服。
942.traditional: 我們的木頭沙發似乎不太舒服。
942.pinyin: wǒmen de mùtou shāfā sìhū bù tài shūfu
942.english: Our wooden sofa seems not very comfortable.

943.simplified: 我走到临湖而开的那扇门前。
943.traditional: 我走到臨湖而開的那扇門前。
943.pinyin: wǒ zǒu dào lín hú ér kāi de nà shàn ménqián
943.english: I reached the gate that opened onto the lake.

944.simplified: 海外贸易成为主要的项目。
