944.traditional: 海外貿易成為主要的項目。
944.pinyin: hǎiwài màoyì chéngwéi zhǔyào de xiàngmù
944.english: The overseas trade has become the main project.

945.simplified: 他有一些很奇怪的政治信念。
945.traditional: 他有一些很奇怪的政治信念。
945.pinyin: tā yǒuyīxiē hěn qíguài de zhèngzhì xìnniàn
945.english: He has some pretty strange political ideas.

946.simplified: 他掌握会议可真有一套.
946.traditional: 他掌握會議可真有一套.
946.pinyin: tā zhǎngwò huìyì kě zhēn yǒu yītào
946.english: His handling of the meeting was quite a virtuoso performance.

947.simplified: 那辆火车三点钟准时到达。
947.traditional: 那輛火車三點鐘准時到達。
947.pinyin: nà liàng huǒchē sān diǎnzhōng zhǔnshí dàodá
947.english: The train arrived on the dot of three o'clock.

948.simplified: 外科医生问他是否感到紧张。
948.traditional: 外科醫生問他是否感到緊張。
948.pinyin: wàikēyīshēng wèn tā shìfǒu gǎndào jǐnzhāng
948.english: The surgeon asked him if he felt nervous.

949.simplified: 这两个国家已经断绝关系。
949.traditional: 這兩個國家已經斷絕關系。
949.pinyin: zhè liǎng gè guójiā yǐjīng duànjué guānxi
949.english: The two countries have severed their relations.

950.simplified: 那是历史上最严重的空难。
950.traditional: 那是歷史上最嚴重的空難。
950.pinyin: nàshi lìshǐshàng zuì yánzhòng de kōngnàn
950.english: That was the worst airline disaster in history.

951.simplified: 受惊的孩子们呼喊著找妈妈。
951.traditional: 受驚的孩子們呼喊著找媽媽。
951.pinyin: shòujīng de háizimen hūhǎn zhe zhǎo māma
951.english: Frightened children were calling for their mothers.

952.simplified: 我奶奶对外国人抱有偏见。
952.traditional: 我奶奶對外國人抱有偏見。
952.pinyin: wǒ nǎinai duì wàiguórén bàoyǒu piānjiàn
952.english: My grandmother has a complex against foreigners.

953.simplified: 我们的主要问题就是缺少时间。
953.traditional: 我們的主要問題就是缺少時間。
953.pinyin: wǒmen de zhǔyào wèntí jiùshì quēshǎo shíjiān
953.english: Our principal problem is lack of time.

954.simplified: 工人在墙上固定了一个支架。
954.traditional: 工人在牆上固定了一個支架。
954.pinyin: gōngrén zài qiáng shàng gùdìng le yī gè zhījià
954.english: The worker fixed a bracket on the wall.

955.simplified: 不系保险带开车就太傻了。
955.traditional: 不系保險帶開車就太傻了。
955.pinyin: bù xì bǎoxiǎn dài kāichē jiù tài shǎ le
955.english: It's silly to drive without fastening one's seat belt.

956.simplified: 起风了, 雨点忽然落下来。
956.traditional: 起風了, 雨點忽然落下來。
956.pinyin: qǐ fēng le yǔdiǎn hūrán luò xiàlai
956.english: A wind arose, and rain drops began falling all at once.

957.simplified: 他时常提出一些奇怪的问题。
957.traditional: 他時常提出一些奇怪的問題。
957.pinyin: tā shícháng tíchū yīxiē qíguài de wèntí
957.english: He raises some strange questions now and again.

958.simplified: 我累了就无法集中精力工作。
958.traditional: 我累了就無法集中精力工作。
958.pinyin: wǒ lèi le jiù wúfǎ jízhōng jīnglì gōngzuò
958.english: I can't concentrate on my work when I'm tired.

959.simplified: 地址如有变动，请通知我们。
959.traditional: 地址如有變動，請通知我們。
959.pinyin: dìzhǐ rú yǒu biàndòng qǐng tōngzhī wǒmen
959.english: Please notify us of any change of address.

960.simplified: 客机在两万英尺的高度飞行。
960.traditional: 客機在兩萬英尺的高度飛行。
960.pinyin: kèjī zài liǎng wàn yīngchǐ de gāodù fēixíng
960.english: The airliner flew at an altitude of 20000ft.

961.simplified: 他们使用紫外线灯杀死害虫。
961.traditional: 他們使用紫外線燈殺死害蟲。
961.pinyin: tāmen shǐyòng zǐwàixiàn dēng shāsǐ hàichóng
961.english: They use ultraviolet lamp to kill pests.

962.simplified: 一再的拖延打乱了全部安排。
962.traditional: 一再的拖延打亂了全部安排。
962.pinyin: yīzài de tuōyán dǎ luàn le quánbù ānpái
962.english: The delays put the whole schedule out of joint.

963.simplified: 已安排好一个戏剧晚会.
963.traditional: 已安排好一個戲劇晚會.
963.pinyin: yǐ ānpái hǎo yī gè xìjù wǎnhuì
963.english: A theatre evening (ie an evening at the theatre) has been arranged.

964.simplified: 先读课文，然后解释生词。
964.traditional: 先讀課文，然後解釋生詞。
964.pinyin: xiān dú kèwén ránhòu jiěshì shēngcí
964.english: Read the text first and then explain the new words.

965.simplified: 我们可以把动物分成很多种类。
965.traditional: 我們可以把動物分成很多種類。
965.pinyin: wǒmen kěyǐ bǎ dòngwù fēnchéng hěn duō zhǒnglèi
965.english: We can group animals into many types.

966.simplified: 别胡闹了，过来给我帮个忙。
966.traditional: 別胡鬧了，過來給我幫個忙。
966.pinyin: bié húnào le guòlái gěi wǒ bāng gè máng
966.english: Stop fucking around and come and give me a hand.

967.simplified: 他的火车头模型缺了一个零件.
967.traditional: 他的火車頭模型缺了一個零件.
967.pinyin: tā de huǒchētóu móxíng quē le yī gè língjiàn
967.english: He lost one of the pieces of his model engine.

968.simplified: 他每次度假都会带他的狗去。
968.traditional: 他每次度假都會帶他的狗去。
968.pinyin: tā měicì dùjià dūhuì dài tā de gǒu qù
968.english: He never goes on a vacation but he takes his pet dog.

969.simplified: 他尽管有病，还是可以上课。
969.traditional: 他盡管有病，還是可以上課。
969.pinyin: tā jǐnguǎn yǒu bìng háishi kěyǐ shàngkè
969.english: He is not so sick but he can attend a class.

970.simplified: 这块油布是用来铺桌子的。
970.traditional: 這塊油布是用來鋪桌子的。
970.pinyin: zhè kuài yóubù shì yònglái pū zhuōzi de
970.english: The piece of oilcloth is used as a covering for a table.

971.simplified: 请寄给我一张收到此款的收据。
971.traditional: 請寄給我一張收到此款的收據。
971.pinyin: qǐng jì gěi wǒ yī zhāng shōudào cǐ kuǎn de shōujù
971.english: Please send me a receipt for the money.

972.simplified: 我得到一台电脑作生日礼物。
972.traditional: 我得到一台電腦作生日禮物。
972.pinyin: wǒ dédào yī tái diànnǎo zuò shēngrì lǐwù
972.english: I'm getting a new computer for birthday present.

973.simplified: 椅子被倒置过来放在了桌子上。
973.traditional: 椅子被倒置過來放在了桌子上。
973.pinyin: yǐzi bèi dàozhì guòlái fàng zài le zhuōzi shàng
973.english: The chairs were inverted on the table.

974.simplified: 我不完全理解他离开的理由。
974.traditional: 我不完全理解他離開的理由。
974.pinyin: wǒ bù wánquán lǐjiě tā líkāi de lǐyóu
974.english: I don't fully understand his reasons for leaving.

975.simplified: 他们计划组织一次科学考察。
975.traditional: 他們計劃組織一次科學考察。
975.pinyin: tāmen jìhuà zǔzhī yīcì kēxué kǎochá
975.english: They planned to organize a scientific expedition.

976.simplified: 车站到我家只有几步路的路程。
976.traditional: 車站到我家只有幾步路的路程。
976.pinyin: chēzhàn dào wǒ jiā zhǐyǒu jǐ bù lù de lùchéng
976.english: The station is a short walk from my house

977.simplified: 这个工厂经常原料不足。
977.traditional: 這個工廠經常原料不足。
977.english: The factory is in frequent scarcity of raw materials.

978.simplified: 如有冒犯之处，请多多原谅。
978.traditional: 如有冒犯之處，請多多原諒。
978.pinyin: rú yǒu màofàn zhī chǔ qǐng duōduō yuánliàng
978.english: If I have offended you, I ask your pardon.

979.simplified: 他刚刚到达就不得不又离开。
979.traditional: 他剛剛到達就不得不又離開。
979.pinyin: tā gānggang dàodá jiù bùdébù yòu líkāi
979.english: Scarcely had he arrived when he had to leave again.

980.simplified: 你知道我多么讨厌打字和速记。
980.traditional: 你知道我多麼討厭打字和速記。
980.pinyin: nǐ zhīdào wǒ duōme tǎoyàn dǎzì hé sùjì
980.english: You know how I loathe typing and shorthand.

981.simplified: 这段文字可以有不同的解释。
981.traditional: 這段文字可以有不同的解釋。
981.pinyin: zhè duàn wénzì kěyǐ yǒu bùtóng de jiěshì
981.english: This passage may be given several interpretations.

982.simplified: 这种新药还没有投放市场。
982.traditional: 這種新藥還沒有投放市場。
982.pinyin: zhèzhǒng xīn yào hái méiyǒu tóufàngshìchǎng
982.english: This new drug is not yet commercially available.

983.simplified: 游泳后，她用毛巾擦干身子。
983.traditional: 游泳後，她用毛巾擦干身子。
983.pinyin: yóuyǒng hòu tā yòng máojīn cāgān shēnzi
983.english: After her swim she dried herself with a towel.

984.simplified: 国王拒绝评论选举的结果。
984.traditional: 國王拒絕評論選舉的結果。
984.pinyin: guówáng jùjué pínglùn xuǎnjǔ de jiéguǒ
984.english: The king refuses to comment on the election results.

985.simplified: 他的讲话赢得了听众的掌声。
985.traditional: 他的講話贏得了聽眾的掌聲。
985.pinyin: tā de jiǎnghuà yíngdé le tīngzhòng de zhǎngshēng
985.english: His speech won the applause of the audience.

986.simplified: 任何值得做的事就值得做好。
986.traditional: 任何值得做的事就值得做好。
986.pinyin: rènhé zhíde zuò de shì jiù zhíde zuò hǎo
986.english: Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well.

987.simplified: 马感觉到了危险，于是停了下来。
987.traditional: 馬感覺到了危險，於是停了下來。
987.pinyin: mǎ gǎnjué dàoliǎo wēixiǎn yúshì tíng le xiàlai
987.english: The horse sensed danger and stopped.

988.simplified: 这是一个非常普通的女孩名字。
988.traditional: 這是一個非常普通的女孩名字。
988.pinyin: zhè shì yī gè fēicháng pǔtōng de nǚhái míngzi
988.english: This is a very popular name for a girl.

989.simplified: 我们在这个问题上是团结一致的.
989.traditional: 我們在這個問題上是團結一致的.
989.pinyin: wǒmen zài zhège wèntí shàng shì tuánjié yīzhì de
989.english: We are solidly united on this issue.

990.simplified: 他的左胳膊在一次事故中受伤了。
990.traditional: 他的左胳膊在一次事故中受傷了。
990.pinyin: tā de zuǒ gēbo zài yīcì shìgù zhōng shòushāng le
990.english: His left arm was hurt in an accident.

991.simplified: 她不肯帮忙，事情就更难办了。
991.traditional: 她不肯幫忙，事情就更難辦了。
991.pinyin: tā bù kěn bāngmáng shìqing jiù gèng nán bàn le
991.english: Her refusal to help complicates matters.

992.simplified: 儿童的鞋并不便宜--反而更贵.
992.traditional: 兒童的鞋並不便宜--反而更貴.
992.pinyin: értóng de xié bìngbù piányi fǎn'ér gèng guì
992.english: Children's shoes aren't cheap quite the reverse.

993.simplified: 我将对后果承担全部责任。
993.traditional: 我將對後果承擔全部責任。
993.pinyin: wǒ jiāng duì hòuguǒ chéngdān quánbù zérèn
993.english: I'll bear full responsibility for the consequences.

994.simplified: 这所大学有许多外国教授。
994.traditional: 這所大學有許多外國教授。
994.pinyin: zhè suǒ dàxué yǒu xǔduō wàiguó jiàoshòu
994.english: There are many foreign professors in this university.

995.simplified: 宴会的准备工作现在都已就绪。
995.traditional: 宴會的准備工作現在都已就緒。
995.pinyin: yànhuì de zhǔnbèi gōngzuò xiànzài dōu yǐ jiùxù
995.english: Everything is ready now for the party.

996.simplified: 通过这条很滑的路并不容易。
996.traditional: 通過這條很滑的路並不容易。
996.pinyin: tōngguò zhè tiáo hěn huá de lù bìngbù róngyì
996.english: Negotiation of the slippery road was not easy.

997.simplified: 学生们都被他的思想吸引住了。
997.traditional: 學生們都被他的思想吸引住了。
997.pinyin: xuésheng men dōu bèi tā de sīxiǎng xīyǐn zhù le
997.english: The students were fascinated by his ideas.

998.simplified: 这些冷冻食品是最为方便。
998.traditional: 這些冷凍食品是最為方便。
998.pinyin: zhèxiē lěngdòng shípǐn shì zuìwéi fāngbiàn
998.english: These frozen foods are the most convenient of all.

999.simplified: 我们明天早晨进行一个小测验。
999.traditional: 我們明天早晨進行一個小測驗。
999.pinyin: wǒmen míngtiān zǎochén jìnxíng yī gè xiǎo cèyàn
999.english: We will have a quiz tomorrow morning.

1000.simplified: 鸡骨头上还可能有点肉呢。
1000.traditional: 雞骨頭上還可能有點肉呢。
1000.pinyin: jī gǔtou shàng hái kěnéng yǒudiǎn ròu ne
1000.english: You might find a bit of meat left on the chicken carcass.

1001.simplified: 我的围裙太脏了，我不得不洗它。
1001.traditional: 我的圍裙太髒了，我不得不洗它。
1001.pinyin: wǒ de wéiqún tài zāng le wǒ bùdébù xǐ tā
1001.english: My apron is so dirty that I have to wash it.

1002.simplified: 打开窗户，让新鲜的空气进来。
1002.traditional: 打開窗戶，讓新鮮的空氣進來。
1002.pinyin: dǎkāi chuānghu ràng xīnxiān de kōngqì jìnlái
1002.english: Open the window and let in some fresh air.

1003.simplified: 一般人都相信努力是值得的。
1003.traditional: 一般人都相信努力是值得的。
1003.pinyin: yībānrén dōu xiāngxìn nǔlì shì zhíde de
1003.english: It is generally believed that it pays to work hard.

1004.simplified: 他们站在那，互相怒视着对方。
1004.traditional: 他們站在那，互相怒視著對方。
1004.pinyin: tāmen zhàn zài nà hùxiāng nùshì zhe duìfāng
1004.english: They stood there, glaring at each other.

1005.simplified: 这张地图上的红线代表铁路。
1005.traditional: 這張地圖上的紅線代表鐵路。
1005.pinyin: zhè zhāng dìtú shàng de hóngxiàn dàibiǎo tiělù
1005.english: The red lines on the map represent railways.

1006.simplified: 你说话太不礼貌了，我已受够了。
1006.traditional: 你說話太不禮貌了，我已受夠了。
1006.pinyin: nǐ shuōhuà tài bù lǐmào le wǒ yǐ shòugòu le
1006.english: I've had enough of your impertinent words.

1007.simplified: 黄昏时分她常常坐在花园里。
1007.traditional: 黃昏時分她常常坐在花園裡。
1007.pinyin: huánghūn shífēn tā chángcháng zuò zài huāyuán lǐ
1007.english: She often sits in the garden at twilight.

1008.simplified: 他们估计参观者人数为1000万。
1008.traditional: 他們估計參觀者人數為1000萬。
1008.pinyin: tāmen gūjì cānguān zhě rénshù wéi wàn
1008.english: They estimated the number of visitors at 10 million.

1009.simplified: 微笑常常表示高兴和友善。
1009.traditional: 微笑常常表示高興和友善。
1009.pinyin: wēixiào chángcháng biǎoshì gāoxìng hé yǒushàn
1009.english: A smile often denotes pleasure and friendship.

1010.simplified: 请派一辆出租汽车到国际饭店。
1010.traditional: 請派一輛出租汽車到國際飯店。
1010.pinyin: qǐng pài yī liàng chūzūqìchē dào guójì fàndiàn
1010.english: Please send a taxi to Park Hotel.

1011.simplified: 由于肥胖, 大夫叫我停止吃肉。
1011.traditional: 由於肥胖, 大夫叫我停止吃肉。
1011.pinyin: yóuyú féipàng dàifu jiào wǒ tíngzhǐ chī ròu
1011.english: The doctor told me to cut out meat for my fat.

1012.simplified: 他的言行就好像没有常识似的。
1012.traditional: 他的言行就好像沒有常識似的。
1012.pinyin: tā de yánxíng jiù hǎoxiàng méiyǒu chángshí shìde
1012.english: He behaves as if he had no common sense.

1013.simplified: 他在抬沉重的家具时扭伤了腰。
1013.traditional: 他在抬沉重的家具時扭傷了腰。
1013.pinyin: tā zài tái chénzhòng de jiājù shí niǔshāng le yāo
1013.english: He did his back in lifting heavy furniture.

1014.simplified: 我们决定把婚礼推迟到明年。
1014.traditional: 我們決定把婚禮推遲到明年。
1014.pinyin: wǒmen juédìng bǎ hūnlǐ tuī chídào míngnián
1014.english: We decided to delay our wedding until next year.

1015.simplified: 我们会尽力来达到世界水平。
1015.traditional: 我們會盡力來達到世界水平。
1015.pinyin: wǒmen huì jìnlì lái dádào shìjiè shuǐpíng
1015.english: We'll do all we can to catch up the world level.

1016.simplified: 她穿了一件带有精致花边的裙子。
1016.traditional: 她穿了一件帶有精致花邊的裙子。
1016.pinyin: tā chuān le yī jiàn dàiyǒu jīngzhì huābiān de qúnzi
1016.english: She wears a dress with delicate lace.

1017.simplified: 本市每年举行一次夏季音乐节。
1017.traditional: 本市每年舉行一次夏季音樂節。
1017.pinyin: běnshì měinián jǔxíng yīcì xiàjì yīnyuèjié
1017.english: This city has a music festival every summer.

1018.simplified: 我不相信他会如约前来访问。
1018.traditional: 我不相信他會如約前來訪問。
1018.pinyin: wǒ bù xiāngxìn tā huì rú yuē qiánlái fǎngwèn
1018.english: I don't trust his promise to come for a visit.

1019.simplified: 昨夜温度计显示气温下降到零度.
1019.traditional: 昨夜溫度計顯示氣溫下降到零度.
1019.pinyin: zuóyè wēndùjì xiǎnshì qìwēn xiàjiàng dào língdù
1019.english: The thermometer fell to zero lastnight.

1020.simplified: 他在战争中的英勇人所共见。
1020.traditional: 他在戰爭中的英勇人所共見。
1020.pinyin: tā zài zhànzhēng zhòngdì yīngyǒng rén suǒ gòng jiàn
1020.english: His valour in the war was seen by everybody.

1021.simplified: 主席的讲话将向全国广播。
1021.traditional: 主席的講話將向全國廣播。
1021.pinyin: zhǔxí de jiǎnghuà jiāng xiàng quánguó guǎngbō
1021.english: The chairman's speech will be broadcast nationwide.

1022.simplified: 小男孩的手指让墨水给染脏了。
1022.traditional: 小男孩的手指讓墨水給染髒了。
1022.pinyin: xiǎo nánhái de shǒuzhǐ ràng mòshuǐ gěi rǎn zāng le
1022.english: The little boy stained his fingers with ink.

1023.simplified: 他用一则有趣的笑话结束了演讲。
1023.traditional: 他用一則有趣的笑話結束了演講。
1023.pinyin: tā yòng yīzé yǒuqù de xiàohuà jiéshù le yǎnjiǎng
1023.english: He closed his speech with a funny joke.

1024.simplified: 我父亲辛苦地工作为了养家。
1024.traditional: 我父親辛苦地工作為了養家。
1024.pinyin: wǒ fùqīn xīnkǔ dì gōngzuò wèile yǎngjiā
1024.english: My father works hard in order that he may support us.

1025.simplified: 群众纷纷向演讲人扔臭鸡蛋。
1025.traditional: 群眾紛紛向演講人扔臭雞蛋。
1025.pinyin: qúnzhòng fēnfēn xiàng yǎnjiǎng rén rēng chòu jīdàn
1025.english: The crowds pelted bad eggs at the speaker.

1026.simplified: 他问马车夫以前是否去过那里。
1026.traditional: 他問馬車夫以前是否去過那裡。
1026.pinyin: tā wèn mǎchē fū yǐqián shìfǒu qù guò nàli
1026.english: He asked the carter if he had been there before.

1027.simplified: 老师给小学生布置了假期作业。
1027.traditional: 老師給小學生布置了假期作業。
1027.pinyin: lǎoshī gěi xiǎoxuéshēng bùzhì le jiàqī zuòyè
1027.english: The teacher gave the children holiday tasks.

1028.simplified: 他花了半个小时做完这项工作。
1028.traditional: 他花了半個小時做完這項工作。
1028.pinyin: tā huā le bànge xiǎoshí zuòwán zhè xiàng gōngzuò
1028.english: It took him half an hour to finish the work.

1029.simplified: 他对著镜子看领带是否系正.
1029.traditional: 他對著鏡子看領帶是否系正.
1029.pinyin: tā duì zhe jìngzi kàn lǐngdài shìfǒu xì zhèng
1029.english: He looked in the glass to check that his tie was straight.

1030.simplified: 如果我赶不上火车，那也没关系。
1030.traditional: 如果我趕不上火車，那也沒關系。
1030.pinyin: rúguǒ wǒ gǎnbùshàng huǒchē nà yě méiguānxi
1030.english: It doesn't matter if I miss my train.

1031.simplified: 孩子睡觉时，不要练习打鼓。
1031.traditional: 孩子睡覺時，不要練習打鼓。
1031.pinyin: háizi shuìjiào shí bùyào liànxí dǎgǔ
1031.english: You mustn't practise drums while the baby is sleeping.

1032.simplified: 这个组织支持社会主义哲学。
1032.traditional: 這個組織支持社會主義哲學。
1032.english: This organization espouses the socialist philosophy.

1033.simplified: 听说你的猫死了，我觉得很难过。
1033.traditional: 聽說你的貓死了，我覺得很難過。
1033.pinyin: tīngshuō nǐ de māo sǐ le wǒ juéde hěn nánguò
1033.english: I was sorry to hear that your cat had died.

1034.simplified: 他轻而易举地完成了这项工作。
1034.traditional: 他輕而易舉地完成了這項工作。
1034.pinyin: tā qīng'éryìjǔ dì wánchéng le zhè xiàng gōngzuò
1034.english: He finished the work without any difficulty.

1035.simplified: 尽管他帮助过我，可是我还是恨他。
1035.traditional: 盡管他幫助過我，可是我還是恨他。
1035.pinyin: jǐnguǎn tā bāngzhù guò wǒ kěshì wǒ háishi hèn tā
1035.english: I hate him albeit he helped me.

1036.simplified: 她把杯子小心地放在架子边。
1036.traditional: 她把杯子小心地放在架子邊。
1036.pinyin: tā bǎ bēizi xiǎoxīn dì fàng zài jiàzi biān
1036.english: She carefully positioned the cup on the edge of the shelf.

1037.simplified: 她在医院里接受了全面检查。
1037.traditional: 她在醫院裡接受了全面檢查。
1037.pinyin: tā zài yīyuàn lǐ jiēshòu le quánmiàn jiǎnchá
1037.english: She underwent a thorough examination at the hospital.

1038.simplified: 他把一盒食品从汽车上拿进来。
1038.traditional: 他把一盒食品從汽車上拿進來。
1038.pinyin: tā bǎ yī hé shípǐn cóng qìchē shàng ná jìnlái
1038.english: He brought the box of groceries in from the car.

1039.simplified: 他站在门口, 堵住通向大厅的路.
1039.traditional: 他站在門口, 堵住通向大廳的路.
1039.pinyin: tā zhàn zài ménkǒu dǔzhù tōngxiàng dàtīng de lù
1039.english: He stood framed in the doorway to the hall.

1040.simplified: 本次会议将就这些问题作出处理。
1040.traditional: 本次會議將就這些問題作出處理。
1040.pinyin: běn cì huìyì jiāngjiu zhèxiē wèntí zuòchū chǔlǐ
1040.english: The meeting will deal with these problems.

1041.simplified: 我在这家商店里买了一品脱牛奶。
1041.traditional: 我在這家商店裡買了一品脫牛奶。
1041.pinyin: wǒ zài zhè jiā shāngdiàn lǐ mǎi le yīpǐn tuō niúnǎi
1041.english: I bought a pint of milk in the store.

1042.simplified: 她在大学期间主修数学和物理。
1042.traditional: 她在大學期間主修數學和物理。
1042.pinyin: tā zài dàxué qījiān zhǔxiū shùxué hé wùlǐ
1042.english: She majored in maths and physics at university.

1043.simplified: 他学习日语的兴趣逐渐消失了。
1043.traditional: 他學習日語的興趣逐漸消失了。
1043.pinyin: tā xuéxí Rìyǔ de xìngqù zhújiàn xiāoshī le
1043.english: His interest in learning Japanese has petered out.

1044.simplified: 我希望明年某一时候再见到你。
1044.traditional: 我希望明年某一時候再見到你。
1044.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng míngnián mǒu yī shíhou zài jiàndào nǐ
1044.english: I hope to see you again sometime next year.

1045.simplified: 他主持修建这座桥的建筑工程。
1045.traditional: 他主持修建這座橋的建築工程。
1045.pinyin: tā zhǔchí xiūjiàn zhè zuò qiáo de jiànzhù gōngchéng
1045.english: He directed the building of the new bridge.

1046.simplified: 这药保证能让你好好睡一觉。
1046.traditional: 這藥保證能讓你好好睡一覺。
1046.pinyin: zhè yào bǎozhèng néng ràng nǐhǎo hǎoshuì yī jué
1046.english: This medicine will ensure you a good night's sleep.

1047.simplified: 俱乐部会馆提供这样方便的建筑物
1047.traditional: 俱樂部會館提供這樣方便的建築物
1047.pinyin: jùlèbù huìguǎn tígōng zhèyàng fāngbiàn de jiànzhùwù

1048.simplified: 不用说，夏日的傍晚是多么美。
1048.traditional: 不用說，夏日的傍晚是多麼美。
1048.pinyin: bùyòng shuō xiàrì de bàngwǎn shì duōme měi
1048.english: Needs not say how lovely are the summer evenings.

1049.simplified: 候任总统将在下周正式就任。
1049.traditional: 候任總統將在下周正式就任。
1049.pinyin: hòurèn zǒngtǒng jiāng zàixià zhōu zhèngshì jiùrèn
1049.english: The President elect will be installed next week.

1050.simplified: 工厂的平均支出是二千美元。
1050.traditional: 工廠的平均支出是二千美元。
1050.pinyin: gōngchǎng de píngjūn zhīchū shì èr qiān Měiyuán
1050.english: The average outgo of the factory is 2000 dollars.

1051.simplified: 我开始作画，仅仅是最近的事情。
1051.traditional: 我開始作畫，僅僅是最近的事情。
1051.pinyin: wǒ kāishǐ zuòhuà jǐnjǐn shì zuìjìn de shìqing
1051.english: It is only recently that I started painting.

1052.simplified: 出国前我必须进行体格检查。
1052.traditional: 出國前我必須進行體格檢查。
1052.pinyin: chūguó qián wǒ bìxū jìnxíng tǐgéjiǎnchá
1052.english: I have to have a medical examination before going abroad.

1053.simplified: 这个城市因为各种桥梁而著称。
1053.traditional: 這個城市因為各種橋梁而著稱。
1053.pinyin: zhège chéngshì yīnwèi gèzhǒng qiáoliáng ér zhùchēng
1053.english: This city is noted for its various bridges.

1054.simplified: 每个人都是自己命运的创造者。
1054.traditional: 每個人都是自己命運的創造者。
1054.pinyin: měigerén dōu shì zìjǐ mìngyùn de chuàngzàozhě
1054.english: Everyone is the architect of his own fortune.

1055.simplified: 他坐在沙发上, 点燃了一只香烟。
1055.traditional: 他坐在沙發上, 點燃了一只香煙。
1055.pinyin: tā zuò zài shāfā shàng diǎnrán le yī zhǐ xiāngyān
1055.english: He had his seat in the sofa and lit a cigar.

1056.simplified: 夏天时，山坡上长满了花草。
1056.traditional: 夏天時，山坡上長滿了花草。
1056.pinyin: xiàtiān shí shānpō shàng zhǎngmǎn le huācǎo
1056.english: The hillside is covered by grass and flowers in summer.

1057.simplified: 汉字与日文之间有密切关系。
1057.traditional: 漢字與日文之間有密切關系。
1057.pinyin: hànzì yǔ Rìwén zhījiān yǒu mìqiè guānxi
1057.english: There is an affinity between Chinese and Japanese character.

1058.simplified: 请给我们公司寄一份详细的简历。
1058.traditional: 請給我們公司寄一份詳細的簡歷。
1058.pinyin: qǐng gěi wǒmen gōngsī jì yī fèn xiángxì de jiǎnlì
1058.english: Please send a detailed resume to our company.

1059.simplified: 我们很难观察月亮的另一边。
1059.traditional: 我們很難觀察月亮的另一邊。
1059.pinyin: wǒmen hěn nán guānchá yuèliang de lìngyī biān
1059.english: The far side of the moon is difficult for us to observe.

1060.simplified: 汽车以惊人的速度向桥冲过去。
1060.traditional: 汽車以驚人的速度向橋沖過去。
1060.pinyin: qìchē yǐ jīngrén de sùdù xiàng qiáo chōng guòqu
1060.english: The car rushed at the bridge at astonishing speed.

1061.simplified: 她的亲切给我留下了很深的印象。
1061.traditional: 她的親切給我留下了很深的印象。
1061.pinyin: tā de qīnqiè gěi wǒ liúxià le hěn shēn de yìnxiàng
1061.english: Her gentleness has given me a deep impression.

1062.simplified: 我在人群中寻找她，但看不到。
1062.traditional: 我在人群中尋找她，但看不到。
1062.pinyin: wǒ zài rénqún zhōng xúnzhǎo tā dàn kàn bùdào
1062.english: I looked for her in the crowd but couldn't see her.

1063.simplified: 政府已经禁止使用化学武器。
1063.traditional: 政府已經禁止使用化學武器。
1063.english: The government has banned the use of chemical weapons.

1064.simplified: 我不相信她声称同我们友好。
1064.traditional: 我不相信她聲稱同我們友好。
1064.pinyin: wǒ bù xiāngxìn tā shēngchēng tóng wǒmen yǒuhǎo
1064.english: I don't believe her profession of friendship for us.

1065.simplified: 即使你不喜欢这工作，你也得做。
1065.traditional: 即使你不喜歡這工作，你也得做。
1065.pinyin: jíshǐ nǐ bù xǐhuan zhè gōngzuò nǐ yě dé zuò
1065.english: Even though you do not like it, you must do it.

1066.simplified: 拖了那么久，他终于完成了论文。
1066.traditional: 拖了那麼久，他終於完成了論文。
1066.pinyin: tuō le nàme jiǔ tā zhōngyú wánchéng le lùnwén
1066.english: After much delay, he finished his paper at last.

1067.simplified: 修筑一条铁路要花费许多劳动力。
1067.traditional: 修築一條鐵路要花費許多勞動力。
1067.pinyin: xiūzhù yī tiáo tiělù yào huāfèi xǔduō láodònglì
1067.english: It takes a lot of labor to build a railway.

1068.simplified: 在你读到的地方夹上张纸条.
1068.traditional: 在你讀到的地方夾上張紙條.
1068.pinyin: zài nǐ dú dào de dìfang jiā shàng zhāng zhǐtiáo
1068.english: Put a piece of paper in (ie in your book) to mark your place.

1069.simplified: 他带着心满意足的微笑告诉了我们。
1069.traditional: 他帶著心滿意足的微笑告訴了我們。
1069.pinyin: tā dài zhe xīnmǎnyìzú de wēixiào gàosu le wǒmen
1069.english: He told us with a smile of contentment.

1070.simplified: 让我记下你的地址和电话号码。
1070.traditional: 讓我記下你的地址和電話號碼。
1070.pinyin: ràng wǒ jì xià nǐ de dìzhǐ hé diànhuà hàomǎ
1070.english: Let me note down your address and telephone number.

1071.simplified: 这个街区的供暖系统不太���用。
1071.traditional: 這個街區的供暖系統不太���用。
1071.pinyin: zhège jiēqū de gōng nuǎn xìtǒng bùtàihǎo yòng
1071.english: The heating system in this block doesn't work well.

1072.simplified: 在夏天我喜欢吃一些叶状蔬菜。
1072.traditional: 在夏天我喜歡吃一些葉狀蔬菜。
1072.pinyin: zài xiàtiān wǒ xǐhuan chī yīxiē yè zhuàng shūcài
1072.english: I like to eat some leafy vegetables in the summer.

1073.simplified: 我队今年赛季赢五场而未输过.
1073.traditional: 我隊今年賽季贏五場而未輸過.
1073.pinyin: wǒ duì jīnnián sàijì yíng wǔ chǎng ér wèi shū guò
1073.english: Our team has had five wins and no losses this season.

1074.simplified: 该教授正进行高深的学术研究。
1074.traditional: 該教授正進行高深的學術研究。
1074.pinyin: gāi jiàoshòu zhèng jìnxíng gāoshēn de xuéshù yánjiū
1074.english: The professor is engaged in advanced studies.

1075.simplified: 因为流行性感冒全校停止上课。
1075.traditional: 因為流行性感冒全校停止上課。
1075.pinyin: yīnwèi liúxíngxìnggǎnmào quán jiào tíngzhǐ shàngkè
1075.english: The school was closed because of the flu.

1076.simplified: 我们准备把多余的苹果全部送人。
1076.traditional: 我們准備把多余的蘋果全部送人。
1076.pinyin: wǒmen zhǔnbèi bǎ duōyú de píngguǒ quánbù sòngrén
1076.english: We are giving away all our surplus apples.

1077.simplified: 工业革命首先在英国发生。
1077.traditional: 工業革命首先在英國發生。
1077.pinyin: Gōngyè Gémìng shǒuxiān zài Yīngguó fāshēng
1077.english: The industrial revolution had taken place in England first.

1078.simplified: 我希望他别再招待他的朋友了。
1078.traditional: 我希望他別再招待他的朋友了。
1078.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng tā bié zài zhāodài tā de péngyou le
1078.english: I wish he would desist from entertaining his friends.

1079.simplified: 我出生在河北省的一个小村庄。
1079.traditional: 我出生在河北省的一個小村莊。
1079.pinyin: wǒ chūshēng zài Héběi Shěng de yī gè xiǎo cūnzhuāng
1079.english: I was born in a small village in Hebei Province.

1080.simplified: 就我而言，我并不反对你的计划。
1080.traditional: 就我而言，我並不反對你的計劃。
1080.pinyin: jiù wǒ éryán wǒ bìngbù fǎnduì nǐ de jìhuà
1080.english: As far as I am concerned, I'm not against your plan.

1081.simplified: 他对环境的新奇感不久就淡薄了。
1081.traditional: 他對環境的新奇感不久就淡薄了。
1081.pinyin: tā duì huánjìng de xīnqí gǎn bùjiǔ jiù dànbó le
1081.english: The novelty of his surroundings soon wore off.

1082.simplified: 把这条句子的各个成份加以分析。
1082.traditional: 把這條句子的各個成份加以分析。
1082.pinyin: bǎ zhè tiáo jùzi de gègè chéngfèn jiāyǐ fēnxī
1082.english: Analyze the sentence into its constituent parts.

1083.simplified: 他毕业于一所知名的外语学院。
1083.traditional: 他畢業於一所知名的外語學院。
1083.pinyin: tā bìyè yú yī suǒ zhīmíng de wàiyǔ xuéyuàn
1083.english: He graduated from a famous foreign language institute.

1084.simplified: 他已经通过了大学的入学考试。
1084.traditional: 他已經通過了大學的入學考試。
1084.pinyin: tā yǐjīng tōngguò le dàxué de rùxué kǎoshì
1084.english: He had passed the entrance examination of the college.

1085.simplified: 他相信各民族间都应亲如兄弟。
1085.traditional: 他相信各民族間都應親如兄弟。
1085.pinyin: tā xiāngxìn gè mínzú jiān dōu yīng qīn rú xiōngdì
1085.english: He believes in the brotherhood of all peoples.

1086.simplified: 直到听到闹钟的铃声我才醒来。
1086.traditional: 直到聽到鬧鐘的鈴聲我才醒來。
1086.pinyin: zhídào tīngdào nàozhōng de língshēng wǒ cái xǐnglái
1086.english: I didn't wake up until I heard the alarm clock.

1087.simplified: 穿着这双笨重的鞋走路真难受。
1087.traditional: 穿著這雙笨重的鞋走路真難受。
1087.pinyin: chuānzhuó zhè shuāng bènzhòng de xié zǒulù zhēn nánshòu
1087.english: It's not easy walking in these clumsy shoes.

1088.simplified: 我等她回来时，心里越来越不安。
1088.traditional: 我等她回來時，心裡越來越不安。
1088.pinyin: wǒděng tā huílai shí xīnli yuèláiyuè bù'ān
1088.english: I waited with growing uneasiness for her to return.

1089.simplified: 老年人通常比年轻人保守。
1089.traditional: 老年人通常比年輕人保守。
1089.english: Old people are usually more conservative than young people.

1090.simplified: 我们不敢看她那双充满渴望的眼睛。
1090.traditional: 我們不敢看她那雙充滿渴望的眼睛。
1090.pinyin: wǒmen bù gǎn kàn tā nà shuāng chōngmǎn kěwàng de yǎnjing
1090.english: We dare not look at her wistful eyes.

1091.simplified: 战争迫使我们不得不违背旧习俗。
1091.traditional: 戰爭迫使我們不得不違背舊習俗。
1091.pinyin: zhànzhēng pòshǐ wǒmen bùdébù wéibèi jiù xísú
1091.english: The war forced us to depart from the old customs.

1092.simplified: 有天晚上学校放映了一部西部片。
1092.traditional: 有天晚上學校放映了一部西部片。
1092.pinyin: yǒu tiān wǎnshang xuéxiào fàngyìng le yī bù Xībùpiàn
1092.english: One evening the school showed a cowboy film.

1093.simplified: 那位夫人带着满意的微笑看着我。
1093.traditional: 那位夫人帶著滿意的微笑看著我。
1093.pinyin: nà wèi fūren dài zhe mǎnyì de wēixiào kàn zhe wǒ
1093.english: The lady looked at me with a contented smile.

1094.simplified: 他们的研究沿着正确的方针进行。
1094.traditional: 他們的研究沿著正確的方針進行。
1094.pinyin: tāmen de yánjiū yánzhe zhèngquè de fāngzhēn jìnxíng
1094.english: Their research proceeded along sound lines.

1095.simplified: 强迫推行一项政策不是办法。
1095.traditional: 強迫推行一項政策不是辦法。
1095.pinyin: qiǎngpò tuīxíng yī xiàng zhèngcè bùshì bànfǎ
1095.english: It is not the proper way to implement a policy by force.

1096.simplified: 狮子一走近，小动物们都跑开了。
1096.traditional: 獅子一走近，小動物們都跑開了。
1096.pinyin: shīzi yī zǒu jìn xiǎo dòngwù men dōu pǎo kāi le
1096.english: The lion's approach drove away the small animals.

1097.pinyin: niánqián Běiměi yǒu dàliàng de yěniú
1097.english: There were lots of buffaloes in the North America 100 years ago.

1098.simplified: 我们得设计出三年级的新课程.
1098.traditional: 我們得設計出三年級的新課程.
1098.pinyin: wǒmen dé shèjì chū sān niánjí de xīn kèchéng
1098.english: We shall have to design a new curriculum for the third year.

1099.simplified: 我们可以通过烧石灰石来得到石灰。
1099.traditional: 我們可以通過燒石灰石來得到石灰。
1099.pinyin: wǒmen kěyǐ tōngguò shāo shíhuīshí lái dédào shíhuī
1099.english: We may burn limestone to obtain lime.

1100.simplified: 她是悄声说的，所以我没有听见。
1100.traditional: 她是悄聲說的，所以我沒有聽見。
1100.pinyin: tā shì qiǎoshēng shuō de suǒyǐ wǒ méiyǒu tīngjiàn
1100.english: She said it in a whisper, so I didn't hear.

1101.simplified: 男孩子们已决定下个星期去露营。
1101.traditional: 男孩子們已決定下個星期去露營。
1101.pinyin: nánháizi men yǐ juédìng xiàgèxīngqī qù lùyíng
1101.english: The boys have decided to go camping next week.

1102.simplified: 我把一个长方形的盒子放在桌子上。
1102.traditional: 我把一個長方形的盒子放在桌子上。
1102.pinyin: wǒ bǎ yī gè chángfāngxíng de hézi fàng zài zhuōzi shàng
1102.english: I put a rectangular box on the table.

1103.simplified: 土星是依次离太阳的第六颗行星。
1103.traditional: 土星是依次離太陽的第六顆行星。
1103.pinyin: Tǔxīng shì yīcì lí tàiyang de dì liù kē xíngxīng
1103.english: Saturn is the planet sixth in order from the sun.

1104.simplified: 她母亲去世对她是个沉重的打击。
1104.traditional: 她母親去世對她是個沉重的打擊。
1104.pinyin: tā mǔqīn qùshì duì tā shì gè chénzhòng de dǎjī
1104.english: It was a great blow to her when her mother died.

1105.simplified: 头上受了一击后，他昏过去了一会儿。
1105.traditional: 頭上受了一擊後，他昏過去了一會兒。
1105.pinyin: tóushàng shòu le yī jī hòu tā hūn guòqu le yīhuìr
1105.english: The blow on the head dazed him for a moment.

1106.simplified: 他们从远处赶来参观这个展览会。
1106.traditional: 他們從遠處趕來參觀這個展覽會。
1106.pinyin: tāmen cóng yuǎnchù gǎnlái cānguān zhège zhǎnlǎnhuì
1106.english: They came from afar to see the exhibition.

1107.simplified: 他退休后觉得自己年老无用了。
1107.traditional: 他退休後覺得自己年老無用了。
1107.pinyin: tā tuìxiū hòu juéde zìjǐ niánlǎo wúyòng le
1107.english: When he retired he felt that he had outlived his usefulness.

1108.simplified: 这些项目是根据其重要性排列的。
1108.traditional: 這些項目是根據其重要性排列的。
1108.pinyin: zhèxiē xiàngmù shì gēnjù qí zhòngyàoxìng páiliè de
1108.english: The items are listed in order of importance.

1109.simplified: 他们大声地为自己的足球队喊加油。
1109.traditional: 他們大聲地為自己的足球隊喊加油。
1109.pinyin: tāmen dàshēng dì wéi zìjǐ de zúqiúduì hǎn jiāyóu
1109.english: They cheered loudly for their football team.

1110.simplified: 他答应星期五之前完成这项工作。
1110.traditional: 他答應星期五之前完成這項工作。
1110.pinyin: tā dāying Xīngqīwǔ zhīqián wánchéng zhè xiàng gōngzuò
1110.english: He undertook to finish the job by Friday.

1111.simplified: 那位漂亮的女孩是一位时装模特儿。
1111.traditional: 那位漂亮的女孩是一位時裝模特兒。
1111.pinyin: nà wèi piàoliang de nǚhái shì yī wèi shízhuāng mótèr
1111.english: That beautiful girl is a fashion model.

1112.simplified: 如果我现在不走，就赶不上火车了。
1112.traditional: 如果我現在不走，就趕不上火車了。
1112.pinyin: rúguǒ wǒ xiànzài bù zǒu jiù gǎnbùshàng huǒchē le
1112.english: If I don't go now, I will miss the train.

1113.simplified: 他的热情给公司注入了新的生命。
1113.traditional: 他的熱情給公司注入了新的生命。
1113.pinyin: tā de rèqíng gěi gōngsī zhùrù le xīn de shēngmìng
1113.english: His enthusiasm breathed new life into the company.

1114.simplified: 本班男生的平均年龄是十五岁。
1114.traditional: 本班男生的平均年齡是十五歲。
1114.pinyin: běn bān nánshēng de píngjūn niánlíng shì shíwǔ suì
1114.english: The average age of the boys in this class is fifteen.

1115.simplified: 他冒着自己的生命危险救了我的命。
1115.traditional: 他冒著自己的生命危險救了我的命。
1115.pinyin: tā màozhe zìjǐ de shēngmìng wēixiǎn jiù le wǒ de mìng
1115.english: He saved my life at the risk of his own.

1116.simplified: 他的严重的错误导致了重大的损失。
1116.traditional: 他的嚴重的錯誤導致了重大的損失。
1116.pinyin: tā de yánzhòng de cuòwù dǎozhì le zhòngdà de sǔnshī
1116.english: His costly mistake resulted in severe loss.

1117.simplified: 转寄给我们的邮件晚了很久才拿到。
1117.traditional: 轉寄給我們的郵件晚了很久才拿到。
1117.pinyin: zhuǎnjì gěi wǒmen de yóujiàn wǎn le hěn jiǔ cái ná dào
1117.english: There was a long lag in forwarding mail to us.

1118.simplified: 他是那些天文学家中最优秀的一个。
1118.traditional: 他是那些天文學家中最優秀的一個。
1118.pinyin: tā shì nàxiē tiānwénxuéjiā zhōng zuìyōu xiù de yī gè
1118.english: He is the best one of those astronomers.

1119.simplified: 他摇摇头，因为他的想法与此不同。
1119.traditional: 他搖搖頭，因為他的想法與此不同。
1119.pinyin: tā yáo yáotóu yīnwèi tā de xiǎngfǎ yǔ cǐ bùtóng
1119.english: He shook his head, for he thought differently.

1120.simplified: 我儿子六岁的时候开始学习乘法。
1120.traditional: 我兒子六歲的時候開始學習乘法。
1120.pinyin: wǒ érzi liù suì de shíhou kāishǐ xuéxí chéngfǎ
1120.english: My son began to study multiplication when he was six.

1121.simplified: 他们正准备上演新的歌舞喜剧。
1121.traditional: 他們正准備上演新的歌舞喜劇。
1121.pinyin: tāmen zhèng zhǔnbèi shàngyǎn xīn de gēwǔ xǐjù
1121.english: They are preparing for the presentation of a new musical.

1122.simplified: 学习英语口语不只是玩游戏而已。
1122.traditional: 學習英語口語不只是玩游戲而已。
1122.pinyin: xuéxí Yīngyǔ kǒuyǔ bù zhǐshì wán yóuxì éryǐ
1122.english: Spoken English learning is not all beer and skittle.

1123.simplified: 对不起，对方的电话好象坏了。
1123.traditional: 對不起，對方的電話好象壞了。
1123.pinyin: duìbuqǐ duìfāng de diànhuà hǎoxiàng huài le
1123.english: I'm sorry, caller, their telephone seems to be broken.

1124.simplified: 我的起居室的墙上挂着一块壁毯。
1124.traditional: 我的起居室的牆上掛著一塊壁毯。
1124.pinyin: wǒ de qǐjūshì de qiáng shàng guà zhe yīkuài bìtǎn
1124.english: The wall of my living room was hung with a tapestry.

1125.simplified: 小学教育受地方政府的保护。
1125.traditional: 小學教育受地方政府的保護。
1125.pinyin: wǒ de qǐjūshì de qiáng shàng guà zhe yīkuài bìtǎn
1125.english: Primary education comes under the umbrella of local government.

1126.simplified: 在这张画像中画著他躺在沙发上。
1126.traditional: 在這張畫像中畫著他躺在沙發上。
1126.pinyin: zài zhè zhāng huàxiàng zhōng huà zhe tā tǎng zài shāfā shàng
1126.english: In the portrait he is shown lying on a sofa.

1127.simplified: 干燥的天气之后，人人都希望下雨。
1127.traditional: 干燥的天氣之後，人人都希望下雨。
1127.pinyin: gānzào de tiānqì zhīhòu rénrén dōu xīwàng xiàyǔ
1127.english: After these dry days, everyone hopes for rain.

1128.simplified: 我用一个纸夹把那几页纸夹在一起。
1128.traditional: 我用一個紙夾把那幾頁紙夾在一起。
1128.pinyin: wǒ yòng yī gè zhǐjiā bǎ nà jǐ yè zhǐjiā zàiyīqǐ
1128.english: I fastened the pages together with a paperclip.

1129.simplified: 生日晚会之后, 房间里一片混乱。
1129.traditional: 生日晚會之後, 房間裡一片混亂。
1129.pinyin: shēngrì wǎnhuì zhīhòu fángjiān lǐ yīpiàn hùnluàn
1129.english: The room was in confusion after the birthday party.

1130.simplified: 这位医生受到所有人的高度赞扬。
1130.traditional: 這位醫生受到所有人的高度贊揚。
1130.pinyin: shēngrì wǎnhuì zhīhòu fángjiān lǐ yīpiàn hùnluàn
1130.english: This doctor received high praise from everyone.

1131.simplified: 别胡闹了，快来帮我把这个抬起来。
1131.traditional: 別胡鬧了，快來幫我把這個抬起來。
1131.pinyin: shēngrì wǎnhuì zhīhòu fángjiān lǐ yīpiàn hùnluàn
1131.english: Stop playing silly buggers and help me lift this.

1132.simplified: 孩子将玩具汽车两端相连摆在一起.
1132.traditional: 孩子將玩具汽車兩端相連擺在一起.
1132.pinyin: shēngrì wǎnhuì zhīhòu fángjiān lǐ yīpiàn hùnluàn
1132.english: The child put the toy cars together endways.

1133.simplified: 在春天里听鸟儿歌唱是一种乐趣。
1133.traditional: 在春天裡聽鳥兒歌唱是一種樂趣。
1133.pinyin: zài chūntiān lǐ tīng niǎor gēchàng shì yīzhǒng lèqù
1133.english: It's a pleasure to hear birds' warble in spring.

1134.simplified: 那是个复杂得无法解决的问题。
1134.traditional: 那是個復雜得無法解決的問題。
1134.pinyin: nàshi gè fùzá dé wúfǎ jiějué de wèntí
1134.english: It's a problem of such perplexity that it was impossible to solve.

1135.simplified: 他已学了足够的德语来进行会话。
1135.traditional: 他已學了足夠的德語來進行會話。
1135.pinyin: tā yǐ xué le zúgòu de Déyǔ lái jìnxíng huìhuà
1135.english: He had learned enough German to carry on a conversation.

1136.simplified: 不加奶的咖啡在嘴里留下了一些苦味.
1136.traditional: 不加奶的咖啡在嘴裡留下了一些苦味.
1136.pinyin: bùjiā nǎi de kāfēi zài zuǐlǐ liúxià le yīxiē kǔwèi
1136.english: Black coffee leaves a bitter taste in the mouth.

1137.simplified: 最后他终于成功地解决了这个问题。
1137.traditional: 最後他終於成功地解決了這個問題。
1137.pinyin: zuìhòu tā zhōngyú chénggōng dì jiějué le zhège wèntí
1137.english: At last he successfully solved the problem.

1138.simplified: 她踩着他受伤的脚，他疼得缩了回去。
1138.traditional: 她踩著他受傷的腳，他疼得縮了回去。
1138.pinyin: tā cǎi zhe tā shòushāng de jiǎo tā téng dé suō le huíqu
1138.english: He winced as she stood on his injured foot.

1139.simplified: 我已经在这个旅馆里预订了一个房间。
1139.traditional: 我已經在這個旅館裡預訂了一個房間。
1139.pinyin: wǒ yǐjīng zài zhège lǚguǎn lǐ yùdìng le yī gè fángjiān
1139.english: I have engaged a room at this hotel.

1140.simplified: 她保持着长距离游泳的世界纪录。
1140.traditional: 她保持著長距離游泳的世界紀錄。
1140.pinyin: tā bǎochí zhe chángjùlí yóuyǒng de shìjièjìlù
1140.english: She holds the world record for long distance swimming.

1141.simplified: 这家饭店除星期一外, 每天都营业.
1141.traditional: 這家飯店除星期一外, 每天都營業.
1141.pinyin: zhè jiā fàndiàn chú Xīngqīyī wài měitiān dōu yíngyè
1141.english: The restaurant is open every day except Monday.

1142.simplified: 我拿起了那把刀，把它扔到了窗外。
1142.traditional: 我拿起了那把刀，把它扔到了窗外。
1142.pinyin: wǒ náqǐ le nà bǎ dāo bǎ tā rēng dàoliǎo chuāng wài
1142.english: I picked up the knife and threw it out of the window.

1143.simplified: 他对友谊有一种非常独特的见解。
1143.traditional: 他對友誼有一種非常獨特的見解。
1143.pinyin: tā duì yǒuyì yǒu yīzhǒng fēicháng dútè de jiànjiě
1143.english: He's got a pretty strange conception of friendship.

1144.simplified: 中国和许多国家进行多方面贸易。
1144.traditional: 中國和許多國家進行多方面貿易。
1144.pinyin: Zhōngguó hé xǔduō guójiā jìnxíng duōfāngmiàn màoyì
1144.english: China does a lot of trade with many countries.

1145.simplified: 他爸爸坚持他们应该搬到乡下。
1145.traditional: 他爸爸堅持他們應該搬到鄉下。
1145.pinyin: tā bàba jiānchí tāmen yīnggāi bān dào xiāngxia
1145.english: His father insisted that they (should) move to the country.

1146.simplified: 简单朴素的衣服适合在学校里穿。
1146.traditional: 簡單朴素的衣服適合在學校裡穿。
1146.pinyin: jiǎndān pǔsù de yīfu shìhé zài xuéxiào lǐ chuān
1146.english: Plain, simple clothes are appropriate for school wear.

1147.simplified: 我们需要一个更为灵活的外交政策。
1147.traditional: 我們需要一個更為靈活的外交政策。
1147.pinyin: wǒmen xūyào yī gè gèngwéi línghuó de wàijiāozhèngcè
1147.english: We need a foreign policy that is more flexible.

1148.simplified: 我们跟服务员争执那顿饭的价钱.
1148.traditional: 我們跟服務員爭執那頓飯的價錢.
1148.pinyin: wǒmen gēn fúwùyuán zhēngzhí nà dùn fàn de jiàqian
1148.english: We argued with the waiter about the price of the meal.

1149.simplified: 她穿那些衣服也并没显得更漂亮。
1149.traditional: 她穿那些衣服也並沒顯得更漂亮。
1149.pinyin: tā chuān nàxiē yīfu yě bìng méi xiǎnde gèng piàoliang
1149.english: Those clothes do nothing to enhance her appearance.

1150.simplified: 这条河很宽，足以使很多船通过。
1150.traditional: 這條河很寬，足以使很多船通過。
1150.pinyin: zhè tiáo hé hěn kuān zúyǐ shǐ hěn duō chuán tōngguò
1150.english: The waterway is wide for many ships to pass through.

1151.simplified: 这本书是他以前写的剧本的扩充。
1151.traditional: 這本書是他以前寫的劇本的擴充。
1151.pinyin: zhè běn shū shì tā yǐqián xiě de jùběn de kuòchōng
1151.english: This book is an expansion of the play he wrote before.

1152.simplified: 我连移动双脚的力气都几乎没有了。
1152.traditional: 我連移動雙腳的力氣都幾乎沒有了。
1152.pinyin: wǒ lián yídòng shuāngjiǎo de lìqi dōu jīhū méiyǒu le
1152.english: I have hardly enough strength left to move my feet.

1153.simplified: 我认为秋天是一年中最美的季节。
1153.traditional: 我認為秋天是一年中最美的季節。
1153.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi qiūtiān shì yī niánzhōng zuì Měidí jìjié
1153.english: I think autumn is the most beautiful season in a year.

1154.simplified: 他们不敢走入森林中阴暗的深处。
1154.traditional: 他們不敢走入森林中陰暗的深處。
1154.pinyin: tāmen bù gǎn zǒurù sēnlín zhōng yīn'àn de shēnchù
1154.english: They dare not walk into the shadowy depths of the forest.

1155.simplified: 公众强烈反对修建该机场。
1155.traditional: 公眾強烈反對修建該機場。
1155.english: There was a great outcry about the construction of the new airport.

1156.simplified: 逐字翻译不一定最接近原义。
1156.traditional: 逐字翻譯不一定最接近原義。
1156.pinyin: zhú zì fānyì bùyīdìng zuì jiējìn yuányì
1156.english: A literal translation is not always the closest to the original meaning.

1157.simplified: 她的孩子有一双美丽而明亮的蓝眼睛。
1157.traditional: 她的孩子有一雙美麗而明亮的藍眼睛。
1157.pinyin: tā de háizi yǒu yī shuāng měilì ér míngliàng de lán yǎnjing
1157.english: Her baby has bonny and bright blue eyes.

1158.simplified: 寒冷的冬天，我们不得不穿毛织品。
1158.traditional: 寒冷的冬天，我們不得不穿毛織品。
1158.pinyin: hánlěng de dōngtiān wǒmen bùdébù chuān máo zhīpǐn
1158.english: We have to wear woolen clothes in the cold winter.

1159.simplified: 他收拾行李，让我们等了好半天。
1159.traditional: 他收拾行李，讓我們等了好半天。
1159.pinyin: tā shōushi xíngli ràng wǒmen děng le hǎobàntiān
1159.english: He kept us waiting for ages while he packed his luggage.

1160.simplified: 详细的资料可从我们的总部得到。
1160.traditional: 詳細的資料可從我們的總部得到。
1160.pinyin: xiángxì de zīliào kě cóng wǒmen de zǒngbù dédào
1160.english: Further information can be obtained from our head office.

1161.simplified: 北京广播电台向全世界播送新闻。
1161.traditional: 北京廣播電台向全世界播送新聞。
1161.pinyin: Běijīng guǎngbōdiàntái xiàng quánshìjiè bōsòng xīnwén
1161.english: Radio Beijing sends the news all over the world.

1162.simplified: 这家旅馆为旅客提供订票服务。
1162.traditional: 這家旅館為旅客提供訂票服務。
1162.pinyin: zhè jiā lǚguǎn wéi lǚkè tígōng dìngpiào fúwù
1162.english: The hotel provides a reservation of tickets for its residents.

1163.simplified: 今天的天气已露出了一丝秋天的气息。
1163.traditional: 今天的天氣已露出了一絲秋天的氣息。
1163.pinyin: jīntiān de tiānqì yǐ lùchū le yī sī qiūtiān de qìxī
1163.english: There is a breath of autumn in the air today.

1164.simplified: 我们既不将打篮球也不将打排球。
1164.traditional: 我們既不將打籃球也不將打排球。
1164.pinyin: wǒmen jì bù jiāng dǎ lánqiú yě bù jiāng dǎ páiqiú
1164.english: We are going to play neither basketball nor volleyball.

1165.simplified: 我有一件红色的有羊毛衬里的运动服。
1165.traditional: 我有一件紅色的有羊毛襯裡的運動服。
1165.pinyin: wǒ yǒu yī jiàn hóngsè de yǒu yángmáo chènlǐ de yùndòngfú
1165.english: I have a red tracksuit with fleecy lining.

1166.simplified: 她送我的纪念品很小而且不值钱。
1166.traditional: 她送我的紀念品很小而且不值錢。
1166.pinyin: tā sòng wǒ de jìniànpǐn hěn xiǎo érqiě bùzhíqián
1166.english: The keepsake she gave me is small and not very costly.

1167.simplified: 她一走进剧院就引起了一阵兴奋。
1167.traditional: 她一走進劇院就引起了一陣興奮。
1167.pinyin: tā yī zǒujìn jùyuàn jiù yǐnqǐ le yīzhèn xīngfèn
1167.english: There was a stir of excitement as she entered the theatre.

1168.simplified: 本世纪我们已经经历了两次世界大战。
1168.traditional: 本世紀我們已經經歷了兩次世界大戰。
1168.pinyin: běn shìjì wǒmen yǐjīng jīnglì le liǎng cì shìjièdàzhàn
1168.english: We have had two world wars in this century.

1169.simplified: 尽管我努力劝说，他还是不同意。
1169.traditional: 盡管我努力勸說，他還是不同意。
1169.pinyin: jǐnguǎn wǒ nǔlì quànshuō tā háishi bùtóng yì
1169.english: In spite of my efforts at persuasion, he wouldn't agree.

1170.simplified: 正方形有四条边，而圆形没有边。
1170.traditional: 正方形有四條邊，而圓形沒有邊。
1170.pinyin: zhèngfāngxíng yǒu sì tiáo biān ér yuánxíng méiyǒu biān
1170.english: A square has four sides but a circle has no sides.

1171.simplified: 他听到身后有响声，便转过身来。
1171.traditional: 他聽到身後有響聲，便轉過身來。
1171.pinyin: tā tīngdào shēnhòu yǒu xiǎngshēng biàn zhuàn guò shēn lái
1171.english: He turned around as he heard a noise behind him.

1172.simplified: 人民的生活水平明显地改善了。
1172.traditional: 人民的生活水平明顯地改善了。
1172.pinyin: rénmín de shēnghuóshuǐpíng míngxiǎn dì gǎishàn le
1172.english: People's living standard has had a perceptible improvement.

1173.simplified: 您被邀请参观我们的秋季时装展览。
1173.traditional: 您被邀請參觀我們的秋季時裝展覽。
1173.pinyin: nín bèi yāoqǐng cānguān wǒmen de qiūjì shízhuāng zhǎnlǎn
1173.english: You are invited to view our autumn collection.

1174.simplified: 假如我要做新衣服，需要很多布料。
1174.traditional: 假如我要做新衣服，需要很多布料。
1174.pinyin: jiǎrú wǒ yào zuò xīn yīfu xūyào hěn duō bùliào
1174.english: I need a lot of cloth if I want to make a new dress.

1175.simplified: 我刚好及时到会，才算没受责备。
1175.traditional: 我剛好及時到會，才算沒受責備。
1175.pinyin: wǒ gānghǎo jíshí dào huì cái suàn méi shòu zébèi
1175.english: I saved my bacon by arriving just in time for the meeting.

1176.simplified: 我们的假日过得好无聊，每天都下雨。
1176.traditional: 我們的假日過得好無聊，每天都下雨。
1176.pinyin: wǒmen de jiàrì guòdé hǎo wúliáo měitiān dōu xiàyǔ
1176.english: We had a mouldy holiday - it rained every day.

1177.simplified: 我每天至少要把厨房地板擦洗一次。
1177.traditional: 我每天至少要把廚房地板擦洗一次。
1177.pinyin: wǒ měitiān zhìshǎo yào bǎ chúfáng dìbǎn cāxǐ yīcì
1177.english: I have to mop the kitchen floor at least once a day.

1178.simplified: 他对学校课外活动一点也不积极。
1178.traditional: 他對學校課外活動一點也不積極。
1178.pinyin: tā duì xuéxiào kèwài huódòng yīdiǎn yě bù jījí
1178.english: He doesn't take an active part in many school activities.

1179.simplified: 我清楚地告诉他，我拒绝了他的建议。
1179.traditional: 我清楚地告訴他，我拒絕了他的建議。
1179.pinyin: wǒ qīngchu dì gàosu tā wǒ jùjué le tā de jiànyì
1179.english: I made it clear to him that I rejected his proposal.

1180.simplified: 目前似乎好的年轻选手太少了。
1180.traditional: 目前似乎好的年輕選手太少了。
1180.pinyin: mùqián sìhū hǎo de niánqīng xuǎnshǒu tài shǎo le
1180.english: There seems to be a dearth of good young players at the moment.

1181.simplified: 这位老师给他的学生们定下高标准。
1181.traditional: 這位老師給他的學生們定下高標准。
1181.pinyin: zhèwèi lǎoshī gěi tā de xuésheng men dìng xià gāo biāozhǔn
1181.english: The teacher sets high standard for his pupils.

1182.simplified: 海洋几乎占地球表面的四分之三。
1182.traditional: 海洋幾乎佔地球表面的四分之三。
1182.pinyin: hǎiyáng jīhū zhàndì qiú biǎomiàn de sì fēnzhī sān
1182.english: The sea covers nearly three-fourths of the world's surface.

1183.simplified: 很多农民离开农村转事工业劳动.
1183.traditional: 很多農民離開農村轉事工業勞動.
1183.pinyin: hěn duō nóngmín líkāi nóngcūn zhuàn shì gōngyè láodòng
1183.english: Many farmers are leaving the land to work in industry.

1184.simplified: 只有一个人能做这项工作，那就是你。
1184.traditional: 只有一個人能做這項工作，那就是你。
1184.pinyin: zhǐyǒu yīgèrén néng zuò zhè xiàng gōngzuò nà jiùshì nǐ
1184.english: Only one person can do the job, namely you.

1185.simplified: 人们误以为选修语言课程较轻松“
1185.traditional: 人們誤以為選修語言課程較輕松「
1185.pinyin: rénmen wù yǐwéi xuǎnxiū yǔyán kèchéng jiào qīngsōng
1185.english: Language courses are wrongly thought to be soft options.

1186.simplified: 他在我背上拍了一下，请我去喝酒。
1186.traditional: 他在我背上拍了一下，請我去喝酒。
1186.pinyin: tā zài wǒ bèi shàng pāi le yīxià qǐng wǒ qù hējiǔ
1186.english: He gave me a clap on the back and invited me for a drink.

1187.simplified: 该学院采用新的外语教学法。
1187.traditional: 該學院采用新的外語教學法。
1187.pinyin: gāi xuéyuàn cǎiyòng xīn de wàiyǔ jiàoxuéfǎ
1187.english: New methods of teaching foreign languages are adopted in this institute.

1188.simplified: 他们看见了灯塔发出一闪一灭的光。
1188.traditional: 他們看見了燈塔發出一閃一滅的光。
1188.pinyin: tāmen kànjiàn le dēngtǎ fāchū yī shǎn yī miè de guāng
1188.english: They saw the intermittent flashes from a lighthouse.

1189.simplified: 尽管我俩相貌不同，但都讨人喜欢。
1189.traditional: 盡管我倆相貌不同，但都討人喜歡。
1189.pinyin: jǐnguǎn wǒ liǎ xiàngmào bùtóng dàn dōu tǎorénxǐhuan
1189.english: Although our looks differ, we are both attractive.

1190.simplified: 这部小说引起了千万读者的想象。
1190.traditional: 這部小說引起了千萬讀者的想象。
1190.pinyin: zhè bù xiǎoshuō yǐnqǐ le qiānwàn dúzhě de xiǎngxiàng
1190.english: The novel captured the imagination of thousands of readers.

1191.simplified: 看到这个小女孩哭起来，他的心软了。
1191.traditional: 看到這個小女孩哭起來，他的心軟了。
1191.pinyin: kàn dào zhège xiǎo nǚhái kū qilai tā de xīnruǎn le
1191.english: His heart melted when he saw the little girl crying.

1192.simplified: 早晨很冷，他穿上了一件厚毛衣。
1192.traditional: 早晨很冷，他穿上了一件厚毛衣。
1192.pinyin: zǎochén hěn lěng tā chuānshang le yī jiàn hòu máoyī
1192.english: He put on a thick sweater since it was cold in the morning.

1193.simplified: 练习开始前，你最好设定一个目标。
1193.traditional: 練習開始前，你最好設定一個目標。
1193.pinyin: liànxí kāishǐ qián nǐ zuìhǎo shèdìng yī gè mùbiāo
1193.english: You'd better set a goal before you start the drill.

1194.simplified: 他的脚在一块碎玻璃上划了一个大口子。
1194.traditional: 他的腳在一塊碎玻璃上劃了一個大口子。
1194.pinyin: tā de jiǎo zài yīkuài suì bōli shàng huà le yī gè dà kǒuzi
1194.english: He gashed his foot on a piece of broken glass.

1195.simplified: 这两种颜色之间的差别很难区别。
1195.traditional: 這兩種顏色之間的差別很難區別。
1195.pinyin: zhè liǎng zhǒng yánsè zhījiān de chābié hěn nán qūbié
1195.english: The difference between the two colors is imperceptible.

1196.simplified: 两国关系已达到出现危机的地步。
1196.traditional: 兩國關系已達到出現危機的地步。
1196.pinyin: liǎngguóguānxì yǐ dádào chūxiàn wēijī de dìbù
1196.english: Relation between the two countries has reached a crisis point.

1197.simplified: 我只好解释原因来满足他的好奇心。
1197.traditional: 我只好解釋原因來滿足他的好奇心。
1197.pinyin: wǒ zhǐhǎo jiěshì yuányīn lái mǎnzú tā de hàoqíxīn
1197.english: I had to explain the reasons to satisfy his curiosity.

1198.simplified: 学习外语女孩总是比男孩强.
1198.traditional: 學習外語女孩總是比男孩強.
1198.pinyin: xuéxí wàiyǔ nǚhái zǒngshì bǐ nánhái qiáng
1198.english: In learning foreign languages, the girls knock spots off the boys every time.

1199.simplified: 把被单好好煮一煮，好让它们白一些。
1199.traditional: 把被單好好煮一煮，好讓它們白一些。
1199.pinyin: bǎ bèidān hǎohǎo zhǔ yī zhǔ hǎo ràng tāmen bái yīxiē
1199.english: Give the sheets a good boil to get them white.

1200.simplified: 新学期开学前，我一直无所事事。
1200.traditional: 新學期開學前，我一直無所事事。
1200.pinyin: xīn xuéqī kāixué qián wǒ yīzhí wúsuǒshìshì
1200.english: I'm just kicking my heels until the beginning of the new term.

1201.simplified: 我们的文艺必须为大众所喜闻乐见。
1201.traditional: 我們的文藝必須為大眾所喜聞樂見。
1201.pinyin: wǒmen de wényì bìxū wéi dàzhòng suǒ xǐwénlèjiàn
1201.english: Our literature and art ought to cater to popular taste.

1202.simplified: 他们试图预测这场足球比赛的结果。
1202.traditional: 他們試圖預測這場足球比賽的結果。
1202.pinyin: tāmen shìtú yùcè zhè chǎng zúqiú bǐsài de jiéguǒ
1202.english: They tried to forecast the result of the football match.

1203.simplified: 人们应经常洗澡以保证个人卫生。
1203.traditional: 人們應經常洗澡以保證個人衛生。
1203.pinyin: rénmen yīng jīngcháng xǐzǎo yǐ bǎozhèng gèrén wèishēng
1203.english: People should wash regularly to ensure personal hygiene.

1204.simplified: 父亲给我买了一只小狗作为生日礼物。
1204.traditional: 父親給我買了一只小狗作為生日禮物。
1204.pinyin: fùqīn gěi wǒ mǎi le yī zhǐ xiǎogǒu zuòwéi shēngrì lǐwù
1204.english: My father bought me a puppy as a birthday gift.

1205.simplified: 他的病较医生原来以为的更严重。
1205.traditional: 他的病較醫生原來以為的更嚴重。
1205.pinyin: tā de bìng jiào yīshēng yuánlái yǐwéi de gèng yánzhòng
1205.english: His illness was more serious than the doctor first thought.

1206.simplified: 那家剧院得到了艺术委员会的赞助。
1206.traditional: 那家劇院得到了藝術委員會的贊助。
1206.pinyin: nà jiā jùyuàn dé dàoliǎo yìshù wěiyuánhuì de zànzhù
1206.english: The theatre is under the patronage of the Arts Council.

1207.simplified: 她父亲很严厉，他从来没有表扬过她。
1207.traditional: 她父親很嚴厲，他從來沒有表揚過她。
1207.pinyin: tā fùqīn hěn yánlì tā cóngláiméiyǒu biǎoyáng guò tā
1207.english: She had a stern father who never praised her.

1208.simplified: 政府对工会表现得越来越不耐烦。
1208.traditional: 政府對工會表現得越來越不耐煩。
1208.pinyin: zhèngfǔ duì gōnghuì biǎoxiàn dé yuèláiyuè bùnàifán
1208.english: The governments showed growing impatience at the unions.

1209.simplified: 下课后，班长把练习册收了起来。
1209.traditional: 下課後，班長把練習冊收了起來。
1209.pinyin: xiàkè hòu bānzhǎng bǎ liànxícè shōu le qilai
1209.english: The monitor collected the exercise books after the class was over.

1210.simplified: 那小猫爬到树上却不敢下来。
1210.traditional: 那小貓爬到樹上卻不敢下來。
1210.pinyin: nà xiǎomāo pá dào shù shàng què bù gǎn xiàlai
1210.english: The little cat climbed to the top of the tree and became afraid to get down.

1211.simplified: 管理部门采取了一切合理的安全措施。
1211.traditional: 管理部門采取了一切合理的安全措施。
1211.pinyin: guǎnlǐ bùmén cǎiqǔ le yīqiè hélǐ de ānquáncuòshī
1211.english: The management took all reasonable safety precautions.

1212.simplified: 考试之前，我们复习一学期的功课。
1212.traditional: 考試之前，我們復習一學期的功課。
1212.pinyin: kǎoshì zhīqián wǒmen fùxí yī xuéqī de gōngkè
1212.english: Before the examination we have a review of the term's work.

1213.simplified: 我一直抬那些重东西, 现在腰都痛了.
1213.traditional: 我一直抬那些重東西, 現在腰都痛了.
1213.pinyin: wǒ yīzhí tái nàxiē zhòng dōngxi xiànzài yāo dōu tòng le
1213.english: All that heavy lifting has given me a pain in the back.

1214.simplified: 我们需要几个男子作心理学实验对象.
1214.traditional: 我們需要幾個男子作心理學實驗對象.
1214.pinyin: wǒmen xūyào jǐge nánzǐ zuò xīnlǐxué shíyàn duìxiàng
1214.english: We need some male subjects for a psychology experiment.

1215.simplified: 这个花园离市中心只有五分钟的路程。
1215.traditional: 這個花園離市中心只有五分鐘的路程。
1215.pinyin: zhège huāyuán lí shìzhōngxīn zhǐyǒu wǔ fēnzhōng de lùchéng
1215.english: The park is only five minutes from downtown.

1216.simplified: 树叶已开始变色，很快就是冬天了。
1216.traditional: 樹葉已開始變色，很快就是冬天了。
1216.pinyin: shùyè yǐ kāishǐ biànsè hěn kuài jiùshì dōngtiān le
1216.english: The leaves have started to color; it will soon be winter.

1217.simplified: 人民群众普遍反对突然实行的变革。
1217.traditional: 人民群眾普遍反對突然實行的變革。
1217.pinyin: rénmín qúnzhòng pǔbiàn fǎnduì tūrán shíxíng de biàngé
1217.english: The populace at large are opposed to sudden change.

1218.simplified: 那个地方在地图上以十字形记号标出。
1218.traditional: 那個地方在地圖上以十字形記號標出。
1218.pinyin: nàge dìfang zài dìtú shàng yǐ shízìxíng jìhao biāo chū
1218.english: The place is marked on the map with a crossing.

1219.simplified: 那时我不在家，所以由我女儿招待客人。
1219.traditional: 那時我不在家，所以由我女兒招待客人。
1219.pinyin: nàshí wǒ bùzài jiā suǒyǐ yóu wǒ nǚ'ér zhāodài kèrén
1219.english: I went away so my daughter acted as hostess.

1220.simplified: 这件事情对社会造成了有害的影响。
1220.traditional: 這件事情對社會造成了有害的影響。
1220.pinyin: zhè jiàn shìqing duì shèhuì zàochéng le yǒuhài de yǐngxiǎng
1220.english: This event had a pernicious influence on society.

1221.simplified: 我们复制了计算机磁盘以防意外。
1221.traditional: 我們復制了計算機磁盤以防意外。
1221.pinyin: wǒmen fùzhì le jìsuànjī cípán yǐfáng yìwài
1221.english: We make copies of our computer disks as a safeguard against accidents.

1222.simplified: 这一经验为他的思想开阔了新的视野。
1222.traditional: 這一經驗為他的思想開闊了新的視野。
1222.pinyin: zhè yī jīngyàn wéi tā de sīxiǎng kāikuò le xīn de shìyě
1222.english: This experience opened a new prospect in his mind.

1223.simplified: 盒上印有装配模型的简要说明.
1223.traditional: 盒上印有裝配模型的簡要說明.
1223.pinyin: hé shàng yìn yǒu zhuāngpèi móxíng de jiǎnyào shuōmíng
1223.english: Simple directions for assembling the model are printed on the box.

1224.simplified: 我会陪在你身边，就象我答应你的那样。
1224.traditional: 我會陪在你身邊，就象我答應你的那樣。
1224.pinyin: wǒ huì péi zài nǐ shēnbiān jiù xiàng wǒ dāying nǐ de nàyàng
1224.english: I will be at your side, as I promised you.

1225.simplified: 你的精彩报告引出了几个重要问题。
1225.traditional: 你的精彩報告引出了幾個重要問題。
1225.pinyin: nǐ de jīngcǎi bàogào yǐnchū le jǐge zhòngyào wèntí
1225.english: Your interesting report raises several important queries.

1226.simplified: 群众高声喊叫把演讲人的声音压了下去。
1226.traditional: 群眾高聲喊叫把演講人的聲音壓了下去。
1226.pinyin: qúnzhòng gāoshēng hǎnjiào bǎ yǎnjiǎng rén de shēngyīn yā le xiàqù
1226.english: The crowd shouted the speaker down.

1227.simplified: 你不应该让士兵们冒不必要的危险。
1227.traditional: 你不應該讓士兵們冒不必要的危險。
1227.pinyin: nǐ bù yīnggāi ràng shìbīng men mào bùbìyào de wēixiǎn
1227.english: You shouldn't expose the soldiers to unnecessary risks.

1228.simplified: 等到我得知这项决定时，已经太迟了。
1228.traditional: 等到我得知這項決定時，已經太遲了。
1228.pinyin: děngdào wǒ dézhī zhè xiàng juédìng shí yǐjīng tài chíle
1228.english: I wasn't informed of the decision until too late.

1229.simplified: 我在七点钟的新闻报道中听到了这则消息。
1229.traditional: 我在七點鐘的新聞報道中聽到了這則消息。
1229.pinyin: wǒ zài qī diǎnzhōng de xīnwén bàodào zhōngtīng dàoliǎo zhè zé xiāoxi
1229.english: I heard it on the 7 o'clock news.

1230.simplified: 对我来说，拥有一辆汽车的花费太大。
1230.traditional: 對我來說，擁有一輛汽車的花費太大。
1230.pinyin: duìwǒláishuō yōngyǒu yī liàng qìchē de huāfèi tài dà
1230.english: It's too much of an expense for me to own a car.

1231.simplified: 乘客们拥挤在火车站上等候乘车。
1231.traditional: 乘客們擁擠在火車站上等候乘車。
1231.pinyin: chéngkè men yōngjǐ zài huǒchēzhàn shàng děnghòu chéngchē
1231.english: Passengers thronged the station waiting for their trains.

1232.simplified: 孩子们表演完后，大人们鼓掌。
1232.traditional: 孩子們表演完後，大人們鼓掌。
1232.pinyin: háizimen biǎoyǎn wán hòu dà rénmen gǔzhǎng
1232.english: The grown-ups applauded after the children had finished their performance.

1233.simplified: 诗人造了几个词典里找不到的词。
1233.traditional: 詩人造了幾個詞典裡找不到的詞。
1233.pinyin: shīrén zào le jǐge cídiǎn lǐ zhǎobudào de cí
1233.english: The poet minted several words that cannot be found in any dictionary.

1234.simplified: 他从道理上解释了这个老人的行为。
1234.traditional: 他從道理上解釋了這個老人的行為。
1234.pinyin: tā cóng dàoli shàng jiěshì le zhège lǎorén de xíngwéi
1234.english: He explained the behavior of the old man within reason.

1235.simplified: 两村相距一英里, 我家在中间.
1235.traditional: 兩村相距一英裡, 我家在中間.
1235.pinyin: liǎng cūn xiāngjù yī Yīnglǐ wǒ jiā zài zhōngjiān
1235.english: The two villages are a mile apart, and my house lies midway between them.

1236.simplified: 有关环境的会议将在下周一举行。
1236.traditional: 有關環境的會議將在下周一舉行。
1236.pinyin: yǒuguān huánjìng de huìyì jiāng zàixià Zhōuyī jǔxíng
1236.english: The convocation about environment will be held on next Monday.

1237.simplified: 几乎所有的成员都同意这项提议。
1237.traditional: 幾乎所有的成員都同意這項提議。
1237.pinyin: jīhū suǒyǒu de chéngyuán dōu tóngyì zhè xiàng tíyì
1237.english: Virtually all the members were in agreement with the proposal.

1238.simplified: 尽管他大声喊叫，却没有人来帮助他。
1238.traditional: 盡管他大聲喊叫，卻沒有人來幫助他。
1238.pinyin: jǐnguǎn tā dàshēnghǎnjiào què méiyǒu rén lái bāngzhù tā
1238.english: Despite his cries no one came to his assistance.

1239.simplified: 他伸出手去，保护他的孩子免受伤害。
1239.traditional: 他伸出手去，保護他的孩子免受傷害。
1239.pinyin: tā shēnchū shǒu qù bǎohù tā de háizi miǎnshòushānghài
1239.english: He raised his arm to protect his child from hurt.

1240.simplified: 担任主席的人有责任安排会议。
1240.traditional: 擔任主席的人有責任安排會議。
1240.pinyin: dānrèn zhǔxí de rén yǒuzérèn ānpái huìyì
1240.english: The holder of the office of chairman is responsible for arranging meetings.

1241.simplified: 对他来说，生活似乎已失去了一切乐趣。
1241.traditional: 對他來說，生活似乎已失去了一切樂趣。
1241.pinyin: duì tā láishuō shēnghuó sìhū yǐ shīqù le yīqiè lèqù
1241.english: Life seems to have lost most of its savor for him.

1242.simplified: 我们昨天碰到的那个老工人是李师傅。
1242.traditional: 我們昨天碰到的那個老工人是李師傅。
1242.pinyin: wǒmen zuótiān pèngdào de nàge lǎo gōngrén shì lǐ shīfu
1242.english: The old worker whom we met yesterday is Master Li.

1243.simplified: 他的政治观点在两个极端之间摇摆不定.
1243.traditional: 他的政治觀點在兩個極端之間搖擺不定.
1243.pinyin: tā de zhèngzhì guāndiǎn zài liǎng gè jíduān zhījiān yáobǎibùdìng

1244.simplified: 他们奖给优胜者一些水果和鲜花。
1244.traditional: 他們獎給優勝者一些水果和鮮花。
1244.pinyin: tāmen jiǎng gěi yōushèng zhě yīxiē shuǐguǒ hé xiānhuā
1244.english: They rewarded the winners with gifts of fruits and flowers.

1245.simplified: 这家公司希望把新工厂设在河边。
1245.traditional: 這家公司希望把新工廠設在河邊。
1245.pinyin: zhè jiā gōngsī xīwàng bǎ xīn gōngchǎng shèzài hébiān
1245.english: The company wished to locate its new factory beside the river.

1246.simplified: 他收集的邮票是我的三倍还不止。
1246.traditional: 他收集的郵票是我的三倍還不止。
1246.pinyin: tā shōují de yóupiào shì wǒ de sānbèi hái bùzhǐ
1246.english: He has collected more than three times as many stamps as I (have).

1247.simplified: 我们应充分利用丰富的人力资源。
1247.traditional: 我們應充分利用豐富的人力資源。
1247.pinyin: wǒmen yīng chōngfèn lìyòng fēngfù de rénlìzīyuán
1247.english: We shall take full advantage of our rich source of human beings.

1248.simplified: 我们应该使用无烟煤以防止空气污染。
1248.traditional: 我們應該使用無煙煤以防止空氣污染。
1248.pinyin: wǒmen yīnggāi shǐyòng wúyānméi yǐ fángzhǐ kōngqìwūrǎn
1248.english: We should use anthracite to avoid air pollution.

1249.simplified: 我们除了同意他们之外，没有别的选择。
1249.traditional: 我們除了同意他們之外，沒有別的選擇。
1249.pinyin: wǒmen chúle tóngyì tāmen zhīwài méiyǒu biéde xuǎnzé
1249.english: We have no other choice than to agree with them.

1250.simplified: 把你的名字填写在每页上端的括号内。
1250.traditional: 把你的名字填寫在每頁上端的括號內。
1250.pinyin: bǎ nǐ de míngzi tiánxiě zài měi yè shàng duāndì kuòhào nèi
1250.english: Put your name in brackets at the top of each page.

1251.simplified: 请把窗子弄干净，我几乎看不到外面。
1251.traditional: 請把窗子弄干淨，我幾乎看不到外面。
1251.pinyin: qǐng bǎ chuāngzi nòng gānjìng wǒ jīhū kàn bùdào wàimiàn
1251.english: Please clean the window as I can hardly see out.

1252.simplified: 离开学校后，他成为一名建筑工人。
1252.traditional: 離開學校後，他成為一名建築工人。
1252.pinyin: líkāi xuéxiào hòu tā chéngwéi yī míng jiànzhùgōngrén
1252.english: He became a construction worker after he left school.

1253.simplified: 这张唱片非常成功，卖了一百万张。
1253.traditional: 這張唱片非常成功，賣了一百萬張。
1253.pinyin: zhè zhāng chàngpiàn fēicháng chénggōng mài le yī bǎiwàn zhāng
1253.english: The record was a big hit and sold a million copies.

1254.simplified: 想过舒适的生活不过是普通人的本性。
1254.traditional: 想過舒適的生活不過是普通人的本性。
1254.pinyin: xiǎng guò shūshì de shēnghuó bùguò shì pǔtōngrén de běnxìng
1254.english: It's only human nature to want a comfortable life.

1255.simplified: 这家商店因公平交易而获好名声。
1255.traditional: 這家商店因公平交易而獲好名聲。
1255.pinyin: zhè jiā shāngdiàn yīn gōngpíngjiāoyì ér huò hǎo míngshēng
1255.english: This store has an excellent reputation for fair dealing.

1256.simplified: 中国是一个有着悠久历史的东方国家。
1256.traditional: 中國是一個有著悠久歷史的東方國家。
1256.pinyin: Zhōngguó shì yī gè yǒuzhe yōujiǔ lìshǐ de dōngfāng guójiā
1256.english: China is an oriental country with a long history.

1257.simplified: 我觉得我没有勇气告诉他这个坏消息。
1257.traditional: 我覺得我沒有勇氣告訴他這個壞消息。
1257.pinyin: wǒ juéde wǒ méiyǒu yǒngqì gàosu tā zhège huài xiāoxi
1257.english: I don't think I have the courage to tell him the bad news.

1258.simplified: 我很忙，所以不得不中断每周的访问。
1258.traditional: 我很忙，所以不得不中斷每周的訪問。
1258.pinyin: wǒ hěn máng suǒyǐ bùdébù zhōngduàn měizhōu de fǎngwèn
1258.english: I'm so busy that I have to discontinue weekly visits.

1259.simplified: 在一些问题上，他仍然保留自己的意见。
1259.traditional: 在一些問題上，他仍然保留自己的意見。
1259.pinyin: zài yīxiē wèntí shàng tā réngrán bǎoliú zìjǐ de yìjiàn
1259.english: He still reserved his opinion on some points.

1260.simplified: 我答应一定完好无损地还你的自行车。
1260.traditional: 我答應一定完好無損地還你的自行車。
1260.pinyin: wǒ dāying yīdìng wánhǎowúsǔn dì hái nǐ de zìxíngchē
1260.english: I promise to return your bicycle on good condition.

1261.simplified: 他说完话，接着是一段意味深长的停顿。
1261.traditional: 他說完話，接著是一段意味深長的停頓。
1261.pinyin: tā shuō wán huà jiēzhe shì yī duàn yìwèi shēncháng de tíngdùn
1261.english: His words were followed by a pregnant pause.

1262.simplified: 他们对办理的每项业务收取一定的费用。
1262.traditional: 他們對辦理的每項業務收取一定的費用。
1262.pinyin: tāmen duì bànlǐ de měi xiàng yèwù shōuqǔ yīdìng de fèiyòng
1262.english: They charge a fixed rate for each transaction.

1263.simplified: 他们看着电视里的快步舞并且试图模仿。
1263.traditional: 他們看著電視裡的快步舞並且試圖模仿。
1263.pinyin: tāmen kàn zhe diànshì lǐ de kuàibù wǔ bìngqiě shìtú mófǎng
1263.english: They watched jig on TV and tried to imitate.

1264.simplified: 她和她姐姐外貌相似，但性格不同。
1264.traditional: 她和她姐姐外貌相似，但性格不同。
1264.pinyin: tā hé tā jiějie wàimào xiāngsì dàn xìnggé bùtóng
1264.english: She resembles her sister in appearance but not in character.

1265.simplified: 她总胡乱摆弄手表，结果把它弄坏了。
1265.traditional: 她總胡亂擺弄手表，結果把它弄壞了。
1265.pinyin: tā zǒng húluàn bǎinòng shǒubiǎo jiéguǒ bǎ tā nònghuài le
1265.english: She fiddled with her watch so much that it broke.

1266.simplified: 这些蔬菜中的营养部分全都给煮掉了。
1266.traditional: 這些蔬菜中的營養部分全都給煮掉了。
1266.pinyin: zhèxiē shūcài zhòngdì yíngyǎng bùfen quándōu gěi zhǔ diào le
1266.english: All the goodness has been boiled off the vegetables.

1267.simplified: 她工作的时候就把小儿子送到托儿所。
1267.traditional: 她工作的時候就把小兒子送到托兒所。
1267.pinyin: tā gōngzuò de shíhou jiù bǎ xiǎo érzi sòng dào tuō'érsuǒ
1267.english: She sent her little son to a nursery when she was working.

1268.simplified: 她拥抱了一下儿子，然后让他上床睡觉。
1268.traditional: 她擁抱了一下兒子，然後讓他上床睡覺。
1268.pinyin: tā yōngbào le yīxià érzi ránhòu ràng tā shàngchuáng shuìjiào
1268.english: She give her son a hug and put him to bed.

1269.simplified: 这个男孩想在将来成为一名哲学家。
1269.traditional: 這個男孩想在將來成為一名哲學家。
1269.pinyin: zhège nánhái xiǎng zài jiānglái chéngwéi yī míng zhéxuéjiā
1269.english: The boy wants to become a philosopher in the future.

1270.simplified: 这种新的传染病对抗菌素有抗药性。
1270.traditional: 這種新的傳染病對抗菌素有抗藥性。
1270.pinyin: zhèzhǒng xīn de chuánrǎnbìng duìkàng jūn sùyǒu kàngyàoxìng
1270.english: This new type of infection is resistant to antibiotics.

1271.simplified: 她躺在池子边上，用手指玩水。
1271.traditional: 她躺在池子邊上，用手指玩水。
1271.pinyin: tā tǎng zài chízi biān shàng yòng shǒuzhǐ wán shuǐ
1271.english: She lay at the side of the pool and paddled in the water with her fingers.

1272.simplified: 他为我们介绍了花园中对称的布局。
1272.traditional: 他為我們介紹了花園中對稱的布局。
1272.pinyin: tā wéi wǒmen jièshào le huāyuán zhōng duìchèn de bùjú
1272.english: He introduced to us the symmetrical arrangement of the garden.

1273.simplified: 他考试前没做任何准备，所以不及格。
1273.traditional: 他考試前沒做任何准備，所以不及格。
1273.pinyin: tā kǎoshì qián méi zuò rènhé zhǔnbèi suǒyǐ bùjígé
1273.english: He didn't do any preparation for this exam, so he failed.

1274.simplified: 他历史考试不及格，其他科目都通过了。
1274.traditional: 他歷史考試不及格，其他科目都通過了。
1274.pinyin: tā lìshǐ kǎoshì bùjígé qítā kēmù dōu tōngguò le
1274.english: He got a fail in history and passes in other subjects.

1275.simplified: 她用灵巧的双手为我织了一副手套。
1275.traditional: 她用靈巧的雙手為我織了一副手套。
1275.pinyin: tā yòng língqiǎo de shuāngshǒu wéi wǒ zhī le yī fù shǒutào
1275.english: She knitted a pair of mittens for me with her nimble fingers.

1276.simplified: 录音磁带的复制质量有了很大改进。
1276.traditional: 錄音磁帶的復制質量有了很大改進。
1276.pinyin: lùyīn cídài de fùzhì zhìliàng yǒule hěn dà gǎijìn
1276.english: The reproductive quality of audio tapes has improved enormously.

1277.simplified: 该是你认识形势的真实情况的时候了。
1277.traditional: 該是你認識形勢的真實情況的時候了。
1277.pinyin: gāi shì nǐ rènshi xíngshì de zhēnshí qíngkuàng de shíhou le
1277.english: It's time you awake to the realities of the situation.

1278.simplified: 他回过身来, 帮助那位扭了脚的朋友。
1278.traditional: 他回過身來, 幫助那位扭了腳的朋友。
1278.pinyin: tā huí guò shēn lái bāngzhù nà wèi niǔ le jiǎo de péngyou
1278.english: He came back to help his friend who had sprained an ankle.

1279.simplified: 在我祖父看来，我爸爸仍然是个小孩。
1279.traditional: 在我祖父看來，我爸爸仍然是個小孩。
1279.pinyin: zài wǒ zǔfù kànlai wǒ bàba réngrán shì gè xiǎohái
1279.english: It seems to my grandfather that my father is still a child.

1280.simplified: 墙上有一幅武士站在战车上的画。
1280.traditional: 牆上有一幅武士站在戰車上的畫。
1280.pinyin: qiáng shàng yǒu yī fú wǔshì zhàn zài zhànchē shàng de huà
1280.english: There is a picture of a fighter standing on a chariot on the wall.

1281.simplified: 这些羊被赶在一起，排成歪歪扭扭的一行。
1281.traditional: 這些羊被趕在一起，排成歪歪扭扭的一行。
1281.pinyin: zhèxiē yáng bèi gǎn zàiyīqǐ pái chéng wāiwāiniǔniǔ de yīxíng
1281.english: The sheep were herded into a ragged line.

1282.simplified: 这个人为了赢得胜利进行了英勇的斗争。
1282.traditional: 這個人為了贏得勝利進行了英勇的斗爭。
1282.pinyin: zhè gèrén wèile yíngdé shènglì jìnxíng le yīngyǒng de dòuzhēng
1282.english: The man put up a valiant fight for victory.

1283.simplified: 尽管我们尽了全力，我们还是输掉了比赛。
1283.traditional: 盡管我們盡了全力，我們還是輸掉了比賽。
1283.pinyin: jǐnguǎn wǒmen jìn le quánlì wǒmen háishi shūdiào le bǐsài
1283.english: Despite all our efforts we still lost the game.

1284.simplified: 我还不会游泳，但我用胳膊划了几下。
1284.traditional: 我還不會游泳，但我用胳膊劃了幾下。
1284.pinyin: wǒ hái bùhuì yóuyǒng dàn wǒ yòng gēbo huà le jǐ xià
1284.english: I can't swim yet, but I've made a few strokes with my arms.

1285.simplified: 这位足球教练受到了当地报纸的批评。
1285.traditional: 這位足球教練受到了當地報紙的批評。
1285.pinyin: zhèwèi zúqiú jiàoliàn shòu dàoliǎo dāngdì bàozhǐ de pīpíng
1285.english: The football coach was criticized by the local paper.

1286.simplified: 金属内电流是由电子运动引起的。
1286.traditional: 金屬內電流是由電子運動引起的。
1286.pinyin: jīnshǔ nèi diànliú shì yóu diànzǐ yùndòng yǐnqǐ de
1286.english: An electric current in metal is caused by the movement of electrons.

1287.simplified: 我们的房子离村中两家酒馆距离相等.
1287.traditional: 我們的房子離村中兩家酒館距離相等.
1287.pinyin: wǒmen de fángzi lí cūn zhōng liǎng jiā jiǔguǎn jùlí xiāngděng
1287.english: Our house is equidistant from the two pubs in the village.

1288.simplified: 汽车路线到此为止了, 你得叫辆的士。
1288.traditional: 汽車路線到此為止了, 你得叫輛的士。
1288.pinyin: qìchē lùxiàn dàocǐwéizhǐ le nǐ dé jiào liàng dīshì
1288.english: The bus route goes as far as that, so you'll need to take a taxi.

1289.simplified: 她为自己的孩子取得的成绩感到无比骄傲。
1289.traditional: 她為自己的孩子取得的成績感到無比驕傲。
1289.pinyin: tā wéi zìjǐ de háizi qǔdé de chéngjì gǎndào wúbǐ jiāo'ào
1289.english: She takes great pride in her children's success.

1290.simplified: 那个好心的大教主负责我们这个教区。
1290.traditional: 那個好心的大教主負責我們這個教區。
1290.pinyin: nàge hǎoxīn de dà jiàozhǔ fùzé wǒmen zhège jiàoqū
1290.english: That kind archbishop is responsible for our church district.

1291.simplified: 该报告建议安全标准应该改进。
1291.traditional: 該報告建議安全標准應該改進。
1291.pinyin: gāi bàogào jiànyì ānquán biāozhǔn yīnggāi gǎijìn
1291.english: The report advances the suggestion that safety standards should be improved.

1292.simplified: 为了收集数据我们发给他们一些调查表。
1292.traditional: 為了收集數據我們發給他們一些調查表。
1292.pinyin: wèile shōují shùjù wǒmen fāgěi tāmen yīxiē diàochábiǎo
1292.english: We gave them some questionnaires for collecting data.

1293.simplified: 乘客只可以在公共汽车的上层吸烟。
1293.traditional: 乘客只可以在公共汽車的上層吸煙。
1293.pinyin: chéngkè zhǐ kěyǐ zài gōnggòngqìchē de shàngcéng xīyān
1293.english: Passengers may smoke only on the upper deck of the bus.

1294.simplified: 他在物理学方面已经取得了巨大成就。
1294.traditional: 他在物理學方面已經取得了巨大成就。
1294.pinyin: tā zài wùlǐxué fāngmiàn yǐjīng qǔdé le jùdà chéngjiù
1294.english: He has got brilliant achievements in the field of physics.

1295.simplified: 那首领拿一些玻璃块替换了那些钻石。
1295.traditional: 那首領拿一些玻璃塊替換了那些鑽石。
1295.pinyin: nà shǒulǐng ná yīxiē bōli kuài tìhuàn le nàxiē zuànshí
1295.english: The chief interchanged the diamond with some pieces of glass.

1296.simplified: 我舒适地靠在大沙发上，开始看小说。
1296.traditional: 我舒適地靠在大沙發上，開始看小說。
1296.pinyin: wǒ shūshì dì kào zài dà shāfā shàng kāishǐ kàn xiǎoshuō
1296.english: I nestled down on the big sofa and began to read novels.

1297.simplified: 不应该让退休的人感到自己是个闲人
1297.traditional: 不應該讓退休的人感到自己是個閒人
1297.pinyin: bù yīnggāi ràng tuìxiū de rén gǎndào zìjǐ shì gè xiánrén
1297.english: A retired person should not be made to feel he's on the shelf.

1298.simplified: 她用一张面巾纸擦掉脸上的汗水。
1298.traditional: 她用一張面巾紙擦掉臉上的汗水。
1298.pinyin: tā yòng yī zhāng miànjīn zhǐ cādiào liǎn shàng de hànshuǐ
1298.english: She wiped off the sweat from her face with a piece of facial tissue.

1299.simplified: 拥有汽车的人数一直在逐渐上升。
1299.traditional: 擁有汽車的人數一直在逐漸上升。
1299.pinyin: yōngyǒu qìchē de rénshù yīzhí zài zhújiàn shàngshēng
1299.english: There has been a gradual increase in the number of people owning cars.

1300.simplified: 在资信方面, 这家商行还是很可靠的。
1300.traditional: 在資信方面, 這家商行還是很可靠的。
1300.pinyin: zài zī xìn fāngmiàn zhè jiā shāngháng háishi hěn kěkào de
1300.english: In respect of financial standing, this firm is reliable.

1301.simplified: 他对他的选民表现出很有感染力的热情。
1301.traditional: 他對他的選民表現出很有感染力的熱情。
1301.pinyin: tā duì tā de xuǎnmín biǎoxiàn chū hěn yǒu gǎnrǎnlì de rèqíng
1301.english: He expressed infectious enthusiasm to his voters.

1302.simplified: 我开始做这项工作时, 遇到许多困难.
1302.traditional: 我開始做這項工作時, 遇到許多困難.
1302.pinyin: wǒ kāishǐ zuò zhè xiàng gōngzuò shí yùdào xǔduō kùnnan
1302.english: I encountered many difficulties when I first started this job.

1303.simplified: 这幅画被他看中了，所以他就把他买了下来。
1303.traditional: 這幅畫被他看中了，所以他就把他買了下來。
1303.pinyin: zhè fú huà bèi tā kànzhòng le suǒyǐ tā jiù bǎ tā mǎi le xiàlai
1303.english: The painting took his fancy, so he bought it.

1304.simplified: 对全体学生的功课作出连贯性的评定。
1304.traditional: 對全體學生的功課作出連貫性的評定。
1304.pinyin: duì quántǐ xuésheng de gōngkè zuòchū liánguàn xìng de píngdìng
1304.english: Continuous assessment is made of all students' work.

1305.simplified: 她午饭吃得很少，期待晚饭时饱餐一顿。
1305.traditional: 她午飯吃得很少，期待晚飯時飽餐一頓。
1305.pinyin: tā wǔfàn chī dehěn shǎo qīdài wǎnfàn shí bǎocānyīdùn
1305.english: She ate a light lunch in expectation of a good dinner.

1306.simplified: 他向我走来，微笑著伸出手来和我握手。
1306.traditional: 他向我走來，微笑著伸出手來和我握手。
1306.pinyin: tā xiàng wǒ zǒu lái wēixiào zhe shēnchū shǒu lái hé wǒ wòshǒu
1306.english: He came towards me, smiled and offered his hand.

1307.simplified: 这个地区大多数国家的经济都不稳定。
1307.traditional: 這個地區大多數國家的經濟都不穩定。
1307.pinyin: zhège dìqū dàduōshù guójiā de jīngjì dōu bùwěndìng
1307.english: Most of the countries in the region have unstable economies.

1308.simplified: 我养了一只猫和一只狗，但它们老是打架。
1308.traditional: 我養了一只貓和一只狗，但它們老是打架。
1308.pinyin: wǒ yǎng le yī zhǐ māo hé yī zhǐ gǒu dàn tāmen lǎoshi dǎjià
1308.english: I have a dog and a cat, but they fight all the time.

1309.simplified: 只要我们紧密团结就能克服困难。
1309.traditional: 只要我們緊密團結就能克服困難。
1309.pinyin: zhǐyào wǒmen jǐnmì tuánjié jiù néng kèfú kùnnan
1309.english: We can surely overcome these difficulties as long as we are closely united.

1310.simplified: 因为现在是收获期，所以我们都非常忙。
1310.traditional: 因為現在是收獲期，所以我們都非常忙。
1310.pinyin: yīnwèi xiànzài shì shōuhuò qī suǒyǐ wǒmen dōu fēicháng máng
1310.english: We are all very busy because it's the harvest time.

1311.simplified: 一如既往，我们将继续每星期四开会。
1311.traditional: 一如既往，我們將繼續每星期四開會。
1311.pinyin: yīrújìwǎng wǒmen jiāng jìxù měi Xīngqīsì kāihuì
1311.english: We will continue to hold meetings on Thursdays, as heretofore.

1312.simplified: 只有时间才能使人淡忘那些不快的记忆。
1312.traditional: 只有時間才能使人淡忘那些不快的記憶。
1312.pinyin: zhǐyǒu shíjiān cáinéng shǐ rén dànwàng nàxiē bùkuài de jìyì
1312.english: Time alone will efface those unpleasant memories.

1313.simplified: 有一条良好的A级公路通往北方--A级1号公路.
1313.traditional: 有一條良好的A級公路通往北方--A級1號公路.
1313.pinyin: yǒu yī tiáo liánghǎo de jí gōnglù tōngwǎng běifāng jí hào gōnglù
1313.english: There's a good A-road going North -- the A1.

1314.simplified: 法庭上原告和被告双方都有各自的律师。
1314.traditional: 法庭上原告和被告雙方都有各自的律師。
1314.pinyin: fǎtíng shàng yuángào hé bèigào shuāngfāng dōu yǒu gèzì de lǜshī
1314.english: Each side of a case in court has its own counsel.

1315.simplified: 别那样对我大声嚷嚷，我能听清楚。
1315.traditional: 別那樣對我大聲嚷嚷，我能聽清楚。
1315.pinyin: bié nàyàng duì wǒ dàshēng rāngrang wǒ néng tīng qīngchu
1315.english: Don't shout into my ears like that, I can hear you perfectly well.

1316.simplified: 如在市区电车或公车上找给顾客的零钱
1316.traditional: 如在市區電車或公車上找給顧客的零錢
1316.pinyin: rú zài shìqū diànchē huò gōngchē shàng zhǎo gěi gùkè de língqián
1316.english: The fare charged a passenger, as on a streetcar or bus.

1317.simplified: 从这个角度来看, 画中的女子面带微笑.
1317.traditional: 從這個角度來看, 畫中的女子面帶微笑.
1317.pinyin: cóng zhège jiǎodù láikàn huà zhòngdì nǚzǐ miàndài wēixiào
1317.english: Seen from this angle the woman in the picture is smiling.

1318.simplified: 老师要求学生们复述他们刚读的故事。
1318.traditional: 老師要求學生們復述他們剛讀的故事。
1318.pinyin: lǎoshī yāoqiú xuésheng men fùshù tāmen gāng dú de gùshi
1318.english: The teacher asked the students to retell the story they just read.

1319.simplified: 那家大工厂倒闭，使许多工人失业。
1319.traditional: 那家大工廠倒閉，使許多工人失業。
1319.pinyin: nà jiā dà gōngchǎng dǎobì shǐ xǔduō gōngrén shīyè
1319.english: The closure of the large factory made many workers live in idleness.

1320.simplified: 你决不会知道你的鼓励对我多么有意义。
1320.traditional: 你決不會知道你的鼓勵對我多麼有意義。
1320.pinyin: nǐ jué bùhuì zhīdào nǐ de gǔlì duì wǒ duōme yǒuyìyì
1320.english: You will never know how much your encouragement meant to me.

1321.simplified: 这次经验有助于帮助她改变社会意识。
1321.traditional: 這次經驗有助於幫助她改變社會意識。
1321.pinyin: zhè cì jīngyàn yǒuzhùyú bāngzhù tā gǎibiàn shèhuì yìshí
1321.english: This experience helped to change her social consciousness.

1322.simplified: 电影导演测试了一下那位新演员的演技。
1322.traditional: 電影導演測試了一下那位新演員的演技。
1322.pinyin: diànyǐngdǎoyǎn cèshì le yīxià nà wèi xīn yǎnyuán de yǎnjì
1322.english: The film director put the new actor through his paces.

1323.simplified: 他做的事完全合法, 警方不能碰他.
1323.traditional: 他做的事完全合法, 警方不能碰他.
1323.pinyin: tā zuò de shì wánquán héfǎ jǐngfāng bùnéng pèng tā
1323.english: What he did was perfectly legal the police can't touch (ie arrest) him for it.

1324.simplified: 这位冠军为了下一场比赛正在进行训练。
1324.traditional: 這位冠軍為了下一場比賽正在進行訓練。
1324.pinyin: zhèwèi guànjūn wèile xià yī chǎng bǐsài zhèngzài jìnxíng xùnliàn
1324.english: The champion is in training for his next fight.

1325.simplified: 我们用电脑查找所有用连字符连接的词。
1325.traditional: 我們用電腦查找所有用連字符連接的詞。
1325.pinyin: wǒmen yòng diànnǎo cházhǎo suǒyǒu yòng liánzìfú liánjiē de cí
1325.english: We did a computer search for all the hyphenated words.

1326.simplified: 我认为这些有趣的旧习俗应该保存下去。
1326.traditional: 我認為這些有趣的舊習俗應該保存下去。
1326.pinyin: wǒmen yòng diànnǎo cházhǎo suǒyǒu yòng liánzìfú liánjiē de cí
1326.english: I think these interesting old customs should be preserved.

1327.simplified: 他们的观点同我们看问题的方法格格不入。
1327.traditional: 他們的觀點同我們看問題的方法格格不入。
1327.pinyin: tāmen de guāndiǎn tóng wǒmen kàn wèntí de fāngfǎ gégébùrù
1327.english: Their ideas are quite alien to our ways of thinking.

1328.simplified: 我们用他给我们带来的面粉做了一些面包。
1328.traditional: 我們用他給我們帶來的面粉做了一些面包。
1328.pinyin: wǒmen yòng tā gěi wǒmen dàilái de miànfěn zuò le yīxiē miànbāo
1328.english: We made some bread with the flour he bought for us.

1329.simplified: 骑士们在小酒店里会合，讨论他们的计划。
1329.traditional: 騎士們在小酒店裡會合，討論他們的計劃。
1329.pinyin: qíshì men zài xiǎo jiǔdiàn lǐ huìhé tǎolùn tāmen de jìhuà
1329.english: The knights met in the tavern to discuss their plan.

1330.simplified: 我们大家都得参加跑步训练, 无人例外.
1330.traditional: 我們大家都得參加跑步訓練, 無人例外.
1330.pinyin: wǒmen dàjiā dōu dé cānjiā pǎobù xùnliàn wúrén lìwài
1330.english: We all had to take part in the training run, with nobody excepted.

1331.simplified: 首次飞跃大西洋是一项了不起的业绩。
1331.traditional: 首次飛躍大西洋是一項了不起的業績。
1331.pinyin: shǒucì fēiyuè Dàxīyáng shì yī xiàng liǎobuqǐ de yèjì
1331.english: Flying across the Atlantic for the first time was a great achievement.

1332.simplified: 我因有约在先，所以未能参加这个会。
1332.traditional: 我因有約在先，所以未能參加這個會。
1332.pinyin: wǒ yīn yǒuyuēzàixiān suǒyǐ wèinéng cānjiā zhège huì
1332.english: I was unable to attend the meeting because of a prior engagement.

1333.simplified: 他在面对危险的时候表现出非凡的勇气。
1333.traditional: 他在面對危險的時候表現出非凡的勇氣。
1333.pinyin: tā zài miànduì wēixiǎn de shíhou biǎoxiàn chū fēifán de yǒngqì
1333.english: He showed remarkable courage when he faced the danger.

1334.simplified: 我得把电话号码记下来，以免待会儿忘记。
1334.traditional: 我得把電話號碼記下來，以免待會兒忘記。
1334.pinyin: wǒ dé bǎ diànhuà hàomǎ jì xiàlai yǐmiǎn dāihuìr wàngjì
1334.english: I'll just jot down their phone number before I forget it.

1335.simplified: 我喜欢滑雪, 同时也知道这非常危险。
1335.traditional: 我喜歡滑雪, 同時也知道這非常危險。
1335.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan huáxuě tóngshí yě zhīdào zhè fēicháng wēixiǎn
1335.english: I like skiing and in the meantime, I know it is very dangerous.

1336.simplified: 我们应该多吃一些富含纤维素的绿色蔬菜。
1336.traditional: 我們應該多吃一些富含纖維素的綠色蔬菜。
1336.pinyin: wǒmen yīnggāi duō chī yīxiē fù hán xiānwéisù de lǜsè shūcài
1336.english: We should eat more green vegetables rich in cellulose.

1337.simplified: 请假离开办公室之后我赶紧去了医院。
1337.traditional: 請假離開辦公室之後我趕緊去了醫院。
1337.pinyin: qǐngjià líkāi bàngōngshì zhīhòu wǒ gǎnjǐn qù le yīyuàn
1337.english: After asking off my office, I went to the hospital immediately.

1338.simplified: 他体重减了很多, 比以前轻了三公斤.
1338.traditional: 他體重減了很多, 比以前輕了三公斤.
1338.pinyin: tā tǐzhòng jiǎn le hěn duō bǐ yǐqián qīng le sān gōngjīn
1338.english: He's lost a lot of weight: he's three kilos lighter than he used to be.

1339.simplified: 自从他去年夏天离去, 我们就失去了联系。
1339.traditional: 自從他去年夏天離去, 我們就失去了聯系。
1339.pinyin: zìcóng tā qùnián xiàtiān líqù wǒmen jiù shīqù le liánxì
1339.english: We have lost contact with him since he left last summer.

1340.simplified: 检查者对所有受害者的朋友进行了调查。
1340.traditional: 檢查者對所有受害者的朋友進行了調查。
1340.pinyin: jiǎnchá zhě duì suǒyǒu shòuhàizhě de péngyou jìnxíng le diàochá
1340.english: The checker made a check on all the victims' friends.

1341.simplified: 我们可以以2比零或2比1赢得这三局两胜的比赛.
1341.traditional: 我們可以以2比零或2比1贏得這三局兩勝的比賽.
1341.pinyin: wǒmen kěyǐ yǐ bǐ líng huò bǐ yíngdé zhè sān jú liǎng shèng de bǐsài
1341.english: We can win the rubber 2 games to nil or 2-1.

1342.simplified: 在这张粉红色纸条上写下你的姓名和地址。
1342.traditional: 在這張粉紅色紙條上寫下你的姓名和地址。
1342.pinyin: zài zhè zhāng fěnhóngsè zhǐtiáo shàng xiěxià nǐ de xìngmíng hé dìzhǐ
1342.english: Write your name and address on this pink slip.

1343.simplified: 他用自来水龙头流出的凉水把手洗干净。
1343.traditional: 他用自來水龍頭流出的涼水把手洗干淨。
1343.pinyin: tā yòng zìláishuǐ lóngtóu liúchū de liángshuǐ bǎshǒu xǐ gānjìng
1343.english: He cleaned his hands in the cold water from the tap.

1344.simplified: 他用尽一切影响力使他们接受他的计划。
1344.traditional: 他用盡一切影響力使他們接受他的計劃。
1344.pinyin: tā yòngjìn yīqiè yǐngxiǎnglì shǐ tāmen jiēshòu tā de jìhuà
1344.english: He exerted all his influence to make them accept his plan.

1345.simplified: 生命可以被比作一次不知目的地的旅行。
1345.traditional: 生命可以被比作一次不知目的地的旅行。
1345.pinyin: shēngmìng kěyǐ bèi bǐ zuò yīcì bùzhī mùdìdì de lǚxíng
1345.english: Life can be likened to a journey with an unknown destination.

1346.simplified: 他们对即将到来的选举作了充分的准备。
1346.traditional: 他們對即將到來的選舉作了充分的准備。
1346.pinyin: tāmen duì jíjiāng dàolái de xuǎnjǔ zuò le chōngfèn de zhǔnbèi
1346.english: They have made good preparation for the upcoming elections.

1347.simplified: 他们爱举行戏称之为文学晚会的活动.
1347.traditional: 他們愛舉行戲稱之為文學晚會的活動.
1347.pinyin: tāmen ài jǔxíng xì chēngzhīwéi wénxué wǎnhuì de huódòng
1347.english: They're fond of holding what are laughingly known as literary soirees.

1348.simplified: 你有这样一位通情达理的父亲，真是幸运。
1348.traditional: 你有這樣一位通情達理的父親，真是幸運。
1348.pinyin: nǐ yǒu zhèyàng yī wèi tōngqíngdálǐ de fùqīn zhēnshi xìngyùn
1348.english: You are fortunate to have such a reasonable father.

1349.simplified: 老师从一开始就强调翻译准确性。
1349.traditional: 老師從一開始就強調翻譯准確性。
1349.pinyin: lǎoshī cóng yī kāishǐ jiù qiángdiào fānyì zhǔnquèxìng
1349.english: The teacher laid emphasis on the precision of the translation from the outset.

1350.simplified: 原始社会的结构并不一定就是简单的。
1350.traditional: 原始社會的結構並不一定就是簡單的。
1350.pinyin: yuánshǐshèhuì de jiégòu bìngbù yīdìng jiùshì jiǎndān de
