1773.pinyin: jǐngfāng bǎ jiànzhùwù de suǒyǒu chūkǒu dōu fēngsuǒ zhù le
1773.english: Police sealed off all the exits from the building.

1774.simplified: 如果机器出故障，就把开关关掉。
1774.traditional: 如果機器出故障，就把開關關掉。
1774.pinyin: rúguǒ jīqì chū gùzhàng jiù bǎ kāiguān guāndiào
1774.english: Turn off the switch when anything goes wrong with the machine.

1775.simplified: 他最近去世给家庭聚会蒙上了阴影。
1775.traditional: 他最近去世給家庭聚會蒙上了陰影。
1775.pinyin: tā zuìjìn qùshì gěi jiātíng jùhuì méng shàng le yīnyǐng
1775.english: His recent death overshadowed the family gathering.

1776.simplified: 只留下一些被太阳晒得泛白的枯骨。
1776.traditional: 只留下一些被太陽曬得泛白的枯骨。
1776.pinyin: zhǐ liúxià yīxiē bèi tàiyang shài dé fànbái de kū gǔ
1776.english: There were only a few dry bones left, bleached by the sun.

1777.simplified: 每周六琴在村里的公用草地上骑马。
1777.traditional: 每周六琴在村裡的公用草地上騎馬。
1777.pinyin: měizhōu liù qín zài cūn lǐ de gōngyòng cǎodì shàng qímǎ
1777.english: Every Saturday Jean went riding on the village common.

1778.simplified: 销售经理想在远东开辟新市场。
1778.traditional: 銷售經理想在遠東開辟新市場。
1778.pinyin: xiāoshòu jīng lǐxiǎng zài Yuǎndōng kāipì xīn shìchǎng
1778.english: The sales manager wants to open up new markets in the Far East.

1779.simplified: 他呆在幕后为了避开公众的注意。
1779.traditional: 他呆在幕後為了避開公眾的注意。
1779.pinyin: tā dāi zài mùhòu wèile bìkāi gōngzhòng de zhùyì
1779.english: He stayed in the background to escape from the public attention.

1780.simplified: 那家商场的西洋梳镜柜看上去很特别。
1780.traditional: 那家商場的西洋梳鏡櫃看上去很特別。
1780.pinyin: nà jiā shāngchǎng de xīyáng shū jìng guì kànshangqu hěn tèbié
1780.english: The chiffonier in that shop looks special.

1781.simplified: 这个小镇很适宜于一位青年医生安家。
1781.traditional: 這個小鎮很適宜於一位青年醫生安家。
1781.pinyin: zhège xiǎo zhèn hěn shìyí yú yī wèi qīngnián yīshēng ānjiā
1781.english: The town is a good location for a young doctor.

1782.simplified: 科学家仍在寻求治疗感冒的方法。
1782.traditional: 科學家仍在尋求治療感冒的方法。
1782.pinyin: kēxuéjiā réng zài xúnqiú zhìliáo gǎnmào de fāngfǎ
1782.english: Scientists are still searching for a cure to the common cold.

1783.simplified: 我送给她一条编织的披肩作圣诞礼物。
1783.traditional: 我送給她一條編織的披肩作聖誕禮物。
1783.pinyin: wǒ sònggěi tā yī tiáo biānzhī de pījiān zuò Shèngdàn lǐwù
1783.english: I gave her a knitted shawl as a Christmas gift.

1784.simplified: 这座城市已经把旧的电车轨道拆除了。
1784.traditional: 這座城市已經把舊的電車軌道拆除了。
1784.pinyin: zhè zuò chéngshì yǐjīng bǎ jiù de diànchē guǐdào chāi chúle
1784.english: The city has taken the old streetcar tracks up.

1785.simplified: 他公然蔑视上司，并要求他作出解释。
1785.traditional: 他公然蔑視上司，並要求他作出解釋。
1785.pinyin: tā gōngrán mièshì shàngsi bìng yāoqiú tā zuòchū jiěshì
1785.english: He bearded his boss and demanded an explanation.

1786.simplified: 政府力图在这个问题上保持低姿态。
1786.traditional: 政府力圖在這個問題上保持低姿態。
1786.pinyin: zhèngfǔ lìtú zài zhège wèntí shàng bǎochí dī zītài
1786.english: The government is trying to keep a low profile on this issue.

1787.simplified: 别把热水倒进玻璃杯里，不然它会炸的。
1787.traditional: 別把熱水倒進玻璃杯裡，不然它會炸的。
1787.pinyin: bié bǎ rèshuǐ dǎo jìn bōlibēi lǐ bùrán tā huì zhá de
1787.english: Don't pour hot water into the glass or it will crack.

1788.simplified: 我们喜欢观赏初升太阳的灿烂光辉。
1788.traditional: 我們喜歡觀賞初升太陽的燦爛光輝。
1788.pinyin: wǒmen xǐhuan guānshǎng chūshēng tàiyang de cànlàn guānghuī
1788.english: We enjoy seeing the glorious beams of the rising sun.

1789.simplified: 她太倒霉了，休假第一天就感冒了。
1789.traditional: 她太倒黴了，休假第一天就感冒了。
1789.pinyin: tā tài dǎoméi le xiūjià dìyī tiān jiù gǎnmào le
1789.english: She was unlucky to catch a cold on the first day of her holiday.

1790.simplified: 整顿饭都很好, 尤其是葡萄酒更好.
1790.traditional: 整頓飯都很好, 尤其是葡萄酒更好.
1790.pinyin: zhěngdùn fàn dōu hěn hǎo yóuqíshì pútaojiǔ gèng hǎo
1790.english: The whole meal was good but the wine in particular was excellent.

1791.simplified: 听到朋友死亡的消息，她难过地哭了。
1791.traditional: 聽到朋友死亡的消息，她難過地哭了。
1791.pinyin: tīngdào péngyou sǐwáng de xiāoxi tā nánguò dì kū le
1791.english: She cried with grief when she heard news of her friend's death.

1792.simplified: 史密斯教授曾做过总统的特别顾问。
1792.traditional: 史密斯教授曾做過總統的特別顧問。
1792.pinyin: Shǐmìsī jiàoshòu céng zuò guò zǒngtǒng de tèbié gùwèn
1792.english: Professor Smith served as special adviser to the President.

1793.simplified: 人类是在幼年开始学习第一种语言的。
1793.traditional: 人類是在幼年開始學習第一種語言的。
1793.pinyin: rénlèi shì zài yòunián kāishǐ xuéxí dìyī zhǒng yǔyán de
1793.english: Mankind learns its first language in early childhood.

1794.simplified: 史密斯先生在政府的行政部门工作。
1794.traditional: 史密斯先生在政府的行政部門工作。
1794.pinyin: Shǐmìsī xiānsheng zài zhèngfǔ de xíngzhèngbùmén gōngzuò
1794.english: Mr. Smith works in an executive branch of the government.

1795.simplified: 这家公司必须克服对采用新技术的阻力.
1795.traditional: 這家公司必須克服對采用新技術的阻力.
1795.pinyin: zhè jiā gōngsī bìxū kèfú duì cǎiyòng xīnjìshù de zǔlì
1795.english: The firm has to overcome its resistance to new technology.

1796.simplified: 偶然的相遇使两位老朋友重新聚首。
1796.traditional: 偶然的相遇使兩位老朋友重新聚首。
1796.pinyin: ǒurán de xiāngyù shǐ liǎng wèi lǎopéngyou chóngxīn jùshǒu
1796.english: A chance meeting brought the two old friends together again.

1797.simplified: 咱们索性把蛋糕吃完吧, 也没剩多少了.
1797.traditional: 咱們索性把蛋糕吃完吧, 也沒剩多少了.
1797.pinyin: zánmen suǒxìng bǎ dàngāo chīwán ba yě méi shèng duōshao le
1797.english: We might as well finish (up) the cake; there isn't much left.

1798.simplified: 我希望他成为钢琴家的梦想可以成真。
1798.traditional: 我希望他成為鋼琴家的夢想可以成真。
1798.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng tā chéngwéi gāngqínjiā de mèngxiǎng kěyǐ chéngzhēn
1798.english: I hope his dream of becoming a pianist will come true.

1799.simplified: 雇用了没参加工会的工人以结束罢工行动.
1799.traditional: 雇用了沒參加工會的工人以結束罷工行動.
1799.pinyin: gùyòng le méi cānjiā gōnghuì de gōngrén yǐ jiéshù bàgōng xíngdòng
1799.english: Non-union labour was used to end the strike.

1800.simplified: 在重要的节日, 人们把国旗悬挂在门外。
1800.traditional: 在重要的節日, 人們把國旗懸掛在門外。
1800.pinyin: zài zhòngyào de jiérì rénmen bǎ guóqí xuánguà zài ménwài
1800.english: People hang national flags out on important holidays.

1801.simplified: 基督派基督十二使徒之一宣传他的教义。
1801.traditional: 基督派基督十二使徒之一宣傳他的教義。
1801.pinyin: Jīdū pài Jīdū shí'èr shǐtú zhīyī xuānchuán tā de jiàoyì
1801.english: Apostles were sent out by Christ to spread his teachings.

1802.simplified: 从资料库借磁带是退而求其次的办法。
1802.traditional: 從資料庫借磁帶是退而求其次的辦法。
1802.pinyin: cóng zīliàokù jiè cídài shì tuì'érqiúqícì de bànfǎ
1802.english: Borrowing tapes from the library would be the next-best thing.

1803.simplified: 在这场足球赛中，他主罚，踢进了一个球。
1803.traditional: 在這場足球賽中，他主罰，踢進了一個球。
1803.pinyin: zài zhè chǎng zúqiúsài zhōng tā zhǔfá tī jìn le yī gè qiú
1803.english: He kicked a penalty goal in the football match.

1804.simplified: 他被家庭束缚，不能再到处去旅游了。
1804.traditional: 他被家庭束縛，不能再到處去旅游了。
1804.pinyin: tā bèi jiātíng shùfù bùnéng zài dàochù qù lǚyóu le
1804.english: He was fettered by his family and could not travel any longer.

1805.simplified: 许多人都相信监禁解决不了犯罪问题。
1805.traditional: 許多人都相信監禁解決不了犯罪問題。
1805.pinyin: xǔduō rén dōu xiāngxìn jiānjìn jiějué bùliǎo fànzuì wèntí
1805.english: Many people believe that prison isn't a cure for crime.

1806.simplified: 我们已经收到了对该节目的一连串投诉。
1806.traditional: 我們已經收到了對該節目的一連串投訴。
1806.pinyin: wǒmen yǐjīng shōu dàoliǎo duì gāi jié mùdì yīliánchuàn tóusù
1806.english: We have had a string of complaints about the program.

1807.simplified: 犯人从大门口的警卫身旁溜过逃走了.
1807.traditional: 犯人從大門口的警衛身旁溜過逃走了.
1807.pinyin: fànrén cóng dàmén kǒu de jǐngwèi shēn páng liū guò táozǒu le
1807.english: The prisoner slipped past the guards on the gate and escaped.

1808.simplified: 那项发现在科学界引起极大的震动。
1808.traditional: 那項發現在科學界引起極大的震動。
1808.pinyin: nà xiàng fāxiàn zài kēxuéjiè yǐnqǐ jídà de zhèndòng
1808.english: The discovery caused a tremendous commotion in the scientific world.

1809.simplified: 那个寄居者在威尔士已经逗留了两个星期。
1809.traditional: 那個寄居者在威爾士已經逗留了兩個星期。
1809.pinyin: nàge jìjū zhě zài Wēi'ěrshì yǐjīng dòuliú le liǎng gè xīngqī
1809.english: The sojourner has been in Wales for two weeks.

1810.simplified: 无轨电车的电能是通过架空线供给的。
1810.traditional: 無軌電車的電能是通過架空線供給的。
1810.pinyin: wúguǐdiànchē de diànnéng shì tōngguò jiàkōng xiàn gōngjǐ de
1810.english: The trolley bus picks up current from an overhead wire.

1811.simplified: 有些罪犯被释放后有可能重新犯罪。
1811.traditional: 有些罪犯被釋放後有可能重新犯罪。
1811.pinyin: yǒuxiē zuìfàn bèi shìfàng hòu yǒukěnéng chóngxīn fànzuì
1811.english: Some criminals are likely to offend again when they are released.

1812.simplified: 勉强他做事不是教育孩子的办法。
1812.traditional: 勉強他做事不是教育孩子的辦法。
1812.pinyin: miǎnqiǎng tā zuòshì bùshì jiàoyù háizi de bànfǎ
1812.english: It is not the way to educate a child by making him do things against his will.

1813.simplified: 教士那圆润低沉的声音在教堂里回响。
1813.traditional: 教士那圓潤低沉的聲音在教堂裡回響。
1813.pinyin: jiàoshì nà yuánrùn dīchén de shēngyīn zài jiàotáng lǐ huíxiǎng
1813.english: The sonorous voice of the priest resounded in the church.

1814.simplified: 财务上出现问题延误了我们的建设计画。
1814.traditional: 財務上出現問題延誤了我們的建設計畫。
1814.pinyin: cáiwù shàng chūxiàn wèntí yánwu le wǒmen de jiànshè jìhuà
1814.english: Financial problems have set back our building programme.

1815.simplified: 这个学生敏捷的回答得到了老师的表扬。
1815.traditional: 這個學生敏捷的回答得到了老師的表揚。
1815.pinyin: zhège xuésheng mǐnjié de huídá dé dàoliǎo lǎoshī de biǎoyáng
1815.english: The student's speedy answers were praised by the teacher.

1816.simplified: 他们跟她开玩笑, 把她往游泳池里浸了一下.
1816.traditional: 他們跟她開玩笑, 把她往游泳池裡浸了一下.
1816.pinyin: tāmen gēn tā kāiwánxiào bǎ tā wǎng yóuyǒngchí lǐ jìn le yīxià
1816.english: They dunked her in the swimming-pool as a joke.

1817.simplified: 他申请出国签证经历了很大的困难。
1817.traditional: 他申請出國簽證經歷了很大的困難。
1817.pinyin: tā shēnqǐng chūguó qiānzhèng jīnglì le hěn dà de kùnnan
1817.english: He experienced great difficulty in getting a visa to leave the country.

1818.simplified: 这个勤奋的学生每天天亮以前就起床了。
1818.traditional: 這個勤奮的學生每天天亮以前就起床了。
1818.pinyin: zhège qínfèn de xuésheng měitiān tiānliàng yǐqián jiù qǐchuáng le
1818.english: The diligent student gets up before dawn every day.

1819.simplified: 我大声打了个呵欠，可他还是不停地讲下去。
1819.traditional: 我大聲打了個呵欠，可他還是不停地講下去。
1819.pinyin: wǒ dàshēng dǎ le gè hēqiàn kě tā háishi bùtíng dì jiǎng xiàqù
1819.english: I gave a loud yawn, but he just kept on talking.

1820.simplified: 该足球队员向旁边跨步以避开对方拦截动作.
1820.traditional: 該足球隊員向旁邊跨步以避開對方攔截動作.
1820.pinyin: gāi zúqiú duìyuán xiàng pángbiān kuàbù yǐ bìkāi duìfāng lánjié dòngzuò

1821.simplified: 我在卧室里发现两只袜子, 但不成对。
1821.traditional: 我在臥室裡發現兩只襪子, 但不成對。
1821.pinyin: wǒ zài wòshì lǐ fāxiàn liǎng zhǐ wàzi dàn bùchéng duì
1821.english: I found a couple of socks in the bedroom, but they don't make a pair.

1822.simplified: 通过勤查字典，他掌握了这些单词。
1822.traditional: 通過勤查字典，他掌握了這些單詞。
1822.pinyin: tōngguò qín chá zìdiǎn tā zhǎngwò le zhèxiē dāncí
1822.english: He mastered these words through the arduous consultation of the dictionary.

1823.simplified: 精神病院常雇用男护士护理精神病人.
1823.traditional: 精神病院常雇用男護士護理精神病人.
1823.pinyin: jīngshén bìngyuàn cháng gùyòng nán hùshi hùlǐ jīngshén bìngrén
1823.english: Male nurses are often employed in hospitals for the mentally ill.

1824.simplified: 你若对我们的报价感兴趣，请与我们联系。
1824.traditional: 你若對我們的報價感興趣，請與我們聯系。
1824.pinyin: nǐ ruò duì wǒmen de bàojià gǎnxìngqù qǐng yǔ wǒmen liánxì
1824.english: Should you be interested in our offer, please contact us.

1825.simplified: 发展的主要障碍是这个国家人口太多。
1825.traditional: 發展的主要障礙是這個國家人口太多。
1825.pinyin: fāzhǎn de zhǔyào zhàng'ài shì zhège guójiā rénkǒu tài duō
1825.english: The main impediment to development is the country's large population.

1826.simplified: 突然窗帘拉了开来，一道强光照了进来。
1826.traditional: 突然窗簾拉了開來，一道強光照了進來。
1826.pinyin: tūrán chuānglián lā le kāi lái yīdào qiángguāng zhào le jìnlái
1826.english: The curtain was suddenly drawn and a bright light shone in.

1827.simplified: 警察在小偷的家里发现了一些被盗的财物。
1827.traditional: 警察在小偷的家裡發現了一些被盜的財物。
1827.pinyin: jǐngchá zài xiǎotōu de jiālǐ fāxiàn le yīxiē bèi dào de cáiwù
1827.english: The police found some stolen property in the thief's house.

1828.simplified: 殖民地的人们拿起武器反抗英国统治者。
1828.traditional: 殖民地的人們拿起武器反抗英國統治者。
1828.pinyin: zhímíndì de rénmen náqǐ wǔqì fǎnkàng Yīngguó tǒngzhìzhě
1828.english: The colonists took up weapons to rebel against the British ruler.

1829.simplified: 现代神话现代被浪漫化或普遍流行的神话
1829.traditional: 現代神話現代被浪漫化或普遍流行的神話
1829.pinyin: xiàndài shénhuà xiàndài bèi làngmàn huà huò pǔbiàn liúxíng de shénhuà
1829.english: A romanticized or popularized myth of modern times.

1830.simplified: 部长就局势的最新发展作了另一番解释。
1830.traditional: 部長就局勢的最新發展作了另一番解釋。
1830.pinyin: bùzhǎng jiù júshì de zuìxīn fāzhǎn zuò le lìngyī fān jiěshì
1830.english: The minister has put a different gloss on recent developments.

1831.simplified: 在日本，棒球比其他任何运动都受人欢迎。
1831.traditional: 在日本，棒球比其他任何運動都受人歡迎。
1831.pinyin: zài Rìběn bàngqiú bǐ qítā rènhé yùndòng dōu shòu rén huānyíng
1831.english: Baseball is more popular than any other sport in Japan.

1832.simplified: 风向的突然转变预示着暴风雨即将来临。
1832.traditional: 風向的突然轉變預示著暴風雨即將來臨。
1832.pinyin: fēngxiàng de tūrán zhuǎnbiàn yùshì zhe bàofēngyǔ jíjiāngláilín
1832.english: A sudden shift in the wind warned of the coming storm.

1833.simplified: 政治和宗教是人们平常交谈的主要话题。
1833.traditional: 政治和宗教是人們平常交談的主要話題。
1833.pinyin: zhèngzhì hé zōngjiào shì rénmen píngcháng jiāotán de zhǔyào huàtí
1833.english: Politics and religion are daily topics of conversation.

1834.simplified: 他新拍摄的电影确实受到评论家严厉的批评。
1834.traditional: 他新拍攝的電影確實受到評論家嚴厲的批評。
1834.pinyin: tā xīn pāishè de diànyǐng quèshí shòudào pínglùnjiā yánlì de pīpíng
1834.english: His new film was really panned by the critics.

1835.simplified: 这名记者因为试图揭露一个阴谋而被杀害。
1835.traditional: 這名記者因為試圖揭露一個陰謀而被殺害。
1835.pinyin: zhè míng jìzhě yīnwèi shìtú jiēlù yī gè yīnmóu ér bèi shāhài
1835.english: The reporter was killed because he tried to expose a plot.

1836.simplified: 她抬起头来，凝望着十二月份阴沉沉的天空。
1836.traditional: 她抬起頭來，凝望著十二月份陰沉沉的天空。
1836.pinyin: tā táiqǐ tóu lái níngwàng zhe shí'èryuèfèn yīnchén chén de tiānkōng
1836.english: She looked up staring at the sombre December sky.

1837.simplified: 根据解剖结果，此人死于心脏病发作。
1837.traditional: 根據解剖結果，此人死於心髒病發作。
1837.pinyin: gēnjù jiěpōu jiéguǒ cǐ rénsǐ yú xīnzàngbìng fāzuò
1837.english: According to the result of the dissection, the man died from heart attack.

1838.simplified: 你只要一看见她的脸就会明白，她是无辜的。
1838.traditional: 你只要一看見她的臉就會明白，她是無辜的。
1838.pinyin: nǐ zhǐyào yī kànjiàn tā de liǎn jiù huì míngbai tā shì wúgū de
1838.english: A glimpse of her face will tell you that she is innocent.

1839.simplified: 很多种类的动物现在已经从地球上绝迹了。
1839.traditional: 很多種類的動物現在已經從地球上絕跡了。
1839.pinyin: hěn duō zhǒnglèi de dòngwù xiànzài yǐjīng cóng dìqiú shàng juéjì le
1839.english: Many types of animals have now vanished from the earth.

1840.simplified: 那是一个以几种语言叙述的古老的故事。
1840.traditional: 那是一個以幾種語言敘述的古老的故事。
1840.pinyin: nàshi yī gè yǐ jǐ zhǒng yǔyán xùshù de gǔlǎo de gùshi
1840.english: It's an ancient tale which appears in various guises in several languages.

1841.simplified: 我们可以听到远处传来的车辆往来的嗡嗡声。
1841.traditional: 我們可以聽到遠處傳來的車輛往來的嗡嗡聲。
1841.pinyin: wǒmen kěyǐ tīngdào yuǎnchù chuánlái de chēliàng wǎnglái de wēngwēngshēng
1841.english: We could hear the distant drone of the traffic.

1842.simplified: 他并没有把这首诗的意义真正揭示出来.
1842.traditional: 他並沒有把這首詩的意義真正揭示出來.
1842.pinyin: tā bìng méiyǒu bǎ zhè shǒu shī de yìyì zhēnzhèng jiēshì chūlái
1842.english: The meaning of the poem doesn't really come out in his interpretation.

1843.simplified: 我请求他从新疆回来时给我带些葡萄干。
1843.traditional: 我請求他從新疆回來時給我帶些葡萄干。
1843.pinyin: wǒ qǐngqiú tā cóng Xīnjiāng huílai shí gěi wǒ dài xiē pútaogān
1843.english: I asked him to bring me some raisins when he returns from Xinjiang.

1844.simplified: 这家公司现在使用电脑来计算所有的帐目。
1844.traditional: 這家公司現在使用電腦來計算所有的帳目。
1844.pinyin: zhè jiā gōngsī xiànzài shǐyòng diànnǎo lái jìsuàn suǒ yǒude zhàngmù
1844.english: The company now uses a computer to do all its account.

1845.simplified: 我们经济的决定性因素是控制通货膨胀。
1845.traditional: 我們經濟的決定性因素是控制通貨膨脹。
1845.pinyin: wǒmen jīngjì de juédìngxìng yīnsù shì kòngzhì tōnghuòpéngzhàng
1845.english: The determinate factor of our economy is to control inflation.

1846.simplified: 因为我的愚蠢，我不得不站起来听他的批评。
1846.traditional: 因為我的愚蠢，我不得不站起來聽他的批評。
1846.pinyin: yīnwèi wǒ de yúchǔn wǒ bùdébù zhànqǐlai tīng tā de pīpíng
1846.english: I have to stand up listening to his criticism of my foolishness.

1847.simplified: 在以后的岁月中，他一直记着她临别时的一吻。
1847.traditional: 在以後的歲月中，他一直記著她臨別時的一吻。
1847.pinyin: zài yǐhòu de suìyuè zhōng tā yīzhí jì zhe tā línbié shí de yī wěn
1847.english: He remembered her parting kiss in the following years.

1848.simplified: 他有个主意，以纯白为背景给他们拍摄。
1848.traditional: 他有個主意，以純白為背景給他們拍攝。
1848.pinyin: tā yǒu gè zhǔyi yǐ chúnbái wéi bèijǐng gěi tāmen pāishè
1848.english: He had the idea of shooting them against a complete plain white background.

1849.simplified: 警方还未得到可捉拿这个罪犯的足够情报。
1849.traditional: 警方還未得到可捉拿這個罪犯的足夠情報。
1849.pinyin: jǐngfāng hái wèi dédào kě zhuōná zhège zuìfàn de zúgòu qíngbào
1849.english: The police haven't got enough information to catch the criminal.

1850.simplified: 这次聚会一定没意思--咱们想个法子别去了.
1850.traditional: 這次聚會一定沒意思--咱們想個法子別去了.
1850.pinyin: zhè cì jùhuì yīdìng méiyìsi zánmen xiǎng gè fǎzi bié qù le
1850.english: It's bound to be a boring party let's try to wangle out of it/going.

1851.simplified: 我们送些酬劳，对您的大力协助聊表谢意。
1851.traditional: 我們送些酬勞，對您的大力協助聊表謝意。
1851.pinyin: wǒmen sòng xiē chóuláo duì nín de dàlì xiézhù liáo biǎo xièyì
1851.english: We are sending you some money in acknowledgement of your valuable help.

1852.simplified: 据说法国人是世界上最浪漫的民族之一。
1852.traditional: 據說法國人是世界上最浪漫的民族之一。
1852.pinyin: jùshuō Fǎguórén shì shìjiè shàng zuì làngmàn de mínzú zhīyī
1852.english: It is said that Frenchmen are among the most romantic people in the world.

1853.simplified: 我在街道对面的连锁商店里买了这只面包。
1853.traditional: 我在街道對面的連鎖商店裡買了這只面包。
1853.pinyin: wǒ zài jiēdào duìmiàn de liánsuǒshāngdiàn lǐ mǎi le zhè zhǐ miànbāo
1853.english: I bought this loaf of bread in the chain store opposite the street.

1854.simplified: 女主人给我们端上来一大盘热气腾腾的饺子。
1854.traditional: 女主人給我們端上來一大盤熱氣騰騰的餃子。
1854.pinyin: nǚzhǔrén gěi wǒmen duān shànglái yī dà pán rèqìténgténg de jiǎozi
1854.english: Our hostess served up a large plate of steaming hot dumplings.

1855.simplified: 他打了个呵欠，揉了揉眼睛，就到前边屋里去了。
1855.traditional: 他打了個呵欠，揉了揉眼睛，就到前邊屋裡去了。
1855.pinyin: tā dǎ le gè hēqiàn róu le róu yǎnjing jiù dào qiánbian wū lǐ qù le
1855.english: He yawned, rubbed his eyes and went into the front room.

1856.simplified: 你或许有权要求退回去年你交付的部分税金。
1856.traditional: 你或許有權要求退回去年你交付的部分稅金。
1856.pinyin: nǐ huòxǔ yǒuquán yāoqiú tuìhuí qùnián nǐ jiāofù de bùfen shuì jīn
1856.english: You may be entitled to reclaim some of the tax you paid last year.

1857.simplified: 我们应该团结起来为消除贫穷和疾病而斗争.
1857.traditional: 我們應該團結起來為消除貧窮和疾病而斗爭.
1857.pinyin: wǒmen yīnggāi tuánjié qilai wéi xiāochú pínqióng hé jíbìng ér dòuzhēng
1857.english: We should unite in fighting/unite to fight poverty and disease.

1858.simplified: 我们从悬崖顶上的高处能看到城市的全景。
1858.traditional: 我們從懸崖頂上的高處能看到城市的全景。
1858.pinyin: wǒmen cóng xuányá dǐngshàng de gāochù néng kàn dào chéngshì de quánjǐng
1858.english: From our perch up there on top of the cliff we can see the whole town.

1859.simplified: 英格兰队如果不改进打法, 就会输掉这场比赛.
1859.traditional: 英格蘭隊如果不改進打法, 就會輸掉這場比賽.
1859.pinyin: Yīnggélán duì rúguǒ bù gǎijìn dǎfǎ jiù huì shūdiào zhè chǎng bǐsài
1859.english: Unless England improve their game they're going to lose the match.

1860.simplified: 年轻姑娘必须言词谨慎，衣着得体，行为端庄。
1860.traditional: 年輕姑娘必須言詞謹慎，衣著得體，行為端莊。
1860.pinyin: niánqīng gūniang bìxū yáncí jǐnshèn yīzhuó détǐ xíngwéi duānzhuāng
1860.english: Young girls must be modest in speech, dress and behavior.

1861.simplified: 天气干旱了这么久，这场雨成了农民的救星。
1861.traditional: 天氣干旱了這麼久，這場雨成了農民的救星。
1861.pinyin: tiānqì gānhàn le zhème jiǔ zhè chǎng yǔ chéngle nóngmín de jiùxīng
1861.english: After so much dry weather, the rain has been the farmer's salvation.

1862.simplified: 我对发生的每件事的细枝末节都记得清清楚楚。
1862.traditional: 我對發生的每件事的細枝末節都記得清清楚楚。
1862.pinyin: wǒ duì fāshēng de měi jiàn shì de xìzhīmòjié dōu jìde qīng qīngchu chǔ
1862.english: I had remembered in minute detail everything that had happened.

1863.simplified: 想在这样大的暴风雪中去爬山简直是疯狂。
1863.traditional: 想在這樣大的暴風雪中去爬山簡直是瘋狂。
1863.pinyin: xiǎng zài zhèyàng dà de bàofēngxuě zhōng qù páshān jiǎnzhí shì fēngkuáng
1863.english: It would be madness to try to climb the mountain in such a snowstorm.

1864.simplified: 签定这一协议是两国关系加强的序幕。
1864.traditional: 簽定這一協議是兩國關系加強的序幕。
1864.pinyin: qiāndìng zhè yī xiéyì shì liǎngguóguānxì jiāqiáng de xùmù
1864.english: The signing of the agreement was a prologue to better relations between the two countries.

1865.simplified: 新法令授予警察可以在街上截停任何人的权利。
1865.traditional: 新法令授予警察可以在街上截停任何人的權利。
1865.pinyin: xīn fǎlìng shòuyǔ jǐngchá kěyǐ zài jiēshang jié tíng rènhé rén de quánlì
1865.english: The new laws empower the police to stop anybody in the street.

1866.simplified: 他们在恶劣的天气条件下登上了山的顶峰。
1866.traditional: 他們在惡劣的天氣條件下登上了山的頂峰。
1866.pinyin: tāmen zài èliè de tiānqì tiáojiàn xià dēngshàng le shān de dǐngfēng
1866.english: They climbed up the last part of the mountain in formidable weather conditions.

1867.simplified: 他们把自己的家变成了无家可归的孤儿们的避难所。
1867.traditional: 他們把自己的家變成了無家可歸的孤兒們的避難所。
1867.pinyin: tāmen bǎ zìjǐ de jiā biànchéng le wújiākěguī de gū'ér men de bìnànsuǒ
1867.english: They have made their home a haven for the homeless orphans.

1868.simplified: 将军推测说敌人将于今天晚上突袭我们。
1868.traditional: 將軍推測說敵人將於今天晚上突襲我們。
1868.pinyin: jiāngjūn tuīcè shuō dírén jiāng yú jīntiān wǎnshang tūxí wǒmen
1868.english: The general conjectures that the enemy will launch an attack against us this night.

1869.simplified: 他们探索过各种途径，但是没有找到解决的办法。
1869.traditional: 他們探索過各種途徑，但是沒有找到解決的辦法。
1869.pinyin: tāmen tànsuǒ guò gèzhǒng tújìng dànshì méiyǒu zhǎodào jiějué de bànfǎ
1869.english: They exploded every avenue but could not find a solution.

1870.simplified: 他因未对事故进行汇报而受到委员会的批评。
1870.traditional: 他因未對事故進行匯報而受到委員會的批評。
1870.pinyin: tā yīn wèi duì shìgù jìnxíng huìbào ér shòudào wěiyuánhuì de pīpíng
1870.english: He was criticized by the committee for failing to report the accident.

1871.simplified: 我父母发现窗子被打破后，一定会有一番斥责。
1871.traditional: 我父母發現窗子被打破後，一定會有一番斥責。
1871.pinyin: wǒ fùmǔ fāxiàn chuāngzi bèi dǎpò hòu yīdìng huì yǒu yī fān chìzé
1871.english: There is sure to be a fuss when my parents find the window is broken.

1872.simplified: 政府在独立的问题上采取了毫不妥协的态度。
1872.traditional: 政府在獨立的問題上采取了毫不妥協的態度。
1872.pinyin: zhèngfǔ zài dúlì de wèntí shàng cǎiqǔ le háobù tuǒxié de tàidu
1872.english: The government adopted an uncompromising posture on the issue of independence.

1873.simplified: 税务法非常复杂，只有专家才能解释清楚。
1873.traditional: 稅務法非常復雜，只有專家才能解釋清楚。
1873.pinyin: shuìwù fǎ fēicháng fùzá zhǐyǒu zhuānjiā cáinéng jiěshì qīngchu
1873.english: The tax laws are so complicated that only an expert can provide enlightenment.

1874.simplified: 她戴了那么多首饰，看上去象是包在金子里似的。
1874.traditional: 她戴了那麼多首飾，看上去象是包在金子裡似的。
1874.pinyin: tā dài le nàme duō shǒushì kànshangqu xiàng shì bāo zài jīnzi lǐ shìde
1874.english: She wore so much jewellery that she seemed to be covered in gold.

1875.simplified: 我们正考虑在这样的事情上给他们更多的发言权。
1875.traditional: 我們正考慮在這樣的事情上給他們更多的發言權。
1875.pinyin: wǒmen zhèng kǎolǜ zài zhèyàng de shìqing shàng gěi tāmen gèng duō de fāyánquán
1875.english: We are considering giving them greater say in such matters.

1876.simplified: 拉丁语系, 例如法语, 意大利语, 都起源于拉丁语。
1876.traditional: 拉丁語系, 例如法語, 意大利語, 都起源於拉丁語。
1876.pinyin: lādīng yǔxì lìrú Fǎyǔ Yìdàlìyǔ dōu qǐyuán yú Lādīngyǔ
1876.english: The Roman languages such as French, Italian, are all derived from Latin.

1877.simplified: 在合作社中, 利润是在全体劳动者中进行分配的.
1877.traditional: 在合作社中, 利潤是在全體勞動者中進行分配的.
1877.pinyin: zài hézuòshè zhōng lìrùn shì zài quántǐ láodòngzhě zhōng jìnxíng fēnpèi de
1877.english: In a co-operative profits are distributed among the work-force.

1878.simplified: 他从巴黎回来，发现他的办公室被别人占了。
1878.traditional: 他從巴黎回來，發現他的辦公室被別人佔了。
1878.pinyin: tā cóng Bālí huílai fāxiàn tā de bàngōngshì bèi biéren zhàn le
1878.english: He returned from Paris and found his office was under someone else's occupation.

1879.simplified: 她在科学方面的倾向性在孩童时代就已显现出来。
1879.traditional: 她在科學方面的傾向性在孩童時代就已顯現出來。
1879.pinyin: tā zài kēxué fāngmiàn de qīngxiàngxìng zài háitóng shídài jiù yǐ xiǎnxiàn chūlái
1879.english: Her scientific bias showed itself in early childhood.

1880.simplified: 他同时具有创造性想象力和真正的治学谨严学风。
1880.traditional: 他同時具有創造性想象力和真正的治學謹嚴學風。
1880.pinyin: tā tóngshí jùyǒu chuàngzàoxìng xiǎngxiànglì hé zhēnzhèng de zhìxué jǐnyán xuéfēng
1880.english: He combines creative imagination and true scholarship.

1881.simplified: 这个国家同意为了共同的安全而与邻国结盟。
1881.traditional: 這個國家同意為了共同的安全而與鄰國結盟。
1881.pinyin: zhège guójiā tóngyì wèile gòngtóng de ānquán ér yǔ línguó jiéméng
1881.english: The country agreed to confederate with the neighboring country for mutual safety.

1882.simplified: 这个地方笼罩在神秘气氛下，继续使游览者着迷。
1882.traditional: 這個地方籠罩在神秘氣氛下，繼續使游覽者著迷。
1882.pinyin: zhège dìfang lǒngzhào zài shénmì qìfēn xià jìxù shǐ yóulǎn zhě zháomí
1882.english: The place continues to fascinate visitors, cloaked in its mystery.

1883.simplified: 看到我的生日礼物受到极大的赞赏，我感到高兴。
1883.traditional: 看到我的生日禮物受到極大的贊賞，我感到高興。
1883.pinyin: kàn dào wǒ de shēngrì lǐwù shòudào jídà de zànshǎng wǒ gǎndào gāoxìng
1883.english: I was gratified to see how much my birthday present was appreciated.

1884.simplified: 我们只能做些较小的让步，但这就可能打破僵局。
1884.traditional: 我們只能做些較小的讓步，但這就可能打破僵局。
1884.pinyin: wǒmen zhǐnéng zuò xiē jiào xiǎode ràngbù dàn zhè jiù kěnéng dǎpò jiāngjú
1884.english: We can only make minor concessions, but it might break the deadlock.

1885.simplified: 许多富商靠极其残酷地践踏别人而爬了上去。
1885.traditional: 許多富商靠極其殘酷地踐踏別人而爬了上去。
1885.pinyin: xǔduō fùshāng kào jíqí cánkù dì jiàntà biéren ér pá le shàngqù
1885.english: Many a rich businessman reached the top by trampling on others in the most brutal way.

1886.simplified: 组织这样大规模的聚会要花费许多时间和精力。
1886.traditional: 組織這樣大規模的聚會要花費許多時間和精力。
1886.pinyin: zǔzhī zhèyàng dàguīmó de jùhuì yào huāfèi xǔduō shíjiān hé jīnglì
1886.english: The organization of such a large-scale party takes a lot of time and energy.

1887.simplified: 不论何时我到台北，我一定去参观故宫博物院。
1887.traditional: 不論何時我到台北，我一定去參觀故宮博物院。
1887.pinyin: bùlùn héshí wǒ dào Táiběi wǒ yīdìng qù cānguān Gùgōng Bówùyuàn
1887.english: Whenever I go to Taipei, I make a point of visiting the National Palace Museum.

1888.simplified: 他这个人很没意思, 在聚会上我总是对他退避三舍.
1888.traditional: 他這個人很沒意思, 在聚會上我總是對他退避三舍.
1888.pinyin: tā zhège rén hěn méiyìsi zài jùhuì shàng wǒ zǒngshì duì tā tuìbìsānshè
1888.english: He's so boring that I always try to give him a wide berth at parties.

1889.simplified: 因为地震，每天飞往这个城市的航班暂停了。
1889.traditional: 因為地震，每天飛往這個城市的航班暫停了。
1889.pinyin: yīnwèi dìzhèn měitiān fēi wǎng zhège chéngshì de hángbān zàntíng le
1889.english: The daily flight to the city has been temporarily suspended because of the earthquake.

1890.simplified: 他们正在恶狠狠地争吵，我想他们可能要打架了。
1890.traditional: 他們正在惡狠狠地爭吵，我想他們可能要打架了。
1890.pinyin: tāmen zhèngzài èhěnhěn dì zhēngchǎo wǒ xiǎng tāmen kěnéng yào dǎjià le
1890.english: They were having a fierce argument and I thought they might hit each other.

1891.simplified: 我申请加入排球队时给教练留下了良好的印象。
1891.traditional: 我申請加入排球隊時給教練留下了良好的印象。
1891.pinyin: wǒ shēnqǐng jiārù pái qiúduì shí gěi jiàoliàn liúxià le liánghǎo de yìnxiàng
1891.english: I had made on the coach a good impression when I went out for volleyball.

1892.simplified: 他还告诉我说你的辅导课和讨论课出勤率不高。
1892.traditional: 他還告訴我說你的輔導課和討論課出勤率不高。
1892.pinyin: tā hái gàosu wǒ shuō nǐ de fǔdǎo kè hé tǎolùn kè chūqín lǜ bù gāo
1892.english: He also tells me that your attendance at his tutorial and seminar have been poor.

1893.simplified: 抵押款提高了，其中一部分可由免税额增加而抵消。
1893.traditional: 抵押款提高了，其中一部分可由免稅額增加而抵消。
1893.pinyin: dǐyā kuǎn tígāo le qízhōng yībùfèn kě yóu miǎnshuì é zēngjiā ér dǐxiāo
1893.english: Higher mortgage rates are partly offset by increased tax allowances.

1894.simplified: 社会公益服务机构和当地医生应该加强协作。
1894.traditional: 社會公益服務機構和當地醫生應該加強協作。
1894.pinyin: shèhuì gōngyì fúwù jīgòu hé dāngdì yīshēng yīnggāi jiāqiáng xiézuò
1894.english: There should be a lot more interaction between the social services and local doctors.

1895.simplified: 如果班上的人数多，老师就不能给予个别辅导了。
1895.traditional: 如果班上的人數多，老師就不能給予個別輔導了。
1895.pinyin: rúguǒ bānshàng de rénshù duō lǎoshī jiù bùnéng jǐyǔ gèbié fǔdǎo le
1895.english: A teacher can't give individual attention to each pupil if his class is large.

1896.simplified: 最近的丑闻给政府的反对派提供了大量的炮弹。
1896.traditional: 最近的丑聞給政府的反對派提供了大量的炮彈。
1896.pinyin: rúguǒ bānshàng de rénshù duō lǎoshī jiù bùnéng jǐyǔ gèbié fǔdǎo le
1896.english: The recent scandal has provided the government's opponents with plenty of ammunition.

1897.simplified: 一位稀有昆虫采集家将给我们看一些他的最新发现。
1897.traditional: 一位稀有昆蟲采集家將給我們看一些他的最新發現。
1897.pinyin: yī wèi xīyǒu kūnchóng cǎijí jiā jiāng gěi wǒmen kàn yīxiē tā de zuìxīn fāxiàn
1897.english: A collector of rare insects will show us some of his latest discoveries.

1898.simplified: 他偷脚踏车是事实，但他并不像你所想的那样坏。
1898.traditional: 他偷腳踏車是事實，但他並不像你所想的那樣壞。
1898.pinyin: tā tōu jiǎotàchē shì shìshí dàn tā bìngbù xiàng nǐ suǒxiǎng de nàyàng huài
1898.english: It is true that he stole the bicycle, but he is not so bad as you might think.

1899.simplified: 我认为直截了当地告诉他这个坏消息倒是友好的行为。
1899.traditional: 我認為直截了當地告訴他這個壞消息倒是友好的行為。
1899.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi zhíjié le dāngdì gàosu tā zhège huài xiāoxi dàoshi yǒuhǎo de xíngwéi
1899.english: I think it would be a kindness to tell him the bad news straight away.

1900.simplified: 干旱少雨使原本就很严重的粮食短缺问题更加严重。
1900.traditional: 干旱少雨使原本就很嚴重的糧食短缺問題更加嚴重。
1900.pinyin: gānhàn shǎo yǔ shǐ yuánběn jiù hěn yánzhòng de liángshi duǎnquē wèntí gèngjiā yánzhòng
1900.english: The lack of rain aggravated the already serious shortage of food.

1901.simplified: 医生定期到这家进行拜访，检查婴儿有没有问题。
1901.traditional: 醫生定期到這家進行拜訪，檢查嬰兒有沒有問題。
1901.pinyin: yīshēng dìngqī dào zhè jiā jìnxíng bàifǎng jiǎnchá yīng'ér yǒu méiyǒu wèntí
1901.english: The doctor made periodic visit to the house to see if the baby was all right.

1902.simplified: 我认为咱们不在家时不能把孩子都硬塞给你父母看管。
1902.traditional: 我認為咱們不在家時不能把孩子都硬塞給你父母看管。
1902.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi zánmen bùzài jiā shí bùnéng bǎ háizi dōu yìng sāigěi nǐ fùmǔ kānguǎn
1902.english: I don't think we can wish the children on your parents while we're away.

1903.simplified: 节目涉及从流行音乐到京剧这样形形色色的题材。
1903.traditional: 節目涉及從流行音樂到京劇這樣形形色色的題材。
1903.pinyin: jiémù shèjí cóng liúxíngyīnyuè dào Jīngjù zhèyàng xíngxíngsèsè de tícái
1903.english: The program deals with subjects as diverse as pop music and Beijing Opera.

1904.simplified: 恰恰就在我登上公共汽车踏板的时候，车子开动了。
1904.traditional: 恰恰就在我登上公共汽車踏板的時候，車子開動了。
1904.pinyin: qiàqià jiù zài wǒ dēngshàng gōnggòngqìchē tàbǎn de shíhou chēzi kāidòng le
1904.english: At the precise moment that I put my foot on the step, the bus started.

1905.simplified: 她的考试成绩令人失望，但却装出若无其事的样子。
1905.traditional: 她的考試成績令人失望，但卻裝出若無其事的樣子。
1905.pinyin: tā de kǎoshì chéngjì lìngrén shīwàng dàn què zhuāngchū ruòwúqíshì de yàngzi
1905.english: Her exam result was disappointing but she tried to put a brave face on it.

1906.simplified: 经过连续几次的失败，他最后终于通过了驾驶考试。
1906.traditional: 經過連續幾次的失敗，他最後終於通過了駕駛考試。
1906.pinyin: jīngguò liánxù jǐcì de shībài tā zuìhòu zhōngyú tōngguò le jiàshǐ kǎoshì
1906.english: After a series of unsuccessful attempts, he has finally passed the driving test.

1907.simplified: 起初她威胁要解雇我们所有的人，但是后来她态度软化了。
1907.traditional: 起初她威脅要解雇我們所有的人，但是後來她態度軟化了。
1907.pinyin: qǐchū tā wēixié yào jiěgù wǒmen suǒyǒu de rén dànshì hòulái tā tàidu ruǎnhuà le
1907.english: At first she threatened to dismiss us all, but later she relented.

1908.simplified: 国民财富在很大程度上取决于一个国家的教育水准。
1908.traditional: 國民財富在很大程度上取決於一個國家的教育水准。
1908.pinyin: guómín cáifù zài hěn dà chéngdù shàng qǔjué yú yī gè guójiā de jiàoyù shuǐzhǔn
1908.english: National wealth depends to a high degree on a country's educational standard.

1909.simplified: 我的周末过得很无聊--只是在屋子里 转转或者看看电视.
1909.traditional: 我的周末過得很無聊--只是在屋子裡 轉轉或者看看電視.
1909.pinyin: wǒ de zhōumò guò dehěn wúliáo zhǐshì zài wūzi lǐ zhuànzhuan huòzhě kànkan diànshì
1909.english: My weekend was boring I just floated about (the house) or watched TV.

1910.simplified: 马路上来往的车辆声音不断地破坏我们家的安宁。
1910.traditional: 馬路上來往的車輛聲音不斷地破壞我們家的安寧。
1910.pinyin: mǎ lùshang láiwǎng de chēliàng shēngyīn bùduàn dì pòhuài wǒmen jiāde ānníng
1910.english: The noise of cars passing along the road is a continual disturbance to our quiet at home.

1911.simplified: 她用毫无表情的声调回答问题，甚至连眼睛都不抬起。
1911.traditional: 她用毫無表情的聲調回答問題，甚至連眼睛都不抬起。
1911.pinyin: tā yòng háowú biǎoqíng de shēngdiào huídá wèntí shènzhì lián yǎnjing dōu bù táiqǐ
1911.english: She answered in a flat little voice and didn't even raised her eyes.

1912.simplified: 今天的报纸上有一篇关于办公室里的性骚扰的报道。
1912.traditional: 今天的報紙上有一篇關於辦公室裡的性騷擾的報道。
1912.pinyin: jīntiān de bàozhǐ shàng yǒu yī piān guānyú bàngōngshì lǐ de xìngsāorǎo de bàodào
1912.english: There is a report about a sexual harassment in the office on this newspaper.

1913.simplified: 他们支持日本接管德国以前在山东省的所有权益。
1913.traditional: 他們支持日本接管德國以前在山東省的所有權益。
1913.pinyin: tāmen zhīchí Rìběn jiēguǎn Déguó yǐqián zài Shāndōng Shěng de suǒyǒuquán yì
1913.english: They supported Japan's take over of all the former German interests in Shandong Province.

1914.simplified: 我愿借此机会感谢每一位为这个项目辛勤工作的人。
1914.traditional: 我願借此機會感謝每一位為這個項目辛勤工作的人。
1914.pinyin: wǒ yuàn jiècǐ jīhuì gǎnxiè měiyī wèi wéi zhège xiàngmù xīnqín gōngzuò de rén
1914.english: I'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work on the project.

1915.simplified: 首都一片平静，然而据报道在别的地方仍有持续的骚乱。
1915.traditional: 首都一片平靜，然而據報道在別的地方仍有持續的騷亂。
1915.pinyin: shǒudū yīpiàn píngjìng rán'ér jùbàodào zài biéde dìfang réng yǒu chíxù de sāoluàn
1915.english: The capital is calm, but continuing disorder has been reported elsewhere.

1916.simplified: 学习英语和德语等现代语言比学习拉丁语更为有用。
1916.traditional: 學習英語和德語等現代語言比學習拉丁語更為有用。
1916.pinyin: xuéxí Yīngyǔ hé Déyǔ děng xiàndài yǔyán bǐ xuéxí Lādīngyǔ gèngwéi yǒuyòng
1916.english: It's more useful to learn modern languages, such as English and German, than Latin.

1917.simplified: 我怀疑在我有生之年这个国家会不会出现一位女总统。
1917.traditional: 我懷疑在我有生之年這個國家會不會出現一位女總統。
1917.pinyin: wǒ huáiyí zài wǒ yǒu shēng zhī nián zhège guójiā huìbùhuì chūxiàn yī wèi nǚ zǒngtǒng
1917.english: I doubt if there will be a female president in this country in my lifetime.

1918.simplified: 节目中的暴力场面和难听的粗话使许多观众感到震惊。
1918.traditional: 節目中的暴力場面和難聽的粗話使許多觀眾感到震驚。
1918.pinyin: jiémù zhòngdì bàolì chǎngmiàn hé nántīng de cūhuà shǐ xǔduō guānzhòng gǎndào zhènjīng
1918.english: The violence and bad language in the program shocked many of the viewers.

1919.simplified: 陪审团的全体成员，你们现在必须退下去考虑应如何裁决。
1919.traditional: 陪審團的全體成員，你們現在必須退下去考慮應如何裁決。
1919.pinyin: péishěntuán de quántǐ chéngyuán nǐmen xiànzài bìxū tuì xiàqù kǎolǜ yīng rúhé cáijué
1919.english: Members of the jury, you must now retire to consider your verdict.

1920.simplified: 中国人民正在努力工作，把国家建设得更加富饶美丽。
1920.traditional: 中國人民正在努力工作，把國家建設得更加富饒美麗。
1920.pinyin: Zhōngguó rénmín zhèngzài nǔlì gōngzuò bǎ guójiā jiànshè dé gèngjiā fùráo měilì
1920.english: Chinese people are working hard to make the country richer and more beautiful.

1921.simplified: 若非认识我们这位好朋友，我们的生活一定十分不妙。
1921.traditional: 若非認識我們這位好朋友，我們的生活一定十分不妙。
1921.pinyin: ruòfēi rènshi wǒmen zhèwèi hǎopéngyou wǒmen de shēnghuó yīdìng shífēn bùmiào
1921.english: Our lives would have been greatly impoverished, if we had not known our dear friend.

1922.simplified: 这个政治家发现饥饿的孩子们可怜的哭声让人不忍心听下去。
1922.traditional: 這個政治家發現飢餓的孩子們可憐的哭聲讓人不忍心聽下去。
1922.pinyin: zhège zhèngzhìjiā fāxiàn jī'è de háizimen kělián de kūshēng ràng rén bùrěn xīn tīng xiàqù
1922.english: The politician found the piteous cries of the starving children unbearable.

1923.simplified: 当他穿着全套大礼服露面的时候，显得和整个场合很不协调。
1923.traditional: 當他穿著全套大禮服露面的時候，顯得和整個場合很不協調。
1923.pinyin: dāng tā chuānzhuó quántào dà lǐfú lòumiàn de shíhou xiǎnde hé zhěnggè chǎnghé hěn bùxiétiáo
1923.english: He looked rather out of place when he turned up in full ceremonial rig.

1924.simplified: 当一个人一旦认为自己是有意思的时候，他就不再是有意思的人了。
1924.traditional: 當一個人一旦認為自己是有意思的時候，他就不再是有意思的人了。
1924.pinyin: dāng yīgèrén yīdàn rènwéi zìjǐ shì yǒuyìsi de shíhou tā jiù bùzài shì yǒuyìsi de rén le
1924.english: The minute a man is convinced that he is interesting, he is not.

1925.simplified: 撞船事故发生地区的所有船只都参加了搜寻幸存者的工作。
1925.traditional: 撞船事故發生地區的所有船只都參加了搜尋幸存者的工作。
1925.pinyin: zhuàng chuán shìgù fāshēng dìqū de suǒyǒu chuánzhī dōu cānjiā le sōuxún xìngcúnzhě de gōngzuò
1925.english: All the ships in the vicinity of the crash joined in the search for survivors.

1926.simplified: 第一只小鸟醒来了，男孩还能听见珍珠鸡在他的前边叫着。
1926.traditional: 第一只小鳥醒來了，男孩還能聽見珍珠雞在他的前邊叫著。
1926.pinyin: dìyī zhǐ xiǎo niǎo xǐnglái le nánhái hái néng tīngjiàn zhēnzhū jī zài tā de qiánbian jiào zhe
1926.english: The first bird woke and the boy could hear the guinea-fowl calling ahead of him.

1927.simplified: 他们谈到人们如何在政治问题上使用及滥用数字来混淆视听。
1927.traditional: 他們談到人們如何在政治問題上使用及濫用數字來混淆視聽。
1927.pinyin: tāmen tándào rénmen rúhé zài zhèngzhì wèntí shàng shǐyòng jí lànyòng shùzì lái hùnxiáoshìtīng
1927.english: They talked about how the uses and abuses of figures to prove things in politics.

1928.simplified: 他由于忘了带钥匙，便以简单的应急办法从窗户爬进屋里。
1928.traditional: 他由於忘了帶鑰匙，便以簡單的應急辦法從窗戶爬進屋裡。

2035.english: He told the photographers to stop pestering him.

2036.simplified: 我在晚会上丢失了水晶项链。
2036.traditional: 我在晚會上丟失了水晶項鏈。
2036.pinyin: wǒ zài wǎnhuì shàng diūshī le shuǐjīng xiàngliàn
2036.english: I lost my crystal necklace at the party.

2037.simplified: 铅会在相当低的温度下熔化。
2037.traditional: 鉛會在相當低的溫度下熔化。
2037.pinyin: wǒ zài wǎnhuì shàng diūshī le shuǐjīng xiàngliàn
2037.english: Lead will fuse at quite a low temperature.

2038.simplified: 我们听见远处隆隆的雷声。
2038.traditional: 我們聽見遠處隆隆的雷聲。
2038.pinyin: wǒmen tīngjiàn yuǎnchù lónglóng de léishēng
2038.english: We heard the thunder growling in the distance.

2039.simplified: 在旧社会，贵族们生活奢侈。
2039.traditional: 在舊社會，貴族們生活奢侈。
2039.pinyin: zài jiù shèhuì guìzú men shēnghuó shēchǐ
2039.english: In old society, the gentry lived in luxury.

2040.simplified: 这辆汽车焊接了一个新的翼子板。
2040.traditional: 這輛汽車焊接了一個新的翼子板。
2040.pinyin: zhè liàng qìchē hànjiē le yī gè xīn de yìzibǎn
2040.english: The car has had a new wing welded on.

2041.simplified: 胶囊里充满了可溶的小颗粒。
2041.traditional: 膠囊裡充滿了可溶的小顆粒。
2041.pinyin: jiāonáng lǐ chōngmǎn le kěróng de xiǎo kēlì
2041.english: The capsule is filled with small soluble cases.

2042.simplified: 在内阁会议上讨论了这个问题。
2042.traditional: 在內閣會議上討論了這個問題。
2042.pinyin: zài nèigé huìyì shàng tǎolùn le zhège wèntí
2042.english: The question was discussed in cabinet.

2043.simplified: 声音通过空气这一媒介传播。
2043.traditional: 聲音通過空氣這一媒介傳播。
2043.pinyin: shēngyīn tōngguò kōngqì zhè yī méijiè chuánbō
2043.english: Sound travels through the medium of air.

2044.simplified: 水沿山泻下，形成一条瀑布。
2044.traditional: 水沿山瀉下，形成一條瀑布。
2044.pinyin: shuǐ yán shān xiè xià xíngchéng yī tiáo pùbù
2044.english: The water formed a cascade down the mountain.

2045.simplified: 咱们考虑一下搬家的利弊吧。
2045.traditional: 咱們考慮一下搬家的利弊吧。
2045.pinyin: zánmen kǎolǜ yīxià bānjiā de lìbì ba
2045.english: Let's consider the pluses and minuses of moving house.

2046.simplified: 割草晾晒的活儿很累, 干一会儿就饿了.
2046.traditional: 割草晾曬的活兒很累, 干一會兒就餓了.
2046.pinyin: gēcǎo liàng shài de huór hěn lèi gàn yīhuìr jiù è le

2047.simplified: 我喜欢看那个魔术师的表演。
2047.traditional: 我喜歡看那個魔術師的表演。
2047.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan kàn nàge móshùshī de biǎoyǎn
2047.english: I like watching the performance of that magician.

2048.simplified: 要是站起来, 能把独木舟弄翻.
2048.traditional: 要是站起來, 能把獨木舟弄翻.
2048.pinyin: yàoshi zhànqǐlai néng bǎ dúmùzhōu nòng fān
2048.english: If you stand up you'll overbalance the canoe.

2049.simplified: 因风雪交加道路上混乱不堪.
2049.traditional: 因風雪交加道路上混亂不堪.
2049.pinyin: yīn fēng xuě jiāojiā dàolù shàng hùnluàn bùkān
2049.english: The wintry weather has caused chaos on the roads.

2050.simplified: 这件事情在他的管辖权限之内。
2050.traditional: 這件事情在他的管轄權限之內。
2050.pinyin: zhè jiàn shìqing zài tā de guǎnxiá quánxiàn zhīnèi
2050.english: This affair is within his jurisdiction.

2051.simplified: 一只老鼠从黑暗的洞口跑出。
2051.traditional: 一只老鼠從黑暗的洞口跑出。
2051.pinyin: yī zhǐ lǎoshǔ cóng hēi'àn de dòngkǒu pǎochū
2051.english: A mouse ran out from the dark orifice of the cave.

2052.simplified: 他一转旋钮，声音就变小了。
2052.traditional: 他一轉旋鈕，聲音就變小了。
2052.pinyin: tā yī zhuàn xuánniǔ shēngyīn jiù biàn xiǎo le
2052.english: As he turned the knob, the sound diminished.

2053.simplified: 我们设法寻找遮蔽暴风雨的地方。
2053.traditional: 我們設法尋找遮蔽暴風雨的地方。
2053.pinyin: wǒmen shèfǎ xúnzhǎo zhēbì bàofēngyǔ de dìfang
2053.english: We tried to find cover from the storm.

2054.simplified: 金刚砂是非常坚硬的金属物质。
2054.traditional: 金剛砂是非常堅硬的金屬物質。
2054.pinyin: jīngāngshā shì fēicháng jiānyìng de jīnshǔ wùzhì
2054.english: The emery is a hard metallic substance.

2055.simplified: 小孩穿着紧绷的靴子很难受。
2055.traditional: 小孩穿著緊繃的靴子很難受。
2055.pinyin: xiǎohái chuānzhuó jǐnbēng de xuēzi hěn nánshòu
2055.english: The child was uncomfortable in his tight boots.

2056.simplified: 咱们去吃点冰淇淋凉快凉快吧。
2056.traditional: 咱們去吃點冰淇淋涼快涼快吧。
2056.pinyin: zánmen qù chī diǎn bīngqílín liángkuai liángkuai ba
2056.english: Let's go and have icecream to cool off.

2057.simplified: 哄孩子们去睡可不是容易的事。
2057.traditional: 哄孩子們去睡可不是容易的事。
2057.pinyin: hǒng háizimen qù shuì kěbushì róngyì de shì
2057.english: It was hard work getting the children off to bed.

2058.simplified: 别相信他，他像老狐狸一样狡猾。
2058.traditional: 別相信他，他像老狐狸一樣狡猾。
2058.pinyin: bié xiāngxìn tā tā xiàng lǎohúli yīyàng jiǎohuá
2058.english: Don't trust him, he is a sly old fox.

2059.simplified: 在麻醉剂的作用下我感到舒服些。
2059.traditional: 在麻醉劑的作用下我感到舒服些。
2059.pinyin: zài mázuìjì de zuòyòng xià wǒ gǎndào shūfu xiē
2059.english: I felt comfortable on narcotic effect.

2060.simplified: 银行拒绝再贷款给这家公司。
2060.traditional: 銀行拒絕再貸款給這家公司。
2060.pinyin: yínháng jùjué zài dàikuǎn gěi zhè jiā gōngsī
2060.english: The bank refused further credits to the company.

2061.simplified: 杰逊看到我, 立即从马上下来。
2061.traditional: 傑遜看到我, 立即從馬上下來。
2061.pinyin: jié xùn kàn dào wǒ lìjí cóng mǎshàng xiàlai
2061.english: Jason saw me and got off the horse immediately.

2062.simplified: 我们十分清楚形势的严峻性。
2062.traditional: 我們十分清楚形勢的嚴峻性。
2062.pinyin: wǒmen shífēn qīngchu xíngshì de yánjùn xìng
2062.english: We are fully aware of the gravity of the situation.

2063.simplified: 他打开窗户，放出污浊的空气。
2063.traditional: 他打開窗戶，放出污濁的空氣。
2063.pinyin: tā dǎkāi chuānghu fàngchū wūzhuó de kōngqì
2063.english: He opened the window to let out the foul air.

2064.simplified: 政府颁布了发行一种纸币的法令。
2064.traditional: 政府頒布了發行一種紙幣的法令。
2064.pinyin: zhèngfǔ bānbù le fāxíng yīzhǒng zhǐbì de fǎlìng
2064.english: Government has decreed a paper currency.

2065.simplified: 他从商店里得到了几张优惠券。
2065.traditional: 他從商店裡得到了幾張優惠券。
2065.pinyin: tā cóng shāngdiàn lǐ dé dàoliǎo jǐ zhāng yōuhuìquàn
2065.english: He redeemed several coupons at the store.

2066.simplified: 他的绘画正在展览会上展出。
2066.traditional: 他的繪畫正在展覽會上展出。
2066.pinyin: tā de huìhuà zhèngzài zhǎnlǎnhuì shàng zhǎnchū
2066.english: His paintings are on display at the exhibition.

2067.pinyin: zhè fángjiān cháng yīngchǐ kuān yīngchǐ
2067.english: The room is 15 feet in length and 10 feet in breadth.

2068.simplified: 这种病的症状是发烧与呕吐.
2068.traditional: 這種病的症狀是發燒與嘔吐.
2068.pinyin: zhèzhǒng bìng de zhèngzhuàng shì fāshāo yǔ ǒutù
2068.english: The symptoms of this disease are fever and sickness.

2069.simplified: 对他来说，非洲是一片神秘的土地。
2069.traditional: 對他來說，非洲是一片神秘的土地。
2069.pinyin: duì tā láishuō Fēizhōu shì yīpiàn shénmì de tǔdì
2069.english: Africa is a mysterious land to him.

2070.simplified: 观众必须于序曲演奏前入座。
2070.traditional: 觀眾必須於序曲演奏前入座。
2070.pinyin: guānzhòng bìxū yú xùqǔ yǎnzòu qián rùzuò
2070.english: The audience must be in their seats before the overture.

2071.simplified: 她用海绵把地板 使劲儿擦了一遍.
2071.traditional: 她用海綿把地板 使勁兒擦了一遍.
2071.pinyin: tā yòng hǎimián bǎ dìbǎn shǐjìnr cā le yībiàn
2071.english: She gave the floor a vigorous sponge all over.

2072.simplified: 老师正在审阅汤姆的英语答卷。
2072.traditional: 老師正在審閱湯姆的英語答卷。
2072.pinyin: lǎoshī zhèngzài shěnyuè Tāngmǔ de Yīngyǔ dájuàn
2072.english: The teacher is reading Tom's English paper.

2073.simplified: 这些年，他干了许多可耻的事情。
2073.traditional: 這些年，他干了許多可恥的事情。
2073.pinyin: zhèxiē nián tā gàn le xǔduō kěchǐ de shìqing
2073.english: He has done many dishonorable things these years

2074.simplified: 在我们学校几乎没有人懂得丹麦语。
2074.traditional: 在我們學校幾乎沒有人懂得丹麥語。
2074.pinyin: zài wǒmen xuéxiào jīhū méiyǒu rén dǒngde Dānmài yǔ
2074.english: Few people know Danish in our school.

2075.simplified: 这个年轻的姑娘长着一双杏眼。
2075.traditional: 這個年輕的姑娘長著一雙杏眼。
2075.pinyin: zhège niánqīng de gūniang cháng zhe yī shuāng xìngyǎn
2075.english: The young girl has a pair of almond eyes.

2076.simplified: 倒果汁前，先把瓶子摇几下。
2076.traditional: 倒果汁前，先把瓶子搖幾下。
2076.pinyin: dǎo guǒzhī qián xiān bǎ píngzi yáo jǐ xià
2076.english: Give the bottle a couple of shakes before pouring the juice.

2077.simplified: 他像老虎一样悄悄潜近他的猎物。
2077.traditional: 他像老虎一樣悄悄潛近他的獵物。
2077.pinyin: tā xiàng lǎohǔ yīyàng qiāoqiāo qián jìn tā de lièwù
2077.english: He moved like a tiger stalking its prey.

2078.simplified: 和他兄弟不同，他有种幽默感。
2078.traditional: 和他兄弟不同，他有種幽默感。
2078.pinyin: hé tā xiōngdì bùtóng tā yǒuzhǒng yōumògǎn
2078.english: Unlike his brother, he has a good sense of humor.

2079.simplified: 飞机以每小时900公里的速度飞行。
2079.traditional: 飛機以每小時900公裡的速度飛行。
2079.pinyin: fēijī yǐ měi xiǎoshí gōnglǐ de sùdù fēixíng
2079.english: The airplane flies at 900 kilometers an hour.

2080.simplified: 他离开学校后服了两年兵役。
2080.traditional: 他離開學校後服了兩年兵役。
2080.pinyin: tā líkāi xuéxiào hòu fú le liǎng nián bīngyì
2080.english: He did a two-year stint in the army when he left school.

2081.simplified: 那是一幅描绘春天景色的油画。
2081.traditional: 那是一幅描繪春天景色的油畫。
2081.pinyin: nàshi yī fú miáohuì chūntiān jǐngsè de yóuhuà
2081.english: That is an oil painting of a landscape in spring.

2082.simplified: 他晚饭吃了一些什锦泡菜和米饭。
2082.traditional: 他晚飯吃了一些什錦泡菜和米飯。
2082.pinyin: tā wǎnfàn chī le yīxiē shíjǐn pàocài hé mǐfàn
2082.english: He had some mixed pickles and rice for supper.

2083.simplified: 挪威人生活在比较寒冷的地区。
2083.traditional: 挪威人生活在比較寒冷的地區。
2083.pinyin: Nuówēi rén shēnghuó zài bǐjiào hánlěng de dìqū
2083.english: The Norwegians live in a comparatively cold zone.

2084.simplified: 各商行互相竞争以招揽顾客。
2084.traditional: 各商行互相競爭以招攬顧客。
2084.pinyin: gè shāngháng hùxiāng jìngzhēng yǐ zhāolǎn gùkè
2084.english: Businesses vied with each other to attract customers.

2085.simplified: 占星家声称能预知祸福.
2085.traditional: 佔星家聲稱能預知禍福.
2085.english: Astrologers claim to be able to divine what the stars hold in store for us.

2086.simplified: 这人这么和蔼, 我立刻为他着迷。
2086.traditional: 這人這麼和藹, 我立刻為他著迷。
2086.pinyin: zhè rén zhème hé'ǎi wǒ lìkè wéi tā zháomí
2086.english: The man was so genial, so I was drawn to him at once.

2087.simplified: 有人相信婴儿的尿是一种药。
2087.traditional: 有人相信嬰兒的尿是一種藥。
2087.pinyin: yǒurén xiāngxìn yīng'ér de niào shì yīzhǒng yào
2087.english: Someone believes that a baby's urine is a kind of medicine.

2088.simplified: 我的同事已经戒掉了吸烟的习惯。
2088.traditional: 我的同事已經戒掉了吸煙的習慣。
2088.pinyin: wǒ de tóngshì yǐjīng jiè diào le xīyān de xíguàn
2088.english: My colleague has broken off the habit of smoking.

2089.simplified: 通知她交纳罚款，但她拒不服从。
2089.traditional: 通知她交納罰款，但她拒不服從。
2089.pinyin: tōngzhī tā jiāonà fákuǎn dàn tā jù bù fúcóng
2089.english: She was told to pay the fine, but refused to comply.

2090.simplified: 他应该受到法律最严厉的惩罚。
2090.traditional: 他應該受到法律最嚴厲的懲罰。
2090.pinyin: tā yīnggāi shòudào fǎlǜ zuì yánlì de chéngfá
2090.english: He deserves to be punished with the full rigor of the law.

2091.simplified: 魔术师从他的帽子里变出一只兔子。
2091.traditional: 魔術師從他的帽子裡變出一只兔子。
2091.pinyin: móshùshī cóng tā de màozi lǐ biàn chū yī zhǐ tùzi
2091.english: The magician conjured a rabbit out of his hat.

2092.simplified: 一位护士来给他包上干净的绷带。
2092.traditional: 一位護士來給他包上干淨的繃帶。
2092.pinyin: yī wèi hùshi lái gěi tā bāo shàng gānjìng de bēngdài
2092.english: A nurse came to put on a clean dressing for him.

2093.simplified: 那人用斧头把一块木头劈成两半。
2093.traditional: 那人用斧頭把一塊木頭劈成兩半。
2093.pinyin: nà rén yòng fǔtóu bǎ yīkuài mùtou pī chéng liǎng bàn
2093.english: The man cleft a block of wood in two with an axe.

2094.simplified: 船只在汹涌的大海中缓慢前进。
2094.traditional: 船只在洶湧的大海中緩慢前進。
2094.pinyin: chuánzhī zài xiōngyǒng de dàhǎi zhōng huǎnmàn qiánjìn
2094.english: The ship made slow progress through the rough sea.

2095.simplified: 她戴着结婚戒指，表示她已结婚。
2095.traditional: 她戴著結婚戒指，表示她已結婚。
2095.pinyin: tā dài zhe jiéhūn jièzhi biǎoshì tā yǐ jiéhūn
2095.english: She wears a wedding ring to show that she's married.

2096.simplified: 我不会跟你撒谎，那不是我的风格。
2096.traditional: 我不會跟你撒謊，那不是我的風格。
2096.pinyin: wǒ bùhuì gēn nǐ sāhuǎng nà bùshì wǒ de fēnggé
2096.english: I wouldn't tell lies to you; that's not my style.

2097.simplified: 血液在她的膝盖伤口周围凝固了。
2097.traditional: 血液在她的膝蓋傷口周圍凝固了。
2097.pinyin: xuèyè zài tā de xīgài shāngkǒu zhōuwéi nínggù le
2097.english: The blood had congealed round the cut on her knee.

2098.simplified: 学生应该始终具有强烈的求知欲。
2098.traditional: 學生應該始終具有強烈的求知欲。
2098.pinyin: xuésheng yīnggāi shǐzhōng jùyǒu qiángliè de qiúzhīyù
2098.english: A student should always be curious to learn.

2099.simplified: 这首诗的最后两行没有押好韵。
2099.traditional: 這首詩的最後兩行沒有押好韻。
2099.pinyin: zhè shǒu shī de zuìhòu liǎng xíng méiyǒu yā hǎo yùn
2099.english: The last two lines of this poem don't rhyme properly.

2100.simplified: 牧师每星期二作履行神职的访问。
2100.traditional: 牧師每星期二作履行神職的訪問。
2100.pinyin: mùshī měi Xīngqī'èr zuò lǚxíng shénzhí de fǎngwèn
2100.english: The priest makes pastoral visits every Tuesday.

2101.simplified: 他把花茎折断，汁液就流了出来。
2101.traditional: 他把花莖折斷，汁液就流了出來。
2101.pinyin: tā bǎ huā jīng zhéduàn zhīyè jiù liú le chūlái
2101.english: The sap flowed out when he broke the stem of the flower.

2102.simplified: 用餐时摆弄刀叉玩儿是不雅的.
2102.traditional: 用餐時擺弄刀叉玩兒是不雅的.
2102.pinyin: yòngcān shí bǎinòng dāochā wánr shì bùyǎ de
2102.english: It's bad manners to fidget about (with the cutlery) at the table.

2103.simplified: 她的钱被一个奸诈的会计骗去了。
2103.traditional: 她的錢被一個奸詐的會計騙去了。
2103.pinyin: tā de qián bèi yī gè jiānzhà de kuàijì piàn qù le
2103.english: She was defrauded of her money by a dishonest accountant.

2104.simplified: 他的答覆看来是半开玩笑半认真的.
2104.traditional: 他的答覆看來是半開玩笑半認真的.
2104.pinyin: tā de dáfù kànlai shì bàn kāiwánxiào bàn rènzhēn de
2104.english: His reply was taken half seriously, half in jest.

2105.simplified: 有个年幼的学生在炎炎烈日下晕倒了。
2105.traditional: 有個年幼的學生在炎炎烈日下暈倒了。
2105.pinyin: yǒu gè niányòu de xuésheng zài yányán lièrì xià yūndǎo le
2105.english: A young student fainted in the hot sun.

2106.simplified: 她很害羞，不敢和其他旅行者交谈。
2106.traditional: 她很害羞，不敢和其他旅行者交談。
2106.pinyin: tā hěn hàixiū bù gǎn hé qítā lǚxíngzhě jiāotán
2106.english: She was too timid to talk with other travelers.

2107.simplified: 这艘船的停泊税一年是五千美元.
2107.traditional: 這艘船的停泊稅一年是五千美元.
2107.pinyin: zhè sōu chuán de tíngbó shuì yī nián shì wǔ qiān Měiyuán
2107.english: The vessel tax of anchorage is 5,000 dollars per year.

2108.simplified: 她瘦长结实的身体看上去精力充沛。
2108.traditional: 她瘦長結實的身體看上去精力充沛。
2108.pinyin: tā shòucháng jiēshi de shēntǐ kànshangqu jīnglìchōngpèi
2108.english: Her wiry athletic body seems energetic.

2109.simplified: 你完全不知道在那里是什么滋味。
2109.traditional: 你完全不知道在那裡是什麼滋味。
2109.pinyin: nǐ wánquán bù zhīdào zài nàli shì shénme zīwèi
2109.english: You have no conception of what it was like to be there.

2110.simplified: 他们将为不得不干那项工作而抱怨。
2110.traditional: 他們將為不得不干那項工作而抱怨。
2110.pinyin: tāmen jiāng wéi bùdébù gàn nà xiàng gōngzuò ér bàoyuàn
2110.english: They will grumble about having to do the work.

2111.simplified: 他们低声说话，唯恐被别人听见。
2111.traditional: 他們低聲說話，唯恐被別人聽見。
2111.pinyin: tāmen dīshēng shuōhuà wéikǒng bèi biéren tīngjiàn
2111.english: They spoke in whispers lest they should be heard.

2112.simplified: 那个图书馆从上午9点到下午6点开放。
2112.traditional: 那個圖書館從上午9點到下午6點開放。
2112.pinyin: nàge túshūguǎn cóng shàngwǔ diǎn dào xiàwǔ diǎn kāifàng
2112.english: The library is open from 9 to 6.

2113.simplified: 每次她动一下腿，就发出一声呻吟。
2113.traditional: 每次她動一下腿，就發出一聲呻吟。
2113.pinyin: měicì tā dòng yīxià tuǐ jiù fāchū yīshēng shēnyín
2113.english: Each time she moved her leg, she let out a moan.

2114.simplified: 夕阳无限好，只是近黄昏。
2114.traditional: 夕陽無限好，只是近黃昏。
2114.pinyin: xīyáng wúxiàn hǎo zhǐshì jìn huánghūn
2114.english: The setting sun had boundless beauty, Just because the yellow dusk is so near.

2115.simplified: 我在旅行期间舆同学们保持联系。
2115.traditional: 我在旅行期間輿同學們保持聯系。
2115.pinyin: wǒ zài lǚxíng qījiān yú tóngxué men bǎochíliánxì
2115.english: I kept in touch with my classmates during my journey.

2116.simplified: 我想驾驶滑翔机一定需要些技术。
2116.traditional: 我想駕駛滑翔機一定需要些技術。
2116.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng jiàshǐ huáxiángjī yīdìng xūyào xiē jìshù
2116.english: I guess it must require some skills to fly a glider.

2117.simplified: 她穿着纽约杰出设计师设计的服装。
2117.traditional: 她穿著紐約傑出設計師設計的服裝。
2117.pinyin: tā chuānzhuó Niǔyuē jiéchū shèjìshī shèjì de fúzhuāng
2117.english: She was dressed by a leading New York designer.

2118.simplified: 他给我一条项链作为周年纪念礼物。
2118.traditional: 他給我一條項鏈作為周年紀念禮物。
2118.pinyin: tā gěi wǒ yī tiáo xiàngliàn zuòwéi zhōunián jìniàn lǐwù
2118.english: He gave me a necklace as an anniversary gift.

2119.simplified: 她不用学跑步技巧, 她天生就擅跑.
2119.traditional: 她不用學跑步技巧, 她天生就擅跑.
2119.pinyin: tā bùyòng xué pǎobù jìqiǎo tā tiānshēng jiù shàn pǎo
2119.english: She didn't have to learn how to run: she's a natural.

2120.simplified: 肖邦的乐曲唤起了她极其复杂的感情。
2120.traditional: 肖邦的樂曲喚起了她極其復雜的感情。
2120.pinyin: Xiāobāng de yuèqǔ huànqǐ le tā jíqí fùzá de gǎnqíng
2120.english: Chopin aroused very complicated emotions in her.

2121.simplified: 一块煤炭从火中掉出来，烧坏了地席。
2121.traditional: 一塊煤炭從火中掉出來，燒壞了地席。
2121.pinyin: yīkuài méitàn cóng huǒ zhōng diào chūlái shāo huài le dì xí
2121.english: A coal fell from the fire and burned the mat.

2122.simplified: 我们不应该嘲笑别人的宗教信仰。
2122.traditional: 我們不應該嘲笑別人的宗教信仰。
2122.pinyin: wǒmen bù yīnggāi cháoxiào biéren de zōngjiào xìnyǎng
2122.english: We should not mock at other people's religious beliefs.

2123.simplified: 我宁愿考不及格，也不愿意考试作弊。
2123.traditional: 我寧願考不及格，也不願意考試作弊。
2123.pinyin: wǒ nìngyuàn kǎo bùjígé yě bù yuànyì kǎoshì zuòbì
2123.english: I would rather fail than cheat in the examination.

2124.simplified: 司机应该对这场车祸负部分责任。
2124.traditional: 司機應該對這場車禍負部分責任。
2124.pinyin: sījī yīnggāi duì zhè chǎng chēhuò fù bùfen zérèn
2124.english: The driver must bear a portion of the blame for the accident.

2125.simplified: 我们的人民正在暴君的统治下受苦。
2125.traditional: 我們的人民正在暴君的統治下受苦。
2125.pinyin: wǒmen de rénmín zhèngzài bàojūn de tǒngzhì xià shòukǔ
2125.english: Our people are suffering at the hands of an oppressor.

2126.simplified: 那个害羞的小男孩遇到陌生人就紧张。
2126.traditional: 那個害羞的小男孩遇到陌生人就緊張。
2126.pinyin: nàge hàixiū de xiǎo nánhái yùdào mòshēngrén jiù jǐnzhāng
2126.english: The bashful boy was nervous with strangers.

2127.simplified: 这张桌子的腿是用螺丝固定在地板上的。
2127.traditional: 這張桌子的腿是用螺絲固定在地板上的。
2127.pinyin: zhè zhāng zhuōzi de tuǐ shì yòng luósī gùdìng zài dìbǎn shàng de
2127.english: The table legs are screwed to the floor.

2128.simplified: 首先，要向杯子里放一小片锌板。
2128.traditional: 首先，要向杯子裡放一小片鋅板。
2128.pinyin: shǒuxiān yào xiàng bēizi lǐ fàng yī xiǎo piàn xīn bǎn
2128.english: You should first put a small piece of zinc plate into the cup.

2129.simplified: 她有一条用三角形蓝绸子做的围巾。
2129.traditional: 她有一條用三角形藍綢子做的圍巾。
2129.pinyin: tā yǒu yī tiáo yòng sānjiǎoxíng lán chóuzi zuò de wéijīn
2129.english: She has a scarf made of a triangular piece of blue silk.

2130.simplified: 他过去因失败而蒙羞，现在东山再起了。
2130.traditional: 他過去因失敗而蒙羞，現在東山再起了。
2130.pinyin: tā guòqu yīn shībài ér méngxiū xiànzài dōngshānzàiqǐ le
2130.english: He rose again from the dust of past defeats.

2131.simplified: 他们这个下午卖掉了十箱矿泉水。
2131.traditional: 他們這個下午賣掉了十箱礦泉水。
2131.pinyin: tāmen zhège xiàwǔ màidiào le shí xiāng kuàngquánshuǐ
2131.english: They have sold up ten crates of mineral water in the afternoon.

2132.simplified: 有的人看到色情杂志能激发起性欲。
2132.traditional: 有的人看到色情雜志能激發起性欲。
2132.pinyin: yǒude rén kàn dào sèqíng zázhì néng jīfā qǐ xìngyù
2132.english: Some people are sexually excited by pornographic magazines.

2133.simplified: 盟军数以百计的飞机轰炸了那个国家。
2133.traditional: 盟軍數以百計的飛機轟炸了那個國家。
2133.pinyin: méngjūn shùyǐbǎijì de fēijī hōngzhà le nàge guójiā
2133.english: The allied warplanes bombed the country by the hundred.

2134.simplified: 我的女儿看见了一条鼻涕虫，尖叫了起来。
2134.traditional: 我的女兒看見了一條鼻涕蟲，尖叫了起來。
2134.pinyin: wǒ de nǚ'ér kànjiàn le yī tiáo bítìchóng jiānjiào le qilai
2134.english: My daughter screamed when she saw a slug.

2135.simplified: 我正在用我新买的煎锅做苹果馅饼。
2135.traditional: 我正在用我新買的煎鍋做蘋果餡餅。
2135.pinyin: wǒ zhèngzài yòng wǒ xīn mǎi de jiānguō zuò píngguǒxiànbǐng
2135.english: I am cooking apple pies with my newly bought frying pan.

2136.simplified: 他跳上马, 朝寺庙方向飞奔而去。
2136.traditional: 他跳上馬, 朝寺廟方向飛奔而去。
2136.pinyin: tā tiào shàngmǎ cháo sìmiào fāngxiàng fēibēn ér qù
2136.english: He jumped onto the horse and galloped in the direction of the temple.

2137.simplified: 我们在碗上铺了白的覆盖物防止苍蝇。
2137.traditional: 我們在碗上鋪了白的覆蓋物防止蒼蠅。
2137.pinyin: wǒmen zài wǎn shàng pū le bái de fùgài wù fángzhǐ cāngying
2137.english: We spread white covers over the bowls to keep flies away.

2138.simplified: 在神话故事中，魔鬼很残忍而且吃人。
2138.traditional: 在神話故事中，魔鬼很殘忍而且吃人。
2138.pinyin: zài shénhuàgùshi zhōng móguǐ hěn cánrěn érqiě chīrén
2138.english: In fairy stories, the ogre is cruel and eats people.

2139.simplified: 那个亚洲人拦住我，问我是不是中国人。
2139.traditional: 那個亞洲人攔住我，問我是不是中國人。
2139.pinyin: nàge Yàzhōu rén lánzhù wǒ wèn wǒ shìbùshì Zhōngguórén
2139.english: That Asian stopped me and asked if I was Chinese.

2140.simplified: 他到那里喝一瓶汽水和吃一块汉堡面包。
2140.traditional: 他到那裡喝一瓶汽水和吃一塊漢堡面包。
2140.pinyin: tā dào nàli hē yī píng qìshuǐ hé chī yīkuài hànbǎo miànbāo
2140.english: He go there to drink a soda and eat a hamburger.

2141.simplified: 阳光透过万里碧空照耀着北京城。
2141.traditional: 陽光透過萬裡碧空照耀著北京城。
2141.pinyin: yángguāng tòuguò wànlǐ bìkōng zhàoyào zhe běi jīngchéng
2141.english: From a sky of untarnished blue the sun beamed down upon Beijing.

2142.simplified: 他学得慢，但是他表现出不屈不挠的毅力。
2142.traditional: 他學得慢，但是他表現出不屈不撓的毅力。
2142.pinyin: tā xué dé màn dànshì tā biǎoxiàn chū bùqūbùnáo de yìlì
2142.english: He is slow to learn, but shows great perseverance.

2143.simplified: 好的水果冬天难得见到，而且价格昂贵。
2143.traditional: 好的水果冬天難得見到，而且價格昂貴。
2143.pinyin: hǎo de shuǐguǒ dōngtiān nándé jiàndào érqiě jiàgé ángguì
2143.english: Good fruit is scarce in winter and costs a lot.

2144.simplified: 他就早期新教徒的异端邪说作了演讲。
2144.traditional: 他就早期新教徒的異端邪說作了演講。
2144.pinyin: tā jiù zǎoqī xīnjiàotú de yìduān xié shuō zuò le yǎnjiǎng
2144.english: He gave a speech on the heresies of the early Protestants.

2145.simplified: 这栋房子周围有几个小男孩在晃荡。
2145.traditional: 這棟房子周圍有幾個小男孩在晃蕩。
2145.pinyin: zhè dòng fángzi zhōuwéi yǒu jǐge xiǎo nánhái zài huàngdang
2145.english: There are several young boys loitering around the building.

2146.simplified: 这棵苏格兰植物是我的一个表亲给我的礼物。
2146.traditional: 這棵蘇格蘭植物是我的一個表親給我的禮物。
2146.pinyin: zhè kē Sūgélán zhíwù shì wǒ de yī gè biǎoqīn gěi wǒ de lǐwù
2146.english: This Scottish plant was a gift from my cousin.

2147.simplified: 这些犹太人生活在会遭到拘捕的恐惧之中。
2147.traditional: 這些猶太人生活在會遭到拘捕的恐懼之中。
2147.pinyin: zhèxiē Yóutàirén shēnghuó zài huì zāodào jūbǔ de kǒngjù zhīzhōng
2147.english: The Jews lived in dread of being caught.

2148.simplified: 把蔬菜煮上20分钟，然后把水沥掉。
2148.traditional: 把蔬菜煮上20分鐘，然後把水瀝掉。
2148.pinyin: bǎ shūcài zhǔ shàng fēnzhōng ránhòu bǎ shuǐ lì diào
2148.english: Boil the vegetables for 20 minutes and then drain off the water.

2149.simplified: 学杂费昂贵，外国留学生负担不起。
2149.traditional: 學雜費昂貴，外國留學生負擔不起。
2149.pinyin: xué záfèi ángguì wàiguó liúxuéshēng fùdānbuqǐ
2149.english: The tuition and fees fall heavy on the international students.

2150.simplified: 他熟练地驾驶着汽车穿过狭窄的街道。
2150.traditional: 他熟練地駕駛著汽車穿過狹窄的街道。
2150.pinyin: tā shúliàn dì jiàshǐ zhe qìchē chuānguò xiázhǎi de jiēdào
2150.english: He steered the car skillfully through the narrow streets.

2151.simplified: 他对任何人都很拘谨，从不跟人说笑。
2151.traditional: 他對任何人都很拘謹，從不跟人說笑。
2151.pinyin: tā duì rènhé rén dōu hěn jūjǐn cóngbù gēnrén shuōxiào
2151.english: He is very formal with everyone; he never joins in a laugh.

2152.simplified: 那位富翁在遗嘱中什么都没给他儿子留下。
2152.traditional: 那位富翁在遺囑中什麼都沒給他兒子留下。
2152.pinyin: nà wèi fùwēng zài yízhǔ zhōng shénme dōu méi gěi tā érzi liúxià
2152.english: The rich man left his son nothing in the will.

2153.simplified: 别人回家后，他仍在学校外面徘徊。
2153.traditional: 別人回家後，他仍在學校外面徘徊。
2153.pinyin: biéren huíjiā hòu tā réng zài xuéxiào wàimiàn páihuái
2153.english: He lingered outside the school after everybody else had gone home.

2154.simplified: 耳膜的振动帮助声音传送到大脑。
2154.traditional: 耳膜的振動幫助聲音傳送到大腦。
2154.pinyin: ěrmó de zhèndòng bāngzhù shēngyīn chuánsòng dào dànǎo
2154.english: A vibrating membrane in the ear helps to convey sounds to the brain.

2155.simplified: 他向每一个愿意听的人抱怨他的不幸。
2155.traditional: 他向每一個願意聽的人抱怨他的不幸。
2155.pinyin: tā xiàng měiyī gè yuànyì tīng de rén bàoyuàn tā de bùxìng
2155.english: He moaned about his misfortunes to anyone who would listen.

2156.simplified: 她的右手上戴着一枚镶有绿宝石的戒指。
2156.traditional: 她的右手上戴著一枚鑲有綠寶石的戒指。
2156.pinyin: tā de yòushǒu shàng dài zhe yī méi xiāng yǒu lǜbǎoshí de jièzhi
2156.english: She wears a ring set with emeralds on her right hand.

2157.simplified: 他们在窗户上加了窗条以防盗贼进入.
2157.traditional: 他們在窗戶上加了窗條以防盜賊進入.
2157.pinyin: tāmen zài chuānghu shàng jiā le chuāng tiáo yǐfáng dàozéi jìnrù
2157.english: They fitted bars to their windows to stop burglars getting in.

2158.simplified: 别看这辆汽车小, 里面还比较宽敞.
2158.traditional: 別看這輛汽車小, 裡面還比較寬敞.
2158.pinyin: bié kàn zhè liàng qìchē xiǎo lǐmiàn hái bǐjiào kuānchang
2158.english: Considering the smallness of the car, it is relatively roomy inside.

2159.simplified: 他一点儿一点儿攒钱直到够买一辆汽车.
2159.traditional: 他一點兒一點兒攢錢直到夠買一輛汽車.
2159.pinyin: tā yīdiǎnr yīdiǎnr zǎn qián zhídào gòu mǎi yī liàng qìchē
2159.english: He saved money bit by bit until he had enough to buy a car.

2160.simplified: 乘长途汽车唯一可取之处就是旅费便宜.
2160.traditional: 乘長途汽車唯一可取之處就是旅費便宜.
2160.pinyin: chéng chángtúqìchē wéiyī kěqǔzhīchù jiùshì lǚfèi piányi
2160.english: The cheapness of coach travel is its only recommendation.

2161.simplified: 中国孩子会在春节前买很多鞭炮。
2161.traditional: 中國孩子會在春節前買很多鞭炮。
2161.pinyin: Zhōngguó háizi huì zài Chūnjié qián mǎi hěn duō biānpào
2161.english: Chinese children like to buy many firecrackers before the Spring Festival.

2162.simplified: 主人举起鞭子时，狗抖缩在桌子下边。
2162.traditional: 主人舉起鞭子時，狗抖縮在桌子下邊。
2162.pinyin: zhǔrén jǔqǐ biānzi shí gǒu dǒusuō zài zhuōzi xiàbian
2162.english: The dog cowered under the table when his master raised the whip.

2163.simplified: 我正在看一本关于罗马帝国兴衰的书。
2163.traditional: 我正在看一本關於羅馬帝國興衰的書。
2163.pinyin: wǒ zhèngzài kàn yī běn guānyú Luómǎ Dìguó xīngshuāi de shū
2163.english: I am reading a book about the rise and fall of the Roman Empire.

2164.simplified: 那些孩子在操场上玩, 宣泄过剩的精力.
2164.traditional: 那些孩子在操場上玩, 宣洩過剩的精力.
2164.pinyin: nàxiē háizi zài cāochǎng shàng wán xuānxiè guòshèng de jīnglì
2164.english: The children were out in the playground letting off steam.

2165.simplified: 这个城市的公园以其华丽的喷泉而著名。
2165.traditional: 這個城市的公園以其華麗的噴泉而著名。
2165.pinyin: zhège chéngshì de gōngyuán yǐ qí huálì de pēnquán ér zhùmíng
2165.english: The parks of this city are famous for their ornate fountains.

2166.simplified: 要她去牙科医生那里看病非得生拉硬拽不可.
2166.traditional: 要她去牙科醫生那裡看病非得生拉硬拽不可.
2166.pinyin: yào tā qù yákēyīshēng nàli kànbìng fēiděi shēng lā yìng zhuài bùkě
2166.english: She had to be dragged into seeing the dentist.

2167.simplified: 普鲁士士兵在锯木厂后边草地上操练。
2167.traditional: 普魯士士兵在鋸木廠後邊草地上操練。
2167.pinyin: Pǔlǔshì shìbīng zài jùmùchǎng hòubian cǎo dìshang cāoliàn
2167.english: The Prussians are drilling in the meadow behind the sawmill.

2168.simplified: 我们必须加倍努力来澄清这一神秘的事件。
2168.traditional: 我們必須加倍努力來澄清這一神秘的事件。
2168.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū jiābèi nǔlì lái chéngqīng zhè yī shénmì de shìjiàn
2168.english: We must multiply our efforts to clear up the mystery.

2169.simplified: 噪音令人讨厌，尤其当你想睡觉的时候。
2169.traditional: 噪音令人討厭，尤其當你想睡覺的時候。
2169.pinyin: zàoyīn lìngrén tǎoyàn yóuqí dāng nǐ xiǎng shuìjiào de shíhou
2169.english: Noise is unpleasant, especially when you are trying to sleep.

2170.simplified: 我希望我的告诫会促使她作出更大的努力。
2170.traditional: 我希望我的告誡會促使她作出更大的努力。
2170.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng wǒ de gàojiè huì cùshǐ tā zuòchū gèng dà de nǔlì
2170.english: I hoped my warning would stimulate her to greater efforts.

2171.simplified: 这只汉堡包不但气味好闻而且味道好吃。
2171.traditional: 這只漢堡包不但氣味好聞而且味道好吃。
2171.pinyin: zhè zhǐ hànbǎobāo bùdàn qìwèi hǎo wén érqiě wèidao hǎochī
2171.english: The hamburger not only smells good but (also) tastes delicious.

2172.simplified: 辐射泄露的消息引起了公众的普遍恐慌。
2172.traditional: 輻射洩露的消息引起了公眾的普遍恐慌。
2172.pinyin: fúshè xièlù de xiāoxi yǐnqǐ le gōngzhòng de pǔbiàn kǒnghuāng
2172.english: The news of the radiation leak caused widespread public alarm.

2173.simplified: 那热气腾腾的蛋糕对这个饥饿的男孩是个诱惑。
2173.traditional: 那熱氣騰騰的蛋糕對這個飢餓的男孩是個誘惑。
2173.pinyin: nà rèqìténgténg de dàngāo duì zhège jī'è de nánhái shì gè yòuhuò
2173.english: The steaming cake was a bait for the hungry boy.

2174.simplified: 流行歌星总是抱怨他们受到歌迷的包围。
2174.traditional: 流行歌星總是抱怨他們受到歌迷的包圍。
2174.pinyin: liúxíng gēxīng zǒngshì bàoyuàn tāmen shòudào gēmí de bāowéi
2174.english: Pop stars are always moaning about being mobbed by their fans.

2175.simplified: 你总是随心所欲而不考虑我们的情感。
2175.traditional: 你總是隨心所欲而不考慮我們的情感。
2175.pinyin: nǐ zǒngshì suíxīnsuǒyù ér bù kǎolǜ wǒmen de qínggǎn
2175.english: You always follow your own inclination instead of thinking of our feelings.

2176.simplified: 顺着这条大路走，在路的分岔口向右拐。
2176.traditional: 順著這條大路走，在路的分岔口向右拐。
2176.pinyin: shùnzhe zhè tiáo dàlù zǒu zài lù de fēn chàkǒu xiàngyòuguǎi
2176.english: Follow the main road until it branches, and then turn to the right.

2177.simplified: 他听到的唯一的声音就是那台机器的嗡嗡声。
2177.traditional: 他聽到的唯一的聲音就是那台機器的嗡嗡聲。
2177.pinyin: tā tīngdào de wéiyī de shēngyīn jiùshì nà tái jīqì de wēngwēngshēng
2177.english: The only sound he heard was the hum of the machine.

2178.simplified: 他用一支笔在地图上标出了波斯湾的位置。
2178.traditional: 他用一支筆在地圖上標出了波斯灣的位置。
2178.pinyin: tā yòng yī zhī bǐ zài dìtú shàngbiāo chū le Bōsī Wān de wèizhi
2178.english: He indicated the location of the Persian Gulf with a pen on the map.

2179.simplified: 这位科学家在许多知识领域中都是杰出的。
2179.traditional: 這位科學家在許多知識領域中都是傑出的。
2179.pinyin: zhèwèi kēxuéjiā zài xǔduō zhīshi lǐngyù Zhōngdū shì jiéchū de
2179.english: The scientist is distinguished in many spheres of knowledge.

2180.simplified: 战士们唱起了歌颂他们英勇战斗的凯歌。
2180.traditional: 戰士們唱起了歌頌他們英勇戰斗的凱歌。
2180.pinyin: zhànshì men chàng qǐ le gēsòng tāmen yīngyǒng zhàndòu de kǎigē
2180.english: The soldiers sang a song of victory, describing their prowess in battle.

2181.simplified: 他的建议在理论上可以, 但不能付诸实现。
2181.traditional: 他的建議在理論上可以, 但不能付諸實現。
2181.pinyin: tā de jiànyì zài lǐlùn shàng kěyǐ dàn bùnéng fùzhū shíxiàn
2181.english: His proposition is good in theory but cannot be put into practice.

2182.simplified: 电视已成为传播政治思想的重要媒介。
2182.traditional: 電視已成為傳播政治思想的重要媒介。
2182.pinyin: diànshì yǐ chéngwéi chuánbō zhèngzhìsīxiǎng de zhòngyào méijiè
2182.english: Television has become an important vehicle for spreading political ideas.

2183.simplified: 他仅有的消遣是喝啤酒和在花园里种花草。
2183.traditional: 他僅有的消遣是喝啤酒和在花園裡種花草。
2183.pinyin: tā jǐn yǒude xiāoqiǎn shì hē píjiǔ hé zài huāyuán lǐ zhǒng huācǎo
2183.english: His only recreations are drinking beer and working in the garden.

2184.simplified: 郁金香在春天开出颜色鲜亮的杯状的花朵。
2184.traditional: 郁金香在春天開出顏色鮮亮的杯狀的花朵。
2184.pinyin: yùjīnxiāng zài chūntiān kāi chū yánsè xiānliang de bēi zhuàng de huāduǒ
2184.english: Tulip grows large brightly-colored cup-shaped flower in spring.

2185.simplified: 汤姆每次转身都把被子往他那边再拉一些。
2185.traditional: 湯姆每次轉身都把被子往他那邊再拉一些。
2185.pinyin: Tāngmǔ měicì zhuǎnshēn dōu bǎ bèizi wǎng tā nàbian zài lā yīxiē
2185.english: Every time Tom rolled over he pulled more of the bedclothes to his side.

2186.simplified: 这位将军被誉为领导全国赢得胜利的人。
2186.traditional: 這位將軍被譽為領導全國贏得勝利的人。
2186.pinyin: zhèwèi jiāngjūn bèiyùwéi lǐngdǎo quánguó yíngdé shènglì de rén
2186.english: The general was extolled as the man who had led the country to victory.

2187.simplified: 杰克不仅是个好学生，而且还是名篮球队员。
2187.traditional: 傑克不僅是個好學生，而且還是名籃球隊員。
2187.pinyin: Jiékè bùjǐn shì gè hǎo xuésheng érqiě háishi míng lánqiú duìyuán
2187.english: Jack is not only a good student but also a basketball player.

2188.simplified: 一般人也许会嘲笑他的音乐，但我们更了解它。
2188.traditional: 一般人也許會嘲笑他的音樂，但我們更了解它。
2188.pinyin: yībānrén yěxǔ huì cháoxiào tā de yīnyuè dàn wǒmen gèng liǎojiě tā
2188.english: The multitude may laugh at his music, but we know better.

2189.simplified: 我非常恼怒，以致觉得非给报社写封信不可。
2189.traditional: 我非常惱怒，以致覺得非給報社寫封信不可。
2189.pinyin: wǒ fēicháng nǎonù yǐzhì juéde fēi gěi bàoshè xiě fēng xìn bùkě
2189.english: I was so annoyed that I felt impelled to write a letter to the paper.

2190.simplified: 他把派克大衣兜帽两边都绑得紧紧的来挡住雪。
2190.traditional: 他把派克大衣兜帽兩邊都綁得緊緊的來擋住雪。
2190.pinyin: tā bǎ pàikèdàyī dōumào liǎngbian dōu bǎng dé jǐnjǐn de lái dǎngzhù xuě
2190.english: He held both sides of the parka hood closed against the snow.

2191.simplified: 由于投资少，我们的工业生产一直停滞不前。
2191.traditional: 由於投資少，我們的工業生產一直停滯不前。
2191.pinyin: yóuyú tóuzī shǎo wǒmen de gōngyè shēngchǎn yīzhí tíngzhìbùqián
2191.english: Due to low investment, our industrial output has remained stagnant.

2192.simplified: 她沾湿了一块纸巾，轻轻擦去项链上的灰尘。
2192.traditional: 她沾濕了一塊紙巾，輕輕擦去項鏈上的灰塵。
2192.pinyin: tā zhānshī le yīkuài zhǐjīn qīngqīng cā qù xiàngliàn shàng de huīchén
2192.english: She moistened a tissue and gently wiped the dust off the necklace.

2193.simplified: 他听到汽车刹车发出的尖锐的声音，然后就摔倒了。
2193.traditional: 他聽到汽車剎車發出的尖銳的聲音，然後就摔倒了。
2193.pinyin: tā tīngdào qìchē shāchē fāchū de jiānruì de shēngyīn ránhòu jiù shuāidǎo le
2193.english: He heard a screech of brakes and then fell down.

2194.simplified: 木匠量了一下棚屋的尺寸, 立刻估计出它的大小。
2194.traditional: 木匠量了一下棚屋的尺寸, 立刻估計出它的大小。
2194.pinyin: mùjiàng liáng le yīxià péng wū de chǐcun lìkè gūjì chū tā de dàxiǎo
2194.english: The carpenter ran his ruler over the shed and sized it up at once.

2195.simplified: 做试验前，老师给我们每个人发了一张滤纸。
2195.traditional: 做試驗前，老師給我們每個人發了一張濾紙。
2195.pinyin: zuò shìyàn qián lǎoshī gěi wǒmen měigerén fā le yī zhāng lǜzhǐ
2195.english: The teacher gave each of us a piece of filter paper before doing the experiment.

2196.simplified: 魔术师口中念念有词, 把兔子从礼帽中掏了出来.
2196.traditional: 魔術師口中念念有詞, 把兔子從禮帽中掏了出來.
2196.pinyin: móshùshī kǒu zhōng niànniànyǒucí bǎ tùzi cóng lǐmào zhōng tāo le chūlái
2196.english: `Abracadabra,' said the conjuror as he pulled the rabbit from the hat.

2197.simplified: 我觉得你嘲笑他说英语的方式刺伤了他的自尊心。
2197.traditional: 我覺得你嘲笑他說英語的方式刺傷了他的自尊心。
2197.pinyin: wǒ juéde nǐ cháoxiào tā shuō Yīngyǔ de fāngshì cìshāng le tā de zìzūnxīn
2197.english: I think you hurt his pride by laughing at the way he speaks English.

2198.simplified: 这个百万富翁已把他一半的股票移交给他的长子。
2198.traditional: 這個百萬富翁已把他一半的股票移交給他的長子。
2198.pinyin: zhège bǎiwànfùwēng yǐ bǎ tā yībàn de gǔpiào yí jiāogěi tā de zhǎngzǐ
2198.english: The millionaire has handed over 50 percent of his stock to his first son.

2199.simplified: 其他地方更优厚的薪金待遇诱使他离开了公司。
2199.traditional: 其他地方更優厚的薪金待遇誘使他離開了公司。
2199.pinyin: qítā dìfang gèng yōuhòu de xīnjīn dàiyù yòushǐ tā líkāi le gōngsī
2199.english: He was seduced into leaving the company by the offer of higher pay elsewhere.

2200.simplified: 他们的主要出口货物是纺织品，特别是丝绸和棉布。
2200.traditional: 他們的主要出口貨物是紡織品，特別是絲綢和棉布。
2200.pinyin: tāmen de zhǔyào chūkǒu huòwù shì fǎngzhīpǐn tèbié shì sīchóu hé miánbù
2200.english: Their main exports are textiles, especially silk and cotton.

2201.simplified: 他不敢把令人不快的真情告诉他们。他是条哑吧狗。
2201.traditional: 他不敢把令人不快的真情告訴他們。他是條啞吧狗。
2201.pinyin: tā bù gǎn bǎ lìngrénbùkuài de zhēnqíng gàosu tāmen tā shì tiáo yǎ ba gǒu
2201.english: He is afraid to tell them the unpalatable truths. He is a dumb dog.

2202.simplified: 这栋房子对我们来说不够大，而且离城太远了。
2202.traditional: 這棟房子對我們來說不夠大，而且離城太遠了。
2202.pinyin: zhè dòng fángzi duì wǒmen láishuō bùgòu dà érqiě lí chéng tài yuǎn le
2202.english: This house is not large enough for us, and further, it is too far from the town.

2203.simplified: 大部分印第安人生活在联邦政府建立的保留地上。
2203.traditional: 大部分印第安人生活在聯邦政府建立的保留地上。
2203.pinyin: dàbùfen Yìndì'ānrén shēnghuó zài liánbāngzhèngfǔ jiànlì de bǎoliú dìshang
2203.english: Most Indian live on reservation establish by the federal government.

2204.simplified: 无论报纸上刊登什么荒谬的东西，总有人相信。
2204.traditional: 無論報紙上刊登什麼荒謬的東西，總有人相信。
2204.pinyin: wúlùn bàozhǐ shàng kāndēng shénme huāngmiù de dōngxi zǒng yǒurén xiāngxìn
2204.english: Whatsoever nonsense the newspaper prints, some people always believe it.

2205.simplified: 这幅画表现了牛在溪边饮水的迷人的田园风光。
2205.traditional: 這幅畫表現了牛在溪邊飲水的迷人的田園風光。
2205.pinyin: zhè fú huà biǎoxiàn le niú zài xī biān yǐnshuǐ de mírén de tián yuán fēngguāng
2205.english: The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.

2206.simplified: 孩子喂饱后不哭不闹的满足状使疲惫的母亲很满意。
2206.traditional: 孩子喂飽後不哭不鬧的滿足狀使疲憊的母親很滿意。
2206.pinyin: háizi wèi bǎo hòu bù kū bù nào de mǎnzú zhuàng shǐ píbèi de mǔqīn hěn mǎnyì
2206.english: The quiet contentment of a well-fed child satisfied the tired mother.

2207.simplified: 父亲想到乡下去，可是孩子们吵着要去海滨。
2207.traditional: 父親想到鄉下去，可是孩子們吵著要去海濱。
2207.pinyin: fùqīn xiǎngdào xiāng xiàqù kěshì háizimen chǎo zhe yào qù hǎibīn
2207.english: Father wanted to go to the country, but the children were whooping it up for the beach.

2208.simplified: 最近，许多州坚持中学应该教学生如何开车。
2208.traditional: 最近，許多州堅持中學應該教學生如何開車。
2208.pinyin: zuìjìn xǔduō zhōu jiānchí zhōngxué yīnggāi jiāo xuésheng rúhé kāichē
2208.english: Recently, many states have insisted that high schools teach students how to drive.

2209.simplified: 那人太阳穴上贴了一块膏药，看上去像个卡通人物。
2209.traditional: 那人太陽穴上貼了一塊膏藥，看上去像個卡通人物。
2209.pinyin: nà rén tàiyángxué shàng tiē le yīkuài gāoyao kànshangqu xiàng gè kǎtōng rénwù
2209.english: The man looks like a cartoon character with a plaster on his temple.

2210.simplified: 那架喷气式飞机低飞掠过房顶, 隆隆声把大家吓了一跳.
2210.traditional: 那架噴氣式飛機低飛掠過房頂, 隆隆聲把大家嚇了一跳.
2210.pinyin: nà jià pēnqìshìfēijī dī fēi lüèguò fángdǐng lónglóngshēng bǎ dàjiā xià le yī tiào
2210.english: The jet zoomed low over the houses, frightening everyone.

2211.simplified: 这些优异的成绩给我们全体工作人员带来了莫大的光荣.
2211.traditional: 這些優異的成績給我們全體工作人員帶來了莫大的光榮.
2211.pinyin: zhèxiē yōuyì de chéngjì gěi wǒmen quántǐ gōngzuòrényuán dàilái le mòdà de guāngróng
2211.english: These excellent results reflect great credit on all our staff.

2212.simplified: 庄园主宅第是一栋环抱在美丽的花园中的大理石房子。
2212.traditional: 莊園主宅第是一棟環抱在美麗的花園中的大理石房子。
2212.pinyin: zhuāngyuán zhǔ zhái dì shì yī dòng huánbào zài měilì de huāyuán zhòngdì dàlǐshí fángzi
2212.english: The manor is a marble house surrounded by a beautiful garden.

2213.simplified: 这块地毯已经脏得辨认不出原来的颜色了.
2213.traditional: 這塊地毯已經髒得辨認不出原來的顏色了.
2213.pinyin: zhè kuài dìtǎn yǐjīng zāng dé biànrèn bù chū yuánlái de yánsè le
2213.english: The carpet was badly stained, to such an extent that (ie so much that) you couldn't tell its original colour.

2214.simplified: 各反对党指责修建新机场是浪费纳税人的金钱。
2214.traditional: 各反對黨指責修建新機場是浪費納稅人的金錢。
2214.pinyin: gè fǎnduìdǎng zhǐzé xiūjiàn xīn jīchǎng shì làngfèi nàshuìrén de jīnqián
2214.english: The opposition parties have condemned the new airport as a waste of taxpayers' money.

2215.simplified: 开出鲜艳花朵的爬藤植物瀑布般悬挂在花园墙上。
2215.traditional: 開出鮮豔花朵的爬藤植物瀑布般懸掛在花園牆上。
2215.pinyin: kāi chū xiānyàn huāduǒ de pá téng zhíwù pùbù bān xuánguà zài huāyuán qiáng shàng
2215.english: Climbing plants with their bright flowers hung in cascades over the garden wall.

2216.simplified: 美国的公共教育史起源于早期拓荒者的社会。
2216.traditional: 美國的公共教育史起源於早期拓荒者的社會。
2216.pinyin: Měiguó de gōnggòng jiàoyù shǐ qǐyuán yú zǎoqī tuòhuāngzhě de shèhuì
2216.english: The history of public education in the United States dates from the society of the early pioneers.

2217.simplified: 工会运动旨在争取更高的工资和更好的工作条件。
2217.traditional: 工會運動旨在爭取更高的工資和更好的工作條件。

2218.traditional: 如果你們不是很熟的話，問別人薪水多少是很不禮貌的。

2219.traditional: 熱天穿棉布之類有滲透性的材料制成的衣服最為適宜。

2220.traditional: 美利堅合眾國保證合眾國各州實行共和政體。
2220.pinyin: Měilìjiān Hézhòngguó bǎozhèng hézhòngguó gè zhōu shíxíng gònghézhèngtǐ

2221.traditional: 吉姆在物理考試中作弊卻逃避了懲罰, 麥克則受到責備。

2221.english: Jim got away with cheating in the physics test, while Mike was scolded.

2222.traditional: 他們這些顛覆性的思想是對我們年輕人的精神污染。

2224.traditional: 財務董事派人帶話說，她因不能出席會議而向大家道歉。

2226.traditional: 我們贏得了合同，但是卻經過了多次不屈不撓的談判才達到目的。
