2376.traditional: 我們什麼時候會面合適？
2376.english: What time is suitable for us to meet?

2377.english: What's the matter? Why are you crying?

2378.simplified: 你隔多久就在外面吃一次饭？
2378.traditional: 你隔多久就在外面吃一次飯？
2378.pinyin: nǐ gé duōjiǔ jiù zài wàimiàn chī yīcì fàn
2378.english: How often do you eat out?

2379.simplified: 你跟你的新上司处得如何？
2379.traditional: 你跟你的新上司處得如何？
2379.pinyin: nǐ gēn nǐ de xīn shàngsi chǔ dé rúhé
2379.english: How are you doing with your new boss?

2380.simplified: 他要了两杯酸橙苏打汽水。
2380.traditional: 他要了兩杯酸橙蘇打汽水。
2380.pinyin: tā yào le liǎng bēi suānchéng sūdá qìshuǐ

2381.pinyin: nà zhǐ māo bèi kǎchē niǎn sǐ le
2381.english: The cat got run over by the lorry and squashed.

2382.simplified: 谁掌握国家的最高权力?
2382.traditional: 誰掌握國家的最高權力?
2382.pinyin: shéi zhǎngwò guójiā de zuì gāo quánlì
2382.english: Who holds sovereign power in the state?

2383.simplified: 请问, 我和苏珊说句话行吗?
2383.traditional: 請問, 我和蘇珊說句話行嗎?
2383.pinyin: qǐngwèn wǒ hé Sūshān shuō jù huà xíng ma
2383.english: Can I talk to Susan, please?

2384.simplified: 闭上你的嘴, 没人要你说话!
2384.traditional: 閉上你的嘴, 沒人要你說話!
2384.pinyin: bìshang nǐ de zuǐ méi rén yào nǐ shuōhuà
2384.english: Shut your mouth, nobody asked you!

2385.simplified: 你从哪里学会说英语的呢？
2385.traditional: 你從哪裡學會說英語的呢？
2385.pinyin: nǐ cóng nǎlǐ xuéhuì shuō Yīngyǔ de ne
2385.english: Where did you learn to speak English?

2386.simplified: 他拍了一部关于埃及的电影。
2386.traditional: 他拍了一部關於埃及的電影。
2386.pinyin: tā pāi le yī bù guānyú Āijí de diànyǐng
2386.english: He made a film about Egypt.

2387.simplified: 比萨在（佛罗伦萨的）西边.
2387.traditional: 比薩在（佛羅倫薩的）西邊.
2387.english: Pisa is to the west (of Florence).

2388.english: If only one had an unlimited supply of money!

2389.simplified: 这家公司里谁是决策者？
2389.traditional: 這家公司裡誰是決策者？
2389.pinyin: zhè jiā gōngsī lǐ shéi shì juécèzhě
2389.english: Who is the policy maker in this company?

2390.simplified: 杰弗里斯负责体育新闻组。
2390.traditional: 傑弗裡斯負責體育新聞組。
2390.pinyin: jié fú lǐ sī fùzé tǐyù xīnwénzǔ
2390.english: Jefferies is running the sports desk.

2391.simplified: 他是我认识的最可憎的人。
2391.traditional: 他是我認識的最可憎的人。
2391.pinyin: tā shì wǒ rènshi de zuì kězēng de rén
2391.english: He is the most obnoxious man I know.

2392.pinyin: bùduì yǐ zài guǎngchǎng shàng jíhé

2393.simplified: 去年的雨量是多少英寸？
2393.traditional: 去年的雨量是多少英寸？
2393.pinyin: qùnián de yǔliàng shì duōshao yīngcùn
2393.english: How many inches of rain fell last year?

2394.simplified: 这台机器的制造商在哪？
2394.traditional: 這台機器的制造商在哪？
2394.pinyin: zhè tái jīqì de zhìzàoshāng zài nǎ
2394.english: Where is the manufacturer of the machine?

2395.simplified: 鳝鱼很长而且很难抓住。
2395.traditional: 鱔魚很長而且很難抓住。
2395.pinyin: shànyú hěn cháng érqiě hěn nán zhuāzhù
2395.english: Eels are long and difficult to catch.

2396.simplified: 请把铅笔借给我用用好吗？
2396.traditional: 請把鉛筆借給我用用好嗎？
2396.pinyin: qǐng bǎ qiānbǐ jiègěi wǒ yòng yòng hǎo ma
2396.english: Would you please lend me your pencil?

2397.simplified: 老师要他下课後先别走.
2397.traditional: 老師要他下課後先別走.
2397.pinyin: lǎoshī yào tā xiàkè hòu xiān bié zǒu
2397.english: The teacher told him to stay behind after class.

2398.simplified: 水可以通过蒸馏而提纯。
2398.traditional: 水可以通過蒸餾而提純。
2398.pinyin: shuǐ kěyǐ tōngguò zhēngliú ér tíchún
2398.english: Water can be made pure by distilling it.

2399.simplified: 那只猫大声地发出呼噜呼噜声。
2399.traditional: 那只貓大聲地發出呼嚕呼嚕聲。
2399.pinyin: nà zhǐ māo dàshēng dì fāchū hūlu hūlu shēng

2400.simplified: 你能抽出五分钟和我谈谈吗？
2400.traditional: 你能抽出五分鐘和我談談嗎？
2400.pinyin: nǐ néng chōuchū wǔ fēnzhōng hé wǒ tántán ma
2400.english: Can you spare me five minutes?

2401.simplified: 约翰靠他自己修理录音机。
2401.traditional: 約翰靠他自己修理錄音機。
2401.pinyin: Yuēhàn kào tā zìjǐ xiūlǐ lùyīnjī
2401.english: John fixed the tape recorder by himself.

2402.english: The market is rather depressed at the moment.

2403.simplified: 那是我听到的最愚蠢的事！
2403.traditional: 那是我聽到的最愚蠢的事！
2403.pinyin: nàshi wǒ tīngdào de zuì yúchǔn de shì
2403.english: That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard!

2404.simplified: 我们有 4 亿英镑的贸易顺差.
2404.traditional: 我們有 4 億英鎊的貿易順差.
2404.pinyin: wǒmen yǒu yì Yīngbàng de màoyìshùnchā
2404.english: We have a trade surplus of 400 million.

2405.simplified: 这只夜莺夜里唱得很好听。
2405.traditional: 這只夜鶯夜裡唱得很好聽。
2405.pinyin: zhè zhǐ yèyīng yèli chàng dehěn hǎotīng
2405.english: The nightingale sings sweetly at night.

2406.simplified: 头大是不是表示智慧高？
2406.traditional: 頭大是不是表示智慧高？
2406.english: Is a large head indicative of high intelligence?

2407.simplified: 她年纪那麽大活跃得不得了.
2407.traditional: 她年紀那麼大活躍得不得了.
2407.pinyin: tā niánjì nàme dà huóyuè dé bùdéliǎo
2407.english: She is wonderfully active for her age.

2408.simplified: 他打了个榧子招呼服务员.
2408.traditional: 他打了個榧子招呼服務員.
2408.pinyin: tā dǎ le gè fěi zǐ zhāohu fúwùyuán
2408.english: He snapped his fingers to attract the waiter.

2409.simplified: 有咖喱的菜配米饭最妙.
2409.traditional: 有咖喱的菜配米飯最妙.
2409.pinyin: yǒu gālí de cài pèi mǐfàn zuì miào
2409.english: Rice makes an excellent complement to a curry dish.

2410.simplified: 神父听取那个青年的忏悔。
2410.traditional: 神父聽取那個青年的懺悔。
2410.pinyin: shénfu tīngqǔ nàge qīngnián de chànhuǐ
2410.english: The priest confessed the young man.

2411.simplified: 那疾病多见於农村地区.
2411.traditional: 那疾病多見於農村地區.
2411.pinyin: nà jíbìng duō jiàn yú nóngcūn dìqū
2411.english: The disease occurs most frequently in rural areas.

2412.simplified: 你听说过凯尔特人的传说吗？
2412.traditional: 你聽說過凱爾特人的傳說嗎？
2412.pinyin: nǐ tīngshuō guò Kǎi'ěrtèrén de chuánshuō ma
2412.english: Have you heard the Celtic lore?

2413.simplified: 我们的狗喜欢用嘴接饼乾.
2413.traditional: 我們的狗喜歡用嘴接餅乾.
2413.pinyin: wǒmen de gǒu xǐhuan yòng zuǐ jiē bǐng gān
2413.english: Our dog likes catching biscuits in its mouth.

2414.simplified: 约翰甚至在夏天也不出门。
2414.traditional: 約翰甚至在夏天也不出門。
2414.pinyin: Yuēhàn shènzhì zài xiàtiān yě bù chūmén
2414.english: John doesn't go out even in the summer.

2415.simplified: 玛丽所有的钱是怎么赚到的？
2415.traditional: 瑪麗所有的錢是怎麼賺到的？
2415.pinyin: Mǎlì suǒyǒu de qián shì zěnme zhuàn dào de
2415.english: How did Mary make all of her money?

2416.simplified: 你看新栽的玫瑰长根了吗？
2416.traditional: 你看新栽的玫瑰長根了嗎？
2416.pinyin: nǐ kàn xīn zāi de méiguī cháng gēn le ma
2416.english: Do you think the new rosebush has taken root?

2417.simplified: 我喜欢唱‘山楂树’这首歌。
2417.traditional: 我喜歡唱『山楂樹』這首歌。
2417.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan chàng shānzhā shù zhè shǒugē
2417.english: I like to sing the song 'hawthorn'.

2418.simplified: 例如,伦敦是英国的首都。
2418.traditional: 例如,倫敦是英國的首都。
2418.pinyin: lìrú Lúndūn shì Yīngguó de shǒudū
2418.english: For example, London is the capital of Britain.

2419.simplified: 有司令部的任何命令吗？
2419.traditional: 有司令部的任何命令嗎？
2419.pinyin: yǒu sīlìngbù de rènhé mìnglìng ma
2419.english: Are their any orders coming from the headquarters?

2420.simplified: 这所大学里有多少教室？
2420.traditional: 這所大學裡有多少教室？
2420.pinyin: zhè suǒ dàxué lǐ yǒu duōshao jiàoshì
2420.english: How many schoolrooms are there in this college?

2421.simplified: 炸弹把那座建筑夷为平地。
2421.traditional: 炸彈把那座建築夷為平地。
2421.pinyin: zhàdàn bǎ nà zuò jiànzhù yíwéipíngdì
2421.english: The bombs razed the building to the ground.

2422.simplified: 伦敦也被称为现代巴比伦。
2422.traditional: 倫敦也被稱為現代巴比倫。
2422.pinyin: Lúndūn yě bèi chēngwéi xiàndài Bābǐlún
2422.english: London was also called the modern Babylon.

2423.simplified: 参观博物馆人们络绎不绝。
2423.traditional: 參觀博物館人們絡繹不絕。
2423.english: People went to visit the Museum on and on.

2424.simplified: 他（用手巾）轻轻把脸拍乾.
2424.traditional: 他（用手巾）輕輕把臉拍乾.
2424.pinyin: tā yòng shǒujīn qīngqīng bǎ liǎn pāi gān
2424.english: He patted his face dry (with a towel).

2425.simplified: 你要把蔬菜煮熟还是生吃？
2425.traditional: 你要把蔬菜煮熟還是生吃？
2425.pinyin: nǐ yào bǎ shūcài zhǔshóu háishi shēng chī
2425.english: Do you want your vegetables cooked or raw?

2426.simplified: 医院还有别的方法可以救他吗？
2426.traditional: 醫院還有別的方法可以救他嗎？
2426.pinyin: yīyuàn háiyǒu biéde fāngfǎ kěyǐ jiù tā ma
2426.english: How else can the doctor save him?

2427.simplified: 他们在公园里种了许多紫杉。
2427.traditional: 他們在公園裡種了許多紫杉。
2427.pinyin: tāmen zài gōngyuán lǐ zhǒng le xǔduō zǐshān
2427.english: They planted many yews in the park.

2428.simplified: 这本新书名叫《爱情故事》。
2428.traditional: 這本新書名叫《愛情故事》。
2428.pinyin: zhè běn xīn shūmíng jiào àiqíng gùshi
2428.english: The new book is entitled Love Story.

2429.simplified: 你看了关于选举的新闻了吗？
2429.traditional: 你看了關於選舉的新聞了嗎？
2429.pinyin: nǐ kàn le guānyú xuǎnjǔ de xīnwén le ma
2429.english: Have you read the news about the election?

2430.simplified: 回去? 我宁可移居海外也不回去!
2430.traditional: 回去? 我寧可移居海外也不回去!
2430.pinyin: huíqu wǒ nìngkě yíjū hǎiwài yě bù huíqu
2430.english: Go back there? I'd sooner emigrate!

2431.simplified: 我真的必须参加这个会议吗？
2431.traditional: 我真的必須參加這個會議嗎？
2431.pinyin: wǒ zhēn de bìxū cānjiā zhège huìyì ma
2431.english: Is it necessary for me to attend the meeting?

2432.simplified: 所有的计算机都使用二进制吗？
2432.traditional: 所有的計算機都使用二進制嗎？
2432.pinyin: suǒyǒu de jìsuànjī dōu shǐyòng èrjìnzhì ma
2432.english: Do all computers use binary system?

2433.simplified: 那位矮男孩是谁？那位是比尔。
2433.traditional: 那位矮男孩是誰？那位是比爾。
2433.pinyin: nà wèi ǎi nánhái shì shéi nà wèi shì Bǐ'ěr
2433.english: Who is that short boy? That is Bill.

2434.simplified: 她看上去像一个矜持的少女。
2434.traditional: 她看上去像一個矜持的少女。
2434.pinyin: tā kànshangqu xiàng yī gè jīnchí de shàonǚ
2434.english: She looks like a very demure young lady.

2435.simplified: 画中的苹果显得多逼真啊！
2435.traditional: 畫中的蘋果顯得多逼真啊！
2435.pinyin: huà zhòngdì píngguǒ xiǎnde duō bīzhēn ā
2435.english: What a realistic looking apple in the picture!

2436.simplified: 这件传统服装是靛蓝色的。
2436.traditional: 這件傳統服裝是靛藍色的。
2436.pinyin: zhè jiàn chuántǒng fúzhuāng shì diànlánsè de
2436.english: This traditional costume is of indigo blue.

2437.simplified: 一颗子弹嗖的一声从我耳边飞过。
2437.traditional: 一顆子彈嗖的一聲從我耳邊飛過。
2437.pinyin: zhè jiàn chuántǒng fúzhuāng shì diànlánsè de
2437.english: A bullet whizzed past my ear.

2438.simplified: 他给马装上鞍子便骑马离去了。
2438.traditional: 他給馬裝上鞍子便騎馬離去了。
2438.pinyin: tā gěi mǎ zhuāng shàng ān zǐ biàn qímǎ líqù le
2438.english: He saddled up his horse and rode away.

2439.simplified: 他停止扫地，倚着扫帚休息。
2439.traditional: 他停止掃地，倚著掃帚休息。
2439.pinyin: tā tíngzhǐ sǎodì yǐ zhe sàozhou xiūxi
2439.english: He stopped sweeping and rested on the broom.

2440.simplified: 当地地主常常虐待农民。
2440.traditional: 當地地主常常虐待農民。
2440.english: The local lords often treated the peasants badly.

2441.simplified: 这一段长城有八个垛口。
2441.traditional: 這一段長城有八個垛口。
2441.pinyin: zhè yī duàn Chángchéng yǒu bā gè duǒkǒu
2441.english: There are eight forts in this section of the Great Wall.

2442.simplified: 这个岛的纬度是北纬三十度。
2442.traditional: 這個島的緯度是北緯三十度。
2442.pinyin: zhège dǎo de wěidù shì běiwěi sānshí dù
2442.english: The latitude of the island is 30 degrees north.

2443.simplified: 澳大利亚是一个讲英语的国家。
2443.traditional: 澳大利亞是一個講英語的國家。
2443.pinyin: Àodàlìyà shì yī gè jiǎng Yīngyǔ de guójiā
2443.english: Australia is an English speaking nation.

2444.simplified: 我对他知识的渊博感到惊奇。
2444.traditional: 我對他知識的淵博感到驚奇。
2444.pinyin: wǒ duì tā zhīshi de yuānbó gǎndào jīngqí
2444.english: I was amazed at the extent of his knowledge.

2445.simplified: 我喜欢收集秋天赤褐色的叶子。
2445.traditional: 我喜歡收集秋天赤褐色的葉子。
2445.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan shōují qiūtiān chìhèsè de yèzi
2445.english: I like to collect russet autumn leaves.

2446.simplified: 这两个概念之间有何联系？
2446.traditional: 這兩個概念之間有何聯系？
2446.pinyin: zhè liǎng gè gàiniàn zhījiān yǒu hé liánxì
2446.english: What is the connection between the two ideas?

2447.simplified: 啊，我真喜欢这首歌！好高兴！
2447.traditional: 啊，我真喜歡這首歌！好高興！
2447.pinyin: ā wǒ zhēn xǐhuan zhè shǒugē hǎo gāoxìng
2447.english: Ah, I really love this song! I am so glad!

2448.simplified: 他们在山脚下支起了帐篷。
2448.traditional: 他們在山腳下支起了帳篷。
2448.pinyin: tāmen zài shānjiǎo xià zhī qǐ le zhàngpeng
2448.english: They erected their tent at the foot of the mountain.

2449.simplified: 香蕉、 苹果和橘子都是水果.
2449.traditional: 香蕉、 蘋果和橘子都是水果.
2449.pinyin: xiāngjiāo píngguǒ hé júzi dōu shì shuǐguǒ
2449.english: Bananas, apples and oranges are all fruit.

2450.simplified: 他在昨晚的比赛中独得了48分。
2450.traditional: 他在昨晚的比賽中獨得了48分。
2450.pinyin: tā zài zuówǎn de bǐsài zhōng dú déle fēn
2450.english: He made 48 baskets in the game last night.

2451.simplified: 这是中文－－我一点儿都不懂。
2451.traditional: 這是中文－－我一點兒都不懂。
2451.pinyin: zhè shì Zhōngwén wǒ yīdiǎnr dōu bù dǒng
2451.english: It's in Chinese I can make little of it.

2452.simplified: 她学撒切尔夫人的样子倒挺像哩。
2452.traditional: 她學撒切爾夫人的樣子倒挺像哩。
2452.pinyin: tā xué Sāqiē'ěr Fūren de yàngzi dǎo tǐng xiàng lǐ
2452.english: She does Mrs. Thatcher rather well.

2453.simplified: 咱们把课文[生词]再复习一遍。
2453.traditional: 咱們把課文[生詞]再復習一遍。
2453.pinyin: zánmen bǎ kèwén shēngcí zài fùxí yībiàn
2453.english: Let's go over the lesson[new words]again.

2454.simplified: 你知道谁是电灯的发明者？
2454.traditional: 你知道誰是電燈的發明者？
2454.pinyin: nǐ zhīdào shéi shì diàndēng de fāmíngzhě
2454.english: Do you know who is the creator of the electric bulb?

2455.simplified: 桦树有光滑的皮和细长的枝。
2455.traditional: 樺樹有光滑的皮和細長的枝。
2455.pinyin: huàshù yǒu guānghuá de pí hé xìcháng de zhī
2455.english: The birch has smooth bark and slender branches.

2456.pinyin: yàn yī cháo déle lì tòngkǔ biàn wàngjì
2456.english: Pain is forgotten where gain follows.

2457.simplified: 玛利把许多吃的放在冰箱里了。
2457.traditional: 瑪利把許多吃的放在冰箱裡了。
2457.pinyin: mǎ lì bǎ xǔduō chī de fàng zài bīngxiāng lǐ le
2457.english: Mary put a lot of food in the refrigerator.

2458.simplified: 这老人没有手杖就走不了路。
2458.traditional: 這老人沒有手杖就走不了路。
2458.pinyin: zhè lǎorén méiyǒu shǒuzhàng jiù zǒu bùliǎo lù

2459.simplified: 你知道美国的三大电视网吗？
2459.traditional: 你知道美國的三大電視網嗎？
2459.pinyin: nǐ zhīdào Měiguó de sān dà diànshì wǎng ma
2459.english: Do you know the three USA television networks?

2460.simplified: 蝙蝠在夜间飞行，以昆虫为食。
2460.traditional: 蝙蝠在夜間飛行，以昆蟲為食。
2460.pinyin: biānfú zài yèjiān fēixíng yǐ kūnchóng wéi shí

2461.traditional: 護士給病人清洗皮膚、 刮去毛發.
2461.pinyin: hùshi gěi bìngrén qīngxǐ pífū guā qù máofà

2462.traditional: 他翻閱地址簿，尋找號碼。
2462.pinyin: tā fānyuè dìzhǐ bù xúnzhǎo hàomǎ

2463.simplified: 我该怎样才能报答你的好意呢？
2463.traditional: 我該怎樣才能報答你的好意呢？
2463.pinyin: wǒ gāi zěnyàng cáinéng bàodá nǐ de hǎoyì ne
2463.english: How can I ever repay you for your kindness?

2464.simplified: 我冤枉了她，怎样才能补救呢？
2464.traditional: 我冤枉了她，怎樣才能補救呢？
2464.pinyin: wǒ yuānwang le tā zěnyàng cáinéng bǔjiù ne
2464.english: How can I repair the wrong I have done her?

2465.simplified: 帮我洗洗这些锅碗瓢盆好吗？
2465.traditional: 幫我洗洗這些鍋碗瓢盆好嗎？
2465.pinyin: bāng wǒ xǐ xǐ zhèxiē guō wǎn piáo pén hǎo ma
2465.english: Will you help me to wash up all these pots and pans?

2466.simplified: 你到美国是坐船还是坐飞机？
2466.traditional: 你到美國是坐船還是坐飛機？
2466.pinyin: nǐ dào Měiguó shì zuò chuán háishi zuòfēijī
2466.english: Are you going to America by boat or by plane?

2467.simplified: 他用欧芹的嫩枝点缀在鸡上。
2467.traditional: 他用歐芹的嫩枝點綴在雞上。
2467.pinyin: tā yòng ōuqín de nèn zhī diǎnzhuì zài jī shàng
2467.english: He decorated the chicken with sprigs of parsley.

2468.simplified: 太阳、月亮和星星都是天体。
2468.traditional: 太陽、月亮和星星都是天體。
2468.pinyin: tàiyang yuèliang hé xīngxing dōu shì tiāntǐ
2468.english: The sun, moon and stars are heavenly bodies.

2469.simplified: 这支歌的乐曲使她心旷神怡。
2469.traditional: 這支歌的樂曲使她心曠神怡。
2469.pinyin: zhè zhī gē de yuèqǔ shǐ tā xīnkuàngshényí
2469.english: The music of this song sent her carefree and joyous.

2470.simplified: 他在40 个人的班级里排第九名。
2470.traditional: 他在40 個人的班級裡排第九名。
2470.pinyin: tā zài gèrén de bānjí lǐ pái dì jiǔ míng
2470.english: He took the ninth position in his class of forty.

2471.simplified: 这个屋子的面积是80平方米。
2471.traditional: 這個屋子的面積是80平方米。
2471.pinyin: zhège wūzi de miànjī shì píngfāngmǐ
2471.english: The overall measurement of this room is 80 square meters.

2472.simplified: 她把画儿上的一小部分擦乾净了.
2472.traditional: 她把畫兒上的一小部分擦乾淨了.
2472.pinyin: tā bǎ huàr shàng de yīxiǎobùfèn cāgān jìng le
2472.english: She cleaned a small segment of the painting.

2473.simplified: 秋天树叶由绿色变成黄褐色。
2473.traditional: 秋天樹葉由綠色變成黃褐色。
2473.pinyin: qiūtiān shùyè yóu lǜsè biànchéng huánghèsè
2473.english: In autumn the leaves change from green to brown.

2474.simplified: 【谚】东也好，西也好，还是家最好。
2474.traditional: 【諺】東也好，西也好，還是家最好。
2474.pinyin: yàn dōng yě hǎo xī yě hǎo háishi jiā zuìhǎo
2474.english: East or west, home is best.

2475.simplified: 崎岖不平的道路使车颠簸得很厉害。
2475.traditional: 崎嶇不平的道路使車顛簸得很厲害。
2475.pinyin: qíqū bùpíng de dàolù shǐ chē diānbǒ dehěn lìhai
2475.english: The rough road made the car vibrate.

2476.simplified: 女王以传统仪式举行了加冕礼。
2476.traditional: 女王以傳統儀式舉行了加冕禮。
2476.pinyin: nǚwáng yǐ chuántǒng yíshì jǔxíng le jiāmiǎn lǐ
2476.english: The queen was crowned with proper ceremony.

2477.simplified: 人们聚集在篝火周围唱歌。
2477.traditional: 人們聚集在篝火周圍唱歌。
2477.pinyin: rénmen jùjí zài gōuhuǒ zhōuwéi chànggē
2477.english: The men clustered together round the fire and sang songs.

2478.english: Preposition is abbreviated as ""prep"" in this dictionary.

2479.simplified: 你真的一点也不关心你的将来？
2479.traditional: 你真的一點也不關心你的將來？
2479.pinyin: nǐ zhēn de yīdiǎn yě bù guānxīn nǐ de jiānglái
2479.english: Do you really care nothing about your future?

2480.simplified: 我可以搭乘你的便车到车站吗？
2480.traditional: 我可以搭乘你的便車到車站嗎？
2480.pinyin: wǒ kěyǐ dāchéng nǐ de biànchē dào chēzhàn ma
2480.english: Can I hitch a lift with you as far as the station?

2481.simplified: 窗帘上绘有精美的花卉图案。
2481.traditional: 窗簾上繪有精美的花卉圖案。
2481.pinyin: chuānglián shàng huì yǒu jīngměi de huāhuì tú'àn
2481.english: The curtains had an elaborate pattern of flowers.

2482.simplified: 水痘是一种常见的儿童期疾病。
2482.traditional: 水痘是一種常見的兒童期疾病。
2482.pinyin: shuǐdòu shì yīzhǒng chángjiàn de értóng qī jíbìng
2482.english: Chicken pox is a common childhood sickness.

2483.simplified: 你认为他当真要离开公司吗？
2483.traditional: 你認為他當真要離開公司嗎？
2483.pinyin: nǐ rènwéi tā dāngzhēn yào líkāi gōngsī ma
2483.english: Do you think he is serious about leaving the company?

2484.pinyin: jīngtōng yī mén wàiyǔ nán bù nán
2484.english: Is it difficult to feel at home in (ie confident when using) a foreign language?

2485.simplified: 懦夫一生要经过许多次死的痛苦。
2485.traditional: 懦夫一生要經過許多次死的痛苦。
2485.pinyin: nuòfū yīshēng yào jīngguò xǔduō cì sǐ de tòngkǔ
2485.english: Cowards die many times before their death.

2486.simplified: 我还能有别的方法可以向她道歉吗？
2486.traditional: 我還能有別的方法可以向她道歉嗎？
2486.pinyin: wǒ hái néng yǒu biéde fāngfǎ kěyǐ xiàng tā dàoqiàn ma

2487.simplified: 谁把我写在黑板上的数字擦掉了?
2487.traditional: 誰把我寫在黑板上的數字擦掉了?
2487.pinyin: shéi bǎ wǒ xiě zài hēibǎn shàng de shùzì cādiào le
2487.english: Who's rubbed my figures off the blackboard?

2488.simplified: 游完泳后你愿意放松一下吗？
2488.traditional: 游完泳後你願意放松一下嗎？
2488.pinyin: yóu wán yǒng hòu nǐ yuànyì fàngsōng yīxià ma

2489.traditional: 一座雄偉的大橋橫亙在大江之上。
2489.pinyin: yī zuò xióngwěi de Dà Qiáo héng gèn zài dà jiāng zhīshàng
2489.english: A magnificent bridge spans the river.

2490.simplified: 伦敦是世界上最大的城市之一。
2490.traditional: 倫敦是世界上最大的城市之一。
2490.pinyin: Lúndūn shì shìjiè shàng zuì dà de chéngshì zhīyī
2490.english: London is among the greatest cities of the world.

2491.simplified: 你弟弟今天上午在公园玩耍吗？
2491.traditional: 你弟弟今天上午在公園玩耍嗎？
2491.pinyin: nǐ dìdi jīntiān shàngwǔ zài gōngyuán wánshuǎ ma

2492.traditional: 什麼是解決這個問題的最好方法？
2492.pinyin: shénme shì jiějué zhège wèntí de zuìhǎo fāngfǎ

2493.traditional: 包餃子前，我把瘦肉細細剁碎。

2494.simplified: 要是问题一次只发生一个该多好！
2494.traditional: 要是問題一次只發生一個該多好！
2494.pinyin: yàoshi wèntí yīcì zhǐ fāshēng yī gè gāi duō hǎo

2495.simplified: 总统正在对欧洲做私人访问。
2495.traditional: 總統正在對歐洲做私人訪問。
2495.pinyin: zǒngtǒng zhèngzài duì Ōuzhōu zuò sīrén fǎngwèn

2496.traditional: 咱們一起復習你的英語練習好嗎？

2497.traditional: 你看到火車站對面的房子了嗎？
2497.pinyin: nǐ kàn dào huǒchēzhàn duìmiàn de fángzi le ma

2498.simplified: 你能告诉我这些鞋子的零售价吗？
2498.traditional: 你能告訴我這些鞋子的零售價嗎？
2498.pinyin: nǐ néng gàosu wǒ zhèxiē xiézi de líng shòujià ma
2498.english: Could you tell me the retail prices of these shoes?

2499.simplified: 这只小动物有一双淡褐色的眼睛。
2499.traditional: 這只小動物有一雙淡褐色的眼睛。
2499.pinyin: zhè zhǐ xiǎo dòngwù yǒu yī shuāng dàn hèsè de yǎnjing

2500.simplified: 这个女人说：""也许他又聋又哑吧。""
2500.traditional: 這個女人說：""也許他又聾又啞吧。""
2500.pinyin: zhège nǚrén shuō yěxǔ tā yòu lóng yòu yǎ ba
2500.english: Perhaps he's deaf and dumb, "" said the woman.

2501.simplified: 谁自愿来帮忙收拾一下这些盘子？
2501.traditional: 誰自願來幫忙收拾一下這些盤子？
2501.pinyin: shéi zìyuàn lái bāngmáng shōushi yīxià zhèxiē pánzi
2501.english: Can I have a volunteer to wash the dishes?

2502.simplified: 我丢了一块带蓝色花边的白手绢。
2502.traditional: 我丟了一塊帶藍色花邊的白手絹。
2502.pinyin: wǒ diū le yīkuài dài lánsè huābiān de bái shǒujuàn

2503.simplified: 车朝我开过来时约翰叫道:""小心!""
2503.traditional: 車朝我開過來時約翰叫道:""小心!""
2503.pinyin: chē cháo wǒ kāi guòlái shí Yuēhàn jiàodào xiǎoxīn
2503.english: Look out!"" Jone called as the car came towards me.

2504.simplified: 日落时, 西边天空有一道红晖.
2504.traditional: 日落時, 西邊天空有一道紅暉.
2504.pinyin: rìluò shí xībiān tiānkōng yǒu yīdào hóng huī
2504.english: At sunset, there was a bar of red across the western sky.

2505.traditional: 貴國是什麼時候實行普選權的？
2505.pinyin: guìguó shì shénmeshíhou shíxíng pǔxuǎnquán de

2506.simplified: 请您告诉我怎样去联络律师？
2506.traditional: 請您告訴我怎樣去聯絡律師？
2506.pinyin: qǐng nín gàosu wǒ zěnyàng qù liánluò lǜshī
2506.english: Could you please inform me how to go about contacting a lawyer?

2507.simplified: 他们正在建设一条海底电缆隧道。
2507.traditional: 他們正在建設一條海底電纜隧道。
2507.pinyin: tāmen zhèngzài jiànshè yī tiáo hǎidǐ diànlǎn suìdào
2507.english: They are building a submarine cable tunnel.

2508.simplified: 你能告诉我去火车站最近的路吗？
2508.traditional: 你能告訴我去火車站最近的路嗎？
2508.pinyin: nǐ néng gàosu wǒ qù huǒchēzhàn zuìjìn de lù ma
2508.english: Can you tell me the nearest way to the railway station?

2509.simplified: 我坐在庭院里享受明媚的阳光。
2509.traditional: 我坐在庭院裡享受明媚的陽光。
2509.pinyin: wǒ zuò zài tíngyuàn lǐ xiǎngshòu míngmèi de yángguāng
2509.english: I was sitting in the garden enjoying the sunshine.

2510.simplified: 送小孩上学的重担又推给了我！
2510.traditional: 送小孩上學的重擔又推給了我！
2510.pinyin: sòng xiǎohái shàngxué de zhòngdàn yòu tuī gěi le wǒ
2510.english: I got saddled with taking the children to school again!

2511.simplified: 中央C音相当於每秒钟振动256次.
2511.traditional: 中央C音相當於每秒鐘振動256次.
2511.pinyin: zhōngyāng yīn xiāngdāng yú měi miǎozhōng zhèndòng cì
2511.english: Middle C is equivalent to 256 vibrations per second.

2512.simplified: 克莱尔, 那板上的画儿是你的大作吗?
2512.traditional: 克萊爾, 那板上的畫兒是你的大作嗎?
2512.pinyin: Kèlái ěr nà bǎn shàng de huàr shì nǐ de dàzuò ma
2512.english: Is that drawing on the board your handiwork, Clare?

2513.simplified: 你是怎样庆祝结婚周年纪念日的？
2513.traditional: 你是怎樣慶祝結婚周年紀念日的？
2513.pinyin: nǐ shì zěnyàng qìngzhù jiéhūn zhōunián jìniànrì de
2513.english: How did you celebrate your wedding anniversary?

2514.simplified: 月球对地球的吸引力造成潮汐。
2514.traditional: 月球對地球的吸引力造成潮汐。
2514.pinyin: yuèqiú duì dìqiú de xīyǐnlì zàochéng cháoxī
2514.english: The attraction of the moon for the earth causes the tides.

2515.simplified: 你还记得我们解剖青蛙的那堂课吗？
2515.traditional: 你還記得我們解剖青蛙的那堂課嗎？
2515.pinyin: nǐ hái jìde wǒmen jiěpōu qīngwā de nà táng kè ma
2515.english: Do you remember the lesson on the anatomy of a frog?

2516.simplified: 这本书名为《美国文学指南》。
2516.traditional: 這本書名為《美國文學指南》。
2516.pinyin: zhè běn shūmíng wéi Měiguó wénxué zhǐnán
2516.english: This book is titled An Introduction to American Literature.

2517.simplified: ｀他听得见我们的话吗?＇｀大概听不见.＇
2517.traditional: ｀他聽得見我們的話嗎?＇｀大概聽不見.＇
2517.pinyin: tā tīngdéjiàn wǒmen dehuà ma dàgài tīngbujiàn

2518.simplified: 你能不能派个助手来取这份档案？
2518.traditional: 你能不能派個助手來取這份檔案？
2518.pinyin: tā tīngdéjiàn wǒmen dehuà ma dàgài tīngbujiàn
2518.english: Can you send one of your minions to collect this file?

2519.simplified: 这位不是别人，正是我的老朋友约翰。
2519.traditional: 這位不是別人，正是我的老朋友約翰。
2519.pinyin: zhèwèi bùshì biéren zhèngshì wǒ de lǎopéngyou Yuēhàn
2519.english: This is no other than my old friend, John.

2520.simplified: 这些树林里经常栖息着各种鸟类。
2520.traditional: 這些樹林裡經常棲息著各種鳥類。
2520.pinyin: zhèxiē shùlín lǐ jīngcháng qīxī zhe gèzhǒng niǎolèi
2520.english: These woods are frequented by all kinds of birds.

2521.simplified: 她提　一个棕色的纸包，里面是书。
2521.traditional: 她提　一個棕色的紙包，裡面是書。
2521.pinyin: tā tí yī gè zōngsè de zhǐ bāo lǐmiàn shì shū
2521.english: She was carrying a parcel of books done up in brown paper.

2522.simplified: 劳驾，您能告诉我在哪能买到邮票吗？
2522.traditional: 勞駕，您能告訴我在哪能買到郵票嗎？
2522.pinyin: láojià nín néng gàosu wǒ zài nǎ néng mǎi dào yóupiào ma
2522.english: Excuse me, can you tell where to get stamp?

2523.simplified: 不要着急：这项工程会有好结果的
2523.traditional: 不要著急：這項工程會有好結果的
2523.pinyin: bùyào zháojí zhè xiàng gōngchéng huì yǒu hǎo jiéguǒ de
2523.english: Don't worry: this project will come out in the wash.

2524.simplified: 我（那时）很着急。－－你用不着着急嘛。
2524.traditional: 我（那時）很著急。－－你用不著著急嘛。
2524.pinyin: wǒ nàshí hěn zháojí nǐ yòngbuzháo zháojí ma
2524.english: I was worried. You needn't have been.

2525.simplified: 他坐在操场上，聆听远处的蛙鸣。
2525.traditional: 他坐在操場上，聆聽遠處的蛙鳴。
2525.pinyin: tā zuò zài cāochǎng shàng língtīng yuǎnchù de wā míng
2525.english: He sat on the playground listening to the distant croak.

2526.simplified: 那次行进速度很快, 到中午已抵达伦敦.
2526.traditional: 那次行進速度很快, 到中午已抵達倫敦.
2526.pinyin: nà cì xíngjìn sùdù hěn kuài dào zhōngwǔ yǐ dǐdá Lúndūn
2526.english: It was good going to reach London by midday.

2527.simplified: 克里斯托弗·哥伦布是伟大的探险家。
2527.traditional: 克裡斯托弗·哥倫布是偉大的探險家。
2527.pinyin: Kèlǐsītuōfú Gēlúnbù shì wěidà de tànxiǎnjiā
2527.english: Christopher Columbus was one of the great explorers.

2528.simplified: 他们在外国保持多少个军事基地？
2528.traditional: 他們在外國保持多少個軍事基地？
2528.pinyin: tāmen zài wàiguó bǎochí duōshao gè jūnshìjīdì
2528.english: How many military bases are they maintaining on foreign soil?

2529.simplified: 我想请你下星期日去参加舞会好吗？
2529.traditional: 我想請你下星期日去參加舞會好嗎？
2529.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ xià Xīngqīrì qù cānjiā wǔhuì hǎo ma
2529.english: I would like to invite you to a ball next Sunday.

2530.simplified: 你去开会之前，咱们能私下说句话吗？
2530.traditional: 你去開會之前，咱們能私下說句話嗎？
2530.pinyin: nǐ qù kāihuì zhīqián zánmen néng sīxià shuō jù huà ma
2530.english: Could we have a word before you go to the meeting?

2531.simplified: 我喜欢夏天吃莴苣，我的兔子也喜欢。
2531.traditional: 我喜歡夏天吃萵苣，我的兔子也喜歡。
2531.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan xiàtiān chī wōjù wǒ de tùzi yě xǐhuan
2531.english: I like to eat lettuce in summer, and so does my rabbit.

2532.simplified: 咒语将青蛙和老鼠又变回成了人。
2532.traditional: 咒語將青蛙和老鼠又變回成了人。
2532.pinyin: zhòuyǔ jiāng qīngwā hé lǎoshǔ yòu biàn huí chéngle rén
2532.english: The magic spell changed the frogs and rats back into men.

2533.simplified: 火蜥蜴曾被认为能生活于火中。
2533.traditional: 火蜥蜴曾被認為能生活於火中。
2533.pinyin: huǒxīyì céng bèi rènwéi néng shēnghuó yú huǒ zhōng
2533.english: Salamanders once were thought to be capable of living in fire.

2534.simplified: 这个悬而未决的问题什么时候能解决呢？
2534.traditional: 這個懸而未決的問題什麼時候能解決呢？
2534.pinyin: zhège xuán'érwèijué de wèntí shénmeshíhou néng jiějué ne
2534.english: When will the pendent problem be solved?

2535.simplified: 公爵命令仆人把一封信送给国王。
2535.traditional: 公爵命令僕人把一封信送給國王。
2535.pinyin: gōngjué mìnglìng púrén bǎ yī fēng xìn sònggěi guówáng
2535.english: The duke ordered the servant to send a letter to the king.

2536.simplified: 你的意见是否代表其他学生的意见？
2536.traditional: 你的意見是否代表其他學生的意見？
2536.pinyin: nǐ de yìjiàn shìfǒu dàibiǎo qítā xuésheng de yìjiàn
2536.english: Are your opinions representative of the other students?

2537.simplified: “这是您的车吗，先生？” 警察问道。
2537.traditional: 「這是您的車嗎，先生？」 警察問道。
2537.pinyin: zhè shì nín de chē ma xiānsheng jǐngchá wèndào
2537.english: Is this your vehicle, sir?"" asked the policeman.

2538.simplified: 我建议刚开始爬山的人使用拐杖。
2538.traditional: 我建議剛開始爬山的人使用拐杖。
2538.pinyin: wǒ jiànyì gāng kāishǐ páshān de rén shǐyòng guǎizhàng
2538.english: When climbing a mountain I advise beginners to use a staff.

2539.simplified: 他这个人有点轻薄--别跟他太认真!
2539.traditional: 他這個人有點輕薄--別跟他太認真!
2539.pinyin: tā zhège rén yǒudiǎn qīngbó bié gēn tā tài rènzhēn
2539.english: He's a bit of a philanderer -- don't take him too seriously!

2540.simplified: 她不但参加了竞赛--而且居然获胜了!
2540.traditional: 她不但參加了競賽--而且居然獲勝了!
2540.pinyin: tā bùdàn cānjiā le jìngsài érqiě jūrán huòshèng le
2540.english: She not only entered the competition she actually won it!

2541.simplified: 衣、 食、 住所是生活的基本必需品.
2541.traditional: 衣、 食、 住所是生活的基本必需品.
2541.pinyin: yì shí zhùsuǒ shì shēnghuó de jīběn bìxūpǐn
2541.english: Food, clothing and shelter are all basic necessities of life.

2542.simplified: 空气中有熏衣草和迷迭香花的味道。
2542.traditional: 空氣中有熏衣草和迷迭香花的味道。
2542.pinyin: kōngqì zhōng yǒu xūnyīcǎo hé mí dié xiānghuā de wèidao
2542.english: There is a lavender scent and rosemary scent in the air.

2543.simplified: 父亲有时候带着手杖出去散步。
2543.traditional: 父親有時候帶著手杖出去散步。
2543.pinyin: fùqīn yǒushíhou dài zhuóshǒu zhàng chūqù sànbù
2543.english: My father sometimes goes out for a stroll with a stick in his hand.

2544.simplified: 你读了有关信息革命的那篇文章没有？
2544.traditional: 你讀了有關信息革命的那篇文章沒有？
2544.pinyin: nǐ dú le yǒuguān xìnxī gémìng de nà piān wénzhāng méiyǒu
2544.english: Have you read the article on information revolution?

2545.simplified: 五、 四、 三、 二、 一、 零. 我们升空了!
2545.traditional: 五、 四、 三、 二、 一、 零. 我們升空了!
2545.pinyin: wǔ sì sān èr yī líng wǒmen shēngkōng le
2545.english: Five, four, three, two, one, zero. We have lift-off!

2546.simplified: 你把玩具玩儿完了以後放进柜子里去.
2546.traditional: 你把玩具玩兒完了以後放進櫃子裡去.
2546.pinyin: nǐ bǎ wánjù wánrwán le yǐhòu fàngjìn guìzi lǐ qù
2546.english: Put your toys away in the cupboard, when you've finished playing.

2547.simplified: 她爱市场上的生趣、喧哗与多姿多彩。
2547.traditional: 她愛市場上的生趣、喧嘩與多姿多彩。
2547.pinyin: tā ài shìchǎng shàng de shēng qù xuānhuá yǔ duōzīduōcǎi
2547.english: She loved the life, noise, and color of the market.

2548.simplified: 万岁日本人在进攻时的呐喊或爱国的欢呼；
2548.traditional: 萬歲日本人在進攻時的吶喊或愛國的歡呼；
2548.pinyin: wànsuì Rìběnrén zài jìngōng shí de nàhǎn huò àiguó de huānhū
2548.english: A Japanese battle cry or patriotic cheer.

2549.simplified: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心。
2549.traditional: 他日夜祈求上帝賦予他虔敬的心。
2549.pinyin: tā rìyè qíqiú Shàngdì fùyǔ tā qiánjìng de xīn
2549.english: He prayed to God night and day to endue him with the spirit of holiness.

2550.simplified: 最初她只是微笑，後来才放声大笑。
2550.traditional: 最初她只是微笑，後來才放聲大笑。
2550.pinyin: zuìchū tā zhǐshì wēixiào hòu lái cái fàngshēng dàxiào
2550.english: First of all she just smiled, then she started to laugh.

2551.simplified: 想到还需重新考试，我就感到沮丧。
2551.traditional: 想到還需重新考試，我就感到沮喪。
2551.pinyin: xiǎngdào hái xū chóngxīn kǎoshì wǒ jiù gǎndào jǔsàng
2551.english: The thought of having to take the exam again depressed me.

2552.simplified: 她晚了一个钟头了吧? 她就是这样.
2552.traditional: 她晚了一個鐘頭了吧? 她就是這樣.
2552.pinyin: tā wǎn le yī gè zhōngtóu le ba tā jiùshì zhèyàng
2552.english: She was an hour late, was she? That's about par for the course for her.

2553.simplified: 日记簿用来保存个人经历记载的本子
2553.traditional: 日記簿用來保存個人經歷記載的本子
2553.pinyin: rìjì bù yònglái bǎocún gèrén jīnglì jìzǎi de běnzi
2553.english: A book for use in keeping a personal record, as of experiences.

2554.simplified: 公园对大城市的居民是大有裨益的设施。
2554.traditional: 公園對大城市的居民是大有裨益的設施。
2554.pinyin: gōngyuán duì dàchéngshì de jūmín shì dàyǒubìyì de shèshī
2554.english: Parks are a great boon to people in big cities.

2555.simplified: 我们刚才看见的那位同志是你的老师吗？
2555.traditional: 我們剛才看見的那位同志是你的老師嗎？
2555.pinyin: wǒmen gāngcái kànjiàn de nà wèi tóngzhì shì nǐ de lǎoshī ma
2555.english: Be the comrade whom we see just now your teacher?

2556.simplified: 她与原来的丈夫离婚十年後又复婚了.
2556.traditional: 她與原來的丈夫離婚十年後又復婚了.
2556.pinyin: tā yǔ yuánlái de zhàngfu líhūn shí nián hòu yòu fùhūn le
2556.english: She remarried her former husband ten years after their divorce.

2557.simplified: 玛丽不但清扫房间而且也洗刷窗子。
2557.traditional: 瑪麗不但清掃房間而且也洗刷窗子。
2557.pinyin: Mǎlì bùdàn qīngsǎo fángjiān érqiě yě xǐshuā chuāngzi
2557.english: Mary not only cleaned the room but (also) washed the window.

2558.simplified: 你能相信我只花了25美元就买了一台电视吗?
2558.traditional: 你能相信我只花了25美元就買了一台電視嗎?
2558.pinyin: nǐ néng xiāngxìn wǒ zhǐ huā le Měiyuán jiù mǎi le yī tái diànshì ma
2558.english: Can you believe that I bought a TV for $25?

2559.simplified: 作者从每本卖出的书中可得10%的版税。
2559.traditional: 作者從每本賣出的書中可得10%的版稅。
2559.pinyin: zuòzhě cóng měi běn màichū de shū zhōng kě dé de bǎnshuì
2559.english: The writer gets a 10% royalty on each copy sold of his book.

2560.simplified: 今天早晨报上有什么有趣的新闻吗？
2560.traditional: 今天早晨報上有什麼有趣的新聞嗎？
2560.pinyin: jīntiān zǎochén bàoshàng yǒu shénme yǒuqù de xīnwén ma
2560.english: Are there any interesting news items in the paper this morning?

2561.simplified: 我们真的处于困境——没人照顾婴儿。
2561.traditional: 我們真的處於困境——沒人照顧嬰兒。
2561.pinyin: wǒmen zhēn de chǔyú kùnjìng méi rén zhàogu yīng'ér
2561.english: We are in a real fix - there is nobody to look after the baby.

2562.simplified: 处理这种困难你有什么具体的想法？
2562.traditional: 處理這種困難你有什麼具體的想法？
2562.pinyin: chǔlǐ zhèzhǒng kùnnan nǐ yǒu shénme jùtǐ de xiǎngfǎ
2562.english: Have you any concrete thoughts on how to deal with this difficulty?

2563.simplified: 新闻——当有人咬狗、或者打劫酒店之时。
2563.traditional: 新聞——當有人咬狗、或者打劫酒店之時。
2563.pinyin: xīnwén dāng yǒurén yǎo gǒu huòzhě dǎjié jiǔdiàn zhī shí
2563.english: News- when a man bite a dog or rob a hotel.

2564.simplified: 德语中有三性: 阳性、 阴性和中性.
2564.traditional: 德語中有三性: 陽性、 陰性和中性.
2564.pinyin: Déyǔ zhōng yǒu sān xìng yángxìng yīnxìng hé zhōngxìng
2564.english: There are three genders in German: masculine, feminine and neuter.

2565.simplified: 公众的利益高於个人的利益.
2565.traditional: 公眾的利益高於個人的利益.
2565.pinyin: gōngzhòng de lìyì gāoyú gèrén de lìyì
2565.english: The needs of the community must take precedence over (ie must be met before) individual requirements.

2566.simplified: 我父亲总是对我做事的方式百般挑剔。
2566.traditional: 我父親總是對我做事的方式百般挑剔。
2566.pinyin: wǒ fùqīn zǒngshì duì wǒ zuòshì de fāngshì bǎibān tiāoti
2566.english: My father is always finding fault with the way I do things.

2567.simplified: 古埃及的许多法老相信他们可以永生。
2567.traditional: 古埃及的許多法老相信他們可以永生。
2567.pinyin: gǔ Āijí de xǔduō fǎlǎo xiāngxìn tāmen kěyǐ yǒngshēng
2567.english: Many Pharaohs in ancient Egypt believe they can live forever.

2568.simplified: 她踩到一块松动的石头上，扭伤了脚踝。
2568.traditional: 她踩到一塊松動的石頭上，扭傷了腳踝。
2568.pinyin: tā cǎi dào yīkuài sōngdòng de shítou shàng niǔshāng le jiǎohuái
2568.english: She stepped on a loose stone and twisted her ankle.

2569.simplified: 如果你同意我的意见，就明白地回答“是”。
2569.traditional: 如果你同意我的意見，就明白地回答「是」。
2569.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ tóngyì wǒ de yìjiàn jiù míngbai dì huídá shì
2569.english: Answer with a plain ""yes"" if you agree with me.

2570.simplified: 他买了一个鳕鱼罐头和一个三明治作晚饭。
2570.traditional: 他買了一個鱈魚罐頭和一個三明治作晚飯。
2570.pinyin: tā mǎi le yī gè xuěyú guàntou hé yī gè sānmíngzhì zuò wǎnfàn
2570.english: He bought a canned cod and a sandwich as supper.

2571.simplified: 听到煤气的嘶嘶声，他冲进来把它关掉。
2571.traditional: 聽到煤氣的嘶嘶聲，他沖進來把它關掉。
2571.pinyin: tīngdào méiqì de sīsīshēng tā chōng jìnlái bǎ tā guāndiào
2571.english: Hearing the hiss of gas, he rushed in and turned it off.

2572.simplified: 他在外面犹豫徘徊, 因过於胆怯而不敢进去.
2572.traditional: 他在外面猶豫徘徊, 因過於膽怯而不敢進去.
2572.pinyin: tā zài wàimiàn yóuyù páihuái yīn guò yú dǎnqiè ér bù gǎn jìnqù
2572.english: He hovered about outside, too afraid to go in.

2573.simplified: 我们（各处）找了半天, 却找不到那本书.
2573.traditional: 我們（各處）找了半天, 卻找不到那本書.
2573.pinyin: wǒmen gèchù zhǎo le bàntiān què zhǎobudào nà běn shū
2573.english: We searched (around) for hours, but couldn't find the book.

2574.simplified: 她把新歌剧院叫作 “那讨厌的庞然大物”。
2574.traditional: 她把新歌劇院叫作 「那討厭的龐然大物」。
2574.pinyin: tā bǎ xīn gējùyuàn jiàozuò nà tǎoyàn de pángrándàwù
2574.english: She calls the new opera house ""that hideous erection"".

2575.simplified: 此款项将用於建设新学校（的开销）.
2575.traditional: 此款項將用於建設新學校（的開銷）.
2575.pinyin: cǐ kuǎnxiàng jiāng yòng yú jiànshè xīn xuéxiào de kāixiāo
2575.english: The money will go towards (the cost of) building a new school.

2576.simplified: 他是一个随和的人，但就是喜欢自吹自擂。
2576.traditional: 他是一個隨和的人，但就是喜歡自吹自擂。
2576.pinyin: tā shì yī gè suíhé de rén dàn jiùshì xǐhuan zìchuīzìléi
2576.english: He is an agreeable fellow, but likes to blow his own horn.

2577.simplified: 天气多好哇，咱们何不开车到海边玩玩？
2577.traditional: 天氣多好哇，咱們何不開車到海邊玩玩？
2577.pinyin: tiānqì duō hǎowā zánmen hébù kāichē dào hǎibiān wán wán
2577.english: It's a lovely sunny day; why don't we run down to the coast?

2578.simplified: 顾客赊帐簿商人登记顾客购买的商品的本子
2578.traditional: 顧客賒帳簿商人登記顧客購買的商品的本子
2578.pinyin: gùkè shē zhàngbù shāngrén dēngjì gùkè gòumǎi de shāngpǐn de běnzi
2578.english: A book in which a merchant records credit sales.

2579.simplified: 这沙土地利於排水, 适於种植块根作物.
2579.traditional: 這沙土地利於排水, 適於種植塊根作物.
2579.pinyin: zhè shā tǔdì lìyú páishuǐ shì yú zhòngzhí kuàigēn zuòwù
2579.english: This gravelly soil is well drained and good for growing root crops.

2580.simplified: 摩托车手必须戴头盔保护自己免受伤害。
2580.traditional: 摩托車手必須戴頭盔保護自己免受傷害。
2580.pinyin: mótuōchē shǒu bìxū dài tóukuī bǎohù zìjǐ miǎnshòushānghài
2580.english: Motorcyclists must wear helmets to shield them from injury.

2581.simplified: 许多人到国外时，都感受到文化震撼。
2581.traditional: 許多人到國外時，都感受到文化震撼。
2581.pinyin: xǔduō rén dào guówài shí dōu gǎn shòudào wénhuà zhènhàn
2581.english: Many people suffered from cultural shock when they came abroad.

2582.simplified: 【谚】今天能够做的事，切莫拖延到明天。
2582.traditional: 【諺】今天能夠做的事，切莫拖延到明天。
2582.pinyin: yàn jīntiān nénggòu zuò de shì qièmò tuōyán dào míngtiān
2582.english: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.

2583.simplified: 北极熊虽然会游泳，但也是陆栖动物。
2583.traditional: 北極熊雖然會游泳，但也是陸棲動物。
2583.pinyin: běijíxióng suīrán huì yóuyǒng dàn yě shì lùqī dòngwù
2583.english: Although they can swim, the polar bears are terrestrial animals.

2584.simplified: 我的铅笔钝了，你能借我把刀子削一削吗？
2584.traditional: 我的鉛筆鈍了，你能借我把刀子削一削嗎？
2584.pinyin: wǒ de qiānbǐ dùn le nǐ néng jiè wǒ bǎ dāozi xiāo yī xiāo ma
2584.english: My pencil is blunt, could you lend me a knife to sharpen it?

2585.simplified: 戴维觉得（与别的孩子）交朋友是很难的事.
2585.traditional: 戴維覺得（與別的孩子）交朋友是很難的事.
2585.pinyin: dài wéi juéde yǔ biéde háizi jiāopéngyou shì hěn nán de shì
2585.english: David finds it hard to make friends (with other children).

2586.simplified: 那种新的发式的确使她好看一些[好看多了].
2586.traditional: 那種新的發式的確使她好看一些[好看多了].
2586.pinyin: nàzhǒng xīn de fàshì díquè shǐ tā hǎokàn yīxiē hǎokàn duō le
2586.english: That new hairstyle really does something/a lot for her.

2587.simplified: 大火扑灭之後, 工厂只剩下个空架子了.
2587.traditional: 大火撲滅之後, 工廠只剩下個空架子了.
2587.pinyin: dàhuǒ pūmiè zhīhòu gōngchǎng zhǐ shèngxià gè kōng jiàzi le
2587.english: Only the shell of the factory was left after the fire had been put out.

2588.simplified: 在凉爽的天气里轻松地散步令人心旷神怡。
2588.traditional: 在涼爽的天氣裡輕松地散步令人心曠神怡。
2588.pinyin: zài liángshuǎng de tiānqì lǐ qīngsōng dì sànbù lìngrén xīnkuàngshényí
2588.english: A brisk walk in cool weather is invigorating.

2589.simplified: 我们需要具有真知灼见的人来领导这个党。
2589.traditional: 我們需要具有真知灼見的人來領導這個黨。
2589.pinyin: wǒmen xūyào jùyǒu zhēnzhīzhuójiàn de rén lái lǐngdǎo zhège dǎng
2589.english: We need someone with real vision to lead the party.

2590.simplified: 雪崩发生的时候我们的处境多么危险啊！
2590.traditional: 雪崩發生的時候我們的處境多麼危險啊！
2590.pinyin: xuěbēng fāshēng de shíhou wǒmen de chǔjìng duōme wēixiǎn ā
2590.english: What a precarious situation we were in when the avalanche started!

2591.simplified: 你认为她的小说属于文学类，还是其它类?
2591.traditional: 你認為她的小說屬於文學類，還是其它類?
2591.pinyin: nǐ rènwéi tā de xiǎoshuō shǔyú wénxué lèi háishi qítā lèi
2591.english: Would you classify her novels as serious literature or other?

2592.simplified: 你们参加高级程度英语考试要读哪些必修课本?
2592.traditional: 你們參加高級程度英語考試要讀哪些必修課本?
2592.pinyin: nǐmen cānjiā gāojí chéngdù Yīngyǔ kǎoshì yào dú nǎxiē bìxiū kèběn
2592.english: What are your set books for English A Level?

2593.simplified: 我喜欢吃水果，比如苹果、梨子、香蕉等等。
2593.traditional: 我喜歡吃水果，比如蘋果、梨子、香蕉等等。
2593.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan chī shuǐguǒ bǐrú píngguǒ lízi xiāngjiāo děngděng
2593.english: I like fruits, such as apples, pears, bananas...

2594.simplified: 你撞到了我的手肘，弄坏了我正在画的图画。
2594.traditional: 你撞到了我的手肘，弄壞了我正在畫的圖畫。
2594.pinyin: nǐ zhuàng dàoliǎo wǒ de shǒuzhǒu nònghuài le wǒ zhèngzài huà de túhuà
2594.english: You jogged my elbow and spoiled what I was drawing.

2595.simplified: 我送给玛丽一个苹果换我最喜欢吃的香蕉。
2595.traditional: 我送給瑪麗一個蘋果換我最喜歡吃的香蕉。
2595.pinyin: wǒ sònggěi Mǎlì yī gè píngguǒ huàn wǒ zuì xǐhuan chī de xiāngjiāo
2595.english: I gave Mary an apple in exchange for my favorite banana.

2596.simplified: 在大家到齐之後两小时，她终於姗姗来到。
2596.traditional: 在大家到齊之後兩小時，她終於姍姍來到。
2596.pinyin: zài dàjiā dàoqí zhīhòu liǎng xiǎoshí tā zhōng yú shān shān láidào
2596.english: She finally drifted in two hours after everyone else.

2597.simplified: 他思忖著要是没有这些孩子, 将来又如何.
2597.traditional: 他思忖著要是沒有這些孩子, 將來又如何.
2597.pinyin: tā sīcǔn zhe yàoshi méiyǒu zhèxiē háizi jiānglái yòu rúhé
2597.english: He contemplated what the future would be like without the children.

2598.simplified: 英国广播公司计画播放莎士比亚的全部戏剧。
2598.traditional: 英國廣播公司計畫播放莎士比亞的全部戲劇。
2598.pinyin: Yīngguó Guǎngbō Gōngsī jìhuà bōfàng Shāshìbǐyà de quánbù xìjù
2598.english: The BBC plans to televise all Shakespeare's plays.

2599.simplified: 这帮匪徒通过他们的 连锁饭店洗赃款.
2599.traditional: 這幫匪徒通過他們的 連鎖飯店洗贓款.
2599.pinyin: zhè bāng fěitú tōngguò tāmen de liánsuǒ fàndiàn xǐ zāngkuǎn
2599.english: The gang laundered the stolen money through their chain of restaurants.

2600.simplified: 她还没做出什麽成绩来。但她确实很努力。
2600.traditional: 她還沒做出什麼成績來。但她確實很努力。
2600.pinyin: tā hái méi zuòchū shí mó chéngjì lái dàn tā quèshí hěn nǔlì
2600.english: She hasn't had much success yet. Mark you, she does try hard.

2601.simplified: 你认为总统会对恐怖分子的要求让步吗？
2601.traditional: 你認為總統會對恐怖分子的要求讓步嗎？
2601.pinyin: nǐ rènwéi zǒngtǒng huì duì kǒngbùfènzǐ de yāoqiú ràngbù ma
2601.english: Do you think the President will give in to the terrorists' demand?

2602.simplified: 你在发动引擎时，一定要让汽车处于空档。
2602.traditional: 你在發動引擎時，一定要讓汽車處於空檔。
2602.pinyin: nǐ zài fādòng yǐnqíng shí yīdìngyào ràng qìchē chǔyú kòngdàng
2602.english: When you start the engine, be sure the car is in neutral.

2603.simplified: 这护士照顾这位病人彷佛在照顾她爸爸似的。
2603.traditional: 這護士照顧這位病人彷佛在照顧她爸爸似的。
2603.pinyin: zhè hùshi zhàogu zhèwèi bìngrén fǎng fú zài zhàogu tā bàba shìde
2603.english: The nurse attends on the patient as if he were her father.

2604.simplified: 你并不认为我会相信那个可鄙的借口，是吧？
2604.traditional: 你並不認為我會相信那個可鄙的借口，是吧？
2604.pinyin: nǐ bìngbù rènwéi wǒ huì xiāngxìn nàge kěbǐ de jièkǒu shì ba
2604.english: You don't expect me to believe that pitiful excuse, do you?

2605.simplified: 从三楼掉下而没有受伤，这怎么可能呢？
2605.traditional: 從三樓掉下而沒有受傷，這怎麼可能呢？
2605.pinyin: cóng sān lóu diàoxià ér méiyǒu shòushāng zhè zěnme kěnéng ne
2605.english: How was it possible to fall down from the third floor without being hurt?

2606.simplified: 他的脚稍有先天畸形，走起路来一瘸一拐。
2606.traditional: 他的腳稍有先天畸形，走起路來一瘸一拐。
2606.pinyin: tā de jiǎo shāo yǒu xiāntiān jīxíng zǒu qǐ lù lái yīquéyīguǎi
2606.english: He was born with a slight deformity of the feet which made him limp.

2607.simplified: ＂在聪明的妹妹相形之下，她变得黯然失色。＂
2607.traditional: ＂在聰明的妹妹相形之下，她變得黯然失色。＂
2607.pinyin: zài cōngming de mèimei xiāng xíng zhīxià tā biànde ànránshīsè
2607.english: She is quite eclipsed by her clever younger sister.

2608.simplified: 你需用泵著实抽吸几分钟, 才能把油箱灌满.
2608.traditional: 你需用泵著實抽吸幾分鐘, 才能把油箱灌滿.
2608.pinyin: nǐ xū yòng bèng zhe shí chōu xī jǐ fēnzhōng cáinéng bǎ yóuxiāng guàn mǎn
2608.english: You will need to pump hard for several minutes to fill the tank.

2609.simplified: 法律禁止向18岁以下的人出售含有酒精的饮料。
2609.traditional: 法律禁止向18歲以下的人出售含有酒精的飲料。
2609.pinyin: fǎlǜ jìnzhǐ xiàng suì yǐxià de rén chūshòu hányǒu jiǔjīng de yǐnliào
2609.english: The law forbids the sale of alcohol to people under 18.

2610.simplified: 这台泵通过这个阀门把（容器中的）空气抽出.
2610.traditional: 這台泵通過這個閥門把（容器中的）空氣抽出.
2610.pinyin: zhè tái bèng tōngguò zhège fámén bǎ róngqì zhòngdì kōngqì chōuchū
2610.english: The pump sucks air out (of the vessel) through this valve.

2611.simplified: 我们要是买不起汽车, 也就只好不用（汽车）了.
2611.traditional: 我們要是買不起汽車, 也就只好不用（汽車）了.
2611.pinyin: wǒmen yàoshi mǎibuqǐ qìchē yě jiù zhǐhǎo bùyòng qìchē le
2611.english: If we can't afford a car, we'll just have to do without (one).

2612.simplified: 对于他们枪杀无辜平民，人们感到义愤填膺。
2612.traditional: 對於他們槍殺無辜平民，人們感到義憤填膺。
2612.pinyin: duìyú tāmen qiāngshā wúgū píngmín rénmen gǎndào yìfèntiányīng
2612.english: People are indignant by their shooting of innocent civilians.

2613.simplified: 他由於一件表现出精湛技艺的作品而受到赞扬.
2613.traditional: 他由於一件表現出精湛技藝的作品而受到贊揚.
2613.pinyin: tā yóuyú yī jiàn biǎoxiàn chū jīngzhàn jìyì de zuòpǐn ér shòudào zànyáng
2613.english: He was complimented on a very professional piece of work.

2614.simplified: 我的女儿十八岁了，已经长成为美丽的淑女。
2614.traditional: 我的女兒十八歲了，已經長成為美麗的淑女。
2614.pinyin: wǒ de nǚ'ér shíbā suì le yǐjīng cháng chéngwéi měilì de shūnǚ
2614.english: My daughter is eighteen years old and has grown into a beautiful lady.

2615.simplified: 你在那不停的噪声中怎麽能工作得下去呀?
2615.traditional: 你在那不停的噪聲中怎麼能工作得下去呀?
2615.pinyin: nǐ zài nà bùtíng de zàoshēng zhōng zěnme néng gōngzuò dé xiàqù ya
2615.english: How can you continue to work/continue working with all that noise going on?

2616.simplified: 我们有不同的派，例如苹果、樱桃和草莓派。
2616.traditional: 我們有不同的派，例如蘋果、櫻桃和草莓派。
2616.pinyin: wǒmen yǒu bùtóng de pài lìrú píngguǒ yīngtáo hé cǎoméi pài
2616.english: We have different pies, such as apple, cherry, and strawberry pies.

2617.simplified: 她的卧室是这座嘈杂房屋中一个难得的安静之处。
2617.traditional: 她的臥室是這座嘈雜房屋中一個難得的安靜之處。
2617.pinyin: tā de wòshì shì zhè zuò cáozá fángwū zhōng yī gè nándé de ānjìng zhī chǔ
2617.english: Her bedroom is an oasis of calm in the noisy house.

2618.simplified: 那两个女孩经常一起在那棵大山楂树下玩耍。
2618.traditional: 那兩個女孩經常一起在那棵大山楂樹下玩耍。
2618.pinyin: nà liǎng gè nǚhái jīngcháng yīqǐ zài nà kē dà shānzhā shù xià wánshuǎ
2618.english: The two girls always play together under the large hawthorn.

2619.simplified: 我以前从未听到过这个词语，是最近新造的吗？
2619.traditional: 我以前從未聽到過這個詞語，是最近新造的嗎？
2619.pinyin: wǒ yǐqián cóngwèi tīngdào guò zhège cíyǔ shì zuìjìn xīnzào de ma
2619.english: I hadn't heard that expression before ; is it a recent coinage?

2620.simplified: 天竺葵是种开红、粉红或白色花的花园植物。
2620.traditional: 天竺葵是種開紅、粉紅或白色花的花園植物。
2620.pinyin: tiānzhúkuí shì zhǒng kāi hóng fěnhóng huò báisè huā de huāyuán zhíwù
2620.english: The geranium is a garden plant with red, pink or white flowers.

2621.simplified: 即使是最聪明的人也会陷入琐事与混乱之中。
2621.traditional: 即使是最聰明的人也會陷入瑣事與混亂之中。
2621.pinyin: jíshǐ shì zuì cōngming de rén yě huì xiànrù suǒshì yǔ hùnluàn zhīzhōng
2621.english: The most brilliant person may be mired in detail and confusion.

2622.simplified: 这位医生颇为炫耀地带着我们参观了他的医院。
2622.traditional: 這位醫生頗為炫耀地帶著我們參觀了他的醫院。
2622.pinyin: zhèwèi yīshēng pōwéi xuànyào dìdài zhe wǒmen cānguān le tā de yīyuàn
2622.english: The doctor showed us about his hospital with much flourish.

2623.simplified: 那项要求很有意思，可是你有证件加以证明吗？
2623.traditional: 那項要求很有意思，可是你有證件加以證明嗎？
2623.pinyin: nà xiàng yāoqiú hěn yǒuyìsi kěshì nǐ yǒu zhèngjiàn jiāyǐ zhèngmíng ma
2623.english: That's a very interesting claim, but can you document it?

2624.simplified: 运动员们离开赛场时，被愤怒的人群推搡着。
2624.traditional: 運動員們離開賽場時，被憤怒的人群推搡著。
2624.pinyin: yùndòngyuán men líkāi sàichǎng shí bèi fènnù de rénqún tuīsǎng zhe
2624.english: The players were jostled by an angry crowd as they left the field.

2625.simplified: 他像一只骄傲的孔雀一样在我前面趾高气扬地走着。
2625.traditional: 他像一只驕傲的孔雀一樣在我前面趾高氣揚地走著。
2625.pinyin: tā xiàng yī zhǐ jiāo'ào de kǒngquè yīyàng zài wǒ qiánmiàn zhǐgāoqìyáng dì zǒu zhe
2625.english: He strutted in front of me like a peacock.

2626.simplified: 我只是出于好奇，请问你买这辆车花了多少钱？
2626.traditional: 我只是出於好奇，請問你買這輛車花了多少錢？
2626.pinyin: wǒ zhǐshì chūyú hàoqí qǐngwèn nǐ mǎi zhè liàng chē huā le duōshao qián
2626.english: Just to satisfy my curiosity, how much did you pay for your car?

2627.simplified: ＂局长看上去彷佛挺厉害，但他心地正直。＂
2627.traditional: ＂局長看上去彷佛挺厲害，但他心地正直。＂
2627.pinyin: júzhǎng kànshangqu fǎng fú tǐng lìhai dàn tā xīndì zhèngzhí
2627.english: The director seems rather fierce, but his heart is in the right place.""

2628.simplified: 哥伦布按顺序仔细而详尽地记载了他的各次航程。
2628.traditional: 哥倫布按順序仔細而詳盡地記載了他的各次航程。
2628.pinyin: Gēlúnbù àn shùnxù zǐxì ér xiángjìn dì jìzǎi le tā de gè cì hángchéng
2628.english: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.

2629.simplified: 我们若决定购买这座别墅，就得重新进行装修。
2629.traditional: 我們若決定購買這座別墅，就得重新進行裝修。
2629.pinyin: wǒmen ruò juédìng gòumǎi zhè zuò biéshù jiù dé chóngxīn jìnxíng zhuāngxiū
2629.english: If we decide to buy the cottage we'll have to do it up.

2630.simplified: 从我搬进城里以后，我有好几年没见过蚂蚱了。
2630.traditional: 從我搬進城裡以後，我有好幾年沒見過螞蚱了。
2630.pinyin: cóng wǒ bān jìnchéng lǐ yǐhòu wǒ yǒu hǎojǐnián méi jiàn guò màzha le
2630.english: I hadn't seen a grasshopper for years since I moved into the city.

2631.simplified: 我觉得你的咳嗽声有问题--是不是该找医生看看?
2631.traditional: 我覺得你的咳嗽聲有問題--是不是該找醫生看看?
2631.pinyin: wǒ juéde nǐ de késou shēng yǒu wèntí shìbùshì gāi zhǎo yīshēng kànkan
2631.english: I don't like the sound of that cough oughtn't you to see a doctor?

2632.simplified: 储存的　物经常受损坏, 尤其是老鼠为患最甚.
2632.traditional: 儲存的　物經常受損壞, 尤其是老鼠為患最甚.
2632.pinyin: chǔcún de wù jīngcháng shòu sǔnhuài yóuqíshì lǎoshǔ wéi huàn zuì shèn
2632.english: Stores of grain are frequently attacked by pests, especially rats.

2633.simplified: 要参加体育活动--篮球、 冰球、 游泳之类的活动.
2633.traditional: 要參加體育活動--籃球、 冰球、 游泳之類的活動.
2633.pinyin: yào cānjiā tǐyùhuódòng lánqiú bīngqiú yóuyǒng zhīlèi de huódòng
2633.english: Take any sport basketball, ice hockey, swimming or whatever.

2634.simplified: 这些儿童在早餐与午餐之间有牛奶与饼乾作点心.
2634.traditional: 這些兒童在早餐與午餐之間有牛奶與餅乾作點心.
2634.pinyin: zhèxiē értóng zài zǎocān yǔ wǔcān zhījiān yǒu niúnǎi yǔ bǐng gān zuò diǎnxin
2634.english: The children have a mid-morning snack of milk and biscuits.

2635.simplified: 这比那个大一倍。（注意：as large again as是…的两倍，比…大一倍）
2635.traditional: 這比那個大一倍。（注意：as large again as是…的兩倍，比…大一倍）
2635.pinyin: zhè bǐ nàge dàyī bèi zhùyì shì de liǎngbèi bǐ dàyī bèi
2635.english: It is as large again as that.

2636.simplified: 我并不是自吹自擂，但所有的重要工作都是我干的。
2636.traditional: 我並不是自吹自擂，但所有的重要工作都是我干的。
2636.pinyin: wǒ bìng bùshì zìchuīzìléi dàn suǒyǒu de zhòngyào gōngzuò dōu shì wǒ gàn de
2636.english: I'm not blowing my own trumpet, but I did all the top jobs.

2637.simplified: 他最初的反应是不同意。可是後来他改变了主意。
2637.traditional: 他最初的反應是不同意。可是後來他改變了主意。
2637.pinyin: tā zuìchū de fǎnyìng shì bùtóng yì kěshì hòu lái tā gǎibiàn le zhǔyi
2637.english: His first response was to say no. Later, however, he changed his mind.

2638.simplified: 人们一提到维也纳就会联想到华尔兹圆舞曲和咖啡馆.
2638.traditional: 人們一提到維也納就會聯想到華爾茲圓舞曲和咖啡館.
2638.pinyin: rénmen yī tídào Wéiyěnà jiù huì lián xiǎngdào huá'ěrzī yuánwǔqǔ hé kāfēiguǎn
2638.english: People connect Vienna with waltzes and coffee-houses.

2639.simplified: 你肯定不会指望我认真考虑你那些荒谬的建议吧?
2639.traditional: 你肯定不會指望我認真考慮你那些荒謬的建議吧?
2639.pinyin: nǐ kěndìng bùhuì zhǐwàng wǒ rènzhēn kǎolǜ nǐ nàxiē huāngmiù de jiànyì ba
2639.english: Surely you don't expect me to take your potty suggestions seriously?

2640.simplified: 除了一本照相簿外, 我还给了他一支钢笔和一支铅笔。
2640.traditional: 除了一本照相簿外, 我還給了他一支鋼筆和一支鉛筆。
2640.pinyin: chúle yī běn zhàoxiàng bù wài wǒ huángěi le tā yī zhī gāngbǐ hé yī zhī qiānbǐ
2640.english: In addition to an album, I gave him a pen and a pencil.

2641.simplified: 往日激情将熄的余烬仍可从他的文章中看出来。
2641.traditional: 往日激情將熄的余燼仍可從他的文章中看出來。
2641.pinyin: wǎngrì jīqíng jiāng xī de yújìn réng kě cóng tā de wénzhāng zhōngkàn chūlái
2641.english: The dying embers of a former passion can still be seen in his article.

2642.simplified: 这一段里面有很多名词，例如男孩、女孩和书本。
2642.traditional: 這一段裡面有很多名詞，例如男孩、女孩和書本。
2642.pinyin: zhè yī duàn lǐmiàn yǒu hěn duō míngcí lìrú nánhái nǚhái hé shūběn
2642.english: In this paragraph there are many nouns, such as boy, girl, and book.

2643.simplified: 你的书好像比我的有意思, 你愿意（和我）交换吗?
2643.traditional: 你的書好像比我的有意思, 你願意（和我）交換嗎?
2643.pinyin: nǐ de shū hǎoxiàng bǐ wǒ de yǒuyìsi nǐ yuànyì hé wǒ jiāohuàn ma
2643.english: Your book looks more interesting than mine: do you want to swap (with me)?

2644.simplified: 珍和玛丽是好朋友，前者是老师，后者是护士。
2644.traditional: 珍和瑪麗是好朋友，前者是老師，後者是護士。
2644.pinyin: zhēn hé Mǎlì shì hǎopéngyou qiánzhě shì lǎoshī hòuzhě shì hùshi
2644.english: Jane and Mary are good friends; the former is a teacher, the latter is a nurse.

2645.simplified: 刘师傅把每道工序做给我们看，然后让我们自己干。
2645.traditional: 劉師傅把每道工序做給我們看，然後讓我們自己干。
2645.pinyin: Liú shīfu bǎ měi dào gōngxù zuò gěi wǒmen kàn ránhòu ràng wǒmen zìjǐ gàn
2645.english: Master Liu demonstrated to us each process, and let us do it ourselves.

2646.simplified: 利物浦队因对方一队员用手触球而得到一个罚球。
2646.traditional: 利物浦隊因對方一隊員用手觸球而得到一個罰球。
2646.pinyin: Lìwùpǔ duì yīn duìfāng yī duìyuán yòng shǒu chù qiú ér dédào yī gè fáqiú
2646.english: Liverpool were given a penalty when one of their opponents handled the ball.

2647.simplified: 瞧，我这是怎么搞的！它本是辆新车。我怎么办好呢？
2647.traditional: 瞧，我這是怎麼搞的！它本是輛新車。我怎麼辦好呢？
2647.pinyin: qiáo wǒ zhè shì zěnmegǎode tā běn shì liàng xīn chē wǒ zěnmebàn hǎo ne
2647.english: Just look what I have done! It was a new car. Whatever am I going to do?

2648.simplified: 你弟弟小小的年龄竟高出你一大截，真令人恼火！
2648.traditional: 你弟弟小小的年齡竟高出你一大截，真令人惱火！
2648.pinyin: nǐ dìdi xiǎoxiǎo de niánlíng jìng gāo chū nǐ yī dà jié zhēn lìngrén nǎohuǒ
2648.english: How maddening to have your younger brother tower over you, at his age, too!

2649.simplified: 别老唠叨你的那些问题，还是做些实际工作解决它们吧！
2649.traditional: 別老嘮叨你的那些問題，還是做些實際工作解決它們吧！
2649.pinyin: bié lǎo láodao nǐ de nàxiē wèntí háishi zuò xiē shíjì gōngzuò jiějué tāmen ba
2649.english: Stop dwelling on your problems and do something about them!

2650.simplified: 先把系帐篷的桩子打进地里，再把绳子系在桩子上。
2650.traditional: 先把系帳篷的樁子打進地裡，再把繩子系在樁子上。
2650.pinyin: xiān bǎ xì zhàngpeng de zhuāng zǐ dǎjìn dì lǐ zài bǎ shéngzi xì zài zhuāng zǐ shàng
2650.english: First hammer the tent pegs into the ground, then tie the ropes onto them.

2651.simplified: 共用餐者如在军队集体食堂里经常与某人一起用膳的人
2651.traditional: 共用餐者如在軍隊集體食堂裡經常與某人一起用膳的人
2651.pinyin: gòngyòng cān zhě rú zài jūnduì jítǐ shítáng lǐ jīngcháng yǔ mǒurén yīqǐ yòngshàn de rén
2651.english: A person with whom one eats regularly, as in a military mess.

2652.simplified: 店主给我们的分量不足: 应该10公斤我们只得到7.5公斤.
2652.traditional: 店主給我們的分量不足: 應該10公斤我們只得到7.5公斤.
2652.pinyin: diànzhǔ gěi wǒmen de fènliang bùzú yīnggāi gōngjīn wǒmen zhǐ dédào gōngjīn
2652.english: The shopkeeper gave us short weight: we got 7.5 kilos instead of 10 kilos.

2653.simplified: 必须对那些专在足球比赛时打架的社会渣滓严加惩处！
2653.traditional: 必須對那些專在足球比賽時打架的社會渣滓嚴加懲處！
2653.pinyin: bìxū duì nàxiē zhuān zài zúqiú bǐsài shí dǎjià de shèhuì zhāzǐ yánjiā chéngchǔ
2653.english: These scum who fight at the football matches must be severely dealt with!

2654.simplified: 他胜任新闻广播员的工作，在於他有当过记者的锻炼。
2654.traditional: 他勝任新聞廣播員的工作，在於他有當過記者的鍛煉。
2654.pinyin: tā shèngrèn xīnwén guǎngbōyuán de gōngzuò zàiyú tā yǒu dāng guò jìzhě de duànliàn
2654.english: His strength as a news-reader lies in his training as a journalist.

2655.simplified: 念咒口头咒语或符咒的仪式性的吟诵以产生魔力的效果
2655.traditional: 念咒口頭咒語或符咒的儀式性的吟誦以產生魔力的效果
2655.pinyin: niànzhòu kǒutóu zhòuyǔ huò fúzhòu de yíshì xìng de yínsòng yǐ chǎnshēng mólì de xiàoguǒ
2655.english: Ritual recitation of verbal charms or spells to produce a magic effect.

2656.simplified: 真不幸，上午我的自行车丢了，下午钱包又被偷了！
2656.traditional: 真不幸，上午我的自行車丟了，下午錢包又被偷了！
2656.pinyin: zhēn bùxìng shàngwǔ wǒ de zìxíngchē diū le xiàwǔ qiánbāo yòu bèi tōu le
2656.english: It's luckless, I lost my bicycle in the morning and my wallet was stolen in the afternoon!

2657.simplified: 我那趟班机误点了, 我只好看书消磨时间[打发了两小时].
2657.traditional: 我那趟班機誤點了, 我只好看書消磨時間[打發了兩小時].
2657.pinyin: wǒ nà tàng bānjī wùdiǎn le wǒ zhǐhǎo k��nshū xiāomóshíjiān dǎfa le liǎng xiǎoshí
2657.english: My flight was delayed, so I killed time/killed two hours reading a book.

2658.simplified: 史密斯小姐（去年访问了中国）打算嫁给爱尔伯特先生。
2658.traditional: 史密斯小姐（去年訪問了中國）打算嫁給愛爾伯特先生。
2658.pinyin: Shǐmìsī xiǎojie qùnián fǎngwèn le Zhōngguó dǎsuàn jià gěi ài ěr bó tè xiānsheng
2658.english: Miss Smith( who visited china last year) is going to marry Mr. Abbott.

2659.simplified: 我不知道地址，但地点是离SheratonHotel北边两条街的地方。
2659.traditional: 我不知道地址，但地點是離SheratonHotel北邊兩條街的地方。
2659.pinyin: wǒ bù zhīdào dìzhǐ dàn dìdiǎn shì lí běibiān liǎng tiáo jiē de dìfang
2659.english: I do not know the address, but it's two block north of the sheraton hotel.

2660.simplified: 你从图书馆借的书上的戳记表明，这本书必须明天归还。
2660.traditional: 你從圖書館借的書上的戳記表明，這本書必須明天歸還。
2660.pinyin: nǐ cóng túshūguǎn jiè de shū shàng de chuōjì biǎomíng zhè běn shū bìxū míngtiān guīhuán
2660.english: The stamp in your library book shows it must be returned tomorrow.

2661.simplified: 我原以为自己画得不错, 可比起你的画儿来未免相形见绌.
2661.traditional: 我原以為自己畫得不錯, 可比起你的畫兒來未免相形見絀.
2661.pinyin: wǒ yuán yǐwéi zìjǐ huà dé bùcuò kě bǐqǐ nǐ de huàr lái wèimiǎn xiāngxíngjiànchù
2661.english: I thought I was quite a good artist, but your painting puts mine in the shade.

2662.simplified: 你看见语法书在哪儿呢吗? 词典都在正对著的书架上.
2662.traditional: 你看見語法書在哪兒呢嗎? 詞典都在正對著的書架上.
2662.pinyin: nǐ kànjiàn yǔfǎshū zàinǎr ne ma cídiǎn dōu zài zhèngduì zhe de shūjià shàng
2662.english: Can you see where the grammar books are? The dictionaries are on the shelf directly opposite.

2663.simplified: 在日常会话中，你是请求别人做事，而不是""命令""他们。
2663.traditional: 在日常會話中，你是請求別人做事，而不是""命令""他們。
2663.pinyin: zài rìcháng huìhuà zhōng nǐ shì qǐngqiú biéren zuòshì ér bùshì mìnglìng tāmen
2663.english: In everyday conversation, you request people to do things, not ""order"" them.

2664.simplified: 我基本上同意你的建议, 但是有几个小问题有待商榷.
2664.traditional: 我基本上同意你的建議, 但是有幾個小問題有待商榷.
2664.pinyin: wǒ jīběnshang tóngyì nǐ de jiànyì dànshì yǒu jǐge xiǎo wèntí yǒudài shāngquè
2664.english: Basically I agree with your proposals, but there are a few small points I'd like to discuss.

2665.simplified: 松鼠，啮齿类动物的代表；举例介绍每一个生词的用法
2665.traditional: 松鼠，齧齒類動物的代表；舉例介紹每一個生詞的用法
2665.pinyin: sōngshǔ nièchǐlèi dòngwù de dàibiǎo jǔlì jièshào měiyī gè shēngcí de yòngfǎ
2665.english: The squirrel, an example of a rodent; introduced each new word with examples of its use.

2666.simplified: 当局答应给护士增加5%的工资, 但她们坚持要得到7%的增幅.
2666.traditional: 當局答應給護士增加5%的工資, 但她們堅持要得到7%的增幅.
2666.pinyin: dāngjú dāying gěi hùshi zēngjiā de gōngzī dàn tāmen jiānchí yào dédào de zēngfú
2666.english: The nurses have been offered an extra 5%, but they're standing out for a 7% pay rise.

2667.simplified: 要是太阳从西边出来，他就会通过考试－－他不可能通过考试。
2667.traditional: 要是太陽從西邊出來，他就會通過考試－－他不可能通過考試。
2667.pinyin: yàoshi tàiyang cóng xībiān chūlái tā jiù huì tōngguò kǎoshì tā bùkěnéng tōngguò kǎoshì
2667.english: If the sun were to rise in the west, he would pass the exam.

2668.simplified: 中间休息时有些点心（如冰激凌、 炸土豆片、 巧克力）.
2668.traditional: 中間休息時有些點心（如冰激凌、 炸土豆片、 巧克力）.
2668.pinyin: zhōngjiān xiūxi shí yǒuxiē diǎnxin rú bīngjīlíng zhátǔdòupiàn qiǎokèlì
2668.english: Light refreshments (eg ice-cream, crisps, chocolate) are available during the interval.

2669.simplified: 一个小男孩在街上拦住了我，问道；“先生，现在几点了？”
2669.traditional: 一個小男孩在街上攔住了我，問道；「先生，現在幾點了？」
2669.pinyin: yī gè xiǎo nánhái zài jiēshang lánzhù le wǒ wèndào xiānsheng xiànzài jǐdiǎnle
2669.english: A little boy stopped me in the street and asked me, ""What's the time, mister?""

2670.simplified: 她需要使请求语气柔婉，以便尽可能把它变成有礼貌与客气。
2670.traditional: 她需要使請求語氣柔婉，以便盡可能把它變成有禮貌與客氣。
2670.pinyin: tā xūyào shǐ qǐngqiú yǔqì róu wǎn yǐbiàn jǐnkěnéng bǎ tā biànchéng yǒulǐmào yǔ kèqi
2670.english: She needed to soften her request to make it as polite and courteous as she could.

2671.simplified: 天文学家现在能看到的星星的数目，多得简直令人头晕目眩。
2671.traditional: 天文學家現在能看到的星星的數目，多得簡直令人頭暈目眩。
2671.pinyin: tiānwénxuéjiā xiànzài néng kàn dào de xīngxing de shùmù duō dé jiǎnzhí lìngrén tóuyūnmùxuàn
2671.english: The number of stars now visible to the astronomers makes one's brain reel.

2672.simplified: 我们应该努力摆脱劳资关系中｀那群人和我们＇这种对立的态度.
2672.traditional: 我們應該努力擺脫勞資關系中｀那群人和我們＇這種對立的態度.
2672.pinyin: wǒmen yīnggāi nǔlì bǎituō láozīguānxì zhōng nà qún rén hé wǒmen zhèzhǒng duìlì de tàidu
2672.english: We should try to get away from a `them and us' attitude in industrial relations.

2673.simplified: “Micro”这个词的意思是“小”，Microclimate＂是指小区域里的气候条件。
2673.traditional: 「Micro」這個詞的意思是「小」，Microclimate＂是指小區域裡的氣候條件。
2673.pinyin: zhège cí de yìsi shì xiǎo shì zhǐ xiǎo qūyù lǐ de qìhòu tiáojiàn
2673.english: Micro means small, and microclimate refers to the climate conditions over a small area.

2674.simplified: （成交或成婚时的）握手用来表示诸如合约或婚姻的誓言的一种握手
2674.traditional: （成交或成婚時的）握手用來表示諸如合約或婚姻的誓言的一種握手
2674.pinyin: chéngjiāo huò chénghūn shí de wòshǒu yònglái biǎoshì zhūrú héyuē huò hūnyīn de shìyán de yīzhǒng wòshǒu
2674.english: A handclasp used to signify a pledge, such as a contract or marriage.

2675.simplified: 你飞回家度寒假的时刻不知不觉就会来到的，我都已经在盼望着啦！
2675.traditional: 你飛回家度寒假的時刻不知不覺就會來到的，我都已經在盼望著啦！
2675.pinyin: nǐ fēi huíjiā dù hánjià de shíkè bùzhībùjué jiù huì láidào de wǒ dōu yǐjīng zài pànwàng zhe la
2675.english: Before you know it you'll be flying home for the winter holidays, I can hardly wait!

2676.simplified: 哲瑞米是初出茅庐，所以我们并不指望他在这次比赛中表现得很好。
2676.traditional: 哲瑞米是初出茅廬，所以我們並不指望他在這次比賽中表現得很好。
2676.pinyin: zhé ruì mǐ shì chūchūmáolú suǒyǐ wǒmen bìngbù zhǐwàng tā zài zhè cì bǐsài zhōng biǎoxiàn dehěn hǎo
2676.english: Jeremy's just being blooded, so we don't expect him to be very good at the game.

2677.simplified: 鸬鹚是一种长脖子黑颜色的大鸟，生活在海滨而且以吃鱼为生。
2677.traditional: 鸕鶿是一種長脖子黑顏色的大鳥，生活在海濱而且以吃魚為生。
2677.pinyin: lúcí shì yīzhǒng cháng bózi hēi yánsè de dà niǎo shēnghuó zài hǎibīn érqiě yǐ chī yú wéishēng
2677.english: The cormorant is a large, long-necked, dark-colored bird which lives near sea coasts and eats fish.

2678.simplified: 一谈到别的事情时，他们的记性并不是很好，但他们却记得彗星。
2678.traditional: 一談到別的事情時，他們的記性並不是很好，但他們卻記得彗星。
2678.pinyin: yī tándào biéde shìqing shí tāmen de jìxìng bìng bùshì hěn hǎo dàn tāmen què jìde huìxīng
2678.english: Their memory wasn't very good when it came to recalling other things, but they remembered the comet.

2679.simplified: 我们在晚会上要装扮得像电影中的角色，这是一个多么新奇的主意啊！
2679.traditional: 我們在晚會上要裝扮得像電影中的角色，這是一個多麼新奇的主意啊！
2679.pinyin: wǒmen zài wǎnhuì shàng yào zhuāngbàn dé xiàng diànyǐng zhòngdì juésè zhè shì yī gè duōme xīnqí de zhǔyi ā
2679.english: We are supposed to dress up as movie characters for the party, what a novel idea!

2680.simplified: 把你们的学习室收拾一下，孩子们，""妈妈说，""你们把所有的书都弄得乱七八糟的了。""
2680.traditional: 把你們的學習室收拾一下，孩子們，""媽媽說，""你們把所有的書都弄得亂七八糟的了。""
2680.pinyin: bǎ nǐmen de xuéxí shì shōushi yīxià háizimen māma shuō nǐmen bǎ suǒyǒu de shū dōu nòng dé luànqībāzāo de le
2680.english: Tidy up your study, kids, ""Mother said, ""all your books are in a muddle.""

2681.simplified: 尽管（她讲的）内容有些枯燥, 但由於她善於表达, 大家仍听得津津有味.
2681.traditional: 盡管（她講的）內容有些枯燥, 但由於她善於表達, 大家仍聽得津津有味.
2681.pinyin: jǐnguǎn tā jiǎng de nèiróng yǒuxiē kūzào dàn yóuyú tā shànyú biǎodá dàjiā réng tīng dé jīnjīnyǒuwèi
2681.english: Although the subject-matter (of her talk) was rather dull her witty delivery kept the audience interested.

2682.simplified: 一道耀眼的闪光，把人们的眼睛都照花了……紧接着轰隆隆传来一声巨雷。
2682.traditional: 一道耀眼的閃光，把人們的眼睛都照花了……緊接著轟隆隆傳來一聲巨雷。
2682.pinyin: yīdào yàoyǎn de shǎnguāng bǎ rénmen de yǎnjing dōu zhào huā le jǐn jiēzhe hōng lónglóng chuánlái yīshēng jù léi
2682.english: And then there came a blinding flash… and hard upon the heels of it, a great tow-row of thunder.

2683.simplified: 扫帚梆在一块儿的枝条、干草或刺毛，缚在一根棍或把柄上，作清扫之用
2683.traditional: 掃帚梆在一塊兒的枝條、干草或刺毛，縛在一根棍或把柄上，作清掃之用
2683.pinyin: sàozhou bāng zài yīkuàir de zhītiáo gāncǎo huò cì máo fù zài yī gēn gùn huò bǎbǐng shàng zuò qīngsǎo zhī yòng
