2844.simplified: 我们决定开办一家合作社。
2844.traditional: 我們決定開辦一家合作社。
2844.english: We decided to set up a cooperative.

2845.simplified: 你送花来, 想得真周到.
2845.traditional: 你送花來, 想得真周到.
2845.pinyin: nǐ sòng huā lái xiǎng dé zhēn zhōudào
2845.english: It was very thoughtful of you to send flowers.

2846.simplified: 那间办公室又明亮又通风.
2846.traditional: 那間辦公室又明亮又通風.
2846.pinyin: nà jiān bàngōngshì yòu míngliàng yòu tōngfēng
2846.english: The office was light and airy.

2847.simplified: 蛋黄是鸡蛋中的黄色部分.
2847.traditional: 蛋黃是雞蛋中的黃色部分.
2847.pinyin: dànhuáng shì jīdàn zhòngdì huángsè bùfen
2847.english: The yolk is the yellow part in an egg.

2848.simplified: 他能准确流利地说英语。
2848.traditional: 他能准確流利地說英語。
2848.pinyin: tā néng zhǔnquè liúlì dì shuō Yīngyǔ
2848.english: He can speak English fluently and accurately.

2849.simplified: 还是我直接跟他打交道为好
2849.traditional: 還是我直接跟他打交道為好
2849.pinyin: háishi wǒ zhíjiē gēn tā dǎjiāodào wéi hǎo
2849.english: I prefer to deal with him direct.

2850.english: The man in the street is opposed to this idea.

2851.simplified: 便条简短的便条或备忘字条
2851.traditional: 便條簡短的便條或備忘字條
2851.pinyin: biàntiáo jiǎnduǎn de biàntiáo huò bèi wàng zìtiáo

2852.simplified: 这是目前最时兴的做法了。
2852.traditional: 這是目前最時興的做法了。
2852.pinyin: zhè shì mùqián zuì shíxīng de zuòfǎ le
2852.english: It's the in-thing to do at the moment.

2853.simplified: 你最好听听我要说些什么。
2853.traditional: 你最好聽聽我要說些什麼。
2853.pinyin: nǐ zuìhǎo tīng tīng wǒ yàoshuō xiē shénme
2853.english: You had better hear what I'll say.

2854.simplified: 对我们来说那是有利的结果。
2854.traditional: 對我們來說那是有利的結果。
2854.pinyin: duì wǒmen láishuō nàshi yǒulì de jiéguǒ
2854.english: It's a beneficial result to us.

2855.simplified: 我们不能在白天看到星星。
2855.traditional: 我們不能在白天看到星星。
2855.pinyin: wǒmen bùnéng zài báitiān kàn dào xīngxing
2855.english: We can't see stars in the daytime.

2856.simplified: 她在大街开了一家书店.
2856.traditional: 她在大街開了一家書店.
2856.pinyin: tā zài dàjiē kāi le yījiā shūdiàn
2856.english: She set up shop as a bookseller in the High Street.

2857.simplified: 她除了他以外没有好朋友。
2857.traditional: 她除了他以外沒有好朋友。
2857.pinyin: tā chúle tā yǐwài méiyǒu hǎopéngyou
2857.english: She has no close friends other than him.

2858.simplified: 他对生活有种成熟的看法。
2858.traditional: 他對生活有種成熟的看法。
2858.pinyin: tā duì shēnghuó yǒuzhǒng chéngshú de kànfǎ
2858.english: He has a mellow attitude to life.

2859.simplified: 这张照片是人眼的特写。
2859.traditional: 這張照片是人眼的特寫。
2859.pinyin: zhè zhāng zhàopiàn shì rén yǎn de tèxiě
2859.english: This picture is a closeness of the human eye.

2860.simplified: 那条广告口号是双关语.
2860.traditional: 那條廣告口號是雙關語.
2860.pinyin: nà tiáo guǎnggào kǒuhào shì shuāngguānyǔ
2860.english: The advertising slogan was a play on words.

2861.simplified: 好看的录像带总是被借走。
2861.traditional: 好看的錄像帶總是被借走。
2861.pinyin: hǎokàn de lùxiàngdài zǒngshì bèi jiè zǒu
2861.english: The good video is always rented out.

2862.simplified: 那就是我昨天见到的那个人。
2862.traditional: 那就是我昨天見到的那個人。
2862.pinyin: nà jiùshì wǒ zuótiān jiàndào de nàgèrén
2862.english: That is the man I saw yesterday.

2863.simplified: 这一交易需经政府批准.
2863.traditional: 這一交易需經政府批准.
2863.pinyin: zhè yī jiāoyì xū jīng zhèngfǔ pīzhǔn
2863.english: The deal needs the government's seal of approval.

2864.simplified: 有时这个病人疼得哭起来。
2864.traditional: 有時這個病人疼得哭起來。
2864.pinyin: yǒushí zhège bìngrén téng dé kū qilai
2864.english: Sometimes the patient cried for the pain.

2865.simplified: 近来各方面都有所改进。
2865.traditional: 近來各方面都有所改進。
2865.pinyin: jìnlái gè fāngmiàn dōu yǒusuǒ gǎijìn
2865.english: There's been an overall improvement recently.

2866.simplified: 我昨天在理发店里理了发。
2866.traditional: 我昨天在理發店裡理了發。
2866.pinyin: wǒ zuótiān zài lǐfàdiàn lǐ lǐ le fā
2866.english: I had my hair cut at the barber's yesterday.

2867.simplified: 你用不着让自己这么不安的。
2867.traditional: 你用不著讓自己這麼不安的。
2867.pinyin: nǐ yòngbuzháo ràng zìjǐ zhème bù'ān de
2867.english: There's no need to upset yourself.

2868.simplified: 这个男孩有交友的能力。
2868.traditional: 這個男孩有交友的能力。
2868.pinyin: zhège nánhái yǒu jiāoyǒu de nénglì
2868.english: This boy has a faculty of making friends easily.

2869.simplified: 这里一连好几天都是雨天。
2869.traditional: 這裡一連好幾天都是雨天。
2869.pinyin: zhèlǐ yīlián hǎo jǐtiān dōu shì yǔtiān
2869.english: There are a succession of rainy days here.

2870.simplified: 你和我的友谊对我意义重大.
2870.traditional: 你和我的友誼對我意義重大.
2870.pinyin: nǐ hé wǒ de yǒuyì duì wǒ yìyì zhòngdà
2870.english: Your friendship means a great deal to me.

2871.simplified: 一个人一定要对自己有信心。
2871.traditional: 一個人一定要對自己有信心。
2871.pinyin: yīgèrén yīdìngyào duì zìjǐ yǒu xìnxīn
2871.english: One has to be confident in himself.

2872.simplified: 不要忘记在支票上写上日期.
2872.traditional: 不要忘記在支票上寫上日期.
2872.pinyin: bùyào wàngjì zài zhīpiào shàng xiě shàng rìqī
2872.english: Don't forget to date your cheque.

2873.simplified: 这两个事件相互有联系。
2873.traditional: 這兩個事件相互有聯系。
2873.pinyin: zhè liǎng gè shìjiàn xiānghù yǒuliánxì
2873.english: These two events were related to each other.

2874.simplified: 她已全面掌握了这一学科。
2874.traditional: 她已全面掌握了這一學科。
2874.pinyin: tā yǐ quánmiàn zhǎngwò le zhè yī xuékē
2874.english: She has a comprehensive grasp of the subject.

2875.simplified: 我认为她是个很能干的经理.
2875.traditional: 我認為她是個很能干的經理.
2875.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi tā shì gè hěn nénggàn de jīnglǐ
2875.english: I summed her up as a competent manager.

2876.simplified: 这不过是许多例子中的一个。
2876.traditional: 這不過是許多例子中的一個。
2876.pinyin: zhè bùguò shì xǔduō lìzi zhòngdì yī gè
2876.english: This is only one instance out of many.

2877.simplified: 她干的工作比别人要好些。
2877.traditional: 她干的工作比別人要好些。
2877.pinyin: tā gàn de gōngzuò bǐ biéren yàohǎo xiē
2877.english: Her work is a cut above that of the others.

2878.simplified: 吃饭的时候我坐在他的对面。
2878.traditional: 吃飯的時候我坐在他的對面。
2878.pinyin: chīfàn de shíhou wǒ zuò zài tā de duìmiàn
2878.english: I sat opposite to him during the meal.

2879.simplified: 他说他会来的，果然来了。
2879.traditional: 他說他會來的，果然來了。
2879.pinyin: tā shuō tā huì lái de guǒrán lái le
2879.english: He said he would come, and sure enough he did.

2880.simplified: 他想到她已死去就很难过。
2880.traditional: 他想到她已死去就很難過。
2880.pinyin: tā xiǎngdào tā yǐ sǐqù jiù hěn nánguò
2880.english: He was saddened at the memory of her death.

2881.simplified: 我们事先就知道有这个问题.
2881.traditional: 我們事先就知道有這個問題.
2881.pinyin: wǒmen shìxiān jiù zhīdào yǒu zhège wèntí
2881.english: We were aware of the problem beforehand.

2882.simplified: 我们要为新娘的健康干杯。
2882.traditional: 我們要為新娘的健康干杯。
2882.pinyin: wǒmen yào wéi xīnniáng de jiànkāng gānbēi
2882.english: We must drink to the health of the bride.

2883.simplified: 有必要马上派他到那里去。
2883.traditional: 有必要馬上派他到那裡去。
2883.pinyin: yǒu bìyào mǎshàng pài tā dào nàli qù
2883.english: It is necessary that he be sent there at once.

2884.simplified: 我们应该学习祖先的成就。
2884.traditional: 我們應該學習祖先的成就。
2884.pinyin: wǒmen yīnggāi xuéxí zǔxiān de chéngjiù
2884.english: We should study our ancestral achievements.

2885.simplified: 有些科学家用动物做试验。
2885.traditional: 有些科學家用動物做試驗。
2885.pinyin: yǒuxiē kēxuéjiā yòng dòngwù zuò shìyàn

2886.simplified: 我们可以利用风力发电.
2886.traditional: 我們可以利用風力發電.
2886.pinyin: yǒuxiē kēxuéjiā yòng dòngwù zuò shìyàn
2886.english: We can harness the power of the wind to make electricity.

2887.simplified: 在你的右边能看到那个邮局.
2887.traditional: 在你的右邊能看到那個郵局.
2887.pinyin: zài nǐ de yòubian néng kàn dào nàge yóujú
2887.english: You'll see the post office on your right.

2888.simplified: 我打开房门，然后走进屋里。
2888.traditional: 我打開房門，然後走進屋裡。
2888.pinyin: wǒ dǎkāi fángmén ránhòu zǒujìn wū lǐ
2888.english: I unlocked the door and went into the room.

2889.pinyin: zhè liǎng zhǒng zhèngtǐ zhènghǎo xiāngfǎn
2889.english: The two systems of government are polar opposites.

2890.simplified: 一个舒适的家可以是一个乐园。
2890.traditional: 一個舒適的家可以是一個樂園。
2890.pinyin: yī gè shūshì de jiā kěyǐ shì yī gè lèyuán
2890.english: A comfortable house may be an Eden.

2891.simplified: 我们都去飞机场为她送行了.
2891.traditional: 我們都去飛機場為她送行了.
2891.pinyin: wǒmen dōu qù fēijīchǎng wéi tā sòngxíng le
2891.english: We all went to the airport to see her off.

2892.simplified: 这些道路上车辆行人很多。
2892.traditional: 這些道路上車輛行人很多。
2892.pinyin: zhèxiē dào lùshang chēliàng xíngrén hěn duō
2892.english: There was a lot of traffic on the roads.

2893.simplified: 这里最常刮的风是西南风.
2893.traditional: 這裡最常刮的風是西南風.
2893.pinyin: zhèlǐ zuì cháng guā de fēng shì xīnán fēng
2893.english: The prevailing wind here is from the south-west.

2894.simplified: 早饭后，我就准备去上班。
2894.traditional: 早飯後，我就准備去上班。
2894.pinyin: zǎofàn hòu wǒ jiù zhǔnbèi qù shàngbān
2894.english: After breakfast, I'll get ready to go to work.

2895.simplified: 我们迟早会查明事实真相。
2895.traditional: 我們遲早會查明事實真相。
2895.pinyin: wǒmen chízǎo huì chámíng shìshí zhēnxiàng
2895.english: We shall find out the truth early or late.

2896.simplified: 他给我看一张合家欢的照片。
2896.traditional: 他給我看一張合家歡的照片。
2896.pinyin: tā gěi wǒ kàn yī zhāng héjiāhuān de zhàopiàn
2896.english: He showed me a photo of a family group.

2897.simplified: 一点点对你不会有什么坏处。
2897.traditional: 一點點對你不會有什麼壞處。
2897.pinyin: yīdiǎndiǎn duì nǐ bùhuì yǒu shénme huàichu
2897.english: A little of it will not do you any harm.

2898.simplified: 她用的时间正好不到四分钟。
2898.traditional: 她用的時間正好不到四分鐘。
2898.pinyin: tā yòng de shíjiān zhènghǎo bùdào sì fēnzhōng
2898.english: Her time was just under four minutes.

2899.simplified: 他的家在这个城市的东北部。
2899.traditional: 他的家在這個城市的東北部。
2899.pinyin: tā de jiā zài zhège chéngshì de dōng běibù
2899.english: His house is in the northeast of this city.

2900.simplified: 图书馆每周五对读者开放。
2900.traditional: 圖書館每周五對讀者開放。
2900.pinyin: túshūguǎn měizhōu wǔ duì dúzhě kāifàng
2900.english: The library is open to readers on every Friday.

2901.simplified: 天气很暖和，我就把大衣脱了。
2901.traditional: 天氣很暖和，我就把大衣脫了。
2901.pinyin: tiānqì hěn nuǎnhuo wǒ jiù bǎ dàyī tuō le
2901.english: I took off my overcoat since it was warm.

2902.simplified: 我父亲要我送顾客到门口。
2902.traditional: 我父親要我送顧客到門口。
2902.pinyin: wǒ fùqīn yào wǒ sòng gùkè dào ménkǒu
2902.english: My father asked me to see the customer to the door.

2903.simplified: 大学的任务是教学和科研。
2903.traditional: 大學的任務是教學和科研。
2903.pinyin: dàxué de rènwu shì jiàoxué hé kēyán
2903.english: The mission of a university is teaching and research.

2904.simplified: 我们把一切事情都交给他处理。
2904.traditional: 我們把一切事情都交給他處理。
2904.pinyin: wǒmen bǎ yīqiè shìqing dōu jiāogěi tā chǔlǐ
2904.english: We placed everything at his disposal.

2905.simplified: 把画挂在窗户对面的墙上.
2905.traditional: 把畫掛在窗戶對面的牆上.
2905.pinyin: bǎ huà guà zài chuānghu duìmiàn de qiáng shàng
2905.english: Hang the picture on the wall opposite the window.

2906.simplified: 我们开会的时间已经确定了.
2906.traditional: 我們開會的時間已經確定了.
2906.pinyin: wǒmen kāihuì de shíjiān yǐjīng quèdìng le
2906.english: The time for our meeting has been fixed already.

2907.simplified: 老实讲，我不同意你的计划。
2907.traditional: 老實講，我不同意你的計劃。
2907.pinyin: lǎoshi jiǎng wǒ bùtóng yì nǐ de jìhuà
2907.english: To tell the truth, I don't agree to your plan.

2908.simplified: 那一页的数字中有几个差错。
2908.traditional: 那一頁的數字中有幾個差錯。
2908.pinyin: nà yī yè de shùzì zhōng yǒu jǐge chācuò
2908.english: There are several faults in the page of figures.

2909.simplified: 在照相前，他调整了快门。
2909.traditional: 在照相前，他調整了快門。
2909.pinyin: zài zhàoxiàng qián tā tiáozhěng le kuàimén
2909.english: He adjusted the shutter before taking a photo.

2910.simplified: 我们可以相信他会准时到来。
2910.traditional: 我們可以相信他會准時到來。
2910.pinyin: wǒmen kěyǐ xiāngxìn tā huì zhǔnshí dàolái
2910.english: We can depend on his arriving here on time.

2911.simplified: 他的名字在名单上排第十六名。
2911.traditional: 他的名字在名單上排第十六名。
2911.pinyin: tā de míngzi zài míngdān shàng pái dì shíliù míng
2911.english: His name is the sixteenth on the list.

2912.simplified: 比赛因天气不好只得取消。
2912.traditional: 比賽因天氣不好只得取消。
2912.pinyin: bǐsài yīn tiānqì bùhǎo zhǐdé qǔxiāo
2912.english: The match had to be cancelled because of bad weather.

2913.simplified: 我的小女儿像天使一样可爱。
2913.traditional: 我的小女兒像天使一樣可愛。
2913.pinyin: wǒ de xiǎo nǚ'ér xiàng tiānshǐ yīyàng kě'ài
2913.english: My little daughter is as lovely as an angel.

2914.simplified: 他手上握着刀向这里跑来。
2914.traditional: 他手上握著刀向這裡跑來。
2914.pinyin: tā shǒu shàng wò zhe dāo xiàng zhèlǐ pǎo lái
2914.english: He came running here with one hand holding a knife.

2915.simplified: 她个子高, 能看到墙的那一边.
2915.traditional: 她個子高, 能看到牆的那一邊.
2915.pinyin: tā gèzi gāo néng kàn dào qiáng de nà yībiān
2915.english: She can see over the wall because of her height.

2916.simplified: 你会很快习惯这里的气候的。
2916.traditional: 你會很快習慣這裡的氣候的。
2916.pinyin: nǐ huì hěn kuài xíguàn zhèlǐ de qìhòu de
2916.english: You will soon get accustomed to the climate here.

2917.simplified: 这时她注意到书记走了进来。
2917.traditional: 這時她注意到書記走了進來。
2917.pinyin: zhèshí tā zhùyì dào shūji zǒu le jìnlái
2917.english: At this moment she noticed the secretary coming in.

2918.simplified: 已成立工作组调查该问题.
2918.traditional: 已成立工作組調查該問題.
2918.pinyin: yǐ chénglì gōngzuòzǔ diàochá gāi wèntí
2918.english: A working party has been set up to look into the problem.

2919.simplified: 她向一个中国教员学习英语。
2919.traditional: 她向一個中國教員學習英語。
2919.pinyin: tā xiàng yī gèzhōng guójiào yuán xuéxí Yīngyǔ
2919.english: She learned English from a Chinese teacher.

2920.simplified: 别忘了一到就给我们打个电报.
2920.traditional: 別忘了一到就給我們打個電報.
2920.pinyin: bié wàng le yī dào jiù gěi wǒmen dǎ gè diànbào
2920.english: Don't forget to cable us as soon as you arrive.

2921.simplified: 以下是人生而平等的真理。
2921.traditional: 以下是人生而平等的真理。
2921.pinyin: yǐxià shì rénshēng ér píngděng de zhēnlǐ
2921.english: What follows is the truth that men are created equal.

2922.simplified: 学生中许多人来自其他国家。
2922.traditional: 學生中許多人來自其他國家。
2922.pinyin: xuésheng zhōng xǔduō rén láizì qítā guójiā
2922.english: Many of the students came from other countries.

2923.simplified: 他是一个有重要社会地位的人。
2923.traditional: 他是一個有重要社會地位的人。
2923.pinyin: tā shì yī gè yǒu zhòngyào shèhuì dìwèi de rén
2923.english: He is a person of important social status.

2924.simplified: 她的马车是院子里最漂亮的。
2924.traditional: 她的馬車是院子裡最漂亮的。
2924.pinyin: tā de mǎchē shì yuànzi lǐ zuì piàoliang de
2924.english: Her carriage was the most beautiful one in the yard.

2925.simplified: 他的文章在省报上发表了。
2925.traditional: 他的文章在省報上發表了。
2925.pinyin: tā de wénzhāng zài shěng bàoshàng fābiǎo le
2925.english: His articles are published on the provincial newspaper.

2926.simplified: 当然，我们从小学就是朋友了。
2926.traditional: 當然，我們從小學就是朋友了。
2926.pinyin: dāngrán wǒmen cóng xiǎoxué jiùshì péngyou le
2926.english: Sure. We are friends since primary school.

2927.simplified: 他就是我们刚才谈论的那个人。
2927.traditional: 他就是我們剛才談論的那個人。
2927.pinyin: tā jiùshì wǒmen gāngcái tánlùn de nàgèrén
2927.english: That is the man about whom we were speaking.

2928.simplified: 不论你去不去，请打电话给我。
2928.traditional: 不論你去不去，請打電話給我。
2928.pinyin: bùlùn nǐ qù bù qù qǐng dǎdiànhuà gěi wǒ
2928.english: Whether you will go (or not), please call me up.

2929.simplified: 他们现在过着比较舒适的生活。
2929.traditional: 他們現在過著比較舒適的生活。
2929.pinyin: tāmen xiànzài guò zhe bǐjiào shūshì de shēnghuó
2929.english: They are now living in relative comfort.

2930.simplified: 一到干活儿的时候, 他就不见了.
2930.traditional: 一到干活兒的時候, 他就不見了.
2930.pinyin: yī dào gànhuór de shíhou tā jiù bùjiàn le
2930.english: He's always missing when there's work to be done.

2931.simplified: 这学期他的写作有了很大进步。
2931.traditional: 這學期他的寫作有了很大進步。
2931.pinyin: zhè xuéqī tā de xiězuò yǒule hěn dà jìnbù
2931.english: His writing has improved greatly in this semester.

2932.simplified: 今天早晨我的汽车发动不起来了。
2932.traditional: 今天早晨我的汽車發動不起來了。
2932.pinyin: jīntiān zǎochén wǒ de qìchē fādòng bù qilai le
2932.english: I couldn't make my car start this morning.

2933.simplified: 那小男孩在父母身边感到安心。
2933.traditional: 那小男孩在父母身邊感到安心。
2933.pinyin: nà xiǎo nánhái zài fùmǔ shēnbiān gǎndào ānxīn
2933.english: The little boy felt secure near his parents.

2934.simplified: 这个花瓶的年代比那个的早.
2934.traditional: 這個花瓶的年代比那個的早.
2934.pinyin: zhège huāpíng de niándài bǐ nàge de zǎo
2934.english: This vase is of an earlier date (ie is older) than that one.

2935.simplified: 讲话时他经常参考笔记。
2935.traditional: 講話時他經常參考筆記。
2935.pinyin: jiǎnghuà shí tā jīngcháng cānkǎo bǐjì
2935.english: He frequently referred to the notes during the course of the talk.

2936.simplified: 我近几个月身体不好没上班.
2936.traditional: 我近幾個月身體不好沒上班.
2936.pinyin: wǒ jìn jǐge yuè shēntǐ bùhǎo méi shàngbān
2936.english: I've been too sick/ill to go to work for the last few months.

2937.simplified: 我从来没有想过会再次见到你。
2937.traditional: 我從來沒有想過會再次見到你。
2937.pinyin: wǒ cóngláiméiyǒu xiǎng guò huì zàicì jiàndào nǐ
2937.english: I never dreamed that I should see you again.

2938.simplified: 他法语还不错, 但应该再好些.
2938.traditional: 他法語還不錯, 但應該再好些.
2938.pinyin: tā Fǎyǔ hái bùcuò dàn yīnggāi zài hǎoxiē
2938.english: His knowledge of French is fair, but ought to be better.

2939.simplified: 电影院不远, 你可以走到那去。
2939.traditional: 電影院不遠, 你可以走到那去。
2939.pinyin: diànyǐngyuàn bù yuǎn nǐ kěyǐ zǒu dào nà qù
2939.english: The cinema is not far, you can get there on foot.

2940.simplified: 我认得她，但想不起她的名字了。
2940.traditional: 我認得她，但想不起她的名字了。
2940.pinyin: wǒ rènde tā dàn xiǎng bù qǐ tā de míngzi le
2940.english: I know her face but I can't call her name to mind.

2941.simplified: 太阳很低时, 物体的影子就很长.
2941.traditional: 太陽很低時, 物體的影子就很長.
2941.pinyin: tàiyang hěn dī shí wùtǐ de yǐngzi jiù hěn cháng
2941.english: Shadows are longer when the sun is low in the sky.

2942.simplified: 这一排排的房屋外表都是一样的。
2942.traditional: 這一排排的房屋外表都是一樣的。
2942.pinyin: zhè yīpái pái de fángwū wàibiǎo dōu shì yīyàng de
2942.english: The rows of houses were uniform in appearance.

2943.simplified: 不论下不下雨，比赛照常举行。
2943.traditional: 不論下不下雨，比賽照常舉行。
2943.pinyin: bùlùn xià bù xiàyǔ bǐsài zhàocháng jǔxíng
2943.english: Rain or shine, the game will be held as scheduled.

2944.simplified: 这医院有内科病房和外科病房.
2944.traditional: 這醫院有內科病房和外科病房.
2944.pinyin: zhè yīyuàn yǒu nèikē bìngfáng hé wàikē bìngfáng
2944.english: The hospital has a medical ward and a surgical ward.

2945.simplified: 你能把那一点指出来，我感到很高兴。
2945.traditional: 你能把那一點指出來，我感到很高興。
2945.pinyin: nǐ néng bǎ nà yīdiǎn zhǐchū lái wǒ gǎndào hěn gāoxìng
2945.english: I'm glad you raised that point.

2946.simplified: 她花了整整一个下午整理邮票。
2946.traditional: 她花了整整一個下午整理郵票。
2946.pinyin: tā huā le zhěngzhěng yī gè xiàwǔ zhěnglǐ yóupiào
2946.english: She spent a whole afternoon sorting out her stamps.

2947.simplified: 公共汽车停下来让一些旅客下车。
2947.traditional: 公共汽車停下來讓一些旅客下車。
2947.pinyin: gōnggòngqìchē tíngxiàlái ràng yīxiē lǚkè xiàchē
2947.english: The bus stopped to put down some passengers.

2948.simplified: 他在几年前脱离了那个非法团体。
2948.traditional: 他在幾年前脫離了那個非法團體。
2948.pinyin: tā zài jǐnián qián tuōlí le nàge fēifǎ tuántǐ
2948.english: He broke away from that lawless group years ago.

2949.simplified: 到半夜时分他已喝了近两瓶酒。
2949.traditional: 到半夜時分他已喝了近兩瓶酒。
2949.pinyin: dào bànyè shífēn tā yǐ hē le jìn liǎng píng jiǔ
2949.english: By midnight he had put back nearly two bottles of wine.

2950.simplified: 在两点到三点之间向经理报到。
2950.traditional: 在兩點到三點之間向經理報到。
2950.pinyin: zài liǎng diǎn dào sān diǎn zhījiān xiàng jīnglǐ bàodào
2950.english: Report yourself to the manager between2 and3.

2951.simplified: 出门前你应该把房间收拾整齐。
2951.traditional: 出門前你應該把房間收拾整齊。
2951.pinyin: chūmén qián nǐ yīnggāi bǎ fángjiān shōushi zhěngqí
2951.english: You should straighten up your room before going out.

2952.simplified: 我希望你不要看不起这种工作。
2952.traditional: 我希望你不要看不起這種工作。
2952.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng nǐ bùyào kànbuqǐ zhèzhǒng gōngzuò
2952.english: I wish you wouldn't look down on this kind of work.

2953.simplified: 这没什么要紧，不要为它烦心了。
2953.traditional: 這沒什麼要緊，不要為它煩心了。
2953.pinyin: zhè méishénme yàojǐn bùyào wéi tā fán xīn le
2953.english: It's not important; don't bother your head about it.

2954.simplified: 在集市上，我闻到了东方的气息。
2954.traditional: 在集市上，我聞到了東方的氣息。
2954.pinyin: zài jíshì shàng wǒ wén dàoliǎo dōngfāng de qìxī
2954.english: In the market, I breathed the smells of the Orient.

2955.simplified: 我在谈话中当然会十分小心的。
2955.traditional: 我在談話中當然會十分小心的。
2955.pinyin: wǒ zài tánhuà zhōng dāngrán huì shífēn xiǎoxīn de
2955.english: I'll certainly be most discreet in my conversation.

2956.simplified: 昨天下雨了, 结果比赛被取消。
2956.traditional: 昨天下雨了, 結果比賽被取消。
2956.pinyin: zuótiān xiàyǔ le jiéguǒ bǐsài bèi qǔxiāo
2956.english: It rained yesterday and in consequence the match was canceled.

2957.simplified: 太阳下山后天气很快就会冷下来。
2957.traditional: 太陽下山後天氣很快就會冷下來。
2957.pinyin: tàiyang xiàshān hòu tiānqì hěn kuài jiù huì lěng xiàlai
2957.english: It gets cold quickly when the sun goes down.

2958.simplified: 我们都被他的爱国精神深深感动了。
2958.traditional: 我們都被他的愛國精神深深感動了。
2958.pinyin: wǒmen dōu bèi tā de àiguó jīngshén shēnshēn gǎndòng le
2958.english: We are all deeply moved by his patriotism.

2959.simplified: 在这块不毛之地上什么也不能生长。
2959.traditional: 在這塊不毛之地上什麼也不能生長。
2959.pinyin: zài zhè kuài bùmáo zhī dìshang shénme yě bùnéng shēngzhǎng
2959.english: Nothing can grow in this barren land.

2960.simplified: 因为天气热，她穿了一件凉快的衣服。
2960.traditional: 因為天氣熱，她穿了一件涼快的衣服。
2960.pinyin: yīnwèi tiānqì rè tā chuān le yī jiàn liángkuai de yīfu
2960.english: As it was a hot day she wore a cool dress.

2961.simplified: 现代音乐最初是在意大利发展起来的。
2961.traditional: 現代音樂最初是在意大利發展起來的。
2961.pinyin: xiàndàiyīnyuè zuìchū shì zàiyì dà lì fāzhǎn qilai de
2961.english: Modern music was first developed in Italy.

2962.simplified: 你这本词典看来有点儿太旧了.
2962.traditional: 你這本詞典看來有點兒太舊了.
2962.pinyin: nǐ zhè běn cídiǎn kànlai yǒudiǎnr tài jiù le
2962.english: Your copy of the dictionary is looking a bit the worse for wear.

2963.simplified: 他对我指的是什么没有一点儿概念。
2963.traditional: 他對我指的是什麼沒有一點兒概念。
2963.pinyin: tā duì wǒ zhǐ de shì shénme méiyǒu yīdiǎnr gàiniàn
2963.english: He didn't have a slightest notion of what I meant.

2964.simplified: 你永远应该以搞好你的工作为目的。
2964.traditional: 你永遠應該以搞好你的工作為目的。
2964.pinyin: nǐ yǒngyuǎn yīnggāi yǐ gǎohǎo nǐ de gōngzuò wéi mùdì
2964.english: You should always aim at doing your job well.

2965.simplified: 那张照片上的突出物是我们的大楼。
2965.traditional: 那張照片上的突出物是我們的大樓。
2965.pinyin: nà zhāng zhàopiàn shàng de tūchū wù shì wǒmen de dàlóu
2965.english: The projection on the picture is our building.

2966.simplified: 他们不得不为了那条消息作出声明。
2966.traditional: 他們不得不為了那條消息作出聲明。
2966.pinyin: tāmen bùdébù wèile nà tiáo xiāoxi zuòchū shēngmíng
2966.english: They have to make a protestation of that news.

2967.simplified: 他没有一次到书店而不买一些书。
2967.traditional: 他沒有一次到書店而不買一些書。
2967.pinyin: tā méiyǒu yīcì dào shūdiàn ér bù mǎi yīxiē shū
2967.english: He never went to the bookstore without buying some books.

2968.simplified: 如果你拿着地图指路，我就来开车。
2968.traditional: 如果你拿著地圖指路，我就來開車。
2968.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ ná zhe dìtú zhǐlù wǒ jiù lái kāichē
2968.english: I'll drive the car if you hold the map and navigate.

2969.simplified: 这个问题你在适当的时候问问她吧。
2969.traditional: 這個問題你在適當的時候問問她吧。
2969.pinyin: zhège wèntí nǐ zài shìdàng de shíhou wèn wèn tā ba
2969.english: Ask her about it when a suitable moment offer itself.

2970.simplified: 有人已经把他的名字从名单上划去了。
2970.traditional: 有人已經把他的名字從名單上劃去了。
2970.pinyin: yǒurén yǐjīng bǎ tā de míngzi cóng míngdān shàng huà qù le
2970.english: Somebody has scratched his name off the list.

2971.simplified: 这本书可能有用，只是相当贵。
2971.traditional: 這本書可能有用，只是相當貴。
2971.pinyin: zhè běn shū kěnéng yǒuyòng zhǐshì xiāngdāng guì
2971.english: The book is likely to be useful, only it's rather expensive.

2972.simplified: 有人向部长提出了工业计划问题。
2972.traditional: 有人向部長提出了工業計劃問題。
2972.pinyin: yǒurén xiàng bùzhǎng tíchū le gōngyè jìhuà wèntí
2972.english: The minister was queried about his plans for the industry.

2973.simplified: 我们大学的校园里新建了一座体育馆。
2973.traditional: 我們大學的校園裡新建了一座體育館。
2973.pinyin: wǒmen dàxué de xiàoyuán lǐ xīnjiàn le yī zuò tǐyùguǎn
2973.english: A new gymnasium has been built on our campus.

2974.simplified: 他的研究成果和你的研究成果有关联。
2974.traditional: 他的研究成果和你的研究成果有關聯。
2974.pinyin: tā de yánjiū chéngguǒ hé nǐ de yánjiū chéngguǒ yǒuguānlián
2974.english: His research results correlate with yours.

2975.simplified: 他是大学教师联合会的一名成员。
2975.traditional: 他是大學教師聯合會的一名成員。
2975.pinyin: tā shì dàxué jiàoshī liánhéhuì de yī míng chéngyuán
2975.english: He is a member of the Association of University Teachers.

2976.simplified: 推广这种新方法不是件容易的工作。
2976.traditional: 推廣這種新方法不是件容易的工作。
2976.pinyin: tuīguǎng zhèzhǒng xīn fāngfǎ bùshì jiàn róngyì de gōngzuò
2976.english: Popularizing this new method is not an easy job.

2977.simplified: 当他平静下来时，我开始告诉他实情。
2977.traditional: 當他平靜下來時，我開始告訴他實情。
2977.pinyin: dāng tā píngjìng xiàlai shí wǒ kāishǐ gàosu tā shíqíng
2977.english: When he quieted down, I began to tell him the truth.

2978.simplified: 他在生人面前总是不知要说什么。
2978.traditional: 他在生人面前總是不知要說什麼。
2978.pinyin: tā zài shēngrén miànqián zǒngshì bùzhī yàoshuō shénme
2978.english: He is always at a loss what to say in front of strangers.

2979.simplified: 世界上任何困难他们都可以克服。
2979.traditional: 世界上任何困難他們都可以克服。
2979.pinyin: shìjiè shàng rènhé kùnnan tāmen dōu kěyǐ kèfú
2979.english: There will be no difficulty in the world that they cannot overcome.

2980.simplified: 想要懂得今天，就必须研究昨天。
2980.traditional: 想要懂得今天，就必須研究昨天。
2980.pinyin: xiǎngyào dǒngde jīntiān jiù bìxū yánjiū zuótiān
2980.english: If you want to understand today, you have to search yesterday.

2981.simplified: 我已经在这家旅馆里住了两个星期了。
2981.traditional: 我已經在這家旅館裡住了兩個星期了。
2981.pinyin: wǒ yǐjīng zài zhè jiā lǚguǎn lǐ zhù le liǎng gè xīngqī le
2981.english: I have been resident in this hotel for two weeks.

2982.simplified: 我已经好久没有读到过这样好的书了。
2982.traditional: 我已經好久沒有讀到過這樣好的書了。
2982.pinyin: wǒ yǐjīng hǎojiǔ méiyǒu dú dào guò zhèyàng hǎo de shū le
2982.english: I've not read such a good book for many a long day.

2983.simplified: 她坐在那里努力集中思想准备发言.
2983.traditional: 她坐在那裡努力集中思想准備發言.
2983.pinyin: tā zuò zài nàli nǔlì jízhōng sīxiǎng zhǔnbèi fāyán
2983.english: She sat trying to gather her thoughts before making her speech.

2984.simplified: 那所房子是出卖的，房子里有暖气设备。
2984.traditional: 那所房子是出賣的，房子裡有暖氣設備。
2984.pinyin: nà suǒ fángzi shì chūmài de fángzi lǐ yǒu nuǎnqì shèbèi
2984.english: That house is for sale. It has central heating.

2985.simplified: 他总是把女朋友的相片放在身边。
2985.traditional: 他總是把女朋友的相片放在身邊。
2985.pinyin: tā zǒngshì bǎ nǚpéngyou de xiàngpiàn fàng zài shēnbiān
2985.english: He always kept the picture of his girlfriend's close at hand.

2986.simplified: 她不得不低下头才能穿过低矮的门口。
2986.traditional: 她不得不低下頭才能穿過低矮的門口。
2986.pinyin: tā bùdébù dīxià tóu cáinéng chuānguò dī'ǎi de ménkǒu
2986.english: She had to duck her head to get through the low doorway.

2987.simplified: 你没有认识到她这一成就的重大意义。
2987.traditional: 你沒有認識到她這一成就的重大意義。
2987.pinyin: nǐ méiyǒu rènshi dào tā zhè yī chéngjiù de zhòngdà yìyì
2987.english: You haven't realized the magnitude of her achievement.

2988.simplified: 今天要是星期三，前天就是星期一。
2988.traditional: 今天要是星期三，前天就是星期一。
2988.pinyin: jīntiān yàoshi Xīngqīsān qiántiān jiùshì Xīngqīyī
2988.english: If today is Wednesday, the day before yesterday is Monday.

2989.simplified: 如果你不老实话，我定会对你不客气。
2989.traditional: 如果你不老實話，我定會對你不客氣。
2989.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ bù lǎoshi huà wǒ dìng huì duì nǐ bùkèqi
2989.english: If you don't behave I'll come down on you with heavy hand.

2990.simplified: 如今人们公认这是个错误.
2990.traditional: 如今人們公認這是個錯誤.
2990.pinyin: rújīn rénmen gōngrèn zhè shì gè cuòwù
2990.english: It is now generally admitted to have been (ie Most people agree and accept that it was) a mistake.

2991.simplified: 爸爸刚出门, 那男孩就跑向电影院。
2991.traditional: 爸爸剛出門, 那男孩就跑向電影院。
2991.pinyin: bàba gāng chūmén nà nánhái jiù pǎo xiàng diànyǐngyuàn
2991.english: As soon as his father went out, the boy ran to the cinema.

2992.simplified: 小男孩喜欢在书页空白边上做笔记。
2992.traditional: 小男孩喜歡在書頁空白邊上做筆記。
2992.pinyin: xiǎo nánhái xǐhuan zài shūyè kòngbái biān shàng zuò bǐjì
2992.english: The little boy likes to make notes in the margin of books.

2993.simplified: 前天我见过他，但后来再没见过他。
2993.traditional: 前天我見過他，但後來再沒見過他。
2993.pinyin: qiántiān wǒ jiàn guò tā dàn hòulái zài méi jiàn guò tā
2993.english: I see him the day before yesterday, but have not see him since.

2994.simplified: 我经常收到读过我的书的读者的来信。
2994.traditional: 我經常收到讀過我的書的讀者的來信。
2994.pinyin: wǒ jīngcháng shōudào dú guò wǒ de shū de dúzhě de láixìn
2994.english: I regularly get letters from people who have read my books.

2995.simplified: 没什么事可做，我还是上床睡觉好了。
2995.traditional: 沒什麼事可做，我還是上床睡覺好了。
2995.pinyin: méishénme shì kě zuò wǒ háishi shàngchuáng shuìjiào hǎole
2995.english: There is nothing to do, so I may as well go to bed.

2996.simplified: 为了确定他在家，我事先打电话给他。
2996.traditional: 為了確定他在家，我事先打電話給他。
2996.pinyin: wèile quèdìng tā zài jiā wǒ shìxiān dǎdiànhuà gěi tā
2996.english: To make sure that he was at home, I called him up in advance.

2997.simplified: 她的第一部小说一问世，便使她一举成名。
2997.traditional: 她的第一部小說一問世，便使她一舉成名。
2997.pinyin: tā de dìyī bù xiǎoshuō yī wènshì biàn shǐ tā yījǔ chéngmíng
2997.english: She won her overnight fame by her first novel.

2998.simplified: 我把那封信挂号寄出了，因为里面有钱。
2998.traditional: 我把那封信掛號寄出了，因為裡面有錢。
2998.pinyin: wǒ bǎ nà fēng xìn guàhào jìchū le yīnwèi lǐmiàn yǒuqián
2998.english: I registered the letter because it contain some money.

2999.simplified: 老师问了我一些和我的论文有关的问题。
2999.traditional: 老師問了我一些和我的論文有關的問題。
2999.pinyin: lǎoshī wèn le wǒ yīxiē hé wǒ de lùnwén yǒuguān de wèntí
2999.english: The teacher asked me some questions relative to my paper.

3000.simplified: 现在很多小孩都可以说是少年老成了。
3000.traditional: 現在很多小孩都可以說是少年老成了。
3000.pinyin: xiànzài hěn duō xiǎohái dōu kěyǐ shuō shì shǎo niánlǎo chéngle
3000.english: Now many children can be called young but experienced.

3001.simplified: 正因为他操一口流利的英语，她更爱他。
3001.traditional: 正因為他操一口流利的英語，她更愛他。
3001.pinyin: zhèng yīnwèi tā cāo yīkǒu liúlì de Yīngyǔ tā gèng ài tā
3001.english: She likes him all the better for his fluent spoken English.

3002.simplified: 我在街上遇到她时，她假装不认得我。
3002.traditional: 我在街上遇到她時，她假裝不認得我。
3002.pinyin: wǒ zài jiēshang yùdào tā shí tā jiǎzhuāng bù rènde wǒ
3002.english: She pretended she didn't know me when I passed her in the street.

3003.simplified: 他虽然没有通过考试，但他做了很大的努力。
3003.traditional: 他雖然沒有通過考試，但他做了很大的努力。
3003.pinyin: tā suīrán méiyǒu tōngguò kǎoshì dàn tā zuò le hěn dà de nǔlì
3003.english: He didn't pass the exam, but it was a good attempt.

3004.simplified: 再伟大的学者也没有办法解答这个难题吧。
3004.traditional: 再偉大的學者也沒有辦法解答這個難題吧。
3004.pinyin: zài wěidà de xuézhě yě méiyǒu bànfǎ jiědá zhège nántí ba
3004.english: The greatest scholar cannot solve this difficult problem.

3005.simplified: 就英语作文而言，练习是最好的方法。
3005.traditional: 就英語作文而言，練習是最好的方法。
3005.pinyin: jiù Yīngyǔ zuòwén éryán liànxí shì zuìhǎo de fāngfǎ
3005.english: So far as English composition is concerned, practice is the best way.

3006.simplified: 你已经成年了, 这些问题要自己解决。
3006.traditional: 你已經成年了, 這些問題要自己解決。
3006.pinyin: nǐ yǐjīng chéngnián le zhèxiē wèntí yào zìjǐ jiějué
3006.english: Since you are already of age now, you should solve the problems by yourself.

3007.simplified: 电影一开演我就知道不会喜欢这部电影.
3007.traditional: 電影一開演我就知道不會喜歡這部電影.
3007.pinyin: diànyǐng yī kāiyǎn wǒ jiù zhīdào bùhuì xǐhuan zhè bù diànyǐng
3007.english: I knew early on (in the film) that I wasn't going to enjoy it.

3008.simplified: 简给他写了封长信，然而他一直没有回信。
3008.traditional: 簡給他寫了封長信，然而他一直沒有回信。
3008.pinyin: jiǎn gěi tā xiě le fēng cháng xìn rán'ér tā yīzhí méiyǒu huíxìn
3008.english: Jane wrote him a long letter, but he never wrote back.

3009.simplified: 我首先是一个教师, 其次才是一个作家。
3009.traditional: 我首先是一個教師, 其次才是一個作家。
3009.pinyin: wǒ shǒuxiān shì yī gè jiàoshī qícì cái shì yī gè zuòjiā
3009.english: I am a teacher in the first place and a writer in the next place.

3010.simplified: 我们必须安排一个合适的时间和地点开会。
3010.traditional: 我們必須安排一個合適的時間和地點開會。
3010.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū ānpái yī gè héshì de shíjiān hé dìdiǎn kāihuì
3010.english: We must arrange a convenient time and place for the meeting.

3011.simplified: 那不是个好办法，首先没人会帮我们的忙。
3011.traditional: 那不是個好辦法，首先沒人會幫我們的忙。
3011.pinyin: nà bùshì gè hǎo bànfǎ shǒuxiān méi rén huì bāng wǒmen de máng
3011.english: It is not a good idea. For one thing, nobody will help us.

3012.simplified: 这五年来，出生人数有很大的增长。
3012.traditional: 這五年來，出生人數有很大的增長。
3012.pinyin: zhè wǔ niánlái chūshēng rénshù yǒu hěn dà de zēngzhǎng
3012.english: There has been a great leap in the number of births in these past five years.

3013.simplified: 我说几句好听的, 也许能说服他去做这工作.
3013.traditional: 我說幾句好聽的, 也許能說服他去做這工作.
3013.pinyin: wǒ shuō jǐ jù hǎotīng de yěxǔ néng shuōfú tā qù zuò zhè gōngzuò
3013.english: With a little flattery I might persuade him to do the job.

3014.simplified: 不，他们车间的机床没有我们车间的多。
3014.traditional: 不，他們車間的機床沒有我們車間的多。
3014.pinyin: bù tāmen chējiān de jīchuáng méiyǒu wǒmen chējiān de duō
3014.english: No, there is not so many machine tools in their workshop as in ours.

3015.simplified: 我的朋友都是男生，他们一点也不关心读书。
3015.traditional: 我的朋友都是男生，他們一點也不關心讀書。
3015.pinyin: wǒ de péngyou dōu shì nánshēng tāmen yīdiǎn yě bù guānxīn dúshū
3015.english: My friends were all boys who cared nothing about studying.

3016.simplified: 他很乐观, 认为自己一定很快就能找到工作.
3016.traditional: 他很樂觀, 認為自己一定很快就能找到工作.
3016.pinyin: tā hěn lèguān rènwéi zìjǐ yīdìng hěn kuài jiù néng zhǎodào gōngzuò
3016.english: He's such an optimist that he's sure he'll soon find a job.

3017.simplified: 她好像够亲切的, 可是我不应该信以为真.
3017.traditional: 她好像夠親切的, 可是我不應該信以為真.
3017.pinyin: tā hǎoxiàng gòu qīnqiè de kěshì wǒ bù yīnggāi xìnyǐwéizhēn
3017.english: She seems friendly enough but I shouldn't take her at (her) face value.

3018.simplified: 不要看不起他的努力。他已经取得了很大的进步。
3018.traditional: 不要看不起他的努力。他已經取得了很大的進步。
3018.pinyin: bùyào kànbuqǐ tā de nǔlì tā yǐjīng qǔdé le hěn dà de jìnbù
3018.english: Don't sniff at his effort. He's made great progress.

3019.simplified: 希望今后两国人民之间有更多的交往。
3019.traditional: 希望今後兩國人民之間有更多的交往。
3019.pinyin: xīwàng jīnhòu liǎngguó rénmín zhījiān yǒu gèng duō de jiāowǎng
3019.english: We hope from now on there will be more exchanges between our two peoples.

3020.simplified: 这一章我看到一半才意识到我根本没看懂。
3020.traditional: 這一章我看到一半才意識到我根本沒看懂。
3020.pinyin: zhè yī zhāng wǒ kàn dào yībàn cái yìshí dào wǒ gēnběn méi kàndǒng
3020.english: Half-way through the chapter I realized I hadn't taken anything in.

3021.simplified: 自从我们在学校认识之后，我们就一直是好朋友。
3021.traditional: 自從我們在學校認識之後，我們就一直是好朋友。
3021.pinyin: zìcóng wǒmen zài xuéxiào rènshi zhīhòu wǒmen jiù yīzhí shì hǎopéngyou
3021.english: We've been friends ever since we met at school.

3022.simplified: 你应该查字典找出这个单词的正确读音。
3022.traditional: 你應該查字典找出這個單詞的正確讀音。
3022.pinyin: nǐ yīnggāi chá zìdiǎn zhǎochū zhège dāncí de zhèngquè dúyīn
3022.english: You should look up the right pronunciation of this word in the dictionary.

3023.simplified: 老是有各种各样的天气，不论我们喜欢不喜欢。
3023.traditional: 老是有各種各樣的天氣，不論我們喜歡不喜歡。
3023.pinyin: lǎoshi yǒu gèzhǒnggèyàng de tiānqì bùlùn wǒmen xǐhuan bù xǐhuan
3023.english: There's always weather, weather, whether we like it or not.

3024.simplified: 对不起，我来晚了。刚才我在开会，不能脱身。
3024.traditional: 對不起，我來晚了。剛才我在開會，不能脫身。
3024.pinyin: duìbuqǐ wǒ lái wǎn le gāngcái wǒ zài kāihuì bùnéng tuōshēn
3024.english: I'm sorry I'm late; I was at a meeting and couldn't get away.

3025.simplified: 人家告诉我她很可爱，可是她根本不是那样。
3025.traditional: 人家告訴我她很可愛，可是她根本不是那樣。
3025.pinyin: rénjiā gàosu wǒ tā hěn kě'ài kěshì tā gēnběn bùshì nàyàng
3025.english: People had told me she was very pleasant but she's nothing of the kind.

3026.simplified: 我差点儿把对整个这件事的看法向他讲了。
3026.traditional: 我差點兒把對整個這件事的看法向他講了。
3026.pinyin: wǒ chàdiǎnr bǎ duì zhěnggè zhè jiàn shì de kànfǎ xiàng tā jiǎng le
3026.english: I came near to telling him just what I thought of the whole business.

3027.simplified: 我不是说她真在外层空间--这只是打个比方.
3027.traditional: 我不是說她真在外層空間--這只是打個比方.
3027.pinyin: wǒ bùshì shuō tā zhēn zàiwài céng kōngjiān zhè zhǐshì dǎ gè bǐfang
3027.english: I didn't really mean she was in outer space it's just a figure of speech.

3028.simplified: 她是那些老是把困难往最坏处想的女人之一。
3028.traditional: 她是那些老是把困難往最壞處想的女人之一。
3028.pinyin: tā shì nàxiē lǎoshi bǎ kùnnan wǎng zuì huàichu xiǎng de nǚrén zhīyī
3028.english: She is one of those women who always make the worst of their troubles.

3029.simplified: 请他出去吃午饭, 那样他心情就会好些.
3029.traditional: 請他出去吃午飯, 那樣他心情就會好些.
3029.pinyin: qǐng tā chūqù chī wǔfàn nàyàng tā xīnqíng jiù huì hǎoxiē
3029.english: Offer to take him out for lunch, then (ie as a result of this) he'll feel in a better mood.

3030.simplified: 必须明确指出，部长的言论有两点是错误的。
3030.traditional: 必須明確指出，部長的言論有兩點是錯誤的。
3030.pinyin: bìxū míngquè zhǐchū bùzhǎng de yánlùn yǒu liǎng diǎn shì cuòwù de
3030.english: Just for the record, the minister's statement is wrong on two points.

3031.simplified: 他姐姐过去一直指导他，给他出主意，是他的朋友。
3031.traditional: 他姐姐過去一直指導他，給他出主意，是他的朋友。
3031.pinyin: tā jiějie guòqu yīzhí zhǐdǎo tā gěi tā chū zhǔyi shì tā de péngyou
3031.english: His elder sister had been his guide, counsellor and friend.

3032.simplified: 成年地做一种单调工作, 能把活人也做成机器人.
3032.traditional: 成年地做一種單調工作, 能把活人也做成機器人.
3032.pinyin: chéngnián dì zuò yīzhǒng dāndiào gōngzuò néng bǎ huórén yě zuò chéng jīqìrén
3032.english: Years of doing the same dull job can turn you into a machine.

3033.simplified: 我吃完晚饭常感到困, 一到晚上就又精神了.
3033.traditional: 我吃完晚飯常感到困, 一到晚上就又精神了.
3033.pinyin: wǒ chīwán wǎnfàn cháng gǎndào kùn yī dào wǎnshang jiù yòu jīngshén le
3033.english: I often feel sleepy after supper and then I get my second wind later in the evening.

3034.simplified: 在我们整个旅行中，我们没有看到一个大人打孩子。
3034.traditional: 在我們整個旅行中，我們沒有看到一個大人打孩子。
3034.pinyin: zài wǒmen zhěnggè lǚxíng zhōng wǒmen méiyǒu kàn dào yī gè dàren dǎ háizi
3034.english: In all our travelling, we never saw an adult strike a child.

3035.simplified: 我们今天晚上节目中最精彩的是中国杂技表演.
3035.traditional: 我們今天晚上節目中最精彩的是中國雜技表演.
3035.pinyin: wǒmen jīntiān wǎnshang jiémù zhōng zuì jīngcǎi de shì Zhōngguó zájì biǎoyǎn
3035.english: The star turn in our show tonight will be a group of Chinese acrobats.

3036.simplified: 走道人可以在上面行走的地方，如人行道或散步场所
3036.traditional: 走道人可以在上面行走的地方，如人行道或散步場所
3036.pinyin: zǒudào rén kěyǐ zài shàngmian xíngzǒu de dìfang rú rénxíngdào huò sànbù chǎngsuǒ
3036.english: A place, such as a sidewalk or promenade, on which one may walk.

3037.simplified: 自从我上次离开这里以来，这小城已变得认不出来了。
3037.traditional: 自從我上次離開這裡以來，這小城已變得認不出來了。
3037.pinyin: zìcóng wǒ shàngcì líkāi zhèlǐ yǐlái zhè xiǎochéng yǐ biànde rèn bù chūlái le
3037.english: The town has altered out of all recognition since I was last here.

3038.simplified: 自从我上次离开这里以来，这小城已经变得认不出来了。
3038.traditional: 自從我上次離開這裡以來，這小城已經變得認不出來了。
3038.pinyin: zìcóng wǒ shàngcì líkāi zhèlǐ yǐlái zhè xiǎochéng yǐjīng biànde rèn bù chūlái le
3038.english: The town has altered out of all recognition since I was last there.

3039.simplified: 就像其他老人一样，我祖父也老喜欢讲他当年的故事。
3039.traditional: 就像其他老人一樣，我祖父也老喜歡講他當年的故事。
3039.pinyin: jiù xiàng qítā lǎorén yīyàng wǒ zǔfù yě lǎo xǐhuan jiǎng tā dāngnián de gùshi
3039.english: As is often the case with old people, my grandfather is fond of talking about good old days.

3044.english: I have a fear of snakes.

3051.english: The army is on the move.

3057.english: He's got his hat on askew.

3058.english: Sweat was pouring down his face.

3061.english: I have nothing to do with it.

3068.english: Make a guess at the answer.

3069.english: I need to go to the bathroom.

3072.english: She was holding up an umbrella.

3074.english: He fell and hit his head.

3075.english: Strong animals prey upon weaker ones.

3077.pinyin: nà pǐ mǎ yíng dìng le

3081.english: I have a complaint of the chest.

3082.english: I am going to my uncle's.

3086.english: Both mother and baby are doing well.

3088.english: She is passionately fond of tennis.

3090.pinyin: lù dào zhèlǐ biàn zhǎi le

3091.pinyin: tā de fèi bù bù jiànkāng

3094.pinyin: zhè zhāng huà guà wāi le

3097.english: She snuggled close up to him.

3099.english: He hit me in the stomach.

3106.pinyin: zuòxia xiē xiē tuǐ r ba
3106.english: Sit down and rest your legs.

3107.pinyin: tā zhàn dé bù tài wěn
3107.english: She's not very steady on her pins.

3108.pinyin: wǒ de bèi téng dé yàomìng

3109.english: Stick the fork into the potato.

3110.english: I beseech you to tell me.

3112.pinyin: cóng liù gè lǐ tiāo yī gè
3112.english: Choose one out of the six.

3113.english: It was a period of innovation.

3114.english: It doesn't matter in the least.

3118.english: His behaviour conforms to his words.

3120.english: You should take pity on him.

3121.english: Water spewed out of the hole.

3125.pinyin: ànzhào fēnfù nǐ de qù zuò

3127.pinyin: zhè duǒ huā shì xióng huā
3127.english: This flower is a male flower.

3128.english: I want a pail of milk.

3129.english: She is crazy about rock and roll.

3131.english: The bar is open to non-residents.

3134.pinyin: bìzhǐ shì chéng juǎn mǎi de

3136.english: Water sluiced out of the hole.

3139.pinyin: wǒ hùn shēn dōu zài fādǒu

3143.english: My toothbrush is losing its bristles.

3144.pinyin: tāmen kǎn dǎo le nà kē shù

3147.pinyin: qǐng lái liǎng bēi dàn de píjiǔ

3148.english: The two lines cut across each other.

3149.english: I saw the procession pass by.

3151.pinyin: wǒmen ràng tàiyang shài shú le
3151.english: We are baking in the sun.

3154.pinyin: wǒ kàn bù shàng tā de zuòpǐn

3155.english: She emitted a cry of pain.

3156.pinyin: wǒ gàosu tā wúshù cì le

3157.english: He is a graduate in medicine.

3158.pinyin: nà tiáo yú fǔlàn dé fā chòu le

3159.english: I will hie to the market.

3161.english: She pricked herself on a needle.

3166.english: I feel pity for the old man.

3167.pinyin: gěi wǒ zài lái yī hú kāfēi
3167.english: Bring me another pot of coffee.

3168.pinyin: zhège pénzi shì tiě zuò de

3660.simplified: 很多东西是由竹子做出的。
3660.traditional: 很多東西是由竹子做出的。
3660.pinyin: hěn duō dōngxi shì yóu zhúzi zuòchū de
3660.english: Many things are made out of bamboo.

3661.simplified: 那简直是浪费时间和精力.
3661.traditional: 那簡直是浪費時間和精力.
3661.pinyin: nà jiǎnzhí shì làngfèi shíjiān hé jīnglì
3661.english: It's a waste of time and energy.

3662.simplified: 我向他们做了明白的解释。
3662.traditional: 我向他們做了明白的解釋。
3662.pinyin: wǒ xiàng tāmen zuò le míngbai de jiěshì
3662.english: I made a lucid explanation to them.

3663.simplified: 他努力追求自己的奋斗目标.
3663.traditional: 他努力追求自己的奮斗目標.
3663.pinyin: tā nǔlì zhuīqiú zìjǐ de fèndòu mùbiāo
3663.english: He pursues his aims with diligence.

3664.simplified: 她的建议一再遭到拒绝。
3664.traditional: 她的建議一再遭到拒絕。
3664.pinyin: tā de jiànyì yīzài zāodào jùjué
3664.english: Her proposal met with continual rejections.

3665.simplified: 这个东方传说很吸引人。
3665.traditional: 這個東方傳說很吸引人。
3665.pinyin: zhège dōngfāng chuánshuō hěn xīyǐn rén

3666.simplified: 我站在那里，害怕得直发抖。
3666.traditional: 我站在那裡，害怕得直發抖。
3666.pinyin: wǒ zhàn zài nàli hàipà dé zhí fādǒu
3666.english: I stood there quaking with fear.

3667.simplified: 她失败后感到非常痛心。
3667.traditional: 她失敗後感到非常痛心。
3667.pinyin: tā shībài hòu gǎndào fēicháng tòngxīn
3667.english: She was badly cut up when she failed.

3668.simplified: 他完全不顾及自己的安全。
3668.traditional: 他完全不顧及自己的安全。
3668.pinyin: tā wánquán bù gùjí zìjǐ de ānquán
3668.english: He's quite reckless of his own safety.

3669.simplified: 她拒绝接见工会代表团.
3669.traditional: 她拒絕接見工會代表團.
3669.english: She refused to meet the union delegation.

3670.simplified: 我的要求遭到了断然拒绝。
3670.traditional: 我的要求遭到了斷然拒絕。
3670.pinyin: wǒ de yāoqiú zāo dàoliǎo duànrán jùjué
3670.english: My request was met with a flat refusal.

3671.simplified: 这个可怜的人是一个采煤工。
3671.traditional: 這個可憐的人是一個采煤工。
3671.pinyin: zhège kělián de rén shì yī gè cǎiméi gōng
3671.english: The poor man is a coal digger.

3672.simplified: 他化装扮演一个老头儿。
3672.traditional: 他化裝扮演一個老頭兒。
3672.pinyin: tā huàzhuāng bànyǎn yī gè lǎotóur
3672.english: He made up for the part of an old man.

3673.simplified: 我们用词句来表达思想。
3673.traditional: 我們用詞句來表達思想。
3673.pinyin: wǒmen yòng cíjù lái biǎodá sīxiǎng
3673.english: We express our thought by means of words.

3674.pinyin: fànrén chèn zhe tiānhēi táopǎo le
3674.english: The criminal escaped under the cover of darkness.

3675.pinyin: fànrén chèn zhe tiānhēi táopǎo le
3675.english: The minister is busy with important affairs of state.

3676.simplified: 政策的条款是临时决定的.
3676.traditional: 政策的條款是臨時決定的.
3676.pinyin: zhèngcè de tiáokuǎn shì línshí juédìng de
3676.english: Points of policy are decided ad hoc.

3677.simplified: 人群慢慢从体育场散去.
3677.traditional: 人群慢慢從體育場散去.
3677.pinyin: rénqún mànmàn cóng tǐyùchǎng sǎn qù
3677.english: The crowds drifted away from the stadium.

3678.pinyin: wǒ yǒudiǎn sīshì hé nǐ shāngliang
3678.english: I have something personal to discuss with you.

3679.simplified: 每天晚上他都埋头读书.
3679.traditional: 每天晚上他都埋頭讀書.
3679.pinyin: měitiān wǎnshang tā dōu máitóu dúshū
3679.english: In the evenings he buries himself in his books.

3680.simplified: 尽量更客观地对待此事吧。
3680.traditional: 盡量更客觀地對待此事吧。
3680.pinyin: jǐnliàng gèng kèguān dì duìdài cǐ shì ba
3680.english: Try to be more objective about it.

3681.simplified: 知你平安无事才放下心来
3681.traditional: 知你平安無事才放下心來
3681.pinyin: zhī nǐ píng'ānwúshì cái fàngxia xīn lái
3681.english: It's a great relief to know you're safe.

3682.simplified: 广大的地区均已变成沙漠.
3682.traditional: 廣大的地區均已變成沙漠.
3682.pinyin: guǎngdà de dìqū jūn yǐ biànchéng shāmò
3682.english: Vast areas of land have become desert.

3683.simplified: 这个月我们看了好几场戏。
3683.traditional: 這個月我們看了好幾場戲。
3683.pinyin: zhège yuè wǒmen kàn le hǎojǐ chǎng xì
3683.english: We've been to several plays this month.

3684.simplified: 工人正在一个大桶里染布。
3684.traditional: 工人正在一個大桶裡染布。
3684.pinyin: gōngrén zhèngzài yī gè dàtǒng lǐ rǎnbù
3684.english: The worker is dyeing cloth in a vat.

3685.simplified: 大家以热烈的掌声欢迎她.
3685.traditional: 大家以熱烈的掌聲歡迎她.
3685.pinyin: dàjiā yǐ rèliè de zhǎngshēng huānyíng tā
3685.english: She was received with warm applause.

3686.simplified: 石墨是一种软而黑的物质。
3686.traditional: 石墨是一種軟而黑的物質。
3686.pinyin: shímò shì yīzhǒng ruǎn ér hēi de wùzhì
3686.english: Graphite is a soft black substance.

3687.simplified: 我在省钱买一台电冰箱。
3687.traditional: 我在省錢買一台電冰箱。
3687.pinyin: wǒ zài shěngqián mǎi yī tái diànbīngxiāng
3687.english: I'm saving up for a refrigerator.

3688.simplified: 他的政治观点相当极端。
3688.traditional: 他的政治觀點相當極端。
3688.pinyin: tā de zhèngzhì guāndiǎn xiāngdāng jíduān
3688.english: His political views are rather extreme.

3689.simplified: 我们不能用肉眼看到细菌。
3689.traditional: 我們不能用肉眼看到細菌。
3689.pinyin: wǒmen bùnéng yòng ròuyǎn kàn dào xìjūn
3689.english: We can not see bacillus with eyes.

3690.simplified: 这机构得到联合国的资助。
3690.traditional: 這機構得到聯合國的資助。
3690.pinyin: zhè jīgòu dédào Liánhéguó de zīzhù
3690.english: The organization is backed by the UN.

3691.pinyin: tīngzhòng zhìshǎo yě yǒu wǔ qiān rén
3691.english: The audience was not less than five thousand.

3692.simplified: 他的外套和裤子不相配。
3692.traditional: 他的外套和褲子不相配。
3692.pinyin: tā de wàitào hé kùzi bù xiāngpèi
3692.english: His coat is not in keeping with the trousers.

3693.simplified: 警察找回了被盗的珠宝。
3693.traditional: 警察找回了被盜的珠寶。
3693.pinyin: jǐngchá zhǎohuí le bèi dào de zhūbǎo
3693.english: The police recovered the stolen jewellery.

3694.simplified: 批改试卷的确是个苦事。
3694.traditional: 批改試卷的確是個苦事。
3694.pinyin: pīgǎi shìjuàn díquè shì gè kǔshì
3694.english: Marking examination papers is a real grind.

3695.simplified: 他来到北京，想碰碰运气。
3695.traditional: 他來到北京，想碰碰運氣。
3695.pinyin: tā láidào Běijīng xiǎng pèng pèngyùnqi
3695.english: He came to Beijing to try his luck.

3696.simplified: 我喜欢吃有黄瓜的三明治。
3696.traditional: 我喜歡吃有黃瓜的三明治。
3696.pinyin: tā láidào Běijīng xiǎng pèng pèngyùnqi
3696.english: I like to eat cucumber sandwiches.

3697.simplified: 我能很准确地预测某事。
3697.traditional: 我能很准確地預測某事。
3697.pinyin: wǒ néng hěn zhǔnquè dì yùcè mǒushì
3697.english: I can predict something with great accuracy.

3698.simplified: 我的厨房里有好几个勺子。
3698.traditional: 我的廚房裡有好幾個勺子。
3698.pinyin: wǒ de chúfáng lǐ yǒu hǎo jǐge sháozi
3698.english: There are several scoops in my kitchen.

3699.simplified: 在这些高的地方很难呼吸.
3699.traditional: 在這些高的地方很難呼吸.
3699.pinyin: zài zhèxiē gāo de dìfang hěn nán hūxī
3699.english: It is difficult to breathe at these altitudes.

3700.simplified: 他对人生抱有崇高的理想。
3700.traditional: 他對人生抱有崇高的理想。
3700.pinyin: tā duì rénshēng bàoyǒu chónggāo de lǐxiǎng
3700.english: He has lofty ideals about life.

3701.simplified: 小时是时间的一个量度单位。
3701.traditional: 小時是時間的一個量度單位。
3701.pinyin: xiǎoshí shì shíjiān de yī gè liángdù dānwèi
3701.english: An hour is a measure of time.

3702.simplified: 他的计划遭到强烈的反对。
3702.traditional: 他的計劃遭到強烈的反對。
3702.pinyin: tā de jìhuà zāodào qiángliè de fǎnduì
3702.english: His plan was opposed with fierceness.

3703.simplified: 她的眼睛扫视了一下那个房间。
3703.traditional: 她的眼睛掃視了一下那個房間。
3703.pinyin: tā de yǎnjing sǎoshì le yīxià nàge fángjiān

3704.simplified: 他在口袋里摸著, 想找些钱.
3704.traditional: 他在口袋裡摸著, 想找些錢.
3704.pinyin: tā zài kǒudài lǐ mō zhe xiǎng zhǎo xiē qián
3704.english: He felt in his pocket for some money.

3705.simplified: 我儿子抓住我的手不撒开。
3705.traditional: 我兒子抓住我的手不撒開。
3705.pinyin: wǒ érzi zhuāzhù wǒ de shǒu bù sā kāi
3705.english: My son grabbed my hand and wouldn't let go.

3706.simplified: 他在面包上涂上苹果酱。
3706.traditional: 他在面包上涂上蘋果醬。
3706.pinyin: tā zài miànbāo shàng tú shàng píngguǒjiàng
3706.english: He spread some apple jam on the bread.

3707.simplified: 她虽疲劳但仍继续工作。
3707.traditional: 她雖疲勞但仍繼續工作。
3707.pinyin: tā suī píláo dàn réng jìxù gōngzuò
3707.english: She kept on working although she was tired.

3708.simplified: 碎骨是最好的肥料之一。
3708.traditional: 碎骨是最好的肥料之一。
3708.pinyin: suì gǔ shì zuìhǎo de féiliào zhīyī
3708.english: Crushed bones make one of the best fertilizers.

3709.simplified: 这部著作已是第三次重印了.
3709.traditional: 這部著作已是第三次重印了.
3709.pinyin: zhè bù zhùzuò yǐ shì dì sāncì chóngyìn le
3709.english: The work is into its third reprint.

3710.simplified: 后面那辆车想超过我们。
3710.traditional: 後面那輛車想超過我們。
3710.pinyin: hòumian nà liàng chē xiǎng chāoguò wǒmen
3710.english: The car behind wants to get ahead of us.

3711.simplified: 队伍就在我家门前经过.
3711.traditional: 隊伍就在我家門前經過.
3711.pinyin: duìwǔ jiù zài wǒ jiā ménqián jīngguò
3711.english: The procession passed right by my front door.

3712.simplified: 他的新房子侵占了我的土地。
3712.traditional: 他的新房子侵佔了我的土地。
3712.pinyin: tā de xīn fángzi qīnzhàn le wǒ de tǔdì
3712.english: His new house encroached on my land.

3713.simplified: 他的上司奖给他一笔现金。
3713.traditional: 他的上司獎給他一筆現金。
3713.pinyin: tā de shàngsi jiǎng gěi tā yī bǐ xiànjīn
3713.english: He was awarded a cash bounty by his boss.

3714.simplified: 他是一个成功的性格演员。
3714.traditional: 他是一個成功的性格演員。
3714.pinyin: tā shì yī gè chénggōng de xìnggé yǎnyuán
3714.english: He is a successful character actor.

3715.simplified: 有的化学家研究气体的性质.
3715.traditional: 有的化學家研究氣體的性質.
3715.pinyin: yǒude huàxuéjiā yánjiū qìtǐ de xìngzhì
3715.english: Chemists study the nature of gases.

3716.simplified: 正义一定会战胜非正义。
3716.traditional: 正義一定會戰勝非正義。
3716.pinyin: zhèngyì yīdìng huì zhànshèng fēi zhèngyì

3717.simplified: 她把那小鸟握在掌心里.
3717.traditional: 她把那小鳥握在掌心裡.
3717.pinyin: tā bǎ nà xiǎo niǎo wò zài zhǎng xīnli
3717.english: She held the small bird in the hollow of her hand.

3718.simplified: 无数想法划过她的心头。
3718.traditional: 無數想法劃過她的心頭。
3718.pinyin: wúshù xiǎngfǎ huáguò tā de xīntóu
3718.english: A myriad of thoughts passed through her mind.

3719.simplified: 他梦想着过体面的生活。
3719.traditional: 他夢想著過體面的生活。
3719.pinyin: tā mèngxiǎng zhe guò tǐmiàn de shēnghuó
3719.english: He dreamed of living in decent conditions.

3720.simplified: 她发现和他们的争论没用。
3720.traditional: 她發現和他們的爭論沒用。
3720.pinyin: tā fāxiàn hé tāmen de zhēnglùn méiyòng
3720.english: She find it useless argue with them.

3721.simplified: 我部队已深入到敌占区.
3721.traditional: 我部隊已深入到敵佔區.
3721.pinyin: wǒ bùduì yǐ shēnrù dào dízhànqū
3721.english: Our troops have penetrated (into) enemy territory.

3722.simplified: 他们正在把小麦磨成面粉。
3722.traditional: 他們正在把小麥磨成面粉。
3722.pinyin: tāmen zhèngzài bǎ xiǎomài mó chéng miànfěn
3722.english: They are grinding wheat into flour.

3723.simplified: 战士们为取得胜利而欢跃。
3723.traditional: 戰士們為取得勝利而歡躍。
3723.pinyin: zhànshì men wéi qǔdéshènglì ér huān yuè
3723.english: The soldiers exulted at their victory.

3724.simplified: 她用挖苦的语调和他说话。
3724.traditional: 她用挖苦的語調和他說話。
3724.pinyin: tā yòng wākǔ de yǔ tiáohé tā shuōhuà
3724.english: She talked with him with sarcastic tones.

3725.simplified: 我在假日愿意轻松一些.
3725.traditional: 我在假日願意輕松一些.
3725.pinyin: wǒ zài jiàrì yuànyì qīngsōng yīxiē
3725.english: I like to take things easy when I'm on holiday.

3726.simplified: 紧急情况紧急或迫切的情况
3726.traditional: 緊急情況緊急或迫切的情況
3726.pinyin: jǐnjí qíngkuàng jǐnjí huò pòqiè de qíngkuàng

3727.simplified: 晚饭前，他吃了一些饼干。
3727.traditional: 晚飯前，他吃了一些餅干。
3727.pinyin: wǎnfàn qián tā chī le yīxiē bǐnggān
3727.english: He had some biscuits before the dinner.

3728.pinyin: Zhōngcān cháng yǒu mǐfàn huò miàntiáo
3728.english: Chinese food is often served with rice or noodles.

3729.simplified: 他全面完成了分配的任务。
3729.traditional: 他全面完成了分配的任務。
3729.pinyin: tā quánmiàn wánchéng le fēnpèi de rènwu

3730.simplified: 发现她在那，我感到很吃惊。
3730.traditional: 發現她在那，我感到很吃驚。
3730.pinyin: fāxiàn tā zài nà wǒ gǎndào hěn chījīng
3730.english: I was amazed to find her there.

3731.simplified: 他来自于一个大型海港城市。
3731.traditional: 他來自於一個大型海港城市。
3731.pinyin: tā láizì yú yī gè dàxíng hǎigǎng chéngshì
3731.english: He came from a large seaport.

3732.simplified: 总有一天我会回到家乡。
3732.traditional: 總有一天我會回到家鄉。
3732.pinyin: zǒngyǒu yī tiān wǒ huì huídào jiāxiāng
3732.english: I can come back to my hometown some day.

3733.simplified: 你故意和我的想法对著干.
3733.traditional: 你故意和我的想法對著干.
3733.pinyin: nǐ gùyì hé wǒ de xiǎngfǎ duì zhe gàn
3733.english: You have deliberately acted against my wishes.

3734.simplified: 沉默不能总理解为同意。
3734.traditional: 沉默不能總理解為同意。
3734.pinyin: chénmò bùnéng zǒng lǐjiě wéi tóngyì
3734.english: Silence must not always be read as consent.

3735.simplified: 她把头紧靠在我的肩膀上。
3735.traditional: 她把頭緊靠在我的肩膀上。
3735.pinyin: tā bǎtóu jǐnkào zài wǒ de jiānbǎng shàng
3735.english: She burrowed her head into my shoulder.

3736.simplified: 他们兴高采烈地庆祝胜利。
3736.traditional: 他們興高采烈地慶祝勝利。

3737.simplified: 那辆汽车一加速就超越了我.
3737.traditional: 那輛汽車一加速就超越了我.
3737.pinyin: nà liàng qìchē yī jiāsù jiù chāoyuè le wǒ
3737.english: The car accelerated as it overtook me.

3738.simplified: 比较一下这些三角形的面积.
3738.traditional: 比較一下這些三角形的面積.
3738.pinyin: bǐjiào yīxià zhèxiē sānjiǎoxíng de miànjī
3738.english: Compare the areas of these triangles.

3739.simplified: 这个错误是由印刷工造成的。
3739.traditional: 這個錯誤是由印刷工造成的。
3739.pinyin: zhège cuòwù shì yóu yìnshuā gōng zàochéng de
3739.english: This error is made by printer.

3740.simplified: 他们最需要的是管理人才。
3740.traditional: 他們最需要的是管理人才。
3740.pinyin: tāmen zuì xūyào de shì guǎnlǐ réncái
3740.english: What they need most is managerial talent.

3741.simplified: 她是一位年仅二十岁的教师。
3741.traditional: 她是一位年僅二十歲的教師。
3741.pinyin: tā shì yī wèi nián jǐn èrshí suì de jiàoshī
3741.english: She is a teacher aged only twenty.

3742.simplified: 这一法律古老但仍然有效。
3742.traditional: 這一法律古老但仍然有效。
3742.pinyin: zhè yī fǎlǜ gǔlǎo dàn réngrán yǒuxiào
3742.english: This law is ancient but still extant.

3743.simplified: 耐力忍受困难和痛苦的能力
3743.traditional: 耐力忍受困難和痛苦的能力
3743.pinyin: nàilì rěnshòu kùnnan hé tòngkǔ de nénglì
3743.english: The capacity to endure hardship or pain.

3827.english: Pay half now and the rest later.

3828.simplified: 他们正争论神学上的问题。
3828.traditional: 他們正爭論神學上的問題。
3828.pinyin: tāmen zhèng zhēnglùn shénxué shàng de wèntí
3828.english: They are having a theological argument.

3829.simplified: 这本书出版社已印了10000册.
3829.traditional: 這本書出版社已印了10000冊.
3829.pinyin: zhè běn shū chūbǎnshè yǐ yìn le cè
3829.english: The publisher has printed10000 copies of the book.

3830.english: He was utterly ruthless in his determination to succeed.

3831.simplified: 部队向前进, 赶跑了敌人.
3831.traditional: 部隊向前進, 趕跑了敵人.
3831.pinyin: bùduì xiàngqián jìn gǎnpǎo le dírén
3831.english: The enemy was put to flight by the advancing army.

3832.simplified: 我不好意思告诉她我不及格。
3832.traditional: 我不好意思告訴她我不及格。
3832.pinyin: wǒ bùhǎoyìsi gàosu tā wǒ bùjígé
3832.english: I was too ashamed to tell her that I had failed.

3833.simplified: 我尽量找些东西给你穿。
3833.traditional: 我盡量找些東西給你穿。
3833.pinyin: wǒ jǐnliàng zhǎo xiē dōngxi gěi nǐ chuān
3833.english: I'll try and rake out something for you to wear.

3834.simplified: 小猫把那个盒子当做它的床。
3834.traditional: 小貓把那個盒子當做它的床。
3834.pinyin: xiǎomāo bǎ nàge hézi dàngzuò tā de chuáng
3834.english: The kitten uses that box as its bed.

3835.simplified: 现代战争并不是好玩的事。
3835.traditional: 現代戰爭並不是好玩的事。
3835.pinyin: xiàndài zhànzhēng bìng bùshì hǎowán de shì
3835.english: There is not much comedy in modern war.

3836.simplified: 他承认以前从未见过她。
3836.traditional: 他承認以前從未見過她。
3836.pinyin: tā chéngrèn yǐqián cóngwèi jiàn guò tā
3836.english: He confessed that he had never seen her before.

3837.simplified: 我们生活在舒适的环境中。
3837.traditional: 我們生活在舒適的環境中。
3837.pinyin: wǒmen shēnghuó zài shūshì de huánjìng zhōng
3837.english: We are living in pleasant surroundings.

3838.simplified: 他从盒子里偷拿了一块巧克力。
3838.traditional: 他從盒子裡偷拿了一塊巧克力。
3838.pinyin: tā cóng hézi lǐ tōu ná le yīkuài qiǎokèlì
3838.english: He sneaked a chocolate from the box.

3839.simplified: 老师们异口同声地称赞他。
3839.traditional: 老師們異口同聲地稱贊他。
3839.pinyin: lǎoshī men yìkǒutóngshēng dì chēngzàn tā
3839.english: The teachers praised him with one accord.

3840.simplified: 他统治了这个国家四十年。
3840.traditional: 他統治了這個國家四十年。
3840.pinyin: tā tǒngzhì le zhège guójiā sìshí nián
3840.english: He reigned over the country for forty years.

3841.simplified: 请让我趁此机会讲几句话.
3841.traditional: 請讓我趁此機會講幾句話.
3841.pinyin: qǐng ràng wǒ chèn cǐ jīhuì jiǎng jǐ jù huà
3841.english: Let me take this opportunity to say a few words.

3842.simplified: 我们在地图上画出我们的路线.
3842.traditional: 我們在地圖上畫出我們的路線.
3842.pinyin: wǒmen zài dìtú shàng huà chū wǒmen de lùxiàn
3842.english: We traced out our route on the map.

3843.simplified: 他把钱包放在里面的口袋里.
3843.traditional: 他把錢包放在裡面的口袋裡.
3843.pinyin: tā bǎ qiánbāo fàng zài lǐmiàn de kǒudài lǐ
3843.english: He kept his wallet in an ,inside pocket.

3844.simplified: 他把桌子移到房间中心。
3844.traditional: 他把桌子移到房間中心。
3844.pinyin: tā bǎ zhuōzi yídào fángjiān zhōngxīn
3844.english: He moved the table over to the center of the room.

3845.simplified: 争论演变成了公开的论战。
3845.traditional: 爭論演變成了公開的論戰。
3845.pinyin: zhēnglùn yǎnbiàn chéngle gōngkāi de lùnzhàn
3845.english: The argument boiled over into open war.

3846.simplified: 她觉得她的创造力难以发挥.
3846.traditional: 她覺得她的創造力難以發揮.
3846.pinyin: tā juéde tā de chuàngzàolì nányǐ fāhuī
3846.english: She felt her creativity was being strangled.

3847.simplified: 不知什么原因，她自杀了。
3847.traditional: 不知什麼原因，她自殺了。
3847.pinyin: bùzhī shénme yuányīn tā zìshā le
3847.english: For one reason or another, she committed suicide.

3848.simplified: 我们对我们的新老师很失望。
3848.traditional: 我們對我們的新老師很失望。
3848.pinyin: wǒmen duì wǒmen de xīn lǎoshī hěn shīwàng
3848.english: We are disappointed in our new teacher.

3849.simplified: 她的新剧作获得广泛宣传.
3849.traditional: 她的新劇作獲得廣泛宣傳.
3849.pinyin: tā de xīn jù zuò huòdé guǎngfàn xuānchuán
3849.english: Her new play has attracted a lot of publicity.

3850.simplified: 大多数戏剧都是用对话体写的.
3850.traditional: 大多數戲劇都是用對話體寫的.
3850.pinyin: dàduōshù xìjù dōu shì yòng duìhuà tǐ xiě de
3850.english: Most plays are written in dialogue.

3851.simplified: 无可否认, 他当时并不知道.
3851.traditional: 無可否認, 他當時並不知道.
3851.pinyin: wúkě fǒurèn tā dāngshí bìngbù zhīdào
3851.english: Admittedly, he didn't know that at the time.

3852.simplified: 这种声明具有政治性质。
3852.traditional: 這種聲明具有政治性質。
3852.english: The statements were of political character.

3853.simplified: 天在下雪，所以我无法外出。
3853.traditional: 天在下雪，所以我無法外出。
3853.pinyin: tiān zàixià xuě suǒyǐ wǒ wúfǎ wàichū
3853.english: It was snowing, and so I could not go out.

3854.simplified: 太阳把这本书的书皮晒弯了.
3854.traditional: 太陽把這本書的書皮曬彎了.
3854.pinyin: tàiyang bǎ zhè běn shū de shūpí shài wān le
3854.english: The hot sun had warped the cover of the book.

3855.simplified: 在网球赛中，他们是对手。
3855.traditional: 在網球賽中，他們是對手。
3855.pinyin: zài wǎngqiúsài zhōng tāmen shì duìshǒu
3855.english: They were adversaries in the tennis match.

3856.simplified: 他太胖了，以致于弯不下腰。
3856.traditional: 他太胖了，以致於彎不下腰。
3856.pinyin: tā tài pàng le yǐzhìyú wān bùxià yāo
3856.english: His fatness renders him unable to bend down.

3857.simplified: 她把两手插在上衣口袋里。
3857.traditional: 她把兩手插在上衣口袋裡。
3857.pinyin: tā bǎ liǎng shǒu chā zài shàngyī kǒudài lǐ
3857.english: She plunged her hands into her coat pockets.

3858.simplified: 我们与警方配合进行工作.
3858.traditional: 我們與警方配合進行工作.
3858.pinyin: wǒmen yǔ jǐngfāng pèihé jìnxíng gōngzuò
3858.english: We are working in conjunction with the police.

3859.simplified: 他当了五年的足球队长.
3859.traditional: 他當了五年的足球隊長.
3859.pinyin: tā dāng le wǔ nián de zúqiú duìzhǎng
3859.english: He was (the) captain of the football team for five years.

3860.simplified: 工人们正去除银中的杂质。
3860.traditional: 工人們正去除銀中的雜質。
3860.pinyin: gōng rénmen zhèng qùchú yín zhòngdì zázhì
3860.english: Workers are removing impurities from silver.

3861.simplified: 他们为促进世界和平而努力.
3861.traditional: 他們為促進世界和平而努力.
3861.pinyin: tāmen wéi cùjìn shìjièhépíng ér nǔlì
3861.english: They worked for the promotion of world peace.

3862.simplified: 我不喜欢我那单调乏味的工作。
3862.traditional: 我不喜歡我那單調乏味的工作。
3862.pinyin: wǒ bù xǐhuan wǒ nà dāndiàofáwèi de gōngzuò
3862.english: I do not like my monotonous work.

3863.simplified: 采取任何你认为最好的措施。
3863.traditional: 采取任何你認為最好的措施。
3863.pinyin: cǎiqǔ rènhé nǐ rènwéi zuìhǎo de cuòshī
3863.english: Take whatsoever measures you consider best.

3864.simplified: 关于此事对他已免于处分。
3864.traditional: 關於此事對他已免於處分。
3864.pinyin: guānyú cǐ shì duì tā yǐ miǎnyú chǔfèn
3864.english: He is exempt from punishment about this thing.

3865.simplified: 她意外地发现了他的真实身份。
3865.traditional: 她意外地發現了他的真實身份。
3865.pinyin: tā yìwài dì fāxiàn le tā de zhēnshí shēnfèn
3865.english: She stumbled on his true identity.

3866.simplified: 我姑姑有时候还真有点讨人厌.
3866.traditional: 我姑姑有時候還真有點討人厭.
3866.pinyin: wǒ gūgu yǒushíhou hái zhēn yǒudiǎn tǎorényàn
3866.english: My aunt can be a bit of a terror.

3867.simplified: 临睡前请拔下电视机的插头.
3867.traditional: 臨睡前請拔下電視機的插頭.
3867.pinyin: lín shuì qián qǐng bá xià diànshìjī de chātóu
3867.english: Please unplug the TV before you go to bed.

3868.simplified: 太阳是能量的最基本来源。
3868.traditional: 太陽是能量的最基本來源。
3868.pinyin: tàiyang shì néngliàng de zuì jīběn láiyuán
3868.english: The sun is the ultimate source of energy.

3869.simplified: 他们的新房子真像梦一般美好。
3869.traditional: 他們的新房子真像夢一般美好。
3869.pinyin: tāmen de xīn fángzi zhēn xiàng mèng yībān měihǎo
3869.english: Their new house is a real dream.

3870.simplified: 我们将按月分期付款买房。
3870.traditional: 我們將按月分期付款買房。
3870.english: We will pay for houses by monthly installments.

3871.simplified: 气象学者画了一张天气图。
3871.traditional: 氣象學者畫了一張天氣圖。
3871.pinyin: qìxiàngxuézhě huà le yī zhāng tiānqì tú
3871.english: The Meteorologist drew a picture of weather.

3872.simplified: 在夏天一个温暖的夜晚...
3872.traditional: 在夏天一個溫暖的夜晚...
3872.pinyin: zài xiàtiān yī gè wēnnuǎn de yèwǎn
3872.english: One warm summer evening.../On a warm summer evening...

3873.simplified: 要求和她定个约会也没有用。
3873.traditional: 要求和她定個約會也沒有用。
3873.pinyin: yāoqiú hé tā dìng gè yuēhuì yě méiyǒu yòng
3873.english: It is no good asking her for a date.

3874.simplified: 真羡慕麦克，他的车子真漂亮。
3874.traditional: 真羨慕麥克，他的車子真漂亮。
3874.pinyin: zhēn xiànmù màikè tā de chēzi zhēn piàoliang
3874.english: I envy Mike, whose car is fancy.

3875.simplified: 医院进口了一些外科器械。
3875.traditional: 醫院進口了一些外科器械。
3875.pinyin: yīyuàn jìnkǒu le yīxiē wàikē qìxiè
3875.english: The hospital imported some surgical instruments.

3876.simplified: 我认为这样的集会毫无价值。
3876.traditional: 我認為這樣的集會毫無價值。
3876.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi zhèyàng de jíhuì háowú jiàzhí
3876.english: I feel that such gatherings are worthless.

3877.simplified: 那项发明是集体努力的成果。
3877.traditional: 那項發明是集體努力的成果。
3877.pinyin: nà xiàng fāmíng shì jítǐ nǔlì de chéngguǒ
3877.english: The invention was a collective effort.

3878.simplified: 虽然他严格，却富有同情心。
3878.traditional: 雖然他嚴格，卻富有同情心。
3878.pinyin: suīrán tā yángé què fùyǒu tóngqíng xīn
3878.english: Stern as he is, he is full of sympathy.

3879.simplified: 这所房子处于一个很好的位置。
3879.traditional: 這所房子處於一個很好的位置。
3879.pinyin: zhè suǒ fángzi chǔyú yī gè hěn hǎo de wèizhi
3879.english: The house has a very good position.

3880.simplified: 压路机是用来修筑道路的。
3880.traditional: 壓路機是用來修築道路的。
3880.pinyin: yālùjī shì yònglái xiūzhù dàolù de
3880.english: A road roller is used in making and repairing roads.

3881.simplified: 我与他合伙做出口生意。
3881.traditional: 我與他合伙做出口生意。
3881.pinyin: wǒ yǔ tā héhuǒ zuò chūkǒu shēngyì
3881.english: I enter into partnership with him to do export business.

3882.simplified: 他留着劲在比赛结束时用。
3882.traditional: 他留著勁在比賽結束時用。
3882.pinyin: tā liú zhe jìn zài bǐsài jiéshù shí yòng
3882.english: He saved his strength for the end of the race.

3883.simplified: 这里年平均降雪量为10厘米.
3883.traditional: 這裡年平均降雪量為10釐米.
3883.pinyin: zhèlǐ nián píngjūn jiàngxuě liáng wéi límǐ
3883.english: The average snowfall here is 10cm a year.

3884.simplified: 没有人敢把视线离开地面。
3884.traditional: 沒有人敢把視線離開地面。
3884.pinyin: méiyǒu rén gǎn bǎ shìxiàn líkāi dìmiàn
3884.english: Nobody dared lift their eyes from the ground.

3885.simplified: 运动对于各年龄段都很有利。
3885.traditional: 運動對於各年齡段都很有利。
3885.pinyin: yùndòng duìyú gè niánlíng duàn dōu hěn yǒulì
3885.english: Exercise is profitable in all ages.

3886.simplified: 这儿的气候和台北非常相似。
3886.traditional: 這兒的氣候和台北非常相似。
3886.pinyin: zhèr de qìhòu hé Táiběi fēicháng xiāngsì
3886.english: The climate here is like that of Taipei.

3887.simplified: 那一切意味看大量艰苦工作。
3887.traditional: 那一切意味看大量艱苦工作。
3887.pinyin: nà yīqiè yìwèi kàn dàliàng jiānkǔ gōngzuò
3887.english: It all amounts to a lot of hard work.

3888.simplified: 她委托邻居照顾她的孩子。
3888.traditional: 她委托鄰居照顧她的孩子。
3888.pinyin: tā wěituō línjū zhàogu tā de háizi
3888.english: She resigned her children to the care of a neighbor.

3889.simplified: 如今，银行业面临许多竞争。
3889.traditional: 如今，銀行業面臨許多競爭。

3890.simplified: 我们应该发扬革命传统。
3890.traditional: 我們應該發揚革命傳統。
3890.english: We shall carry forward the revolutionary tradition.

3891.simplified: 这名士兵胸部受了重伤。
3891.traditional: 這名士兵胸部受了重傷。
3891.pinyin: zhè míng shìbīng xiōngbù shòu le zhòngshāng
3891.english: The soldier received a serious wound on the chest.

3892.simplified: 她参加初级饭店经理课程。
3892.traditional: 她參加初級飯店經理課程。
3892.pinyin: tā cānjiā chūjí fàndiàn jīnglǐ kèchéng
3892.english: She attend a course for junior hotel manager.

3893.simplified: 你对那段距离的判断十分精确.
3893.traditional: 你對那段距離的判斷十分精確.
3893.pinyin: nǐ duì nà duàn jùlí de pànduàn shífēn jīngquè
3893.english: You judged the distance to a nicety.

3894.simplified: 他一字不差地复述了您说的话。
3894.traditional: 他一字不差地復述了您說的話。
3894.pinyin: tā yīzìbùchā dì fùshù le nín shuō dehuà
3894.english: He repeated what you said word for word.

3895.simplified: 冷天出门时要披上披肩。
3895.traditional: 冷天出門時要披上披肩。
3895.pinyin: lěngtiān chūmén shí yào pī shàng pījiān
3895.english: You should put a robe on if you go out in a cold day.

3896.simplified: 无论发生什么事都要保持冷静。
3896.traditional: 無論發生什麼事都要保持冷靜。
3896.pinyin: wúlùn fāshēng shénmeshì dōu yào bǎochí lěngjìng

3897.simplified: 我只在特殊场合穿高跟鞋。
3897.traditional: 我只在特殊場合穿高跟鞋。
3897.pinyin: wǒ zhǐ zài tèshū chǎnghé chuān gāogēnxié
3897.english: I only wear high heels on special occasions.

3898.simplified: 这种理论与已知事实不符。
3898.traditional: 這種理論與已知事實不符。
3898.pinyin: zhèzhǒng lǐlùn yǔ yǐzhī shìshí bùfú
3898.english: This theory is at variance with the known facts.

3899.simplified: 他的传记就是一部科研记实.
3899.traditional: 他的傳記就是一部科研記實.
3899.pinyin: tā de zhuànjì jiùshì yī bù kēyán jì shí
3899.english: His biography is a saga of scientific research.

3900.pinyin: wǒ juédìng bùzài zhuīchá nà shì
3900.english: I have decided not to pursue (ie investigate) the matter any further.

3901.simplified: 预料今天下午有零星阵雨。
3901.traditional: 預料今天下午有零星陣雨。
3901.pinyin: yùliào jīntiān xiàwǔ yǒu língxīng zhènyǔ
3901.english: Scattered showers are expected this afternoon.

3902.simplified: 我喜欢风景画，不喜欢静物画。
3902.traditional: 我喜歡風景畫，不喜歡靜物畫。
3902.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan fēngjǐng huà bù xǐhuan jìng wù huà
3902.english: I prefer landscape to still life.

3903.simplified: 只有人类才具有说话的能力。
3903.traditional: 只有人類才具有說話的能力。
3903.pinyin: zhǐyǒu rénlèi cái jùyǒu shuōhuà de nénglì
3903.english: Only human beings are capable of speech.

3904.simplified: 他生病以来胃口就不大好。
3904.traditional: 他生病以來胃口就不大好。
3904.pinyin: tā shēngbìng yǐlái wèikǒu jiù bùdà hǎo
3904.english: He's been a bit off his oats since his illness.

3905.english: He is a favourite with his uncle/a favourite of his uncle's/his uncle's favourite.

3906.simplified: 我们国家有充足的食物供应。
3906.traditional: 我們國家有充足的食物供應。
3906.pinyin: wǒmen guójiā yǒu chōngzú de shíwù gōngyìng
3906.english: Our country has a bountiful supply of food.

3907.simplified: 他们充分利用旅馆的设备.
3907.traditional: 他們充分利用旅館的設備.
3907.pinyin: tāmen chōngfèn lìyòng lǚguǎn de shèbèi
3907.english: They took full advantage of the hotel's facilities.

3908.simplified: 卫生当局正调查这件事.
3908.traditional: 衛生當局正調查這件事.
3908.pinyin: wèishēng dāngjú zhèng diàochá zhè jiàn shì
3908.english: The health authorities are investigating the matter.

3909.simplified: 听相同的故事是令人厌烦的。
3909.traditional: 聽相同的故事是令人厭煩的。
3909.pinyin: tīng xiāngtóng de gùshi shì lìngrén yànfán de
3909.english: It is boring to listen to the same story.

3910.simplified: 大多数国家使用十进制货币。
3910.traditional: 大多數國家使用十進制貨幣。
3910.english: Most countries have a decimal currency.

3911.simplified: 该领事馆已升格为大使馆.
3911.traditional: 該領事館已升格為大使館.
3911.pinyin: gāi lǐngshìguǎn yǐ shēnggé wéi dàshǐguǎn
3911.english: The consulate was upgraded to embassy status.

3912.simplified: 他再试一次，竟然还是失败。
3912.traditional: 他再試一次，竟然還是失敗。
3912.pinyin: tā zài shì yīcì jìngrán háishi shībài
3912.english: He tried a second time only to fail again.

3913.simplified: 我们应当采取措施制止战争。
3913.traditional: 我們應當采取措施制止戰爭。
3913.english: We should take steps to prevent war.

3914.simplified: 这首诗表现出强烈的激情。
3914.traditional: 這首詩表現出強烈的激情。
3914.pinyin: zhè shǒu shī biǎoxiàn chū qiángliè de jīqíng
3914.english: The poem showed great intensity of feeling.

3915.simplified: 抓紧绳子, 否则你会跌下来的。
3915.traditional: 抓緊繩子, 否則你會跌下來的。
3915.pinyin: zhuājǐn shéngzi fǒuzé nǐ huì diē xiàlai de
3915.english: Get hold of the rope or you will fall.

3916.simplified: 她远远地离开故乡在外地生活。
3916.traditional: 她遠遠地離開故鄉在外地生活。
3916.pinyin: tā yuǎnyuǎn dì líkāigùxiāng zàiwài dì shēnghuó
3916.english: She lives a long way from home.

3917.simplified: 我痛恨铺张浪费的行政机关。
3917.traditional: 我痛恨鋪張浪費的行政機關。

3918.simplified: 他用无线电报把消息告诉我。
3918.traditional: 他用無線電報把消息告訴我。
3918.pinyin: tā yòng wúxiàndiàn bào bǎ xiāoxi gàosu wǒ
3918.english: He sent me the news by wireless telegraph.

3919.simplified: 首都在这个国家的最南端。
3919.traditional: 首都在這個國家的最南端。
3919.pinyin: shǒudū zài zhège guójiā de zuì nánduān
3919.english: The capital is in the extreme south of the country.

3920.simplified: 蜜蜂采蜜时常使花受粉.
3920.traditional: 蜜蜂采蜜時常使花受粉.
3920.pinyin: mìfēng cǎi mì shícháng shǐ huā shòu fěn
3920.english: Flowers are often fertilized by bees as they gather nectar.

3921.simplified: 主要重点放在法律和秩序上。
3921.traditional: 主要重點放在法律和秩序上。
3921.pinyin: zhǔyào zhòngdiǎn fàng zài fǎlǜ hé zhìxù shàng
3921.english: Lay heavy stress on law and order.

3922.simplified: 他是大学足球代表队的球员。
3922.traditional: 他是大學足球代表隊的球員。
3922.pinyin: tā shì dàxué zúqiú dàibiǎoduì de qiúyuán
3922.english: He is a member of the varsity football team.

3923.simplified: 骄傲自大是他的一个缺点.
3923.traditional: 驕傲自大是他的一個缺點.
3923.pinyin: jiāo'ào zìdà shì tā de yī gè quēdiǎn
3923.english: Arrogance is one of his less attractive characteristics.

3924.simplified: 黄油从冰箱中取出会变软.
3924.traditional: 黃油從冰箱中取出會變軟.
3924.pinyin: huángyóu cóng bīngxiāng zhōng qǔchū huì biànruǎn
3924.english: The butter will soften out of the fridge.

3925.simplified: 要乘飞机必须提前定位子。
3925.traditional: 要乘飛機必須提前定位子。
3925.pinyin: yào chéng fēijī bìxū tíqián dìngwèi zǐ
3925.english: To ride in an aeroplane you have to book in advance.

3926.simplified: 那两个情人只是偷偷地会面。
3926.traditional: 那兩個情人只是偷偷地會面。
3926.pinyin: nà liǎng gè qíngrén zhǐshì tōutōu dì huìmiàn
3926.english: The two lovers had met only by stealth.

3927.simplified: 我党在南方有一大批拥护者.
3927.traditional: 我黨在南方有一大批擁護者.
3927.pinyin: wǒ dǎng zài nánfāng yǒu yī dàpī yōnghùzhě
3927.english: Our party has a large following in the south.

3928.simplified: 有一次他大胆提出了自己的看法。
3928.traditional: 有一次他大膽提出了自己的看法。
3928.pinyin: yǒuyīcì tā dàdǎn tíchū le zìjǐ de kànfǎ
3928.english: Once he made bold to air his views.

3929.simplified: 我当时正把机密文件切碎。
3929.traditional: 我當時正把機密文件切碎。
3929.pinyin: wǒ dāngshí zhèng bǎ jīmìwénjiàn qiēsuì
3929.english: I was shredding top-secret documents at that time.

3930.simplified: 她指导实习护士练习注射.
3930.traditional: 她指導實習護士練習注射.
3930.pinyin: tā zhǐdǎo shíxí hùshi liànxí zhùshè
3930.english: She instructed the trainee nurses in giving injections.

3931.simplified: 我们必须提高产量满足需求。
3931.traditional: 我們必須提高產量滿足需求。
3931.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū tígāo chǎnliàng mǎnzú xūqiú
3931.english: We must increase our output to meet demand.

3932.simplified: 今年物价没显出多大变化。
3932.traditional: 今年物價沒顯出多大變化。
3932.pinyin: jīnnián wùjià méi xiǎnchū duōdà biànhuà
3932.english: Prices have not shown much variation this year.

3933.simplified: 他的健康状况时好时坏。
3933.traditional: 他的健康狀況時好時壞。
3933.english: There are fluctuations in the state of his health.

3934.simplified: 她的秘书处理她的一切约会。
3934.traditional: 她的秘書處理她的一切約會。
3934.pinyin: tā de mìshū chǔlǐ tā de yīqiè yuēhuì
3934.english: Her secretary took care of all her appointments.

3935.simplified: 在美国存在长期失业问题。
3935.traditional: 在美國存在長期失業問題。
3935.pinyin: zài Měiguó cúnzài chángqī shīyè wèntí
3935.english: There is a chronic unemployment problem in America.

3936.simplified: 他把箱子放在行李寄存处。
3936.traditional: 他把箱子放在行李寄存處。
3936.pinyin: tā bǎ xiāngzi fàng zài xíngli jìcúnchù
3936.english: He deposited the case in the left luggage office.

3937.simplified: 她在针织品部买了很多袜子。
3937.traditional: 她在針織品部買了很多襪子。
3937.pinyin: tā zài zhēnzhīpǐn bù mǎi le hěn duō wàzi
3937.english: She bought many socks in the hosiery department.

3938.simplified: 小船稳稳地顺著运河突突地航行.
3938.traditional: 小船穩穩地順著運河突突地航行.
3938.pinyin: xiǎochuán wěn wěn dì shùn zhe yùnhé tūtū dì hángxíng
3938.english: The boat chugged along the canal.

3939.simplified: 他叫秘书把文件复制一份。
3939.traditional: 他叫秘書把文件復制一份。
3939.pinyin: tā jiào mìshū bǎ wénjiàn fùzhì yī fèn
3939.english: He asked his secretary to make a copy of the document.

3940.simplified: 我们必须促进与邻国的贸易.
3940.traditional: 我們必須促進與鄰國的貿易.
3940.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū cùjìn yǔ línguó de màoyì
3940.english: We must promote commerce with neighbouring countries.

3941.simplified: 我们的公司实行共同责任制.
3941.traditional: 我們的公司實行共同責任制.
3941.pinyin: wǒmen de gōngsī shíxíng gòngtóng zérènzhì
3941.english: Our business is a joint/shared responsibility.

3942.simplified: 我被这个惊人的想法吸引住了。
3942.traditional: 我被這個驚人的想法吸引住了。
3942.pinyin: wǒ bèi zhège jīngrén de xiǎngfǎ xīyǐn zhù le
3942.english: I was attracted by the striking idea.

3943.simplified: 今天早上我太太对我发脾气。
3943.traditional: 今天早上我太太對我發脾氣。
3943.pinyin: jīntiān zǎoshang wǒ tàitai duì wǒ fāpíqì
3943.english: My wife was disagreeable to me this morning.

3944.simplified: 只有少数人在这个岛上居住。
3944.traditional: 只有少數人在這個島上居住。
3944.pinyin: zhǐyǒu shǎoshù rén zài zhège dǎo shàng jūzhù
3944.english: Only a few people inhabited the island.

3945.simplified: 资方和工会的谈判失败了。
3945.traditional: 資方和工會的談判失敗了。
3945.pinyin: zīfāng hé gōnghuì de tánpàn shībài le
3945.english: Talks between management and unions have collapsed.

3946.simplified: 市议会批准了这项建筑计划。
3946.traditional: 市議會批准了這項建築計劃。
3946.pinyin: shìyìhuì pīzhǔn le zhè xiàng jiànzhù jìhuà
3946.english: The city council approved the building plan.

3947.simplified: 我们需要有人来修理录音机。
3947.traditional: 我們需要有人來修理錄音機。
3947.pinyin: wǒmen xūyào yǒurén lái xiūlǐ lùyīnjī
3947.english: We needed someone to fix the tape recorder.

3948.simplified: 你的发音毛病是可以纠正的。
3948.traditional: 你的發音毛病是可以糾正的。
3948.pinyin: nǐ de fāyīn máobìng shì kěyǐ jiūzhèng de
3948.english: Your faults of pronunciation can be remedied.

3949.simplified: 我最讨厌的是得参加这些会议.
3949.traditional: 我最討厭的是得參加這些會議.
3949.pinyin: wǒ zuì tǎoyàn de shì dé cānjiā zhèxiē huìyì
3949.english: I loathe having to go to these conferences.

3950.simplified: 我证明他已经收到了你的钱。
3950.traditional: 我證明他已經收到了你的錢。
3950.pinyin: wǒ zhèngmíng tā yǐjīng shōu dàoliǎo nǐ de qián
3950.english: I certify that he has received your money.

3951.simplified: 这件古老的家具是1700年制造的。
3951.traditional: 這件古老的家具是1700年制造的。
3951.pinyin: zhè jiàn gǔlǎo de jiājù shì nián zhìzào de
3951.english: The antique furniture was made in 1700.

3952.simplified: 他把东西装进箱子里就动身了。
3952.traditional: 他把東西裝進箱子裡就動身了。
3952.pinyin: tā bǎ dōngxi zhuāng jìn xiāngzi lǐ jiù dòngshēn le
3952.english: He packed up his things and left.

3953.simplified: 公司想把总部设在北方.
3953.traditional: 公司想把總部設在北方.
3953.pinyin: gōngsī xiǎng bǎ zǒngbù shèzài běifāng
3953.english: The company wants to situate its headquarters in the north.

3954.simplified: 这一事故把汽车损坏得很厉害.
3954.traditional: 這一事故把汽車損壞得很厲害.
3954.pinyin: zhè yī shìgù bǎ qìchē sǔnhuài dehěn lìhai
3954.english: The accident did a lot of damage to the car.

3955.simplified: 我们关闭发动机开始滑行.
3955.traditional: 我們關閉發動機開始滑行.
3955.english: We switched off the motor and started to drift (along).

3956.simplified: 不幸的小伙子啊, 他刚刚死了妻子.
3956.traditional: 不幸的小伙子啊, 他剛剛死了妻子.
3956.pinyin: bùxìng de xiǎohuǒzi ā tā gānggang sǐ le qīzi
3956.english: Poor chap, his wife has just died.

3957.simplified: 老是唱反调的人批判地不同意的人
3957.traditional: 老是唱反調的人批判地不同意的人
3957.pinyin: lǎoshi chàngfǎndiào de rén pīpàn dì bùtóng yì de rén

3958.simplified: 艺术家巧妙地捕捉住她的笑容.
3958.traditional: 藝術家巧妙地捕捉住她的笑容.
3958.pinyin: yìshùjiā qiǎomiào dì bǔzhuō zhù tā de xiàoróng
3958.english: The artist has caught her smile perfectly.

3959.simplified: 他非常疲劳, 很快就睡着了。
3959.traditional: 他非常疲勞, 很快就睡著了。
3959.pinyin: tā fēicháng píláo hěn kuài jiù shuìzháo le
3959.english: He was so tired that he fell asleep quickly.

3960.simplified: 图书馆的书是按科目分类的。
3960.traditional: 圖書館的書是按科目分類的。
3960.pinyin: túshūguǎn de shū shì àn kēmù fēnlèi de
3960.english: The books in the library are classified by subject.

3961.simplified: 编词典是一种极其吃力的苦差。
3961.traditional: 編詞典是一種極其吃力的苦差。
3961.pinyin: biān cídiǎn shì yīzhǒng jíqí chīlì de kǔchāi
3961.english: Compiling a dictionary is an awful sweat.

3962.simplified: 她喜欢议论邻居们的是非长短。
3962.traditional: 她喜歡議論鄰居們的是非長短。
3962.pinyin: tā xǐhuan yìlùn línjū men de shìfēi chángduǎn
3962.english: She loves to gossip to her neighbors.

3963.simplified: 这一误会引发了激烈的争论.
3963.traditional: 這一誤會引發了激烈的爭論.
3963.pinyin: zhè yī wùhuì yǐnfā le jīliè de zhēnglùn
3963.english: Bitter arguments ensued from this misunderstanding.

3964.simplified: 风景优美，非文字所能形容。
3964.traditional: 風景優美，非文字所能形容。
3964.pinyin: fēngjǐng yōuměi fēi wénzì suǒnéng xíngróng
3964.english: The scenery is too beautiful for words.

3965.simplified: 他在马路对面向我招手致意。
3965.traditional: 他在馬路對面向我招手致意。
3965.pinyin: tā zài mǎlù duìmiàn xiàng wǒ zhāoshǒu zhìyì
3965.english: He beckoned to me from across the street.

3966.simplified: 政府的政策开始发挥作用了.
3966.traditional: 政府的政策開始發揮作用了.
3966.pinyin: zhèngfǔ de zhèngcè kāishǐ fāhuī zuòyòng le
3966.english: The government's policies are beginning to tell.

3967.simplified: 他的儿子是骑兵团的一名战士。
3967.traditional: 他的兒子是騎兵團的一名戰士。
3967.pinyin: tā de érzi shì qíbīng tuán de yī míng zhànshì
3967.english: His son is a soldier in a cavalry regiment.

3968.simplified: 这所中学大约有300个学生。
3968.traditional: 這所中學大約有300個學生。
3968.pinyin: zhè suǒ zhōngxué dàyuē yǒu gè xuésheng
3968.english: There are 300 students or so in this middle school.

3969.simplified: 我觉得我没有受到公正的对待。
3969.traditional: 我覺得我沒有受到公正的對待。
3969.pinyin: wǒ juéde wǒ méiyǒu shòudào gōngzhèng de duìdài
3969.english: I felt I hadn't been treated fairly.

3970.simplified: 这所小学附属于一所大学。
3970.traditional: 這所小學附屬於一所大學。
3970.pinyin: zhè suǒ xiǎoxué fù shǔyú yī suǒ dàxué
3970.english: This elementary school is affiliated to a university.

3971.simplified: 我建议你打听一下这项工作。
3971.traditional: 我建議你打聽一下這項工作。
3971.pinyin: wǒ jiànyì nǐ dǎting yīxià zhè xiàng gōngzuò
3971.english: I recommend that you inquire about the job.

3972.simplified: 真抱歉给你添了这么多麻烦。
3972.traditional: 真抱歉給你添了這麼多麻煩。
3972.pinyin: zhēn bàoqiàn gěi nǐ tiān le zhème duō máfan
3972.english: I am so sorry to give you not a little trouble.

3973.simplified: 观点十分明确, 无须解释.
3973.traditional: 觀點十分明確, 無須解釋.
3973.english: The proposition is so clear that it needs no explanation.

3974.simplified: 他的建议遭到某种程度的反对。
3974.traditional: 他的建議遭到某種程度的反對。
3974.pinyin: tā de jiànyì zāodào mǒuzhǒng chéngdù de fǎnduì
3974.english: His suggestion met with some hostility.

3975.simplified: 他毕业于一所工艺美术学校。
3975.traditional: 他畢業於一所工藝美術學校。
3975.pinyin: tā bìyè yú yī suǒ gōngyìměishù xuéxiào
3975.english: He graduated from a school of crafts and arts.

3976.simplified: 由于他的参与，我们赢了比赛。
3976.traditional: 由於他的參與，我們贏了比賽。
3976.pinyin: yóuyú tā de cānyù wǒmen yíng le bǐsài
3976.english: We win the game because of his participation.

3977.simplified: 盆子和锅在厨房里碰击作响。
3977.traditional: 盆子和鍋在廚房裡碰擊作響。
3977.pinyin: pénzi hé guō zài chúfáng lǐ pèngjī zuò xiǎng
3977.english: Pots and pans were clattering in the kitchen.

3978.simplified: 这种做法不符合我们的政策.
3978.traditional: 這種做法不符合我們的政策.
3978.pinyin: zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ bùfúhé wǒmen de zhèngcè
3978.english: Such an act would not be in accord with our policy.

3979.simplified: 那个胖子经常大吃甜食。
3979.traditional: 那個胖子經常大吃甜食。
