3979.english: The fat man gorged himself constantly with enormous desserts.

3980.simplified: 血液中有红和白两种血球。
3980.traditional: 血液中有紅和白兩種血球。
3980.pinyin: xuèyè zhōng yǒu hóng hé bái liǎng zhǒng xuèqiú
3980.english: There are red and white corpuscles in blood.

3981.simplified: 你能解答那个问题真是聪明。
3981.traditional: 你能解答那個問題真是聰明。
3981.pinyin: nǐ néng jiědá nàge wèntí zhēnshi cōngming
3981.english: It was clever of you to solve the problem.

3982.simplified: 她的书法有了明显的进步。
3982.traditional: 她的書法有了明顯的進步。
3982.pinyin: tā de shūfǎ yǒule míngxiǎn de jìnbù
3982.english: There's been a noticeable improvement in her handwriting.

3983.simplified: 看到动物受痛苦是很难受的。
3983.traditional: 看到動物受痛苦是很難受的。
3983.pinyin: kàn dào dòngwù shòu tòngkǔ shì hěn nánshòu de
3983.english: A suffering animal is a distressing sight.

3984.simplified: 我们全靠自己完成了这项工作。
3984.traditional: 我們全靠自己完成了這項工作。
3984.pinyin: wǒmen quán kào zìjǐ wánchéng le zhè xiàng gōngzuò
3984.english: We finished the job all by ourselves.

3985.simplified: 他大学时的专业是国际贸易。
3985.traditional: 他大學時的專業是國際貿易。
3985.pinyin: tā dàxué shí de zhuānyè shì guójìmàoyì
3985.english: He majored in international commerce in college.

3986.simplified: 我一文不名，因此不能付钱给你。
3986.traditional: 我一文不名，因此不能付錢給你。
3986.pinyin: wǒ yīwénbùmíng yīncǐ bùnéng fùqián gěi nǐ
3986.english: I haven't a bean, so I can't pay you.

3987.simplified: 房间里发出一片兴奋的嚷嚷声。
3987.traditional: 房間裡發出一片興奮的嚷嚷聲。
3987.pinyin: fángjiān lǐ fāchū yīpiàn xīngfèn de rāngrang shēng

3988.simplified: 别把镜头弄脏了, 我刚刚擦过.
3988.traditional: 別把鏡頭弄髒了, 我剛剛擦過.
3988.pinyin: bié bǎ jìngtóu nòngzāng le wǒ gānggang cā guò
3988.english: Don't smear the lens; I've just polished it.

3989.simplified: 剧场的地板斜度太大了一点。
3989.traditional: 劇場的地板斜度太大了一點。
3989.pinyin: jùchǎng de dìbǎn xiédù tài dà le yīdiǎn
3989.english: The rake of the theater floor is a bit too steep.

3990.simplified: 降低失业率应是头等大事。
3990.traditional: 降低失業率應是頭等大事。
3990.pinyin: jiàngdī shīyèlǜ yīng shì tóuděng dàshì
3990.english: The reduction of unemployment should be paramount.

3991.simplified: 没有任何事能扰乱他平静的心绪.
3991.traditional: 沒有任何事能擾亂他平靜的心緒.
3991.pinyin: méiyǒu rènhé shì néng rǎoluàn tā píngjìng de xīnxù

3992.simplified: 敌人以强大的军队围困城市。
3992.traditional: 敵人以強大的軍隊圍困城市。
3992.pinyin: dírén yǐ qiángdà de jūnduì wéikùn chéngshì
3992.english: The enemy beset the city with a strong army.

3993.simplified: 当地人选举了六名立法委员。
3993.traditional: 當地人選舉了六名立法委員。
3993.pinyin: dāngdì rén xuǎnjǔ le liù míng lìfǎwěiyuán
3993.english: Six legislators were elected by local people.

3994.simplified: 把这句子的各个成分加以分析.
3994.traditional: 把這句子的各個成分加以分析.
3994.pinyin: bǎ zhè jùzi de gègè chéngfèn jiāyǐ fēnxī
3994.english: Analyse the sentence into its constituent parts.

3995.simplified: 这些年他的性格已大大成熟。
3995.traditional: 這些年他的性格已大大成熟。
3995.pinyin: zhèxiē nián tā de xìnggé yǐ dàdà chéngshú
3995.english: His character has greatly matured in the years.

3996.simplified: 我不会把我的钱投资到他的公司。
3996.traditional: 我不會把我的錢投資到他的公司。
3996.pinyin: wǒ bùhuì bǎ wǒ de qián tóuzī dào tā de gōngsī
3996.english: I won't invest my money in his company.

3997.simplified: 你的拒绝让我感到十分为难。
3997.traditional: 你的拒絕讓我感到十分為難。
3997.pinyin: nǐ de jùjué ràng wǒ gǎndào shífēn wéinán
3997.english: Your refusal puts me in an awkward predicament.

3998.simplified: 该领导人受到了首相的接见.
3998.traditional: 該領導人受到了首相的接見.
3998.pinyin: gāi lǐngdǎorén shòu dàoliǎo shǒuxiàng de jiējiàn
3998.english: The chief was received by the Prime Minister.

3999.simplified: 明亮的灯光刺痛了我的眼睛。
3999.traditional: 明亮的燈光刺痛了我的眼睛。
3999.pinyin: míngliàng de dēngguāng cìtòng le wǒ de yǎnjing
3999.english: The light hurt my eyes with its brightness.

4000.simplified: 这些票的有效期只有一个月。
4000.traditional: 這些票的有效期只有一個月。
4000.pinyin: zhèxiē piào de yǒuxiàoqī zhǐyǒu yī gè yuè
4000.english: These tickets are available for one month only.

4001.simplified: 士兵已训练得绝对服从命令.
4001.traditional: 士兵已訓練得絕對服從命令.
4001.pinyin: shìbīng yǐ xùnliàn dé juéduì fúcóng mìnglìng
4001.english: Soldiers are trained to obey without question.

4002.simplified: 自从他是小孩时，他就喜欢狗。
4002.traditional: 自從他是小孩時，他就喜歡狗。
4002.pinyin: zìcóng tā shì xiǎohái shí tā jiù xǐhuan gǒu
4002.english: He has liked dogs since he was a child.

4003.simplified: 我跑过的最长的距离是十英里.
4003.traditional: 我跑過的最長的距離是十英裡.
4003.pinyin: wǒ pǎo guò de zuì cháng de jùlí shì shí Yīnglǐ
4003.english: The farthest distance I've run is ten miles.

4004.simplified: 那次宴会很轻松, 随随便便.
4004.traditional: 那次宴會很輕松, 隨隨便便.
4004.pinyin: nà cì yànhuì hěn qīngsōng suí suíbiàn biàn
4004.english: The dinner was a relaxed, unceremonious occasion.

4005.simplified: 我们必须遵守这个国家的法规。
4005.traditional: 我們必須遵守這個國家的法規。
4005.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū zūnshǒu zhège guójiā de fǎguī
4005.english: We must obey the statutes in this country.

4006.pinyin: rén jǔ bù qǐ zhèyàng de zhòngliàng
4006.english: It is not humanly possible (ie A human is not able) to lift the weight.

4007.simplified: 士兵们背起行装，继续前进。
4007.traditional: 士兵們背起行裝，繼續前進。
4007.pinyin: shìbīng men bèi qǐ xíngzhuāng jìxù qiánjìn
4007.english: The soldiers shouldered their kit and moved on.

4008.simplified: 我一看见冒烟，就发出了警报。
4008.traditional: 我一看見冒煙，就發出了警報。
4008.pinyin: wǒ yī kànjiàn màoyān jiù fāchū le jǐngbào
4008.english: I gave the alarm as soon as I saw the smoke.

4009.simplified: 这完全是你力所能及的工作。
4009.traditional: 這完全是你力所能及的工作。
4009.pinyin: zhè wánquán shì nǐ lìsuǒnéngjí de gōngzuò
4009.english: This is a task well within your ability.

4010.simplified: 他指出地球是围绕太阳转的.
4010.traditional: 他指出地球是圍繞太陽轉的.
4010.pinyin: tā zhǐchū dìqiú shì wéirào tàiyang zhuàn de
4010.english: He taught that the earth revolves around the sun.

4011.simplified: 通电时线圈就会有磁性。
4011.traditional: 通電時線圈就會有磁性。
4011.pinyin: tōngdiàn shí xiànquān jiù huì yǒu cíxìng
4011.english: The loop becomes magnetic when the current is switched on.

4012.simplified: 现在激光可以用来做手术。
4012.traditional: 現在激光可以用來做手術。
4012.pinyin: xiànzài jīguāng kěyǐ yònglái zuò shǒushù
4012.english: Lasers can be used to perform operations nowadays.

4013.simplified: 有人通知他到司令部去报到。
4013.traditional: 有人通知他到司令部去報到。
4013.pinyin: yǒurén tōngzhī tā dào sīlìngbù qù bàodào
4013.english: He was told to report himself to headquarters.

4014.simplified: 他们拣拾木柴以补充煤的不足.
4014.traditional: 他們揀拾木柴以補充煤的不足.
4014.pinyin: tāmen jiǎn shí mùchái yǐ bǔchōng méi de bùzú
4014.english: They eked out their coal by collecting firewood.

4015.simplified: 他要在春节期间拜访叔叔。
4015.traditional: 他要在春節期間拜訪叔叔。
4015.pinyin: tā yào zài Chūnjié qījiān bàifǎng shūshu
4015.english: He is to visit his uncle during the Spring Festival.

4016.simplified: 就她的年龄来说, 她是够活跃的.
4016.traditional: 就她的年齡來說, 她是夠活躍的.
4016.pinyin: jiù tā de niánlíng láishuō tā shì gòu huóyuè de
4016.english: She's very active, considering her age.

4017.simplified: 这本书描述了一个演员的一生。
4017.traditional: 這本書描述了一個演員的一生。
4017.pinyin: zhè běn shū miáoshù le yī gè yǎnyuán de yīshēng
4017.english: The book portrays the life of an actor.

4018.simplified: 班长把试卷分发给同学们。
4018.traditional: 班長把試卷分發給同學們。
4018.pinyin: bānzhǎng bǎ shìjuàn fēn fāgěi tóngxué men
4018.english: The monitor handed the papers out to the classmates.

4019.simplified: 我得承认, 我不喜欢现代音乐。
4019.traditional: 我得承認, 我不喜歡現代音樂。
4019.pinyin: wǒ dé chéngrèn wǒ bù xǐhuan xiàndàiyīnyuè
4019.english: I have to admit to a dislike for modern music.

4020.simplified: 我们必须避免无谓的重复劳动.
4020.traditional: 我們必須避免無謂的重復勞動.
4020.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū bìmiǎn wúwèi de chóngfù láodòng
4020.english: We must avoid wasteful duplication of effort.

4021.simplified: 注意你的举止, 别闹出笑话来。
4021.traditional: 注意你的舉止, 別鬧出笑話來。
4021.pinyin: zhùyì nǐ de jǔzhǐ bié nào chū xiàohuà lái
4021.english: Behave yourself; don't make a fool of yourself.

4022.simplified: 我经常在树林里呼吸新鲜空气。
4022.traditional: 我經常在樹林裡呼吸新鮮空氣。
4022.pinyin: wǒ jīngcháng zài shùlín lǐ hūxī xīnxiān kōngqì
4022.english: I always imbibe fresh air in the woods.

4023.simplified: 钓鱼的人渡水到河中央去了.
4023.traditional: 釣魚的人渡水到河中央去了.
4023.pinyin: diàoyú de rén dù shuǐ dào hé zhōngyāng qù le
4023.english: The angler waded (out) into the middle of the river.

4024.simplified: 医生给她注射以减轻疼痛.
4024.traditional: 醫生給她注射以減輕疼痛.
4024.pinyin: yīshēng gěi tā zhùshè yǐ jiǎnqīng téngtòng
4024.english: The doctor gave her an injection to alleviate the pain.

4025.simplified: 他非但不用功，反而到处鬼混。
4025.traditional: 他非但不用功，反而到處鬼混。
4025.pinyin: tā fēidàn bùyòng gōng fǎn'ér dàochù guǐhùn
4025.english: Far from working hard, he played around.

4026.simplified: 以上各点均包括在建议中.
4026.traditional: 以上各點均包括在建議中.
4026.pinyin: yǐshàng gè diǎn jūn bāokuò zài jiànyì zhōng
4026.english: The foregoing have all been included in the proposals.

4027.simplified: 由于各种原因，我不愿见他。
4027.traditional: 由於各種原因，我不願見他。
4027.pinyin: yóuyú gèzhǒng yuányīn wǒ bùyuàn jiàn tā
4027.english: For various reasons I'd prefer not to meet him.

4028.simplified: 冰太薄，承受不住你们的重量。
4028.traditional: 冰太薄，承受不住你們的重量。
4028.pinyin: bīng tài báo chéngshòu bùzhù nǐmen de zhòngliàng
4028.english: The ice is too thin to bear your weight.

4029.simplified: 这个小女孩不太善于做加法。
4029.traditional: 這個小女孩不太善於做加法。
4029.pinyin: zhège xiǎo nǚhái bù tài shànyú zuò jiāfǎ
4029.english: The little girl is not very clever at addition.

4030.simplified: 请把我的信件转到我的新地址。
4030.traditional: 請把我的信件轉到我的新地址。
4030.pinyin: qǐng bǎ wǒ de xìnjiàn zhuàn dào wǒ de xīn dìzhǐ
4030.english: Please forward my mail to my new address.

4031.simplified: 这些学生很尊敬他们的老师。
4031.traditional: 這些學生很尊敬他們的老師。
4031.pinyin: zhèxiē xuésheng hěn zūnjìng tāmen de lǎoshī
4031.english: These students have reverence for their teacher.

4032.simplified: 你和我属于不同的政治阵营。
4032.traditional: 你和我屬於不同的政治陣營。
4032.pinyin: nǐ hé wǒ shǔyú bùtóng de zhèngzhì zhènyíng
4032.english: You and I belong to different political camps.

4033.simplified: 他的花白的头发显示出了他的年龄。
4033.traditional: 他的花白的頭發顯示出了他的年齡。
4033.pinyin: tā de huābái de tóufa xiǎnshì chū le tā de niánlíng
4033.english: His hoary hair showed his age.

4034.simplified: 谁都无法形容这景色的美丽。
4034.traditional: 誰都無法形容這景色的美麗。
4034.pinyin: shéi dōu wúfǎxíngróng zhè jǐngsè de měilì
4034.english: There is no describing the beauty of the scene.

4035.simplified: 他己被悄悄地免掉主任的职务。
4035.traditional: 他己被悄悄地免掉主任的職務。
4035.pinyin: tā jǐ bèi qiāoqiāo dì miǎndiào zhǔrèn de zhíwù
4035.english: He has been quietly booted out as chief.

4036.simplified: 她把一张白纸插入打字机里。
4036.traditional: 她把一張白紙插入打字機裡。
4036.pinyin: tā bǎ yī zhāng bái zhǐ chārù dǎzìjī lǐ
4036.english: She inserted a new sheet of paper into the typewriter.

4037.simplified: 那个项目的改造已经完成。
4037.traditional: 那個項目的改造已經完成。
4037.pinyin: nàge xiàngmù de gǎizào yǐjīng wánchéng
4037.english: The transformation of that project has been finished.

4038.simplified: 这位教授目前正在写一本书。
4038.traditional: 這位教授目前正在寫一本書。
4038.pinyin: zhèwèi jiàoshòu mùqián zhèngzài xiě yī běn shū
4038.english: The professor is presently writing a book.

4039.simplified: 法官劝告他改变生活方式。
4039.traditional: 法官勸告他改變生活方式。
4039.english: The judge advised him to amend his way of living.

4040.simplified: 别把秘密告诉他，他的嘴不严。
4040.traditional: 別把秘密告訴他，他的嘴不嚴。
4040.pinyin: bié bǎ mìmì gàosu tā tā de zuǐ bù yán
4040.english: Never tell him a secret; he's got a loose tongue.

4041.simplified: 他们表示有签订合同的意愿。
4041.traditional: 他們表示有簽訂合同的意願。
4041.pinyin: tāmen biǎoshì yǒu qiāndìng hétong de yìyuàn
4041.english: They showed a disposition to sign the contract.

4042.simplified: 他顺便提到他有一辆新汽车。
4042.traditional: 他順便提到他有一輛新汽車。
4042.pinyin: tā shùnbiàn tídào tā yǒu yī liàng xīn qìchē
4042.english: He mentioned in passing that he had a new car.

4043.simplified: 那小女孩把鼻子贴在窗户上。
4043.traditional: 那小女孩把鼻子貼在窗戶上。
4043.pinyin: nà xiǎo nǚhái bǎ bízi tiē zài chuānghu shàng
4043.english: The child pressed her nose against the window.

4044.simplified: 据说他已经成为一名党员了。
4044.traditional: 據說他已經成為一名黨員了。
4044.pinyin: jùshuō tā yǐjīng chéngwéi yī míng dǎngyuán le
4044.english: It is said that he has became a Party member.

4045.simplified: 这个国家原料大部分靠进口.
4045.traditional: 這個國家原料大部分靠進口.
4045.pinyin: zhège guójiā yuánliào dàbùfen kào jìnkǒu
4045.english: The country has to import most of its raw materials.

4046.simplified: 一个人的衣著可反映出其个性.
4046.traditional: 一個人的衣著可反映出其個性.
4046.pinyin: yīgèrén de yīzhuó kě fǎnyìng chū qí gèxìng
4046.english: Your clothes are a reflection of your personality.

4047.simplified: 他指向远处地平线上的一座塔.
4047.traditional: 他指向遠處地平線上的一座塔.
4047.pinyin: tā zhǐxiàng yuǎnchù dì píng xiànshàng de yī zuò tǎ
4047.english: He pointed to a tower on the distant horizon.

4048.simplified: 这个学期他选修了泛读课程。
4048.traditional: 這個學期他選修了泛讀課程。
4048.pinyin: zhège xuéqī tā xuǎnxiū le fàndú kèchéng
4048.english: He selected an extensive reading course this term.

4049.simplified: 工会被迫稍稍改变立场。
4049.traditional: 工會被迫稍稍改變立場。
4049.english: The union has been forced to slightly modify its position.

4050.simplified: 工程师奋力进行修桥工作.
4050.traditional: 工程師奮力進行修橋工作.
4050.pinyin: gōngchéngshī fènlì jìnxíng xiū qiáo gōngzuò
4050.english: The engineers set to on repair work to the bridge.

4051.simplified: 警方无法确定当时他在哪里.
4051.traditional: 警方無法確定當時他在哪裡.
4051.pinyin: jǐngfāng wúfǎ quèdìng dāngshí tā zài nǎlǐ
4051.english: The police can't establish where he was at the time.

4052.simplified: 这个决定受他情绪的影响。
4052.traditional: 這個決定受他情緒的影響。
4052.pinyin: zhège juédìng shòu tā qíngxù de yǐngxiǎng
4052.english: The decision was affected by his fluctuation of mood.

4053.simplified: 他们只用天然颜料染毛织品。
4053.traditional: 他們只用天然顏料染毛織品。
4053.pinyin: tāmen zhǐ yòng tiānrán yánliào rǎn máo zhīpǐn
4053.english: They used only natural pigments to dye the wool.

4054.simplified: 他只是短期外出--至多一周.
4054.traditional: 他只是短期外出--至多一周.
4054.pinyin: tā zhǐshì duǎnqī wàichū zhìduō yīzhōu
4054.english: He's only away for short periods a week at the longest.

4055.simplified: 我把打碎的盘子藏在餐桌后面了。
4055.traditional: 我把打碎的盤子藏在餐桌後面了。
4055.pinyin: wǒ bǎ dǎsuì de pánzi cáng zài cānzhuō hòumian le
4055.english: I hid the broken plate behind the table.

4056.simplified: 新鲜空气和运动有益于健康。
4056.traditional: 新鮮空氣和運動有益於健康。
4056.pinyin: xīnxiān kōngqì hé yùndòng yǒuyì yú jiànkāng
4056.english: Fresh air and exercise are good for the health.

4057.simplified: 很多士兵因为缺少粮食死去。
4057.traditional: 很多士兵因為缺少糧食死去。
4057.pinyin: xīnxiān kōngqì hé yùndòng yǒuyì yú jiànkāng
4057.english: Many soldiers died because of dearth of food.

4058.simplified: 供求规律决定商品的价格.
4058.traditional: 供求規律決定商品的價格.
4058.pinyin: gōngqiú guīlǜ juédìng shāngpǐn de jiàgé
4058.english: The law of supply and demand governs the prices of goods.

4059.simplified: 这个商人说服我买了他的货物。
4059.traditional: 這個商人說服我買了他的貨物。
4059.pinyin: zhège shāngrén shuōfú wǒ mǎi le tā de huòwù
4059.english: This trader persuaded me into buying his goods.

4060.simplified: 我们很快就超过那些跑得慢的人.
4060.traditional: 我們很快就超過那些跑得慢的人.
4060.pinyin: wǒmen hěn kuài jiù chāoguò nàxiē pǎo dé màn de rén
4060.english: We soon outstripped the slower runners.

4061.simplified: 我可以闻到雨后鲜花的清香。
4061.traditional: 我可以聞到雨後鮮花的清香。
4061.pinyin: wǒ kěyǐ wéndào yǔ hòu xiānhuā de qīngxiāng
4061.english: I can smell the fragrance of flowers after showers.

4062.simplified: 他为他出身于名门望族而骄傲。
4062.traditional: 他為他出身於名門望族而驕傲。
4062.pinyin: tā wéi tā chūshēn yú míngménwàngzú ér jiāo'ào
4062.english: He was proud of his impeccable pedigree.

4063.simplified: 他只能靠微薄的收入来养家。
4063.traditional: 他只能靠微薄的收入來養家。
4063.pinyin: tā zhǐnéng kào wēibó de shōurù lái yǎngjiā
4063.english: He had to support his family with his meager income.

4064.simplified: 那个人具备领导民众的才能。
4064.traditional: 那個人具備領導民眾的才能。
4064.pinyin: nàgèrén jùbèi lǐngdǎo mínzhòng de cáinéng
4064.english: The man had the quality for leading the people.

4065.simplified: 这个地图集是由我们公司出版的。
4065.traditional: 這個地圖集是由我們公司出版的。
4065.pinyin: zhège dìtújí shì yóu wǒmen gōngsī chūbǎn de
4065.english: The atlas was published by our company.

4066.simplified: 你必须提前两小时到达机场。
4066.traditional: 你必須提前兩小時到達機場。
4066.pinyin: nǐ bìxū tíqián liǎng xiǎoshí dàodá jīchǎng
4066.english: You must arrive at the airport two hours early.

4067.simplified: 他鼓起全部的勇气参加比赛。
4067.traditional: 他鼓起全部的勇氣參加比賽。
4067.pinyin: tā gǔqǐ quánbù de yǒngqì cānjiā bǐsài
4067.english: He mustered all his courage to take part in the game.

4068.simplified: 委员会打算休会几个星期。
4068.traditional: 委員會打算休會幾個星期。
4068.english: The committee is going into recess for a couple of weeks.

4069.simplified: 秋天比任何季节都适合读书。
4069.traditional: 秋天比任何季節都適合讀書。
4069.pinyin: qiūtiān bǐ rènhé jìjié dōu shìhé dúshū
4069.english: Autumn is better for reading than any other season.

4070.english: The kitchen is 12 square metres in area/has an area of 12 square metres.

4071.simplified: 我的汽车遇到事故，但毫无损坏。
4071.traditional: 我的汽車遇到事故，但毫無損壞。
4071.pinyin: wǒ de qìchē yùdào shìgù dàn háowú sǔnhuài
4071.english: My car is none the worse for the accident.

4072.simplified: 可以逼人服从, 却无法逼人生爱.
4072.traditional: 可以逼人服從, 卻無法逼人生愛.
4072.pinyin: kěyǐ bīrén fúcóng què wúfǎ bī rénshēng ài
4072.english: You can compel obedience, but not affection.

4073.simplified: 学生依次朗读他们各自的作业。
4073.traditional: 學生依次朗讀他們各自的作業。
4073.pinyin: xuésheng yīcì lǎngdú tāmen gèzì de zuòyè
4073.english: The pupils took turns in reading out their work.

4074.simplified: 油轮沉没了，石油污染了海面。
4074.traditional: 油輪沉沒了，石油污染了海面。
4074.pinyin: yóulún chénmò le shíyóu wūrǎn le hǎimiàn
4074.english: The tanker sank and the oil polluted the sea.

4075.simplified: 她把自己的第一本书献给了丈夫。
4075.traditional: 她把自己的第一本書獻給了丈夫。
4075.pinyin: tā bǎ zìjǐ de dìyī běn shū xiàn gěi le zhàngfu
4075.english: She dedicated her first book to her husband.

4076.simplified: 不合格的与标准或期望不符合的
4076.traditional: 不合格的與標准或期望不符合的
4076.pinyin: bù hégé de yǔ biāozhǔn huò qīwàng bùfúhé de
4076.english: Not measuring up to standards or expectations.

4077.simplified: 管子工对管道做了仔细的检查。
4077.traditional: 管子工對管道做了仔細的檢查。
4077.pinyin: guǎnzigōng duì guǎndào zuò le zǐxì de jiǎnchá
4077.english: The plumber made a careful check of the pipes.

4078.simplified: 大家纷纷向新娘新郎祝福.
4078.traditional: 大家紛紛向新娘新郎祝福.
4078.pinyin: dàjiā fēnfēn xiàng xīnniáng xīnláng zhùfú
4078.english: Good wishes showered (down) on the bride and bridegroom.

4079.simplified: 西红柿的短缺提高了它的价格。
4079.traditional: 西紅柿的短缺提高了它的價格。
4079.pinyin: xīhóngshì de duǎnquē tígāo le tā de jiàgé
4079.english: The shortage of tomatoes kept the prices up.

4080.simplified: 铜比其他材料导电性能好。
4080.traditional: 銅比其他材料導電性能好。
4080.pinyin: tóng bǐ qítā cáiliào dǎodiàn xìngnéng hǎo
4080.english: Copper conducts electricity better than other materials.

4081.simplified: 他并不以这方面专家自居。
4081.traditional: 他並不以這方面專家自居。
4081.pinyin: tā bìngbù yǐ zhè fāngmiàn zhuānjiā zìjū
4081.english: He has no pretensions to being an expert on the subject.

4082.simplified: 现在终于发现，是他偷了那笔钱。
4082.traditional: 現在終於發現，是他偷了那筆錢。
4082.pinyin: xiànzài zhōngyú fāxiàn shì tā tōu le nà bǐ qián
4082.english: It has emerged that he stole the money.

4083.simplified: 他几乎连一个英文单词都不会说。
4083.traditional: 他幾乎連一個英文單詞都不會說。
4083.pinyin: tā jīhū lián yī gè Yīngwén dāncí dōu bùhuì shuō
4083.english: He spoke scarcely a word of English.

4084.simplified: 我的口袋因装着苹果而鼓起来了。
4084.traditional: 我的口袋因裝著蘋果而鼓起來了。
4084.pinyin: wǒ de kǒudài yīn zhuāng zhe píngguǒ ér gǔ qilai le
4084.english: My pockets were bulging with apples.

4085.simplified: 总统号召全国人民团结起来。
4085.traditional: 總統號召全國人民團結起來。
4085.pinyin: zǒngtǒng hàozhào quánguó rénmín tuánjié qilai
4085.english: The President made a call for national unity.

4086.simplified: 军人应当绝对服从命令。
4086.traditional: 軍人應當絕對服從命令。
4086.english: Soldiers are expected to obey their orders without question.

4087.simplified: 谁也料不到有这些奇怪的事情.
4087.traditional: 誰也料不到有這些奇怪的事情.
4087.pinyin: shéi yě liào bùdào yǒu zhèxiē qíguài de shìqing
4087.english: No one could have foretold such strange events.

4088.simplified: 总统宣布将发行新货币。
4088.traditional: 總統宣布將發行新貨幣。
4088.pinyin: zǒngtǒng xuānbù jiāng fāxíng xīn huòbì
4088.english: The president proclaimed that a new currency would be issued.

4089.simplified: 他们很冷淡地接待了这位首相.
4089.traditional: 他們很冷淡地接待了這位首相.
4089.pinyin: tāmen hěn lěngdàn dì jiēdài le zhèwèi shǒuxiàng
4089.english: They gave the Prime Minister a cool reception.

4090.simplified: 在黑暗中他撞上了一根电线杆。
4090.traditional: 在黑暗中他撞上了一根電線桿。
4090.pinyin: zài hēi'àn zhōng tā zhuàng shàng le yī gēn diànxiàngǎn
4090.english: He ran against a lamp post in the dark.

4091.simplified: 你最好替我们去问问有没有房间。
4091.traditional: 你最好替我們去問問有沒有房間。
4091.pinyin: nǐ zuìhǎo tì wǒmen qù wèn wèn yǒu méiyǒu fángjiān
4091.english: You had better see about rooms for us.

4092.simplified: 她的劝说很有力, 我完全接受.
4092.traditional: 她的勸說很有力, 我完全接受.
4092.pinyin: tā de quànshuō hěn yǒulì wǒ wánquán jiēshòu
4092.english: Defeated by her powers of persuasion, I accepted.

4093.simplified: 跑上楼梯时，心跳会加速。
4093.traditional: 跑上樓梯時，心跳會加速。
4093.pinyin: pǎo shàng lóutī shí xīntiào huì jiāsù
4093.english: Your heart beat will quicken when you run up the stairs.

4094.simplified: 她在飞机场受到了热情的欢送.
4094.traditional: 她在飛機場受到了熱情的歡送.
4094.pinyin: tā zài fēijīchǎng shòu dàoliǎo rèqíng de huānsòng
4094.english: She was given a good send-off at the airport.

4095.simplified: 渐渐地, 这种货币不再通用。
4095.traditional: 漸漸地, 這種貨幣不再通用。
4095.pinyin: jiànjiàn dì zhèzhǒng huòbì bùzài tōngyòng
4095.english: Gradually, this kind of currency fell into disuse.

4096.simplified: 别说了, 要不你把我全搞糊涂了.
4096.traditional: 別說了, 要不你把我全搞糊涂了.
4096.pinyin: bié shuō le yàobù nǐ bǎ wǒ quán gǎo hútu le
4096.english: Stop talking, or you'll muddle me (up) completely.

4097.simplified: 我觉得他穿的那件衬衣真可笑。
4097.traditional: 我覺得他穿的那件襯衣真可笑。
4097.pinyin: wǒ juéde tā chuān de nà jiàn chènyī zhēn kěxiào
4097.english: I can't get over that shirt he was wearing.

4098.simplified: 他站在那里，双手插在口袋里。
4098.traditional: 他站在那裡，雙手插在口袋裡。
4098.pinyin: tā zhàn zài nàli shuāngshǒu chā zài kǒudài lǐ
4098.english: He stood there with his hands in his pockets.

4099.simplified: 修道院院长告诉他要遵守规定。
4099.traditional: 修道院院長告訴他要遵守規定。
4099.pinyin: xiūdàoyuàn yuànzhǎng gàosu tā yào zūnshǒu guīdìng
4099.english: The abbot told him to obey the rules.

4100.simplified: 她不明白作记录的重要性。
4100.traditional: 她不明白作記錄的重要性。
4100.pinyin: tā bù míngbai zuò jìlù de zhòngyàoxìng
4100.english: She is rather dim about the importance of keeping records.

4101.simplified: 政府已经对进口加以了限制。
4101.traditional: 政府已經對進口加以了限制。
4101.pinyin: zhèngfǔ yǐjīng duì jìnkǒu jiāyǐ le xiànzhì
4101.english: The government has imposed limitation on imports.

4102.simplified: 我国每四年一次人口普查。
4102.traditional: 我國每四年一次人口普查。
4102.pinyin: wǒguó měi sì nián yīcì rénkǒupǔchá
4102.english: The census is taken one time every four years in our country.

4103.simplified: 从几个例子中仅给你举出一例....
4103.traditional: 從幾個例子中僅給你舉出一例....
4103.pinyin: cóng jǐge lìzi zhōng jǐn gěi nǐ jǔ chū yī lì
4103.english: To give you only one example out of several....

4104.simplified: 别降低身份为这事去跟她争吵。
4104.traditional: 別降低身份為這事去跟她爭吵。
4104.pinyin: bié jiàngdī shēnfèn wéi zhè shì qù gēn tā zhēngchǎo
4104.english: Don't stoop to quarrel with her about it.

4105.simplified: 我们已经扩大了生产以满足需求.
4105.traditional: 我們已經擴大了生產以滿足需求.
4105.pinyin: wǒmen yǐjīng kuòdà le shēngchǎn yǐ mǎnzú xūqiú
4105.english: We've scaled up production to meet demand.

4106.simplified: 他要求追随者对他绝对服从.
4106.traditional: 他要求追隨者對他絕對服從.
4106.pinyin: tā yāoqiú zhuīsuízhě duì tā juéduì fúcóng
4106.english: He demands unquestioning obedience from his followers.

4107.simplified: 航空学飞机航行的理论与实践
4107.traditional: 航空學飛機航行的理論與實踐
4107.pinyin: hángkōngxué fēijī hángxíng de lǐlùn yǔ shíjiàn
4107.english: The theory and practice of aircraft navigation.

4108.simplified: 她被派出国执行一项艰巨任务.
4108.traditional: 她被派出國執行一項艱巨任務.
4108.pinyin: tā bèi pài chūguó zhíxíng yī xiàng jiānjù rènwu
4108.english: She was sent abroad on a difficult assignment.

4109.simplified: 现在需求逐渐超过了生产能力.
4109.traditional: 現在需求逐漸超過了生產能力.
4109.pinyin: xiànzài xūqiú zhújiàn chāoguò le shēngchǎnnénglì

4110.simplified: 开往上海的轮船星期三启程。
4110.traditional: 開往上海的輪船星期三啟程。
4110.pinyin: kāiwǎng Shàng Hǎi de lúnchuán Xīngqīsān qǐchéng
4110.english: The steamers for Shanghai leave on Wednesday.

4111.simplified: 在这件事情上我同他是一致的。
4111.traditional: 在這件事情上我同他是一致的。
4111.pinyin: zài zhè jiàn shìqing shàng wǒ tóng tā shì yīzhì de
4111.english: I am in accordance with him in this matter.

4112.simplified: 他以一张欠条代替现金付给我们。
4112.traditional: 他以一張欠條代替現金付給我們。
4112.pinyin: tā yǐ yī zhāng qiàntiáo dàitì xiànjīn fùgěi wǒmen
4112.english: He gave us an I.O.U. in lieu of cash.

4113.simplified: 他们仍在为决赛失败而伤心.
4113.traditional: 他們仍在為決賽失敗而傷心.
4113.pinyin: tāmen réng zài wéi juésài shībài ér shāngxīn
4113.english: They're still smarting from their defeat in the final.

4114.simplified: 他切菜时不小心割破了手指。
4114.traditional: 他切菜時不小心割破了手指。
4114.pinyin: tā qiē cài shí bù xiǎoxīn gē pò le shǒuzhǐ
4114.english: He sliced his finger by accident when cutting vegetables.

4115.simplified: 她把自己的原则体现在行动中。
4115.traditional: 她把自己的原則體現在行動中。
4115.pinyin: tā bǎ zìjǐ de yuánzé tǐ xiànzài xíngdòng zhōng
4115.english: She embodies her principles in her behavior.

4116.simplified: 这些印度客人对这本书很熟悉。
4116.traditional: 這些印度客人對這本書很熟悉。
4116.pinyin: zhèxiē Yìndù kèrén duì zhè běn shū hěn shúxī
4116.english: These Indian guest are familiar with this book.

4117.simplified: 这地方因出手工艺品而出名。
4117.traditional: 這地方因出手工藝品而出名。
4117.pinyin: zhè dìfang yīn chūshǒu gōngyìpǐn ér chūmíng
4117.english: The place is known for its handicraft products.

4118.simplified: 当军官的应懂得怎样统率士兵
4118.traditional: 當軍官的應懂得怎樣統率士兵
4118.pinyin: dāng jūnguān de yīng dǒngde zěnyàng tǒngshuài shìbīng
4118.english: An officer must know how to handle his men.

4119.simplified: 拐弯之前别忘记指示车行方向。
4119.traditional: 拐彎之前別忘記指示車行方向。
4119.pinyin: guǎiwān zhīqián bié wàngjì zhǐshì chēháng fāngxiàng
4119.english: Don't forget to indicate before turning.

4120.simplified: 我在故乡度过了自己的孩提时代。
4120.traditional: 我在故鄉度過了自己的孩提時代。
4120.pinyin: wǒ zài gùxiāng dùguò le zìjǐ de háití shídài
4120.english: I spent my early childhood in my hometown.

4121.simplified: 我提醒他们树林里可能有蛇。
4121.traditional: 我提醒他們樹林裡可能有蛇。
4121.pinyin: wǒ tíxǐng tāmen shùlín lǐ kěnéng yǒu shé
4121.english: I warned them that there might be snakes in the woods.

4122.simplified: 我的私生活与你毫不相干.
4122.traditional: 我的私生活與你毫不相干.
4122.pinyin: wǒ de sī shēnghuó yǔ nǐ háo bùxiānggān
4122.english: My private life is none of your business/is no business of yours.

4123.simplified: 实际上我对当地的法律并不熟。
4123.traditional: 實際上我對當地的法律並不熟。
4123.pinyin: shíjìshàng wǒ duì dāngdì de fǎlǜ bìngbù shú
4123.english: I am not really familiar with the local laws.

4124.simplified: 我们决不能满足于自己的成绩。
4124.traditional: 我們決不能滿足於自己的成績。
4124.pinyin: wǒmen jué bùnéng mǎnzú yú zìjǐ de chéngjì
4124.english: We must not be complacent about our achievements.

4125.simplified: 他的讲话受到热烈的欢迎.
4125.traditional: 他的講話受到熱烈的歡迎.
4125.pinyin: tā de jiǎnghuà shòudào rèliè de huānyíng
4125.english: His talk met with/was given a warm (ie enthusiastic) reception.

4126.simplified: 她以自我牺牲精神救了我们的性命.
4126.traditional: 她以自我犧牲精神救了我們的性命.
4126.pinyin: tā yǐ zìwǒ xīshēng jīngshén jiù le wǒmen de xìngmìng

4127.simplified: 这个集装箱的体积是20立方米。
4127.traditional: 這個集裝箱的體積是20立方米。
4127.pinyin: zhège jízhuāngxiāng de tǐjī shì lìfāngmǐ
4127.english: The volume of this container is 20 cubic meters.

4128.simplified: 他婚后过着合乎道德规范的生活。
4128.traditional: 他婚後過著合乎道德規范的生活。
4128.pinyin: tā hūn hòu guò zhe héhū dàodé guīfàn de shēnghuó
4128.english: He lived a moral life after marriage.

4129.simplified: 落叶松长着球果和针形的叶子。
4129.traditional: 落葉松長著球果和針形的葉子。
4129.pinyin: luòyèsōng cháng zhe qiú guǒ hé zhēn xíng de yèzi
4129.english: Larch has small cones and needle-like leaves.

4130.simplified: 工人们正在道路下面铺设管道。
4130.traditional: 工人們正在道路下面鋪設管道。
4130.pinyin: gōng rénmen zhèngzài dàolù xiàmian pūshè guǎndào
4130.english: The workers are laying pipes under the road.

4131.simplified: 早晨的新鲜空气使他觉得愉快。
4131.traditional: 早晨的新鮮空氣使他覺得愉快。
4131.pinyin: zǎochén de xīnxiān kōngqì shǐ tā juéde yúkuài
4131.english: The fresh air in the morning made him feel glad.

4132.simplified: 他的血透过衬衫染污了上衣.
4132.traditional: 他的血透過襯衫染污了上衣.
4132.pinyin: tā de xuè tòuguò chènshān rǎn wū le shàngyī
4132.english: The blood soaked through his shirt and stained his jacket.

4133.simplified: 这本书包含你所需的一切资料。
4133.traditional: 這本書包含你所需的一切資料。
4133.pinyin: zhè běn shū bāohán nǐ suǒxū de yīqiè zīliào
4133.english: This book contains all the information you need.

4134.simplified: 他应该亲自来领奖才对.
4134.traditional: 他應該親自來領獎才對.
4134.pinyin: tā yīnggāi qīnzì lái lǐngjiǎng cái duì
4134.english: It was fitting that he should be here to receive the prize in person.

4135.simplified: 他是最优秀的年长的国务活动家.
4135.traditional: 他是最優秀的年長的國務活動家.
4135.pinyin: tā shì zuì yōuxiù de niánzhǎng de guówù huódòngjiā
4135.english: He is the elder statesman par excellence.

4136.simplified: 我喜欢读一些关于电子音乐的书。
4136.traditional: 我喜歡讀一些關於電子音樂的書。
4136.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan dú yīxiē guānyú diànzǐ yīnyuè de shū
4136.english: I like to read books on electronic music.

4137.simplified: 有些人相信上帝创造了世界。
4137.traditional: 有些人相信上帝創造了世界。
4137.pinyin: yǒuxiērén xiāngxìn Shàngdì chuàngzào le shìjiè
4137.english: Some people believe that God created the world.

4138.simplified: 如果失败，我还有另一个机会。
4138.traditional: 如果失敗，我還有另一個機會。
4138.pinyin: rúguǒ shībài wǒ háiyǒu lìngyī gè jīhuì
4138.english: I shall have another chance in the event of failure.

4139.simplified: 只有时间才能证明你是否正确。
4139.traditional: 只有時間才能證明你是否正確。
4139.pinyin: zhǐyǒu shíjiān cáinéng zhèngmíng nǐ shìfǒu zhèngquè
4139.english: Only time will tell if you are right.

4140.simplified: 我认为他会成功是理所当然的。
4140.traditional: 我認為他會成功是理所當然的。
4140.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi tā huì chénggōng shì lǐsuǒdāngrán de
4140.english: I take it for granted that he will succeed.

4141.simplified: 古玩是一种非常保险的投资对象。
4141.traditional: 古玩是一種非常保險的投資對象。
4141.pinyin: gǔwán shì yīzhǒng fēicháng bǎoxiǎn de tóuzī duìxiàng
4141.english: Antiques are a very safe investment.

4142.simplified: 在困难时期我们过着艰苦的生活。
4142.traditional: 在困難時期我們過著艱苦的生活。
4142.pinyin: zài kùnnan shíqī wǒmen guò zhe jiānkǔ de shēnghuó
4142.english: We led a hard life in times of stress.

4143.simplified: 特征显著或特殊的特征或特点
4143.traditional: 特征顯著或特殊的特征或特點
4143.pinyin: tèzhēng xiǎnzhù huò tèshū de tèzhēng huò tèdiǎn
4143.english: A notable or distinctive feature or characteristic.

4144.simplified: 他被任命为那所中学的校长。
4144.traditional: 他被任命為那所中學的校長。
4144.pinyin: tā bèi rènmìng wéi nà suǒ zhōngxué de xiàozhǎng
4144.english: He was appointed the rector of the middle school.

4145.simplified: 他加了一些煤油, 火就燃烧起来了.
4145.traditional: 他加了一些煤油, 火就燃燒起來了.
4145.pinyin: tā jiā le yīxiē méiyóu huǒ jiù ránshāo qilai le
4145.english: The fire blazed up when he added paraffin.

4146.simplified: 这家公司是国际粮食贸易公司.
4146.traditional: 這家公司是國際糧食貿易公司.
4146.pinyin: zhè jiā gōngsī shì guójì liángshi màoyìgōngsī
4146.english: The company is an international trader in grain.

4147.simplified: 吃了一顿好饭，他的脾气变得好多了。
4147.traditional: 吃了一頓好飯，他的脾氣變得好多了。
4147.pinyin: chī le yī dùn hǎo fàn tā de píqi biànde hǎoduō le
4147.english: A good meal sweetened his temper.

4148.simplified: 我绝没想到会在这里遇见你。
4148.traditional: 我絕沒想到會在這裡遇見你。
4148.pinyin: wǒ jué méixiǎngdào huì zài zhèlǐ yùjiàn nǐ
4148.english: This is the last place where I expected to meet you.

4149.simplified: 获胜的队扛著队长走出场地.
4149.traditional: 獲勝的隊扛著隊長走出場地.
4149.pinyin: huòshèng de duì káng zhe duìzhǎng zǒuchū chǎngdì
4149.english: The winning team chaired their captain off the field.

4150.simplified: 他十二点五十分在餐厅吃午餐。
4150.traditional: 他十二點五十分在餐廳吃午餐。
4150.pinyin: tā shí'èr diǎn wǔshí fēn zài cāntīng chī wǔcān
4150.english: At twelve-fifty, he ate lunch in a restaurant.

4151.simplified: 我不喜欢滑冰，而且冰又太薄。
4151.traditional: 我不喜歡滑冰，而且冰又太薄。
4151.pinyin: wǒ bù xǐhuan huábīng érqiě bīng yòu tài báo
4151.english: I don't like skating, moreover, the ice is too thin.

4152.simplified: 草原向四周伸展, 一望无际.
4152.traditional: 草原向四周伸展, 一望無際.
4152.english: The prairies stretch on all sides as far as the eye can see.

4153.simplified: 这些盘子是用一种塑料制造的.
4153.traditional: 這些盤子是用一種塑料制造的.
4153.pinyin: zhèxiē pánzi shì yòng yīzhǒng sùliào zhìzào de
4153.english: A kind of plastic stuff is used to make the plates.

4154.simplified: 天气太冷了，他感到寒冷刺骨。
4154.traditional: 天氣太冷了，他感到寒冷刺骨。
4154.pinyin: tiānqì tài lěng le tā gǎndào hánlěng cìgǔ
4154.english: It was so cold that he felt frozen to the marrow.

4155.simplified: 这辆新车包含了许多改进的项目。
4155.traditional: 這輛新車包含了許多改進的項目。
4155.pinyin: zhè liàng xīn chē bāohán le xǔduō gǎijìn de xiàngmù
4155.english: The new car embodies many improvements.

4156.simplified: 她因未能获得奖金而深感不满。
4156.traditional: 她因未能獲得獎金而深感不滿。
4156.pinyin: tā yīn wèinéng huòdé jiǎngjīn ér shēngǎn bùmǎn
4156.english: She's very dissatisfied at not getting a bonus.

4157.simplified: 水渠得穿过别的合作社的土地。
4157.traditional: 水渠得穿過別的合作社的土地。
4157.pinyin: shuǐqú dé chuānguò biéde hézuòshè de tǔdì
4157.english: The canal had to cut through the land of other co-ops.

4158.simplified: 他对他扮演的角色理解得细微之至。
4158.traditional: 他對他扮演的角色理解得細微之至。
4158.pinyin: tā duì tā bànyǎn de juésè lǐjiě dé xìwēi zhīzhì
4158.english: He understands his part to a miracle.

4159.simplified: 女王正对加拿大进行私人访问.
4159.traditional: 女王正對加拿大進行私人訪問.
4159.pinyin: nǚwáng zhèngduì Jiānádà jìnxíng sīrén fǎngwèn
4159.english: The Queen is making a private visit to Canada.

4160.simplified: 你应该把房屋建得尽可能结实。
4160.traditional: 你應該把房屋建得盡可能結實。
4160.pinyin: nǐ yīnggāi bǎ fángwū jiàn dé jǐnkěnéng jiēshi
4160.english: You must make the houses as strong as possible.

4161.simplified: 人命与萝卜依然是多而且便宜。
4161.traditional: 人命與蘿卜依然是多而且便宜。
4161.pinyin: rénmìng yǔ luóbo yīrán shì duō érqiě piányi
4161.english: Human life and turnip remain cheap and plentiful.

4162.simplified: 机器生产已经代替了手工劳作.
4162.traditional: 機器生產已經代替了手工勞作.
4162.pinyin: jīqì shēngchǎn yǐjīng dàitì le shǒugōng láozuò
4162.english: Work done by machines has replaced manual labour.

4163.simplified: 航天器的设计正大加修改.
4163.traditional: 航天器的設計正大加修改.
4163.pinyin: hángtiānqì de shèjì zhèng dà jiā xiūgǎi
4163.english: The design of the spacecraft is undergoing extensive modification.

4164.simplified: 及时付款正是我们所盼望的。
4164.traditional: 及時付款正是我們所盼望的。
4164.pinyin: jíshí fùkuǎn zhèngshì wǒmen suǒ pànwàng de
4164.english: What we expected is nothing less than a timely payment.

4165.simplified: 我不久就习惯了他那些奇怪的做法.
4165.traditional: 我不久就習慣了他那些奇怪的做法.
4165.pinyin: wǒ bùjiǔ jiù xíguàn le tā nàxiē qíguài de zuòfǎ
4165.english: I soon got accustomed to his strange ways.

4166.simplified: 如果明天天气好，我门宜于出门。
4166.traditional: 如果明天天氣好，我門宜於出門。
4166.pinyin: rúguǒ míngtiān tiānqì hǎo wǒ mén yí yú chūmén
4166.english: If it is fine tomorrow, we should go out.

4167.simplified: 他们对官方的政策表示出异议。
4167.traditional: 他們對官方的政策表示出異議。
4167.pinyin: tāmen duì guānfāng de zhèngcè biǎoshì chū yìyì
4167.english: They expressed their dissent from official policy.

4168.simplified: 要是我再高几寸，我会好高兴。
4168.traditional: 要是我再高幾寸，我會好高興。
4168.pinyin: yàoshi wǒ zài gāo jǐ cùn wǒ huì hǎo gāoxìng
4168.english: How happy I would be if I were a few inches taller!

4169.simplified: 让我们互相支持，互相鼓励。
4169.traditional: 讓我們互相支持，互相鼓勵。
4169.pinyin: ràng wǒmen hùxiāng zhīchí hùxiāng gǔlì
4169.english: Let's give mutual support and inspiration to each other.

4170.simplified: 她因母亲偷看她的日记而生气。
4170.traditional: 她因母親偷看她的日記而生氣。
4170.pinyin: tā yīn mǔqīn tōukàn tā de rìjì ér shēngqì
4170.english: She was angry for her mother's peeping at her diary.

4171.simplified: 该计画的可取之处是相当明显的.
4171.traditional: 該計畫的可取之處是相當明顯的.
4171.pinyin: gāi jìhuà de kěqǔzhīchù shì xiāngdāng míngxiǎn de
4171.english: The merits of the scheme are quite obvious.

4172.simplified: 前景中的马画得不成比例.
4172.traditional: 前景中的馬畫得不成比例.
4172.pinyin: qiánjǐng zhòngdì mǎ huà dé bùchéng bǐlì
4172.english: The figures of the horses in the foreground are out of proportion.

4173.simplified: 科学家猜测在金星上没有生命。
4173.traditional: 科學家猜測在金星上沒有生命。
4173.pinyin: kēxuéjiā cāicè zài jīnxīng shàng méiyǒu shēngmìng
4173.english: The scientists guess that Venus is lifeless.

4174.simplified: 他太穷了，买不起天文望远镜。
4174.traditional: 他太窮了，買不起天文望遠鏡。
4174.pinyin: tā tài qióng le mǎibuqǐ tiānwén wàngyuǎnjìng
4174.english: He was too poor to buy an astronomical telescope.

4175.simplified: 这些观点在知识分子中很普遍。
4175.traditional: 這些觀點在知識分子中很普遍。
4175.pinyin: zhèxiē guāndiǎn zài zhīshifènzǐ zhōng hěn pǔbiàn
4175.english: These views were common among intellectuals.

4176.simplified: 他决定开一间小规模杂货店。
4176.traditional: 他決定開一間小規模雜貨店。
4176.pinyin: tā juédìng kāi yī jiān xiǎo guīmó záhuòdiàn
4176.english: He has decided to open a grocer store in a small way.

4177.simplified: 她讨厌他到不和他讲话的程度。
4177.traditional: 她討厭他到不和他講話的程度。
4177.pinyin: tā tǎoyàn tā dào bùhé tā jiǎnghuà de chéngdù
4177.english: She hates him to the point of not talking to him.

4178.simplified: 距离六英里以外的东西很难看清.
4178.traditional: 距離六英裡以外的東西很難看清.
4178.pinyin: jùlí liù Yīnglǐ yǐwài de dōngxi hěn nán kànqīng
4178.english: At a distance of six miles you can't see much.

4179.simplified: 农产品价格的提高有助于农业。
4179.traditional: 農產品價格的提高有助於農業。
4179.pinyin: nóngchǎnpǐn jiàgé de tígāo yǒuzhùyú nóngyè
4179.english: High prices for farm products encouraged farming.

4180.simplified: 我们决定为我们的新产品做广告。
4180.traditional: 我們決定為我們的新產品做廣告。
4180.pinyin: wǒmen juédìng wéi wǒmen de xīnchǎnpǐn zuò guǎnggào
4180.english: We decided to advertise our new product.

4181.simplified: 该系列讲座可自然分作三部分。
4181.traditional: 該系列講座可自然分作三部分。
4181.pinyin: gāi xìliè jiǎngzuò kě zìrán fēn zuò sān bùfen
4181.english: The lecture series falls naturally into three parts.

4182.simplified: 时间比世上任何东西都宝贵。
4182.traditional: 時間比世上任何東西都寶貴。
4182.pinyin: shíjiān bǐ shìshàng rènhé dōngxi dōu bǎoguì
4182.english: Time is more precious than anything else in the world.

4183.simplified: 实际经验证明这个理论是错误的。
4183.traditional: 實際經驗證明這個理論是錯誤的。
4183.pinyin: shíjì jīngyàn zhèngmíng zhège lǐlùn shì cuòwù de

4184.simplified: 他的指控遭到一阵愤怒的反对声。
4184.traditional: 他的指控遭到一陣憤怒的反對聲。
4184.pinyin: tā de zhǐkòng zāodào yīzhèn fènnù de fǎnduì shēng
4184.english: His charges were met with cries of anger.

4185.simplified: 他抓住我的领子把我拉倒他面前。
4185.traditional: 他抓住我的領子把我拉倒他面前。
4185.pinyin: tā zhuāzhù wǒ de lǐngzi bǎ wǒ lādǎo tā miànqián
4185.english: He grabbed my collar and pulled me towards him.

4186.simplified: 这项政策不会受到选民的欢迎。
4186.traditional: 這項政策不會受到選民的歡迎。
4186.pinyin: zhè xiàng zhèngcè bùhuì shòudào xuǎnmín de huānyíng
4186.english: This policy will not appeal to the voters.

4187.simplified: 做个消防队员有时候会有危险。
4187.traditional: 做個消防隊員有時候會有危險。
4187.pinyin: zuò gè xiāofángduìyuán yǒushíhou huì yǒu wēixiǎn
4187.english: Being a fireman sometimes may be dangerous.

4188.simplified: 你可以把这些磁带当作听力材料。
4188.traditional: 你可以把這些磁帶當作聽力材料。
4188.pinyin: nǐ kěyǐ bǎ zhèxiē cídài dàngzuò tīnglì cáiliào
4188.english: You can use these tapes as aural material.

4189.simplified: 水泥地没铺地毯, 我的脚感到很凉.
4189.traditional: 水泥地沒鋪地毯, 我的腳感到很涼.
4189.pinyin: shuǐní dì méi pū dìtǎn wǒ de jiǎo gǎndào hěn liáng
4189.english: The bare concrete floor was cold on my feet.

4190.simplified: 据信这种生物来自外太空。
4190.traditional: 據信這種生物來自外太空。
4190.english: These creatures were believed to have come from outer space.

4191.simplified: 我盼望著能自己一人在这所房子  .
4191.traditional: 我盼望著能自己一人在這所房子  .
4191.pinyin: wǒ pànwàng zhe néng zìjǐ yī rén zài zhè suǒ fángzi
4191.english: I look forward to being alone in the house.

4192.simplified: 为恢复秩序必须采取严厉措施.
4192.traditional: 為恢復秩序必須采取嚴厲措施.
4192.pinyin: wéi huīfù zhìxù bìxū cǎiqǔ yánlì cuòshī
4192.english: Drastic measures will have to be taken to restore order.

4193.simplified: 这位科学家需要一些精密的仪器。
4193.traditional: 這位科學家需要一些精密的儀器。
4193.pinyin: zhèwèi kēxuéjiā xūyào yīxiē jīngmì de yíqì
4193.english: The scientist needs some delicate instruments.

4194.simplified: 他工作不错，但似乎缺乏信心。
4194.traditional: 他工作不錯，但似乎缺乏信心。
4194.pinyin: tā gōngzuò bùcuò dàn sìhū quēfá xìnxīn
4194.english: He is good at his job but he seems to lack confidence.

4195.simplified: 维护公共秩序是警察的职责。
4195.traditional: 維護公共秩序是警察的職責。
4195.pinyin: wéihù gōnggòngzhìxù shì jǐngchá de zhízé
4195.english: It's the duty of the police to preserve the public order.

4196.simplified: 有人关照我，要我小心别伤害他。
4196.traditional: 有人關照我，要我小心別傷害他。
4196.pinyin: yǒurén guānzhào wǒ yào wǒ xiǎoxīn bié shānghài tā
4196.english: I was told to beware lest I injure him.

4197.simplified: 突然他鼓起全身的劲，站了起来。
4197.traditional: 突然他鼓起全身的勁，站了起來。
4197.pinyin: tūrán tā gǔqǐ quánshēn de jìn zhàn le qilai
4197.english: Suddenly, gathering all his strength, he stood up.

4198.simplified: 这座城市位于加拿大的西北部。
4198.traditional: 這座城市位於加拿大的西北部。
4198.pinyin: zhè zuò chéngshì wèiyú Jiānádà de Xīběibù
4198.english: The city is located in the northwest part of Canada.

4199.simplified: 政府号召青年义务献血。
4199.traditional: 政府號召青年義務獻血。
4199.english: The government calls on the youth to donate their blood voluntarily.

4200.simplified: 他给了我一个小册子记录电话号码。
4200.traditional: 他給了我一個小冊子記錄電話號碼。
4200.pinyin: tā gěi le wǒ yī gè xiǎocèzi jìlù diànhuà hàomǎ
4200.english: He gave me a pamphlet for my call numbers.

4201.simplified: 他努力学习，因此通过了考试。
4201.traditional: 他努力學習，因此通過了考試。
4201.pinyin: tā nǔlì xuéxí yīncǐ tōngguò le kǎoshì
4201.english: He studied hard, and in consequence he passed the exam.

4202.simplified: 我并非因为他有学问而尊敬他。
4202.traditional: 我並非因為他有學問而尊敬他。
4202.pinyin: wǒ bìngfēi yīnwèi tā yǒuxuéwèn ér zūnjìng tā
4202.english: I do not respect him because he is knowledgeable.

4203.simplified: 这项工程对每个人都大有好处。
4203.traditional: 這項工程對每個人都大有好處。
4203.pinyin: zhè xiàng gōngchéng duì měigerén dōu dàyǒu hǎochu
4203.english: This project is of great benefit to everyone.

4204.simplified: 据报道说，明天有日环食。
4204.traditional: 據報道說，明天有日環食。
4204.english: It was reported that there would be an annular eclipse tomorrow.

4205.simplified: 抢救那孩子的生命是英勇的行为。
4205.traditional: 搶救那孩子的生命是英勇的行為。
4205.pinyin: qiǎngjiù nà háizi de shēngmìng shì yīngyǒng de xíngwéi
4205.english: Saving the child's life was a heroic act.

4206.simplified: 我说过要有这样的事，果然如此。
4206.traditional: 我說過要有這樣的事，果然如此。
4206.pinyin: wǒ shuō guò yàoyǒu zhèyàng de shì guǒrán rúcǐ
4206.english: I say it will happen, and sure enough it do.

4207.simplified: 他的讲话文本得加上标点符号.
4207.traditional: 他的講話文本得加上標點符號.
4207.pinyin: tā de jiǎnghuà wénběn dé jiāshàng biāodiǎnfúhào
4207.english: The transcription of his speech must be punctuated.

4208.simplified: 她拒绝遵从正常的社会习俗。
4208.traditional: 她拒絕遵從正常的社會習俗。
4208.pinyin: tā jùjué zūncóng zhèngcháng de shèhuì xísú
4208.english: She refused to conform to the normal social conventions.

4209.simplified: 没有电梯, 我们得爬六段楼梯.
4209.traditional: 沒有電梯, 我們得爬六段樓梯.
4209.pinyin: méiyǒu diàntī wǒmen dé pá liù duàn lóutī
4209.english: There was no lift and we had to climb six flights of stairs.

4210.simplified: 从上周起，我在工作中落后了。
4210.traditional: 從上周起，我在工作中落後了。
4210.pinyin: cóng shàngzhōu qǐ wǒ zài gōngzuò zhōng luòhòu le
4210.english: I have fall behind in my work since last week.

4211.simplified: 昨天我给丈夫买了一支领带别针。
4211.traditional: 昨天我給丈夫買了一支領帶別針。
4211.pinyin: zuótiān wǒ gěi zhàngfu mǎi le yī zhī lǐngdài biézhēn
4211.english: I bought a tie pin for my husband yesterday.

4212.simplified: 他对事业的热情激励著他的追随者.
4212.traditional: 他對事業的熱情激勵著他的追隨者.
4212.pinyin: tā duì shìyè de rèqíng jīlì zhe tā de zhuīsuízhě
4212.english: His ardour for the cause inspired his followers.

4213.simplified: 你作判断时要尽量做到不存偏见.
4213.traditional: 你作判斷時要盡量做到不存偏見.
4213.pinyin: nǐ zuò pànduàn shí yào jǐnliàng zuòdào bù cún piānjiàn
4213.english: Try not to be prejudiced in your judgements.

4214.simplified: 恢复谈判的任何做法都值得欢迎。
4214.traditional: 恢復談判的任何做法都值得歡迎。
4214.pinyin: huīfù tánpàn de rènhé zuòfǎ dōu zhíde huānyíng
4214.english: Any renewal of negotiations will be welcomed.

4215.simplified: 这本书简单易懂，适合儿童。
4215.traditional: 這本書簡單易懂，適合兒童。
4215.pinyin: zhè běn shū jiǎndān yìdǒng shìhé értóng
4215.english: The simplicity of the book makes it suitable for children.

4216.simplified: 我们正在为达到共同的目标而努力.
4216.traditional: 我們正在為達到共同的目標而努力.
4216.pinyin: wǒmen zhèngzài wéi dádào gòngtóng de mùbiāo ér nǔlì

4217.simplified: 我希望星期五之前天气会好转。
4217.traditional: 我希望星期五之前天氣會好轉。
4217.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng Xīngqīwǔ zhīqián tiānqì huì hǎozhuǎn
4217.english: I hope the weather will improve before Friday.

4218.simplified: 她已调到附属建筑的办事处去了.
4218.traditional: 她已調到附屬建築的辦事處去了.
4218.pinyin: tā yǐ diào dào fùshǔ jiànzhù de bànshìchù qù le
4218.english: She's been shunted off to an office in the annexe.

4219.simplified: 这些腐烂的香蕉发出难闻的气味.
4219.traditional: 這些腐爛的香蕉發出難聞的氣味.
4219.pinyin: zhèxiē fǔlàn de xiāngjiāo fāchū nánwén de qìwèi
4219.english: These rotting bananas are giving off a bad smell.

4220.simplified: 他是不太可靠, 但我仍很喜欢他.
4220.traditional: 他是不太可靠, 但我仍很喜歡他.
4220.pinyin: tā shì bù tài kěkào dàn wǒ réng hěn xǐhuan tā
4220.english: He's not very reliable, but I like him just the same.

4221.simplified: 我们每年给三个研究生的奖学金.
4221.traditional: 我們每年給三個研究生的獎學金.
4221.pinyin: wǒmen měinián gěi sān gè yánjiūshēng de jiǎngxuéjīn
4221.english: We give three research fellowships a year.

4222.simplified: 母亲死后，我收到许多安慰信。
4222.traditional: 母親死後，我收到許多安慰信。
4222.pinyin: mǔqīn sǐhòu wǒ shōudào xǔduō ānwèi xìn
4222.english: I got many letters of consolation when my mother died.

4223.simplified: 我碰巧身边有官方的统计数字。
4223.traditional: 我碰巧身邊有官方的統計數字。
4223.pinyin: wǒ pèngqiǎo shēnbiān yǒu guānfāng de tǒngjì shùzì
4223.english: I happen to have the official statistics with me.

4224.simplified: 下一段行程我们就要进山区了.
4224.traditional: 下一段行程我們就要進山區了.
4224.pinyin: xià yī duàn xíngchéng wǒmen jiùyào jìn shānqū le
4224.english: The next lap of our trip takes us into the mountains.

4225.simplified: 这只狗开始生病并且很快就死了。
4225.traditional: 這只狗開始生病並且很快就死了。
4225.pinyin: zhè zhǐ gǒu kāishǐ shēngbìng bìngqiě hěn kuài jiù sǐ le
4225.english: The dog began to sicken and soon died.

4226.simplified: 他出生于一个历史悠久的演员世家。
4226.traditional: 他出生於一個歷史悠久的演員世家。
4226.pinyin: tā chūshēng yú yī gè lìshǐyōujiǔ de yǎnyuán shìjiā
4226.english: He comes from a long line of actors.

4227.simplified: 我对会议的结果感到极其满意.
4227.traditional: 我對會議的結果感到極其滿意.
4227.pinyin: wǒ duì huìyì de jiéguǒ gǎndào jíqí mǎnyì
4227.english: I was most gratified at/by/with the outcome of the meeting.

4228.simplified: 要把前景中的人物画得合比例.
4228.traditional: 要把前景中的人物畫得合比例.
4228.pinyin: yào bǎ qiánjǐng zhòngdì rénwù huà dé hé bǐlì
4228.english: Try to draw the figures in the foreground in proportion.

4229.simplified: 为致富而牺牲原则是不值得的.
4229.traditional: 為致富而犧牲原則是不值得的.
4229.pinyin: wéi zhìfù ér xīshēng yuánzé shì bùzhíde de
4229.english: Getting rich isn't worth the sacrifice of your principles.

4230.simplified: 我们等待着消息，越来越着急。
4230.traditional: 我們等待著消息，越來越著急。
4230.pinyin: wǒmen děngdài zhe xiāoxi yuèláiyuè zháojí
4230.english: We waited for news with a growing sense of anxiety.

4231.simplified: 她鼓励她表达个人深处的感情。
4231.traditional: 她鼓勵她表達個人深處的感情。
4231.pinyin: tā gǔlì tā biǎodá gèrén shēnchù de gǎnqíng
4231.english: She encourages her to express her innermost feelings.

4232.simplified: 她邀请我吃饭以表示她的感激。
4232.traditional: 她邀請我吃飯以表示她的感激。
4232.pinyin: tā yāoqǐng wǒ chīfàn yǐ biǎoshì tā de gǎnjī
4232.english: She showed me her gratitude by inviting me to dinner.

4233.simplified: 他可以招摇撞骗闯过任何难关。
4233.traditional: 他可以招搖撞騙闖過任何難關。
4233.pinyin: tā kěyǐ zhāoyáo zhuàngpiàn chuǎngguò rènhé nánguān
4233.english: He could bluff his way through any difficulty.

4234.simplified: 他说阿拉伯语和英语都一样自如.
4234.traditional: 他說阿拉伯語和英語都一樣自如.
4234.pinyin: tā shuō Ālābóyǔ hé Yīngyǔ dōu yīyàng zìrú
4234.english: He speaks Arabic and English with equal ease.

4235.simplified: 我得要求你陪我去一趟警察分局.
4235.traditional: 我得要求你陪我去一趟警察分局.
4235.pinyin: wǒ dé yāoqiú nǐ péi wǒ qù yī tàng jǐngchá fēnjú
4235.english: I must ask you to accompany me to the police station.

4236.simplified: 村民一致反对修建旁道.
4236.traditional: 村民一致反對修建旁道.
4236.pinyin: cūnmín yīzhì fǎnduì xiūjiàn páng dào
4236.english: The villagers are unanimous in their opposition to the building of a bypass.

4237.simplified: 士兵们为争夺每一寸土地而斗争。
4237.traditional: 士兵們為爭奪每一寸土地而斗爭。
4237.pinyin: shìbīng men wéi zhēngduó měiyī cùn tǔdì ér dòuzhēng
4237.english: The soldiers contested every inch of ground.

4238.simplified: 服从命令在军队中是很重要的。
4238.traditional: 服從命令在軍隊中是很重要的。
4238.pinyin: fúcóng mìnglìng zài jūnduì zhōng shì hěn zhòngyào de
4238.english: Obedience to order is very important in an army.

4239.simplified: 凡是漂亮的男子, 她见一个追一个.
4239.traditional: 凡是漂亮的男子, 她見一個追一個.
4239.english: She runs after every good-looking man she meets.

4240.simplified: 一提到他的名字，他立即站了起来。
4240.traditional: 一提到他的名字，他立即站了起來。
4240.pinyin: yī tídào tā de míngzi tā lìjí zhàn le qilai
4240.english: At the mention of his name, he instantly stood up.

4241.simplified: 这家广播电台不播送任何广告。
4241.traditional: 這家廣播電台不播送任何廣告。
4241.pinyin: zhè jiā guǎngbōdiàntái bù bōsòng rènhé guǎnggào
4241.english: This radio station does not carry any advertising.

4242.simplified: 你时时拜望亲戚很周到啊。
4242.traditional: 你時時拜望親戚很周到啊。
4242.pinyin: nǐ shíshí bàiwàng qīnqi hěn zhōudào ā
4242.english: It is considerate of you to call on your relatives from time to time.

4243.simplified: 我恐怕没有抓住你的论据的思路。
4243.traditional: 我恐怕沒有抓住你的論據的思路。
4243.pinyin: wǒ kǒngpà méiyǒu zhuāzhù nǐ de lùnjù de sīlù
4243.english: I'm afraid I've lost the thread of your argument.

4244.simplified: 我女儿是一个想象力活跃的孩子。
4244.traditional: 我女兒是一個想象力活躍的孩子。
4244.pinyin: wǒ nǚ'ér shì yī gè xiǎngxiànglì huóyuè de háizi
4244.english: My daughter is a child with vivid imagination.

4245.simplified: 这些手套是为严寒地区制造的。
4245.traditional: 這些手套是為嚴寒地區制造的。
4245.pinyin: zhèxiē shǒutào shì wéi yánhán dìqū zhìzào de
4245.english: The gloves were designed for extremely cold climates.

4246.simplified: 我们的老师对标点符号非常重视.
4246.traditional: 我們的老師對標點符號非常重視.
4246.pinyin: wǒmen de lǎoshī duì biāodiǎnfúhào fēicháng zhòngshì
4246.english: Our teacher is very fussy about punctuation.

4247.simplified: 这场讨论演变成了激烈的争吵.
4247.traditional: 這場討論演變成了激烈的爭吵.
4247.pinyin: zhè chǎng tǎolùn yǎnbiàn chéngle jīliè de zhēngchǎo
4247.english: The discussion deteriorated into a bitter quarrel.

4248.simplified: 我把一棵花种到了新买的花盆里。
4248.traditional: 我把一棵花種到了新買的花盆裡。
4248.pinyin: wǒ bǎ yī kē huā zhǒng dàoliǎo xīn mǎi de huāpén lǐ
4248.english: I potted up a flower in the newly bought flowerpot.

4249.simplified: 他只是因为受人激将才参加竞赛.
4249.traditional: 他只是因為受人激將才參加競賽.
4249.pinyin: tā zhǐshì yīnwèi shòu rén jī jiàngcái cānjiā jìngsài
4249.english: He only entered the competition for a dare.

4250.simplified: 我们的眼睛慢慢地适应了黑暗的环境.
4250.traditional: 我們的眼睛慢慢地適應了黑暗的環境.
4250.pinyin: wǒmen de yǎnjing mànmàn dì shìyìng le hēi'àn de huánjìng
4250.english: Our eyes slowly adapted to the dark.

4251.simplified: 那个专门小组被选中参加讨论。
4251.traditional: 那個專門小組被選中參加討論。
4251.pinyin: nàge zhuānmén xiǎozǔ bèi xuǎnzhòng cānjiā tǎolùn
4251.english: The panel was chosen to take part in discussion.

4252.simplified: 他冷静客观地看著她遭受的痛苦.
4252.traditional: 他冷靜客觀地看著她遭受的痛苦.
4252.pinyin: tā lěngjìng kèguān dì kàn zhe tā zāoshòu de tòngkǔ
4252.english: He watched her suffering with clinical detachment.

4253.simplified: 他专心读报, 连门铃也没听见。
4253.traditional: 他專心讀報, 連門鈴也沒聽見。
4253.pinyin: tā zhuānxīn dúbào lián ménlíng yě méi tīngjiàn
4253.english: He was too absorbed in the newspaper to hear the bell.

4254.simplified: 她是英国人, 但也有一些德国亲戚.
4254.traditional: 她是英國人, 但也有一些德國親戚.
4254.pinyin: tā shì Yīngguórén dàn yě yǒuyīxiē Déguó qīnqi
4254.english: She is British but also has German connections.

4255.simplified: 他们结为夫妇共同生活了很多年.
4255.traditional: 他們結為夫婦共同生活了很多年.
4255.pinyin: tāmen jié wéi fūfù gòngtóng shēnghuó le hěn duō nián
4255.english: They lived together as husband and wife for years.

4256.simplified: 不是父亲而是母亲出席此一仪式。
4256.traditional: 不是父親而是母親出席此一儀式。
4256.pinyin: bùshì fùqīn érshì mǔqīn chūxí cǐ yī yíshì
4256.english: Not father but mother was present at the ceremony.

4257.simplified: 这个水壶上的开关按下时卡不住了。
4257.traditional: 這個水壺上的開關按下時卡不住了。
4257.pinyin: zhège shuǐhú shàng de kāiguān ànxià shí kǎ bùzhù le
4257.english: The switch on the kettle won't stay down.

4258.simplified: 警察朝人群上方射出一排子弹。
4258.traditional: 警察朝人群上方射出一排子彈。
4258.pinyin: jǐngchá cháo rénqún shàng fāng shèchū yīpái zǐdàn
4258.english: Police fired a volley over the heads of the crowd.

4259.simplified: 无铅汽油的应用现正逐步推广.
4259.traditional: 無鉛汽油的應用現正逐步推廣.
4259.pinyin: wú qiān qìyóu de yìngyòng xiàn zhèng zhúbù tuīguǎng
4259.english: The use of lead-free petrol is now being phased in.

4260.simplified: 这次争吵是两家不和引起的。
4260.traditional: 這次爭吵是兩家不和引起的。
4260.pinyin: zhè cì zhēngchǎo shì liǎng jiā bùhé yǐnqǐ de
4260.english: The quarrel originated in rivalry between the two families.

4261.simplified: 他为了养家不得不去拼命工作。
4261.traditional: 他為了養家不得不去拼命工作。
4261.pinyin: tā wèile yǎngjiā bùdébù qù pīnmìng gōngzuò
4261.english: He had to work hard for the maintenance of his family.

4262.simplified: 邻居从早到晚开着收音机。
4262.traditional: 鄰居從早到晚開著收音機。
4262.pinyin: línjū cóng zǎo dào wǎn kāi zhe shōuyīnjī
4262.english: The people next door play their radio from morning till night.

4263.simplified: 她很热心, 为我打电话叫了计程车.
4263.traditional: 她很熱心, 為我打電話叫了計程車.
4263.pinyin: tā hěn rèxīn wéi wǒ dǎdiànhuà jiào le jìchéngchē
4263.english: She was so kind as to phone for a taxi for me.

4264.simplified: 他们以唱歌来减轻等候的厌烦.
4264.traditional: 他們以唱歌來減輕等候的厭煩.
4264.pinyin: tāmen yǐ chànggē lái jiǎnqīng děnghòu de yànfán
4264.english: They alleviated the boredom of waiting by singing songs.

4265.simplified: 请注意这两个词之间的区别。
4265.traditional: 請注意這兩個詞之間的區別。
4265.pinyin: qǐng zhùyì zhè liǎng gè cí zhījiān de qūbié
4265.english: Please pay attention to the difference between the two words.

4266.simplified: 我始终认为帮助别人是重要的。
4266.traditional: 我始終認為幫助別人是重要的。
4266.pinyin: wǒ shǐzhōng rènwéi bāngzhù biéren shì zhòngyào de
4266.english: I always make a point of giving a hand to others.

4267.simplified: 我相信他是个我们应当尊敬的人。
4267.traditional: 我相信他是個我們應當尊敬的人。
4267.pinyin: wǒ xiāngxìn tā shì gè wǒmen yīngdāng zūnjìng de rén
4267.english: He is a man whom I believe we should respect.

4268.simplified: 这件事完全超出了他的生活范围了.
4268.traditional: 這件事完全超出了他的生活范圍了.
4268.pinyin: zhè jiàn shì wánquán chāochū le tā de shēnghuó fànwéi le
4268.english: It took him completely out of his sphere.

4269.simplified: 这个城市的人口在持续下降。
4269.traditional: 這個城市的人口在持續下降。
4269.pinyin: zhège chéngshì de rénkǒu zài chíxù xiàjiàng
4269.english: There has been a steady decrease in population in this city.

4270.simplified: 这两间大教室已经分配给我们了.
4270.traditional: 這兩間大教室已經分配給我們了.
4270.pinyin: zhè liǎng jiān dà jiàoshì yǐjīng fēnpèi gěi wǒmen le
4270.english: The two large classrooms have been assigned to us.

4271.simplified: 增加工作不一定需要增添人员。
4271.traditional: 增加工作不一定需要增添人員。
4271.pinyin: zēngjiā gōngzuò bùyīdìng xūyào zēngtiān rényuán
4271.english: More work does not necessarily call for more men.

4272.simplified: 他新买的房子是美国初期的建筑。
4272.traditional: 他新買的房子是美國初期的建築。
4272.pinyin: tā xīn mǎi de fángzi shì Měiguó chūqī de jiànzhù
4272.english: The new house he bought was colonial architecture.

4273.simplified: 这个图书馆星期一至星期六都开放。
4273.traditional: 這個圖書館星期一至星期六都開放。
4273.pinyin: zhège túshūguǎn Xīngqīyī zhì Xīngqīliù dōu kāifàng
4273.english: The library is open on weekdays only.

4274.simplified: 我不得不承认他的论据有力.
4274.traditional: 我不得不承認他的論據有力.
4274.pinyin: wǒ bùdébù chéngrèn tā de lùnjù yǒulì
4274.english: I was compelled to (ie I had to) acknowledge the force of his argument.

4275.simplified: 这样的经验才是生活的内在本质。
4275.traditional: 這樣的經驗才是生活的內在本質。
4275.pinyin: zhèyàng de jīngyàn cái shì shēnghuó de nèizài běnzhì
4275.english: Such experiences are the very staff of life.

4276.simplified: 可能对外国口味而言过于朴素了些。
4276.traditional: 可能對外國口味而言過於朴素了些。
4276.pinyin: kěnéng duì wàiguó kǒuwèi éryán guòyú pǔsù le xiē
4276.english: May be a little austere for foreign taste.

4277.simplified: 他的演讲风格是模仿首相的.
4277.traditional: 他的演講風格是模仿首相的.
4277.pinyin: tā de yǎnjiǎng fēnggé shì mófǎng shǒuxiàng de
4277.english: His style of public speaking is imitative of the prime minister.

4278.simplified: 他们决定明天去田野里打野兔。
4278.traditional: 他們決定明天去田野裡打野兔。
4278.pinyin: tāmen juédìng míngtiān qù tiányě lǐ dǎ yětù
4278.english: They decide to go potting at rabbits in the field tomorrow.

4279.simplified: 我必须告诉你，他的耐心是有限的。
4279.traditional: 我必須告訴你，他的耐心是有限的。
4279.pinyin: wǒ bìxū gàosu nǐ tā de nàixīn shì yǒuxiàn de
4279.english: I must tell you that his patience has its limit.

4280.simplified: 老师让那个学生用这个字造句。
4280.traditional: 老師讓那個學生用這個字造句。
4280.pinyin: lǎoshī ràng nàge xuésheng yòng zhège zì zàojù
4280.english: The pupil was told to make a sentence with this word.

4281.simplified: 经数月钻探, 在沿海找到了石油.
4281.traditional: 經數月鑽探, 在沿海找到了石油.
4281.pinyin: jīng shùyuè zuāntàn zài yánhǎi zhǎo dàoliǎo shíyóu
4281.english: After months of drilling, oil was found off the coast.

4282.simplified: 这幅画上你画的猪鼻子太长了。
4282.traditional: 這幅畫上你畫的豬鼻子太長了。
4282.pinyin: zhè fú huà shàng nǐ huà de zhū bízi tài cháng le
4282.english: The snout of the pig you drew on the picture is too long.

4283.simplified: 左边的人物有损于画面的效果。
4283.traditional: 左邊的人物有損於畫面的效果。
4283.pinyin: zuǒbian de rénwù yǒusǔn yú huàmiàn de xiàoguǒ
4283.english: The figure on the left spoils the unity of the painting.

4284.simplified: 他喜欢读伟人传记来提高自己。
4284.traditional: 他喜歡讀偉人傳記來提高自己。
4284.pinyin: tā xǐhuan dú wěirén zhuànjì lái tígāo zìjǐ
4284.english: He likes to read biographies of great men to promote himself.

4285.simplified: 修理教堂结构的花费非常大。
4285.traditional: 修理教堂結構的花費非常大。
4285.pinyin: xiūlǐ jiàotáng jiégòu de huāfèi fēicháng dà
4285.english: The cost of repairing the fabric of the church was very high.

4286.simplified: 控制工资是政府政策的关键.
4286.traditional: 控制工資是政府政策的關鍵.
4286.pinyin: kòngzhì gōngzī shì zhèngfǔ zhèngcè de guānjiàn
4286.english: Controlling wages is the linchpin of the Government'spolicies.

4287.simplified: 有些食物比另一些食物容易吸收。
4287.traditional: 有些食物比另一些食物容易吸收。
4287.pinyin: yǒuxiē shíwù bǐ lìng yīxiē shíwù róngyì xīshōu
4287.english: Some foods are assimilated more easily than others.

4288.simplified: 有些品种的狗尾巴只有退化的部分.
4288.traditional: 有些品種的狗尾巴只有退化的部分.
4288.pinyin: yǒuxiē pǐnzhǒng de gǒu wěiba zhǐyǒu tuìhuà de bùfen
4288.english: Some breeds of dog have only rudimentary tails.

4289.simplified: 我父亲决不会同意我们的婚姻的。
4289.traditional: 我父親決不會同意我們的婚姻的。
4289.pinyin: wǒ fùqīn jué bùhuì tóngyì wǒmen de hūnyīn de
4289.english: My father will never give his consent to our marriage.

4290.simplified: 我正在学习德语，但还说不好。
4290.traditional: 我正在學習德語，但還說不好。
4290.pinyin: wǒ zhèngzài xuéxí Déyǔ dàn hái shuō bùhǎo
4290.english: I'm learning German, but I still can't speak it properly.

4291.simplified: 国会制定法律，总统执行法律。
4291.traditional: 國會制定法律，總統執行法律。
4291.pinyin: guóhuì zhìdìng fǎlǜ zǒngtǒng zhíxíng fǎlǜ
4291.english: Congress makes the laws; the President executes them.

4292.simplified: 我们的改革取得了势不可挡的进展。
4292.traditional: 我們的改革取得了勢不可擋的進展。
4292.pinyin: wǒmen de gǎigé qǔdé le shì bùkě dǎng de jìnzhǎn
4292.english: Our reform made an inexorable march of progress.

4293.simplified: 这方案表面上看来似乎很实际。
4293.traditional: 這方案表面上看來似乎很實際。
4293.pinyin: zhè fāng'àn biǎomiàn shàng kànlai sìhū hěn shíjì
4293.english: The scheme seems on the surface to be quite practical.

4294.simplified: 他在职业介绍所登记要当秘书。
4294.traditional: 他在職業介紹所登記要當秘書。
4294.pinyin: tā zài zhíyè jièshào suǒ dēngjì yào dāng mìshū
4294.english: He enrolled with an employment agency for a secretary.

4295.simplified: 他躺在铺上，身上盖了一大堆毯子。
4295.traditional: 他躺在鋪上，身上蓋了一大堆毯子。
4295.pinyin: tā tǎng zài pū shàng shēnshang gài le yī dà duī tǎnzi
4295.english: He lay in his bunk under a mound of blankets.

4296.simplified: 有些上了年纪的人非常喜爱京剧。
4296.traditional: 有些上了年紀的人非常喜愛京劇。
4296.pinyin: yǒuxiē shàng le niánjì de rén fēicháng xǐ'ài Jīngjù
4296.english: Some elder people enjoy Beijing opera immensely.

4297.simplified: 我给他这一机会，他立刻抓住不放。
4297.traditional: 我給他這一機會，他立刻抓住不放。
4297.pinyin: wǒ gěi tā zhè yī jīhuì tā lìkè zhuāzhù bù fàng
4297.english: When I gave him the chance, he grabbed it at once.

4298.simplified: 有很多日常生活用品是塑料制的.
4298.traditional: 有很多日常生活用品是塑料制的.
4298.pinyin: yǒu hěn duō rìcháng shēnghuó yòngpǐn shì sùliào zhì de
4298.english: Many items in daily use are made out of plastic.

4299.simplified: 我大部分时间都用在观光游览上了.
4299.traditional: 我大部分時間都用在觀光游覽上了.
4299.pinyin: wǒ dàbùfen shíjiān dōu yòng zài guānguāng yóulǎn shàng le
4299.english: I spent most of my time (in) sightseeing.

4300.simplified: 我讨厌的一切都在他身上体现出来了。
4300.traditional: 我討厭的一切都在他身上體現出來了。
4300.pinyin: wǒ tǎoyàn de yīqiè dōu zài tā shēnshang tǐxiàn chūlái le

4301.simplified: 每个人都必须遵守这条政府法令。
4301.traditional: 每個人都必須遵守這條政府法令。
4301.pinyin: měigerén dōu bìxū zūnshǒu zhè tiáo zhèngfǔ fǎlìng
4301.english: Everyone should obey the government ordinance.

4302.simplified: 他们用冲床在金属板上打孔。
4302.traditional: 他們用沖床在金屬板上打孔。
4302.pinyin: tāmen yòng chōng chuáng zài jīnshǔbǎn shàng dǎ kǒng
4302.english: They cut holes on the sheet of metal with a punch press.

4303.simplified: 铃响以前任何人均不得离开教室。
4303.traditional: 鈴響以前任何人均不得離開教室。
4303.pinyin: líng xiǎng yǐqián rènhé rénjūn bùdé líkāi jiàoshì
4303.english: No one may leave the classroom until the bell go.

4304.simplified: 移民到这个国家有严格的限制。
4304.traditional: 移民到這個國家有嚴格的限制。
4304.pinyin: yímín dào zhège guójiā yǒu yángé de xiànzhì
4304.english: There are strict controls on immigration into this country.

4305.simplified: 该演员与观众建立了密切的关系.
4305.traditional: 該演員與觀眾建立了密切的關系.
4305.pinyin: gāi yǎnyuán yǔ guānzhòng jiànlì le mìqiè de guānxi
4305.english: The actor developed a close rapport with his audience.

4306.simplified: 这位老人退休前是警察局长。
4306.traditional: 這位老人退休前是警察局長。
4306.pinyin: zhèwèi lǎorén tuìxiū qián shì jǐngchájú cháng
4306.english: The old man was a police commissioner before his retirement.

4307.simplified: 这两块木头已用金属丝捆在一起了。
4307.traditional: 這兩塊木頭已用金屬絲捆在一起了。
4307.pinyin: zhè liǎng kuài mùtou yǐ yòng jīnshǔ sī kǔn zàiyīqǐ le
4307.english: The two pieces of wood were wired together.

4308.simplified: 掌握无限空间的概念是很难的。
4308.traditional: 掌握無限空間的概念是很難的。
4308.pinyin: zhǎngwò wúxiàn kōngjiān de gàiniàn shì hěn nán de
4308.english: It is difficult to grasp the concept of infinite space.

4309.simplified: 群众情绪转眼就能发生变化.
4309.traditional: 群眾情緒轉眼就能發生變化.
4309.pinyin: qúnzhòng qíngxù zhuǎnyǎn jiù néng fāshēng biànhuà
4309.english: The mood of the crowd can change in the twinkling of an eye.

4310.simplified: 敌人在一场决定性的战斗中被击败.
4310.traditional: 敵人在一場決定性的戰斗中被擊敗.
4310.pinyin: dírén zài yī chǎng juédìngxìng de zhàndòu zhōng bèi jībài
4310.english: The enemy was defeated in a decisive battle.

4311.simplified: 她说她再也不愿进入那所房子了。
4311.traditional: 她說她再也不願進入那所房子了。
4311.pinyin: tā shuō tā zàiyě bùyuàn jìnrù nà suǒ fángzi le
4311.english: She said she would never set foot in that house again.

4312.simplified: 他连忙接受了我提供的东西或办法等。
4312.traditional: 他連忙接受了我提供的東西或辦法等。
4312.pinyin: tā liánmáng jiēshòu le wǒ tígōng de dōngxi huò bànfǎ děng
4312.english: He snapped at the offer I made him.

4313.simplified: 她探身去取放在餐桌对面的黄油。
4313.traditional: 她探身去取放在餐桌對面的黃油。
4313.pinyin: tā tànshēn qùqǔ fàng zài cānzhuō duìmiàn de huángyóu
4313.english: She stretched across the table for the butter.

4314.simplified: 他们断言这个女孩子读了不少书。
4314.traditional: 他們斷言這個女孩子讀了不少書。
4314.pinyin: tāmen duànyán zhège nǚháizi dú le bùshǎo shū
4314.english: They affirmed that the girl did quite a bit of reading.

4315.simplified: 舞台灯光产生月夜景色的效果.
4315.traditional: 舞台燈光產生月夜景色的效果.
4315.pinyin: wǔtái dēngguāng chǎnshēng yuèyè jǐngsè de xiàoguǒ
4315.english: The stage lighting gives the effect of a moonlit scene.

4316.simplified: 前途光明的表示名望或成功的希望的
4316.traditional: 前途光明的表示名望或成功的希望的
4316.pinyin: qiántú guāngmíng de biǎoshì míngwàng huò chénggōng de xīwàng de
4316.english: Showing promise of fame or success.

4317.simplified: 他对他的新制度提出过分的要求。
4317.traditional: 他對他的新制度提出過分的要求。
4317.pinyin: tā duì tā de xīn zhìdù tíchū guòfèn de yāoqiú
4317.english: He makes the most extravagant claims for his new system.

4318.simplified: 那件大衣看来是绝对旧得穿不出去了.
4318.traditional: 那件大衣看來是絕對舊得穿不出去了.
4318.pinyin: nà jiàn dàyī kànlai shì juéduì jiù dé chuān bù chūqù le
4318.english: That overcoat is looking decidedly past it.

4319.simplified: 她随和的个性使她能与任何人相处。
4319.traditional: 她隨和的個性使她能與任何人相處。
4319.pinyin: tā suíhé de gèxìng shǐ tā néng yǔ rènhé rén xiāngchǔ
4319.english: Her facile nature adapted itself to any company.

4320.simplified: 工业现代化分20年逐步实现.
4320.traditional: 工業現代化分20年逐步實現.
4320.english: The modernization of the industry was phased over a 20-year period.

4321.simplified: 我说不好他的生意是否全部合法。
4321.traditional: 我說不好他的生意是否全部合法。
4321.pinyin: wǒ shuō bùhǎo tā de shēngyì shìfǒu quánbù héfǎ
4321.english: I'm not sure that his business is strictly legitimate.

4322.simplified: 这些生物生活在太平洋的海底。
4322.traditional: 這些生物生活在太平洋的海底。
4322.pinyin: zhèxiē shēngwù shēnghuó zài Tàipíng Yáng de hǎidǐ
4322.english: These creatures live in the depth of the Pacific Ocean.

4323.simplified: 这种药使用过量会损害肝脏.
4323.traditional: 這種藥使用過量會損害肝髒.
4323.pinyin: zhèzhǒng yào shǐyòng guòliàng huì sǔnhài gānzàng
4323.english: Excessive dosage of this drug can result in injury to the liver.

4324.simplified: 没多久，哈里就跟在我们背后跑来了。
4324.traditional: 沒多久，哈裡就跟在我們背後跑來了。
4324.pinyin: méi duōjiǔ Hālǐ jiù gēn zài wǒmen bèihòu pǎo lái le
4324.english: Before long Harry came running behind us.

4325.simplified: 我们已经尽了一切可能来赶上他们。
4325.traditional: 我們已經盡了一切可能來趕上他們。
4325.pinyin: wǒmen yǐjīng jìn le yīqiè kěnéng lái gǎnshàng tāmen
4325.english: We have done all we could to catch up with them.

4326.simplified: 近来差不多样样东西都涨价。
4326.traditional: 近來差不多樣樣東西都漲價。
4326.pinyin: jìnlái chàbuduō yàngyàng dōngxi dōu zhǎngjià
4326.english: In recent times the price of just about everything has gone up.

4327.simplified: 不怎么想去，我并不大喜欢看电影。
4327.traditional: 不怎麼想去，我並不大喜歡看電影。
4327.pinyin: bùzěnme xiǎng qù wǒ bìng bùdà xǐhuan kàn diànyǐng
4327.english: Not really. I am not very fond of the cinema.

4328.simplified: 他在街上向我亲切地挥手致意.
4328.traditional: 他在街上向我親切地揮手致意.
4328.pinyin: tā zài jiēshang xiàng wǒ qīnqiè dì huīshǒu zhìyì
4328.english: He greeted me in the street with a friendly wave of the hand.

4329.simplified: 那些出席者中有首相及其丈夫.
4329.traditional: 那些出席者中有首相及其丈夫.
4329.pinyin: nàxiē chūxízhě zhōng yǒu shǒuxiàng jíqí zhàngfu
4329.english: Among those present were the Prime Minister and her husband.

4330.simplified: 哎呀，我把毛活儿落在公共汽车上了。
4330.traditional: 哎呀，我把毛活兒落在公共汽車上了。
4330.pinyin: āiyā wǒ bǎ máo huór luò zài gōnggòngqìchē shàng le
4330.english: Oh dear, I've left my knitting on the bus!

4331.simplified: 她给学会作了一次有关哲学的讲话.
4331.traditional: 她給學會作了一次有關哲學的講話.
4331.pinyin: tā gěi xuéhuì zuò le yīcì yǒuguān zhéxué de jiǎnghuà
4331.english: She delivered a talk on philosophy to the society.

4332.simplified: 明年将要修建一条超级高速公路。
4332.traditional: 明年將要修建一條超級高速公路。
4332.pinyin: míngnián jiāngyào xiūjiàn yī tiáo chāojí gāosùgōnglù
4332.english: A superhighway will be constructed next year.

4333.simplified: 她以自己的名义支持这一崇高的事业。
4333.traditional: 她以自己的名義支持這一崇高的事業。
4333.pinyin: tā yǐ zìjǐ de míngyì zhīchí zhè yī chónggāo de shìyè
4333.english: She has lent her name to the lofty cause.

4334.simplified: 有前面那个人挡著, 我看不见球赛.
4334.traditional: 有前面那個人擋著, 我看不見球賽.
4334.pinyin: yǒu qiánmiàn nàgèrén dǎng zhe wǒ kànbujiàn qiúsài
4334.english: The man in front was obstructing my view of the pitch.

4335.simplified: 那位老太太从一段楼梯上摔了下来。
4335.traditional: 那位老太太從一段樓梯上摔了下來。
4335.pinyin: nà wèi lǎotàitai cóng yī duàn lóutī shàng shuāi le xiàlai
4335.english: The old woman fell down a flight of stairs.

4336.simplified: 不论你到哪里，语言几乎是相同的。
4336.traditional: 不論你到哪裡，語言幾乎是相同的。
4336.pinyin: bùlùn nǐ dào nǎlǐ yǔyán jīhū shì xiāngtóng de
4336.english: The language is almost the same wherever one goes.

4337.simplified: 我们鼓励他坚持自己对此事的看法。
4337.traditional: 我們鼓勵他堅持自己對此事的看法。
4337.pinyin: wǒmen gǔlì tā jiānchí zìjǐ duì cǐ shì de kànfǎ
4337.english: We encouraged him to assert his view of the matter.

4338.simplified: 那只鸟飞了过去, 翅膀发出呼呼的声音.
4338.traditional: 那只鳥飛了過去, 翅膀發出呼呼的聲音.
4338.pinyin: nà zhǐ niǎo fēi le guòqu chìbǎng fāchū hūhū de shēngyīn
4338.english: The bird flew past, its wings whirring.

4339.simplified: 有一点是肯定的, 你再也不能行走了.
4339.traditional: 有一點是肯定的, 你再也不能行走了.
4339.pinyin: yǒu yīdiǎn shì kěndìng de nǐ zàiyě bùnéng xíngzǒu le
4339.english: This much is certain, you will never walk again.

4340.simplified: 她在这一切不幸中表现得很坚强。
4340.traditional: 她在這一切不幸中表現得很堅強。
4340.pinyin: tā zài zhè yīqiè bùxìng zhōng biǎoxiàn dehěn jiānqiáng
4340.english: She bore up well against all these misfortunes.

4341.simplified: 医术，医业，医学有关医学的技术和专业
4341.traditional: 醫術，醫業，醫學有關醫學的技術和專業
4341.pinyin: yīshù yī yè yīxué yǒuguān yīxué de jìshù hé zhuānyè
4341.english: The art or profession of medicine.

4342.simplified: 他认为，美国应保持超然态度。
4342.traditional: 他認為，美國應保持超然態度。
4342.pinyin: tā rènwéi Měiguó yīng bǎochí chāo rán tàidu
4342.english: The United States should, he argues, attempt to remain aloof.

4343.simplified: 我毫无保留地认为他说的是实话。
4343.traditional: 我毫無保留地認為他說的是實話。
4343.pinyin: wǒ háowú bǎoliú dì rènwéi tā shuō de shì shíhuà
4343.english: I accepted without reservation what he had said as true.

4344.simplified: 你如果不停止吃糖，你就不要吃饭。
4344.traditional: 你如果不停止吃糖，你就不要吃飯。
4344.pinyin: nǐ rúguǒ bù tíngzhǐ chī táng nǐ jiù bùyào chīfàn
4344.english: Stop eating sweets, or you won't get any dinner.

4345.simplified: 政府不允许报道那起严重事故。
4345.traditional: 政府不允許報道那起嚴重事故。
4345.pinyin: zhèngfǔ bù yǔnxǔ bàodào nà qǐ yánzhòng shìgù
4345.english: The government didn't allow reporting the terrible accident.

4346.simplified: 那强盗以刀刺穿了那旅客的胸部。
4346.traditional: 那強盜以刀刺穿了那旅客的胸部。
4346.pinyin: nà qiángdào yǐ dāo cìchuān le nà lǚkè de xiōngbù
4346.english: The robber thrust his sword through the traveler's bosom.

4347.simplified: 被压迫的人民，在政变之后获得自由。
4347.traditional: 被壓迫的人民，在政變之後獲得自由。
4347.pinyin: bèi yāpò de rénmín zài zhèngbiàn zhīhòu huòdé zìyóu
4347.english: The oppressed were free after the coup.

4348.simplified: 把发生的事情尽可能仔细地回忆一下.
4348.traditional: 把發生的事情盡可能仔細地回憶一下.
4348.pinyin: bǎ fāshēng de shìqing jǐnkěnéng zǐxì dì huíyì yīxià
4348.english: Try to recall (to mind) exactly what happened.

4349.simplified: 她戴上墨镜以防强光的照射。
4349.traditional: 她戴上墨鏡以防強光的照射。
4349.pinyin: tā dàishang mòjìng yǐfáng qiángguāng de zhàoshè
4349.english: She put on dark glasses as a protection against the strong light.

4350.simplified: 那位政治家曾是著名的社会改革家。
4350.traditional: 那位政治家曾是著名的社會改革家。
4350.pinyin: nà wèi zhèngzhìjiā céng shì zhùmíng de shèhuì gǎigéjiā
4350.english: The politician was a famous social reformer.

4351.simplified: 要不是报纸，我们都赶不上时代了。
4351.traditional: 要不是報紙，我們都趕不上時代了。
4351.pinyin: yàobushì bàozhǐ wǒmen dōu gǎnbùshàng shídài le
4351.english: Without newspaper, we would get behind the times.

4352.simplified: 为独立而斗争的势头日益增长。
4352.traditional: 為獨立而斗爭的勢頭日益增長。
4352.pinyin: wéi dúlì ér dòuzhēng de shìtóu rìyì zēngzhǎng
4352.english: The struggle for independence is gaining momentum every day.

4353.simplified: 我们的目标是进一步加强贸易关系。
4353.traditional: 我們的目標是進一步加強貿易關系。
4353.pinyin: wǒmen de mùbiāo shì jìnyībù jiāqiáng màoyì guānxi
4353.english: Our object is to further cement trade relations.

4354.simplified: 别拿她的话当真--她不过是逗弄人.
4354.traditional: 別拿她的話當真--她不過是逗弄人.
4354.pinyin: bié ná tā dehuà dāngzhēn tā bùguò shì dòunòng rén
4354.english: Don't take what she said seriously she was only teasing.

4355.simplified: 这条新的公路一直延伸到我们村庄。
4355.traditional: 這條新的公路一直延伸到我們村莊。
4355.pinyin: zhè tiáo xīn de gōnglù yīzhí yánshēn dào wǒmen cūnzhuāng
4355.english: The new road reaches as far as our village.

4356.simplified: 他举了具体的例子才把论点讲透彻。
4356.traditional: 他舉了具體的例子才把論點講透徹。
4356.pinyin: tā jǔ le jùtǐ de lìzi cái bǎ lùndiǎn jiǎng tòuchè
4356.english: He drove home his point by citing specific examples.

4357.simplified: 咱们定好下次会议的时间和地点吧.
4357.traditional: 咱們定好下次會議的時間和地點吧.
4357.pinyin: zánmen dìng hǎo xiàcì huìyì de shíjiān hé dìdiǎn ba
4357.english: Let's arrange a time and place for our next meeting.

4358.simplified: 这两所学校一向有密切联系.
4358.traditional: 這兩所學校一向有密切聯系.
4358.pinyin: zhè liǎng suǒ xuéxiào yīxiàng yǒu mìqiè liánxì
4358.english: There has always been a close association between these two schools.

4359.simplified: 这个报道与我们昨天听到的有矛盾。
4359.traditional: 這個報道與我們昨天聽到的有矛盾。
4359.pinyin: zhège bàodào yǔ wǒmen zuótiān tīngdào de yǒu máodùn
4359.english: The report contradicts what we heard yesterday.

4360.simplified: 我们不得不把汽车拖到最近的修车厂。
4360.traditional: 我們不得不把汽車拖到最近的修車廠。
4360.pinyin: wǒmen bùdébù bǎ qìchē tuō dào zuìjìn de xiū chēchǎng
4360.english: We have to tow that car to the nearest garage.

4361.simplified: 他总的健康状况相当令人满意。
4361.traditional: 他總的健康狀況相當令人滿意。
4361.pinyin: tā zǒng de jiànkāngzhuàngkuàng xiāngdāng lìngrénmǎnyì
4361.english: His general state of health is fairly satisfactory.

4362.simplified: 这个地方使人回忆起许多生动的往事。
4362.traditional: 這個地方使人回憶起許多生動的往事。
4362.pinyin: zhège dìfang shǐ rén huíyì qǐ xǔduō shēngdòng de wǎngshì
4362.english: This place conjures up vivid memories.

4363.simplified: 这房间就其高度的比例而言是很宽的.
4363.traditional: 這房間就其高度的比例而言是很寬的.
4363.pinyin: zhè fángjiān jiù qí gāodù de bǐlì éryán shì hěn kuān de
4363.english: The room is wide in proportion to its height.

4364.simplified: 五岁以下的儿童乘火车通常免费。
4364.traditional: 五歲以下的兒童乘火車通常免費。
4364.pinyin: wǔ suì yǐxià de értóng chéng huǒchē tōngcháng miǎnfèi
4364.english: Children under five usually travel free on trains.

4365.simplified: 拥有世界冠军是我们每个公民的骄傲。
4365.traditional: 擁有世界冠軍是我們每個公民的驕傲。
4365.pinyin: yōngyǒu shìjiè guànjūn shì wǒmen měi gè gōngmín de jiāo'ào
4365.english: It's a civic pride to have a champion.

4366.simplified: 在中世纪, 哲学与神学是不分的.
4366.traditional: 在中世紀, 哲學與神學是不分的.
4366.pinyin: zài zhōngshìjì zhéxué yǔ shénxué shì bùfēn de
4366.english: In the Middle Ages, philosophy and theology were inextricable.

4367.simplified: 他刚刚四十岁时，头发就变得灰白了。
4367.traditional: 他剛剛四十歲時，頭發就變得灰白了。
4367.pinyin: tā gānggang sìshí suìshí tóufa jiù biànde huībái le
4367.english: His hair became gray when he was only forty.

4368.simplified: 人们常说女人比男人更富于感情。
4368.traditional: 人們常說女人比男人更富於感情。
4368.pinyin: rénmen cháng shuō nǚrén bǐ nánrén gèng fùyú gǎnqíng
4368.english: Women are often said to be more emotional than men.

4369.simplified: 我们不知道这些鸟如何找到它们的路。
4369.traditional: 我們不知道這些鳥如何找到它們的路。
4369.pinyin: wǒmen bù zhīdào zhèxiē niǎo rúhé zhǎodào tāmen de lù
4369.english: We have no idea how the birds find their way.

4370.simplified: 他们的研究项目实用价值很有限。
4370.traditional: 他們的研究項目實用價值很有限。
4370.pinyin: tāmen de yánjiū xiàngmù shíyòngjiàzhí hěn yǒuxiàn
4370.english: Their research project has limited practical utility.

4371.simplified: 两国总理的会谈将于下月举行。
4371.traditional: 兩國總理的會談將於下月舉行。
4371.pinyin: liǎngguó zǒnglǐ de huìtán jiāng yú xiàyuè jǔxíng
4371.english: The talks between the two premiers will be held next month.

4372.simplified: 他总提心吊胆的，担心被人发现。
4372.traditional: 他總提心吊膽的，擔心被人發現。
4372.pinyin: tā zǒng tíxīndiàodǎn de dānxīn bèi rén fāxiàn
4372.english: The fear of being discovered was his constant companion.

4373.simplified: 她和他们打招呼时亲切地直呼其名.
4373.traditional: 她和他們打招呼時親切地直呼其名.
4373.pinyin: tā hé tāmen dǎzhāohu shí qīnqiè dì zhí hū qí míng
4373.english: She greeted them by their first names in a familiar way.

4374.simplified: 街上挂起了旗子，庆祝皇室婚礼。
4374.traditional: 街上掛起了旗子，慶祝皇室婚禮。
4374.pinyin: jiēshang guà qǐ le qízi qìngzhù huángshì hūnlǐ
4374.english: The streets were flagged to celebrate the royal wedding.

4375.simplified: 印度向许多国家出口茶叶和棉花.
4375.traditional: 印度向許多國家出口茶葉和棉花.
4375.pinyin: Yìndù xiàng xǔduō guójiā chūkǒu cháyè hé miánhua
4375.english: India exports tea and cotton to many different countries.

4376.simplified: 他那热情的样子并没把我们欺骗多久.
4376.traditional: 他那熱情的樣子並沒把我們欺騙多久.
4376.pinyin: tā nà rèqíng de yàngzi bìng méi bǎ wǒmen qīpiàn duōjiǔ
4376.english: His friendly manner did not deceive us for long.

4377.simplified: 我通过职业介绍所找到了这份工作。
4377.traditional: 我通過職業介紹所找到了這份工作。
4377.pinyin: wǒ tōngguò zhíyè jièshào suǒ zhǎo dàoliǎo zhè fèn gōngzuò
4377.english: I got this job through an employment agency.

4378.simplified: 他老是把钱借给她，心肠也太软了。
4378.traditional: 他老是把錢借給她，心腸也太軟了。
4378.pinyin: tā lǎoshi bǎ qián jiègěi tā xīncháng yě tài ruǎn le
4378.english: He's always lending her money; he's too soft-hearted.

4379.simplified: 他们扬言要一下子取消整个项目.
4379.traditional: 他們揚言要一下子取消整個項目.
4379.pinyin: tāmen yángyán yào yīxiàzi qǔxiāo zhěnggè xiàngmù
4379.english: They threatened to cancel the whole project at a stroke.

4380.simplified: 她最喜爱的运动是滑雪, 其次是冰球.
4380.traditional: 她最喜愛的運動是滑雪, 其次是冰球.
4380.pinyin: tā zuìxǐ'ài de yùndòng shì huáxuě qícì shì bīngqiú
4380.english: Next to skiing her favourite sport was ice-hockey.

4381.simplified: 这个超市附近有一个地下停车场。
4381.traditional: 這個超市附近有一個地下停車場。
4381.pinyin: zhège chāoshì fùjìn yǒu yī gè dìxià tíngchēchǎng
4381.english: There is an underground car park near the supermarket.

4382.simplified: 随着太阳的落下，夜晚悄悄地来到。
4382.traditional: 隨著太陽的落下，夜晚悄悄地來到。
4382.pinyin: suízhe tàiyang de luòxià yèwǎn qiāoqiāo dì láidào
4382.english: With the setting of the sun, night comes silently.

4383.simplified: 工人们已经表明反对这些方案.
4383.traditional: 工人們已經表明反對這些方案.
4383.pinyin: gōng rénmen yǐjīng biǎomíng fǎnduì zhèxiē fāng'àn
4383.english: Workers have already demonstrated their opposition to the plans.

4384.simplified: 风力是按0-12级标准等级测量的。
4384.traditional: 風力是按0-12級標准等級測量的。
4384.pinyin: fēnglì shì àn jí biāozhǔn děngjí cèliáng de
4384.english: The force of the wind is measured on a standard scale of 0-12.

4385.simplified: 他的勇敢应作为我们大家学习的榜样.
4385.traditional: 他的勇敢應作為我們大家學習的榜樣.
4385.pinyin: tā de yǒnggǎn yīng zuòwéi wǒmen dàjiā xuéxí de bǎngyàng
4385.english: His bravery should be an example to all of us.

4386.simplified: 海关官员根本没检查我们的行李。
4386.traditional: 海關官員根本沒檢查我們的行李。
4386.pinyin: hǎiguānguānyuán gēnběn méi jiǎnchá wǒmen de xíngli
4386.english: The Customs officer didn't bother to check our luggage.

4387.simplified: 我们的副经理是公司的实际负责人。
4387.traditional: 我們的副經理是公司的實際負責人。
4387.pinyin: wǒmen de fùjīnglǐ shì gōngsī de shíjì fùzérén
4387.english: Our deputy manager is the virtual head of the business.

4388.simplified: 我修改一下计划以便和你的计划相适应.
4388.traditional: 我修改一下計劃以便和你的計劃相適應.
4388.pinyin: wǒ xiūgǎi yīxià jìhuà yǐbiàn hé nǐ de jìhuà xiāng shìyìng
4388.english: I will accommodate my plans to yours.

4389.simplified: 他们在郊区从一家钢铁厂前面经过。
4389.traditional: 他們在郊區從一家鋼鐵廠前面經過。
4389.pinyin: tāmen zài jiāoqū cóng yījiā gāngtiěchǎng qiánmiàn jīngguò
4389.english: On the outskirts they passed a steel mill.

4390.simplified: 这个司机是个不遵守速度限制的人。
4390.traditional: 這個司機是個不遵守速度限制的人。
4390.pinyin: zhège sījī shì gè bù zūnshǒu sùdù xiànzhì de rén
4390.english: The driver is a poor observer of speed restrictions.

4391.simplified: 我所有的业余时间都用在诗歌阅读上。
4391.traditional: 我所有的業余時間都用在詩歌閱讀上。
4391.pinyin: wǒ suǒyǒu de yèyú shíjiān dōu yòng zài shīgē yuèdú shàng
4391.english: I spent all my spare time reading poetry.

4392.simplified: 首席书记官某些法院中的最高书记官
4392.traditional: 首席書記官某些法院中的最高書記官
4392.pinyin: shǒuxí shūji guān mǒuxiē fǎyuàn zhòngdì zuì gāo shūji guān
4392.english: The principal clerk in certain courts of law.

4393.simplified: 我们爬到山顶时, 看到了优美的景色.
4393.traditional: 我們爬到山頂時, 看到了優美的景色.
4393.pinyin: wǒmen pá dào shāndǐng shí kàn dàoliǎo yōuměi de jǐngsè
4393.english: When we finally topped the hill we had a fine view.

4394.simplified: 这本书未经作者许可就给翻译了。
4394.traditional: 這本書未經作者許可就給翻譯了。
4394.pinyin: zhè běn shū wèijīng zuòzhě xǔkě jiù gěi fānyì le
4394.english: The book was translated without the sanction of the author.

4395.simplified: 这就是兴趣与技能是有区别的。
4395.traditional: 這就是興趣與技能是有區別的。
4395.pinyin: zhè jiùshì xìngqù yǔ jìnéng shì yǒu qū biéde
4395.english: The point is there is a difference between an interest and a skill.

4396.simplified: 从他的口音判断，他一定是南方人。
4396.traditional: 從他的口音判斷，他一定是南方人。
4396.pinyin: cóng tā de kǒuyin pànduàn tā yīdìng shì nánfāng rén
4396.english: Judging by his accent, he must be from the South.

4397.simplified: 他到了渡口，却发现渡船在对岸。
4397.traditional: 他到了渡口，卻發現渡船在對岸。
4397.pinyin: tā dàoliǎo dùkǒu què fāxiàn dùchuán zài duì'àn
4397.english: He went down to the ferry but found the boat on the other side.

4398.simplified: 没料到，他对这件事的反应是这样的。
4398.traditional: 沒料到，他對這件事的反應是這樣的。
4398.pinyin: méi liàodào tā duì zhè jiàn shì de fǎnyìng shì zhèyàng de
4398.english: His reaction on this matter is unexpected.

4399.simplified: 他吩咐他到外面跑跑去寻找新的顾客。
4399.traditional: 他吩咐他到外面跑跑去尋找新的顧客。
4399.pinyin: tā fēnfù tā dào wàimiàn pǎo pǎo qù xúnzhǎo xīn de gùkè
4399.english: He tells him to go out and find new customer.

4400.simplified: 联合国大会是一种世界性的集会。
4400.traditional: 聯合國大會是一種世界性的集會。
4400.pinyin: Liánhéguó Dàhuì shì yīzhǒng shìjiè xìng de jíhuì
4400.english: The United Nations assembly is a cosmopolitan gathering.

4401.simplified: 我假期在宾馆里干活儿，当服务员。
4401.traditional: 我假期在賓館裡干活兒，當服務員。
4401.pinyin: wǒ jiàqī zài bīnguǎn lǐ gànhuór dāng fúwùyuán
4401.english: I got holiday jobs in guesthouses, waiting on tables.

4402.simplified: 或许这些营养品对你的健康有帮助。
4402.traditional: 或許這些營養品對你的健康有幫助。
4402.pinyin: huòxǔ zhèxiē yíngyǎngpǐn duì nǐ de jiànkāng yǒubāngzhù
4402.english: Maybe these nutrients are helpful to your health.

4403.simplified: 他在结婚之前曾向四个姑娘求过婚。
4403.traditional: 他在結婚之前曾向四個姑娘求過婚。
4403.pinyin: tā zài jiéhūn zhīqián céng xiàng sì gè gūniang qiú guò hūn
4403.english: He wooed four girls before finally marrying one.

4404.simplified: 在我看来，我们会再次考试不及格的。
4404.traditional: 在我看來，我們會再次考試不及格的。
