4404.pinyin: zài wǒ kànlai wǒmen huì zàicì kǎoshì bùjígé de
4404.english: It seems to me that we'll again fail in the exam.

4405.simplified: 市民们进行突击，试图冲破包围。
4405.traditional: 市民們進行突擊，試圖沖破包圍。
4405.pinyin: shìmín men jìnxíng tūjī shìtú chōngpò bāowéi
4405.english: The citizens sallied out in an attempt to break the siege.

4406.simplified: 我设法自立而不求助于我的父母。
4406.traditional: 我設法自立而不求助於我的父母。
4406.pinyin: wǒ shèfǎ zìlì ér bù qiúzhù yú wǒ de fùmǔ
4406.english: I tried to stand on my own two feet rather than turned to my parents.

4407.simplified: 我跟太太争论有关家庭费用的问题。
4407.traditional: 我跟太太爭論有關家庭費用的問題。
4407.pinyin: wǒ gēn tàitai zhēnglùn yǒuguān jiātíng fèiyòng de wèntí
4407.english: I disputed with my wife on household expenses.

4408.simplified: 咱们不要在现阶段著手处理具体问题。
4408.traditional: 咱們不要在現階段著手處理具體問題。
4408.pinyin: zánmen bùyào zài xiànjiēduàn zhuóshǒu chǔlǐ jùtǐwèntí
4408.english: Let's not enter into details at this stage.

4409.simplified: 让我们继续讨论议程上的下一个项目。
4409.traditional: 讓我們繼續討論議程上的下一個項目。
4409.pinyin: ràng wǒmen jìxù tǎolùn yìchéng shàng de xiàyīge xiàngmù
4409.english: Let us go on to the next item on the agenda.

4410.simplified: 这些勇敢的士兵会保卫我们的国家的。
4410.traditional: 這些勇敢的士兵會保衛我們的國家的。
4410.pinyin: zhèxiē yǒnggǎn dīshì bīng huì bǎowèi wǒmen de guójiā de
4410.english: These gallant soldiers will protect our country.

4411.simplified: 党向工会大会致以亲切的问候。
4411.traditional: 黨向工會大會致以親切的問候。
4411.pinyin: dǎng xiàng gōnghuì dàhuì zhìyǐ qīnqiè de wènhòu
4411.english: The party sent its fraternal greetings to the trade union meeting.

4412.simplified: 共同的利益把这两人联系到一起。
4412.traditional: 共同的利益把這兩人聯系到一起。
4412.pinyin: gòngtóng de lìyì bǎ zhè liǎng rén liánxì dào yīqǐ
4412.english: me in strength but Common interest brings these two together.

4413.simplified: 你不应该硬是反对各种进步形式.
4413.traditional: 你不應該硬是反對各種進步形式.
4413.pinyin: nǐ bù yīnggāi yìngshì fǎnduì gèzhǒng jìnbù xíngshì
4413.english: You shouldn't set your face against all forms of progress.

4414.simplified: 我不能再忍受他那傲慢无礼的行为了。
4414.traditional: 我不能再忍受他那傲慢無禮的行為了。
4414.pinyin: wǒ bùnéng zài rěnshòu tā nà àomàn wúlǐ de xíng wèile
4414.english: I could not endure the insolence of his behaviour.

4415.simplified: 大家认为最好暂时放弃这个想法。
4415.traditional: 大家認為最好暫時放棄這個想法。
4415.pinyin: dàjiā rènwéi zuìhǎo zànshí fàngqì zhège xiǎngfǎ
4415.english: It was thought best to drop the idea for the time being.

4416.simplified: 他的妻子知道在他生气时怎么对付他。
4416.traditional: 他的妻子知道在他生氣時怎麼對付他。
4416.pinyin: tā de qīzi zhīdào zài tā shēngqì shí zěnme duìfu tā
4416.english: His wife knows how to manage him when he is angry.

4417.simplified: 最近有关离婚的电视剧太多了。
4417.traditional: 最近有關離婚的電視劇太多了。
4417.pinyin: zuìjìn yǒuguān líhūn de diànshìjù tài duō le
4417.english: There has been a surfeit of plays about divorce on the TV recently.

4418.simplified: 遭遇海难的水手已经被直升机救起。
4418.traditional: 遭遇海難的水手已經被直升機救起。
4418.pinyin: zāoyù hǎinàn de shuǐshǒu yǐjīng bèi zhíshēngjī jiù qǐ
4418.english: The shipwrecked sailors were rescued by helicopter.

4419.simplified: 附近没有酒店, 至少据我所知没有.
4419.traditional: 附近沒有酒店, 至少據我所知沒有.
4419.pinyin: fùjìn méiyǒu jiǔdiàn zhìshǎo jù wǒ suǒzhī méiyǒu
4419.english: There's no pub round here, leastways not that I know of.

4420.simplified: 你不能回避在这一事件中的责任。
4420.traditional: 你不能回避在這一事件中的責任。
4420.pinyin: nǐ bùnéng huíbì zài zhè yī shìjiàn zhòngdì zérèn
4420.english: You can't retreat from the responsibility in this affair.

4421.simplified: 他病得非常厉害，不大可能恢复健康了。
4421.traditional: 他病得非常厲害，不大可能恢復健康了。
4421.pinyin: tā bìng dé fēicháng lìhai bùdà kěnéng huīfù jiànkāng le
4421.english: He is very ill and unlikely to recover.

4422.simplified: 直到太阳从东方升起，我们才出发。
4422.traditional: 直到太陽從東方升起，我們才出發。
4422.pinyin: zhídào tàiyang cóng dōngfāng shēngqǐ wǒmen cái chūfā
4422.english: We did not start until the sun rose in the east.

4423.simplified: 选举之后，该党的党员所剩无几了。
4423.traditional: 選舉之後，該黨的黨員所剩無幾了。
4423.pinyin: xuǎnjǔ zhīhòu gāi dǎng de dǎngyuán suǒshèngwújǐ le
4423.english: After the election the party was reduced to a rump.

4424.simplified: 参赛者中包括三名世界记录保持者。
4424.traditional: 參賽者中包括三名世界記錄保持者。
4424.pinyin: cānsàizhě zhōng bāokuò sān míng shìjiè jìlù bǎochí zhě
4424.english: The field includes three world record holders.

4425.simplified: 建筑费用涨到高达新台币两千万。
4425.traditional: 建築費用漲到高達新台幣兩千萬。
4425.pinyin: jiànzhù fèiyòng zhǎngdào gāodá Xīntáibì liǎng qiānwàn
4425.english: Building costs ran up to as much as NT$ 20 million.

4426.simplified: 这种新飞机正在接受安全性能检验。
4426.traditional: 這種新飛機正在接受安全性能檢驗。
4426.pinyin: zhèzhǒng xīn fēijī zhèngzài jiēshòu ānquán xìngnéng jiǎnyàn
4426.english: The new aircraft is undergoing safety tests.

4427.simplified: 错过这么好的一次机会他有点后悔。
4427.traditional: 錯過這麼好的一次機會他有點後悔。
4427.pinyin: cuòguò zhème hǎo de yīcì jīhuì tā yǒudiǎn hòuhuǐ
4427.english: He repented in a measure of missing such a good chance.

4428.simplified: 有些食物比另一些食物容易吸收.
4428.traditional: 有些食物比另一些食物容易吸收.
4428.pinyin: cuòguò zhème hǎo de yīcì jīhuì tā yǒudiǎn hòuhuǐ
4428.english: Some foods assimilate/ are assimilated more easily than others.

4429.simplified: 他好容易找到一家餐馆去填饱肚子。
4429.traditional: 他好容易找到一家餐館去填飽肚子。
4429.pinyin: tā hǎoróngyì zhǎodào yījiā cānguǎn qù tiánbǎo dùzi
4429.english: He hunted up a restaurant to appease his hunger.

4430.simplified: 我们对医生这样对待我们感到不满。
4430.traditional: 我們對醫生這樣對待我們感到不滿。
4430.pinyin: wǒmen duì yīshēng zhèyàng duìdài wǒmen gǎndào bùmǎn
4430.english: We are unhappy about the way the doctor treated us.

4431.simplified: 他似乎没有意识到形势的严重性。
4431.traditional: 他似乎沒有意識到形勢的嚴重性。
4431.pinyin: tā sìhū méiyǒu yìshí dào xíngshì de yánzhòngxìng
4431.english: He doesn't seem to understand the gravity of the situation.

4432.simplified: 他所受的教育使他能胜任那个职位。
4432.traditional: 他所受的教育使他能勝任那個職位。
4432.pinyin: tā suǒ shòu de jiàoyù shǐ tā néng shèngrèn nàge zhíwèi
4432.english: The education he has received fits him for the post.

4433.simplified: 既然你坚持，我就只好修改信用证。
4433.traditional: 既然你堅持，我就只好修改信用證。
4433.pinyin: jìrán nǐ jiānchí wǒ jiù zhǐhǎo xiūgǎi xìnyòngzhèng
4433.english: Since you insist, I must amend the letter of credit.

4434.simplified: 他的父亲规定他要用英文写日记。
4434.traditional: 他的父親規定他要用英文寫日記。
4434.pinyin: tā de fùqīn guīdìng tā yào yòng Yīngwén xiě rìjì
4434.english: His father ordered that he (should) keep a diary in English.

4435.simplified: 我女儿喜欢给我讲她那些奇怪的梦。
4435.traditional: 我女兒喜歡給我講她那些奇怪的夢。
4435.pinyin: wǒ nǚ'ér xǐhuan gěi wǒ jiǎng tā nàxiē qíguài de mèng
4435.english: My daughter likes to describe her fantastic dreams to me.

4436.simplified: 她的活泼与兴高采烈的情绪把他迷住了.
4436.traditional: 她的活潑與興高采烈的情緒把他迷住了.
4436.pinyin: tā de huópo yǔ xìnggāocǎiliè de qíngxù bǎ tā mízhu le
4436.english: He was charmed by her vivacity and high spirits.

4437.simplified: 除掉金星以外其他的星星全都消失了。
4437.traditional: 除掉金星以外其他的星星全都消失了。
4437.pinyin: chúdiào jīnxīng yǐwài qítā de xīngxing quándōu xiāoshī le
4437.english: All but the morning star have disappeared.

4438.simplified: 根据表面现象看问题有时是不可取的。
4438.traditional: 根據表面現象看問題有時是不可取的。
4438.pinyin: gēnjù biǎomiàn xiànxiàng kàn wèntí yǒushí shì bùkě qǔ de
4438.english: It's not always wise to go by appearances.

4439.simplified: 我再也不想到这个糟糕的地方来了.
4439.traditional: 我再也不想到這個糟糕的地方來了.
4439.pinyin: wǒ zàiyě bù xiǎngdào zhège zāogāo de dìfang lái le
4439.english: I have no intention of coming to this terrible place again!

4440.simplified: 我负担不起带花园的大房子的维护费.
4440.traditional: 我負擔不起帶花園的大房子的維護費.
4440.pinyin: wǒ fùdānbuqǐ dài huāyuán de dà fángzi de wéihù fèi
4440.english: I can't afford the upkeep of a large house and garden.

4441.simplified: 这一切误会都是他在无意中造成的.
4441.traditional: 這一切誤會都是他在無意中造成的.
4441.pinyin: zhè yīqiè wùhuì dōu shì tā zài wúyìzhōng zàochéng de
4441.english: He was the unknowing cause of all the misunderstanding.

4442.simplified: 马克曾在密西西比河上当过领航员。
4442.traditional: 馬克曾在密西西比河上當過領航員。
4442.pinyin: Mǎkè céng zài Mìxīxībǐ Hé shàngdàng guò lǐnghángyuán
4442.english: Mark used to be a pilot on the Mississippi River.

4443.simplified: 俱乐部的成员限定在三十岁以下。
4443.traditional: 俱樂部的成員限定在三十歲以下。
4443.pinyin: jùlèbù de chéngyuán xiàndìng zài sānshí suì yǐxià
4443.english: Membership in this club is restricted to man under 30.

4444.simplified: 这次争论没有引起公众丝毫的兴趣。
4444.traditional: 這次爭論沒有引起公眾絲毫的興趣。
4444.pinyin: zhè cì zhēnglùn méiyǒu yǐnqǐ gōngzhòng sīháo de xìngqù
4444.english: The debate aroused not a speck of public interest.

4445.simplified: 电视塔明显地是我国最大的建筑。
4445.traditional: 電視塔明顯地是我國最大的建築。
4445.pinyin: diànshìtǎ míngxiǎn dì shì wǒguó zuì dà de jiànzhù
4445.english: The TV tower is by far the largest construction of our country.

4446.simplified: 这种小麦可以在寒冷的春天生长。
4446.traditional: 這種小麥可以在寒冷的春天生長。
4446.pinyin: zhèzhǒng xiǎomài kěyǐ zài hánlěng de chūntiān shēngzhǎng
4446.english: This strain of wheat can grow during a cold spring.

4447.simplified: 我想征求一下你对这个计划的建议。
4447.traditional: 我想征求一下你對這個計劃的建議。
4447.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng zhēngqiú yīxià nǐ duì zhège jìhuà de jiànyì
4447.english: I should like to ask for your advice about the plan?

4448.simplified: 高速公路多已取代了普通公路.
4448.traditional: 高速公路多已取代了普通公路.
4448.pinyin: gāosùgōnglù duō yǐ qǔdài le pǔtōng gōnglù
4448.english: Motorways have largely superseded ordinary roads for long-distance travel.

4449.simplified: 我相信礼貌对大家是很重要的。
4449.traditional: 我相信禮貌對大家是很重要的。
4449.pinyin: wǒ xiāngxìn lǐmào duì dàjiā shì hěn zhòngyào de
4449.english: It is my belief that good manners are very important to everybody.

4450.simplified: 毕业前，我们会接受一些职业训练。
4450.traditional: 畢業前，我們會接受一些職業訓練。
4450.pinyin: wǒ xiāngxìn lǐmào duì dàjiā shì hěn zhòngyào de
4450.english: We will have some vocational training before graduation.

4451.simplified: 不要责骂这孩子, 他过了那一阵就会好的.
4451.traditional: 不要責罵這孩子, 他過了那一陣就會好的.
4451.pinyin: bùyào zémà zhè háizi tā guò le nà yīzhèn jiù huì hǎo de
4451.english: Don't scold the boy; he'll come round in time.

4452.simplified: 他以为她爱上他，但只是梦想而已。
4452.traditional: 他以為她愛上他，但只是夢想而已。
4452.pinyin: tā yǐwéi tā àishàng tā dàn zhǐshì mèngxiǎng éryǐ
4452.english: He thinks she is in love with him, but it's only a dream.

4453.simplified: 那孩子翻著跟头从体育馆这头翻到那头.
4453.traditional: 那孩子翻著跟頭從體育館這頭翻到那頭.
4453.pinyin: nà háizi fān zhe gēntou cóng tǐyùguǎn zhè tóu fān dào nà tóu
4453.english: The child somersaulted across the gymnasium.

4454.simplified: 我们发现可折叠的桌子使用非常方便。
4454.traditional: 我們發現可折疊的桌子使用非常方便。
4454.pinyin: wǒmen fāxiàn kě zhédié de zhuōzi shǐyòng fēicháng fāngbiàn
4454.english: We find our folding table a great convenience.

4455.simplified: 公司答应给工人增加工资.
4455.traditional: 公司答應給工人增加工資.
4455.pinyin: gōngsī dāying gěi gōngrén zēngjiā gōngzī
4455.english: The firm promised a wage increase to the workers/promised the workers a wage increase.

4456.simplified: 影片中的声音必须与动作配合一致.
4456.traditional: 影片中的聲音必須與動作配合一致.
4456.pinyin: yǐngpiàn zhòngdì shēngyīn bìxū yǔ dòngzuò pèihé yīzhì
4456.english: The sound on a film must synchronize with the action.

4457.simplified: 这些东西的区别只是大小不同而实质一样.
4457.traditional: 這些東西的區別只是大小不同而實質一樣.
4457.pinyin: zhèxiē dōngxi de qūbié zhǐshì dàxiǎo bùtóng ér shízhì yīyàng
4457.english: They differ in size but not in kind.

4458.simplified: 能和你在一起对我是件极为安慰的事。
4458.traditional: 能和你在一起對我是件極為安慰的事。
4458.pinyin: néng hé nǐ zàiyīqǐ duì wǒ shì jiàn jíwéi ānwèi de shì
4458.english: Your company has been a great consolation to me.

4459.simplified: 他们在经济危机时遭受了巨大的损失。
4459.traditional: 他們在經濟危機時遭受了巨大的損失。
4459.pinyin: tāmen zài jīngjìwēijī shí zāoshòu le jùdà de sǔnshī
4459.english: They suffered huge losses in the financial crisis.

4460.simplified: 在我看来，你跟他都没有达到标准。
4460.traditional: 在我看來，你跟他都沒有達到標准。
4460.pinyin: zài wǒ kànlai nǐ gēn tā dōu méiyǒu dádào biāozhǔn
4460.english: In my opinion, neither you nor he has met the standard.

4461.simplified: 在中国，山区农民在梯田上种水稻。
4461.traditional: 在中國，山區農民在梯田上種水稻。
4461.pinyin: zài Zhōngguó shānqū nóngmín zài tītián shàng zhǒng shuǐdào
4461.english: In China hill farmers grow rice on terraces.

4462.simplified: 我们的炮火控制了通往市区的各条道路。
4462.traditional: 我們的炮火控制了通往市區的各條道路。
4462.pinyin: wǒmen de pàohuǒ kòngzhì le tōngwǎng shìqū de gè tiáo dàolù
4462.english: Our guns covered every approach to the town.

4463.simplified: 现实中, 事情总是出乎意料地发生。
4463.traditional: 現實中, 事情總是出乎意料地發生。
4463.pinyin: xiànshí zhōng shìqing zǒngshì chūhūyìliào dì fāshēng
4463.english: In reality, things always happen out of expectation.

4464.simplified: 这个学期我们都有一门古代史课程。
4464.traditional: 這個學期我們都有一門古代史課程。
4464.pinyin: zhège xuéqī wǒmen dōu yǒu yī mén gǔdàishǐ kèchéng
4464.english: We will all have a course in ancient history this term.

4465.simplified: 环保部门要求我们使用无烟煤。
4465.traditional: 環保部門要求我們使用無煙煤。
4465.pinyin: huánbǎo bùmén yāoqiú wǒmen shǐyòng wúyānméi
4465.english: We are required by environment protecting department to use anthracite.

4466.simplified: 他重复了几遍直到记住为止.
4466.traditional: 他重復了幾遍直到記住為止.
4466.pinyin: tā chóngfù le jǐ biàn zhídào jìzhu wéizhǐ
4466.english: He repeated it several times over (ie again and again) until he could remember it.

4467.simplified: 主管人，尤指大学校长或学院院长
4467.traditional: 主管人，尤指大學校長或學院院長
4467.pinyin: zhǔguǎn rén yóuzhǐ dàxué xiàozhǎng huò xuéyuàn yuànzhǎng
4467.english: A president, especially of a college or university.

4468.simplified: 由上面所说的，我们可以做一个结论。
4468.traditional: 由上面所說的，我們可以做一個結論。
4468.pinyin: yóu shàngmian suǒ shuō de wǒmen kěyǐ zuò yī gè jiélùn
4468.english: From what is said above, we can draw a conclusion.

4469.simplified: 我叫她去刷牙, 她就跟我顶起嘴来.
4469.traditional: 我叫她去刷牙, 她就跟我頂起嘴來.
4469.pinyin: wǒ jiào tā qù shuāyá tā jiù gēn wǒ dǐng qǐ zuǐ lái
4469.english: I asked her to go and brush her teeth and she just sassed me back.

4470.simplified: 你在夜晚可以看到星星，白天却看不到。
4470.traditional: 你在夜晚可以看到星星，白天卻看不到。
4470.pinyin: nǐ zài yèwǎn kěyǐ kàn dào xīngxing báitiān què kàn bùdào
4470.english: You can see stars by night, but not by day.

4471.simplified: 展现在我们面前的是一片广阔的土地。
4471.traditional: 展現在我們面前的是一片廣闊的土地。
4471.pinyin: zhǎn xiànzài wǒmen miànqián de shì yīpiàn guǎngkuò de tǔdì
4471.english: A wide stretch of land spread in front of us.

4472.simplified: 一直朝著这个方向走就看见指示牌了.
4472.traditional: 一直朝著這個方向走就看見指示牌了.
4472.pinyin: yīzhí cháozhe zhège fāngxiàng zǒu jiù kànjiàn zhǐshì pái le
4472.english: Continue in this direction until you see a sign.

4473.simplified: 我们全都是为了他才放弃这个计划的。
4473.traditional: 我們全都是為了他才放棄這個計劃的。
4473.pinyin: wǒmen quándōu shì wèile tā cái fàngqì zhège jìhuà de
4473.english: It was all because of him that we gave up the plan.

4474.simplified: 跟他们讨论终止合同是没有用的。
4474.traditional: 跟他們討論終止合同是沒有用的。
4474.pinyin: gēn tāmen tǎolùn zhōngzhǐ hétong shì méiyǒu yòng de
4474.english: It's no use to discuss the termination of contract with them.

4475.simplified: 新政府的成立带来了一个繁荣的时期.
4475.traditional: 新政府的成立帶來了一個繁榮的時期.
4475.pinyin: xīn zhèngfǔ de chénglì dàilái le yī gè fánróng de shíqī
4475.english: The new government ushered in a period of prosperity.

4476.simplified: 他背上的重负似乎要把他压倒在地。
4476.traditional: 他背上的重負似乎要把他壓倒在地。
4476.pinyin: tā bèi shàng de zhòngfù sìhū yào bǎ tā yādǎo zàidì
4476.english: The burden on his back seemed to be crushing him to the earth.

4477.simplified: 有些食物的吸收比另一些更容易。
4477.traditional: 有些食物的吸收比另一些更容易。
4477.pinyin: tā bèi shàng de zhòngfù sìhū yào bǎ tā yādǎo zàidì
4477.english: The assimilation of some foods is more easily than that of others.

4478.simplified: 吸烟有害健康，这是大家公认的。
4478.traditional: 吸煙有害健康，這是大家公認的。
4478.pinyin: xīyān yǒuhài jiànkāng zhè shì dàjiā gōngrèn de
4478.english: It is generally accepted that smoking is harmful to our health.

4479.simplified: 游击队在那个省开辟了一条新战线。
4479.traditional: 游擊隊在那個省開辟了一條新戰線。
4479.pinyin: yóujīduì zài nàge shěng kāipì le yī tiáo xīn zhànxiàn
4479.english: The guerrillas opened up a new front in that province.

4480.simplified: 她那些所谓的朋友对她的影响很坏.
4480.traditional: 她那些所謂的朋友對她的影響很壞.
4480.pinyin: tā nàxiē suǒwèi de péngyou duì tā de yǐngxiǎng hěn huài
4480.english: Those so-called friends of hers are a bad influence on her.

4481.simplified: 见面礼节礼节性拥抱，如问候或敬礼
4481.traditional: 見面禮節禮節性擁抱，如問候或敬禮
4481.pinyin: jiànmiàn lǐjié lǐjié xìng yōngbào rú wènhòu huò jìnglǐ
4481.english: A ceremonial embrace, as of greeting or salutation.

4482.simplified: 人们认为海洋曾经是生命的发源地。
4482.traditional: 人們認為海洋曾經是生命的發源地。
4482.pinyin: rénmen rènwéi hǎiyáng céngjīng shì shēngmìng de fāyuándì
4482.english: The sea is thought to have been the cradle of life.

4483.simplified: 我还没来得及给他盖好被子，他就睡着了。
4483.traditional: 我還沒來得及給他蓋好被子，他就睡著了。
4483.pinyin: wǒ hái méi láidejí gěi tā gài hǎo bèizi tā jiù shuìzháo le
4483.english: He was asleep before I tucked him in.

4484.simplified: 他正在看一篇关于道路状况的报告。
4484.traditional: 他正在看一篇關於道路狀況的報告。
4484.pinyin: tā zhèngzài kàn yī piān guānyú dàolù zhuàngkuàng de bàogào
4484.english: He is reading a report of the state of the roads.

4485.simplified: 许多学生缺席，特别是连班长也没来。
4485.traditional: 許多學生缺席，特別是連班長也沒來。
4485.pinyin: xǔduō xuésheng quēxí tèbié shì lián bānzhǎng yě méi lái
4485.english: Many students were absent, notably the monitor.

4486.simplified: 有一个省脱离了旧政府而另组新政府。
4486.traditional: 有一個省脫離了舊政府而另組新政府。
4486.pinyin: yǒu yī gè shěng tuōlí le jiù zhèngfǔ ér lìng zǔ xīn zhèngfǔ
4486.english: A province has broken away to form a new state.

4487.simplified: 学习植物学使我对大自然了解了许多。
4487.traditional: 學習植物學使我對大自然了解了許多。
4487.pinyin: xuéxí zhíwùxué shǐ wǒ duì dàzìrán liǎojiě le xǔduō
4487.english: In learning botany, I understand much about nature.

4488.simplified: 部落的知识和风俗口耳相传保存下来.
4488.traditional: 部落的知識和風俗口耳相傳保存下來.
4488.pinyin: bùluò de zhīshi hé fēngsú kǒu ěr xiāngchuán bǎocún xiàlai
4488.english: Tribal lore and custom have been passed down orally.

4489.simplified: 他对你给他的东西没流露出一丝兴趣。
4489.traditional: 他對你給他的東西沒流露出一絲興趣。
4489.pinyin: tā duì nǐ gěi tā de dōngxi méi liúlùchū yī sī xìngqù
4489.english: He showed no glimmer of interest in what you had offered.

4490.simplified: 劳资双方仍在商谈制订和解方案.
4490.traditional: 勞資雙方仍在商談制訂和解方案.
4490.pinyin: láozī shuāngfāng réng zài shāngtán zhìdìng héjiě fāng'àn
4490.english: Managers and workers are still working out a peace formula.

4491.simplified: 我们公司是这个地区最大的用电户。
4491.traditional: 我們公司是這個地區最大的用電戶。
4491.pinyin: wǒmen gōngsī shì zhège dìqū zuì dà de yòng diàn hù
4491.english: Our company is the biggest user of electricity in this area.

4492.simplified: 劳资双方之间存在大量矛盾.
4492.traditional: 勞資雙方之間存在大量矛盾.
4492.pinyin: láozī shuāngfāng zhījiān cúnzài dàliàng máodùn
4492.english: There is a great deal of friction between the management and the work force.

4493.simplified: 他们决定将下一次会议的日期提前。
4493.traditional: 他們決定將下一次會議的日期提前。
4493.pinyin: tāmen juédìng jiāng xiàyīcì huìyì de rìqī tíqián
4493.english: They decided to bring forward the date of the next meeting.

4494.simplified: 一谈到暑假，我们大家都变兴奋了。
4494.traditional: 一談到暑假，我們大家都變興奮了。
4494.pinyin: yī tándào shǔjià wǒmen dàjiā dōu biàn xīngfèn le
4494.english: When it came to the summer vacation, we all became excited.

4495.simplified: 院子里已经是一团糟，更不用说房子了
4495.traditional: 院子裡已經是一團糟，更不用說房子了
4495.pinyin: yuànzi lǐ yǐjīng shì yītuánzāo gèng bùyòng shuō fángzi le
4495.english: The yard is a mess, to say nothing of the house.

4496.simplified: 不要一下子全吃光留下一些以后再吃。
4496.traditional: 不要一下子全吃光留下一些以後再吃。
4496.pinyin: bùyào yīxiàzi quán chī guāng liúxià yīxiē yǐhòu zài chī
4496.english: Don't eat them all at once; save some for later.

4497.simplified: 我承认他身上有种强有力的优点。
4497.traditional: 我承認他身上有種強有力的優點。
4497.pinyin: wǒ chéngrèn tā shēnshang yǒuzhǒng qiángyǒulì de yōudiǎn
4497.english: I grant a sledge-hammering sort of merit in him.(Dickens)

4498.simplified: 这本书表明他是一个有创造力的作家。
4498.traditional: 這本書表明他是一個有創造力的作家。
4498.pinyin: zhè běn shū biǎomíng tā shì yī gè yǒuchuàngzàolì de zuòjiā
4498.english: This book shows that he is an ingenious author.

4499.simplified: 我在一家非常富有创新精神的公司工作。
4499.traditional: 我在一家非常富有創新精神的公司工作。
4499.pinyin: wǒ zài yījiā fēicháng fùyǒu chuàngxīnjīngshén de gōngsī gōngzuò
4499.english: I worked in a very innovative company.

4500.simplified: 吵闹的年青人都已从影院被逐出去了。
4500.traditional: 吵鬧的年青人都已從影院被逐出去了。
4500.pinyin: chǎonào de niánqīng rén dōu yǐ cóng yǐngyuàn bèi zhú chūqù le
4500.english: The noisy youths were ejected from the cinema.

4501.simplified: 本身行为不正, 则不宜批评别人.
4501.traditional: 本身行為不正, 則不宜批評別人.
4501.pinyin: běnshēn xíngwéi bù zhèng zé bùyí pīpíng biéren
4501.english: You can ill afford to criticize others when you behave so badly yourself.

4502.simplified: 我们希望能够和平过渡到新的制度。
4502.traditional: 我們希望能夠和平過渡到新的制度。
4502.pinyin: wǒmen xīwàng nénggòu hépíng guòdù dào xīn de zhìdù
4502.english: We hope there will be a peaceful transition to the new system.

4503.simplified: 他上学时有时到羽毛球俱乐部去。
4503.traditional: 他上學時有時到羽毛球俱樂部去。
4503.pinyin: tā shàngxué shí yǒushí dào yǔmáoqiú jùlèbù qù
4503.english: He went to the badminton club at times during his school days.

4504.simplified: 这位著名的经济学家给我们做了一次演讲。
4504.traditional: 這位著名的經濟學家給我們做了一次演講。
4504.pinyin: zhèwèi zhùmíng de jīngjìxuéjiā gěi wǒmen zuò le yīcì yǎnjiǎng
4504.english: The famous economist gave us a speech.

4505.simplified: 教授将要做关于地理特征的讲座。
4505.traditional: 教授將要做關於地理特征的講座。
4505.pinyin: jiàoshòu jiāngyào zuò guānyú dìlǐ tèzhēng de jiǎngzuò
4505.english: The professor will give a lecture of geographical features.

4506.simplified: 改革教育制度将是一个艰难的过程.
4506.traditional: 改革教育制度將是一個艱難的過程.
4506.pinyin: gǎigé jiàoyù zhìdù jiāng shì yī gè jiānnán de guòchéng
4506.english: Reforming the education system will be a difficult process.

4507.simplified: 民间音乐是一代一代地流传下来的。
4507.traditional: 民間音樂是一代一代地流傳下來的。
4507.pinyin: mínjiānyīnyuè shì yīdài yīdài dì liúchuán xiàlai de
4507.english: Folk music has been passed down from one generation to another.

4508.simplified: 为了我们理解，老师列举了很多事例。
4508.traditional: 為了我們理解，老師列舉了很多事例。
4508.pinyin: wèile wǒmen lǐjiě lǎoshī lièjǔ le hěn duōshì lì
4508.english: The teacher enumerated many examples to us for understanding.

4509.simplified: 你的鼓励使我对我的未来更加有信心。
4509.traditional: 你的鼓勵使我對我的未來更加有信心。
4509.pinyin: nǐ de gǔlì shǐ wǒ duì wǒ de wèilái gèngjiā yǒu xìnxīn
4509.english: Your encouragement made me more confident of my future.

4510.simplified: 目前的危机比以前发生过的都严重。
4510.traditional: 目前的危機比以前發生過的都嚴重。
4510.pinyin: mùqián de wēijī bǐ yǐqián fāshēng guò de dōu yánzhòng
4510.english: The present crisis is more than any that have gone before.

4511.simplified: 她在演讲时一直都在玩弄手帕。
4511.traditional: 她在演講時一直都在玩弄手帕。
4511.pinyin: tā zài yǎnjiǎng shí yīzhí dōu zài wánnòng shǒupà
4511.english: She was playing with her handkerchief all the while during the speech.

4512.simplified: 查一下火车时刻表中下一趟车的时间.
4512.traditional: 查一下火車時刻表中下一趟車的時間.
4512.pinyin: chá yīxià huǒchē shíkèbiǎo zhōng xià yī tàng chē de shíjiān
4512.english: Look up the time of the next train in the timetable.

4513.simplified: 只知道一点点，不如完全不晓得。
4513.traditional: 只知道一點點，不如完全不曉得。
4513.pinyin: zhǐ zhīdào yīdiǎndiǎn bùrú wánquán bù xiǎode
4513.english: You might as well not know a thing at all as know it only a little.

4514.simplified: 这家新图书馆上星期正式落成起用。
4514.traditional: 這家新圖書館上星期正式落成起用。
4514.pinyin: zhè jiā xīn túshūguǎn shàngxīngqī zhèngshì luòchéng qǐyòng
4514.english: This new library was officially opened last week.

4515.simplified: 现行的教育制度和现实并不一致。
4515.traditional: 現行的教育制度和現實並不一致。
4515.pinyin: xiànxíng de jiàoyù zhìdù hé xiànshí bìngbù yīzhì
4515.english: The current education system is not in concert with the reality.

4516.simplified: 老师照管着一群孩子上公共汽车。
4516.traditional: 老師照管著一群孩子上公共汽車。
4516.pinyin: lǎoshī zhàoguǎn zhe yī qún háizi shàng gōnggòngqìchē
4516.english: The teacher was shepherding the group of children into the bus.

4517.simplified: 那位记者被控有违反职业道德的行为。
4517.traditional: 那位記者被控有違反職業道德的行為。
4517.pinyin: nà wèi jìzhě bèikòng yǒu wéifǎn zhíyè dàodé de xíngwéi
4517.english: The reporter was accused of unprofessional conduct.

4518.simplified: 终于在一六八七年他发表了他的新理论。
4518.traditional: 終於在一六八七年他發表了他的新理論。
4518.pinyin: zhōngyú zài yī liù bā qī nián tā fābiǎo le tā de xīn lǐlùn
4518.english: Only in 1687 did he at last publish his new theory.

4519.simplified: 他们因偏见而对计划的优点视而不见
4519.traditional: 他們因偏見而對計劃的優點視而不見
4519.pinyin: tāmen yīn piānjiàn ér duì jìhuà de yōudiǎn shì'érbùjiàn
4519.english: Prejudice that blinded them to the merits of the proposal.

4520.simplified: 她简化了指令以便于儿童理解。
4520.traditional: 她簡化了指令以便於兒童理解。
4520.pinyin: tā jiǎnhuà le zhǐlìng yǐbiàn yú értóng lǐjiě
4520.english: She simplified the instructions so that the children could understand them.

4521.simplified: 她的美貌使她与其他女孩相比占了优势。
4521.traditional: 她的美貌使她與其他女孩相比佔了優勢。
4521.pinyin: tā de měimào shǐ tā yǔ qítā nǚhái xiāngbǐ zhàn le yōushì
4521.english: Her good look gave her a pull over other girls.

4522.simplified: 教师给我们每个人都分配了假日的工作.
4522.traditional: 教師給我們每個人都分配了假日的工作.
4522.pinyin: jiàoshī gěi wǒmen měigerén dōu fēnpèi le jiàrì de gōngzuò
4522.english: The teacher has assigned each of us a holiday task.

4523.simplified: 他写了这封信打算征求一些意见。
4523.traditional: 他寫了這封信打算征求一些意見。
4523.pinyin: tā xiě le zhè fēng xìn dǎsuàn zhēngqiú yīxiē yìjiàn
4523.english: He wrote the letter with the intention of asking for some advice.

4524.simplified: 他们一到那儿就干劲十足地投入工作。
4524.traditional: 他們一到那兒就干勁十足地投入工作。
4524.pinyin: tāmen yī dào nàr jiù gànjìn shízú dì tóurù gōngzuò
4524.english: As soon as they arrived there they ploughed into the work.

4525.simplified: 她在国内第一流指挥家中名列榜首.
4525.traditional: 她在國內第一流指揮家中名列榜首.
4525.pinyin: tā zài guónèi dìyīliú zhǐhuījiā zhōng míngliè bǎngshǒu
4525.english: She ranks foremost among the country's leading conductors.

4526.simplified: 一个守时的人总是把事情提前做好。
4526.traditional: 一個守時的人總是把事情提前做好。
4526.pinyin: yī gè shǒushí de rén zǒngshì bǎ shìqing tíqián zuò hǎo
4526.english: A punctual person always finishes everything ahead of time.

4527.simplified: 他经常回忆起年轻时代的幸福时光。
4527.traditional: 他經常回憶起年輕時代的幸福時光。
4527.pinyin: tā jīngcháng huíyì qǐ niánqīng shídài de xìngfú shíguāng
4527.english: He often retraces the happy time during his young age.

4528.simplified: 图书管理员从书架上随便拿了一本书。
4528.traditional: 圖書管理員從書架上隨便拿了一本書。
4528.pinyin: túshūguǎnlǐyuán cóng shūjià shàng suíbiàn ná le yī běn shū
4528.english: The librarian took a book at random from the shelf.

4529.simplified: 这根绳子不够结实，所以我们用金属线。
4529.traditional: 這根繩子不夠結實，所以我們用金屬線。
4529.pinyin: zhè gēn shéngzi bùgòu jiēshi suǒyǐ wǒmen yòng jīnshǔxiàn
4529.english: The rope was not strong enough, so we used wire.

4530.simplified: 护理工作既是职业又是救死扶伤的责任。
4530.traditional: 護理工作既是職業又是救死扶傷的責任。
4530.pinyin: hùlǐ gōngzuò jìshì zhíyè yòu shì jiùsǐfúshāng de zérèn
4530.english: Nursing is a vocation as well as a profession.

4531.simplified: 我们时间很紧, 只好胡乱吃了顿小吃.
4531.traditional: 我們時間很緊, 只好胡亂吃了頓小吃.
4531.pinyin: wǒmen shíjiān hěn jǐn zhǐhǎo húluàn chī le dùn xiǎochī
4531.english: We were in a hurry so we had to make do with a quick snack.

4532.simplified: 搬运工会把你的行李搬到你的房间去的。
4532.traditional: 搬運工會把你的行李搬到你的房間去的。
4532.pinyin: bānyùn gōnghuì bǎ nǐ de xíngli bān dào nǐ de fángjiān qù de
4532.english: The porter will carry your luggage to your room.

4533.simplified: 减少失业人数是政府计画的重点.
4533.traditional: 減少失業人數是政府計畫的重點.
4533.pinyin: jiǎnshǎo shīyè rénshù shì zhèngfǔ jìhuà de zhòngdiǎn
4533.english: Reducing unemploymentis the focal point of the government's plans.

4534.simplified: 士兵们随时准备粉碎敌人的进攻。
4534.traditional: 士兵們隨時准備粉碎敵人的進攻。
4534.pinyin: shìbīng men suíshí zhǔnbèi fěnsuì dírén de jìngōng
4534.english: The soldiers are ready at all times to smash the enemy's attacks.

4535.simplified: 往来交往个人或群体间的交往或交际
4535.traditional: 往來交往個人或群體間的交往或交際
4535.pinyin: wǎnglái jiāowǎng gèrén huò qúntǐ jiān de jiāowǎng huò jiāojì
4535.english: Dealings or communications between persons or groups.

4536.simplified: 篮球运动员们正在体育馆进行训练。
4536.traditional: 籃球運動員們正在體育館進行訓練。
4536.pinyin: lánqiú yùndòngyuán men zhèngzài tǐyùguǎn jìnxíng xùnliàn
4536.english: The basketball players are working out at the gym.

4537.simplified: 你可以使用联机打印机把数据打印出来。
4537.traditional: 你可以使用聯機打印機把數據打印出來。
4537.pinyin: nǐ kěyǐ shǐyòng lián jī dǎyìnjī bǎ shùjù dǎyìn chūlái
4537.english: You may use an online printer to print out the data.

4538.simplified: 她大力鼓吹节约是解决危机的关键。
4538.traditional: 她大力鼓吹節約是解決危機的關鍵。
4538.pinyin: tā dàlì gǔchuī jiéyuē shì jiějué wēijī de guānjiàn
4538.english: She preached economy as the best means of solving the crisis.

4539.simplified: 他突然对即将到来的危险有了一种预感。
4539.traditional: 他突然對即將到來的危險有了一種預感。
4539.pinyin: tā dàlì gǔchuī jiéyuē shì jiějué wēijī de guānjiàn
4539.english: Suddenly he had a presage about the near danger.

4540.simplified: 汽车在离墙不到一英寸的地方停住了。
4540.traditional: 汽車在離牆不到一英寸的地方停住了。
4540.pinyin: qìchē zài lí qiáng bùdào yī yīngcùn de dìfang tíngzhù le
4540.english: The car stopped within a fraction of an inch of the wall.

4541.simplified: 我们可以在话剧开演前一小时去取票.
4541.traditional: 我們可以在話劇開演前一小時去取票.
4541.pinyin: wǒmen kěyǐ zài huàjù kāiyǎn qián yī xiǎoshí qùqǔ piào
4541.english: We can pick up the tickets an hour before the play begins.

4542.simplified: 你一定会被那美丽的景象所感动的。
4542.traditional: 你一定會被那美麗的景象所感動的。
4542.pinyin: nǐ yīdìng huì bèi nà měilì de jǐngxiàng suǒ gǎndòng de
4542.english: You will never fail to be moved by the beauty of the sight.

4543.simplified: 虽然我倒油时很小心, 但还是洒了一些.
4543.traditional: 雖然我倒油時很小心, 但還是灑了一些.
4543.pinyin: suīrán wǒ dǎo yóu shí hěn xiǎoxīn dàn háishi sǎ le yīxiē
4543.english: Although I poured it carefully, I spilt some of the oil.

4544.simplified: 从她的回答来看, 她并不十分热心.
4544.traditional: 從她的回答來看, 她並不十分熱心.
4544.pinyin: cóng tā de huídá láikàn tā bìngbù shífēn rèxīn
4544.english: I gathered from the way she replied that she wasn't very enthusiastic.

4545.simplified: 只有练习能帮你熟练地用眼作出判断。
4545.traditional: 只有練習能幫你熟練地用眼作出判斷。
4545.pinyin: zhǐyǒu liànxí néng bāng nǐ shúliàn dì yòng yǎn zuòchū pànduàn
4545.english: Only practice can help you to keep your eye in.

4546.simplified: 现实生活并不象人们想象的那样美好。
4546.traditional: 現實生活並不象人們想象的那樣美好。
4546.pinyin: xiànshí shēnghuó bìngbù xiàng rénmen xiǎngxiàng de nàyàng měihǎo
4546.english: Real life isn't as happy as people imagine.

4547.simplified: 这座建筑物在这有一处结构上的改变。
4547.traditional: 這座建築物在這有一處結構上的改變。
4547.pinyin: zhè zuò jiànzhùwù zài zhè yǒu yī chǔ jiégòu shàng de gǎibiàn
4547.english: There is a structural alteration to the building.

4548.simplified: 他刚发表了英国鸟类生活观察报告.
4548.traditional: 他剛發表了英國鳥類生活觀察報告.
4548.pinyin: tā gāng fābiǎo le Yīngguó niǎolèi shēnghuó guānchá bàogào
4548.english: He's just published his observations on British bird life.

4549.simplified: 这是某党派选举前的政治广播节目。
4549.traditional: 這是某黨派選舉前的政治廣播節目。
4549.pinyin: zhè shì mǒu dǎngpài xuǎnjǔ qián de zhèngzhì guǎngbōjiémù
4549.english: Here is a political party broadcast before an election.

4550.simplified: 这把尺上有厘米的刻度和英寸的刻度.
4550.traditional: 這把尺上有釐米的刻度和英寸的刻度.
4550.pinyin: zhè bǎ chǐ shàng yǒu límǐ de kèdù hé yīngcùn de kèdù
4550.english: This ruler has one scale in centimetres and another in inches.

4551.simplified: 完整的茶具是在十八世纪发展起来的。
4551.traditional: 完整的茶具是在十八世紀發展起來的。
4551.pinyin: wánzhěng de chájù shì zài shíbā shìjì fāzhǎn qilai de
4551.english: Complete tea services were developed in the 18th century.

4552.simplified: 他对未来感到轻松自在并且充满信心。
4552.traditional: 他對未來感到輕松自在並且充滿信心。
4552.pinyin: tā duì wèilái gǎndào qīngsōng zìzai bìngqiě chōngmǎn xìnxīn
4552.english: He felt at ease and confident about the future.

4553.simplified: 冬天的时候，我们不得不穿上温暖的衣服。
4553.traditional: 冬天的時候，我們不得不穿上溫暖的衣服。
4553.pinyin: dōngtiān de shíhou wǒmen bùdébù chuānshang wēnnuǎn de yīfu
4553.english: We have to put on warm clothing in winter.

4554.simplified: 那问题他再一考虑, 答案就在眼前.
4554.traditional: 那問題他再一考慮, 答案就在眼前.
4554.pinyin: nà wèntí tā zài yī kǎolǜ dá'àn jiù zàiyǎnqián
4554.english: The answer presented itself to him when he looked at the problem again.

4555.simplified: 那个喜剧演员讲的笑话把人们都逗笑了。
4555.traditional: 那個喜劇演員講的笑話把人們都逗笑了。
4555.pinyin: nàge xǐjù yǎnyuán jiǎng de xiàohuà bǎ rénmen dōu dòuxiào le
4555.english: The comedian tickled the crowd with his jokes.

4556.simplified: 这名伤员由于失血过多而昏迷不醒。
4556.traditional: 這名傷員由於失血過多而昏迷不醒。
4556.pinyin: zhè míng shāngyuán yóuyú shīxuè guòduō ér hūnmíbùxǐng
4556.english: This wounded soldier was unconscious from his loss of blood.

4557.simplified: 政府对引进科学设备非常感兴趣。
4557.traditional: 政府對引進科學設備非常感興趣。
4557.pinyin: zhèngfǔ duì yǐnjìn kēxué shèbèi fēicháng gǎnxìngqù
4557.english: The government has an interest in importing scientific equipment.

4558.simplified: 生活费用上升，老年人最受影响。
4558.traditional: 生活費用上升，老年人最受影響。
4558.pinyin: shēnghuó fèiyòng shàngshēng lǎoniánrén zuì shòu yǐngxiǎng
4558.english: Old people are hardest hit by the rising cost of living.

4559.simplified: 如果要避开市中心，请从这里向右转弯。
4559.traditional: 如果要避開市中心，請從這裡向右轉彎。
4559.pinyin: rúguǒ yào bìkāi shìzhōngxīn qǐng cóng zhèlǐ xiàng yòu zhuǎnwān
4559.english: To avoid the city center, turn right here.

4560.simplified: 这两门课程之间不存在重叠的问题。
4560.traditional: 這兩門課程之間不存在重疊的問題。
4560.pinyin: zhè liǎng mén kèchéng zhījiān bù cúnzài chóngdié de wèntí
4560.english: There is no question of overlap between the two courses.

4561.simplified: 这些队在各自参加了一场比赛后不分胜负。
4561.traditional: 這些隊在各自參加了一場比賽後不分勝負。
4561.pinyin: zhèxiē duì zài gèzì cānjiā le yī chǎng bǐsài hòu bùfēnshèngfù
4561.english: The teams are all square at one match each.

4562.simplified: 说阿拉伯语的人说阿拉伯语民族的一个成员
4562.traditional: 說阿拉伯語的人說阿拉伯語民族的一個成員
4562.pinyin: shuō Ālābóyǔ de rén shuō Ālābóyǔ mínzú de yī gè chéngyuán
4562.english: A member of an Arabic-speaking people.

4563.simplified: 陪我的是一位高先生，他是医院院长。
4563.traditional: 陪我的是一位高先生，他是醫院院長。
4563.pinyin: péi wǒ de shì yī wèi gāo xiānsheng tā shì yīyuàn yuànzhǎng
4563.english: Accompanying me was a Mr.Kao, director of the hospital.

4564.simplified: 大多数国家发生过反对政府的革命。
4564.traditional: 大多數國家發生過反對政府的革命。
4564.pinyin: dàduōshù guójiā fāshēng guò fǎnduì zhèngfǔ de gémìng
4564.english: Most countries have had revolutions aganist the government.

4565.simplified: 不管他愿意与否，他非得去参加讲座。
4565.traditional: 不管他願意與否，他非得去參加講座。
4565.pinyin: bùguǎn tā yuànyì yǔfǒu tā fēiděi qù cānjiā jiǎngzuò
4565.english: Whether he wanted it or not, he had to attend the lecture.

4566.simplified: 接替他担任主席的人将参加本次会议。
4566.traditional: 接替他擔任主席的人將參加本次會議。
4566.pinyin: jiētì tā dānrèn zhǔxí de rén jiāng cānjiā běn cì huìyì
4566.english: His successor as the chairman will be at the conference.

4567.simplified: 双方军队在边境的冲突引发了战争。
4567.traditional: 雙方軍隊在邊境的沖突引發了戰爭。
4567.pinyin: shuāngfāng jūnduì zài biānjìng de chōngtū yǐnfā le zhànzhēng
4567.english: A border clash between the two armies started the war.

4568.simplified: 印刷字体太小，我不带眼镜就看不清。
4568.traditional: 印刷字體太小，我不帶眼鏡就看不清。
4568.pinyin: yìnshuā zìtǐ tài xiǎo wǒ bùdài yǎnjìng jiù kànbuqīng
4568.english: The print is too small for me to read without glasses.

4569.simplified: 那些男孩子为几支圆珠笔而争吵起来了。
4569.traditional: 那些男孩子為幾支圓珠筆而爭吵起來了。
4569.pinyin: nàxiē nánháizi wéi jǐ zhī yuánzhūbǐ ér zhēngchǎo qilai le
4569.english: The boys were bickering over some ballpoints.

4570.simplified: 把我的电视机修好要花去我10000日元。
4570.traditional: 把我的電視機修好要花去我10000日元。
4570.pinyin: bǎ wǒ de diànshìjī xiūhǎo yào huā qù wǒ Rìyuán
4570.english: It cost me ten thousand yen to have my television set repaired.

4571.simplified: 他是用功的学生, 是优秀的榜样.
4571.traditional: 他是用功的學生, 是優秀的榜樣.
4571.pinyin: tā shì yònggōng de xuésheng shì yōuxiù de bǎngyàng
4571.english: He's a shining (ie outstanding, excellent) example of a hard-working pupil.

4572.simplified: 当我们快到车站时，火车减慢了速度。
4572.traditional: 當我們快到車站時，火車減慢了速度。
4572.pinyin: tā shì yònggōng de xuésheng shì yōuxiù de bǎngyàng
4572.english: The train slackened speed as we approached the station.

4573.simplified: 请务必使这张便条落到可靠的人手里。
4573.traditional: 請務必使這張便條落到可靠的人手裡。
4573.pinyin: qǐng wùbì shǐ zhè zhāng biàntiáo luò dào kěkào de rénshǒu lǐ
4573.english: Please see that this note gets into the right hands.

4574.simplified: 修汽车前，你得用千斤顶把汽车抬起来。
4574.traditional: 修汽車前，你得用千斤頂把汽車抬起來。
4574.pinyin: xiū qìchē qián nǐ dé yòng qiānjīndǐng bǎ qìchē tái qilai
4574.english: You need a jack to lift the car before repairing it.

4575.simplified: 假期过后，我觉得健康恢复得相当不错。
4575.traditional: 假期過後，我覺得健康恢復得相當不錯。
4575.pinyin: jiàqī guòhòu wǒ juéde jiànkāng huīfù dé xiāngdāng bùcuò
4575.english: I feel quite restored to health after my holiday.

4576.simplified: 主席一职由委员会的成员轮流担任。
4576.traditional: 主席一職由委員會的成員輪流擔任。
4576.pinyin: zhǔxí yī zhí yóu wěiyuánhuì de chéngyuán lúnliú dānrèn
4576.english: The post of chairman rotates among members of the committee.

4577.simplified: 简而言之，我认为我们应该接受他的提议。
4577.traditional: 簡而言之，我認為我們應該接受他的提議。
4577.pinyin: jiǎn'éryánzhī wǒ rènwéi wǒmen yīnggāi jiēshòu tā de tíyì
4577.english: Briefly, I think we should accept his offer.

4578.simplified: 她因那重要时刻渐近而越来越紧张.
4578.traditional: 她因那重要時刻漸近而越來越緊張.
4578.pinyin: tā yīn nà zhòngyào shíkè jiànjìn ér yuèláiyuè jǐnzhāng
4578.english: As the great moment approached, she grew more and more nervous.

4579.simplified: 因无人维持秩序, 教室里一片混乱.
4579.traditional: 因無人維持秩序, 教室裡一片混亂.
4579.pinyin: yīn wúrén wéichí zhìxù jiàoshì lǐ yīpiàn hùnluàn
4579.english: With no one to keep order the situation in the classroom was chaotic.

4580.simplified: 这些别有风味的小蛋糕是该地的特产。
4580.traditional: 這些別有風味的小蛋糕是該地的特產。
4580.pinyin: zhèxiē biéyǒu fēngwèi de xiǎo dàngāo shì gāi dì de tèchǎn
4580.english: These small spiced cakes are a peculiarity of the region.

4581.simplified: 该国需要一个能使全国团结的领袖。
4581.traditional: 該國需要一個能使全國團結的領袖。
4581.pinyin: gāi guó xūyào yī gè néng shǐ quánguó tuánjié de lǐngxiù
4581.english: The country needs a leader who will hold the nation together.

4582.simplified: 我儿子生病时，丈夫给了我极大的安慰。
4582.traditional: 我兒子生病時，丈夫給了我極大的安慰。
4582.pinyin: wǒ érzi shēngbìng shí zhàngfu gěi le wǒ jídà de ānwèi
4582.english: My husband was a great comfort to me when my son was ill.

4583.simplified: 不管她生不生病，她总是开开心心的。
4583.traditional: 不管她生不生病，她總是開開心心的。
4583.pinyin: bùguǎn tā shēng bù shēngbìng tā zǒngshì kāi kāixīn xīn de
4583.english: Whether (she is) sick or fine, she is always cheerful.

4584.simplified: 她除了有一个年老的伯母以外, 再没有亲戚了.
4584.traditional: 她除了有一個年老的伯母以外, 再沒有親戚了.
4584.pinyin: tā chúle yǒu yī gè niánlǎo de bómǔ yǐwài zài méiyǒu qīnqi le
4584.english: She has no relations besides an aged aunt.

4585.simplified: 政府计画严格限制今年公费开支.
4585.traditional: 政府計畫嚴格限制今年公費開支.
4585.pinyin: zhèngfǔ jìhuà yángé xiànzhì jīnnián gōngfèi kāizhī
4585.english: The government plans to set strict limits on public spending this year.

4586.simplified: 他的家乡只是地图上一个不起眼的小城。
4586.traditional: 他的家鄉只是地圖上一個不起眼的小城。
4586.pinyin: tā de jiāxiāng zhǐshì dìtú shàngyīge bùqǐyǎn de xiǎochéng
4586.english: His hometown is an insignificant city on the map.

4587.simplified: 每月都从运河中打捞出几辆旧汽车来.
4587.traditional: 每月都從運河中打撈出幾輛舊汽車來.
4587.pinyin: měiyuè dōu cóng yùnhé zhōng dǎlāo chū jǐ liàng jiù qìchē lái
4587.english: Several old cars are fished out (of the canal) every month.

4588.simplified: 他试著用叉子把罐头里的肉使劲叉出来。
4588.traditional: 他試著用叉子把罐頭裡的肉使勁叉出來。
4588.pinyin: tā shì zhe yòng chāzi bǎ guàntou lǐ de ròu shǐjìn chā chūlái
4588.english: He tried to hoick the meat out of the tin with a fork.

4589.simplified: 我以为他要请客，但结果是各付各的。
4589.traditional: 我以為他要請客，但結果是各付各的。
4589.pinyin: wǒ yǐwéi tā yào qǐngkè dàn jiéguǒ shì gè fù gè de
4589.english: I think he was treating, but it turned out to be a Dutch treat.

4590.simplified: 装配过程的这一部分现在是全自动的.
4590.traditional: 裝配過程的這一部分現在是全自動的.
4590.pinyin: zhuāngpèi guòchéng de zhè yībùfèn xiànzài shì quán zìdòng de
4590.english: This part of the assembly process is now fully automated.

4591.simplified: 大多数中国人认为他将从此不受欢迎。
4591.traditional: 大多數中國人認為他將從此不受歡迎。
4591.pinyin: dàduōshù Zhōngguórén rènwéi tā jiāng cóngcǐ bùshòuhuānyíng
4591.english: Most Chinese think he will be therefrom unwelcome.

4592.simplified: 你们克服了这么大的困难, 值得表扬。
4592.traditional: 你們克服了這麼大的困難, 值得表揚。
4592.pinyin: nǐmen kèfú le zhème dà de kùnnan zhíde biǎoyáng
4592.english: It is greatly to your credit that you have overcome such difficulties.

4593.simplified: 我们为了双方的利益签订这项合同。
4593.traditional: 我們為了雙方的利益簽訂這項合同。
4593.pinyin: wǒmen wèile shuāngfāng de lìyì qiāndìng zhè xiàng hétong
4593.english: We entered into this contract in the interests of both parties.

4594.simplified: 邻居张奶奶生病时，她去帮忙照料。
4594.traditional: 鄰居張奶奶生病時，她去幫忙照料。
4594.pinyin: línjū zhāng nǎinai shēngbìng shí tā qù bāngmáng zhàoliào
4594.english: She helped out when her neighbour Grandma Zhang became ill.

4595.simplified: 他在布置新房子中表现出富有技巧。
4595.traditional: 他在布置新房子中表現出富有技巧。
4595.pinyin: tā zài bùzhì xīn fángzi zhōng biǎoxiàn chū fùyǒu jìqiǎo
4595.english: He display a great deal of artifice in decorate his new house.

4596.simplified: 在等待开演的时候，演员们十分紧张
4596.traditional: 在等待開演的時候，演員們十分緊張
4596.pinyin: zài děngdài kāiyǎn de shíhou yǎnyuán men shífēn jǐnzhāng
4596.english: The performers were edgy as they waited for the show to begin.

4597.simplified: 我们须在我们日常公务中建立一些制度.
4597.traditional: 我們須在我們日常公務中建立一些制度.
4597.pinyin: wǒmen xū zài wǒmen rìcháng gōngwù zhōng jiànlì yīxiē zhìdù
4597.english: We must introduce some system into our office routine.

4598.simplified: 他把他的一生都献给了当代艺术研究。
4598.traditional: 他把他的一生都獻給了當代藝術研究。
4598.pinyin: tā bǎ tā de yīshēng dōu xiàn gěi le dāngdài yìshù yánjiū
4598.english: He had devoted his whole life to the study of contemporary art.

4599.simplified: 我们现在正经历规模空前的失业现象。
4599.traditional: 我們現在正經歷規模空前的失業現象。
4599.pinyin: wǒmen xiànzài zhèng jīnglì guīmó kōngqián de shīyè xiànxiàng
4599.english: We are seeing unemployment on an unprecedented scale.

4600.simplified: 新任命的将军立即向敌人发起攻击.
4600.traditional: 新任命的將軍立即向敵人發起攻擊.
4600.pinyin: xīn rènmìng de jiāngjūn lìjí xiàng dírén fāqǐ gōngjī
4600.english: The new general immediately launched an offensive against the enemy.

4601.simplified: 我插进了几则笑话，把我的讲话拉长了。
4601.traditional: 我插進了幾則笑話，把我的講話拉長了。
4601.pinyin: wǒ chājìn le jǐ zé xiàohuà bǎ wǒ de jiǎnghuà lācháng le
4601.english: I made my speech longer by padding it with a few jokes.

4602.simplified: 使我感到极其好笑的是他的假胡子掉下来了.
4602.traditional: 使我感到極其好笑的是他的假胡子掉下來了.
4602.pinyin: shǐ wǒ gǎndào jíqí hǎoxiào de shì tā de jiǎ húzi diào xiàlai le
4602.english: To my great amusement his false beard fell off.

4603.simplified: 这是件艰巨的工作, 但她是能胜任的.
4603.traditional: 這是件艱巨的工作, 但她是能勝任的.
4603.pinyin: zhè shì jiàn jiānjù de gōngzuò dàn tā shì néng shèngrèn de
4603.english: It's a difficult job but she's the person to carry it through.

4604.simplified: 仍有许多人的生活条件是很艰苦的。
4604.traditional: 仍有許多人的生活條件是很艱苦的。
4604.pinyin: réng yǒu xǔduō rén de shēnghuó tiáojiàn shì hěn jiānkǔ de
4604.english: There are still many people whose living conditions are miserable.

4605.simplified: 在会议之前，我们讨论了这个问题。
4605.traditional: 在會議之前，我們討論了這個問題。
4605.pinyin: zài huìyì zhīqián wǒmen tǎolùn le zhège wèntí
4605.english: Previous to the conference we had discussed the matter among ourselves.

4606.simplified: 整个计划开始具有更切合实际的性质。
4606.traditional: 整個計劃開始具有更切合實際的性質。
4606.pinyin: zhěnggè jìhuà kāishǐ jùyǒu gèng qièhéshíjì de xìngzhì
4606.english: The whole scheme began to take on a more practical aspect.

4607.simplified: 许多危害健康的情况都与吸烟有关。
4607.traditional: 許多危害健康的情況都與吸煙有關。
4607.pinyin: xǔduō wēihài jiànkāng de qíngkuàng dōu yǔ xīyān yǒuguān
4607.english: There are many serious health hazards associated with smoking.

4608.simplified: 一个人应该为世界和平事业尽最大努力。
4608.traditional: 一個人應該為世界和平事業盡最大努力。
4608.pinyin: yīgèrén yīnggāi wéi shìjièhépíng shìyè jìn zuì dà nǔlì
4608.english: One should do his best for the cause of world peace.

4609.simplified: 他用绳子打个圈，套在这头小公牛的角上。
4609.traditional: 他用繩子打個圈，套在這頭小公牛的角上。
4609.pinyin: tā yòng shéngzi dǎ gè quān tào zài zhè tóu xiǎo gōngniú de jiǎo shàng
4609.english: He looped the rope around the steer's horns.

4610.simplified: 在这一测验中你与专家较量一下技巧吧。
4610.traditional: 在這一測驗中你與專家較量一下技巧吧。
4610.pinyin: zài zhè yī cèyàn zhōng nǐ yǔ zhuānjiā jiàoliàng yīxià jìqiǎo ba
4610.english: Match your skill against the experts in this quiz.

4611.simplified: 由于无法控制的情况，讲座取消了。
4611.traditional: 由於無法控制的情況，講座取消了。
4611.pinyin: yóuyú wúfǎ kòngzhì de qíngkuàng jiǎngzuò qǔxiāo le
4611.english: Due to circumstances beyond our control the lecture was cancelled.

4612.simplified: 很少植物或动物能在沙漠中很好地生长。
4612.traditional: 很少植物或動物能在沙漠中很好地生長。
4612.pinyin: hěn shǎo zhíwù huò dòngwù néng zài shāmò zhōng hěn hǎo dì shēngzhǎng
4612.english: Few plants or animals thrive in the desert.

4613.simplified: 要想赶上其他同学, 我得特别努力才行。
4613.traditional: 要想趕上其他同學, 我得特別努力才行。
4613.pinyin: yào xiǎng gǎnshàng qítā tóngxué wǒ dé tèbié nǔlì cái xíng
4613.english: I have to work hard to catch up with the other students.

4614.simplified: 你最好不要碰这些衣服，好避免传染病。
4614.traditional: 你最好不要碰這些衣服，好避免傳染病。
4614.pinyin: nǐ zuìhǎo bùyào pèng zhèxiē yīfu hǎo bìmiǎn chuánrǎnbìng
4614.english: You'd better not touch these coats to avoid contagion.

4615.simplified: 女王在一所古老的大教堂里举行登基仪式。
4615.traditional: 女王在一所古老的大教堂裡舉行登基儀式。
4615.pinyin: nǚwáng zài yī suǒ gǔlǎo de dàjiàotáng lǐ jǔxíng dēngjī yíshì
4615.english: The queen was enthroned in an ancient abbey.

4616.simplified: 我愿意接受此品种，因为价格合理。
4616.traditional: 我願意接受此品種，因為價格合理。
4616.pinyin: wǒ yuànyì jiēshòu cǐ pǐnzhǒng yīnwèi jiàgé hélǐ
4616.english: I'd like to accept this item, seeing (that) the price is reasonable.

4617.simplified: 你应很好利用宝贵的每一分钟去学习。
4617.traditional: 你應很好利用寶貴的每一分鐘去學習。
4617.pinyin: nǐ yīng hěn hǎo lìyòng bǎoguì de měiyī fēnzhōng qù xuéxí
4617.english: You should make good use of every precious minute to study.

4618.simplified: 全营以连为单位在军营广场上列队.
4618.traditional: 全營以連為單位在軍營廣場上列隊.
4618.pinyin: quán yíng yǐ lián wéi dānwèi zài jūnyíng guǎngchǎng shàng lièduì
4618.english: The battalion formed up by companies on the barrack square.

4619.simplified: 我觉得这是个合理的建议，但他不同意。
4619.traditional: 我覺得這是個合理的建議，但他不同意。
4619.pinyin: wǒ juéde zhè shì gè hélǐ de jiànyì dàn tā bùtóng yì
4619.english: I thought it was a reasonable proposal, but he didn't agree.

4620.simplified: 那老太太想开录像机, 但是越搞越糊涂.
4620.traditional: 那老太太想開錄像機, 但是越搞越糊涂.
4620.pinyin: nà lǎotàitai xiǎngkāi lùxiàngjī dànshì yuè gǎo yuè hútu
4620.english: The old lady gets in(to) a muddle trying to work the video.

4621.simplified: 让我坐下歇一会儿，我刚得到一些坏消息。
4621.traditional: 讓我坐下歇一會兒，我剛得到一些壞消息。
4621.pinyin: ràng wǒ zuòxia xiē yīhuìr wǒ gāng dédào yīxiē huài xiāoxi
4621.english: May I sit down a minute? I've just had some bad news.

4622.simplified: 一只碗，一双筷子就是他的全部家产。
4622.traditional: 一只碗，一雙筷子就是他的全部家產。
4622.pinyin: yī zhǐ wǎn yī shuāng kuàizi jiùshì tā de quánbù jiāchǎn
4622.english: A bowl and a pair of chopsticks are all the property he has.

4623.simplified: 我国任何时候都没有现在这样繁荣。
4623.traditional: 我國任何時候都沒有現在這樣繁榮。
4623.pinyin: wǒguó rènhé shíhou dōu méiyǒu xiànzài zhèyàng fánróng
4623.english: At no time has the country been more prosperous than at present.

4624.simplified: 她那灵巧的手指把羊毛纺织成了细线。
4624.traditional: 她那靈巧的手指把羊毛紡織成了細線。
4624.pinyin: tā nà língqiǎo de shǒuzhǐ bǎ yángmáo fǎngzhī chéngle xìxiàn
4624.english: Her skillful fingers spun the wool out to a fine thread.

4625.simplified: 她负责采购电视系列片所用的道具.
4625.traditional: 她負責采購電視系列片所用的道具.
4625.pinyin: tā fùzé cǎigòu diànshì xìlièpiàn suǒ yòng de dàojù
4625.english: She was responsible for buying the properties for the television series.

4626.simplified: 那个工厂需要大量钢铁以维持生产。
4626.traditional: 那個工廠需要大量鋼鐵以維持生產。
4626.pinyin: nàge gōngchǎng xūyào dàliàng gāngtiě yǐ wéichí shēngchǎn
4626.english: The factory is in great demand of steel to keep up production.

4627.simplified: 好看的身材或面貌上让人愉快的，端庄的
4627.traditional: 好看的身材或面貌上讓人愉快的，端莊的
4627.pinyin: hǎokàn de shēncái huò miànmào shàng ràng rén yúkuài de duānzhuāng de
4627.english: Pleasing and dignified in form or appearance.

4628.simplified: 她极力主张拼写正确是十分重要的.
4628.traditional: 她極力主張拼寫正確是十分重要的.
4628.pinyin: tā jílì zhǔzhāng pīnxiě zhèngquè shì shífēn zhòngyào de
4628.english: She has very pronounced views on the importance of correct spelling.

4629.simplified: 有个学生真冒失, 竟然和教授争论起来.
4629.traditional: 有個學生真冒失, 竟然和教授爭論起來.
4629.pinyin: yǒu gè xuésheng zhēn màoshi jìngrán hé jiàoshòu zhēnglùn qilai
4629.english: One student made so bold as to argue with the professor.

4630.simplified: 留著点儿劲儿，你一会儿还得干重活儿呢。
4630.traditional: 留著點兒勁兒，你一會兒還得干重活兒呢。
4630.pinyin: liú zhe diǎnr jìnr nǐ yīhuìr hái dé gàn zhònghuór ne
4630.english: Save your strength for the hard work you'll have to do later.

4631.simplified: 开始做饭前，我还得去买些厨房用具。
4631.traditional: 開始做飯前，我還得去買些廚房用具。
4631.pinyin: kāishǐ zuòfàn qián wǒ hái dé qù mǎi xiē chúfáng yòngjù
4631.english: I have to buy some kitchen utensils before starting cooking.

4632.simplified: 只要把它完成了，你怎么做我并不计较。
4632.traditional: 只要把它完成了，你怎麼做我並不計較。
4632.pinyin: zhǐyào bǎ tā wánchéng le nǐ zěnme zuò wǒ bìngbù jìjiào
4632.english: I'm not particular how you do it as long as it gets done.

4633.simplified: 我那辆可靠的旧车会把我们安全地送回家的。
4633.traditional: 我那輛可靠的舊車會把我們安全地送回家的。
4633.pinyin: wǒ nà liàng kěkào de jiù chē huì bǎ wǒmen ānquán dì sòng huíjiā de
4633.english: My trusty old car will get us home safely.

4634.simplified: 我们的队扔硬币赢了， 因此由我们队先开球。
4634.traditional: 我們的隊扔硬幣贏了， 因此由我們隊先開球。
4634.pinyin: wǒmen de duì rēng yìngbì yíng le yīncǐ yóu wǒmen duì xiān kāiqiú
4634.english: Our team won the toss so we play first.

4635.simplified: 在海上航行了三天，我们终于看见了大陆。
4635.traditional: 在海上航行了三天，我們終於看見了大陸。
4635.pinyin: zài hǎishàng hángxíng le sān tiān wǒmen zhōngyú kànjiàn le dàlù
4635.english: After three days at sea we sighted the land.

4636.simplified: 我们不必争论已经决定的事--只好听他的.
4636.traditional: 我們不必爭論已經決定的事--只好聽他的.
4636.pinyin: wǒmen bùbì zhēnglùn yǐjīng juédìng de shì zhǐhǎo tīng tā de
4636.english: Let's not argue the toss we have to accept his choice.

4637.simplified: 他们恋爱那时国家正进行著战争.
4637.traditional: 他們戀愛那時國家正進行著戰爭.
4637.pinyin: tāmen liàn'ài nàshí guójiā zhèng jìnxíng zhe zhànzhēng
4637.english: Their love affair was played out against the background of a country at war.

4638.simplified: 手术成功了，病人现在已脱离危险。
4638.traditional: 手術成功了，病人現在已脫離危險。
4638.pinyin: shǒushù chénggōng le bìngrén xiànzài yǐ tuōlíwēixiǎn
4638.english: The operation is a success and now the patient is out of danger.

4639.simplified: 加入的液体太多，混合液的浓度就不够。
4639.traditional: 加入的液體太多，混合液的濃度就不夠。
4639.pinyin: shǒushù chénggōng le bìngrén xiànzài yǐ tuōlíwēixiǎn
4639.english: If you add too much liquid the mixture will not be thick enough.

4640.simplified: 他对语言的热爱促使他从事翻译工作.
4640.traditional: 他對語言的熱愛促使他從事翻譯工作.
4640.pinyin: tā duì yǔyán de rè'ài cùshǐ tā cóngshì fānyì gōngzuò
4640.english: His love of languages inclined him towards a career as a translator.

4641.simplified: 她很独立，所以拒绝一切金钱上的资助。
4641.traditional: 她很獨立，所以拒絕一切金錢上的資助。
4641.pinyin: tā hěn dúlì suǒyǐ jùjué yīqiè jīnqián shàng de zīzhù
4641.english: She is so independent that she refused all pecuniary aid.

4642.simplified: 你不能以疲劳为理由就这样对待职工.
4642.traditional: 你不能以疲勞為理由就這樣對待職工.
4642.pinyin: nǐ bùnéng yǐ píláo wéi lǐyóu jiù zhèyàng duìdài zhígōng
4642.english: Tiredness cannot possibly justify your treating staff this way.

4643.simplified: 这个地区传统的早饭包括火腿和鸡蛋。
4643.traditional: 這個地區傳統的早飯包括火腿和雞蛋。
4643.pinyin: zhège dìqū chuántǒng de zǎofàn bāokuò huǒtuǐ hé jīdàn
4643.english: The traditional breakfast in this area includes bacon and eggs.

4644.simplified: 警察让我描述一下这事是怎样发生的。
4644.traditional: 警察讓我描述一下這事是怎樣發生的。
4644.pinyin: jǐngchá ràng wǒ miáoshù yīxià zhè shì shì zěnyàng fāshēng de
4644.english: The police asked me to describe exactly how it happened.

4645.simplified: 不要把馒头放在桌子上，它会干硬的。
4645.traditional: 不要把饅頭放在桌子上，它會干硬的。
4645.pinyin: bùyào bǎ mántou fàng zài zhuōzi shàng tā huì gàn yìng de
4645.english: Don't leave that steamed bread on the table, it will dry out.

4646.simplified: 你得去上班了, 要不然就要失去这份工作了.
4646.traditional: 你得去上班了, 要不然就要失去這份工作了.
4646.pinyin: nǐ dé qù shàngbān le yàobùrán jiùyào shīqù zhè fèn gōngzuò le
4646.english: You must go to work or ,else you'll lose your job.

4647.simplified: 我们都同意他对政治形势的深刻分析。
4647.traditional: 我們都同意他對政治形勢的深刻分析。
4647.pinyin: wǒmen dōu tóngyì tā duì zhèngzhì xíngshì de shēnkè fēnxī
4647.english: We agreed with his acute analysis of the political situation.

4648.simplified: 一定要先看清小号字体印刷部分再签字.
4648.traditional: 一定要先看清小號字體印刷部分再簽字.
4648.pinyin: yīdìngyào xiān kànqīng xiǎohào zìtǐ yìnshuā bùfen zài qiānzì
4648.english: Make sure you read all the small print before signing.

4649.simplified: 植物从泥土中吸收矿物质和其他养料。
4649.traditional: 植物從泥土中吸收礦物質和其他養料。
4649.pinyin: zhíwù cóng nítǔ zhōng xīshōu kuàngwùzhì hé qítā yǎngliào
4649.english: Plants absorb minerals and other nutrients from the soil.

4650.simplified: 我想北极地区的人要比这里的少得多。
4650.traditional: 我想北極地區的人要比這裡的少得多。
4650.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng běijí dìqū de rén yào bǐ zhèlǐ de shǎo dé duō
4650.english: I guess there are much less people in the Arctic regions than here.

4651.simplified: 政府已答应采取措施来帮助失业者。
4651.traditional: 政府已答應采取措施來幫助失業者。
4651.pinyin: zhèngfǔ yǐ dāying cǎiqǔcuòshī lái bāngzhù shīyèzhě
4651.english: The government has promised to take measures to help the unemployed.

4652.simplified: 我们根据有效法律保护投资者的利益。
4652.traditional: 我們根據有效法律保護投資者的利益。
4652.pinyin: wǒmen gēnjù yǒuxiào fǎlǜ bǎohù tóuzīzhě de lìyì
4652.english: We protect the interests of investors by the legislation in effect.

4653.simplified: 抬起这只沉重的箱子要花费相当大的力气。
4653.traditional: 抬起這只沉重的箱子要花費相當大的力氣。
4653.pinyin: táiqǐ zhè zhǐ chénzhòng de xiāngzi yào huāfèi xiāngdāng dà de lìqi
4653.english: It's quite an effort to lift this heavy box.

4654.simplified: 在这种时候应大力反对如此浪费金钱。
4654.traditional: 在這種時候應大力反對如此浪費金錢。
4654.pinyin: zài zhèzhǒng shíhou yīng dàlì fǎnduì rúcǐ làngfèijīnqián
4654.english: Such waste of money should be deprecated at a time like this.

4655.simplified: 发明了印刷术后文化教育才得以普及。
4655.traditional: 發明了印刷術後文化教育才得以普及。
4655.pinyin: fāmíng le yìnshuāshù hòu wénhuà jiàoyù cái déyǐ pǔjí
4655.english: Mass literacy was only possible after the invention of printing.

4656.simplified: 几个孩子跟不上父母的步子，落在后面。
4656.traditional: 幾個孩子跟不上父母的步子，落在後面。
4656.pinyin: jǐge háizi gēnbushàng fùmǔ de bùzi luò zài hòumian
4656.english: A few young children are straggling along behind their parents.

4657.simplified: 你来之前先通知我，真是考虑得很周到。
4657.traditional: 你來之前先通知我，真是考慮得很周到。
4657.pinyin: nǐ lái zhīqián xiān tōngzhī wǒ zhēnshi kǎolǜ dehěn zhōudào
4657.english: It was thoughtful of you to warn me of your arrival.

4658.simplified: 供传阅的，流通的宣扬或发送给大批人的
4658.traditional: 供傳閱的，流通的宣揚或發送給大批人的
4658.pinyin: gōng chuányuè de liútōng de xuānyáng huò fāsòng gěi dàpī rén de
4658.english: Addressed or distributed to a large number of persons.

4659.simplified: 孩子们在游泳池里互相把对方按入水中。
4659.traditional: 孩子們在游泳池裡互相把對方按入水中。
4659.pinyin: háizimen zài yóuyǒngchí lǐ hùxiāng bǎ duìfāng àn rù shuǐ zhōng
4659.english: The children ducked each other in the swimming pool.

4660.simplified: 在考虑这一问题时，你应当抓住实质。
4660.traditional: 在考慮這一問題時，你應當抓住實質。
4660.pinyin: zài kǎolǜ zhè yī wèntí shí nǐ yīngdāng zhuāzhù shízhì
4660.english: In considering this problem, you should grasp its essentials.

4661.simplified: 战争带来的必然结果就是生产力下降。
4661.traditional: 戰爭帶來的必然結果就是生產力下降。
4661.pinyin: zhànzhēng dàilái de bìránjiéguǒ jiùshì shēngchǎnlì xiàjiàng
4661.english: The necessary outcome of a war is a fall in production.

4662.simplified: 我希望他不要将烟灰往地毯上乱弹。
4662.traditional: 我希望他不要將煙灰往地毯上亂彈。
4662.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng tā bùyào jiāng yānhuī wǎng dìtǎn shàng luàn tán
4662.english: I wish he would refrain from scattering his ash all over the carpet.

4663.simplified: 村子的礼堂专作举行庆典和会议之用.
4663.traditional: 村子的禮堂專作舉行慶典和會議之用.
4663.pinyin: cūnzi de lǐtáng zhuān zuò jǔxíng qìngdiǎn hé huìyì zhī yòng
4663.english: The village hall is given over to civic functions and meetings.

4664.simplified: 最后，我终于成功地让我的车子慢慢移动。
4664.traditional: 最後，我終於成功地讓我的車子慢慢移動。
4664.pinyin: zuìhòu wǒ zhōngyú chénggōng dì ràng wǒ de chēzi mànmàn yídòng
4664.english: At last I succeeded in getting my car moving slowly.

4665.simplified: 这棵树向那边倒下就会把那所房子压坏。
4665.traditional: 這棵樹向那邊倒下就會把那所房子壓壞。
4665.pinyin: zhè kē shù xiàng nàbian dǎoxià jiù huì bǎ nà suǒ fángzi yāhuài
4665.english: If the tree fall that way, it will destroy the house.

4666.simplified: 她意识到在所采用的方法中可能出错.
4666.traditional: 她意識到在所采用的方法中可能出錯.
4666.pinyin: tā yìshí dào zài suǒ cǎiyòng de fāngfǎ zhōng kěnéng chūcuò
4666.english: She recognized the potential for error in the method being used.

4667.simplified: 本阅览室的参考书不得私自带出。
4667.traditional: 本閱覽室的參考書不得私自帶出。
4667.pinyin: běn yuèlǎnshì de cānkǎoshū bùdé sīzì dài chū
4667.english: No reference books are to be taken out of the reading room without permission.

4668.simplified: 那个跳舞女郎在生人面前没一点紧张。
4668.traditional: 那個跳舞女郎在生人面前沒一點緊張。
4668.pinyin: nàge tiàowǔ nǚláng zài shēngrén miànqián méi yīdiǎn jǐnzhāng
4668.english: The dance girl is quite at home in front of strangers.

4669.simplified: 按学生人数, 我们应该建三个餐厅。
4669.traditional: 按學生人數, 我們應該建三個餐廳。
4669.pinyin: àn xuésheng rénshù wǒmen yīnggāi jiàn sān gè cāntīng
4669.english: In proportion to the number of students we should build 3 dining rooms.

4670.simplified: 他每次外出都会顺道去那家书店待一会儿。
4670.traditional: 他每次外出都會順道去那家書店待一會兒。
4670.pinyin: tā měicì wàichū dūhuì shùndào qù nà jiā shūdiàn dài yīhuìr
4670.english: He never goes out but he drops in at that bookstore.

4671.simplified: 亲爱的，把脸转过去，这场面不适合你看。
4671.traditional: 親愛的，把臉轉過去，這場面不適合你看。
4671.pinyin: qīn'ài de bǎ liǎn zhuàn guòqu zhè chǎngmiàn bù shìhé nǐ kàn
4671.english: Look away dear, the sight is not fit for your eyes.

4672.simplified: 全体居民都动员起来，防止森林火灾。
4672.traditional: 全體居民都動員起來，防止森林火災。
4672.pinyin: quántǐ jūmín dōu dòngyuán qilai fángzhǐ sēnlín huǒzāi
4672.english: The entire population was mobilized to watch for forest fires.

4673.simplified: 敌人的防线很坚强, 但仍为我军突破。
4673.traditional: 敵人的防線很堅強, 但仍為我軍突破。
4673.pinyin: dírén de fángxiàn hěn jiānqiáng dàn réng wéi wǒ jūn tūpò
4673.english: The enemy's defenses were strong but our soldiers broke through.

4674.simplified: 你收集到的大部分情报没有实用价值。
4674.traditional: 你收集到的大部分情報沒有實用價值。
4674.pinyin: nǐ shōují dào de dàbùfen qíngbào méiyǒu shíyòngjiàzhí
4674.english: Much of the information you have gleaned is of no practical use.

4675.simplified: 据目前情况看，我们不能按时完成任务了。
4675.traditional: 據目前情況看，我們不能按時完成任務了。
4675.pinyin: jù mùqián qíngkuàng kàn wǒmen bùnéng ànshí wánchéng rènwu le
4675.english: As things stand, we won't finish the job on time.

4676.simplified: 他演讲完又补充说了一些最新数字。
4676.traditional: 他演講完又補充說了一些最新數字。
4676.pinyin: tā yǎnjiǎng wán yòu bǔchōng shuō le yīxiē zuìxīn shùzì
4676.english: He added a brief postscript to his speech, giving the latest figures.

4677.simplified: 我要去购物，因为我需要买些日用品。
4677.traditional: 我要去購物，因為我需要買些日用品。
4677.pinyin: wǒ yào qù gòuwù yīnwèi wǒ xūyào mǎi xiē rìyòngpǐn
4677.english: I'm going shopping because I need to buy some daily necessities.

4678.simplified: 我认为能被邀请参加晚宴是很大的荣幸。
4678.traditional: 我認為能被邀請參加晚宴是很大的榮幸。
4678.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi néng bèi yāoqǐng cānjiā wǎnyàn shì hěn dà de róngxìng
4678.english: I consider it a great honor to be invited to dinner.

4679.simplified: 亲爱的，过街到那个商店去买些酱油。
4679.traditional: 親愛的，過街到那個商店去買些醬油。
4679.pinyin: qīn'ài de guò jiē dào nàge shāngdiàn qù mǎi xiē jiàngyóu
4679.english: My darling, come over the street to that shop to buy some soy.

4680.simplified: 他对于保健食品有他自己的一套奇怪的看法。
4680.traditional: 他對於保健食品有他自己的一套奇怪的看法。
4680.pinyin: tā duìyú bǎojiàn shípǐn yǒu tā zìjǐ de yītào qíguài de kànfǎ
4680.english: He has a bee in his bonnet about health foods.

4681.simplified: 轻型飞机飞行时起落架不一定缩回.
4681.traditional: 輕型飛機飛行時起落架不一定縮回.
4681.pinyin: qīngxíng fēijī fēixíng shí qǐluòjià bùyīdìng suō huí
4681.english: The undercarriage on light aircraft does not always retract in flight.

4682.simplified: 一个国际性的会议下月将在北京举行。
4682.traditional: 一個國際性的會議下月將在北京舉行。
4682.pinyin: yī gè guójìxìng de huìyì xiàyuè jiāng zài Běijīng jǔxíng
4682.english: An international conference will be held in Beijing next month.

4683.simplified: 他下决心每天要读一小时有益读物。
4683.traditional: 他下決心每天要讀一小時有益讀物。
4683.pinyin: tā xiàjuéxīn měitiān yào dú yī xiǎoshí yǒuyì dúwù
4683.english: He made a resolution to read something profitable for one hour every day.

4684.simplified: 我不知道这首歌的歌词, 但我可以哼给你听.
4684.traditional: 我不知道這首歌的歌詞, 但我可以哼給你聽.
4684.pinyin: wǒ bù zhīdào zhè shǒugē de gēcí dàn wǒ kěyǐ hēng gěi nǐ tīng
4684.english: I don't know the words of the song but I can hum it to you.

4685.simplified: 我认为我们对这一问题已差不多是言无不尽了.
4685.traditional: 我認為我們對這一問題已差不多是言無不盡了.
4685.pinyin: wǒ rènwéi wǒmen duì zhè yī wèntí yǐ chàbuduō shì yán wú bùjìn le
4685.english: I think we've just about exhausted that subject.

4686.simplified: 他的死对我们的工作来说是令人悲痛的损失。
4686.traditional: 他的死對我們的工作來說是令人悲痛的損失。
4686.pinyin: tā de sǐ duì wǒmen de gōngzuò láishuō shì lìngrén bēitòng de sǔnshī
4686.english: His death is a lamentable loss of our work.

4687.simplified: 他不会放弃任何机会以获得一份好工作。
4687.traditional: 他不會放棄任何機會以獲得一份好工作。
4687.pinyin: tā bùhuì fàngqì rènhé jīhuì yǐ huòdé yī fèn hǎo gōngzuò
4687.english: He will in no wise give up any chances to get a better job.

4688.simplified: 既然她病得厉害, 我们要马上去请医生。
4688.traditional: 既然她病得厲害, 我們要馬上去請醫生。
4688.pinyin: jìrán tā bìng dé lìhai wǒmen yào mǎshàng qù qǐng yīshēng
4688.english: Since she is seriously ill, we have to send for a doctor at once.

4689.simplified: 我发现有人用过我的牙刷，我很不高兴。
4689.traditional: 我發現有人用過我的牙刷，我很不高興。
4689.pinyin: wǒ fāxiàn yǒurén yòng guò wǒ de yáshuā wǒ hěn bù gāoxìng
4689.english: I am aggrieved to find that someone has used my toothbrush.

4690.simplified: 他不喜欢对他自己的所作所为作出解释。
4690.traditional: 他不喜歡對他自己的所作所為作出解釋。
4690.pinyin: tā bù xǐhuan duì tā zìjǐ de suǒzuòsuǒwéi zuòchū jiěshì
4690.english: He didn't relish the prospect of having to explain his behavior.

4691.simplified: 我们将怎样贯彻这个计划仍需要讨论。
4691.traditional: 我們將怎樣貫徹這個計劃仍需要討論。
4691.pinyin: wǒmen jiāng zěnyàng guànchè zhège jìhuà réng xūyào tǎolùn
4691.english: How we shall carry out this plan still needs to be discussed.

4692.simplified: 他选择了德国，而我个人倒更喜欢西班牙。
4692.traditional: 他選擇了德國，而我個人倒更喜歡西班牙。
4692.pinyin: tā xuǎnzé le Déguó ér wǒ gèrén dǎo gèng xǐhuan Xībānyá
4692.english: He chose Germany, but personally I'd prefer to go to Spain.

4693.simplified: 在我国, 一般人家里没有集中供热设备.
4693.traditional: 在我國, 一般人家裡沒有集中供熱設備.
4693.pinyin: zài wǒguó yībānrén jiālǐ méiyǒu jízhōng gōngrè shèbèi
4693.english: People don't have central heating in their houses in my country.

4694.simplified: 越来越多的大学生主修企业管理学。
4694.traditional: 越來越多的大學生主修企業管理學。
4694.pinyin: yuèláiyuè duō de dàxuéshēng zhǔxiū qǐyèguǎnlǐ xué
4694.english: More and more students are majoring in the science of business management.

4695.simplified: 她紧张地咽了一下，似乎那问题把她难住了。
4695.traditional: 她緊張地咽了一下，似乎那問題把她難住了。
4695.pinyin: tā jǐnzhāng dì yàn le yīxià sìhū nà wèntí bǎ tā nán zhù le
4695.english: She gulped nervously, as if the question bothered her.

4696.simplified: 许多妇女把她们的全部精力投入到职业中。
4696.traditional: 許多婦女把她們的全部精力投入到職業中。
4696.pinyin: xǔduō fùnǚ bǎ tāmen de quánbù jīnglì tóurù dào zhíyè zhōng
4696.english: Many women throw all of their energies into a career.

4697.simplified: 她离开小岛而在法国的大都市中成名。
4697.traditional: 她離開小島而在法國的大都市中成名。
4697.pinyin: tā líkāi xiǎodǎo ér zài Fǎguó de dàdūshì zhōng chéngmíng
4697.english: She left the small island and became famous in metropolitan France.

4698.simplified: 之后我们进一步巩固和扩大了我们的军队。
4698.traditional: 之後我們進一步鞏固和擴大了我們的軍隊。
4698.pinyin: zhīhòu wǒmen jìnyībù gǒnggù hé kuòdà le wǒmen de jūnduì
4698.english: After that we further consolidated and expanded our army.

4699.simplified: 当地画家将要在这个风景点举办展览。
4699.traditional: 當地畫家將要在這個風景點舉辦展覽。
4699.pinyin: dāngdì huàjiā jiāngyào zài zhège fēngjǐng diǎn jǔbàn zhǎnlǎn
4699.english: The local artists will hold an exhibition on the landmark.

4700.simplified: 这个案件中的动机与效果很难联系起来。
4700.traditional: 這個案件中的動機與效果很難聯系起來。
4700.pinyin: zhège ànjiàn zhòngdì dòngjī yǔ xiàoguǒ hěn nán liánxì qilai
4700.english: It is difficult to relate cause and effect in this case.

4701.simplified: 我们的教授要求他就这个课题写篇论文。
4701.traditional: 我們的教授要求他就這個課題寫篇論文。
4701.pinyin: wǒmen de jiàoshòu yāoqiú tā jiù zhège kètí xiě piān lùnwén
4701.english: Our professor asked him to write a treatise on the subject.

4702.simplified: 这个暖气系统有自动化的温度调节系统。
4702.traditional: 這個暖氣系統有自動化的溫度調節系統。
4702.pinyin: zhège nuǎnqì xìtǒng yǒu zìdònghuà de wēndù tiáojié xìtǒng
4702.english: This heating system has an automatic temperature control.

4703.simplified: 我们听他们讲述撒哈拉沙漠的生活经历。
4703.traditional: 我們聽他們講述撒哈拉沙漠的生活經歷。
4703.pinyin: wǒmen tīng tāmen jiǎngshù Sǎhālā Shāmò de shēnghuó jīnglì
4703.english: We listened to their tales about life in the Sahara Desert.

4704.simplified: 尽管早上起来头疼，我还是照常上班。
4704.traditional: 盡管早上起來頭疼，我還是照常上班。
4704.pinyin: jǐnguǎn zǎoshang qilai tóuténg wǒ háishi zhàocháng shàngbān
4704.english: Although I got up with a headache, I went to work as usual.

4705.simplified: 天黑了，我看不见这块石头上的碑文。
4705.traditional: 天黑了，我看不見這塊石頭上的碑文。
4705.pinyin: tiānhēi le wǒ kànbujiàn zhè kuài shítou shàng de bēiwén
4705.english: I can't read the inscription on this stone because it's getting dark.

4706.simplified: 你当众纠正我的错误, 弄得我很难为情.
4706.traditional: 你當眾糾正我的錯誤, 弄得我很難為情.
4706.pinyin: nǐ dāngzhòng jiūzhèng wǒ de cuòwù nòng dé wǒ hěn nánwéiqíng
4706.english: You made me look so small, correcting me in front of everybody.

4707.simplified: 我这是信口开河，随便谈谈脑子里想的东西。
4707.traditional: 我這是信口開河，隨便談談腦子裡想的東西。
4707.pinyin: wǒ zhè shì xìnkǒukāihé suíbiàn tántán nǎozi lǐ xiǎng de dōngxi
4707.english: I'm talking offhand, simply speaking my mind.

4708.simplified: 在他到达车间之前，机器已经开动了。
4708.traditional: 在他到達車間之前，機器已經開動了。
4708.pinyin: zài tā dàodá chējiān zhīqián jīqì yǐjīng kāidòng le
4708.english: Before he gets to the workshop, the machine has been put in motion.

4709.simplified: 这些式样均可改动以适应个人不同的爱好.
4709.traditional: 這些式樣均可改動以適應個人不同的愛好.
4709.pinyin: zhèxiē shìyàng jūnkě gǎidòng yǐ shìyìng gèrén bùtóng de àihào
4709.english: These styles can be adapted to suit individual tastes.

4710.simplified: 他与世隔绝一个月，力图把功课赶上去。
4710.traditional: 他與世隔絕一個月，力圖把功課趕上去。
4710.pinyin: tā yǔshìgéjué yī gè yuè lìtú bǎ gōngkè gǎn shàngqù
4710.english: He shut himself away for a month to catch up on his academic work.

4711.simplified: 商店趁一时缺货而提高价格从中获利。
4711.traditional: 商店趁一時缺貨而提高價格從中獲利。
4711.pinyin: shāngdiàn chèn yīshí quēhuò ér tígāo jiàgé cóngzhōng huòlì
4711.english: The shop is cashed in on temporary shortage by raising price.

4712.simplified: 他以自己的名字命名的冷冻食品成了名牌。
4712.traditional: 他以自己的名字命名的冷凍食品成了名牌。
4712.pinyin: tā yǐ zìjǐ de míngzi mìngmíng de lěngdòng shípǐn chéngle míngpái
4712.english: He gave his name to a well-known brand of frozen food.

4713.simplified: 要准时来，否则你会给人一个坏的印象。
4713.traditional: 要准時來，否則你會給人一個壞的印象。
4713.pinyin: yào zhǔnshí lái fǒuzé nǐ huì gěi rén yī gè huài de yìnxiàng
4713.english: Be there on time, otherwise you'll create a bad impression.

4714.simplified: 我那时正沿著大街向北去, 走著走著....
4714.traditional: 我那時正沿著大街向北去, 走著走著....
4714.pinyin: wǒ nàshí zhèng yánzhe dàjiē xiàngběi qù zǒu zhe zǒu zhe
4714.english: I was proceeding along the High Street in a northerly direction when...

4715.simplified: 这段时间的失业人数又达到了创纪录水平。
4715.traditional: 這段時間的失業人數又達到了創紀錄水平。
4715.pinyin: zhè duàn shíjiān de shīyè rénshù yòu dá dàoliǎo chuàngjìlù shuǐpíng
4715.english: In this period, unemployment reaches record levels.

4716.simplified: 政府不应浪费资金去扶持那些无望的企业.
4716.traditional: 政府不應浪費資金去扶持那些無望的企業.
4716.pinyin: zhèngfǔ bù yīng làngfèi zījīn qù fúchí nàxiē wúwàng de qǐyè
4716.english: The government should not waste money supporting lame ducks.

4717.simplified: 他对他的母亲的敬爱给了我深刻的印象。
4717.traditional: 他對他的母親的敬愛給了我深刻的印象。
4717.pinyin: tā duì tā de mǔqīn de jìng'ài gěi le wǒ shēnkè de yìnxiàng
4717.english: He pressed me profound in his respecting and loving to his mother.

4718.simplified: 在编写这本书的过程中，她起了显著的作用。
4718.traditional: 在編寫這本書的過程中，她起了顯著的作用。
4718.pinyin: zài biānxiě zhè běn shū de guòchéng zhōng tā qǐ le xiǎnzhù de zuòyòng
4718.english: She play a notable role in compile the book.

4719.simplified: 任何人碰到那根电线都会遭到严重的电击。
4719.traditional: 任何人碰到那根電線都會遭到嚴重的電擊。
4719.pinyin: rènhé rén pèngdào nà gēn diànxiàn dūhuì zāodào yánzhòng de diànjī
4719.english: Anyone touching that wire could get badly shocked.

4720.simplified: 他们针对我们的建议提出了一项相反的建议.
4720.traditional: 他們針對我們的建議提出了一項相反的建議.
4720.pinyin: tāmen zhēnduì wǒmen de jiànyì tíchū le yī xiàng xiāngfǎn de jiànyì
4720.english: They countered our proposal with one of their own.

4721.simplified: 局长坐在桌子一端她惯常坐的位置上。
4721.traditional: 局長坐在桌子一端她慣常坐的位置上。
4721.pinyin: júzhǎng zuò zài zhuōzi yī duān tā guàncháng zuò de wèizhi shàng
4721.english: The director took her accustomed place at the end of the table.

4722.simplified: 紫禁城是世界上最伟大的建筑之一。
4722.traditional: 紫禁城是世界上最偉大的建築之一。
4722.pinyin: Zǐjìnchéng shì shìjiè shàng zuì wěidà de jiànzhù zhīyī
4722.english: The Forbidden City is one of the world's greatest works of architecture.

4723.simplified: 相声这种艺术形式让老百姓喜闻乐见。
4723.traditional: 相聲這種藝術形式讓老百姓喜聞樂見。
4723.pinyin: xiàngsheng zhèzhǒng yìshù xíngshì ràng lǎobǎixìng xǐwénlèjiàn
4723.english: Cross talks are an art form people love to see and hear.

4724.simplified: 这场革命把国家引上了通往民主的道路。
4724.traditional: 這場革命把國家引上了通往民主的道路。
4724.pinyin: zhè chǎng gémìng bǎ guójiā yǐn shàng le tōngwǎng mínzhǔ de dàolù
4724.english: The revolution set the country on the road to democracy.

4725.simplified: 动物园里的动物不是生活在自然环境中。
4725.traditional: 動物園裡的動物不是生活在自然環境中。
4725.pinyin: dòngwùyuán lǐ de dòngwù bùshì shēnghuó zài zìrán huánjìng zhōng
4725.english: Animals in zoos are not in their natural surroundings.

4726.simplified: 咱们打个比方吧, 有个某某先生来旅馆登记.
4726.traditional: 咱們打個比方吧, 有個某某先生來旅館登記.
4726.pinyin: zánmen dǎ gè bǐfang ba yǒu gè mǒumǒu xiānsheng lái lǚguǎn dēngjì
4726.english: Let's suppose a Mr So-and-so registers at the hotel.

4727.simplified: 老师的办公室里堆满了大批不同的论文。
4727.traditional: 老師的辦公室裡堆滿了大批不同的論文。
4727.pinyin: lǎoshī de bàngōngshì lǐ duīmǎn le dàpī bùtóng de lùnwén
4727.english: There is a heterogeneous mass of papers in the teacher's office.

4728.simplified: 她即使在最糟糕的时候也总是非常乐观.
4728.traditional: 她即使在最糟糕的時候也總是非常樂觀.
4728.pinyin: tā jíshǐ zài zuì zāogāo de shíhou yě zǒngshì fēicháng lèguān
4728.english: She was always optimistic, even when things were at their worst.

4729.simplified: 他老爱说大话，就仿佛他是一位要人似的。
4729.traditional: 他老愛說大話，就仿佛他是一位要人似的。
4729.pinyin: tā lǎo ài shuō dà huà jiù fǎngfú tā shì yī wèi yàorén shìde
4729.english: He likes to talk big as though he was an important person.

4730.simplified: 你在这样弱的光线下看书会损伤视力的。
4730.traditional: 你在這樣弱的光線下看書會損傷視力的。
4730.pinyin: nǐ zài zhèyàng ruò de guāngxiàn xià kànshū huì sǔnshāng shìlì de
4730.english: You will strain your eyes by reading in such poor light.

4731.simplified: 那位勇敢的人冒著生命危险试图救那孩子。
4731.traditional: 那位勇敢的人冒著生命危險試圖救那孩子。
4731.pinyin: nà wèi yǒnggǎn de rén màozhe shēngmìng wēixiǎn shìtú jiù nà háizi
4731.english: The brave man risk his life in trying to save the child.

4732.simplified: 政府已经采取了措施以确保物价稳定。
4732.traditional: 政府已經采取了措施以確保物價穩定。
4732.pinyin: zhèngfǔ yǐjīng cǎiqǔ le cuòshī yǐ quèbǎo wùjià wěndìng
4732.english: The government has taken a measure to maintain the stability of prices.

4733.simplified: 我不计较价钱，只要车很好用就行了。
4733.traditional: 我不計較價錢，只要車很好用就行了。
4733.pinyin: wǒ bùjì jiào jiàqian zhǐyào chē hěn hǎoyòng jiù xíng le
4733.english: I don't care about the price, so long as the car is in good condition.

4734.simplified: 这个小女孩太可爱了，我把她叫做小精灵。
4734.traditional: 這個小女孩太可愛了，我把她叫做小精靈。
4734.pinyin: zhège xiǎo nǚhái tài kě'ài le wǒ bǎ tā jiàozuò xiǎojīnglíng
4734.english: The little girl is so lovely that I call her a sprite.

4735.simplified: 我们未来的计划必须与当前的实际相结合。
4735.traditional: 我們未來的計劃必須與當前的實際相結合。
4735.pinyin: wǒmen wèilái de jìhuà bìxū yǔ dāngqián de shíjì xiāng jiéhé
4735.english: Our future plans have to mesh with the present practices.

4736.simplified: 这些价值对于我们的生活方式是至关重要的。
4736.traditional: 這些價值對於我們的生活方式是至關重要的。
4736.pinyin: zhèxiē jiàzhí duìyú wǒmen de shēnghuófāngshì shì zhìguānzhòngyào de
4736.english: Such values are central to our way of life.

4737.simplified: 金钱正在被更直接地用来取代某种东西。
4737.traditional: 金錢正在被更直接地用來取代某種東西。
4737.pinyin: jīnqián zhèngzài bèi gèng zhíjiē dì yònglái qǔdài mǒuzhǒng dōngxi
4737.english: Money is being used in place of something more direct.

4738.simplified: 我将继续工作直到我得到相反的命令。
4738.traditional: 我將繼續工作直到我得到相反的命令。
4738.pinyin: wǒ jiāng jìxù gōngzuò zhídào wǒ dédào xiāngfǎn de mìnglìng
4738.english: I will go on with my work unless I get the order to the contrary.

4739.simplified: 要洗的衣物须称过重量再放入洗衣机中.
4739.traditional: 要洗的衣物須稱過重量再放入洗衣機中.
4739.pinyin: yào xǐ de yīwù xū chēng guò zhòngliàng zài fàng rù xǐyījī zhōng
4739.english: The load must be weighed before it is put in the washing-machine.

4740.simplified: 这些情况不利于公司的进一步发展。
4740.traditional: 這些情況不利於公司的進一步發展。
4740.pinyin: zhèxiē qíngkuàng bùlì yú gōngsī de jìnyībù fāzhǎn
4740.english: The circumstances were not propitious for further expansion of the company.

4741.simplified: 我这次就原谅你,你可不许再犯错误。
4741.traditional: 我這次就原諒你,你可不許再犯錯誤。
4741.pinyin: wǒ zhè cì jiù yuánliàng nǐ nǐ kě bùxǔ zàifàn cuòwù
4741.english: I'll forgive you this time, but you shall by no means make the mistake again.

4742.simplified: 这次他欺骗了我, 但总有一天我会报复他的。
4742.traditional: 這次他欺騙了我, 但總有一天我會報復他的。
4742.pinyin: zhè cì tā qīpiàn le wǒ dàn zǒngyǒu yī tiān wǒ huì bàofù tā de
4742.english: He tricked me this time but I'll get back at him one day.

4743.simplified: 这座教堂是中世纪建筑风格的典型实例。
4743.traditional: 這座教堂是中世紀建築風格的典型實例。
4743.pinyin: zhè zuò jiàotáng shì zhōngshìjì jiànzhù fēnggé de diǎnxíng shílì
4743.english: This church is a classic example of medieval architecture.

4744.simplified: 我建议你不要和那个不诚实的商人合作。
4744.traditional: 我建議你不要和那個不誠實的商人合作。
4744.pinyin: wǒ jiànyì nǐ bùyào hé nàge bùchéngshí de shāngrén hézuò
4744.english: I advise you not to cooperate with that deceitful businessman.

4745.simplified: 他们自信地等待我自己发现事实真相。
4745.traditional: 他們自信地等待我自己發現事實真相。
4745.pinyin: tāmen zìxìn dì děngdài wǒ zìjǐ fāxiàn shìshí zhēnxiàng
4745.english: They were waiting with assurance for me to discover the truth for myself.

4746.simplified: 据预报说今天的空气湿度是百分之六十。
4746.traditional: 據預報說今天的空氣濕度是百分之六十。
4746.pinyin: jù yùbào shuō jīntiān de kōngqì shīdù shì bǎifēnzhī liùshí
4746.english: It's said by forecast that the humidity in the air today is 60%.

4747.simplified: 我们可以根据你的特殊需要设计保险单。
4747.traditional: 我們可以根據你的特殊需要設計保險單。
4747.pinyin: wǒmen kěyǐ gēnjù nǐ de tèshū xūyào shèjì bǎoxiǎndān
4747.english: We can tailor the insurance policy according to your special needs.

4748.simplified: 我们班的学生比他们班的那些更不积极。
4748.traditional: 我們班的學生比他們班的那些更不積極。
4748.pinyin: wǒmen bān de xuésheng bǐ tāmen bān de nàxiē gèng bù jījí
4748.english: The student of our class is not positively than those of their class.

4749.simplified: 简伸长脖子张望，在人群中找她的母亲。
4749.traditional: 簡伸長脖子張望，在人群中找她的母親。
4749.pinyin: jiǎn shēncháng bózi zhāngwàng zài rénqún zhōng zhǎo tā de mǔqīn
4749.english: Jane craned her neck to look for her mother in the crowd.

4750.simplified: 她显然丝毫也不顾及别人以及别人的感情.
4750.traditional: 她顯然絲毫也不顧及別人以及別人的感情.
4750.pinyin: tā xiǎnrán sīháo yě bù gùjí biéren yǐjí biéren de gǎnqíng
4750.english: She shows a total disregard for other people and their feelings.

4751.simplified: 总统有六名警卫员时时刻刻在左右保卫.
4751.traditional: 總統有六名警衛員時時刻刻在左右保衛.
4751.pinyin: zǒngtǒng yǒu liù míng jǐngwèi yuán shíshíkèkè zài zuǒyòu bǎowèi
4751.english: The President always has six bodyguards in close attendance.

4752.simplified: 服用药片很容易, 只须放在口中咽下即可.
4752.traditional: 服用藥片很容易, 只須放在口中咽下即可.
4752.pinyin: fúyòng yàopiàn hěn róngyì zhǐ xū fàng zài kǒu zhōng yànxià jíkě
4752.english: Taking pills is easy; just put them in your mouth and swallow.

4753.simplified: 我们为这一项目付出了大量的时间和精力.
4753.traditional: 我們為這一項目付出了大量的時間和精力.
4753.pinyin: wǒmen wéi zhè yī xiàngmù fùchū le dàliàng de shíjiān hé jīnglì
4753.english: We've put a great deal of time and effort into this project.

4754.simplified: 完成这个工程花费了他们十亿多美元。
4754.traditional: 完成這個工程花費了他們十億多美元。
4754.pinyin: wánchéng zhège gōngchéng huāfèi le tāmen shíyì duō Měiyuán
4754.english: It took them more than one billion dollars to complete the project.

4755.simplified: 合同中有一条款禁止承租人转租房屋。
4755.traditional: 合同中有一條款禁止承租人轉租房屋。
4755.pinyin: hétong zhōng yǒu yī tiáokuǎn jìnzhǐ chéngzūrén zhuǎnzū fángwū
4755.english: There is a clause in the contract forbidding tenants to sublet.

4756.simplified: 我最诚恳地请求你重新考虑一下你的立场.
4756.traditional: 我最誠懇地請求你重新考慮一下你的立場.
4756.pinyin: wǒ zuì chéngkěn dì qǐngqiú nǐ chóngxīn kǎolǜ yīxià nǐ de lìchǎng
4756.english: I conjure you most earnestly to reconsider your position.

4757.simplified: 她放弃职业结婚以后有一种失落感。
4757.traditional: 她放棄職業結婚以後有一種失落感。
4757.pinyin: tā fàngqì zhíyè jiéhūn yǐhòu yǒu yīzhǒng shīluò gǎn
4757.english: She experienced a loss of identity after giving up her career to get married.

4758.simplified: 爱你的敌人吧，因为他们让你知道自己的缺点。
4758.traditional: 愛你的敵人吧，因為他們讓你知道自己的缺點。
4758.pinyin: ài nǐ de dírén ba yīnwèi tāmen ràng nǐ zhīdào zìjǐ de quēdiǎn
4758.english: Love your enemies, for they tell you your faults.

4759.simplified: 运动和身体的关系，如同思考和头脑的关系。
4759.traditional: 運動和身體的關系，如同思考和頭腦的關系。
4759.pinyin: yùndòng hé shēntǐ de guānxi rútóng sīkǎo hé tóunǎo de guānxi
4759.english: Exercise is to the body what thinking is to the brain.

4760.simplified: 我们的电动汽车是一项令人鼓舞的新发明.
4760.traditional: 我們的電動汽車是一項令人鼓舞的新發明.
4760.pinyin: wǒmen de diàndòng qìchē shì yī xiàng lìngréngǔwǔ de xīn fāmíng
4760.english: Our electrically-powered car is an exciting new development.

4761.simplified: 他不仅以才能出名，而且是出名的好心。
4761.traditional: 他不僅以才能出名，而且是出名的好心。
4761.pinyin: tā bùjǐn yǐ cáinéng chūmíng érqiě shì chūmíng de hǎoxīn
4761.english: He is famous not only for his talent but (also) for his kindness.

4762.simplified: 庄园周围有一堵高墙, 使他们不受外界打扰.
4762.traditional: 莊園周圍有一堵高牆, 使他們不受外界打擾.
4762.pinyin: zhuāngyuán zhōuwéi yǒu yī dǔ gāo qiáng shǐ tāmen bù shòu wàijiè dǎrǎo
4762.english: A high wall round the estate protected their privacy.

4763.simplified: 汽车展览会上展出了今年所有的新型号。
4763.traditional: 汽車展覽會上展出了今年所有的新型號。
4763.pinyin: qìchēzhǎnlǎnhuì shàng zhǎnchū le jīnnián suǒyǒu de xīnxíng hào
4763.english: All this year's new models are displayed at the motor show.

4764.simplified: 电视观众来信表示对当前节目不满.
4764.traditional: 電視觀眾來信表示對當前節目不滿.
4764.pinyin: diànshì guānzhòng láixìn biǎoshì duì dāngqián jiémù bùmǎn
4764.english: Letters from viewers express their dissatisfaction with current programmes.

4765.simplified: 一般而论这家新闻社的工作是让人感激的。
4765.traditional: 一般而論這家新聞社的工作是讓人感激的。
4765.pinyin: yībān ér lùn zhè jiā xīnwén shè de gōngzuò shì ràng rén gǎnjī de
4765.english: By and large the work of the news agency is appreciative.

4766.simplified: 她的歌声优美，此外，她的舞也跳得不错。
4766.traditional: 她的歌聲優美，此外，她的舞也跳得不錯。
4766.pinyin: tā de gēshēng yōuměi cǐwài tā de wǔ yě tiào dé bùcuò
4766.english: She sings beautifully; what is (far) better/more, she dances well.

4767.simplified: 那件紧身套头毛衣反更突出了他那肥胖的肚子.
4767.traditional: 那件緊身套頭毛衣反更突出了他那肥胖的肚子.
4767.pinyin: nà jiàn jǐnshēn tào tóu máoyī fǎn gèng tūchū le tā nà féipàng de dùzi
4767.english: The tight jumper only accentuated his fat stomach.

4768.simplified: 诗人表达了他对所爱的女子火一般的激情。
4768.traditional: 詩人表達了他對所愛的女子火一般的激情。
4768.pinyin: shīrén biǎodá le tā duì suǒ ài de nǚzǐ huǒ yībān de jīqíng
4768.english: The poet expressed his burning passion for the woman he loved.

4769.simplified: 为发展业务, 我们决定开一家分公司。
4769.traditional: 為發展業務, 我們決定開一家分公司。
4769.pinyin: wéi fāzhǎn yèwù wǒmen juédìng kāi yījiā fēngōngsī
4769.english: With a view to develop our business, we decided to establish a branch office.

4770.simplified: 这个国家的经济在很大程度上依靠其旅游业。
4770.traditional: 這個國家的經濟在很大程度上依靠其旅游業。
4770.pinyin: zhège guójiā de jīngjì zài hěn dà chéngdù shàng yīkào qí lǚyóuyè
4770.english: The country depends heavily on its tourist trade.

4771.simplified: 没表示否定, 其含义可能理解为是肯定的.
4771.traditional: 沒表示否定, 其含義可能理解為是肯定的.
4771.pinyin: méi biǎoshì fǒudìng qí hányì kěnéng lǐjiě wéi shì kěndìng de
4771.english: Failure to say `No' may, by implication, be taken to mean `Yes'.

4772.simplified: 在运输系统中，铁路的重要性逐渐下降。
4772.traditional: 在運輸系統中，鐵路的重要性逐漸下降。
4772.pinyin: zài yùnshū xìtǒng zhōng tiělù de zhòngyàoxìng zhújiàn xiàjiàng
4772.english: The role of the railways declined in the transport system.

4773.simplified: 每个星期五下班后，他去看望年迈的父母。
4773.traditional: 每個星期五下班後，他去看望年邁的父母。
4773.pinyin: měi gè Xīngqīwǔ xiàbān hòu tā qù kànwàng niánmài de fùmǔ
4773.english: He comes to visit his aged parents after work on every Friday.

4774.simplified: 我得大嚷大叫别人才能听见，我为此十分不快。
4774.traditional: 我得大嚷大叫別人才能聽見，我為此十分不快。
4774.pinyin: wǒ dé dà rǎng dà jiào biéren cáinéng tīngjiàn wǒ wèicǐ shífēn bùkuài
4774.english: It irritated me to have to shout to be heard.

4775.simplified: 最近供暖设备已稍加改动以提高效率.
4775.traditional: 最近供暖設備已稍加改動以提高效率.
4775.pinyin: zuìjìn gōng nuǎn shèbèi yǐ shāo jiā gǎidòng yǐ tígāo xiàolǜ
4775.english: The heating system has recently been modified to make it more efficient.

4776.simplified: 这三个人根据各自的能力被分配了工作。
4776.traditional: 這三個人根據各自的能力被分配了工作。
4776.pinyin: zhè sān gèrén gēnjù gèzì de nénglì bèi fēnpèi le gōngzuò
4776.english: The three men were given work according to their respective abilities.

4777.simplified: 这会引起污染，破坏我们的海洋和江河。
4777.traditional: 這會引起污染，破壞我們的海洋和江河。
4777.pinyin: zhè huì yǐnqǐ wūrǎn pòhuài wǒmen de hǎiyáng hé jiānghé
4777.english: It will cause pollution and the destruction of our seas and oceans.
