4778.simplified: 这些蔬菜煮的时间太长了，都煮成糊了。
4778.traditional: 這些蔬菜煮的時間太長了，都煮成糊了。
4778.pinyin: zhèxiē shūcài zhǔ de shíjiān tài cháng le dōu zhǔ chéng hú le
4778.english: These vegetables have been boiling too long; they're cooked to a pulp.

4779.simplified: 他们邀请我们将来到那里时去他们家做客.
4779.traditional: 他們邀請我們將來到那裡時去他們家做客.
4779.pinyin: tāmen yāoqǐng wǒmen jiāng láidào nàli shí qù tāmen jiā zuòkè
4779.english: We have a standing invitation to visit them when we're in the area.

4780.simplified: 表否定的将一个词的意义由肯定变为否定的
4780.traditional: 表否定的將一個詞的意義由肯定變為否定的
4780.pinyin: biǎo fǒudìng de jiāng yī gè cí de yìyì yóu kěndìng biànwéi fǒudìng de
4780.english: Altering the meaning of a term from positive to negative.

4781.simplified: 那项政策经修改后才获得委员会同意。
4781.traditional: 那項政策經修改後才獲得委員會同意。
4781.pinyin: nà xiàng zhèngcè jīng xiūgǎi hòu cái huòdé wěiyuánhuì tóngyì
4781.english: The policy was agreed by the committee, but only in a modified form.

4782.simplified: 法律面前人人平等是被认为理所当然的。
4782.traditional: 法律面前人人平等是被認為理所當然的。
4782.pinyin: fǎlǜ miànqián rénrén píngděng shì bèi rènwéi lǐsuǒdāngrán de
4782.english: It is taken for granted that everyone is equal before the law.

4783.simplified: 那个流浪者把所有的东西捆成一包背在背上.
4783.traditional: 那個流浪者把所有的東西捆成一包背在背上.
4783.pinyin: nàge liúlàngzhě bǎ suǒyǒu de dōngxi kǔn chéng yī bāo bèi zài bèi shàng
4783.english: The tramp carried his belongings in a pack on his back.

4784.simplified: 无限的耐心使她成为这个医院最好的护士。
4784.traditional: 無限的耐心使她成為這個醫院最好的護士。
4784.pinyin: wúxiàn de nàixīn shǐ tā chéngwéi zhège yīyuàn zuìhǎo de hùshi
4784.english: Her endless patience made her the best nurse in the hospital.

4785.simplified: 文化交流是国与国之间建立联系的桥梁.
4785.traditional: 文化交流是國與國之間建立聯系的橋梁.
4785.pinyin: wénhuàjiāoliú shì guó yǔ guó zhījiān jiànlì liánxì de qiáoliáng
4785.english: Cultural exchanges are a way of building bridges between nations.

4786.simplified: 虽然任务艰巨，他们还是设法及时完成。
4786.traditional: 雖然任務艱巨，他們還是設法及時完成。
4786.pinyin: suīrán rènwu jiānjù tāmen háishi shèfǎ jíshí wánchéng
4786.english: Difficult though the task was, they managed to accomplish it in time.

4787.simplified: 我们将按照历史上的先后顺序研究这些事件。
4787.traditional: 我們將按照歷史上的先後順序研究這些事件。
4787.pinyin: wǒmen jiāng ànzhào lìshǐshàng de xiānhòushùnxù yánjiū zhèxiē shìjiàn
4787.english: We will deal with events in historical sequence.

4788.simplified: 印刷术的发明在社会上引起了重大的变化.
4788.traditional: 印刷術的發明在社會上引起了重大的變化.
4788.pinyin: yìnshuāshù de fāmíng zài shèhuì shàng yǐnqǐ le zhòngdà de biànhuà
4788.english: The invention of printing caused important changes in society.

4789.simplified: 从他最近的表现来看，他应该很容易考及格。
4789.traditional: 從他最近的表現來看，他應該很容易考及格。
4789.pinyin: cóng tā zuìjìn de biǎoxiàn láikàn tā yīnggāi hěn róngyì kǎo jígé
4789.english: Judge by recent form, he shall easily pass the exam.

4790.simplified: 她发觉退休后很难建立起新的生活规律。
4790.traditional: 她發覺退休後很難建立起新的生活規律。
4790.pinyin: tā fājué tuìxiū hòu hěn nán jiànlì qǐ xīn de shēnghuó guīlǜ
4790.english: She found it difficult to establish a new routine after retirement.

4791.simplified: 这个模型是由球和杆组成的结构, 样子很奇特.
4791.traditional: 這個模型是由球和桿組成的結構, 樣子很奇特.
4791.pinyin: zhège móxíng shì yóu qiú hé gān zǔchéng de jiégòu yàngzi hěn qítè
4791.english: The model is an odd-looking structure of balls and rods.

4792.simplified: 有些教师觉得课堂秩序很难维持.
4792.traditional: 有些教師覺得課堂秩序很難維持.
4792.pinyin: yǒuxiē jiàoshī juéde kètáng zhìxù hěn nán wéichí
4792.english: Some teachers find it difficult to keep order in their classes/to keep their classes in order.

4793.simplified: 她假装很喜欢他们，借以获得他们的帮助。
4793.traditional: 她假裝很喜歡他們，借以獲得他們的幫助。
4793.pinyin: tā jiǎzhuāng hěn xǐhuan tāmen jièyǐ huòdé tāmen de bāngzhù
4793.english: She pretends that she likes them so that she can get their help.

4794.simplified: 青春期对人的性格形成是非常重要的。
4794.traditional: 青春期對人的性格形成是非常重要的。
4794.pinyin: qīngchūnqī duì rén de xìnggé xíngchéng shì fēicháng zhòngyào de
4794.english: The period of adolescence is very important in forming one's character.

4795.simplified: 这两个国家因为外交争端即将开战。
4795.traditional: 這兩個國家因為外交爭端即將開戰。
4795.pinyin: qīngchūnqī duì rén de xìnggé xíngchéng shì fēicháng zhòngyào de
4795.english: The two countries were on the point of war due to the diplomatic disputes.

4796.simplified: 这个男孩下定决心成为一个优秀的建筑师。
4796.traditional: 這個男孩下定決心成為一個優秀的建築師。
4796.pinyin: zhège nánhái xiàdìngjuéxīn chéngwéi yī gè yōuxiù de jiànzhùshī
4796.english: The boy made up his mind to become an excellent architect.

4797.simplified: 在离开办公室之前, 应把所有物品摆放好。
4797.traditional: 在離開辦公室之前, 應把所有物品擺放好。
4797.pinyin: zài líkāi bàngōngshì zhīqián yīng bǎ suǒyǒu wùpǐn bǎifàng hǎo
4797.english: Before you leave the office, everything should be put in place.

4798.simplified: 我算是放了暑假了, 但却未能真正休息.
4798.traditional: 我算是放了暑假了, 但卻未能真正休息.
4798.pinyin: wǒ suànshì fàng le shǔjià le dàn què wèinéng zhēnzhèng xiūxi
4798.english: I had a kind of/sort of holiday in the summer but I couldn't really relax.

4799.simplified: 他喜欢深入研读他所选定的任何一门学科。
4799.traditional: 他喜歡深入研讀他所選定的任何一門學科。
4799.pinyin: tā xǐhuan shēnrù yándú tā suǒ xuǎndìng de rènhé yī mén xuékē
4799.english: He likes to read deeply in any subject that he chooses to study.

4800.simplified: 这种冒险成分更给探险活动平添几分乐趣.
4800.traditional: 這種冒險成分更給探險活動平添幾分樂趣.
4800.pinyin: zhèzhǒng màoxiǎn chéngfèn gèng gěi tànxiǎn huódòng píng tiān jǐfēn lèqù
4800.english: The element of risk gave (an) added zest to the adventure.

4801.simplified: 他总是到处乱闯，直到我叫他停才停了下来。
4801.traditional: 他總是到處亂闖，直到我叫他停才停了下來。
4801.pinyin: tā zǒngshì dàochù luàn chuǎng zhídào wǒ jiào tā tíng cái tíng le xiàlai
4801.english: He kept on barging about until I told him to stop.

4802.simplified: 我曾想带他去钓鱼，但我不好意思对他开口。
4802.traditional: 我曾想帶他去釣魚，但我不好意思對他開口。
4802.pinyin: wǒ céng xiǎng dài tā qù diàoyú dàn wǒ bùhǎoyìsi duì tā kāikǒu
4802.english: I wanted to take him fishing but I was too timid to ask him.

4803.simplified: 我真想说一句, 叫他们谈话放严肃些....
4803.traditional: 我真想說一句, 叫他們談話放嚴肅些....
4803.pinyin: wǒ zhēn xiǎng shuō yījù jiào tāmen tánhuà fàng yánsù xiē
4803.english: If I could intrude a note of seriousness into this frivolous conversation...

4804.simplified: 草案初步的草案或计划，如工程或建议的草案
4804.traditional: 草案初步的草案或計劃，如工程或建議的草案
4804.pinyin: cǎo'àn chūbù de cǎo'àn huò jìhuà rú gōngchéng huò jiànyì de cǎo'àn
4804.english: A preliminary draft or plan, as of a project or proposal.

4805.simplified: 某位哲学家认为, 存在的事物都是合理的。
4805.traditional: 某位哲學家認為, 存在的事物都是合理的。
4805.pinyin: mǒu wèi zhéxuéjiā rènwéi cúnzài de shìwù dōu shì hélǐ de
4805.english: According to some philosopher, everything in existence is reasonable.

4806.simplified: 他的设想很好, 但实行起来却糟糕透顶.
4806.traditional: 他的設想很好, 但實行起來卻糟糕透頂.
4806.pinyin: tā de shèxiǎng hěn hǎo dàn shíxíng qilai què zāogāo tòudǐng
4806.english: His original idea was good, but his execution of the scheme was disastrous.

4807.simplified: 你不能穿那种衣服出席招待会--不太庄重.
4807.traditional: 你不能穿那種衣服出席招待會--不太莊重.
4807.pinyin: nǐ bùnéng chuān nàzhǒng yīfu chūxí zhāodàihuì bù tài zhuāngzhòng
4807.english: You can't wear that to the reception it's not dressy enough.

4808.simplified: 在今日的交易中, 日元已升值到历史的最高水平.
4808.traditional: 在今日的交易中, 日元已升值到歷史的最高水平.
4808.pinyin: zài jīnrì de jiāoyì zhōng Rìyuán yǐ shēngzhí dào lìshǐ de zuì gāo shuǐpíng
4808.english: The yen hit a record high in trading today.

4809.simplified: 经过多月的努力, 这本新书渐渐像个样子了.
4809.traditional: 經過多月的努力, 這本新書漸漸像個樣子了.
4809.pinyin: jīngguò duō yuè de nǔlì zhè běn xīn shū jiànjiàn xiàng gè yàngzi le
4809.english: After months of work, the new book is gradually taking shape.

4810.simplified: 他是她的私人秘书, 能接触到她所有的信件.
4810.traditional: 他是她的私人秘書, 能接觸到她所有的信件.
4810.pinyin: tā shì tā de sīrén mìshū néng jiēchù dào tā suǒyǒu de xìnjiàn
4810.english: As her private secretary he has access to all her correspondence.

4811.simplified: 仔细研究市场情况是取得成功的先决条件.
4811.traditional: 仔細研究市場情況是取得成功的先決條件.
4811.pinyin: zǐxì yánjiū shìchǎng qíngkuàng shì qǔdé chénggōng de xiānjuétiáojiàn
4811.english: Careful study of the market is a prerequisite for success.

4812.simplified: 两个队都表现了高超的技艺和优良的作风。
4812.traditional: 兩個隊都表現了高超的技藝和優良的作風。
4812.pinyin: liǎng gè duì dōu biǎoxiàn le gāochāo de jìyì hé yōuliáng de zuòfēng
4812.english: Both teams displayed first-rate technique and a fine spirit.

4813.simplified: 在所有商品中, 我对棉布特别感兴趣。
4813.traditional: 在所有商品中, 我對棉布特別感興趣。
4813.pinyin: zài suǒyǒu shāngpǐn zhōng wǒ duì miánbù tèbié gǎnxìngqù
4813.english: Among all the merchandise, I was interested in the cotton piece in particular.

4814.simplified: 恐怕我的方位感很差，因此我容易迷路。
4814.traditional: 恐怕我的方位感很差，因此我容易迷路。
4814.pinyin: kǒngpà wǒ de fāngwèi gǎn hěn chà yīncǐ wǒ róngyì mílù
4814.english: I'm afraid I haven't got a very good sense of directions, so I easily get lost.

4815.simplified: 他原来很著急, 我总算把他的情绪稳定下来了.
4815.traditional: 他原來很著急, 我總算把他的情緒穩定下來了.
4815.pinyin: tā yuánlái hěn zháojí wǒ zǒngsuàn bǎ tā de qíngxù wěndìng xiàlai le
4815.english: He had been quite anxious, but I managed to settle his mind.

4816.simplified: 这个价钱把全部固定装置和设备都打在里面了。
4816.traditional: 這個價錢把全部固定裝置和設備都打在裡面了。
4816.pinyin: zhège jiàqian bǎ quánbù gùdìng zhuāngzhì hé shèbèi dōu dǎ zài lǐmiàn le
4816.english: The price includes all fixtures and fittings.

4817.simplified: 他答应赶紧写好报告，今天就给我们送来。
4817.traditional: 他答應趕緊寫好報告，今天就給我們送來。
4817.pinyin: tā dāying gǎnjǐn xiě hǎo bàogào jīntiān jiù gěi wǒmen sòng lái
4817.english: He promised to hurry on with the report and send it to us today.

4818.simplified: 你的说法完全不真实，我要求立即道歉。
4818.traditional: 你的說法完全不真實，我要求立即道歉。
4818.pinyin: nǐ de shuōfa wánquán bù zhēnshí wǒ yāoqiú lìjí dàoqiàn
4818.english: Your allegations are completely untrue, and I demand an immediate apology.

4819.simplified: 他们装出信心十足的样子却欺骗不了任何人。
4819.traditional: 他們裝出信心十足的樣子卻欺騙不了任何人。
4819.pinyin: tāmen zhuāngchū xìnxīn shízú de yàngzi què qīpiàn bùliǎo rènhé rén
4819.english: Their assumptions of an air of confidence fooled nobody.

4820.simplified: 我上司让我给这位新网球冠军写篇小传。
4820.traditional: 我上司讓我給這位新網球冠軍寫篇小傳。
4820.pinyin: wǒ shàngsi ràng wǒ gěi zhèwèi xīn wǎngqiú guànjūn xiě piān xiǎozhuàn
4820.english: My boss asked me to write a profile for the new tennis champion.

4821.simplified: 他应该主动提出付款--他有的是钱, 别忘了.
4821.traditional: 他應該主動提出付款--他有的是錢, 別忘了.
4821.pinyin: tā yīnggāi zhǔdòng tíchū fùkuǎn tā yǒudeshì qián bié wàng le
4821.english: He should have offered to pay he has plenty of money, after all.

4822.simplified: 一名通讯员被派去给前线士兵送消息。
4822.traditional: 一名通訊員被派去給前線士兵送消息。
4822.pinyin: yī míng tōngxùnyuán bèi pài qù gěi qiánxiàn shìbīng sòng xiāoxi
4822.english: A messenger was despatched to take the news to the soldiers at the front.

4823.simplified: 吵闹声不绝于耳，我很难保持精神集中。
4823.traditional: 吵鬧聲不絕於耳，我很難保持精神集中。
4823.pinyin: chǎonàoshēng bùjuéyú'ěr wǒ hěn nán bǎochí jīngshén jízhōng
4823.english: I found it hard to keep my concentration with such a noise going on.

4824.simplified: 如果你一直呆在家里，就永远不会有生活经验。
4824.traditional: 如果你一直呆在家裡，就永遠不會有生活經驗。
4824.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ yīzhí dāi zài jiālǐ jiù yǒngyuǎn bùhuì yǒu shēnghuó jīngyàn
4824.english: You'll never see life if you stay at home forever.

4825.simplified: 委员会决定取消对他那项计划的资助。
4825.traditional: 委員會決定取消對他那項計劃的資助。
4825.pinyin: wěiyuánhuì juédìng qǔxiāo duì tā nà xiàng jìhuà de zīzhù
4825.english: The committee decided to make a withdrawal of financial support for his scheme.

4826.simplified: 看到他仍然像以前一样健康，真叫人安心。
4826.traditional: 看到他仍然像以前一樣健康，真叫人安心。
4826.pinyin: kàn dào tā réngrán xiàng yǐqián yīyàng jiànkāng zhēn jiào rén ānxīn
4826.english: It is a great relief to see him still as strong as he was.

4827.simplified: 那年轻画家的作品已在几家美术馆中展出.
4827.traditional: 那年輕畫家的作品已在幾家美術館中展出.
4827.pinyin: nà niánqīng huàjiā de zuòpǐn yǐ zài jǐ jiā měishùguǎn zhōng zhǎnchū
4827.english: The young painter has exhibited (his work) in several galleries.

4828.simplified: 那位老师看着他所有的学生走进阅览室。
4828.traditional: 那位老師看著他所有的學生走進閱覽室。
4828.pinyin: nà wèi lǎoshī kàn zhe tā suǒyǒu de xuésheng zǒujìn yuèlǎnshì
4828.english: That teacher is looking his all students walk into the reading room.

4829.simplified: 他的发现使我们的科学知识的面貌为之一新。
4829.traditional: 他的發現使我們的科學知識的面貌為之一新。
4829.pinyin: tā de fāxiàn shǐ wǒmen de kēxuézhīshi de miànmào wéi zhīyī xīn
4829.english: His discoveries have put a new face on our scientific knowledge.

4830.simplified: 这项研究仅仅是重复别人已经做过的工作。
4830.traditional: 這項研究僅僅是重復別人已經做過的工作。
4830.pinyin: zhè xiàng yánjiū jǐnjǐn shì chóngfù biéren yǐjīng zuò guò de gōngzuò
4830.english: This research merely duplicates work already done elsewhere.

4831.simplified: 我们很早就动身去车站以便赶上头班火车。
4831.traditional: 我們很早就動身去車站以便趕上頭班火車。
4831.pinyin: wǒmen hěn zǎojiù dòngshēn qù chēzhàn yǐbiàn gǎnshàng tóu bān huǒchē
4831.english: We left for the station so early as to catch the first train.

4832.simplified: 她尽管很想再见到他, 但却不愿给他回信.
4832.traditional: 她盡管很想再見到他, 但卻不願給他回信.
4832.pinyin: tā jǐnguǎn hěn xiǎng zài jiàndào tā dàn què bùyuàn gěi tā huíxìn
4832.english: Despite wanting to see him again, she refused to reply to his letters.

4833.simplified: 我警告你，如果你再这样干，我们就要处分你了。
4833.traditional: 我警告你，如果你再這樣干，我們就要處分你了。
4833.pinyin: wǒ jǐnggào nǐ rúguǒ nǐ zài zhèyàng gàn wǒmen jiùyào chǔfèn nǐ le
4833.english: I warn you if you do that again We'll punish you.

4834.simplified: 我能使用文字处理机, 但不了解其运转机制.
4834.traditional: 我能使用文字處理機, 但不了解其運轉機制.
4834.pinyin: wǒ néng shǐyòng wénzì chǔlǐ jī dàn bù liǎojiě qí yùnzhuǎn jīzhì
4834.english: I can use a word processor but I don't understand its operation.

4835.simplified: 在赛跑时让年龄小的男生提早了10秒钟起跑.
4835.traditional: 在賽跑時讓年齡小的男生提早了10秒鐘起跑.
4835.pinyin: zài sàipǎo shí ràng niánlíng xiǎode nánshēng tízǎo le miǎozhōng qǐpǎo
4835.english: The smaller boys were given a start of 10 seconds in the race.

4836.simplified: 电脑控制板上有许多小灯和电子设备。
4836.traditional: 電腦控制板上有許多小燈和電子設備。
4836.pinyin: diànnǎo kòngzhì bǎn shàng yǒu xǔduō xiǎo dēng hé diànzǐ shèbèi
4836.english: There are many lights and electrical instruments on the computer console.

4837.simplified: 人们普遍认为她是该国最优秀的作家之一。
4837.traditional: 人們普遍認為她是該國最優秀的作家之一。
4837.pinyin: rénmen pǔbiàn rènwéi tā shì gāi guó zuì yōuxiù de zuòjiā zhīyī
4837.english: She is generally regarded as one of the best writers in the country.

4838.simplified: 助学金通常在大学一年级之后逐渐减少。
4838.traditional: 助學金通常在大學一年級之後逐漸減少。
4838.pinyin: zhù xué jīn tōngcháng zài dàxué yī niánjí zhīhòu zhújiàn jiǎnshǎo
4838.english: Financial aids generally taper off after the first year of college.

4839.simplified: 她把糖放进咖啡里，用勺子把它们混合起来。
4839.traditional: 她把糖放進咖啡裡，用勺子把它們混合起來。
4839.pinyin: tā bǎ táng fàngjìn kāfēi lǐ yòng sháozi bǎ tāmen hùnhé qilai
4839.english: She put the sugar into the coffee and mixed them up with a spoon.

4840.simplified: 被围困在城里的老百姓已空运到安全地区.
4840.traditional: 被圍困在城裡的老百姓已空運到安全地區.
4840.pinyin: bèi wéikùn zài chéng lǐ de lǎobǎixìng yǐ kōngyùn dào ānquán dìqū
4840.english: Civilians trapped in the beleaguered city have been airlifted to safety.

4841.simplified: 既然雨下得这么大，你与其离开倒不如待在这儿。
4841.traditional: 既然雨下得這麼大，你與其離開倒不如待在這兒。
4841.pinyin: jìrán yǔ xià dé zhème dà nǐ yǔqí líkāi dǎo bùrú dài zài zhèr
4841.english: Since it is raining hard, you may as well stay here as leave.

4842.simplified: 气候学对气候及其引起的现象进行的气象研究
4842.traditional: 氣候學對氣候及其引起的現象進行的氣象研究
4842.pinyin: qìhòuxué duì qìhòu jíqí yǐnqǐ de xiànxiàng jìnxíng de qìxiàng yánjiū
4842.english: The meteorological study of climates and their phenomena.

4843.simplified: 他不得不忍住悲痛，继续照常在车间干活。
4843.traditional: 他不得不忍住悲痛，繼續照常在車間干活。
4843.pinyin: tā bùdébù rěn zhù bēitòng jìxù zhàocháng zài chējiān gànhuó
4843.english: He was obliged to swallow his grief and work in the shop as usual.

4844.simplified: 新的汽车设计具备最新安全措施的一切特点。
4844.traditional: 新的汽車設計具備最新安全措施的一切特點。
4844.pinyin: xīn de qìchē shèjì jùbèi zuìxīn ānquáncuòshī de yīqiè tèdiǎn
4844.english: The new car design incorporates all the latest safety features.

4845.simplified: 到这次新闻发布时, 贸易量已达到最低点。
4845.traditional: 到這次新聞發布時, 貿易量已達到最低點。
4845.pinyin: dào zhè cì xīnwén fābù shí màoyì liáng yǐ dádào zuìdīdiǎn
4845.english: At the time of this news release, trading had reached its lowest point.

4846.simplified: 我们根据恐龙的一些骨头重组恐龙的原貌.
4846.traditional: 我們根據恐龍的一些骨頭重組恐龍的原貌.
4846.pinyin: wǒmen gēnjù kǒnglóng de yīxiē gǔtou chóngzǔ kǒnglóng de yuánmào
4846.english: We reconstructed what the dinosaur looked like from a few of its bones.

4847.simplified: 他一方面受到批评，另一方面却受到鼓励。
4847.traditional: 他一方面受到批評，另一方面卻受到鼓勵。
4847.pinyin: tā yīfāngmiàn shòudào pīpíng lìngyīfāngmiàn què shòudào gǔlì
4847.english: He has been criticized on one hand and encouraged on the other.

4848.simplified: 正如他所指出的那样，一切反动派都是纸老虎。
4848.traditional: 正如他所指出的那樣，一切反動派都是紙老虎。
4848.pinyin: zhèngrú tā suǒ zhǐchū de nàyàng yīqiè fǎndòngpài dōu shì zhǐlǎohǔ
4848.english: As he pointed out, all reactionaries are paper tiger.

4849.simplified: 礼拜仪式倡用人运用或提倡运用礼拜仪式的人
4849.traditional: 禮拜儀式倡用人運用或提倡運用禮拜儀式的人
4849.pinyin: lǐbàiyíshì chàng yòngrén yùnyòng huò tíchàng yùnyòng lǐbàiyíshì de rén
4849.english: One who uses or advocates the use of liturgical forms.

4850.simplified: 消防队到达时, 整座建筑物正在熊熊燃烧著.
4850.traditional: 消防隊到達時, 整座建築物正在熊熊燃燒著.
4850.pinyin: xiāofángduì dàodá shí zhěng zuò jiànzhùwù zhèngzài xióngxióng ránshāo zhe
4850.english: When the firemen arrived the whole building was blazing.

4851.simplified: 这项工作需要我拿出自己的全部精力和耐性。
4851.traditional: 這項工作需要我拿出自己的全部精力和耐性。
4851.pinyin: zhè xiàng gōngzuò xūyào wǒ náchū zìjǐ de quánbù jīnglì hé nàixìng
4851.english: The job called for all my resources of energy and patience.

4852.simplified: 他们为穷人准备了米，面及其它各种食物。
4852.traditional: 他們為窮人准備了米，面及其它各種食物。
4852.pinyin: tāmen wéi qióngrén zhǔnbèi le mǐ miàn jí qítā gèzhǒng shíwù
4852.english: They prepared rice, flour and sundry other items of food for the poor.

4853.simplified: 他们拒绝签约，从而使我们的处境有些困难。
4853.traditional: 他們拒絕簽約，從而使我們的處境有些困難。
4853.pinyin: tāmen jùjué qiānyuē cóng'ér shǐ wǒmen de chǔjìng yǒuxiē kùnnan
4853.english: Their refusal to sign the contract has put us in a bit of a bind.

4854.simplified: 除了没挂名以外，实际上他就是委员会的主席。
4854.traditional: 除了沒掛名以外，實際上他就是委員會的主席。
4854.pinyin: chúle méi guà míng yǐwài shíjìshàng tā jiùshì wěiyuánhuì de zhǔxí
4854.english: He is the chairman of the committee in all but the name.

4855.simplified: 考期临近了, 所以学生们确实在刻苦钻研。
4855.traditional: 考期臨近了, 所以學生們確實在刻苦鑽研。
4855.pinyin: kǎoqī línjìn le suǒyǐ xuésheng men quèshí zài kèkǔzuānyán
4855.english: Now that the exam is near, the students are really going at their studies.

4856.simplified: 我这篇小说中所有的地点和人物都是虚构的.
4856.traditional: 我這篇小說中所有的地點和人物都是虛構的.
4856.pinyin: wǒ zhè piān xiǎoshuō zhōng suǒyǒu de dìdiǎn hé rénwù dōu shì xūgòu de
4856.english: All the places and characters in my novel are entirely fictitious.

4857.simplified: 由于找不到工作，许我男人都报名参了军。
4857.traditional: 由於找不到工作，許我男人都報名參了軍。
4857.pinyin: yóuyú zhǎobudào gōngzuò xǔ wǒ nánrén dōu bàomíng cān le jūn
4857.english: Many men sign up for the army because they can not get ordinary jobs.

4858.simplified: 这个报告使整个方针发生了决定性的变化。
4858.traditional: 這個報告使整個方針發生了決定性的變化。
4858.pinyin: zhège bàogào shǐ zhěnggè fāngzhēn fāshēng le juédìngxìng de biànhuà
4858.english: The report brought about a decisive change in the whole policy.

4859.simplified: 今天早上我在超级市场碰见了一个老同学。
4859.traditional: 今天早上我在超級市場碰見了一個老同學。
4859.pinyin: jīntiān zǎoshang wǒ zài chāojíshìchǎng pèngjiàn le yī gè lǎo tóngxué
4859.english: I ran into an old schoolfriend at the supermarket this morning.

4860.simplified: 党的领导人的各种观点已统一为一致的政策.
4860.traditional: 黨的領導人的各種觀點已統一為一致的政策.
4860.pinyin: dǎng de lǐngdǎorén de gèzhǒng guāndiǎn yǐ tǒngyī wéi yīzhì de zhèngcè
4860.english: The views of party leaders coalesced to form a coherent policy.

4861.simplified: 只要红灯一亮，就表示有危及职工的险情。
4861.traditional: 只要紅燈一亮，就表示有危及職工的險情。
4861.pinyin: zhǐyào hóngdēng yī liàng jiù biǎoshì yǒu wēijí zhígōng de xiǎnqíng
4861.english: Only if the red light comes on is there any danger to employee.

4862.simplified: 别尽用那种专门术语--用普通的词语解释吧.
4862.traditional: 別盡用那種專門術語--用普通的詞語解釋吧.
4862.pinyin: bié jìn yòng nàzhǒng zhuānmén shùyǔ yòng pǔtōng de cíyǔ jiěshì ba
4862.english: Don't use all that technical lingo try and explain in plain English.

4863.simplified: 老教授主持了一次理论物理学家的研讨会。
4863.traditional: 老教授主持了一次理論物理學家的研討會。
4863.pinyin: lǎo jiàoshòu zhǔchí le yīcì lǐlùn wùlǐxuéjiā de yántǎohuì
4863.english: The old professor had presided over a seminar for theoretical physicists.

4864.simplified: 那位作家拒绝和他们的出版社进一步商讨。
4864.traditional: 那位作家拒絕和他們的出版社進一步商討。
4864.pinyin: nà wèi zuòjiā jùjué hé tāmen de chūbǎnshè jìnyībù shāngtǎo
4864.english: The writer refused to make further negotiations with their publisher.

4865.simplified: 尽管有那么多困难，我们仍然及时地到达了这儿。
4865.traditional: 盡管有那麼多困難，我們仍然及時地到達了這兒。
4865.pinyin: jǐnguǎn yǒu nàme duō kùnnan wǒmen réngrán jíshí dì dàodá le zhèr
4865.english: Disregarding all the difficulties, we arrived here in time.

4866.simplified: 他们虽然没有得到官方的支持, 但仍继续奋斗.
4866.traditional: 他們雖然沒有得到官方的支持, 但仍繼續奮斗.
4866.pinyin: tāmen suīrán méiyǒu dédào guānfāng de zhīchí dàn réng jìxù fèndòu
4866.english: Though they lack official support they continue their struggle.

4867.simplified: 我必须找一个人，在我离开期间代理我的职务。
4867.traditional: 我必須找一個人，在我離開期間代理我的職務。
4867.pinyin: wǒ bìxū zhǎo yīgèrén zài wǒ líkāi qījiān dàilǐ wǒ de zhíwù
4867.english: I must find someone to act as a deputy for me during my absence.

4868.simplified: 这两样东西外表相同，但本质上却不样。
4868.traditional: 這兩樣東西外表相同，但本質上卻不樣。
4868.pinyin: zhè liǎngyàngdōngxi wàibiǎo xiāngtóng dàn běnzhìshàng què bù yàng
4868.english: The two things are the same in outward form but different in essence.

4869.simplified: 我们的电费已经高得付不起了--得节省些了.
4869.traditional: 我們的電費已經高得付不起了--得節省些了.
4869.pinyin: wǒmen de diàn fèi yǐjīng gāo dé fù bù qǐ le dé jiéshěng xiē le
4869.english: Our electricity bills are higher than we can afford we must start to economize.

4870.simplified: 消防队员需用呼吸器械才能进入燃烧著的房屋.
4870.traditional: 消防隊員需用呼吸器械才能進入燃燒著的房屋.
4870.pinyin: xiāofángduìyuán xū yòng hūxī qìxiè cáinéng jìnrù ránshāo zhe de fángwū
4870.english: Firemen needed breathing apparatus to enter the burning house.

4871.simplified: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。
4871.traditional: 這座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。
4871.pinyin: zhè zuò gētèshì de dàjiàotáng xīyǐn le shìjiègèdì de yóukè
4871.english: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world.

4872.simplified: 我们的人口在增长，因此我们需要更多的食物。
4872.traditional: 我們的人口在增長，因此我們需要更多的食物。
4872.pinyin: wǒmen de rénkǒu zài zēngzhǎng yīncǐ wǒmen xūyào gèng duō de shíwù
4872.english: We have a growing population and therefore we need more food.

4873.simplified: 我决不背离我已经宣布的在这个问题上的政策。
4873.traditional: 我決不背離我已經宣布的在這個問題上的政策。
4873.pinyin: wǒ juébù bèilí wǒ yǐjīng xuānbù de zài zhège wèntí shàng de zhèngcè
4873.english: I will never swerve from my declared policy on this matter.

4874.simplified: 我会尽力帮忙，但我所能做的也是有限度的。
4874.traditional: 我會盡力幫忙，但我所能做的也是有限度的。
4874.pinyin: wǒ huì jìnlì bāngmáng dàn wǒ suǒnéng zuò de yě shì yǒuxiàn dù de
4874.english: I'll help as much as I can, but there is a limit to what I can do.

4875.simplified: 政府正在实施一项新的帮助失业者的政策。
4875.traditional: 政府正在實施一項新的幫助失業者的政策。
4875.pinyin: zhèngfǔ zhèngzài shíshī yī xiàng xīn de bāngzhù shīyèzhě de zhèngcè
4875.english: The government is implementing a new policy to help the unemployed.

4876.simplified: 他们对普遍存在的反政府情绪感到很吃惊。
4876.traditional: 他們對普遍存在的反政府情緒感到很吃驚。
4876.pinyin: tāmen duì pǔbiàn cúnzài de fǎnzhèngfǔ qíngxù gǎndào hěn chījīng
4876.english: They are so surprised by the prevalence of anti-government sentiments.

4877.simplified: 这幅画的照片绝妙地再现了原作的色彩。
4877.traditional: 這幅畫的照片絕妙地再現了原作的色彩。
4877.pinyin: zhè fú huà de zhàopiàn juémiào dì zàixiàn le yuánzuò de sècǎi
4877.english: The photograph of the painting reproduces the colors of the original extremely well.

4878.simplified: 这届国会结束时，好几个议案制定成为法律。
4878.traditional: 這屆國會結束時，好幾個議案制定成為法律。
4878.pinyin: zhè jiè guóhuì jiéshù shí hǎo jǐge yì'àn zhìdìng chéngwéi fǎlǜ
4878.english: Several bills were enacted at the end of this session of Parliament.

4879.simplified: 着火的房子的冒出的烟在几个街区外都能看到。
4879.traditional: 著火的房子的冒出的煙在幾個街區外都能看到。
4879.pinyin: zháohuǒ de fángzi de mào chū de yān zài jǐge jiēqū wài dōu néng kàn dào
4879.english: The smoke of the burning house could be seen many blocks away.

4880.simplified: 他掏出烟斗，装满烟丝，一言不发地抽了起来。
4880.traditional: 他掏出煙斗，裝滿煙絲，一言不發地抽了起來。
4880.pinyin: zháohuǒ de fángzi de mào chū de yān zài jǐge jiēqū wài dōu néng kàn dào
4880.english: Fishing out his pipe, he filled it and puffed at it without a word.

4881.simplified: 无限度的武器竞赛当然会增加战争的危险性。
4881.traditional: 無限度的武器競賽當然會增加戰爭的危險性。
4881.pinyin: wúxiàn dù de wǔqì jìngsài dāngrán huì zēngjiā zhànzhēng de wēixiǎn xìng
4881.english: An unlimited arms race may well increase the danger of war.

4882.simplified: 不久她看出，她已经到达这座城市的郊区。
4882.traditional: 不久她看出，她已經到達這座城市的郊區。
4882.pinyin: bùjiǔ tā kànchū tā yǐjīng dàodá zhè zuò chéngshì de jiāoqū
4882.english: Presently she recognized that she was already in the outskirts of the city.

4883.simplified: 他做临时工作已一年多了, 想找个固定的工作.
4883.traditional: 他做臨時工作已一年多了, 想找個固定的工作.
4883.pinyin: tā zuò línshí gōngzuò yǐ yīniánduō le xiǎng zhǎo gè gùdìng de gōngzuò
4883.english: He's been temping for over a year now and wants a permanent job.

4884.simplified: 我喜欢书架上所有的书，但这本是我最喜欢的。
4884.traditional: 我喜歡書架上所有的書，但這本是我最喜歡的。
4884.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuan shūjià shàng suǒyǒu de shū dàn zhè běn shì wǒ zuì xǐhuan de
4884.english: I like all the books on the shelf but this one is my favorite.

4885.simplified: 我用毯子把病人的腿包了起来，让他暖和一点儿。
4885.traditional: 我用毯子把病人的腿包了起來，讓他暖和一點兒。
4885.pinyin: wǒ yòng tǎnzi bǎ bìngrén de tuǐ bāo le qilai ràng tā nuǎnhuo yīdiǎnr
4885.english: I wrapped the rug around the sick man's legs to keep him warm.

4886.simplified: 直到一八八四年，第一个人造纤维才制造出来。
4886.traditional: 直到一八八四年，第一個人造纖維才制造出來。
4886.pinyin: zhídào yī bā bā sì nián dìyī gèrén zào xiānwéi cái zhìzào chūlái
4886.english: It was not until 1884 that the first artificial fiber was made.

4887.simplified: 他们从这次实验中只得到了一组不完整的答案。
4887.traditional: 他們從這次實驗中只得到了一組不完整的答案。
4887.pinyin: tāmen cóng zhè cì shíyàn zhōng zhǐdé dàoliǎo yī zǔ bù wánzhěng de dá'àn
4887.english: They only got an incomplete set of results from the experiment.

4888.simplified: 那位革命者为避免被捕在地下躲藏了几个星期。
4888.traditional: 那位革命者為避免被捕在地下躲藏了幾個星期。
4888.pinyin: nà wèi gémìng zhě wéi bìmiǎn bèibǔ zàidìxià duǒcáng le jǐge xīngqī
4888.english: The revolutionist eluded capture for weeks by hiding underground.

4889.simplified: 那个新闻工作者不想透露消息提供人的身分。
4889.traditional: 那個新聞工作者不想透露消息提供人的身分。
4889.pinyin: nàge xīnwéngōngzuòzhě bùxiǎng tòulù xiāoxi tígōng rén de shēnfèn
4889.english: The journalist did not want to reveal the identity of his informant.

4890.simplified: 窗户的一边是一面镜子，另一边挂着一幅画。
4890.traditional: 窗戶的一邊是一面鏡子，另一邊掛著一幅畫。
4890.pinyin: chuānghu de yībiān shì yīmiàn jìngzi lìngyī biān guà zhe yī fú huà
4890.english: On one side of the window was a mirror, and on the other a painting.

4891.simplified: 我们前面的那辆汽车突然转入左边的小路上去了.
4891.traditional: 我們前面的那輛汽車突然轉入左邊的小路上去了.
4891.pinyin: wǒmen qiánmiàn de nà liàng qìchē tūrán zhuǎnrù zuǒbian de xiǎolù shàngqù le
4891.english: The car in front of us suddenly branched off to the left.

4892.simplified: 好学生通常都知道如何及时迅速地总结知识。
4892.traditional: 好學生通常都知道如何及時迅速地總結知識。
4892.pinyin: hǎo xuésheng tōngcháng dōu zhīdào rúhé jíshí xùnsù dì zǒngjié zhīshi
4892.english: A good student usually knows how to sum up knowledge in good time.

4893.simplified: 读者来信版是读者们交换意见的有益园地。
4893.traditional: 讀者來信版是讀者們交換意見的有益園地。
4893.pinyin: dúzhě láixìn bǎn shì dúzhě men jiāohuàn yìjiàn de yǒuyì yuándì
4893.english: The letters page serves as a useful forum for the exchange of readers' views.

4894.simplified: 你可以从我的错误中得到教训，避免犯同样错误。
4894.traditional: 你可以從我的錯誤中得到教訓，避免犯同樣錯誤。
4894.pinyin: nǐ kěyǐ cóng wǒ de cuòwù zhōng dédào jiàoxun bìmiǎn fàn tóngyàng cuòwù
4894.english: You can profit by my mistakes and avoid them yourself.

4895.simplified: 在他们讨论我的前途时，我恨不得能偷偷旁观。
4895.traditional: 在他們討論我的前途時，我恨不得能偷偷旁觀。
4895.pinyin: zài tāmen tǎolùn wǒ de qiántú shí wǒ hènbude néng tōutōu pángguān
4895.english: I wish I could be a fly on the wall when they discuss my future.

4896.simplified: 这个餐馆有公共卫生部门官员定期前来检查.
4896.traditional: 這個餐館有公共衛生部門官員定期前來檢查.
4896.pinyin: zhège cānguǎn yǒu gōnggòngwèishēng bùmén guānyuán dìngqī qiánlái jiǎnchá
4896.english: The restaurant is visited regularly by public health officers.

4897.simplified: 该药本身并无害处, 但与酒类同服则有危险.
4897.traditional: 該藥本身並無害處, 但與酒類同服則有危險.
4897.pinyin: gāi yào běnshēn bìng wúhài chǔ dàn yǔ jiǔ lèi tóng fú zé yǒu wēixiǎn
4897.english: The drug is not harmful per se, but is dangerous when taken with alcohol.

4898.simplified: 她最近的一部小说在出版当年就印行了三次.
4898.traditional: 她最近的一部小說在出版當年就印行了三次.
4898.pinyin: tā zuìjìn de yī bù xiǎoshuō zài chūbǎn dāngnián jiù yìnxíng le sāncì
4898.english: Her last novel ran into three reprints in its first year of publication.

4899.simplified: 采用这种新方法无须再用手工检验产品。
4899.traditional: 采用這種新方法無須再用手工檢驗產品。
4899.pinyin: cǎiyòng zhèzhǒng xīn fāngfǎ wúxū zài yòng shǒugōng jiǎnyàn chǎnpǐn
4899.english: This new process has eliminated the need for checking the products by hand.

4900.simplified: 你真走运, 不用出席那死气沉沉的招待会.
4900.traditional: 你真走運, 不用出席那死氣沉沉的招待會.
4900.pinyin: nǐ zhēn zǒuyùn bùyòng chūxí nà sǐqìchénchén de zhāodàihuì
4900.english: You can thank your lucky stars (that) you don't have to go to this dreary reception.

4901.simplified: 兴建新剧院的计画因资金短缺只好搁置起来.
4901.traditional: 興建新劇院的計畫因資金短缺只好擱置起來.
4901.pinyin: xīngjiàn xīn jùyuàn de jìhuà yīn zījīn duǎnquē zhǐhǎo gēzhì qilai
4901.english: The plans for a new theatre have had to be shelved because of lack of money.

4902.simplified: 没有海关的许可，这些货物是不允许出口的。
4902.traditional: 沒有海關的許可，這些貨物是不允許出口的。
4902.pinyin: méiyǒu hǎiguān de xǔkě zhèxiē huòwù shì bù yǔnxǔ chūkǒu de
4902.english: The goods are not allowed to be exported without approbation of the customs.

4903.simplified: 在这样远景鼓舞下，他们打算修建更多的水渠。
4903.traditional: 在這樣遠景鼓舞下，他們打算修建更多的水渠。
4903.pinyin: zài zhèyàng yuǎnjǐng gǔwǔ xià tāmen dǎsuàn xiūjiàn gèng duō de shuǐqú
4903.english: Inspired by these prospects, they planned to build more canals.

4904.simplified: 由于目前的价格情况，我方不得不调整报价。
4904.traditional: 由於目前的價格情況，我方不得不調整報價。
4904.pinyin: yóuyú mùqián de jiàgé qíngkuàng wǒfāng bùdébù tiáozhěng bàojià
4904.english: Due to the present price level, we cannot help but adjust our offer.

4905.simplified: 老师说他将要从我们中选一个人作他的助手。
4905.traditional: 老師說他將要從我們中選一個人作他的助手。
4905.pinyin: lǎoshī shuō tā jiāngyào cóng wǒmen zhòngxuǎn yīgèrén zuò tā de zhùshǒu
4905.english: The teacher said that he would like to choose an assistant among us.

4906.simplified: 阅览室有许多学生，也有一些消磨时间的人。
4906.traditional: 閱覽室有許多學生，也有一些消磨時間的人。
4906.pinyin: yuèlǎnshì yǒu xǔduō xuésheng yě yǒuyīxiē xiāomóshíjiān de rén
4906.english: The reading room held many students, as well as a few time killers.

4907.simplified: 有些人生就一副好嗓子, 有些人则需要训练.
4907.traditional: 有些人生就一副好嗓子, 有些人則需要訓練.
4907.pinyin: yǒuxiērén shēngjiù yī fù hǎo sǎngzi yǒuxiērén zé xūyào xùnliàn
4907.english: Some people have naturally beautiful voices while others need to be trained.

4908.simplified: 如今有些年轻人穿的服装真会把你吓一跳。
4908.traditional: 如今有些年輕人穿的服裝真會把你嚇一跳。
4908.pinyin: rújīn yǒuxiē niánqīngrén chuān de fúzhuāng zhēn huì bǎ nǐ xiàyītiào
4908.english: The clothes some young people wear nowadays really make your hair curl.

4909.simplified: 结果一见分晓, 部长立即举行了记者招待会.
4909.traditional: 結果一見分曉, 部長立即舉行了記者招待會.
4909.pinyin: jiéguǒ yī jiàn fēnxiǎo bùzhǎng lìjí jǔxíng le jìzhězhāodàihuì
4909.english: The Minister called a press conference as soon as the results were known.

4910.simplified: 他确实是想帮忙，然而事实上却只是帮倒忙。
4910.traditional: 他確實是想幫忙，然而事實上卻只是幫倒忙。
4910.pinyin: tā quèshí shì xiǎng bāngmáng rán'ér shìshíshàng què zhǐshì bāngdàománg
4910.english: No doubt he means to help, but in fact he just get in the way.

4911.simplified: 他有点神经质，但他的妻子是一个非常稳重的人。
4911.traditional: 他有點神經質，但他的妻子是一個非常穩重的人。
4911.pinyin: tā yǒudiǎn shénjīngzhì dàn tā de qīzi shì yī gè fēicháng wěnzhòng de rén
4911.english: He is a bit neurotic, but his wife is a very stable person.

4912.simplified: 他的白头发与黑皮肤形成了鲜明的对比.
4912.traditional: 他的白頭發與黑皮膚形成了鮮明的對比.
4912.pinyin: tā de bái tóufa yǔ hēi pífū xíng chéngle xiānmíng de duìbǐ
4912.english: His white hair was in sharp contrast to (ie was very noticeably different from) his dark skin.

4913.simplified: 在学习一种新语言时，词典是非常有用的工具。
4913.traditional: 在學習一種新語言時，詞典是非常有用的工具。
4913.pinyin: zài xuéxí yīzhǒng xīn yǔyán shí cídiǎn shì fēicháng yǒuyòng de gōngjù
4913.english: A dictionary is an invaluable aid in learning a new language.

4914.simplified: 在图画中的天使通常是身穿白衣, 生有翅膀.
4914.traditional: 在圖畫中的天使通常是身穿白衣, 生有翅膀.
4914.pinyin: zài túhuà zhòngdì tiānshǐ tōngcháng shì shēnchuān bái yì shēng yǒu chìbǎng
4914.english: Angels are usually shown in pictures dressed in white, with wings.

4915.simplified: 那个有名的运动员已经没有优势赢得那场比赛了。
4915.traditional: 那個有名的運動員已經沒有優勢贏得那場比賽了。
4915.pinyin: nàge yǒumíng de yùndòngyuán yǐjīng méiyǒu yōushì yíngdé nà chǎng bǐsài le
4915.english: The famous athlete had no vantage to win the game.

4916.simplified: 我比较了复印件和原件，但是差别不是很大。
4916.traditional: 我比較了復印件和原件，但是差別不是很大。
4916.pinyin: wǒ bǐjiào le fùyìnjiàn hé yuánjiàn dànshì chābié bùshì hěn dà
4916.english: I compared the copy with the original, but there was not much difference.

4917.simplified: 我向你们保证那是真事, 以免有人觉得奇怪.
4917.traditional: 我向你們保證那是真事, 以免有人覺得奇怪.
4917.pinyin: wǒ xiàng nǐmen bǎozhèng nàshi zhēnshì yǐmiǎn yǒurén juéde qíguài
4917.english: Lest anyone should think it strange, let me assure you that it is quite true.

4918.simplified: 上诉法院宣布少年法院发出的照看命令无效。
4918.traditional: 上訴法院宣布少年法院發出的照看命令無效。
4918.pinyin: shàngsùfǎyuàn xuānbù shàonián fǎyuàn fāchū de zhàokàn mìnglìng wúxiào
4918.english: The appeal court quash the care order make by the juvenile court.

4919.simplified: 旅游团成员从导游那里拿到详细的日程表。
4919.traditional: 旅游團成員從導游那裡拿到詳細的日程表。
4919.pinyin: lǚyóutuán chéngyuán cóng dǎoyóu nàli ná dào xiángxì de rìchéngbiǎo
4919.english: The member of the group is given a detailed tour itinerary by the courier.

4920.simplified: 您知道，我们可以供应各种类型和尺码的机床。
4920.traditional: 您知道，我們可以供應各種類型和尺碼的機床。
4920.pinyin: nín zhīdào wǒmen kěyǐ gōngyìng gèzhǒng lèixíng hé chǐmǎ de jīchuáng
4920.english: As you know, we can supply machine tools of all types and size.

4921.simplified: 我想拦住他, 不让他进门, 可是他硬闯进来了.
4921.traditional: 我想攔住他, 不讓他進門, 可是他硬闖進來了.
4921.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng lánzhù tā bù ràng tā jìnmén kěshì tā yìng chuǎng jìnlái le
4921.english: I tried to stop him coming through the door but he just barged (his way) in.

4922.simplified: 演讲单调乏味，不久，听众就开始陆续离席了。
4922.traditional: 演講單調乏味，不久，聽眾就開始陸續離席了。
4922.pinyin: yǎnjiǎng dāndiàofáwèi bùjiǔ tīngzhòng jiù kāishǐ lùxù lí xí le
4922.english: The lecture was so dull that soon the audience begin to drop away.

4923.simplified: 他不断要求我们帮助他，过分利用了我们对他的好意。
4923.traditional: 他不斷要求我們幫助他，過分利用了我們對他的好意。
4923.pinyin: tā bùduàn yāoqiú wǒmen bāngzhù tā guòfèn lìyòng le wǒmen duì tā de hǎoyì
4923.english: His constant requests for help taxed our goodwill.

4924.simplified: 我们尽可谈论美的事物，然而美本身却是抽象的。
4924.traditional: 我們盡可談論美的事物，然而美本身卻是抽象的。
4924.pinyin: wǒmen jìn kě tánlùn Měidí shìwù rán'ér měi běnshēn quèshì chōuxiàng de
4924.english: We may talk of beautiful things, but beauty itself is abstract.

4925.simplified: 他明确地把整个经过都对我讲了，一点不含糊。
4925.traditional: 他明確地把整個經過都對我講了，一點不含糊。
4925.pinyin: wǒmen jìn kě tánlùn Měidí shìwù rán'ér měi běnshēn quèshì chōuxiàng de
4925.english: He told me the whole story in spades and there's no doubt about it.

4926.simplified: 保险单内容不包括正常使用所导致的损坏。
4926.traditional: 保險單內容不包括正常使用所導致的損壞。
4926.pinyin: bǎoxiǎndān nèiróng bù bāokuò zhèngcháng shǐyòng suǒ dǎozhì de sǔnhuài
4926.english: The insurance policy do not cover damage cause by normal wear and tear.

4927.simplified: 看起来他似乎很喜欢大城市的热闹繁忙的生活。
4927.traditional: 看起來他似乎很喜歡大城市的熱鬧繁忙的生活。
4927.pinyin: kànqǐlái tā sìhū hěn xǐhuan dàchéngshì de rènao fánmáng de shēnghuó
4927.english: It seems that he enjoys the hustle and bustle of life in the big city.

4928.simplified: 他们突然的攻击使我们更加注意我们周围的危险。
4928.traditional: 他們突然的攻擊使我們更加注意我們周圍的危險。
4928.pinyin: tāmen tūrán de gōngjī shǐ wǒmen gèngjiā zhùyì wǒmen zhōuwéi de wēixiǎn
4928.english: Their sudden attack made us more aware of the danger around us.

4929.simplified: 他总是用这样得方式说话，所以每个人都讨厌他。
4929.traditional: 他總是用這樣得方式說話，所以每個人都討厭他。
4929.pinyin: tā zǒngshì yòng zhèyàng dé fāngshì shuōhuà suǒyǐ měigerén dōu tǎoyàn tā
4929.english: He always talks in such a way that everyone dislikes him.

4930.simplified: 我与她的第一次会面的情景经常出现在我的记忆中。
4930.traditional: 我與她的第一次會面的情景經常出現在我的記憶中。
4930.pinyin: wǒ yǔ tā de dìyīcì huìmiàn de qíngjǐng jīngcháng chūxiàn zài wǒ de jìyì zhōng
4930.english: My first meeting with her often recurs to my memory.

4931.simplified: 那个傻孩子从来不做事，只是整天游手好闲。
4931.traditional: 那個傻孩子從來不做事，只是整天游手好閒。
4931.pinyin: nàge shǎ háizi cóngláibù zuòshì zhǐshì zhěngtiān yóushǒuhàoxián
4931.english: That silly child never does anything; he just fools about all day long.

4932.simplified: 不要把感情浪费在他身上，他是永远不会爱你的。
4932.traditional: 不要把感情浪費在他身上，他是永遠不會愛你的。
4932.pinyin: bùyào bǎ gǎnqíng làngfèi zài tā shēnshang tā shì yǒngyuǎn bùhuì ài nǐ de
4932.english: Don't squander your affection on him, he'll never love you.

4933.simplified: 这家石油公司将用船运出输油管道和重型设备。
4933.traditional: 這家石油公司將用船運出輸油管道和重型設備。
4933.pinyin: zhè jiā shíyóu gōngsī jiāng yòng chuán yùnchū shū yóu guǎndào hé zhòngxíng shèbèi
4933.english: The oil company will ship out piping and heavy equipment.

4934.simplified: 处理这类案件的常规做法是请求法院发出指令。
4934.traditional: 處理這類案件的常規做法是請求法院發出指令。
4934.pinyin: chǔlǐ zhèlèi ànjiàn de chángguī zuòfǎ shì qǐngqiú fǎyuàn fāchū zhǐlìng
4934.english: The general practice in such cases is to apply for a court order.

4935.simplified: 他说他是位医生，但后来却发现他是个骗子。
4935.traditional: 他說他是位醫生，但後來卻發現他是個騙子。
4935.pinyin: tā shuō tā shì wèi yīshēng dàn hòulái què fāxiàn tā shì gè piànzi
4935.english: He said he was a doctor, but it subsequently emerged that he was an impostor.

4936.simplified: 他们的女儿死去已一年多了, 但他们现在仍很悲痛.
4936.traditional: 他們的女兒死去已一年多了, 但他們現在仍很悲痛.
4936.pinyin: tāmen de nǚ'ér sǐqù yǐ yīniánduō le dàn tāmen xiànzài réng hěn bēitòng
4936.english: Their daughter died over a year ago, but they are still grieving.

4937.simplified: 如果你感兴趣，你来后我把详细情况告诉你。
4937.traditional: 如果你感興趣，你來後我把詳細情況告訴你。
4937.pinyin: rúguǒ nǐ gǎnxìngqù nǐ lái hòu wǒ bǎ xiángxì qíngkuàng gàosu nǐ
4937.english: If you would be interested, I'll tell you all the details when you get here.

4938.simplified: 这家公司将为所有运动员提供全套运动服装。
4938.traditional: 這家公司將為所有運動員提供全套運動服裝。
4938.pinyin: zhè jiā gōngsī jiāng wéi suǒyǒu yùndòngyuán tígōng quántào yùndòng fúzhuāng
4938.english: The company will provide the sports outfits for all the players.

4939.simplified: 水源污染已经达到危及居民健康的程度。
4939.traditional: 水源污染已經達到危及居民健康的程度。
4939.pinyin: shuǐyuán wūrǎn yǐjīng dádào wēijí jūmín jiànkāng de chéngdù
4939.english: Pollution of the water supply reached a level pernicious to the health of the population.

4940.simplified: 这张古老的羊皮纸是在一个精致的铁盒子里发现的。
4940.traditional: 這張古老的羊皮紙是在一個精致的鐵盒子裡發現的。
4940.pinyin: zhè zhāng gǔlǎo de yángpízhǐ shì zài yī gè jīngzhì de tiě hézi lǐ fāxiàn de
4940.english: This ancient parchment was discovered in a delicate iron box.

4941.simplified: 在当前评论风气影响下，她的作品不怎么受欢迎。
4941.traditional: 在當前評論風氣影響下，她的作品不怎麼受歡迎。
4941.pinyin: zài dāngqián pínglùn fēngqì yǐngxiǎng xià tā de zuòpǐn bùzěnme shòuhuānyíng
4941.english: In the current critical climate her work is not popular.

4942.simplified: 我们必须坚持人人都应该被平等对待这一原则。
4942.traditional: 我們必須堅持人人都應該被平等對待這一原則。
4942.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū jiānchí rénrén dōu yīnggāi bèi píngděng duìdài zhè yī yuánzé
4942.english: We adhere to the principle that everyone should be treated fairly.

4943.simplified: 根据专家们的意见，他们马上放弃了这项试验。
4943.traditional: 根據專家們的意見，他們馬上放棄了這項試驗。
4943.pinyin: gēnjù zhuānjiā men de yìjiàn tāmen mǎshàng fàngqì le zhè xiàng shìyàn
4943.english: According to expert opinions, they gave up the experiment immediately.

4944.simplified: 这两个研究所打算合并的事现在已经落空了。
4944.traditional: 這兩個研究所打算合並的事現在已經落空了。
4944.pinyin: zhè liǎng gè yánjiūsuǒ dǎsuàn hébìng de shì xiànzài yǐjīng luòkōng le
4944.english: The proposed amalgamation of the two institutes has mow fallen through.

4945.simplified: 从她那封信的字里行间我得知, 她把他赶了出去。
4945.traditional: 從她那封信的字裡行間我得知, 她把他趕了出去。
4945.pinyin: cóng tā nà fēng xìn de zìlǐhángjiān wǒ dézhī tā bǎ tā gǎn le chūqù
4945.english: Reading between the lines of her letter, I learned she had driven him out.

4946.simplified: 部长对此事的处理方法受到新闻界的严厉批评。
4946.traditional: 部長對此事的處理方法受到新聞界的嚴厲批評。
4946.pinyin: bùzhǎng duì cǐ shì de chǔlǐ fāngfǎ shòudào xīnwénjiè de yánlìpīpíng
4946.english: The minister was crucified by the press for his handling of the affair.

4947.simplified: 为了消磨时间等待展览开始, 我们逛了逛商场。
4947.traditional: 為了消磨時間等待展覽開始, 我們逛了逛商場。
4947.pinyin: wèile xiāomóshíjiān děngdài zhǎnlǎn kāishǐ wǒmen guàng le guàng shāngchǎng
4947.english: To kill time until the exhibition opened, we looked round the shops.

4948.simplified: 当我到达山顶的时候，我有一种巨大的成就感。
4948.traditional: 當我到達山頂的時候，我有一種巨大的成就感。
4948.pinyin: dāng wǒ dàodá shāndǐng de shíhou wǒ yǒu yīzhǒng jùdà de chéngjiù gǎn
4948.english: I felt a great sense of achievement when I reached the top of the mountain.

4949.simplified: 她丰富的经验使她比其他求职者具有有利条件。
4949.traditional: 她豐富的經驗使她比其他求職者具有有利條件。
4949.pinyin: tā fēngfù de jīngyàn shǐ tā bǐ qítā qiúzhízhě jùyǒu yǒulì tiáojiàn
4949.english: Her rich experience gave her an advantage over other applicants for the job.

4950.simplified: 我用业余爱好来消除工作中产生的���张情绪。
4950.traditional: 我用業余愛好來消除工作中產生的���張情緒。
4950.pinyin: wǒ yòng yèyú àihào lái xiāochú gōngzuò zhōng chǎnshēng de jǐnzhāng qíngxù
4950.english: My hobby is a good safety-valve for the tension that builds up at work.

4951.simplified: 他正在寻找未来的妻子，但还没有找到理想人选。
4951.traditional: 他正在尋找未來的妻子，但還沒有找到理想人選。
4951.pinyin: tā zhèngzài xúnzhǎo wèilái de qīzi dàn hái méiyǒu zhǎodào lǐxiǎng rénxuǎn
4951.english: He is looking for a wife but he hasn't found his ideal mate.

4952.simplified: 其实用不着在清晨3点钟就把我叫醒吧.
4952.traditional: 其實用不著在清晨3點鐘就把我叫醒吧.
4952.pinyin: qíshí yòngbuzháo zài qīngchén diǎnzhōng jiù bǎ wǒ jiàoxǐng ba
4952.english: I could have done without being (ie I wish I hadn't been) woken up at 3 o'clock in the morning.

4953.simplified: 我希望你最近转变成的这样子永远不要再变。
4953.traditional: 我希望你最近轉變成的這樣子永遠不要再變。
4953.pinyin: wǒ xīwàng nǐ zuìjìn zhuàn biànchéng de zhèyàngzi yǒngyuǎn bùyào zài biàn
4953.english: I hope you'll never change back from the person you have recently become.

4954.simplified: 她的最新小说尽管广为宣传, 结果还是彻底失败.
4954.traditional: 她的最新小說盡管廣為宣傳, 結果還是徹底失敗.
4954.pinyin: tā de zuìxīn xiǎoshuō jǐnguǎn guǎng wéi xuānchuán jiéguǒ háishi chèdǐshībài
4954.english: Despite all the publicity, her latest novel was a complete flop.

4955.simplified: 我们不会走错路的, 因为我对这儿的街道非常熟悉。
4955.traditional: 我們不會走錯路的, 因為我對這兒的街道非常熟悉。
4955.pinyin: wǒmen bùhuì zǒucuò lù de yīnwèi wǒ duì zhèr de jiēdào fēicháng shúxī
4955.english: We won't go wrong, because I'm quite familiar with the streets here.

4956.simplified: 男校和女校联合而组成了一所新的综合中学.
4956.traditional: 男校和女校聯合而組成了一所新的綜合中學.
4956.pinyin: nán jiào hé nǚ jiào liánhé ér zǔchéng le yī suǒ xīn de zōnghé zhōngxué
4956.english: The boys' and girls' schools have (been) amalgamated to form a new comprehensive.

4957.simplified: 对于求职者，我们优先考虑有一定经验的人。
4957.traditional: 對於求職者，我們優先考慮有一定經驗的人。
4957.pinyin: duìyú qiúzhízhě wǒmen yōuxiān kǎolǜ yǒu yīdìng jīngyàn de rén
4957.english: In considering people for jobs, we give preference to those with some experience.

4958.simplified: 照我这外行人听来, 你的嗓音差不多够专业水平了.
4958.traditional: 照我這外行人聽來, 你的嗓音差不多夠專業水平了.
4958.pinyin: zhào wǒ zhè wài xíngrén tīnglái nǐ de sǎngyīn chàbuduō gòu zhuānyè shuǐpíng le
4958.english: To my untutored ear, your voice sounds almost professional.

4959.simplified: 我有重要消息要告诉你--是好消息, 我得赶紧补充一句.
4959.traditional: 我有重要消息要告訴你--是好消息, 我得趕緊補充一句.
4959.pinyin: wǒ yǒu zhòngyào xiāoxi yào gàosu nǐ shì hǎo xiāoxi wǒ dé gǎnjǐn bǔchōng yījù
4959.english: I have important news for you good news, I hasten to add.

4960.simplified: 把这份报告中的有关事项提交委员会讨论。
4960.traditional: 把這份報告中的有關事項提交委員會討論。
4960.pinyin: bǎ zhè fèn bàogào zhòngdì yǒuguān shìxiàng tíjiāo wěiyuánhuì tǎolùn
4960.english: The relative items in this report will be submitted to the committee for discussion.

4961.simplified: 由于石油短缺, 任何一种新能源都会受欢迎。
4961.traditional: 由於石油短缺, 任何一種新能源都會受歡迎。
4961.pinyin: yóuyú shíyóu duǎnquē rènhé yīzhǒng xīn néngyuán dūhuì shòuhuānyíng
4961.english: Any new source of energy will be welcome, as there is a shortage of petroleum.

4962.simplified: 这种新式飞机在最初几次试飞中表现性能良好。
4962.traditional: 這種新式飛機在最初幾次試飛中表現性能良好。
4962.pinyin: zhèzhǒng xīnshì fēijī zài zuìchū jǐcì shì fēi zhōng biǎoxiàn xìngnéng liánghǎo
4962.english: The new aircraft has performed very well in its initial trials.

4963.simplified: 我们每人各据一间小小的办公室，与其他人分隔开。
4963.traditional: 我們每人各據一間小小的辦公室，與其他人分隔開。
4963.pinyin: wǒmen měirén gè jù yī jiān xiǎoxiǎo de bàngōngshì yǔqí tārén fēngé kāi
4963.english: Each of us is boxed off( from the others)in his own little office.

4964.simplified: 我们的计划顺利完成了，于是我们很快就控制了局面。
4964.traditional: 我們的計劃順利完成了，於是我們很快就控制了局面。
4964.pinyin: wǒmen de jìhuà shùnlì wánchéng le yúshì wǒmen hěn kuài jiù kòngzhì le júmiàn
4964.english: Our plan succeeded, and soon we were in complete control.

4965.simplified: 这间屋子在村子的中心草地上，处于引人注目的位置。
4965.traditional: 這間屋子在村子的中心草地上，處於引人注目的位置。
4965.pinyin: zhè jiān wūzi zài cūnzi de zhōngxīn cǎo dìshang chǔyú yǐnrénzhùmù de wèizhi
4965.english: The house is in a prominent position on the village green.

4966.simplified: 这件事明天可能宣布--也可能不宣布, 看情形吧.
4966.traditional: 這件事明天可能宣布--也可能不宣布, 看情形吧.
4966.pinyin: zhè jiàn shì míngtiān kěnéng xuānbù yě kěnéng bù xuānbù kàn qíngxing ba
4966.english: There may be an announcement about this tomorrow or not, as the case may be.

4967.simplified: 我们原来盼望著下星期放假--看样子走不了了.
4967.traditional: 我們原來盼望著下星期放假--看樣子走不了了.
4967.pinyin: wǒmen yuánlái pànwàng zhe xiàxīngqī fàngjià kànyàngzi zǒu bùliǎo le
4967.english: We were hoping to have a holiday next week as it is, we may not be able to get away.

4968.simplified: 几家公司正为争取一项合同而互相竞争.
4968.traditional: 幾家公司正為爭取一項合同而互相競爭.
4968.pinyin: jǐ jiā gōngsī zhèng wéi zhēngqǔ yī xiàng hétong ér hùxiāng jìngzhēng
4968.english: Several companies are competing (against/with each other) for the contract/to gain the contract.

4969.simplified: 邻居们请他们停止吵闹, 可他们不听还是继续吵闹。
4969.traditional: 鄰居們請他們停止吵鬧, 可他們不聽還是繼續吵鬧。
4969.pinyin: línjū men qǐng tāmen tíngzhǐ chǎonào kě tāmen bù tīng háishi jìxù chǎonào
4969.english: The neighbors asked them to stop making a noise, but they kept on.

4970.simplified: 这个节目给普通观众提供了一个发表意见的机会.
4970.traditional: 這個節目給普通觀眾提供了一個發表意見的機會.
4970.pinyin: zhège jiémù gěi pǔtōng guānzhòng tígōng le yī gè fābiǎo yìjiàn de jīhuì
4970.english: This programme gives ordinary viewers a chance to make their voice(s) heard.

4971.simplified: 他有个不大讨人喜欢的特点，就是爱当众责备妻子。
4971.traditional: 他有個不大討人喜歡的特點，就是愛當眾責備妻子。
4971.pinyin: tā yǒu gè bùdà tǎorénxǐhuan de tèdiǎn jiùshì ài dāngzhòng zébèi qīzi
4971.english: One of his less attractive traits is criticizing his wife in public.

4972.simplified: 我们的部队已经退下来重新整编，以便发动新的进攻。
4972.traditional: 我們的部隊已經退下來重新整編，以便發動新的進攻。
4972.pinyin: wǒmen de bùduì yǐjīng tuì xiàlai chóngxīn zhěng biān yǐbiàn fādòng xīn de jìngōng
4972.english: Our armies have retired to regroup for a fresh attack.

4973.simplified: 如今必须有高度的竞争意识才能在体育运动中取胜.
4973.traditional: 如今必須有高度的競爭意識才能在體育運動中取勝.
4973.pinyin: rújīn bìxū yǒu gāodù de jìngzhēng yìshí cáinéng zài tǐyùyùndòng zhōng qǔshèng
4973.english: You have to be highly competitive to do well in sport nowadays.

4974.simplified: 自从原子动力问世以后，工业发生了巨大的变化。
4974.traditional: 自從原子動力問世以後，工業發生了巨大的變化。
4974.pinyin: zìcóng yuánzǐ dònglì wènshì yǐhòu gōngyè fāshēng le jùdà de biànhuà
4974.english: Since the advent of atomic power, there have been great changes in industry.

4975.simplified: 维修手册向您提供修理汽车所需的图表和说明。
4975.traditional: 維修手冊向您提供修理汽車所需的圖表和說明。
4975.pinyin: wéixiū shǒucè xiàng nín tígōng xiūlǐ qìchē suǒxū de túbiǎo hé shuōmíng
4975.english: A maintenance manual gives diagrams and instructions for repairing your car.

4976.simplified: 餐厅的名字未必能告诉你很多它所供应的食物。
4976.traditional: 餐廳的名字未必能告訴你很多它所供應的食物。
4976.pinyin: cāntīng de míngzi wèibì néng gàosu nǐ hěn duō tā suǒ gōngyìng de shíwù
4976.english: The name of a restaurant won't necessarily tell you much about the food it serves.

4977.simplified: 那里的人民正在为摆脱外国统治争取自由而战斗。
4977.traditional: 那裡的人民正在為擺脫外國統治爭取自由而戰斗。
4977.pinyin: nàli de rénmín zhèngzài wéi bǎituō wàiguó tǒngzhì zhēngqǔ zìyóu ér zhàndòu
4977.english: The people there are fighting to gain their freedom from foreign control.

4978.simplified: 伙食费方式是每人20美元，吃五顿早餐和四顿晚餐。
4978.traditional: 伙食費方式是每人20美元，吃五頓早餐和四頓晚餐。
4978.pinyin: huǒshífèi fāngshì shì měirén Měiyuán chī wǔ dùn zǎocān hé sì dùn wǎncān
4978.english: The meal plan be20 dollars each for five breakfast and four supper.

4979.simplified: 在沙漠地带，绝大多数时间都是大晴天，下雨天极少。
4979.traditional: 在沙漠地帶，絕大多數時間都是大晴天，下雨天極少。
4979.pinyin: zài shāmò dìdài juédàduōshù shíjiān dōu shì dà qíngtiān xiàyǔ tiān jíshǎo
4979.english: Sunny days predominate over rainy days in desert regions.

4980.simplified: 她做护士很不顺心, 但当管理人员似乎倒很适合.
4980.traditional: 她做護士很不順心, 但當管理人員似乎倒很適合.
4980.pinyin: tā zuò hùshi hěn bù shùnxīn dàn dāng guǎnlǐ rényuán sìhū dǎo hěn shìhé
4980.english: As a nurse she got very frustrated, but being an administrator seems to suit her.

4981.simplified: 李把他在生意中的道德标准运用到私人关系中去。
4981.traditional: 李把他在生意中的道德標准運用到私人關系中去。
4981.pinyin: lǐ bǎ tā zài shēngyì zhòngdì dàodé biāozhǔn yùnyòng dào sīrén guānxi zhōng qù
4981.english: Lee carries over his business ethics into his personal relationships.

4982.simplified: 这位女士的年纪在五十岁之上，决不会少于五十岁。
4982.traditional: 這位女士的年紀在五十歲之上，決不會少於五十歲。
4982.pinyin: zhèwèi nǚshì de niánjì zài wǔshí suì zhīshàng jué bùhuì shǎo yú wǔshí suì
4982.english: The woman may be above fifty, but (she may) not (be) below fifty.

4983.simplified: 她必须与拥护她的那些比较偏激的人保持一定的距离.
4983.traditional: 她必須與擁護她的那些比較偏激的人保持一定的距離.
4983.pinyin: tā bìxū yǔ yōnghù tā de nàxiē bǐjiào piānjī de rén bǎochí yīdìng de jùlí
4983.english: She needs to distance herself from some of her more extreme supporters.

4984.simplified: 那幅画给我们提供了采用透视画法的最早的范例.
4984.traditional: 那幅畫給我們提供了采用透視畫法的最早的范例.
4984.pinyin: nà fú huà gěi wǒmen tígōng le cǎiyòng tòushìhuàfǎ de zuì zǎo de fànlì
4984.english: The painting provides us with one of the earliest examples of the use of perspective.

4985.simplified: 球拍用于各种运动的球拍，如乒乓球和网球的球拍
4985.traditional: 球拍用於各種運動的球拍，如乒乓球和網球的球拍
4985.pinyin: qiúpāi yòngyú gèzhǒng yùndòng de qiúpāi rú pīngpāngqiú hé wǎngqiú de qiúpāi
4985.english: The racket used in various games, such as table tennis or racquets.

4986.simplified: 我们正处于严重危险之中，我们必须把军人动员起来。
4986.traditional: 我們正處於嚴重危險之中，我們必須把軍人動員起來。
4986.pinyin: wǒmen zhèng chǔyú yánzhòng wēixiǎn zhīzhōng wǒmen bìxū bǎ jūnrén dòngyuán qilai
4986.english: Our country's in great danger; we must mobilize the army.

4987.simplified: 他似乎比较像一个军官，而不像一个商业行政主管。
4987.traditional: 他似乎比較像一個軍官，而不像一個商業行政主管。
4987.pinyin: tā sìhū bǐjiào xiàng yī gè jūnguān ér bù xiàng yī gè shāngyè xíngzhèng zhǔguǎn
4987.english: He seems more like a military officer than a business executive.

4988.simplified: 这个小男孩沿着草地的边上走，小心不踩到地里。
4988.traditional: 這個小男孩沿著草地的邊上走，小心不踩到地裡。
4988.pinyin: zhège xiǎo nánhái yánzhe cǎodì de biān shàng zǒu xiǎoxīn bù cǎi dào dì lǐ
4988.english: The little boy walked along the grass verge, trying not to step into the field.

4989.simplified: 我不相信能力均等，但我确实相信机会均等。
4989.traditional: 我不相信能力均等，但我確實相信機會均等。
4989.pinyin: wǒ bù xiāngxìn nénglì jūnděng dàn wǒ quèshí xiāngxìn jīhuì jūnděng
4989.english: I do not believe in equality of capacity, but I do believe in equality of opportunity.

4990.simplified: 使醉的喝醉了的，被麻醉品例如可卡因或大麻麻醉了的
4990.traditional: 使醉的喝醉了的，被麻醉品例如可卡因或大麻麻醉了的
4990.pinyin: shǐzuì de hēzuì le de bèi mázuì pǐn lìrú kěkǎyīn huò dàmá mázuì le de
4990.english: Intoxicated by or as if by alcohol or a drug, such as cocaine or marijuana.

4991.simplified: 他把空余时间都用在园艺上了, 没有任何其他爱好.
4991.traditional: 他把空余時間都用在園藝上了, 沒有任何其他愛好.
4991.pinyin: tā bǎ kòngyú shíjiān dōu yòng zài yuányì shàng le méiyǒu rènhé qítā àihào
4991.english: He spent his spare time gardening, to the exclusion of all other interests.

4992.simplified: 我正在成人学校补习法语，到时好让他们大吃一惊。
4992.traditional: 我正在成人學校補習法語，到時好讓他們大吃一驚。
4992.pinyin: wǒ zhèngzài chéngrén xuéxiào bǔxí Fǎyǔ dàoshí hǎo ràng tāmen dàchīyījīng
4992.english: I'm brushing up on my French at adult school just to surprise them.

4993.simplified: 我们所有的建议都遭到拒绝，不管这些建议的价值如何。
4993.traditional: 我們所有的建議都遭到拒絕，不管這些建議的價值如何。
4993.pinyin: wǒmen suǒyǒu de jiànyì dōu zāodào jùjué bùguǎn zhèxiē jiànyì de jiàzhí rúhé
4993.english: All our proposals were rejected, regardless of their merits.

4994.simplified: 和面的方法很简单，只要把水和在面粉里就行了。
4994.traditional: 和面的方法很簡單，只要把水和在面粉裡就行了。
4994.pinyin: huómiàn de fāngfǎ hěn jiǎndān zhǐyào bǎ shuǐ hé zài miànfěn lǐ jiù xíng le
4994.english: The way to make dough is very simple as you need only to mix flour with water.

4995.simplified: 大多数西红柿成熟时是红色的，但有些品种是黄色的。
4995.traditional: 大多數西紅柿成熟時是紅色的，但有些品種是黃色的。
4995.pinyin: dàduōshù xīhóngshì chéngshú shí shì hóngsè de dàn yǒuxiē pǐnzhǒng shì huángsè de
4995.english: Most tomatoes are red when ripe, but some kinds are yellow.

4996.simplified: 我没来得及把每件事都安排好, 因此心里七上八下的.
4996.traditional: 我沒來得及把每件事都安排好, 因此心裡七上八下的.
4996.pinyin: wǒ méi láidejí bǎ měi jiàn shì dōu ānpái hǎo yīncǐ xīnli qīshàngbāxià de
4996.english: I haven't had time to arrange everything, so I'm all at sixes and sevens.

4997.simplified: 她向我讲述了他是怎样跑到她跟前抢走她的手提包的.
4997.traditional: 她向我講述了他是怎樣跑到她跟前搶走她的手提包的.
4997.pinyin: tā xiàng wǒ jiǎngshù le tā shì zěnyàng pǎo dào tā gēnqián qiǎngzǒu tā de shǒutíbāo de
4997.english: She described to me how he ran up to her and grabbed her handbag.

4998.simplified: 只因为我的新书包和他的一模一样，他就说我学他的样。
4998.traditional: 只因為我的新書包和他的一模一樣，他就說我學他的樣。
4998.pinyin: zhǐ yīnwèi wǒ de xīn shūbāo hé tā de yīmúyīyàng tā jiù shuō wǒ xué tā de yàng
4998.english: He called me a copycat just because my schoolbag looks like his.

4999.simplified: 临近终点时，那几匹马齐头并进，简直分不出先后。
4999.traditional: 臨近終點時，那幾匹馬齊頭並進，簡直分不出先後。
4999.pinyin: línjìn zhōngdiǎn shí nà jǐ pǐ mǎ qítóubìngjìn jiǎnzhí fēn bù chū xiānhòu
4999.english: As the horses raced towards the finishing post, there was nothing in it.

5000.simplified: 分隔物，分界线分界物或分割物，用作分配或分类
5000.traditional: 分隔物，分界線分界物或分割物，用作分配或分類
5000.pinyin: fēngé wù fēnjièxiàn fēn jiè wù huò fēngē wù yòngzuò fēnpèi huò fēnlèi
5000.english: Something, such as a boundary or partition, that serves to divide or keep separate.
